
PANGASINENSE I Timothy


1Ti 1:1 Si Pablo, sakey ya apostol nen Cristo Jesus onong ed panagbilin na Dios a Manangilaban tayo, tan si Cristo Jesus ya ilalo tayo; 

1Ti 1:2 Isulat ko ed Timoteo, matuan ana' ko ed pananisia: Gracia, panangasi, deen, na Dios ya Ama tayo tan si Cristo Jesus a Katawan tayo. 

1Ti 1:3 Onong a kinerew ko ed sika a natila'ka komon diman ed Efeso, nen amaarapak ed Macedonia, pian ibilin mo komon ed saray arum a totoo ya ag ira mangibangat na sananey a bangat, 

1Ti 1:4 Tan ag da arapen so saray labilabir tan polipoli ya angapo so kasumpalan to ya mamalesay sangsangan, anta pakapikabatan komon ed Dios, a dia ed pananisia; ontan so oliten ko natan a gawaen. 

1Ti 1:5 Ingen say kipaakaran na bilin sikato so aro a nanlapu ed sakey a puso a malinis tan dia ed maabig a linawa tan dia ed pananisian aliwan konwari; 

1Ti 1:6 Diad sarayan bengatla diad insian na saray arum, pinmaliis ira ed tua et linmara dia ed andi kabaliksan a salsalita; 

1Ti 1:7 A pirawrawat da so managbangat na gangan, angan ag da natatalosan so gangan a sasalitaen da, angan say patuaen da a malmalet. 

1Ti 1:8 Sikatayo balet amta tayo a say gangan sikato so maong, no sakey a too et sikatoy agamilen to ed maturing, 

1Ti 1:9 A kabat tayo so saya, a say gangan ag-agawa nipaakar ed matunong a too no ag dia ed saray ag matunong ed gangan tan saray masoknar, dia ed saray andian na Dios, tan dia ed saray managkasalanan, dia ed saray mauges tan saray ag mangigalang ed bengatlan masantos, dia ed saray managpatey ed ama tan saray managpatey ed ina, tan saray managpatey na too, 

1Ti 1:10 Dia ed saray managlawan, dia ed saray managkasalanan onong ed saray kapara a lalaki, dia ed saray managtakew na totoo, dia ed saray matitila, dia ed saray managsamba ed tila, tan no wala ni arum a sananey a bengatla ya onsumpa ed maabig a bangat; 

1Ti 1:11 Onong na evangelio na gloria na bendito a Dios, a nimatelek ed siak. 

1Ti 1:12 Misalamatak ed Saman so amakasil ed siak, salanti Cristo Jesus, a Katawan tayo, lapu ed imbilang to ak a matoor, ya tinoro to ak ed panaglinkor; 

1Ti 1:13 Angan siak a nen saman maayew-ak, tan manamaseg-segang tan managdumsis ak; balet akarapat ak na panangasi, lapu ed sikato so ginawak ya andi amamta, nen agak ni anisia; 

1Ti 1:14 Tan lalon ag asabsabaan so gracia'y Katawan tayo lapu ed pananisia, tan aro ya wala ed Cristo Jesus. 

1Ti 1:15 Matoor so saya a salita, tan manepeg ya awaten na ami-amin, a si Cristo Jesus linma dia ed mundo pian ilaban to so saray managkasalanan; a dia ed sikara siak so manonaan: 

1Ti 1:16 Balet lapu ed saya agamoran ko so panangasi, pian dia ed siak ya manonaan, si Jesu-Cristo ipanengneng to so amin ya alablabas ya anos to, pian uliran na saray manisia ed kaonoran dia ed sikato nipaakar ed bilay ya andi anga. 

1Ti 1:17 Kanian dia ed Ari ya andi anga, ag ompatey, ag nanengneng, say saksakey a Dios, niiter komon so dayew tan gloria lawas ed ando lan ando. Amen. 

1Ti 1:18 Sayan gangan ipiyak ed sika, ana'ko a Timoteo, onong ed saray linmabas a profecia a nipaakar ed sika, pian mansondalo ka komon lapu ed sikara ed maabig ya inkasondalo; 

1Ti 1:19 A mansiansia ka ed pananisia tan dia ed sakey a maabig a linawa; ta dia ed impangikaindan na arum ed saraya sikara so nagba ed pananisia: 

1Ti 1:20 A sakey ed sikara si Himeneo tan Alejandro; a sikara so initer ko ed Satanas, pian aralen da so ag manayew. 



1Ti 2:1 Ipure'ko sirin, a manonaan, a nagawa komon so saray pangitagleey, pikakasi, panangyesel, pisasalamat, nisengeg ed saray amin a totoo; 

1Ti 2:2 Nisengeg ed saray arari tan amin ya wala ed atagey a betang; pian napalabas tayo so sakey a bilay a mareen tan mapayapa ed amin a kasimpitan tan kabintaan. 

1Ti 2:3 Saya sikato so maong tan makapalikliket ed arap na Dios a Manangilaban tayo; 

1Ti 2:4 A sikato labay to a saray amin a totoo nilaban ira komon, tan ondago' ra ed pakapikabat ed katuaan. 

1Ti 2:5 Ta wala so saksakey a Dios, tan saksakey met a Manamegley ed Dios tan saray totoo, say too, si Cristo Jesus, 

1Ti 2:6 Ya inter to so inkasikato ya inpanondon ed saray ganagana; pian pantasi ed saraman la a panaon to; 

1Ti 2:7 Et nipaakar ed saya nipasen ak a managpulong tan apostol (salitaen ko so tua, ya agak mantila, a managbangat na saray Gentiles ed pananisia tan katuaan. 

1Ti 2:8 Pirawat ko sirin a saray totoo mikasi'ra komon dia ed ganagana ya pasen, ya itagey da so malinis a kalimaan da, ya angapo so sanok tan siblangan. 

1Ti 2:9 Ontan met so saray bibii a manpales ira na masimpit, a manparakep ira na mabinta tan madangka; aleg ed saray buek a nilaga, tan balitok odino perlas odino kawes ya angkabli; 

1Ti 2:10 No ag ingen dia ed saray maabig a gawa (a sikato so matokoy ed saray bibii a labay da so mansimpit). 

1Ti 2:11 Say bii manaral komon dia ed andi ese-esel a maimatlek lawas. 

1Ti 2:12 Et ingen ag ko aboloyan so bii a manbangat, odino walay pakauley to ed laki, no ag ingen wala komon ed andi esel. 

1Ti 2:13 Ta si Adan pinalsa ya inmuna, insan si Eva; 

1Ti 2:14 Tan si Adan ag inpatilaan, ingen say bii, nen atilaan, naplag ed kasalanan: 

1Ti 2:15 Angaman ontan nilaban dia ed pangyanak to ed saray anak, no sikara so mansiansia ed pananisia tan panangaro tan inkasanto a sidadangka. 



1Ti 3:1 Matua so saya a salita, No wala so maliket ed betang ya obispo, maong a gawa so pirawa'to. 

1Ti 3:2 Nakaokolan sirin a say obispo angapo komon so kabalawan to, asawa na saksakey a bi-i, maadia, maong so pakalikna to, mabinta, managparawes, maong a manbangat; 

1Ti 3:3 Aliwa'n mainum na alak, aliwa'n masepak; no ag ingen maong so ugali to, aliwa'n makolkol, aliwan maaro na pilak;

1Ti 3:4 Sakey ya uleyan to'n maong so abung to a dili, a peteken to so saray anak to ed amin a kabintaan; 

1Ti 3:5 (Ta say ag to amta so mangoksoy ed abung to'n dili, panon so pangimaton to ed iglesia na Dios?) 

1Ti 3:6 Aliwa'n balo a binangatan, ompan manpangaya et napelag ed panusa ed diablo. 

1Ti 3:7 Utang to ni ya wala so maabig a balita to ed saray taga paway; ompan napelag ed balaw tan dia ed kalot na diablo. 

1Ti 3:8 Ontan met na saray diacono masimpit ira komon, aliwa'n duara so dilara, aliwara'n mainum na dakel ya alak, aliwara'n maagum na pilak; 

1Ti 3:9 Ya agamilen da so misterio na pananisia dia ed maralos a linawa. 

1Ti 3:10 Et saraya sikara so nasalini ya onona; et dia ed ontan ontulong ira a singa diacono, no angapo so kabalawan da. 

1Ti 3:11 Ontan met na saray bibii mabintara komon, aliwa ra'n managpauges, madangka ra, matoor ira ed saray amin a bengatla. 

1Ti 3:12 Saray diacono asawa komon ira na saksakey a bii, oleyan da'n maong so saray anak da tan kaabungan da. 

1Ti 3:13 Ta saray nanagamil a maong ed betang a diacono akagamor ira na sakey a maabig a kipapasen a nipaakar ed sikara, tan baleg a kakpelan ed pananisia ed Cristo Jesus. 

1Ti 3:14 Saraya'n bengatla isulat ko ed sika, ya aalagden ko so pakakar ko ed sika ed magano; 

1Ti 3:15 Ingen no manbayag ak ed andukey a panaon, pian nakabatan mo no panon so nepeg ya ugalien na totoo diman ed Abung na Dios, a sikato so iglesia na Dios a mabilay, a lusek tan sakorong na katuaan. 

1Ti 3:16 Tan andi supiatan, baleg so misterio na kasantosan; Say nipatnag ed laman, Apatonong ed espiritu, anengneng na saray angel, Nipolpulong ed saray nacion,Asisia dia ed mundo, naawat diman ed tagey ed gloria. 

1Ti 4:1 Et ingen say Espiritu kuan to ed maliwawa, a dia ed saray arapen a panaon saray arum onsian ira ed pananisia, a denglen da so saray espiritu a manangilawan tan saray bangat na saray demonio, 

1Ti 4:2 A mansalita ra a mankinonsimpit na tila, ya amarkaan so dili'n conciencia'ra a singa say balat-yang a mandarlang; 

1Ti 4:3 Ya yaawa ra so pankasal da, tan say panangan ed saray asalian a pinalsa na Dios pian awaten komon ira a tooran na saray pisasalamat na saramay mananisia tan saray mikabat na katuaan. 

1Ti 4:4 Ta ganagana'y pinalsa na Dios sikara so maabig, tan angapo so manepeg ya ipulisay, no naawat a tooran na pisasalamat: 

1Ti 4:5 Ta sikato so napasantos lapu ed panamegley na salita na Dios tan say pikakasi. 

1Ti 4:6 No ipaliwawam ed saray agagi so saya'n bengatla, sika naani sakey a maabig a ministro nen Cristo Jesus, a naiwi ed saray salita na pananisia, tan say maabig a tinombok mo ya anga ed natan: 

1Ti 4:7 Ingen paliisan mo so labilabir ya ag-manepeg ed Dios tan saray tongtong na saray akukulaw. Tan sayaen mo so inkasika ed kagagawa na kasantosan: 

1Ti 4:8 Ta dia ed pansaya ed laman daiset so pinanabang; ingen say kasantosan mangiter na pinanabang ed amin a bengatla, ta wala ed sikato so sipan na saya'n bilay a peles, tan say onsabi. 

1Ti 4:9 Tua so sayan salita, tan manepeg ya awaten na saray ganagana. 

1Ti 4:10 Ta lapu'd saya lanti mansagpot tan mantepel kami, lapu ed wala kamin manilalo ed Dios a mabilay a sikato so Manangilaban ed saray amin a totoo, lalo ed saray manisia. 

1Ti 4:11 Ibilin mo so saraya'n bengatla tan sikara so ibangat mo. 

1Ti 4:12 Angapo komon so manmormora ed kaugawan mo; no-ag ingen, sika komon so uliran ed saray manisia, dia ed salita, dia ed panagbilay, dia ed aro, dia ed pananisia, dia ed kasimpitan. 

1Ti 4:13 Anga ed yakar kod tan, manseet ka ed panagbasa, ed panagkalar, ed panangibangat. 

1Ti 4:14 Ag mo italirak so langkap ya wala ed sika, a niiter ed sika ed panamegley na profecia, dia ed inkitapew na saray limalima na saray presbitero. 

1Ti 4:15 Seetan mo so saraya'n bengatla, sikara labat so arapen mo; pian say ibobonam nipatnag komon ed saray ganagana.

1Ti 4:16 Imatonan mo so kaabigan na laman mo' tan say ibabangat mo. Mansiansia ka ed saraya'n bengatla; ta no gawaen mo so saraya, nilaban mo so inkasika tan saray ondengel met ed sika. 



1Ti 5:1 Ag mo banoen so sakey a masiken, no-ag ingen sikato so simbawaen mo a singa ama; saray tobonbalo simbawam ira a singa agagi: 

1Ti 5:2 Saray akukulaw singa'ra say ina, saray mamarikit singa ra agagi, dia ed amin a kasimpitan. 

1Ti 5:3 Pagalangan mo so saray bibi-i a babalo a sikara so peteg a balo. 

1Ti 5:4 Bang-balet no wala so balo ya wala'ra so anak to odino apo, amtaen na saraya komon ya onona ya ipanengneng so kasimpitan da ed kaamong da'n dili, tan tomangan da so kaatengan da: ta saya sikato so makapalikliket ed arap na Dios. 

1Ti 5:5 Say tua a balo, tan manbokbokor, manilalo ed Dios, tan mansiansia ed saray pikakasi tan pikekerew ed labi tan agew. 

1Ti 5:6 Balet say manbilay ed saray likeliket, angaman sibibilay wala la ya inatey. 

1Ti 5:7 Ibilin mo met ed sikara so saraya'n bengatla, pian angapo komon so kabalawan da. 

1Ti 5:8 Balet no wala so ag managano ed anak to, tan lalo la ed saray kakaamong to a dili, pinaandi to la so pananisia, et sikato so lalo'n mauges nen say ag manisia. 

1Ti 5:9 Aleg komon a pailista a manlinkor ya angan siopaman a singa balo no angapo ni anem-a-plo a taon to, tan asawa na saksakey a too, 

1Ti 5:10 Ya wala so maong a balita to nipaakar ed saray maabig a gawa; no nankomis ed saray anak, no amanawes ed saray sankaili, no inorasan to so sali-sali na saray sasanto, no tinolongan to so saray maermen, no tinumbok to ed malet so ganagana'n maabig a gawa. 

1Ti 5:11 Balet ag mo awaten so saray balo ya ugu-gaw: ta onpan magmaliw ira'n mabanday a sumpa ed Cristo, pirawat da so miasawa; 

1Ti 5:12 A napelag ira ed kadusa lapu'd binenegan da so inmona a pananisia. 

1Ti 5:13 Tan iluamen da so mangiras ya onla ra ed saray kaabungan; tan aliwa labat ya mangiras no-ag ingen matongtong ira tan misasalet, a salitaen da so saray bengatla ya ag da kanepegan. 

1Ti 5:14 Pirawat ko lanti a saray ugugaw a balo miasawa'ra komon, mananak ira, oksoyen da so abung da, tan ag ira mangiter ed kabusol na antokaman a sengeg na panayew: 

1Ti 5:15 Ta saray arum la sinmian ira a tinmumbok ed Satanas. 

1Ti 5:16 No wala so bi-i a manisia ya wala so saray balo to, sikara'y taganoen to komon, pian ag nabelatan so iglesia, pian natolongan to so saray tua a balo. 

1Ti 5:17 Saray mamasiken a manuley a maong nibilang ira komon a manepeg ed mamidua'n dayew, nagkalalo la ed saray mansagpot ed salita tan dia ed panagbangat. 

1Ti 5:18 Ta kuan na Sulat: Ag mo balongosan so sangi na vaca a manilik na pagey. Tan, Say mananeger sikato so manepeg ed upa to. 

1Ti 5:19 Ag ka mangaawat na pangidalem ya onsumpa ed sakey a masiken, likod no wala so duara odino talora a tasi. 

1Ti 5:20 Saray nankasalanan, simbawam ira ed arapan na saray ganagana, pian saray arum wala met so takot da. 

1Ti 5:21 Kerewen ko ed sika dia ed arap na Dios tan si Cristo Jesus, tan saray angel ya apili a sumpalen mo so sarayan bengatla ya angapo so pa nangiduma, ya angapo so gawaen ed walay lalabien. 

1Ti 5:22 Ag mo itapew so saray limalimam dia ed magano ed angan siopa tan ag ka met minonong ed sa kasalanan na saray arum: mansiansia ka ed kasimpitan. 

1Ti 5:23 Ag kala uni-inum na danum, ag ingen agamil mo so daiset ya a lapu ed losok mo tan saray mabetbet a saki-sakit mo. 

1Ti 5:24 Saray kasalanan na saraya a too dia ed arapen na ipatnag ed kaokom, wala lara a maliway balet dia ed saray arum nagawa kayari. 

1Ti 5:25 Ontan met wala so saray maabig a gawa a sikara so nipatnag; et saray sananey so inkagawa'ra ag nayari'n niamot. 



1Ti 6:1 Amin na saray wala ed leksab; na pako na inkaaripen ibilang da komon so saray kakatawan da a dili a manepeg ed saray amin a dayew pian say ngaran na Dios tan say bangat ag da komon namormora. 

1Ti 6:2 Tan saray wala so kakatawan da a mananisia, ag da komon kulangan so panangigalang da, lapu ed agagira, no ag ingen manlinkor ira komon ed lalo ya abig ed sikara, lapu'd sikara so matoor tan araroen onong a makapinabang ira ed satan ya abig. Ibangat mo tan ibilin mo so saraya'n bengatla. 

1Ti 6:3 No wala so mangibangat na sananey a bangat, tan ag onaboloy ed saray salita, saianti saray salita na Katawan tayo'n Jesu-Cristo, tan say bangat a tokoy ed kasimpitan; 

1Ti 6:4 Sikato so mapangta, ya angapoy amta to, no-ag ingen kinmalog so olo to nisengeg ed saray pikokolkol tan pisasang-sangan ed saray salita, a sikato so panaglapoan na siblet, kolkol, panamabaing, saray mauges ya inap, 

1Ti 6:5 Siblangan na saray totoo a mauges so kalakal da, et ag da amta so tua, ya inapen da a say kasimpitan sikato so anapen. 

1Ti 6:6 Balet say kasimpitan sikato so baleg a gunguna no tooran na pamasarag: 

1Ti 6:7 Ta angapo so intarok tayo dia ed mundo, et ag tayo met nayariay mangala na antokaman a bengatla; 

1Ti 6:8 No wala siri pantagano tayo tan kawesen tayo pasaragen tayo komon ya. 

1Ti 6:9 Balet saray manpirawat ya onyaman napelag ira ed sakey a katoksoan tan say kalot tan dia ed saray dakel ya agum a maksay tan makaderal a kaalakan, a mangipalereg ed saray totoo ed kagegeba tan kababalang. 

1Ti 6:10 Ta say aro ed pilak sikato so sakey a lamut na saray amin a nengneng na mauges; sikato a sanen inaguman na saray arum, abalbalang ira ed pananisia, tan atalos ira na dakel a kaermenan. 

1Ti 6:11 Balet sika, O too na Dios, tainan mo so sarayan bengatla, tan ontombo'ka ed kaptekan, kasantosan, pananisia, aro, anos, kaoyamoan. 

1Ti 6:12 Mibakal ka ed maabig a pibabakal na pananisia, benbenan mo so bilay ya andi anga, a sikato so atawagan mo, tan impaliwawam so maabig ya panamatua ed arapan na saray dakel a tasi. 

1Ti 6:13 Ibilin ko ed sika ed arap na Dios, a mangiter na bilay ed saray amin ya bengatla tan ed Cristo Jesus, a sikato so nantasi ed arap nen Pilato na maabig ya panamatua; 

1Ti 6:14 A sumpalen mo komon so saray bilin, ya angapo so tilol to, angapo so kabalawan to, anga ed ipatnag nen Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo: 

1Ti 6:15 A sikato sano panaon to ipanengneng to so bendito tan saksakey a Makapanyari, Ari na saray arari, tan Katawan na saray kakatawan: 

1Ti 6:16 A sikato labat so wala ed andi ed ipapatey, a manayam ed sakey a liwawa ya ag na-asingeran; a sikato so ag nanengneng na angan siopa ed saray totoo, et sikato so ag nayari a nengnengen: dia ed sikato niiter komon so dayew tan say pakapanyari ya andi anga. Amen. 

1Ti 6:17 Dia ed saray mangayaman dia ed mundo, ibilin mo ed sikara ya ag ira mantagey na linawa, tan agda met igaton so ilalo ra ed saray kayamanan a panduaruaan, no-ag dia ed Dios, a sikato so mangiter ed sikatayo ed daakan na saray amin a bengatla a pinabangan tayo; 

1Ti 6:18 A mangawa ra komon na maabig, a mayaman ira komon ed saray maabig a gawa, a managpalangkap ira, a mainomay ira'n mangiter; 

1Ti 6:19 A mantipon ira na nipaakar ed sikara ed sakey a maabig a pangiletnegan a niparaan ed panaon ya onsabi, pian nabenbenan da so bilay, a sikato so bilay a peteg. 

1Ti 6:20 O Timoteo, imatonan mo so nimatalek ed sika, ya onarawi ka ed saray tongtong ya ag onnepeg ed Dios tan saray siblangan na ningaranan a kakabatan balet aliwa a tua; 

1Ti 6:21 A sikato nen tinombok na saray arum, abalang ira nipaakar ed pananisia. Say gracia komon so wala ed sika. 


PANGASINENSE I Thessalonians


1Th 1:1 Di Pablo, tan Silvano, tan Timoteo, isulat da ed iglesia na saray taga Tesalonica dia ed Dios ya Ama tan say Katawan a Jesu-Cristo: Gracia komon ed sikayo tan deen. 

1Th 1:2 Misalsalamat kami ed Dios ya andi ebas lapu ed sikayo ya amin, a sasalangbiten mi kayo ed saray pikakasi mi: 

1Th 1:3 A nodnonoten mi ya andi tonda so gawa yo ed pananisia tan sagpot yo ed aro tan anus yo ed ilalo ed Katawan tayo'n Jesu-Cristo, ed arap na Dios tan Ama tayo; 

1Th 1:4 A kabat mi, agagi ya inararo na Dios, so inkapili yo, 

1Th 1:5 Onong ed say evangelio tayo ag sinmabi ed sikayo ed salita labat, noag dia ed pakayari met, tan dia ed Espiritu Santo, tan dia ed dakel a pamasekder; onong na singa pikakabat yo no anto so inkatoo mi ya inparongtal mi a dili ed sikayo a nisengeg ed sikayo. 

1Th 1:6 Tan nagmaliw kayo'n managalig ed sikami, tan dia ed Katawan, ya inawat yo so salita ed baleg a kaermenan, sililiket ed Espiritu Santo; 

1Th 1:7 A dia ed saya nagmaliw kayo'n pangaligan na amin a mananisia ya walara ed Macedonia tan dia ed Acaya. 

1Th 1:8 Ta dia ed sikayo so nanlapuan na inageeg na salita na Katawan, aliwa labat a dia ed Macedonia tan Acaya, no ag dia ed ganagana a pasen say pananisia yo ed Dios sikato so nikayat; kanian ag tayo la kaokolan a salitaen so bengatla. 

1Th 1:9 Ta sikaran dili so mangibaga na nipaakar ed sikami no panon so wala a kaloloob mi ed sikayo; tan no panon so inbeneg yo ed saray talintao ya inmarap kayo ed Dios, pian manlinkor kayo ed Dios a sibibilay tan matua, 

1Th 1:10 Tan manalagar ed Anak to a manlapu ed tawen, a sikato so pinabangon to ed saray inaatey, si Jesus, a mangilaban ed sikatayo ed sanok ya onsabi. 



1Th 2:1 Ta sikayo'n dili, agagik ira, amtayo so iloloob mi ed sikayo, ya ag aromog ya andikakanaan: 

1Th 2:2 No ag bangta nantepel kami nen saman, tan makapabaing so inpakapairap mi ed Filipo, onong na kabat yo, apabayani kami ed Dios tayo a mangisalita ed sikayo na evangelio na Dios ed dakel a sumpaan. 

1Th 2:3 Lapu ed say panangibangat mi agtinekepan na lingo, ni karumsisan, ni kasaolan; 

1Th 2:4 No ag say onong na inabobonan na Dios ed sikami a pangipian na evangelio, ontan so pisalita mi; aliwa'n singa pamaliket ed saray totoo, no ag dia ed Dios a sikato so manali ed saray kapusoan tayo. 

1Th 2:5 Ta angan kapigan man ag kami nanagamil na saray salita a panangala na lupa, onong na kabat yo, ni angyamot na kaaguman, say Dios sikato so tasi; 

1Th 2:6 Ni mananap na galang ed saray totoo, ni manlapu ed sikayo, ni manlapu ed saray arum, anta nayarian mi komon so pasakbat ed sikayo, onong ed apostol kami nen Cristo. 

1Th 2:7 No ag say maoyamo kami ed pegley yo. a singa sakey a sigsiwa a managano na dili'n anak to: 

1Th 2:8 Ontan mi met, a maibibeg kami'n mangaro ed sikayo, apaliket kami'n toloy a mangipanabang ed sikayo, na aliwa'n say evangelio na Dios labat, no ag met saray dili'n kakamarerwa mi, ta nagmaliw kayo a sankablian ed sikami. 

1Th 2:9 Ta nonot yo, agagi, so saray sagpot tan irirap mi: a mankikimey kami ed labi tan agew, pian komon ag kami makabelbelat ed angan siopa ed sikayo, inpulong mi ed sikayo so evangelio'y Dios. 

1Th 2:10 Sikayo so saray tasi, tan say Dios met, ed ontan la a sankasantosan tan sankaptekan tan andi kasalanan so ugali mi'n dili a nipaakar ed sikayo a manisia: 

1Th 2:11 Onong na kabat yo no panon so panangimano mi ed balang sakey ed sikayo, a singa sakey ya ama ed saray dili'n anak to, a kakalaran mi kayo, tan pababayanien mi kayo, tan tatasian, 

1Th 2:12 Ta pian komon mankurang kayo a makanakana ed Dios, a manawag ed sikayo ya onloob ed panarian tan gloria to'n dili. 

1Th 2:13 Et nisengeg ed saya misalamat kami met ed Dios ya andi tonda, ta, sanen inawat yo ed sikami so salita ya ingangan, a salanti salita na Dios, inako yo ya aliwa'n singa salita na totoo, balet onong ed katuaan, say salita'y Dios, a sikato met so ongawa ed sikayo a manisia. 

1Th 2:14 Ta sikayo, agagi, nagmaliw kayo a managalig ed saray iglesia'y Dios ed Cristo Jesus ya wala'ra ed Judea: ta sikayo met intepel yo so bengabengatla ya intepel da met na kabaleyan yo'n dili onong ed ginawa ra ed saray Judio; 

1Th 2:15 A sikara so amatey ed Katawan a Jesus tan saray profeta, tan pinatainan da kami, tan ag da pinaliket so Dios, tan onbobosol ira ed amin day totoo; 

1Th 2:16 Ya a-awaan da kami'n misalita ed saray Bugkalot anta pian sikara komon so nilaban; pian napanoan ira na kasalanan da a naynay: balet sinmabi ed sikara so sanok a sankabalgan. 

1Th 2:17 Balet sikami, agagi, apakso kami ed sikayo ed antikey a panaon, ed arapan, aliwa a dia ed puso, lalo a sinesegan mi ed baleg a pirawat a nengnengen so kalupaan yo: 

1Th 2:18 Lapu ed saya nanpirawatan mi so onla ed sikayo komon, siak a Pablo tinalagak ya aminsan tan pidua; et si Satanas sinebelan to kami. 

1Th 2:19 Ta anto ta so ilalo mi, odino gayaga, odino balanget mi a kidayewan? Aliwata sikayo, dia ed arap na Katawan tayo a Jesus dia ed isasabi to? 

1Th 2:20 Ta sikayo so gloria mi tan gayaga mi. 



1Th 3:1 Kanian sanen ag mi la nasungduan, ninonot mi'n maong a natilak kami a bokbokor ed Atenas; 

1Th 3:2 Tan imbaki mi si Timoteo, ya agi mi tan ministro'y Dios ed evangelio nen Cristo, a mamaletneg ed sikayo, tan manligliwa ed sikayo nipaakar ed pananisia yo; 

1Th 3:3 Pian angapo komon so too ya onokbar lapu'd saraya'n kaermenan; ta kabat yo'n dili a lapu ed saya sikami atoro. 

1Th 3:4 Ta tua, nen wala kami ed sikayo, inbaga mi ed sikayo ya inpauna a sikami mantepel na kaermenan; onong ed agawa la, tan kabat yo. 

1Th 3:5 Ta saya siak met so sengegan, ta nen ag ko la nasungdoan, angibaki ak ta pian nakabatan ko so pananisia yo, ompan dia ed saray bengatla a mananokso et atokso kayo la, tan say sagpot mi et nasumpal ed andi kakanaan. 

1Th 3:6 Et sanen si Timoteo sinmabi natan ed sikami a nanlapu ed sikayo, tan inawi'to ed sikami makapaliket iran paamta ed pananisia tan panangaro yo, tan wala ed sikayo so pannodnonot a maong ya andi ebas ed sikami, a pirawat yo kami a nanengneng, singa sikami met ed pinengneng mi ed sikayo; 

1Th 3:7 A nisengeg ed saya, agagi, aligliwa kami ed sikayo ed amin iran kairapan tan kaermenan mi lapu'd pananisia yo: 

1Th 3:8 Ta natan nabilay kami, no magnayon kayo ed Katawan. 

1Th 3:9 Ta anto a pisasalamat so nayarian mi ya iter lamet ed Dios a nipaakar ed sikayo, ta amin a gayaga a pangagayagaan mi a nisengeg ed sikayo dia ed arap na Dios tayo; 

1Th 3:10 Labi tan agew mankekerew kami a mapalalo pian nanengneng mi komon so kalupaan yo, tan nasumpal mi komon so kakulangan yo ed pananisia? 

1Th 3:11 Natan say Dios komon tan Ama tayon dili, tan say Katawan tayon Jesus, itoro ra so dalan mi ya onpogta ed sikayo: 

1Th 3:12 Tan say Katawan pabonaen tokayo tan padaaken to so aro ed sakey tan sakey, tan dia ed amin a totoo, ontan met so gawaen mi ed sikayo; 

1Th 3:13 Pian komon dia ed kaonoran sikato so mamaelet na kapusoan yo ya andi pankuanan ed kasantosan ed arap na Dios tan Ama tayo, no onsabi Katawan tayon Jesus a pati saray amin a sasantos to. 



1Th 4:1 Kaonoran sirin, agagi, pikasi mi kayo tan bangatan mi kayo ed Katawan tayo a Jesus, pian, onong na inawat yo ed sikami no panon so manepeg a panakar yo tan pamaliket yo ed Dios, ontan so panakar yo, pian sikayo so ondakerakel komon. 

1Th 4:2 Ta kabat yo no anto so saray bilin ya initer mi ed sikayo lapu ed Katawan a Jesus. 

1Th 4:3 Ta sikatoya so linaway Dios, salanti kisantos yo, a paliisan yo so lawan; 

1Th 4:4 A balang sakey ed sikayo kabaten to no panon so panagbenben to ed laman ton dili ed loob na kasantosan tan kagalangan, 

1Th 4:5 Aliwa a dia ed kairapan na panibeg, a salanti singa saray Gentiles ya ag da kabat so Dios; 

1Th 4:6 Ya angapo komon so mansaol, tan manlames na agi to ed pamaakaran: ta say Katawan sikato so manamales ed sarayan amin a bengabengatla, onong na inpauna mi ya inbilin ed sikayo tan tinasian. 

1Th 4:7 Ta say Dios ag to itayo tinawag ed karumsisan, no ag dia ed kasantosan. 

1Th 4:8 Kanian say mangipulisay, aliwa a say too so ipulisay to, no ag say Dios, a sikato so mangiter na Espiritu Santo to ed sikayo. 

1Th 4:9 Et no nipaakar ed aro na sanaagi ag yo nakaokolan ya isulat na sakey a too ed sikayo; ta sikayon dili binangatan kayo la na Dios a mangaro ed sakey tan sakey; 

1Th 4:10 Ta gagawaen yo a tua ed amin ya agagi ya wala ed amin a Macedonia. Balet ikalar mi ed sikayo, agagi, ta ondakerakel kayo komon; 

1Th 4:11 Tan pian makaaral kayo komon a mandeen, tan gawaen yo so nabebetangan yon dili, tan pankimey yo so saray lima yo, onong ed inbilin mi ed sikayo; 

1Th 4:12 Pian komon manakar kayo ed masimsimpit ya onla ed saray paway tan angapo komon so kakulangan yo. 

1Th 4:13 Et ag mi labay komon ya onpasen kayo ya andi amta, agagi, no nipaakar ed saray naugip; pian ag kayo onermen, onong na singa saray arum, ya angapo so ilalo ra. 

1Th 4:14 Ta no sisiaen tayo a si Jesus inatey tan inmolin binmilay, ontan met a saray naugip ed Jesus awiten ira na Dios naani a piolopen ed sikato. 

1Th 4:15 Ta saya so ibaga mi ed sikayo lapud salita na Katawan, a sikatayon mabilay, ya atilak ya anga ed isasabi na Katawan, ag tayon balot onaan so saray naugip. 

1Th 4:16 Ta say Katawan a dili onlasor a manlapu ed tawen, pati sakey ya eyag, pati voces na arkangel, tan say trumpeta na Dios: et saray inaatey ed Cristo onbilay ira ya onona: 

1Th 4:17 Insan sikatayo a mabilay, ya atilak naabot tayo'ra naani a piolopen ed saray kalureman, a miabet ed Katawan diman ed tagey: et ontan miayam itayo lawas ed Katawan. 

1Th 4:18 Kanian manligliwa so sakey tan sakey komon ed saraya a salita. 



1Th 5:1 Et nipaakar ed saray panaon tan saray panaon a manepeg, agagi, ag yo nakaokolan ya isulat ko ed sikayo. 

1Th 5:2 Ta sikayon dili amtayon maong a say agew na Katawan onsabin singa matakew ed labi. 

1Th 5:3 Sano ibabagaray, Kareenan tan andi paga, insan biglan kaderal so onsabi ed sikara, a singa pasakit na bii malokon; tan ag ira makaliktar. 

1Th 5:4 Balet sikayo, agagi, andi kayo ed kabilungtan, a satan ya agew naabotan to kayo a singa sakey a matakew: 

1Th 5:5 Ta sikayon amin anak'kayo na liwawa, tan anak kayo na agew: sikami ag kami anak na labi, angan kabilungtan; 

1Th 5:6 Kanian sirin ag itayo onogip, a singa gawa na saray arum, et manpuyat itayo tan mandangka itayo. 

1Th 5:7 Ta saray naugip, naugip ira ed labi; tan saray nabuek, nabuek ira ed labi. 

1Th 5:8 Et sikatayo, bangta anak itayo na agew, mandangka itayo, mankawes itayo na kinlong na pananisia tan aro; tan onkana a sanib na olo, so panilalo ed kilalaban. 

1Th 5:9 Ta say Dios inpasento kami ya aliwa a dia ed sanok, no ag dia ed pakagamor na kilalaban lapu ed Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo, 

1Th 5:10 A sikatoy inatey lapu ed sikatayo, pian, angan manpuyat odino naugip itayo, manbilay itayo komon ed sikato. 

1Th 5:11 Kanian manbibilinan so sakey tan sakey, tan manpapaalageyan so sakey tan sakey, singa met say gawaen yo. 

1Th 5:12 Et pikasi mi ed sikayo, agagi, a kabaten yo so saray misasagpot ed leet yo, tan mangio-oley ed sikayo dia ed Katawan, tan manbilin ed sikayo; 

1Th 5:13 Tan pablien yo'ra na sankatageyan ya aro lapu ed gawa'ra. Wala kayo komon ed kareenan dia ed inkasikayon dili. 

1Th 5:14 Tan bilinen mi kayo, agagi, a simbawaen yo so saray agnaoksoy, ibalap yo so apunaw ed puso, tagano yo so saray makapuy, masungdo kayo komon ed amin. 

1Th 5:15 Nengneng yo ta angapo so ontumang na mauges lapu ed mauges: no ag tomboken yo lawas so maong, ya ipakana ed sakey tan sakey tan dia ed amin. 

1Th 5:16 Mangayaga kayo lawas; 

1Th 5:17 Mikasi kayo ya andi tonda; 

1Th 5:18 Dia ed amin a bengatla misalamat kayo: ta sikatoya so linawa na Dios ed Cristo Jesus nipaakar ed sikayo. 

1Th 5:19 Ag yo erepen so Espiritu; 

1Th 5:20 Ag yo modmoraen so saray profecias; 

1Th 5:21 Salsalien yo ya ami ganagana;et mansiansia kayo ed maong; 

1Th 5:22 Manngilin kayo ed amin a nengneng na mauges. 

1Th 5:23 Tan say Dios na kareenan a dili pasantosen to kayo a sigpoten; tan say espiritu tan kamarerwa tan la man yo so sigpot komon a naalila, ya andi nipakasalanan dia ed isasabi na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

1Th 5:24 Matoor so manawag ed sikayo, a sikato gawaen to so saya met. 

1Th 5:25 Agagi, pikasi yo kami. 

1Th 5:26 Igalang yo ya amin so saray agagi ed masanto a piangoban. 

1Th 5:27 Pikasik na baleg ed sikayo lapu ed Katawan ta saya a sulat nibasa ed amin ya agagi. 

1Th 5:28 Say gracia na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo so wala komon ed sikayo. 

PANGASINENSE HEBREWS


Heb 1:1 Say Dios ya akisalita dia ed nanduruma a pamaakaran tan dia ed nagsisananey a nengneng nen inmunan panaon ed saray atateng dia ed panamegley na saray profetas, 

Heb 1:2 Dia ed kaonoran na sarayan agew akisalita ed sikatayo dia ed panamegley na Anak to, a sikato so tinoroton manawir ed saray amin a bengatla, a sikato met so nan-gawaan to ed mundo: 

Heb 1:3 Sikato anta sinag na gloria to, tan dilin talintao na inka Dios to, tan tatalimaen to so saray amin a bengatla lapu ed salita na pakayari to, sanen agawa to la so impan-gogol ed saray kasalanan tayo, imyorong ed kawanan na Ari ed tagey; 

Heb 1:4 Et nagmaliw a sankamaabigan ne n saray angel, lapu ed anawir na masudsurin ngaran nen say sikara. 

Heb 1:5 Ta siopa ed saray angeles so angibagaan na Dios ed angan kapigan a panaon, Sika so Ana'ko, Saya ya agew inanak ta ka? tan kuan to lamet: Siak naani so Ama to, Tan sikato naani Ana'ko? 

Heb 1:6 Tan nen ipasakbay to lamet so pangoloan ya anak dia ed mundo, kuan to: Tan amin na saray angeles na Dios sikato so igalang da komon. 

Heb 1:7 Tan nipaakar ed saray angeles kuan to: Say mangawa ya angeles to so saray espiritu, Tan ministro to so saray dalang na apuy: 

Heb 1:8 Ingen dia ed Anak kuan to, Say tronom, O Dios, magnayon law as ed ando Ian ando; Tan say cetro na kaptekan so cetro na panarian mo. 

Heb 1:9 Sika inarom so katunongan, tan binosol mo so kaugsan; Kanian say Dios, say Dios mo, pinoyokan to ka Na larak na liket a nidumaruma nen saray ibam. 

Heb 1:10 Tan, Sika, Katawan, nen inmuna inletneg mo so dalin, Tan saray tawen sikara so gawa na saray limam: 

Heb 1:11 Sikara naani natawtaw; balet magnayon ka; Tan sikara ya amin ondaan ira a singa kawes; 

Heb 1:12 Tan singa sakey a sokbot pongosen mo ra naani, Singa sakey a kawes nasaltan ira; Ingen sika lamlamang, Et saray taon mo ag ira naani naopot. 

Heb 1:13 Tan siopa ed saray angel, angan kapigan, so angibagaan to, Yorong ka ed kawanan ko Anga ed pangyan ko ed saray kabusol mo a gagatinan na saray salim? 

Heb 1:14 Aliwa ta ra ya espiritu ya amin, a nibaki a manlinkor a pinabangan na saray manawir naani na kilalaban? 



Heb 2:1 Kanian nepeg ya imatleken tayo ed baleg a seseg so saray bengatlan nadngel tayo, ta ompan lamang no niagos itayo a manlapu ed sikara. 

Heb 2:2 Ta no say salita ya insalita na saray angeles sikato so malet, tan amin a kasalanan tan ag itotolok inawat da so manepeg a bayar; 

Heb 2:3 Panon naani kiliktar tayo, no palpaulian tayo so sakey a sankabalgan a kilalaban? a sikato bangnen impalapag na Katawan, pinaletan ed sikatayo na saray akadngel; 

Heb 2:4 Ya akitasi ed sikara so Dios ed panamegley na saray tanda tan makapakelaw, tan nanbabangil iran pakayari, tan panamalangkap na Espiritu Santo, onong ed linawa to. 

Heb 2:5 Ta sikato ag to inpauleyan ed saray angel so mundo ya onsabi, a sikato so sasalitaen mi. 

Heb 2:6 Ingen say sakey a tinasian to ed sakey a pasen, a kuan to, Anto so too, pian sikato so nanonotan mo? Odino say anak na too, pian sikato so dalawen mo? 

Heb 2:7 Sikato so ginawam ya abebbebay daiset nen saray angeles; Sikato so binalangetan mo na gloria tan dayew, Tan sikato so inyan mo ed tapew na saray gawa na saray limam: 

Heb 2:8 Inyan mo ya amin so saray bengatla ed silong na saray sali to. Ta sanen pinauleyan to ed sikato so saray amin a bengatla, angapo so intilak to ya ag pauleyan ed sikato. Ingen natan ag tayo ni nanengneng so saray amin a bengatla a pauleyan ed sikato. 

Heb 2:9 Balet nanengneng tayo ya abalangetan na gloria tan dayew, lapud impangitepe'to na ipapatey, so samay Jesus ya agawa ya abebbebay daiset nen saray angeles pian lapud gracia'y Dios natawayan to so ipapatey lapu ed amin a too. 

Heb 2:10 Ta saman so kipaakaran na saray amin a bengatla, tan lapu ed sikato wala ra so saray amin a bengatla, dia ed pangyakar to na dakel ya anak ed gloria, manepeg a gawaen to ya ayadyari dia ed panamegley na irirap so makangawa na kilalaban da. 

Heb 2:11 Ta say mamasanto tan saray pasantosen sikara ya amin saksakey ira; lapud saya sikatoy ag ambaing a manawag ed sikara na agagi, 

Heb 2:12 A kuan to, Ipakabat ko so ngaran mo ed saray agagik, Dia ed pegley na iglesia igalang taka. 

Heb 2:13 Tan kuan to lamet: Siak manmatalek ak ed sikato. Insan lamet, Nia, siak tan saray anak ya initer na Dios ed siak. 

Heb 2:14 Dia ed ontan lapu ed saray anak minanabang ira ed laman tan dala, sikato met a dili akinabang ed satan; pian lapud ipapatey bagbagen to so kawalaan na pakayari na ipapatey, salanti, say diablo; 

Heb 2:15 Tan ilaban to ra ed amin lapu ed takot da ed ipapatey wala ran amin ed legan na bilay da ya inpauleyan ed inkaaripen. 

Heb 2:16 Ta peteg ag to tinulongan so saray angeles no ag say bini nen Abraham so tinulongan to. 

Heb 2:17 Kanian manepeg ed amin a mipara ed saray agagi to, pian sikato komon so mapangasi tan matoor ya atagey a sacerdote dia ed saray bengatla a nipaakar ed Dios, pian mangawa na makapapa a nipaakar ed saray kasalanan na baley. 

Heb 2:18 Ta lapud no sikaton dili et nantepel na pakatokso, nayarian to ya tulongan so saray natokso. 



Heb 3:1 Kanian, agagi a masanto, ya minanabang ed inkatawag a mangatatawen, motektek yo so Apostol tan Atagey a Sacerdote na pananisia tayo, salanti si Jesus; 

Heb 3:2 A sikato so matoor ed saman so angyan ed sikato, a singa met si Moises dia ed amin ya abung to. 

Heb 3:3 Ta sikato so nibilang a makana ed balbaleg a gloria nen si Moises, lapu ed say amaalagey na abung balbaleg so dayew to nen say abung. 

Heb 3:4 Ta amin ya abung pinaalagey na bengatlan too; balet say amaalagey ed saray amin a bengatla sikato so Dios. 

Heb 3:5 Tan si Moises dia ed tua sikatoy matoor ed amin ya abung na Dios, singa sakey ya aripen, a pakatasian ed saraman so bengatla a nipakabat naani; 

Heb 3:6 Balet si Cristo singa sakey ya anak, nipaakar ed abung to; a say an abung dili a sikatayo, no pagnayonen tayo a malet so kakpelan tayo tan say gloria na ilalo tayo angan ed kasumpalan. 

Heb 3:7 Kanian, singa say kuan na Espiritu Santo, No narengel yo natan so voces to, 

Heb 3:8 Ag yo papaaweten so kapusoan yo, a singa dia ed inkasagyat, Singa dia ed saman ya agew na inkatokso ed lawak, 

Heb 3:9 A nantoksoan da ed siak na saray ama yo lapud panalsali ra ed siak, Tan anengneng da so saray gawak ed apataplon taon. 

Heb 3:10 Kanian binmarungak ed say an kailalakan, Tan inkuan ko: Andi ebas a nalingo ra ed puso ra: Balet ag da naamtaan so saray dalan ko; 

Heb 3:11 Kanian sinambaan ko ed sano 'ko: Ag ira makaloob ed painawaan ko. 

Heb 3:12 Nengneng yo, agagi, ag la piga no wala naani ed sikayo so sakey a puson mauges ed ag panisia, diad yarawi to ed Dios a mabilay, 

Heb 3:13 Balet mansisimbawaan kayo a sakey tan sakey ed inagew-agew legan a nibabagay Natan ed Sayan agew; ompan wala so manpaawet ed sikayo lapu'd panamalingo na kasalanan : 

Heb 3:14 Ta nagmaliw itayo a minanabang nen Cristo, no ipagnayon tayo a malet so sengeg na talek tayo anga ed kasampotan; 

Heb 3:15 Legan a nibabaga, No narengel yo natan so voces to, Ag yo papaaweten so kapusoan yo, a singa dia ed inkasagiat, 

Heb 3:16 Ta. siopa ra, so angan nadngel da, sinagiat da? Nen saman aliwa ta ya amin so saray pinmaway diman ed Egipto lapu ed kinen Moises? 

Heb 3:17 Tan siopa so saray binarungan to ed apataploy taon? aliwa tan saraman so nankasalanan, a saray bankay da naplag ira ed lawak? 

Heb 3:18 Tan Siopa so saray sinambaan to ya ag ira makaloob ed painawaan to, no ag saraman so ag tinmolok? 

Heb 3:19 Tan nanengneng tayo lanti ya ag da ayarian so linmoob lapu ed ag da pananisia. 



Heb 4:1 On takot itayo sirin, bangta wala ni keran sipan ed pakaloob ed painawaan to, ag la piga no siopaman ed sikayo onpatnag a singa asebelan. 

Heb 4:2 Ta tua nipulong met ed sikatayo so maabig a pakabat, a singa met dia ed sikara: ingen sikara ag da apinabangan so salita ya inpasabi, lapud ag tinekepan na pananisia na saray akadngel ed saman. 

Heb 4:3 Ta sikatayo ya anisia onloob itayo ed painawaan; onong na kuan to: Kanian sinambaan ko ed sano'ko: Ag ira makaloob ed painawaan ko: angan saray gawa asumpal ira a nanlapu la ed inkapalsay mundo. 

Heb 4:4 Ta dia ed sakey a pasen onia so nasasalita nipaakar ed komapiton agew, Et nanpainawa so Dios ed komapiton agew ed saray amin a gawa to; 

Heb 4:5 Tan dia ed sayan pasen nasasalita lamet: Ag ira makaloob ed painawaan ko. 

Heb 4:6 Ontan sirin, lapu ed nakeraan a saray arum makaloob ira ed sikato, tan saray akaona ya angipulongan na saray maabig a pakabat ag ira akaloob lapud ag pananisia, 

Heb 4:7 Ikuan to lamet so sakey ya agew, a kuan to ed panamegley nen David: Natan, ed kayari andukey a panaon, (onong na nibaga la:) No narengel yo natan so voces to, Ag yo papaaweten so kapusoan yo. 

Heb 4:8 Ta no si Josue inter to komon ed sikara so panpainawa, ag to komon sasalitaen ed kayari to nia, so sananey ya agew. 

Heb 4:9 Wala so nakdaan ni sirin a sakey a panpainawa nipaakar ed baley na Dios. 

Heb 4:10 Ta say linmoob ed panpainawa to, dili a sikato nanpainawa met ed saray kimey to onong a say Dios tinmonda ed saray kimey to. 

Heb 4:11 Pansesegan tayo sirin so onloob ed saman a panagpainawaan, pian angapo so napelag onong ed saman lanlamang ya alimbawa na ag itolok. 

Heb 4:12 Ta say salita na Dios sikatoy mabilay tan mabiskeg, tan makdem nen say angan dinan ya kampilan a duara'y tarem, tan ontalos ya anga ed pansianan na kamarerwa tan espiritu, tan anga ed saray langolangoan tan saray utek, tan masiglat ya mangibiig ed saray nonot tan saray getma na puso. 

Heb 4:13 Tan angapo so bengatlan pinalsa ya ag nipanengneng ed arap to: no ag ingen saray amin a bengatla wala ra a lakseb tan mapatnag ed saray mata na pangitdan tayo na bilang. 

Heb 4:14 Bangta wala so sakey a baleg ya atagey a sacerdote tayo, a linmabas ed saray katawenan, si Jesus ya Anak na Dios, pagnayonen tayo komon sirin a malet so panagkompisal tayo. 

Heb 4:15 Ta angapo so sakey ya atagey a sacerdote tayo ya agmakayarin mangasi ed saray kakapuyan tayo; no ag say sakey a tinokso ed amin a singa sikatayo, ingen angapo so kasalanan to. 

Heb 4:16 Onsinger itayo sirin a mailalo ed trono na gracia pian makagamor itayo na panangasi, tan makalmo itayo na gracia, pian natolongan to itayo sano panaon a kinepeg to. 



Heb 5:1 Ta balang atagey a sacerdote a naala ed saray totoo, sikato so niyan lapu ed saray totoo dia ed saray bengatla a nipaakar ed Dios, pian isaklang to so saray iyapay tan bagbagat lapu ed saray kasalanan: 

Heb 5:2 A nayarian to so mangasi ed saray andi kabat tan saray nalilingo, ta angan sikato met wala ya aliber na kakapuyan; 

Heb 5:3 Tan lapu ed say betang to so mangibagat na bagat lapu ed saray kasalanan, aliwa lambengat a nipaakar ed ombaley, no ag met nipaakar ed sikaton dili. 

Heb 5:4 Tan angapo so too a mangala na sayan dayew ed sikaton dili, no ag sano sikato so tinawag na Dios, a singa si Aaron. 

Heb 5:5 Kanian si Cristo ag nangloria ed sikaton dili a ginawa to so laman to ya Atagey a Sacerdote, no ag inmuna a Saman et inkuan to ed sikato, Sika so Ana'ko, Inyanak taka ed sayan agew, 

Heb 5:6 Singa kuan to met ed arum a pasen, Sika so Sacerdote ya andi angaan Onong ed inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec. 

Heb 5:7 A dia ed saraman ya agew a si kato so silalaman na ompatey, angibagat na pikakasi tan pikekerew, a tekep na mabiskeg a tagleey tan saray lua, ed saman so makapanyari'n mangilaban ed sikato ed ipapatey, tan sikato so nadngel lapud masanton panaglikas to, 

Heb 5:8 Angan sikato so Anak, inaral to so katotolok lapu ed saray bengatlan intepel to; 

Heb 5:9 Tan sanen agawa ya ayadyari, nagmaliw a sikato so nangawa na andi angaan a kilalaban ed saray amin ya ontolok ed sikato; 

Heb 5:10 Tan say Dios ingaton ton atagey a sacerdote onong na inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec. 

Heb 5:11 Nipaakar ed sikato dakel so tongtongen mi, tan mairap ya ipaliwawa, bangta nagmaliw kayon matewet ya ondengel. 

Heb 5:12 Ta anta nepeg yo la komon so managbangat, lapu ed inkabayag la na panaon yo ya anisia, nakaokolan yo ya wala so manbangat lamet ed sikayo, no dinan so saray ononan aralen ed saray salitay Dios; tan nagmaliw kayon singa saray mankaokolan na gatas, ya ag komon say tagano na mabiskeg. 

Heb 5:13 Ta balang sakey a managamil na gatas angapo so asalsali to ed salita na katonongan; ta sikato so sakey ya ugaw. 

Heb 5:14 Ingen say taganon anawet sikato so kien na saray ayadyarin totoo, salanti saraman so lapud panagagamil, saray pakalikna ra apasal ed panangibiig na maong tan mauges. 



Heb 6:1 Kanian, natondaan tayo la ni so saray ononan bangat nen Cristo, tan ontoloy itayo ed inkayadyari, ya ag itayo mangyan lamet na pangipaletnegan na panagbabawi ed saray gawa ya inatey, tan say pananisia ed Dios, 

Heb 6:2 Say bangat ed binyag tan say panangitapew ed saray lima, tan say kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey, tan say kaokom ya andi angaan. 

Heb 6:3 Tan saya so gawaen tayo naani, no sikato so yabuloy na Dios. 

Heb 6:4 Ta saray asilewan la ya aminsan tan atawayan da la so langkap a mangatatawen, tan agawa ra a minanabang ed Espiritu Santo, 

Heb 6:5 Tan atawayan da la so maabig a salitay Dios, tan saray pakayari na panaon ya arapen, 

Heb 6:6 Et sinmian ira, ag nayari ya omanen lamet pian magbabawi'ra; bangta inpasak da lamet nipaakar ed sikaran dili so Anak na Dios, tan bangta sikato so pinabaingan da ed arap na kalapagan. 

Heb 6:7 Ta say dalin ya angesep na uran ya aminpigapiga ya onla ed tapew to, tan patoboen to so pisipising a makana ed saraman a makasengeg a sikato so nataneman, awaten to so bendicion na Dios; 

Heb 6:8 Balet no patoboen to so saray espinos tan abrojos, sikato so ibantak tan asinger ed kaayew; a say kasumpalan to sikato so kapoolan to. 

Heb 6:9 Ingen, inararok ira, alagden mi a mailalo so saray magmaong a bengatla dia ed sikayo, tan saray bengatla a mangolop ed kilalaban, angan mansalita kami na onia: 

Heb 6:10 Ta say Dios aliwan ag matonong pian nalingoanan to so gawa yo tan say aro ya inpanengneng yo ed ngaran to, ed inpanulong yo ed saray sasanto ed saray pankaokolanda, tan ed panotulong yo ni natan ed sikara. 

Heb 6:11 Tan panpirpirawatan mi ya balang sakey ed sikayo ipanengneng to so onman a seet nipaakar ed inkapno na andi kaatapan ya ilalo anga ed kasampotan: 

Heb 6:12 Ya ag kayo mangiras, no ag ingen omaalig ed saraman so lapu ed pananisia tan anos tawiren da so saray sipasipan. 

Heb 6:13 Ta sanen say Dios ginawa to so sipan ed Abraham, lapud ag to nayarian so mansamba ed arum ni a babaleg, insamba to ed dilin inkadios to, 

Heb 6:14 A kuan to, Tua a bendicionan taka naani a bendicionan, tan parakelen ta ka naani a parakelen. 

Heb 6:15 Et ontan, a kayari inpanalagar to a siaanos, agamoran to so sipan. 

Heb 6:16 Ta saray totoo isamba ra so babaleg: tan say samba a nipaakar ed pamaelet, sikato ed sikara so kasumpalan na amin a pansosopiatan. 

Heb 6:17 Kanian sanen labay na Dios ya ipanengneng, ed lalo a daakan ed saray manawir ed sipan so agkaoman na getma to, insale'to so samba to: 

Heb 6:18 Pian lapud saray duaran bengatla ya agnaoman, a sikara so ag nayarin pantilaan na Dios wala so sakey a mabiskeg ya ligliwa mi, sikami a binmatik pian onsalimbeng kami, ya inagamil mi so ilalo a niyan ed arap mi; 

Heb 6:19 A sikato so wala ed sikami a singa sakey a nailaloan tan malet ya pataga na kamarerwa, tan onloob anga ed sakbung; 

Heb 6:20 A sikato so nilooban nen Jesus a singa manonaan lapu ed sikatayo, a sikato so niyan a Sankatageyan a Sacerdote ed andi angaan onong ed inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec. 



Heb 7:1 Ta saya so Melquisedec, ari ed Salem, Sacerdote na Dios a Sankatageyan, a sikato so angabet ed Abraham nen ompawil a nanlapud inpamagbagbag to ed saray ari, tan sikato so binendicionan to, 

Heb 7:2 A sikato met so inapagan nen Abraham na kabaliksan to, sikato so Ari ed Salem, a sikato so Ari na kareenan; 

Heb 7:3 Angapoy ama to, angapoy ina to, angapoy kailalakan to; angapoy sengeg na saray agew to, angan kasumpalan na bilay to, et agawa a miololibay ed Anak na Dios, mansiansia a sacerdote ya andi angaan. 

Heb 7:4 Motektek yo sirin no panon so kabaleg na saya a sikato so angitdan nen patriarka Abraham, na sakey a kakaplo ed saray tinalo to. 

Heb 7:5 Tan peteg a saray mangawat na betang na inkasacerdote ed saray anak nen Levi wala so bilin ed sikara a mangala ed baley ed saray kakaplo onong ed gangan; maliwliwawa, manga wat ira ed saray agagira angan pinmaway ira met ed banel nen Abraham: 

Heb 7:6 Ingen saman a say kailalakan to ag nibilang ed sikara, angala na kakaplo ed Abraham, tan binendicionan to man so wala so sipan ed sikato. 

Heb 7:7 Balet angapo so antokaman a siblangan say melmelag sikatoy binendicionan na lalo. 

Heb 7:8 Et tua a diad saray totoo ya ompatey mangawat ira na kakaplo; balet diman walay sakey, a sikaton tasian dan mabilay. 

Heb 7:9 Tan, dia ed pangibaga na ontan, dia ed panamegley nen Abraham si Levi met, a sikato so mangawat na saray kakaplo, binayaran to so saray kakaplo. 

Heb 7:10 Ta wala ni ed saray loobloob nen ama to, sanen si Melquisedec sikato so aromogto. 

Heb 7:11 Sirin no say inkayadyari narapat lapu ed inkasacerdote na saray Levitas (ta dia ed silong to inawat na baley so gangan), anto nipankaokolan ya onong ed inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec onalagey so sananey a sacerdote, tan sakey ya ag nibilang onong ed inkasacerdote nen Aaron? 

Heb 7:12 Ta no nasalatan so inkasacerdote, mapilit met a nasalatan so gangan. 

Heb 7:13 Ta saman a pakasalitaan na saraya a bengatla nanlapu ed sananey a puli, a sikato so ag nanlapu an na angan siopaman a too a nanlinkor ed altar. 

Heb 7:14 Ta sikato so maliwawa a say Katawan tayo nianak ed Juda, a say puli to angapo so inbaga nen Moises nipaakar ed inkasacerdote. 

Heb 7:15 Tan lalo ni a maliwawa, no onong ed inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec onalagey so sananey a sacerdote. 

Heb 7:16 A sikato so niyan, aliwan onong ed gangan na sakey a bilin a mangaraldalin, no ag ingen onong ed pakayari na sakey a bilay ya andi angaan: 

Heb 7:17 Ta niiter so sayan tasi ed sikato, Sika so sacerdote ya andi angaan Onong ed inkasacerdote nen Melquisedec. 

Heb 7:18 Say gangan ya akaona tua nabagbag lapud kakapuyan to tan andi kabaliksan to 

Heb 7:19 (Ta say gangan angapo so ginawa to ya ayadyari; no ag say kiloob na magmaong ya ilalo, a dia ed panamegley to onasinger itayo ed Dios. 

Heb 7:20 Tan lapu ed ag agawa a sacerdote ya angapo so samba 

Heb 7:21 (Ta saray arum tua a niyan ira a sacerdote ya angapo so samba; balet saya niyan ya wala so samba, lapud saman ya angibaga na nipaakar ed sikato, Sinambaan na Katawan et ag naani magbabawi, Sika so sacerdote ed andi angaan); 

Heb 7:22 Kanian lalo ya ayadyari so sipan a pinaletan nen Jesus. 

Heb 7:23 Tan tuan amayamay iran sacerdote, ta nisengeg ed ipapatey ag da nay ari mansiansia ed inkasacerdote: 

Heb 7:24 Balet sikato, bangta mansiansia ed andi angaan, wala so inkasacerdote to ya ag nipatawir. 

Heb 7:25 Kanian nayarian to met ya ilaban anga ed kasumpalan so saray onasinger ed Dios dia ed panamegley to, ta manbilay lawas a mangyesel ed sikara. 

Heb 7:26 Ta saya so sankatagian a sacerdote a manepeg ed sikatayo, santo, andi kasalanan, andi tilol, nisian ed saray managkasalanan, tan agawa ya atagtagey nen saray katawe-nan; 

Heb 7:27 A sikato ag to nakaokolan ya agewagew, a singa saray sankatageyan a sacerdote, a mangisaklang ed saray bagat, onona lapud saray kasalanan ton dili, insan lapud saray kasalanan na baley: ta say ginawa to ed aminpinsan a nipaakar ed amin, sanen insaklang to so inkasikaton dili. 

Heb 7:28 Ta say gangan yan to a sankatageyan a sacerdote so saray totoon makabos; ingen say salita na samba, a sikato so onsabi ed kayari gangan, yan to so Anak, a sikato so ayadyari ya andi 



Heb 8:1 Natan dia ed saray bengatla sasalitaen mi say manonaan saya: Wala so sakey a sankatageyan a sacerdote mi, ya imyorong ed nikawanan na trono na Ari ed saray katawenan, 

Heb 8:2 Mankatangbayan ed altar, tan say matua a tabernaculo, ya inyan na Katawan, aliwan say too. 

Heb 8:3 Ta amin a sankatageyan a sacerdote wala a niyan pian mangisaklang na saray langkap tan saray bagat: kanian nakaokolan a sayan sankatageyan a sacerdote wala met so bengatlan isaklang to. 

Heb 8:4 Natan no sikato et wala ed tapew na dalin bilang aliwa ni komon a sikatoy sacerdote ya angan panon, bangta wala ray sacerdote a mangisaklang na saray langkap onong ed gangan; 

Heb 8:5 A sikara so manlinkor a singa sinakal tan anino na saray bengatlan mangatatawen, a singa met si Moises a binilin na Dios nen kuan to ya igapo a gawaen so tabernaculo: ta, Nengneng mo, kuan to ed sikato, ta gawaen mo ya amin so saray bengatla onong ed sakalan ya inpanengneng ed sika diman ed palandey. 

Heb 8:6 Balet natan sikato so akagamor na sakey a pankatangbayan a lapu ed sikato met so manamegley ed sakey a sipan a magmaong ya abangon ed tapew na saray magmaong a sipasipan. 

Heb 8:7 Ta no saman so inmuna a sipan angapo so kulang to, ag komon kinaokolan so pasen a nipaakar ed komadua. 

Heb 8:8 Ta sanen akalmo ed sikara na kakulangan, kuan to, Nia, onsabi so saray agew, kuan na Katawan, A pangawak ed abung nen Israel tan abung nen Juda na sakey a balo'n sipan; 

Heb 8:9 Aliwa ya onong ed sipan a ginawak ed saray kaamaan da Sanen agew ya inpangitabin ko ed sikara pian ipaway ko'ra ed dalin na Egipto; Ta sikara ag ira nansiansia ed sipan ko, Tan siak minormorak ira, kuan na Katawan. 

Heb 8:10 Ta saya sikato so sipan a gawaen ko ed abung nen Israel Kayari na saraman ya agew, kuan na Katawan; Yan ko naani so saray gangan ko dia ed isip da, Tan isulat ko'ra met dia ed kapusoan da: Tan siak naani so Dios da, Tan sikara naani so totook: 

Heb 8:11 Tan angapo so mangibangat ed kabaleyan to Tan angapo met so mangibangat ed agi to; a kuan to, Amtaen mo so Katawan; Ta sikara ya amin amta ra'ak naani, Manlapu ed kamelamelagan anga ed kabalbalgan ed sikara. 

Heb 8:12 Ta siak naani so manangasi ed saray kaugsan da, Tan saray kasalanan da naani ag ko la ra nonoten. 

Heb 8:13 Sanen kuan to, Sakey a balo'n sipan impagmaliw to a daan so inmuna. Et say ondaan tan magkaopotopot asinger a nabalang. 



Heb 9:1 Tan tua a say inmona'n sipan wala met so bilin to ed panaglinkor ed Dios, tan say santuario to sakey a santuario dia ed mundo. 

Heb 9:2 Ta say tabernaculo sikato so niparaan, say inmuna, sikato so kawalaan na candelero, tan'say lamisaan, tan saray tinapay na bagat; a sikato so inngaran a Masanto a Pasen. 

Heb 9:3 Tan dia ed labas na komadua'n sakbong, say tabernaculo ya inngaran a Sankasantosan a Pasen; 

Heb 9:4 A sikato so kawalaan na sakey ya incensario a balitok, tan say kaban na sipan a naokopan a manliberliber na balitok, a sikato so kawalaan na vaso a balitok ya anginan ed mana, tan say tayokod nen Aaron a nanbulaklak tan saray tabla na sipan; 

Heb 9:5 Tan dia ed tapew to saray querubin na gloria a sikara so manisirum ed yorongan na panangasi; et saraya a bengatla ag mi natan nayarian a salitaen a sinansakey. 

Heb 9:6 Tan saraya'n bengatla walaran niparaan ed onia, a saray sacerdote naynay ira ya onloob ed inmuna a tabernaculo, a manumpal ira na panaglinkor; 

Heb 9:7 Balet ed komadua bokor na sankatageyan a sacerdote, mt .ninsan ed sakey taon, aliwa ya andi gapo so dala, isaklang to lapu ed sikato'n dili, tan lapu ed saray kasalanan na baley; 

Heb 9:8 A saya ipatalos na Espiritu Santo, ya ag ni nipaliwawa so dalan ed masanton pasen, legan ni a manalalagey so inmuna'n tabernaculo; 

Heb 9:9 A sikato so sakey ya alimbawa ed saman a panaon a manakar: onong ed saya sikato so angisaklangan ed saray langkap tan saray bagat ya ag da nayarian, no nipaakar ed conciencia, a yadyarien so mangisaklang, 

Heb 9:10 A sikara labat (so saray sirasira tan saray i-inumen tan saray nagsisananey a panagoras) pulos ira a bilin a mangaraldalin, a nigaton ya anga ed panaon na panagapiger. 

Heb 9:11 Balet sanen sinmabi si Cristo, sankatageyan a sacerdote na saray maabig a bengatla ya onsabi, ed panamegley na babaleg tan ayadyari'n tabernaculo, ya aliwa'n ginawa na saray lima, labay ko a salitaen, aliwa'n dia ed saya ya inkapalsa, 

Heb 9:12 Tan aliwa met a diad panamegley na dala na saray kanding tan saray kilaw na vaca, no ag lapu ed talonggaring na dala to a dili, linmoob ya aminpinsan nipaakar ed andi angaan, ed masanto a pasen ya agamoran to so maando ya inkarondon. 

Heb 9:13 Ta no say dala na saray kanding tan saray vaca, tan say dapol na manmarmarikit a vaca a niwalsik ed saray nagmaliw a marutak, mamasantos nipaakar ed pakagogol na laman: 

Heb 9:14 Say dala nen Cristo, a lapu'd panamegley na Espiritu ya andi angaan insaklang to so inkasikato'n dili ya angapo so tilol to ed Dios ag ka lalo a manonaan a linisan to so saray conciencia yo ed saray inatey a gawa pian manlinkor kayo ed Dios a mabilay? 

Heb 9:15 Tan lapu ed saya, sikato so manamegley na sakey a balo'n sipan, pian bangta wala so sakey ya inatey a nisengeg ed pananondon ed saray kasalanan ya agawa ed lepsag na inmona'n sipan saray atawag awaten da komon so sipan na tawir ya andi angaan. 

Heb 9:16 Ta no iner so kawalaan na sakey a testamento, nakaokolan a nagawa so ipapatey na nagawa na testamento. 

Heb 9:17 Ta say testamento wala so biskeg to no inatey la so nantestamento: et angapo so antokaman a biskeg to legan a mabilay ni so nantestamento. 

Heb 9:18 Kanian, angan say inmona'n sipan ag apaletan ya andi gapo so dala. 

Heb 9:19 Ta sanen si Moises inbasa to so amin a bilin na gangan ed amin a baley, inala to so dala na saray kilaw na vaca tan saray kanding, a pati say danum tan bago ya ambalanga na carnero tan say panagwalsik, tan niwalsikan to so dili a libro, tan say amin met a baley, 

Heb 9:20 A kuan to, Saya sikato so dala na sipan ya imbilin na Dios a nipaakar ed sikayo. 

Heb 9:21 Ontan met a winalsikan to na dala so tabernaculo tan saray amin ya agagamilen ed pankatangbayan. 

Heb 9:22 Tan onong na kuan na gangan, ngalngali a ikuan ko a saray bengatla sikara so nagogolan na dala, tan no angapo so dala a ni-ibung angapo so karondon. 

Heb 9:23 Akaokolan sirin a saray alimbawa na saray bengatla'n mangatatawen ginogolan ira ed saraman a bagat; balet saray dili a bengatla'n mangatatawen ginogolan ira ed saraman a bagat; balet saray dili a bengatla'n mangatatawen nagogolan ira ed saray bagat a magmaong nen saraman. 

Heb 9:24 Ta ag linmoob si Cristo ed masanto'n pasen a ginawa na lima, ya alimbawa na matua; no ag ingen diman ed tawen a dili, pian onpatnag natan ed arap na Dios lapu ed sikatayo: 

Heb 9:25 Tan ag met nakaokolan ya isaklang to so inkasikato'n dili ed maminpigapiga: a singa say sankatageyan a sacerdote ya onloob ed masanto'n pasen ed tinaon-taon a mangyakar na sananey a dala; 

Heb 9:26 Ta no aliwa ya ontan, kinaokolan to komon so nanirap ya aminpigapiga a nanlapu ed inkapalsa na mundo: balet natan aminpinsan, lambengat anga ed kasampotan na saray taon sikato so nipatnag pian gawaen to so kabagbag na kasalanan lapu ed panamegley na inkibagat na inkasikato'n dili. 

Heb 9:27 Tan onong a nigetar ed saray totoo ya ompatey ira a maminpinsan, tan sano kayari saya ontombok so kaokom; 

Heb 9:28 Ontan met si Cristo nisaklang ed aminpinsan pian awiten to so saray kasalanan na saray dakel; onpatnag naani dia ed komadua, ag nipaakar ed pangekal na kasalanan, no ag lapu ed kilalaban na saray manaalagar ed sikato. 



Heb 10:1 Ta say gangan, wala ed sikato so sakey ya anino na saray penel na bengatla ya onsabi, ya aliwa'n dili a talintao na saray bengatla, a dia ed panamegley na saray dili'n bagat ed tinaon-taon, angan kapigan ag to nayarian a payadyarien so saray onsinger. 

Heb 10:2 Ta no andi ag ira komon sirin tinmonda a nisaklang? bangta saray mangisasaklang lapu ed agogolan ira ed aminsan, ag da la komon nalikna so kasalanan. 

Heb 10:3 Ingen dia ed saraman a bagat wala so pannodnonotan ya agawaan na saray kasalanan ed tinaon-taon. 

Heb 10:4 Ta sikato so agnayari a say dala na saray vaca tan saray kanding ekalen to so saray kasalanan. 

Heb 10:5 Kanian sano onloob dia ed mundo, kuan to: Bagat tan patanir sikara so ag mo ginabay, Ingen sakey a laman so inparaan mo ed siak; 

Heb 10:6 Dia ed saray patanir a napoolan tan saray bagbagat nisengeg ed kasalanan ag ka linmiket: 

Heb 10:7 Sirin inkuan ko, Nia, siak onsabi ak (Dia ed lokot na libro walan nisulat so nipaakar ed siak), Pian gawaen ko, O Dios, so linawam. 

Heb 10:8 Kuan to ed tagey a dasig, Saray bagat tan patpatanir tan saray patanir a napoolan tan saray ibagat da nisengeg ed kasalanan ag mo ginabay, tan ag ka met linmiket ed sikara (saray bengatla a bagat onong ed gangan), 

Heb 10:9 Insan inkuanto: Nia, siak onsabiak pian gawaen ko so linawam. Ekalen to so inmona, pian iletneg to so komadua. 

Heb 10:10 Et dia ed saya'n linawa apasantos kami lapu'd inkisaklang na laman nen Jesu-Cristo ya agawa'n aminpinsan a nipaakar ed andi angaan. 

Heb 10:11 Tan balang sacerdote tua ya wala'n manlinkor ya inagew-agew tan isaklang to a maminpigapiga so saray dili'n nanpapara a bagat, ya ag da nayarian a balot ya ekalen so saray kasalanan: 

Heb 10:12 Et ingen sikato, sanen insaklang to so saksakey a bagat lapu ed saray kasalanan dia ed andi angaan, immirong ed nikawanan na Dios; 

Heb 10:13 Manlapu'd natan anga ed arapen manaalagar anga ed saray kabusol to niyan ira a gagatinan na saray salisali to. 

Heb 10:14 Ta lapu ed saksakey a panangisaklang niyadyari to ed andi angaan so saray napasanto. 

Heb 10:15 Tan say Espiritu Santo itdan to itayo met na panagtasi: ta nen saman asalita to la: 

Heb 10:16 Saya sikato so sipan a gawaen ko naani ed sikara Kayari na saraman ya agew, kuan na Katawan: Yan ko naani so saray gangan ko ed puso ra. Tan sikara naani met so isulat ko ed isip da; 

Heb 10:17 lnsan kuan to Et saray kasalanan da tan saray kaugsan da ag ko la naani nonoten. 

Heb 10:18 Tan no iner so kawalaan na kaekal na saraya, angapo la so bagat lapu ed kasalanan. 

Heb 10:19 No wala sirin, agagi, katalkan ya onloob ed masantos a pasen lapu ed dala nen Jesus, 

Heb 10:20 Dia ed sakey a dalan a balo tan mabilay, a sikato'y nilukasan to a nipaakar ed sikatayo, a labasan to so sakbong, salanti, say laman to; 

Heb 10:21 Tan bangta wala so sakey a sankabalgan a sacerdote a manpaga ed abung na Dios; 

Heb 10:22 Onsinger itayo komon ed puso a matua, ed napno a katuaan na pananisia, ya wala'n awalsikan so saray kapusoan tayo pian nalinisan itayo ed sakey a mauges a conciencia tan naurasan so laman tayo ed danum a malinew: 

Heb 10:23 Mansiansia itayo komon a malet tan agnagiing ed panangiparongtal na ilalo tayo; ta matoor iman so angisipan: 

Heb 10:24 Tan manpapagalangan itayo ed sakey tan sakey pian manaayatan itayo ed aro tan dia ed saray maabig a gawa; 

Heb 10:25 Ya ag tayo paulian so saray panmomoyong tayo, singa ugali na saray arum, no ag ingen mansisimbawaan itayo; tan nagkalalo la, lapud nanengneng yo a manasinger so agew. 

Heb 10:26 Ta no mankasalanan itayo manlapu ed linawa dia ed kayari pangawat ed pakaamta na tua, angapo la so pankaokolan tayo na bengatlan bagat nisengeg ed saray kasalanan, 

Heb 10:27 No ag say sakey a makapataktakot a panalagar na kaokom, tan sakey a kasubegan na apuy a mangakmon naani ed saray kabusol. 

Heb 10:28 Say sakey a too a nanmodmora ed gangan nen Moises lapu ed duara odino talora a tasi ompatey ya andi bengatla ya panangasi: 

Heb 10:29 Anto so masubsubeg a dusa ya nonoten yon manepeg ed saman so angigatin ed lepsag na saray salisali to ed Anak na Dios, tan inisip to a singa marutak so dala na sipan a sikatoy nisaklangan to, tan pinabainganto so Espiritu na gracia? 

Heb 10:30 Ta amta tayo so angibaga: Kien ko so ibabales, siak iter ko naani so tumang. Tan kuan to lamet: Okomen naani na Katawan so baley to. 

Heb 10:31 Sakey a makapataktakot a pamaakaran so napelag ed saray lima na Dios a mabilay. 

Heb 10:32 Balet nonot yo so saray agew ya inmuna, ed kayari yo ya asilewan, nantepel kayo na baleg a bakal na saray irirap; 

Heb 10:33 A no maminsan, agawa kayon nenengnengen lapud saray panamabaing tan sara met so irirap; tan no maminsan, agawa kayon iba na saraman so wala ed sayan kipapasen. 

Heb 10:34 Ta aliwa labat a kinasian yo so saray wala ya nipangaw, no ag ingen inako yo a sililiket so panamsam ed saray kayarian yo, ta amtayo ya wala ed sikayon dili ed tawen so sakey a magmaong a kayarian yo tan maando. 

Heb 10:35 Ag yo sirin ibantak so panangilalo yo, ya wala so sakey a baleg ya apa. 

Heb 10:36 Ta wala so pakapankaokolan yo ed anos, pian, dia ed kayari na panga wa yo na linawa 'y Dios, awaten yo so sipan. 

Heb 10:37 Ta dia ed loob na sankatikeyan a panaon, Onsabi so onsabi naani, tan ag naani manbayag. 

Heb 10:38 Ingen say matunong ko manbilay naani lapu ed pananisia: Et no wala naani onsoner, ag onliket so kamarerwak ed sikato. 

Heb 10:39 Balet sikami aliwa kami ya iba na saray onsoner pian pakabalangan; no ag ingen iba na saray walaan na pananisia ed kilalaban na kamarerwa. 



Heb 11:1 Et say pananisia sikato so ag panduarua ed saray bengatla ya iilaloan, say panangipatnag ed saray bengatla ya ag ni anengneng. 

Heb 11:2 Ta lapu ed sikato saray mamasiken tayo akagamor ira na maabig a tasi. 

Heb 11:3 Lapu ed pananisia natalosan tayo a saray mundo agawa ra lapu ed salita na Dios, dia ed ontan, say nanengneng ag agawa ed saray bengatla a mapatnag. 

Heb 11:4 Lapu ed pananisia si Abel angisaklang ed Dios na bagat a marakdakep nen si Cain, et lapu ed inkaagamil to niiter ed sikato so tasi a sikato so matunong, a tinasian na Dios so nipaakar ed saray baga'to; tan lapu ed sikato bangta inatey la mansalita ni. 

Heb 11:5 Lapu ed pananisia si Enoc sikato so nialis pian ag to nanengneng so patey; et ag nalmo, tan sikato so inalis na Dios: ta sanen ag ni nialis niiter ed sikato so tasi ya apanga sankaili ed dalin ya insipan, a tan managgawa say Dios. 

Heb 11:6 Et no angapo so pananisia ag nayarin paliketen: ta say ondago ed Dios nakaokolan a sisiaen to ya wala, tan sikato so niiyan a mananumang ed saray mananap ed sikato. 

Heb 11:7 Lapu ed pananisia si Noe, sanen binilin na Dios nipaakar ed saray bengatla ya ag ni anengneng, nen saman aragdag ed mapagalang a takot, angiparaan na sakey a biong a kilabanan na abung to; ed panamegley na pananisia to dinusa to so sayan mundo, tan nagmaliw a tomatawir ed katunongan onong ed pananisia. 

Heb 11:8 Lapu ed pananisia si Abraham, sanen atawag, pian onla ed sakey a pasen ya awaten ton singa tawir, tinmolok; tan pinmaway, ya ag to amta no iner so laen to. 

Heb 11:9 Lapu ed pananisia nanayam a singa sankaili ed dalin ya insipan, a singa dia ed dalin ya ag to kien, a manaayam ed saray tolda, pati si Isaac tan si Jacob, a mitawir ed saman met a dilin sipan: 

Heb 11:10 Ta aalagden to so baley ya wala so cimiento to, a say manamaalagey tan managgawa say Dios. 

Heb 11:11 Lapu ed pananisia, si Sara met inawa'to so pakayari a mangilokom na sakey ya anak, sanen sikato so linmabas la ed taon, ta sinisia to a matoor so nangawa na sipan: 

Heb 11:12 Kanian, dia ed sakey bengat, tan singa la inatey pinmaway so karaklan ya ag nabilang a singa saray bitewen tan singa say buer ya wala ed gilig na day at. 

Heb 11:13 Onong ed pananisia inatey iraya ya ag da ni inawat so saray sipan, ingen sikara so anengneng da tan sikara so inbano ra nanlapu ed arawi, tan inpatua'ra a sikara so sankaili tan manaakar ed tapew na dalin. 

Heb 11:14 Ta saray mangibaga ed saray ontan a bengatla inpatnag da ya aanapen da so dalin da a dili. 

Heb 11:15 Et tua a no nanonotan da komon so nanlapuan dan baley wala so baraan da komon ya ompawil. 

Heb 11:16 Balet natan panpirawatan da so dalin a magmaong, salanti, say mangatatawen: kanian say Dios agto ra ibaing, a sikato so manngaran na Dios da: ta wala ya inparaan to ed sikara so sakey a ciudad. 

Heb 11:17 Lapu ed pananisia, si Abraham, sanen sikato so asali, insaklang to si Isaac: salanti, say angawat a sililiket ed saray sipan, sikaton insaklang to wari so bogbogtong ya anak to; 

Heb 11:18 A sikato so angibagaan ed sikato na saya: Dia ed Isaac natawag naani so kailalakan mo: 

Heb 11:19 A momotekteken to ya angan dia ed saray inatey ni, nayarian na Dios so mamaalagey ed sikato; diman met so pinawilan to ya angawat ed aliling. 

Heb 11:20 Lapu ed pananisia, si Isaac binendicionan to si Jacob tan si Esau nipaakar ed saray bengatlan onsabi. 

Heb 11:21 Lapu ed pananisia, si Jacob sanen ngalngali la ya onpatey, binendicionan to so balang sakey ed saray anak nen Jose; tan angigalang a pinmeket ed sampot na tayokor to. 

Heb 11:22 Lapu ed pananisia, si Jose, sanen asinger la so ipatey to inbagato, so saman a inalis na saray anak na Israel; tan angiter na bilin nipaakar ed saray pukepukel to. 

Heb 11:23 Lapu ed pananisia, si Moises, sanen nianak, sikato so inyamot ed taloy bulan na saray atateng to, ta anengneng da a malimgas so ugaw; et ag ira tinmakot ed gangan na ari. 

Heb 11:24 Lapu ed pananisia, si Moises, sanen nagnap la ed inkatoo to ag to ginabay a nangaranan na anak na saman a marikit nen Faraon; 

Heb 11:25 A pinili to a nilabi so mantepel ed irap na saman a baley na Dios, nen say minabang ed saray onlabas a liket na kasalanan; 

Heb 11:26 A pinabli to a balbaleg a kayamanan so kamormora ed Cristo nen saray kayamanan na Egipto: ta wala ya inyan to so nata to ed katumangan. 

Heb 11:27 Lapu ed pananisia tinainari to so Egipto, ya ag to tinakotan so sanok na ari: ta nansiansia a singa to nengnengnengen so ag nanengneng. 

Heb 11:28 Lapu ed pananisia niliketan to so pasco, tan say pangiwalsik na dala, pian say mamagbag ed saray pangoloan ya anak ag to komon ira diwiten. 

Heb 11:29 Lapu ed pananisia linmabas ira ed pegley na Dayat ya Ambalanga a singa ed dalin ya amaga: a sikato so sinalira a gawaen na saray taga Egipto et sikara so nalner. 

Heb 11:30 Lapu ed pananisia nagba so bakor na Jerico, sanen niliber da a pitoy agew. 

Heb 11:31 Lapu ed pananisia si Rahab a balangkantis ag alanor ya abalang ed saray ag tinmolok, bangta anisia, inako to so saray mansisiim ed kareenan. 

Heb 11:32 Tan anto ni naani so ibagak? ta onkulangak naani na panaon pian salitaen ko so nipaakar ed Gedeon, Barac, Samson, Jefte; David, Samuel tan saray prof etas: 

Heb 11:33 A lapu ed pananisia analtalo'ra na panarian, nangawa ra na katonongan, akagamor ira na sipasipan, pinepet da so sangi na saray leon, 

Heb 11:34 Inerep da so biskeg na apuy, akapaliis ira ed tarem na kampilan, akalara na biskeg ed kakapuyan da, nagmaliw iran makapanyari ed bakal, pinabatik da so ejercitos na saray totoo a sankaili. 

Heb 11:35 Saray bibii inawat da so saray inaatey da lapu ed inkioli ed bilay: saray arum inaatey ira ed pekpek ya ag da inawat so inkiliktar, pian makagamor ira na magmaong a kioli ed bilay: 

Heb 11:36 Saray arum nanako'ra na inkamormora tan lewelewet; on, lalo ni ed say inkabalor tan saray pangawan: 

Heb 11:37 Saray arum tinopakda ra, tinegteg da ra, tinoksoda ra, pinatey da ra ed kampilan: nanakarakar ira dia tan diman a nankawes ira na katat na saray carnero tan saray kanding; makabos ira, aparpairap ira, akabkabil ira. 

Heb 11:38 (Tan say mundo aliwan sikatoy makana ed sikara), abalbalang ira ed saray lawak, dia ed saray palandey, tan saray ungib, tan ed saray abutabut na dalin. 

Heb 11:39 Et sarayan amin, dia ed inpakagamor da na sakey a maong a tasi lapu ed pananisia'ra, angaman ontan ag da ni inawat so sipan: 

Heb 11:40 Say Dios angiparaan na magmaong a bengatla nipaakar ed sikatayo, pian ag ira komon nayadyari ya andi itayo. 



Heb 12:1 Kanian sikatayo met, bangta wala ed liberliber tayo so sakey a sankabalgan a lurem na saray tasi, ikaindan tayo so amin a pakabelatan, tan say kasalanan ya akaliktob a sankainomayan ed sikatayo, tan batiken tayo a siaanos komon so babatiken a niyan ed arap tayo, 

Heb 12:2 A nengnengnengen tayo si Jesus a nangawa tan manamayadyari na pananisia tayo, a sikato lapud gayaga a niyan ed arap to sinongdoan to so cruz, ya inbantak to so baing, et imyorong ed kawanan na trono na Dios. 

Heb 12:3 Motektek yo sirin so nansongdo ed ontan la ya insumlang na saray managkasalanan ed sikaton dili, pian ag kayo komon nakesawan, ya onkapuy kayo ed saray kamarerwa yo. 

Heb 12:4 Ag kayo ni nantepel anga ed dala, a mibakal a sumpa ed kasalanan: 

Heb 12:5 Et nilingoanan yo so bilin, a sinalita to ed sikayo a singa dia ed saray anak, Ana'ko, ag mo mormoraen so panusa na Katawan, Tan ag ka met onkapuy no simbawaen to ka; 

Heb 12:6 Ta say Katawan dusaen to so aroen to, Tan leweten to so balang sakey ya awaten ton singa anak. 

Heb 12:7 No songdoan yo so dusa;say Dios ompatnag ed sikayo a singa anak to'ra; ta siopa ta ya anak so ag du saen na ama to? 

Heb 12:8 Balet no wala kayo ed paway na dusa ya inawat na saray amin ya anak to, sirin anak kayo ed paway, tan aliwa kayo ya anak. 

Heb 12:9 Laot ni, sikatayo wala so atateng tayo ed inkatoo a sikara so nandusa ed sikatayo; et sikara so ingalang tayo: akin et ag itayo ontolok a lalo ni ed Ama na saray espiritu, tan manbilay itayo naani? 

Heb 12:10 Ta saraman tua a dinusa'ra itayo ed pigaray agew onong ed apaabig da; et saya dusaen to itayo pian kaabigan tayo, pian makapinabang itayo ed kasantosan to. 

Heb 12:11 Tua ya angapo so pananusa natan a singa sengeg na liket, no ag ingen kaermenan: balet ka yari to mangiter na bunga a mareen na katonongan ed saray nailwamla lapu ed sikato. 

Heb 12:12 Kanian itagey yo so saray lima a naksawan, tan pabiskegen yo so saray pueg ya mangiwgiw; 

Heb 12:13 Tan mangawa kayo na kakokorang a maptek ed saray sali yo, pian ag nabalang so piley no ag ingen sikato so onabig komon. 

Heb 12:14 Tombok yo so kareenan ed saray amin a too, tan say kasantosan ta no angapo so saya, angapo naani so makapinengneng ed Katawan: 

Heb 12:15 A nengnengen yon maong ya angapo komon so onarawi ed graciay Dios; ya angapo komon so lamot na kapaitan ya ontobo tan mangalipanes ed sikayo, tan lapu ed sikato dakel so natilolan; 

Heb 12:16 Angapo komon so managlawan, odino too ya ag mangigalang ed saray bengatla a sagrado, singa si Esau, a lapu ed sanlipong a kanen inlako to so inkapangoloan to. 

Heb 12:17 Ta amtayo la ya angan sanen ayari la nen nanpirawatan to a tawiren so bendicion, sikato so ag naabobonan (ta ag to nalmo ed amato so pasen na pansalat na nonot), angano inanap to a siseseseg a katekep na saray lualua. 

Heb 12:18 Ta ag kayo sinminger ed sakey a palandey a nakarapas, tan mandarlang ed apuy, tan dia ed kadeketan, tan dia ed kabilungetan, tan dia ed bagyo, 

Heb 12:19 Tan dia ed tanol na trumpeta, tan dia ed voces na saray salita; a saray akadngel ed sayan voces inpikasi'ra ya ag to la komon ira pisalitaan: 

Heb 12:20 Ta ag da na yarian ya itepel so inbilin ed sikara: Ya angan say sakey ni ya ayep diwiten to so palandey, sikato naani batoen; 

Heb 12:21 Tan makapataktakot so saman a nanengneng ya angan si Moises kuan to, Ataktakotak tan mangiwgiwak: 

Heb 12:22 Ingen akaasinger kayo ed palandey na Sion, tan dia ed baley na Dios a mabilay, say Jerusalem a mangatatawen, tan ed saray agnabilang ya ejercito na saray angeles, 

Heb 12:23 Ed singbatan na saray lapag tan iglesia na saray pangoloan ya anak ya walaran nisulat diman ed tawen, tan dia ed Dios a Manangokom na amin, tan ed saray espiritu na saray totoo a matunong ya agawa la ra ya ayadyari, 

Heb 12:24 Tan si Jesus a manamegley na balon sipan, tan dia ed dala ya iwalsik, a mansalita ed saray magmaong a bengatla nen saramay kienen Abel. 

Heb 12:25 Nengneng yo ta ag yo ipulisay so mansalita. Ta no ag ira akabatik so saray angipulisay ed angipaliwawa dia ed dalin, naglalo la ag-itayo naani makatainan, no ag tayo denglen so mangipaliwawa ed sikatayo a manlapu ed tawen: 

Heb 12:26 A say voces to niyegyeg to lanti so dalin; balet natan insipan to, a kuan to, Maminsan ni ag ko labat yegyegen so dalin, no ag pati say tawen met. 

Heb 12:27 Et sayan salita: Marninsa'nin ipaliwawa to'y kaekal na saray bengatla ran ayegyeg, a singa saray bengatla ran agawa pian magnayon so saray bengatla ran ag ayegyeg. 

Heb 12:28 Kanian, awaten tayo so sakey a panarian ya agnayari a tenyegen, wala komon so gracia tayo a sikato so panlinkoran tayo ed Dios na makapaliket ed sikato a tokoyan na galang tan takot; 

Heb 12:29 Ta say Dios tayo sikato so sakey ya apuy a mangupot. 



Heb 13:1 Mansiansia komon ed sikayo so aro na sanaagi. 

Heb 13:2 Ag yo lilingoanan so pangipanengneng na aro ed saray sangkaili: ta lapud saya saray arum pinarawes da so saray angel a sikato so ag da naamamtaan. 

Heb 13:3 Nonot yo so saray nipangaw a singa wala kayo a nipangaw ed sikara; tan saray aparpairap lapu ed Cristo a singa wala kayo met ed laman da. 

Heb 13:4 Say panangasawa sikato komon so narayew ed saray ganagana, tan say dokolan andi komon so tilol to: ta saray managlawan tan saray mankakalugoran okomen ira naani na Dios. 

Heb 13:5 Nabolos kayo komon a manlapu ed aro na pilak, panliketan yo so bengatla ya wala ed sikayo: ta sikaton dili inbaga to: Ag taka naani tainan, tan ag taka naani ikaindan. 

Heb 13:6 Dia ed ontan nayarian tayo ya ibaga a mataletalek: Say Katawan sikato so mananulong ko; agak naani ontakot: Anto so nayarin gawaen ed siak na too? 

Heb 13:7 Nonot yo so saray manuley ed sikayo, a sikara so nansalita ed sikayo na salitay Dios; tan motektek yo no anto so asumpalan na inpanbilay da, alig yo so pananisia'ra. 

Heb 13:8 Si Jesu-Cristo sikato met lanlamang karuman, tan natan, on tan ed ando Ian ando. 

Heb 13:9 Ag kayo sirin payakar dia tan diman ed saray nanbabangil a bangat tan sankaili: ta sikato so maabig a bengatla a say puso napabiskeg ed gracia; aliwa a dia ed saray sirasira, ya ag balot apinabangan na saray angarap ed sikara. 

Heb 13:10 Sikami wala so sakey ya altar mi, tan dia ed saray wala ed sikato angapoy katunongan da a mangan so saray manlinkor ed tabernaculo. 

Heb 13:11 Ta saray lamalaman na saraman ya ayayep, a say dala ra sikato so ibagat na sankatageyan a sacerdote diman ed masanto'n pasen lapu ed kasalanan, sikara so napoolan ed paway na kampamento. 

Heb 13:12 Kanian si Jesus met pian napasanto to so baley na Dios ed dala ton dili, nantepel ed paway na pinto. 

Heb 13:13 Ompaway itayo sirin ya onla ed sikato dia ed paway na kampamento, ya itepel tayo so kamodmora to. 

Heb 13:14 Ta angapo so baley tayo dia a maando, balet anapen tayo a siseseseg so arapen. 

Heb 13:15 Lapu ed sikato sirin mangisaklang itayo ed Dios a naynay na bagat a panangidayew, salanti, say bunga na saray bibil a manngiwakawak na ngaran to. 

Heb 13:16 Balet ag yo lingoanan so panaggawa na maabig tan say pannanabang: ta say Dios napaliket a maong ed sarayan bagat. 

Heb 13:17 Ontolo'kayo ed saray wala a manuley ed sikayo, tan pauleyan kayo ed sikara: ta manbabantay ira lapu ed saray kamarerwa yo, a singa sikara so mangiter naani pipalinewan: pian sikato ya so gawaen da a sigagayaga, tan aliwa a sieermen: ta saya ag makapaabig ed sikayo. 

Heb 13:18 Pikasi yo kami: ta ilaloan mi ya wala so maabig a conciencia mi, a panpirawatan mi so manbilay a sigagalang dia ed saray amin a bengatla. 

Heb 13:19 Et kerewen ko ed sikayo a mapilpilit a gawaen yo so saya, pian siak so nipawil ed sikayo ed magangano. 

Heb 13:20 Et say Dios na kareenan, a sikato lapu ed talonggaring na dala na maandon sipan, inuli to ya ina wit ed saray inatey so sankabalgan a pastor na saray carnero, salanti Katawan tayo a Jesus, 

Heb 13:21 Yadyarien to kayo komon ed ganaganan maabig a bengatla ya gawa pian gawaen yo komon so linawa to, a gawaen to komon ed sikayo so makapaliket ed arap to, dia ed panamegley nen Jesu-Cristo; a sikato so nagalang komon ed ando Ian ando. Amen. 

Heb 13:22 Balet pikasik ed sikayo, agagi, ya akoen yo komon so salita a panagbilin: ta nansulat ak ed sikayo ed antikey. 

Heb 13:23 Amtaen yo a si agi tayo a Timoteo nablos la pati sikato, no onsabi a magano, siak nengnengen takayo. 

Heb 13:24 Ibano yo so saray amin ya wala a manuley ed sikayo, tan saray amin a sasanto. Ibano'ra kayo na saray taga Italia. 

Heb 13:25 Say gracia so wala komon ed sikayo ya amin. Amen. 

PANGASINENSE Philemon


Phm 1:1 Si Pablo, dinakep nen Jesu-Cristo, tan si agi a Timoteo, isulat mi ed kinen Filemon ya inararo tan katolongan mi, 

Phm 1:2 Tan si Apia met ya agi ya inararo tan si Arquipo ya ibiba mi ed inkasondalo tan dia ed iglesia ya wala ed abung mo: 

Phm 1:3 Gracia ed sikayo tan kareenan na Dios ya Ama tayo tan say Katawan a Jesu-Cristo. 

Phm 1:4 Misalamatak ya andi ebas ed Dios ko, a sasalangbiten ta ka ed saray pikakasik, 

Phm 1:5 No narengelan ko so arom, tan say pananisia ya wala ed sika ed Katawan a Jesus, tan nipaakar ed saray amin a sasanto; 

Phm 1:6 Pian say pikakasakey na pananisiam magmaliw komon a mabiskeg, a nipaakar ed pakaamta ed amin a maabig ya wala ed sikayo, lapu ed Cristo. 

Phm 1:7 Ta wala so dakel a gayagak tan ligliwak lapud arom, ta saray kapusoan na saray sasanto aligliwa ra lapu ed sika, agi. 

Phm 1:8 Kanian angan dia ed kinen Cristo wala so dakel a panmatale'ko pian igangan ko ed sika so manepeg, 

Phm 1:9 Angaman ontan lapud aro lablabayen kon pikasi ed sika, onong a siak si Pablo a masiken, tan natan pinangaw met nen Cristo Jesus: 

Phm 1:10 Kerewen ko ed sika lapud ana'ko ya Onesimo, ya inyana'ko ed saray balor ko, 

Phm 1:11 Sikato a sanen inmona a panaon angapo so kana to ed sika, balet natan makana ed sika, tan dia ed siak: 

Phm 1:12 A sikato so pinapawil ko ya imbaki ed sika a sikaton dili, a salanti, say dilin pusok: 

Phm 1:13 Sikato so nilabay ko komon ya intilak ed siak, pian dia ed ngaran mo tulongan to ak komon dia ed saray balobalor na evangelio: 

Phm 1:14 Balet no angapo so panangyaboloy mo, ag ko komon labay so mangawa na angan anto; pian say kaabigan mo aliwa komon a singa manlapu'd pankaokolan, no ag dia'd mabolos mon linawa. 

Phm 1:15 Ta anganko sikato so niarawi ed satan ed sika ed sakey ya antikey a panaon, pian napawil mo a sikatoy natilak lad sika ed andi anga; 

Phm 1:16 Aliwa Ian singa aripen, no ag lalo nen aripen, singa agi ya inararo, lalo la ed siak, et ingen lalo ni ed sika, aliwa labat a dia ed laman no ag dia ed Katawan. 

Phm 1:17 Bang sirin no ibilang mo ak ya iba, sikato so awaten mo a singa siak a dili. 

Phm 1:18 Et ingen no wala so daiset ya akalamesan to ed sika, odino wala so utang to a daiset, sikatoy yanmo ed kuentak; 

Phm 1:19 Siak si Pablo sikatoy isulat ko ed limak a dili, siak sikatoy omanen ko naani a bayaran: lapu ed ag ko ibaga ed sika ya angan say inkatoom ni nautang mo ed siak. 

Phm 1:20 On, agi; wala koraon so gayagak ed sika dia ed Katawan: pabtelan mo so pusok ed kinen Cristo. 

Phm 1:21 Lapu ed wala so ilalok dia ed katotolok mo, mansulatak ed sika, ya amtak a sika gawaen mo naani so nagkalalo ni nen say ibagak. 

Phm 1:22 Tan ontan met ya itadiaan mo ak na pagtoloyan a nipaakar ed siak: ta ilaloan ko a lapu ed saray pikakasi yo niaboloyak naani ed sikayo. 

Phm 1:23 Ibano to kayo nen Epafras, ya ibak ya nipangaw ed Cristo Jesus;
