Mat 14:3 Ta si Herodes inerel to nen saman si Juan, tan ginolonggolongan to, tan impangaw to nisengeg ed Herodias, ya asawa nen agi to a Felipe. 

Mat 14:4 Ta si Juan inkuan to nen saman ed sikato, Ag onkatonongan ed sika ya sikato'y kayarianen mo. 

Mat 14:5 Et sanen sikato'y nilabay to komon ya pateyen, tinmakot ed saray katooan, lapu'd inbilang da a sakey a profeta. 

Mat 14:6 Balet sanen dinmateng so agew ya inkianak nen Herodes, say anak a bii nen Herodias nansayaw ed pegley, et pinalike' to si Herodes. 

Mat 14:7 Kanian insipan to ya sinambaan so pangited to na angan anto'n kerewen to. 

Mat 14:8 Et sikato, lapu ed inbangat nen ina to, kuanto, Ited mo dia ed siak ed sakey a lipong so olo nen Juan a Bautista. 

Mat 14:9 Et say ari naermenan; balet nisengeg ed saray samba to, tan lapu ed saray karongo to ed pananganan, sikato'y ingangan to a niiter; 

Mat 14:10 Et angibaki, tan inpapotolan to si Juan ed panangipangawan. 

Mat 14:11 Et say olo to inawit da ed sakey a lipong, tan initer da'd samay marikit; et sikato'y inyakar to ed ina to. 

Mat 14:12 Et saray babangatan to linma ra, tan inala ra'y bankay to, tan inkotkot da; tan linma ra tan inbaga ra ed Jesus. 

Mat 14:13 Bang nen sikato'y nadngelan nen Jesus, inmarawi'd man ed sakey a paraw, tan linma ed sakey a pasen a lawak a maingew: tan sanen nadngelan na saray dakel a katooan, nanakar ira a tinmombok ed sikato a nanlapu ed saray ciudad. 

Mat 14:14 Et sikato'y pinmaway, et anengto ray dakerakel a katooan, et inabagey to ra, tan pinabpaabig to ray agmakayari ra. 

Mat 14:15 Tan sanen sinmabi so ngarem, sinminger so saray babangatan ed sikato, a kuan da, Say pasen sikato'y lawak, tan say horas linmabas la; pasempeten mo ray katooan, pian makakar ira ed saray aldeas tan manaliw ira'y tagano ra. 

Mat 14:16 Bangbalet inkuan nen Jesus ed sikara, Ag da nakaokolan so ontainan; pakanen yo ra. 

Mat 14:17 Et kuan da'd sikato, Wala dia ed sikami so liglimara'n tinapay, tan duara'n sira. 

Mat 14:18 Et inkuan to, Awit yo ra dia ed siak. 

Mat 14:19 Tan ingangan to'd saray dakerakel a katooan ya onyorong ira ed karikaan; et inala to so limara'n tinapay tan duara'n sira, tan sanen tinmangay ed tawen, binendicionan to, tan piningpinglis tan inderew to so saray tinapay ed saray babangatan to, tan saray babangatan, initer da'ra ed saray dakerakel a katooan. 

Mat 14:20 Et angan ira ya amin; tan napsel ira: tan dinokdok da so nakdaan ya apingpinglis, ed labindua a balolang ya napno. 

Mat 14:21 Tan saray angan singa lima'n libo a lalaki, nilikod iray bibii tan ugugaw. 

Mat 14:22 Tan tampol ya pinilitan to so saray babangatan to ya onlugan ed paraw tan pinaona to ra ed pagpag ya gilg, anga ed pakapasipo'to'd saray dakerakel a katooan. 

Mat 14:23 Et sanen apasipo' to so katooan tinmatdang ed palandey a nanpikasi a bokbokor: tan sanen onlalabi la, wadman a bokbokor to. 

Mat 14:24 Say paraw balet wadman ed taew na dayat, ya aaposem na saray daluyon; ta say dagem sikato'y suba. 

Mat 14:25 Et dia ed komapat a panagbantayt ed labi sikato so linma ed sikara, ya manaakar ed tapew na dayat. 

Mat 14:26 Tan sanen sikato so anengneng na saray babangatan ya manaakar ed dayat, agolo ra, ya kuan da, Sikato so sakey a payawar; et nanakis ira lapu'd takot. 

Mat 14:27 Balet tampol ya akisalitay Jesus ed sikara, a kuan to, Manmatale'kayo; ta siak; ag kayo ontakot. 

Mat 14:28 Et si Pedro inmebat tan inkuan to, Katawan, no sika, ibilin mo ya onlaak ed sika a manakar ak ed tapew na saray danum. 

Mat 14:29 Et inkuan to, Gala. Et si Pedro inmepas a nanlapu'd paraw, tan nanakar ed tapew na saray danum ya onla ed Jesus. 

Mat 14:30 Balet sanen anengneng to so dagem atakot; tan nen ongagapo'n onlereg, inmakis, a kuan to, Katawan, ilaban mo ak. 

Mat 14:31 Et tampol ya inunat nen Jesus so lima to, tan sikato so siningka'to, tan kuan to ed sikato, O sika makulang na pananisia, akin et nanduarua ka? 

Mat 14:32 Tan sanen akasapat ira ed paraw, tinmonda'y dagem. 

Mat 14:33 Et saraman so wala'd paraw sikato'y ingalgalang da a kuan da, Tua a sika so Anak na Dios. 

Mat 14:34 Sanen akabaliw ira, linmara ed dalin na Genezaret. 

Mat 14:35 Et nen sikato'y akabatan na saray totoo ed saman a pasen, nanbaki ra ed saman ya am in a sakop a manliberliber, tan inyakar da ed sikato so saray amin ya ag makayari; 

Mat 14:36 Tan akikaskasi ra'd sikato ta nadiwit da labat la komon so saloy na kawes to: et saray amin ya akadiwit inmaabig ira. 



Mat 15:1 Saman la linma ed Jesus so saray Fariseos tan escribas a nanlapu ed Jerusalem, a kuan da, 

Mat 15:2 Akin a saray babangatan mo agda sumpalen so ugali na saray mamasiken? ta'n agda urasan iray lima ra no mangan ira'y tinapay. 

Mat 15:3 Et sikato inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, Akin ya agyo met sumpalen so gangan na Dios nisengeg ed ugali yo? 

Mat 15:4 Ta say Dios inbaga to, Igalang mo'y amam tan inam: tan, Say mansalita na mauges ed ama ono ina, paulian ya ompatey komon ed patey. 

Mat 15:5 Bangbalet kuan yo, Siopaman a mangikuan ed ama to ono ina to, Say nayarian mo komon a pinabangan lapu ed siak niiter ed Dios; 

Mat 15:6 Ag to igalang naani ama to, Et sikayo ginawa yo ya andikakanaan so salita na Dios nisengeg ed ugali yo. 

Mat 15:7 Sikayo mansimpisimpitan, maong so impangiprofeta nen Isaias ed sikayo, a kuan to, 

Mat 15:8 Sayan baley igalang to ak ed saray bibil da; Say puso ra balet arawi'd siak. 

Mat 15:9 Balet maapa so panangigalang da'd siak, Ya ibangat dan singa matuan kakabatan da so bilibilin na saray totoo. 

Mat 15:10 Et tinawag to'd sikato, so saray dakel a katooan tan inkuan to'd sikara, Denglen yo, tan talosan yo: 

Mat 15:11 Aliwan say onloob ed sangi so mandumsis ed too; no ag say onbesngaw ed sangi, saya so mandumsis ed too. 

Mat 15:12 Saman la linma so saray babangatan, tan inkuan da'd sikato, Amtam ya saray Fariseos asanokan ira, nen nadngel da so saya'n salita? 

Mat 15:13 Balet inmebat tan inkuan to, amin a tanaman ya ag-intanem nen Amak ya mangatatawen, nabagot. 

Mat 15:14 Paulian yo ra: sikara so bulag a manangitonton. Et no say bulag itonton to so bulag, sikara'n dua napaleg ira ed abot. 

Mat 15:15 Et si Pedro inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikato, Ipaliwawam ed sikami so saya'n alimbawa. 

Mat 15:16 Et sikato inkuan to, Sikayo met angapo'y pakatalos yo? 

Mat 15:17 Ag yo naomameng, ya anto kaman ya onloob ed sangi ontalos ed eges, tan nibantak ed sebekan? 

Mat 15:18 Bangbalet saray bengatla'n onbesngaw ed sangi manlapu ra'd puso; et dumsisan da so too. 

Mat 15:19 Ta dia ed puso so pawayan na saray mauges a nonot, panagpatey, saray pikakalugoran, saray panaglawan, saray panagtakew, panagtasi ed aliwa'n tua, saray mabanday a salita: 

Mat 15:20 Saraya so mandumsis ed too; say panangan balet ya ag urasan so lima ag to dumsisan so too. 

Mat 15:21 Tan si Jesus tinmainan diman, tan linma ed saray sakop na Tiro tan Sidon. 

Mat 15:22 Et nia, sakey a bii a taga Canaan pinmaway a nanlapu ed saraman ya sakop, tan inmakis, a kuan to, Kasian mo ak komon, O Katawan, sika Anak nen David; say ana'ko a bii papairapen a toloy na sakey a demonic 

Mat 15:23 Balet sikato so ag to inebatan na sakey a salita. Et saray babangatan to sinminger ira tan kinerew da'd sikato, a kuan da, Sikato komon so patainanen mo; ta manakis ya manomtombok ed sikatayo. 

Mat 15:24 Balet inmebat tan inkuan to, Agak dia nibaki no ag dia'd saray abalang a carnero na abung na Israel. 

Mat 15:25 Balet sinminger tan nanpikasi ed sikato, a kuan to, Katawan, tulongan mo ak. 

Mat 15:26 Et sikato inmebat tan inkuan to, Ag manepeg ya alaen so tinapay na saray ugugaw tan sikato so ibontok ed saray aso. 

Mat 15:27 Balet sikato inkuan to, On, Katawan: ta angan saray aso mangan ira'd saray mekmek ya napelag a manlapu'd pananganan na katawan da. 

Mat 15:28 Saman la inmebat si Jesus tan inkuan to'd sikato, O bii, baleg so pananisiam: nagawa ed sika so onong na kaliktan mo. Et say anak to a bii inmabig nanlapu ed saman ya horas. 

Mat 15:29 Et si Jesus tinmainan diman, et linma ed abay na dayat na Galilea; et tinmatdang ed palandey, tan nanyorong diman. 

Mat 15:30 Et sinmabi ed sikato so dakerakel a katooan, a sankaawit da so saray piley, bulag, umel, sikuel, tan arum ni ran dakerakel, tan ingaton dara ed salian to; et pinaabig to ra: 

Mat 15:31 Ed ontan la ya nikelawan so saray dakel a katooan, nen anengneng da so umel a makasalita, say sikuel ya inmabig, tan say piley a makaakar, tan say bulag ya makanengneng: et ingalgalang da so Dios na Israel. 

Mat 15:32 Et si Jesus tinawag to so saray babangatan to ed sikato, tan inkuan to, Kaskasian ko so dakerakel a katooan, lapu'd akipanayam ira'd siak ed talo ran agew, et angapo'y nakan da: et ag ko labay ira'n pasempeten a manaayunal, ta ompan onkapoy ira ed dalan. 

Mat 15:33 Et saray babangatan kuan da'd sikato, Ined so pangalaan tayo na amayamay a tinapay dia ed kalawakan a pasen, pian napesel so ontan a kinarakel a katooan? 

Mat 15:34 Et si Jesus inkuan to'd sikara, Pigara'n tinapay so wala ed sikayo? Et inkuan da, Pitora, tan daiset a sira ya ankekelag. 

Mat 15:35 Et ingangan to'd saray dakel a katooan ya onyorong ira'd dalin; 

Mat 15:36 Et inala to 'ray pitora'n tinapay tan saramay sirasira; tan akisalamat tan pinisagpisag to, tan inderew to'd saray babangatan, tan saray babangatan diad saray dakel a katooan. 

Mat 15:37 Et angan ira ya amin, tan napsel ira: tan dinokdok da so saray nakdaan ya pisagpisag, a pitora'n balolang so napno. 

Mat 15:38 Et saray angan apat a libo ran lalaki nilikod so saray bibii tan ugugaw. 

Mat 15:39 Tan inbaki to so saray dakel a katooan, insan linmoob ed paraw, tan linma ed saray ketegan na Magdala. 



Mat 16:1 Et sinmabi so saray Fariseos tan Saduceos, et dia'd inpanokso rad sikato kinerew da'd sikato ya ipanengnengan to ra na sakey a tanda a nanlapu ed tawen. 

Mat 16:2 Balet sikato inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, No ngarem, kuan yo, Maong naani panaon: ta say tawen ambalanga. 

Mat 16:3 Tan no cabuasan, Mauges so panaon natan: ta say tawen ambalanga tan malurem. Amta yo ya ibiig so nengneng na tawen; bangbalet agyo nayari'n ibiig iray tanda na saray panaon. 

Mat 16:4 Sakey a kapolian a mauges tan mikakalugoran onkerew na sakey a tanda; et angapo'y niiter ya tanda ed sikato, no ag say tanda nen Jonas. Et tinainan to'ra tan imanla. 

Mat 16:5 Et sinmabi so saray babangatan ed biek na dayat, et alingoanan da'y angitarok na tinapay. 

Mat 16:6 Et si Jesus inkuan to'd sikara, aluaran yo tan paliisan yo so levaduara na saray Fariseos tan Saduceos. 

Mat 16:7 Et nanisisip ira ed sikara'n dili, a kuan da, Ag itayo angitarok na tinapay. 

Mat 16:8 Et si Jesus diad inpakalikas to inkuan to, O sikayo makulang na pananisia, akin et manisisip kayo ed sikayon dili, nisengeg ed angapo so tinapay yo? 

Mat 16:9 Ag yo ta ni naamingaw, odino nanonotan so saray limara'n tinapay ed saray limanlibo, tan pigara'n balolang so dinokdok yo? 

Mat 16:10 Angan saray pitora'n tinapay ed saray apat a libo, tan no pigara'n balolang so dinokdok yo? 

Mat 16:11 Panon sirin ya ag yo natebek ya say sinalitak ed sikayo ag nipaakar ed tinapay? No ag ingen paliisan yo so levadura na saray Fariseos tan Saduceos. 

Mat 16:12 Saman da la atalosan ya ag to inbaga a paliisan da so levadura na tinapay, no ag ingen say bangat na saray Fariseos tan Saduceos. 

Mat 16:13 Bangnen akasabi si Jesus ed saray paspasen na Cesarea na Filipo, tinepe'to ed saray babangatan to, a kuan to, Siopa so sayay Anak na too ed pangikuan na saray totoo? 

Mat 16:14 Et inkuan da: Saray arum kuanda'n si Juan a Bautista; saray arum, si Elias: tan saray arum, si Jeremias, ono sakey saray profetas. 

Mat 16:15 Sikato kuan to'd sikara Sikayo balet, siopaak ed kuan yo? 

Mat 16:16 Et si Pedro inmebat tan inkuan to, Sika so Cristo, ya Anak na Dios a mabilay. 

Mat 16:17 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikato, Mapalar ka, Simon ya anak nen Jonas: to ag itan inpuyan ed sika na laman tan dala, no ag si Amak ya wala ed tawen. 

Mat 16:18 Et kuan ko met ed sika, ya sika Pedro ka, et dia ed tapew na saya'n baton dampay ipaalagey ko naani so iglesiak; et saray pinto na Hades ag ontalona naani ed sikato. 

Mat 16:19 Iter ko naani ed sika so saray tombok na panaria'y tawen: et siopaman a singeren mo naani ed dalin nasinger naani ed tawen; tan siopaman ya akbaran mo ed dalin naokbaran naani ed tawen. 

Mat 16:20 Insanto inbilin ed saray babangatan to ya angapo'y pangibagaan da ya sikato si Cristo. 

Mat 16:21 Nanlapu'd saman a panaon ginapoan nen Jesus ya inpatnag ed saray babangatan to, a kaokolan to'y onla ed Jerusalem, tan mantepel na amayamay a bengat la ed saray mamasiken, tan manunaan day sacerdote tan saray escribas, tan sikatoy pateyen da et dia'd kamatlo'n agew onoli ed bilay. 

Mat 16:22 Et sikato'y inala nen Pedro, tan ginapoan ton banoen, a kuanto, Sikato so niarawi komon ed sika, Katawan: saya ag komon nagawa angan kapigan ed sika. 

Mat 16:23 Sikato balet linmingay tan inkuan to ed Pedro, Ekal ka'd arap ko, Satanas: sika'y sakey a makapagapol ed siak: ta ag mo nononoten iray bengatlan nipaakar ed Dios, noag saray bengatlan nipaakar ed saray totoo. 

Mat 16:24 Saman la inkuan nen Jesus ed saray babangatan to, No say siopaman a too et labay to'y ontombok ed siak benegan to'y dili ya inkasikato, et alaen to'y cruz to, tan tomboken toak. 

Mat 16:25 Ta siopaman a mangilaban komon na bilay to nabalang to naani: et siopaman a makabalang naani na bilay to nisengeg ed siak sikato'y naalmo to. 

Mat 16:26 Ta anto tay pinanabang na sakey a too, no naala to'y sankamundoan, et nabalang to'y bilay to? ono anto kasi iter na too ya isandi to'd bilay to? 

Mat 16:27 Ta say Anak na too onla dia naani dia'd gloria na Ama to a pati saray angeles to; saman to tumangan naani so balang sakey a too onong ed saray gawa to. 

Mat 16:28 Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Wala ray arum ed saray wadia, ya angan panon ag da naani natawayan so patey, anga'd pakanengneng da ed Anak na too ya onsabi ed panarian to. 



Mat 17:1 Et kayari anem agew si Jesus inala to ra di Pedro, tan Santiago, tan si Juan ya agi to, tan inyakar to ra ed sakey a palandey ya atagey ed arawi: 

Mat 17:2 Et naoman so nengneng to ed arap da: et say lupa to sinminag a singa say banwa, tan saray kawes to nagmaliw ya amputi ya singa liwawa. 

Mat 17:3 Et nia, pinmayawar ed sikara di Moises tan Elias a misasalita ed sikato. 

Mat 17:4 Et si Pedro inmebat, tan inkuan to ed Jesus, Katawan, maong komon no manayam itayo dia: no labay mo, mangawa ak dia na talora'n abungabung; sakey so onkana'd sika, tan sakey so onkana'd Moises tan sakey so onkana'd Elias.

Mat 17:5 Sanen peles to ni'n mansasalita, nia, so sakey a lurem a masnag tinarongan to ra: tan nia, sakey a voces a nanlapu ed lurem, a kuan to, Sikatoya so inarok ya Anak, a sikato'y panliketan ko'n maong; sikato so dengelen yo. 

Mat 17:6 Et sanen sikato'y nadngel na saray babangatan, intuek da so lupa ra, tan atakot ira'n toloy. 

Mat 17:7 Et si Jesus linma ed diniwi'to ra tan inkuan to, Alagey kayo, tan ag kayo antakot. 

Mat 17:8 Et sanen intengwara so saray kamataan da, angapo'y anengneng da no ag si Jesus labat. 

Mat 17:9 Tan dia ed ilalasor da ed palandey, si Jesus binilin to ra, a kuan to, Ag yo ibabaga ed siopaman a too so pasingawey, anga ed say Anak na too onoli ed bilay a manlapu ed saray inaatey. 

Mat 17:10 Et saray babangatan to tinepet da'd sikato, a kuan da, Akin sirin a kuan na saray escribas a si Elias kaokolan ya onla dia ya onona? 

Mat 17:11 Et sikato inmebat tan kuan to, Si Elias onla dia a peteg, tan ipawil to naani 'amin a bengatla: 

Mat 17:12 Bangbalet kuan ko ed sikayo, ya si Elias linma la dia, et sikato'y agda binirbir, noag ingen ginawa ra'd sikato so angan anto a kinaliktan da. Ontan met a say Anak na too mantepel naani ed sikara. 

Mat 17:13 Saman la atalosan na saray babangatan ya si Juan a Bautista so sinalita to ed sikara. 

Mat 17:14 Tan sanen sinmabi ra ed saray dakel a katooan, dinmago'd sikato'y sakey a laki, ya tinmalimokor ed sikato, tan kuan to, 

Mat 17:15 Katawan, kasian mo pa so ana' ko'n laki: ta sikato so bubulanen, et nanairapan a toloy: ta mabetbet ya nabaktar ed apuy tan mabetbet dia ed danum. 

Mat 17:16 Et sikato'y inyakar ko ed saray babangatan mo, et sikato'y ag da natambal. 

Mat 17:17 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to, O makulang na pananisia tan mauges a kapolian, kaonongan kabayag so kiwalak ed sikayo? kaonongan kabayag so pantepel ko ed sikayo? sikato'y yakar mo dia ed siak. 

Mat 17:18 Et sikato'y nansalitaan nen Jesus; et say demonio pinmaway manlapu'd sikato: et atambal so ugaw a laki nanlapu'd saman ya horas. 

Mat 17:19 Saman la inmasinged so saray babangatan ed kinen Jesus ed kabokoran, tan inkuan da; Akin et sikato'y agmi apapaway? 

Mat 17:20 Et kuan to'd sikara, Nisengeg ed melag ya pananisia yo: ta tua kuan ko'd sikayo, No wala komo'y pananisia yo a singa say sakey a bokei na mostaza, kuan yo naani ed saya'n palandey, Onalis ka a manlapu dia ya anga ed saman a pasen; et sikato'y onalis; tan angapo naani agnayari ed sikayo. 

Mat 17:21 Balet saya'n nengneng agnapapaway no ag dia ed panagpikasi tan panagayunal. 

Mat 17:22 Et leleg a nanayam ira ed Galilea, inbaga nen Jesus ed sikara, Say Anak na too niawat naani ed lima na saray totoo; 

Mat 17:23 Tan sikato naani pateyen da, et dia ed kamatlo'n agew onoli ed bilay. Et nanermen ira a mapalalo. 

Mat 17:24 Et sanen sinmabi ra ed Capernaum, saray mansisingil na kapaldua a siklo linma ra'd Pedro, tan inkuan da, Say managbangat yo ag to bayaran so kapaldua a siklo? 

Mat 17:25 Inkuan to, On. Et nen linmoob ed abung, si Jesus inmona ya akisalita'd sikato, a kuan to: Anto so isisip mo, Simon? saray arari dalin siopa so pansingilan da na impuesto ono buis? ed saray anak da, ono ed saray sankaili? 

Mat 17:26 Et sanen inkuan to, Ed saray sankaili, inkuan nen Jesus ed sikato, Saray anak ag ira sirin ombuis. 

Mat 17:27 Balet, ompan sikara'y naitdan tayo na kagapolan, onla ka ed dayat, tan manbanwit ka, et alam so sira ya ononan naala; tan sano nalengat mo so sangi to naromog mo'y sakey a siklo: alam itan, tan iter mo ed sikara nipaakar ed siak tan sika. 



Mat 18:1 Dia'd saman ya horas sinminger iray babangatan ed Jesus, a kuan da, Siopa sirin so kabalbalgan ed panariay tawen? 

Mat 18:2 Et tinawag to ed sikatoy sakey a melag ya ugaw, tan inyan to ed pegley da, 

Mat 18:3 Tan inkuan to, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, No ag kayo onpawil tan ag kayo magmaliw a singa saray ankekelag ya ugugaw, angan panon ag kayo naani makaloob ed panaria'y tawen. 

Mat 18:4 Kanian siopaman ya manpaabeba a singa saya'n melag ya ugaw, sikato lamlamang so cabalbalgan ed panaria'y tawen. 

Mat 18:5 Tan siopaman ya mangawat naani na sakey ya ontan a melag ya ugaw ed ngaran ko awaten to ak. 

Mat 18:6 Ingen siopaman a mangigapol na sakey ed sarayan ugugaw ya manisia ed siak, magmaong ni ed sikato ya isabit komon so sakey a baleg ya bato na gilingan ed beklew to, tan ipalner komon ed kaaraiman na dayat. 

Mat 18:7 Kasi la so mundo nisengeg ed saray kagapolan! ta nakaokolan ya onsabi so saray kagapolan; ingen kasi la so too a panlapuan na kagapolan! 

Mat 18:8 Et no say limam ono say salim so kagapolan mo, potot mo, tan ipulisay mo ed sika: ta magmaong ni ed sika so onloob ed bilay ya pokol so limam ono salim, nen say wala so duara'n limam ono duara'n salim ya nipelag ka ed apuy ya andi angaan. 

Mat 18:9 Et no say matam so kagapolan mo, sikato so sukit mo, tan ipulisay mo ed sika: magmaong ed sika so onloob ed bilay a saksakey so matam, nen say wala so duara'n matam ya nipelag ka ed apuy na infierno. 

Mat 18:10 Nengneng yo ya ag yo modmoraen so sakey ed saraya'n ugugaw: ta kuan ko'd sikayo, ya dia ed tawen saray angeles da sankanengneng dan naynay so lupa nen Amak ya wala ed tawen. 

Mat 18:11 (Ta say Anak na too linma dia a mangilaban ed saray abalang.) 

Mat 18:12 Panon so isisip yo? no say siopaman a too wala'y sanlasus a carnero to, et abalang so sakey ed sikara, ag to ta tainan so saray siamaplo tan siam, tan onla ed saray palandey, tan anapen to so abalang? 

Mat 18:13 Et no nagawa a sikato'y naalmo to, tua kuan ko'd sikayo, a sikato so panliketan to a mapalalo nen saray siamaplo tan siam ya ag ira abalang. 

Mat 18:14 Ontan met ya ag kaliktan nen Ama yo ya wala ed tawen, ya sakey ed sarayan ankekelag ya ugugaw et natawtaw.

Mat 18:15 Et no say agim makapankasalanan ed sika, onla ka, ipaliwawam ed sikato so kasalanan to a sikayon dua lambengat: no dengelen to ka, tinalom so agim. 

Mat 18:16 Balet no ag to ka dengelen, mangitagar ka ibam a sakey ono duara pian dia ed sangi' duara ono talora a tasi napamintuaan so amin a salita. 

Mat 18:17 Et no ag to ray a dengelen, sikato'y ibagam ed iglesia: et no ag to labay met a dengelen so iglesia, sikatoy ipasen mo ed sika a singa Gentil tan punlicano 

Mat 18:18 Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Anto kaman a berberen yo dia ed dalin naberber naani ed tawen: tan amin ya okbaran yo dia ed dalin naokbaran naani ed tawen 

Mat 18:19 Kuan ko'd sikayo lamet, ya no duara ed sikayo makapanpaknaan naani dia ed dalin nipaakar ed anto kaman ya kerewen da gawaen naani ed sikara nn Amak ya wala ed tawen. 

Mat 18:20 Ta no ined so kawalaan na duara ono talora a nantitipon nisengeg ed ngaran ko siak wala ak ed nanleleetan da. 

Mat 18:21 Saman la sinminger si Pedro, tan inkuan to'd sikato, Katawan maminpiga kas a mankasalanan naani ed siak so agik, tan maminpiga a perdonaen ko? anga ed maminpito? 

Mat 18:22 Si Jesus kuan to'd sikato, Ag ko ikuan ed silta Anga ed maminpito; ingen, Anga ed maminpitomplo ya pito. 

Mat 18:23 Kanian say panaria'y tawen nio libay ed sakey ya ari, ya ginabay to'y akibilangan ed saray ariripen to. 

Mat 18:24 Tan sanen ginmapo a nanbilang, nipatnag ed sikato so sakey, ya aka utang ed sikato na samplon libo ya talentos.

Mat 18:25 Et lapu ed angapo so panbayar to, ingangan na katawan to a sikato'y nilako, tan say asawa to, tan saray anak, tan amin ya wala ed sikato, tan nagawa so panbayad. 

Mat 18:26 Kanian samay aripen dinmakmomo tan akikasi ed sikato, a kuan to, Katawan, anosan mo ak komon, ta bayaran kon amin naani ed sika. 

Mat 18:27 Et say katawan na saman ya aripen, bangta inabagey to, sikato'y inbolos to, tan pinerdona to ed utang to. 

Mat 18:28 Balet saman ya aripen pinmaway, et aromog to'y sakey ed saray ibiba ya akautang ed sikato na sanlasus a denarios: et sikato'y sining ka'to tan tinitikel to, a kuan to, Bayaran mo so utang mo. 

Mat 18:29 Kanian say iba to a papaaripen, dinmakmomo, tan nankerew ed sikato, a kuan to, Anosan mo ak kari, ta bayaran ta ka man. 

Mat 18:30 Et ag to ginabay: no ag say linma tan intobong to ed panangipangawan, anga ed pakabayar to na inutang to. 

Mat 18:31 Kanian sanen anengneng na saray ibaton papaaripen so agawa, naermenan ira a mapalalo, et linma ra tan inbagara'd katawan da so amin ya agawa. 

Mat 18:32 Diad saman sikato'y tinawag na Katawan to ed sikato, tan kuan to'd sikato, Sika marelmeng ya aripen, pinerdonak ed sika so amin ya utang, mo lapu'd akikaskasi ka'd siak: 

Mat 18:33 Ag mo komon met nepeg sirin ya kinasian so ibam ya aripen, a singa say inpangasik ed sika? 

Mat 18:34 Et samay katawan to apasnokan, et sikato'y inyaw'to ed saray managpiirap, anga ed pakabayar to na amin ya inutang to. 

Mat 18:35 Ontan met naani gawaen nen Amak a mangatatawen ed sikayo, no sakey tan sakey ed sikayo ag to perdonaen so agi to a manlapu ed puso yo 



Mat 19:1 Tan agawa sanen asumpal nen Jesus so saraaya'n salita, tinmainan ed Galilea, tan linma ed saray ketegan na Judea ed labas na Jordan; 

Mat 19:2 Et dakerakel a katooan so tinmombok ed sikato; et tinambal to rad' man. 

Mat 19:3 Et sinminger so saray Fariseos ed sikato, a sikato'y toksoen da, tan kuan da, Onkatonongan kasi so pangisian na sakey a laki ed asawa to nisengeg ed anton bengat la? 

Mat 19:4 Et inmebat, tan inkuan to, Ag yo ta abasa, ya say amalsa ed sikara nanlapu ed gapo ginawa to ra a laki tan bii? 

Mat 19:5 Tan inkuan to, Lapu'd saya say laki tainan to naani so ama tan ina to, tan ontipon naani ed asawa to; et sikara'n dua saksakey ira naani ya laman? 

Mat 19:6 Kanian aliwa la ran duara, no ag saksakey a laman. Say inpantipon na Dios sirin, aleg a sianen na too. 

Mat 19:7 Kuan da ed sikato, Akin sirin a si Moises ingangan to so pangiter na sakey a sulat na pansian ta pian sikato so patainanen? 

Mat 19:8 Kuan to ed sikara, Si Moises lapu ed kaawetan na puso yo inaboloyan to kayo a mangisian ed saray kaasawaan yo: balet nanlapu ed gapo aliwan ontan. 

Mat 19:9 Et kuan kod sikayo, Siopaman a laki ya mangisian naani na asawa to, nilikod ed inpilawanan tan mangasawa na sananey a bii, mankasalanan ed pikakalugoran: tan say lakin mangasawa ed sikato sano insian sikato so mankasalanan ed pikakalugoran. 

Mat 19:10 Saray babangatan kuan da ed sikato, No ontan so kipapasen na laki ed asawa to, ag manepeg so mangasawa. 

Mat 19:11 Balet inkuan to ed sikara, Aliwan amin a too so nayarin mangawat ed sayan salita, no ag saraman so pangitdan. 

Mat 19:12 Ta walara'y eunucos, a sikara'y nianak a nanlapud eges na ina ra: tan walaray eunucos, a sikara'y ginawan eunucos na saray totoo: tan walaray eunucos, ya ginawa ra'y inkasikara'n dili a eunucos nisengeg ed panarian na tawen. Say makayarin mangawat ed saya, sikatoy awaten to. 

Mat 19:13 Saman la walaray ugugaw ya ankekelag ya inyakar da ed Jesus, pian nitapew to so saray lima tod sikara, tan mikasi: et saray babangatan binano da ra. 

Mat 19:14 Si Jesus balet inkuan to, Aboloyan yo so saray ankekelag ya ugugaw, tan ag yo ra sesebelan ya ondago ed siak: ta saray ontan so makankien na panariay tawen. 

Mat 19:15 Et intapew to ra'y limalima tod sikara, tan tinmainan diman. 

Mat 19:16 Et nia, walay sakey a dinmago ed sikato tan mankuan, Managbangat, antoy maong a bengatlan gawaen ko, ta pian nagamoran koy bilay a maando? 

Mat 19:17 Et inkuan tod sikato, Akin et tepeten mod siak so nipaakar ed maong? Walay sakey a sikato so maong: et no pirawat moy onloob ed bilay, onoren mo so saray gangan. 

Mat 19:18 Kuan to ed sikato, Dinan ira? Et si Jesus inkuan to, Ag ka mamatey, Ag ka manlawan ed ag mo asawa, Ag ka mantakew, Ag ka mansalita na tila a pantasi; 

Mat 19:19 Igalang mo so amam tan inam; tan, Aroen mo so karapam a too onong ed sika lanlamang. 

Mat 19:20 Say balolaki kuan to ed sikato, Amin so saraya inonor ko ra: dinan ni kakulangan ko? 

Mat 19:21 Si Jesus inkuan to'd sikato, No pirawat mo so cayadyarim, laka, ilakom so walad sika, tan iter mod saray duruka, et wala naani kayamanan mo ed tawen: et gala, tombok mo ak. 

Mat 19:22 Sanen nadngel balet na balolaki so sayan salita, linma la ya maermen a toloy; ta sikatoy sakey ya walaan na baleg a kaykayarian. 

Mat 19:23 Et si Jesus inkuan tod saray babangatan to, Tua kuan kod sikayo, Mairap ed mayaman a too so iloob tod panarian na tawen. 

Mat 19:24 Tan kuan ko lamet ed sikayo, Maig-inomay ni ya onlabot so sakey a camello ed abot na sakey a dagum, nen say sakey a toon mayaman ya onloob ed panarian na Dios. 

Mat 19:25 Et sanen sikatoy nadngel na saray babangatan, nikelawan iran mapalalo a kuan da, Siopa sirin so nayari a nilaban? 

Mat 19:26 Et si Jesus sanen ninengneng to ra inkuan to'd sikara, Dia'd saray totoo agnayari so saya; balet dia'd Dios ami' bengabengatla nayari. 

Mat 19:27 Inmebat si Pedro ed satan, et inkuan to ed sikato, Nia, sikami tinainan mi ya amin, tan tinombok mi ka: anto sirin so wala naani ed sikami? 

Mat 19:28 Et si Jesus inkuan to'd sikara, Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, a sikayo'n tinmombok ed siak, dia ed balo a panamalsa sano say Anak na too onyorong naani ed trono na gloria to, sikayo onyorong kayo met naani ed labindua'n trono a mangokom ed saray labindua'n kailalakan na Israel. 

Mat 19:29 Tan balang sakey a tinainan to ray kaabungan, ono agagi a lalaki, ono bibii, ono ama, ono ina, ono saray anak, ono daldalin, nisengeg ed ngaran ko, makaawat naani' maminlasus, tan tawiren to naani so bilay a maando. 

Mat 19:30 Balet dakel naani 'ray naonor a sikara'y onaan, tan onaan a sicaray naonor. 



Mat 20:1 Ta say panariay tawen miolibay ed sakey a too ya ama na sankabaley, ya pinmaway a masakbay ed kabuasan ya mangopa na dumaralos ed uvasan to. 

Mat 20:2 Et sanen akapipakna'd saray dumaralos ed sakey a denario ed sanagew, sikara'y inbaki to ed uvasan to, 

Mat 20:3 Tan pinmaway ed mikatlo ya horas, et anengneng to so saray sananey a wala ra ed plaza ya manalalagey a manmemeneng, 

Mat 20:4 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo met ed uvasan, et say kanepegan sikato so iter ko'd sikayo. Et linma ra. 

Mat 20:5 Sikato'y pinmaway lamet ed mikanem f tan mikasiam ya horas et ontan met so ginawa to. 

Mat 20:6 Tan sanen singa mikalabinsakey ya horas pinmaway, tan aromog to ray arum ya akaalagey: et kuan to'd sikara, Akin et akaalagey kayo dia a sanagew a manmemeneng? 

Mat 20:7 Kuan da'd sikato, Lapu'd angapo'y angupa ed sikami. Kuan to'd sikara, Onla kayo met ed uvasan. 

Mat 20:8 Et sanen labi la, say makankien na uvasan kuan to'd panagpiaan to, Tawag mo 'ray dumaralos tan bayaran mo'd sikara so upa ra, manlapu'd onor anga ed onaan. 

Mat 20:9 Et sanen sinmabi so saray inupaan ed komaiabinsakey ya horas sikara inawat da balang sakey a too so sakey a denario. 

Mat 20:10 Tan sanen sinmabi so saray akaona, inisip da'n mangawat ira'y dakdakel; et sikara met inawat da balang sakey a too so sakey a denario. 

Mat 20:11 Et sanen sikato so naawat da, nantalabotob ira sumpa ed ama na sankabaley, 

Mat 20:12 A kuan da, Sarayan onor sakey horas lambengat so inpankimey da, et inpiparam ira'd sikami, ya sinakbat mi so awit ya san-agew, tan say makaatong ya petang. 

Mat 20:13 Sikato balet inmebat tan inkuan to'd sakey ed sikara, Kaaro, ag ko gawaen ed sika so agonkatonongan: Agka ta akipakna ed siak ed sakey a denario? 

Mat 20:14 Alam so kayarian mo, tan laka la; labay ko so mangiter ed saya'y onor, na singa say initer ko'd sika. 

Mat 20:15 Ag ta onkatonongan ed siak so pangawak na labay ko ed kayarian ko lanlamang? ono say matam so mauges, lapu ed maongak? 

Mat 20:16 Dia ed ontan saray onor sikara naani unona, tan saray unona sikaray naonor. 

Mat 20:17 Et sanen ontatatdang si Jesus ed Jerusalem, inala to so saray labinduan babangatan ed arawi, tan dia ed dalan inkuanto'd sikara, 

Mat 20:18 Nia, ontatdang itayo ed Jerusalem; et say Anak na too niawat naani ed saray manonan sacerdotes tan escribas; et sikatoy dusaen da naani ed ipapatey, 

Mat 20:19 Tan sikatoy yawat da naani ed saray Gentiles pian ludlureyen da, tan leweten da, tan ipasak da ed cruz: et dia ed komatlon agew onoli ed bilay. 

Mat 20:20 Saman la linma ed sikato- so ina na saray anak nen Zebedeo pati saray anak to a lalaki, a mangigagalang ed sikato tan onkekerew na sakey a bengatla ed sikato. 

Mat 20:21 Et inkuan to'd sikato, Anto'y labay mo? Sikato kuanto'd sikato, Ibilin mo komon a saraya'y duaran ana' komakayorong ira komon, sakey ed nikawanan a limam, tan say sakey ed nikawigi a limam, dia ed panarian mo. 

Mat 20:22 Si Jesus balet inmebat tan inkuan to, Ag yo amtay kekerewen yo. Nayarian yo ta ya inumen so copa ya ngalngali ya inumen ko? Kuan dad sikato, Nayarian mi. 

Mat 20:23 Sikato kuan to'd sikara, Say copak tua ya inumen yo naani: balet say yorong yo ed nikawanan a limak tan dia ed nikawigi a limak, ag ko kien so panangiter, ingen sikato so nipaakad ed saray angiparaanan nen Amak. 

Mat 20:24 Et nen sikato so nadngel na saray samplora, asanokan ira nipaakar ed saray duaran sanagi. 

Mat 20:25 Si Jesus balet tinawag to ra ed sikato, tan inkuan to, Amta yo ya saray makauley na saray Gentiles sikara so katawan ed sikara, tan saray manonaan agamilen da so pakauley da ed sikara. 

Mat 20:26 Aliwan ontan naani dia ed sikayo : noag ingen siopaman a labay toy magmaliw a baleg ed sikayo sikato naani managlinkor yo; 

Mat 20:27 Tan siopaman a labay to'y onaan ed sikayo sikato naani aripen yo; 

Mat 20:28 Singa say Anak na too ya ag dia linma a panlinkoran, noag say manlinkor, tan iter to'y bilay to a panondon ed amayamay. 

Mat 20:29 Et sanen ompaway iran manlapu ed Jerico, dakerakel a katooan so tinmombok ed sikato. 

Mat 20:30 Tan nia, duara a bulag ya manyudyorong ira ed gilig na dalan, sanen nadngel da ya onlalabas si Jesus diman, inmakis ira, a kuan da, Katawan, kasian mo kami komon sika anak nen David. 

Mat 20:31 Et sikaray binano na dakel a katooan, pian ag ira komon oneseesel: balet sikaray lalon nanakis a kuan da, Katawan, kasian mo kami komon, sika anak nen David. 

Mat 20:32 Et si Jesus tinmonda, tan tinawag to ra, tan inkuan to, Antoy laba'yo ya gawaen ko'd sikayo? 

Mat 20:33 Kuan da ed sikato, Katawan, saray mata mi nalukasan komon. 

Mat 20:34 Et si Jesus, dia ed inpangabagey to, dinawi' to so saray kamataan da: et tampol ya inawat da so pakanengneng da, tan tinmombok ira ed sikato. 



Mat 21:1 Tan sanen akaasinger ira ed Jerusalem, tan akasabi ra ed Betfage, anga ed palandey na saray Oliva, saman la inbaki nen Jesus so duara a babangatan. 

Mat 21:2 A kuan to'd sikara, Onla kayo ed aldea ya wala'd naparong yo, et makaromog kayo naani a, tampol na sakey ya asna ya akasinnger, tan sakey a kilaw ya iba to: okbar yo 'ra tan yakar yo ra ed siak. 

Mat 21:3 Et no walay mangibaga na bengatla ed sikayo, ikuan yo, Say Katawan kaokolan to ra; et tampol ya payakad to ra. 

Mat 21:4 Bang saya agawa pian nasumpal so sinalita na profeta, ya kuan to, 

Mat 21:5 Ibaga yo ed anak a bii na Sion, Nia, say Arim onla ed sika, Maoyamo, tan mangabkabayo ed sakey'ya asna, Tan ed sakey a kilaw, ya anak na asna. 

Mat 21:6 Et saray babangatan linma ra, tan ginawa ra so onong na ingangan nen Jesus ed sikara, 

Mat 21:7 Tan inyakar da so asna, tan say kilaw, tan inyan da so saray kawes da ed tapew da, et sikato so imyorong ed tapew. 

Mat 21:8 Et say karakdaklan ed saray dakel a katooan inbilkag da 'ray kawes da ed dalan; tan saray arum nanpuputer iray sangasanga ed saray kiew, tan inbilkag da ra ed dalan. 

Mat 21:9 Tan saray dakel a katooan ya linma ed onaan to, tan saray manomtombok, inmakis ira, a kuan da, Hosanna ed anak nen David: Bendito so onla dia ed ngaran na Katawan; Hosanna ed sankatag'yan. 

Mat 21:10 Tan sanen akaloob ed Jerusalem, amin a ciudad agolo, a kuan da, Siopa ya? 

Mat 21:11 Et saray karaklan kuan da, Saya sikato'y profeta, si Jesus, a nanlapu ed Nazaret na Galilea. 

Mat 21:12 Et si Jesus linmoob ed templo na Dios, et pinapaway to so saray amin a nantatagilako tan nansasaliw dia ed templo, tan ingeba to so saray dulang na saray managsalat na pilak, tan saray yorongan na saray nagtagilako na malmalapati; 

Mat 21:13 Tan kuan to ed sikara, Walan nisulat, Say abung ko natawag naani abung na pikakasi: balet sikato'y gawaen yon sakey ya ongib na saray matakew. 

Mat 21:14 Tan saray bulag tan piley linma rad sikato ed templo, et pinaabig to ra. 

Mat 21:15 Balet sanen saray manonaan na saray sacerdotes tan saray escribas anengneng da so saray makapakelaw a bengabengatla a ginawa to, tan saray ugugaw ya maniingal dia ed templo tan kuan da, Hosanna ed anak nen David; asanokan ira, 

Mat 21:16 Tan inkuan dad sikato, Narengel mo no anto'y ibabaga na saraya? Et si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, On: ag yo tan balot abasa, Dia ed sangi na saray ugugaw tan saray mansoso niyadyarim so panangigalang? 

Mat 21:17 Tan tinainan to ra, tan pinmaway ed ciudad a linma ed Betania, et dinmawes diman. 

Mat 21:18 Tan dia ed kaimbuasan, nen ompawil ed ciudad, narasan. 

Mat 21:19 Et sanen nanengneng to so sakey a kiew ya higos, et gilig na dalan, linma ed sikato, et angapo so aromog tod'man, noag bolobolong labat; et kuan to ed sikato, Ag ka la manbunga manlapud natan anga ed anga. Et tampol say kiew ya higos amagaan. 

Mat 21:20 Et sanen sikato so anengneng na saray babangatan nankelaw ira, ya kuanda, Panoy inkamagaan a tampol na kiew ya higos? 

Mat 21:21 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, No wala so pananisia yo, tan agkayo manduarua, aliwa labat a gawaen yo naani so agawa ed kiew ya higos, noag ingen no kuan yo naani ed sayan palandey, Naaguat ka dia, tan onpelag ka ed dayat, sikatoy nagawa naani. 

Mat 21:22 Tan amin a bengabengatlan antokaman ya kerewen yo ed pikakasi, no manisia kayo, awaten yo. 

Mat 21:23 Et sanen akaloob ed templo, saray manonaan a sacerdotes tan saray mamasiken na baley linma ra ed sikato nen peles to a manbabangat, tan kuan da, Anton pakapanyari so pangagawam ed saraya a bengabengatla? tan siopa so angiter ed sika na sayan pakayari? 

Mat 21:24 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Siak ontepetak met ed sikayo na sakey a tepet, a sikato no ibaga yo ed siak ibagak met ed sikayo no anto a pakapanyari so pangagawak ed saraya a bengabengatla. 

Mat 21:25 Say binyag nen Juan ined so lapuan to? nanlapu ed tawen ono ed saray totoo? Et sikara inisisip da ed inkasikara, a kuan da, No ibaga tayo, ya, Nanlapu ed tawen; ikuan to ed sikatayo, Akin sirin a sikato'y ag yo sinisia? 

Mat 21:26 Balet no ikuan tayo, Nanlapu ed saray totoo; antakot itayo ed karaklan; ta amin bibidbiren da ya si Juan sakey a profeta. 

Mat 21:27 Et inebatan da si Jesus, a kuan da, Ag mi amta. Sikato kuan to met ed sikara, Ag ko met ibaga ed sikayo no anto'n pakayari so pangagawak ed saraya'n bengabengatla. 

Mat 21:28 Bangbalet, anto so isisip yo? Sakey a too wala'y duaran anak to'n lalaki; et sikato'y linma ed inmona, a kuan to, Anak, onla kan mankimey natan ed uvasan. 

Mat 21:29 Et sikato inmebat tan inkuan to, Ag ko; balet nagogunoyan nagbabawi, tan linma. 

Mat 21:30 Et linma ed komadua, tan oilman met so inbaga to. Et inmebat tan inkuan to, Siak onlaak, katawan: et ag linma. 

Mat 21:31 Siopa'd sikara'n dua kasi so angonor na linawa nen ama to? Sikara kuan da, Say inmona, Si Jesus kuan to'd sikara, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, ya saray publicanos tan saray balangkantis makaloob ira'n unona nen sikayo ed panaria'y Dios. 

Mat 21:32 Ta si Juan linma'd sikayo ed dalan na katunongan, et sikato'y ag yo sinisia: balet saray publicanos tan saray balangkantis anisia ra ed sikato: tan sikayo, sanen sikato'y anengneng yo ag kayo nagbabawi ed kayarito, pian manisia kayo ed sikato komon. 

Mat 21:33 Dengel yo'y sananey ya alimbawa: Wala nen saman so sakey a laki ya ama na sankabaley, ya nantanem na sakey ya uvasan, tan niliktob to na alar, tan angotkot na sakey ya alakan, tan angipaalagey na sakey ya ilang, tan sikatoy inted to ya inpaabang ed saray tumatalon, tan linma ed sananey a dalin. 

Mat 21:34 Tan sanen asinger la so panaon na saray bungabunga, inbaki to ray ariripen to ed saray tumatalon, ya mangawat na saray bungabunga to. 

Mat 21:35 Et saray tumatalon inala da ray ariripen to, tan pinekpek da so sakey, tan pinatey day sananey, tan tinopak day sananey. 

Mat 21:36 Sikato angibaki lamet na arum iran ariripen to ya dakdakel nen saray inmona: et onman met so ginawa ra'd sikara. 

Mat 21:37 Kaonoran balet inbaki to ed sikara so anak to'n laki, a kuan to, Derlengen da naani so ana' ko. 

Mat 21:38 Balet saray tumatalon, nen anengneng da so anak to, nagsi kuan ira ed sikara'n dili, Saya sikato'y mananawir; gali dia, ta sikato'y pateyen tayo, tan alaen tayo so tawir to. 

Mat 21:39 Et sikato'y inala ra tan inpaway da ed uvasan, tan sikato'y pinatey da. 

Mat 21:40 Sano onla sirin so katawan na uvasan, anto kasi gawaen to naani ed saray tumatalon? 

Mat 21:41 Sikara kuan da ed sikato, Pangaskasian a bagbagen to naani so saraman a totoo a makibot, tan ipaabang to naani so uvasan ed saray sananey a tumatalon, a sikara'y mangited naani ed sikato na bungabunga ed saray panaon da. 

Mat 21:42 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara Agyo ta ni abasa ed saray sulsulat, Say bato ya inbantak na saray manangipaalagey na abung, Sikato lanlamang so agawa ya olo na suyok; Saya nanlapu ed Katawan, Et sikato so makapakelaw ed saray mata tayo? 

Mat 21:43 Kanian kuan ko ed sikayo, Say panaria'y Dios naekal naani ed sikayo, tan niiter naani ed sakey a nacion ya mamapaway na saray bungabunga to. 

Mat 21:44 Et say napelag ed saya'n bato nagalpong a natiwaktiwak; balet say kapelagan to nia'n bato, sikato'y namekmek a singa dabok. 

Mat 21:45 Et sanen nadngel na saray manonaan a sacerdotes tan saray Fariseos so saray alimbawa to, atebek da ya sikara so sasalitaen to. 

Mat 21:46 Tan bangnen inaanap da so pangerel da'd sikato, tinmakot ira'd saray dakel a katooan, lapu'd sinisia ra a sikato'y sakey a profeta. 



Mat 22:1 Tan inmebat si Jesus tan akisalitaan to ra lamet ed saray alalimbawa, a kuan to, 

Mat 22:2 Say panaria'y tawen miolibay ed sakey ya ari, ya nangawa'y sakey a liket ed pankasal na anak ton laki, 

Mat 22:3 Et inbaki to ray ariripen to ya manawag ed saray binagaan a mibansal et ag da ginabay so dinmagup. 

Mat 22:4 Sikato'y angibaki lamet na sananey ya ariripen to, a kuan to, Ibaga yo ed saray binagaan, Nia, inparaan ko lay pagak; saray vacak tan saray pinatabak pinatey la ra, tan saray ganagana akaparaan la ra: gali la ed bansal. 

Mat 22:5 Balet saray binagaan ag da inngalngalep, tan iman lara, say sakey linma ed uma to, say sakey ed saray anapan to: 

Mat 22:6 Tan saray arum inerel da so saray ariripen to, et nantamian da ra na makapabaing, tan pinatey da ra. 

Mat 22:7 Sa balet so ari apasnokan; et inbaki to ray inayuraan to, tan binagbag to ray amatey, tan inulam to so ciudad da. 

Mat 22:8 Insan to inbaga ed saray ariripen to, Say bansal akaparaan, balet ta saray binagaan ag ira onkana. 

Mat 22:9 Onla kayo sirin ed saray pansasangaay daladalan, et amiamin ya naromog yo itagar yo ra ed bansal. 

Mat 22:10 Et saraman ya ariripen pinmaway ira ed saray daladalan, tan tinipon dan ami-amin so aromog da, nanpadpara mauges man tan maong: et say bansal napno'y sankaili. 

Mat 22:11 Balet sanen linmoob so ari ya onnengneng ed saray sankaili, anengneng to'd man so sakey a toon agangisolong na kawes na mibansal: 

Mat 22:12 Et kuan na ari ed sikato, Kaaro, panon so inyakar mo dia et ag ka nansolong na kawes na mibansal? Et sikato so ag akaskasel. 

Mat 22:13 Say ari ed satan inkuan to ed saray ariripen to, Balor yo ray lima tan sali to, tan ibantak yo ed kabilungtan na paway; sikato naani paningel tan panngalatenget na ngipengipen. 

Mat 22:14 Ta amayamay so saray natawag, daiset balet so napili. 

Mat 22:15 Saman la linma so saray Fariseos, tan nansisingbat ira no panon so pakaparel da ed sikato'd salita to. 

Mat 22:16 Et inbaki ra ed sikato ray babangatan da, pati saray Herodianos, a kuan da, Managbangat, amta mi ya sika matua ka, tan ibangat mon dalan na Dios ed katuaan, tan ag ka napagaan ed siopaman! ta sika ag mo nengnengey inkatoo na saray totoo. 

Mat 22:17 Ibagam pa sirin ed sikami, Anto so isisip mo? Onkatonongan kasi panangiter na bwis ed kinen Cesar, ono andi? 

Mat 22:18 Si Jesus balet atebek toy karelmengan da, et inkuan to, Akin et subsuboken yo ak, sikayo mansimpisimpitan? 

Mat 22:19 Ipanengneng yod siak so pilak na buis. Et angyakar ira ed sikato'y sakey a denario. 

Mat 22:20 Et kuan to ed sikara, Siopay akanlupa tan akansulat ed saya? 

Mat 22:21 Kuan da ed sikato, Si Cesar. Kuan to sirin ed sikara, Bayaran yo sirin ed Cesar so kien nen Cesar; tan ed Dios so kien na Dios. 

Mat 22:22 Et sanen sikato'y nadngel da, nankelkelaw ira, et sikato'y tinainanda, tan linma la ra. 

Mat 22:23 Dia'd saman ya agew linma so saray Saduceos ed sikato, sarama'y mankuan ya angapo so kioli ed bilay: et tinepet da ed sikato, 

Mat 22:24 A kuan da, Managbangat, si Moises inkuan to, No say sakey a laki ompatey ya angapo ray anak to, say agi ton laki asawaen to naani man so asawa to, tan ibangonan to so agi to na poli. 

Mat 22:25 Natan walara ed sikami so pitoran sanaagi a lalaki: et say pangoloan angasawa et inatey, et lapud angapo so ilalak to intilak ton asawa to ed agi ton laki; 

Mat 22:26 Ontan met ed komadua, tan komatlo, anga ed komapito. 

Mat 22:27 Tan kayari ran amin inatey so bii. 

Mat 22:28 Dia ed kioli ed bilay siopa sirin ed saraman a pitora so makan asawa ed sikato? ta sikato'y inasawaran amin. 

Mat 22:29 Si Jesus balet inmebat tan inkuan to d sikara, Nalilingo kayo, lapu'd ag yo amta so saray sulsulat, tan say pakapanyari' Dios. 

Mat 22:30 Ta diad kioli ed bilay ag la 'ra naani mangasawa ono miasawa, noag say singara angeles ed tawen. 

Mat 22:31 Et no nipaakar ed kioli ed bilay na saray inatey, agyo ta abasa so sinalita na Dios ed sikayo, a kuan to, 

Mat 22:32 Siak so Dios nen Abraham, tan Dios nen Isaac, tan Dios nen Jacob? Say Dios aliwan Dios na saray inaatey, noag saray mabilay. 

Mat 22:33 Et sanen sikato so nadngel na saray dakel a katooan, atalagnaw ira ed banga'to. 

Mat 22:34 Balet saray Fariseos, sanen nadngelan da a si Jesus ag to pinaesel iray Saduceos, nandaragup ira a nantitipon. 

Mat 22:35 Tan say sakey ed sikaran manangipaliwaway katunongan, tinepetan to na sakey a tepet, ya totoksoen to: 

Mat 22:36 Managbangat, dinan so baleg a gangan ed katunongan? 

Mat 22:37 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Aroen mo so Katawan a Dios mo ed masimoon a pusom, tan dia ed masimoon a kamarerwam, tan dia ed masimoon ya nonot mo. 

Mat 22:38 Sikato ya so baleg tan unona'n gangan. 

Mat 22:39 Tan say komadua a mipadpara ed sikato saya, Aroen mo so kaparam a too ooong ed sikan dili. 

Mat 22:40 Dia ed sarayan duaran gangan so pansaksabitan na amin a katunongan tan say salita na saray profetas. 

Mat 22:41 Bang nen saray Fariseos wala ran asimsimpok, tinepetan ira nen Jesus na sakey a tepet, 

Mat 22:42 A kuan to, Antoy isisip yo ed Cristo? siopa so makan-anak ed sikato? Sikara kuan da ed sikato, Anak nen David.

Mat 22:43 Kuan to ed sikara, Panon sirin nen David dia ed Espiritu a sikato'y tawagen to na Katawan, a kuan to, 

Mat 22:44 Say Katawan inkuan to ed Katawan ko, Onyorong ka ed nikawanan a limak; Anga ed pakapangyan ko ed saray kakabosol mo ya totoonan na saray salisalim? 

Mat 22:45 No si David sirin sikato so tawagen to'y Katawan, panon a sikato so anak to? 

Mat 22:46 Et angapoy siopaman ya akayarin inmebat ed sikato na sakey a salita, tan angapo la so akat'pel ya nantepettepet ed sikato a nanlapu lad saman ya agew. 



Mat 23:1 Saman la nansalitay Jesus ed saray dakel a katooan tan saray babangatan to, 

Mat 23:2 A kuan to, Saray escribas tan saray Fariseos manyorong ira ed yorongan nen Moises: 

Mat 23:3 Amin a bengabengatla sirin ya antokaman ya ibaga ra naani ed sikayo, gawaen yo tan imanoen yo: ingen ag kayo mangaw na onong ed saray gawa ra; ta ibaga ra, et ag da gawaen. 

Mat 23:4 On, sikara mamerber ira na ambebelat ya awiawit tan makapairap ya awiten, tan sikara'y ipasakbat da ed abala na saray to too; balet sikara lanlamang ag da ra labay a galawen ed tamoro ra. 

Mat 23:5 Balet saray amin a gawa ra gawaen da pian nanengneng ira na totoo: ta gawaen da'n malapar 'ray filacterias da, tan idukey da ray lagaylay na saray kawes da. 

Mat 23:6 Tan kaliktan da'y pasen ya manona ed saray pandoroypo tan saray yorongan a manona ed saray sinagogas, 

Mat 23:7 Tan saray panaglugay ed saray plaza, tan tawagen ira na saray katooan na, Rabbi. 

Mat 23:8 Balet ag kayo komon patatawag na Rabbi: ta sakey so managbangat ed sikayo, et sikayo ya amin sanaagi kayo. 

Mat 23:9 Tan angapo'y tawagen yo na ama ed dalin: ta sakey so Ama yo, a sikato'y wala ed tawen. 

Mat 23:10 Tan ag kayo met patatawag na katawan: sakey so katawan yo a salanti si Cristo. 

Mat 23:11 Ingen saman so kabalbalgan ed sikayo sikato naani aripen yo. 

Mat 23:12 Tan siopaman a mangitanduro na inkasikato, napaabeba naani; et siopaman a mangipaabeba na inkasikato, nitanduro naani. 

Mat 23:13 Ingen kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta kapotan yo so panarian na tawen sumpa ed saray totoo; lapu'd ag kayo onloob lanlamang et ag yo met palooben so saray onloloob. 

Mat 23:14 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta buagen yo so saray abung na saray bibii'n balo, et pinagkabaraan yo'y mangawa kayo na andukey a pikakasi: lapu'd saya akoen yo naani babaleg a dusa. / 

Mat 23:15 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta liberen yo so dayat tan dalin a pangawa yo'y sakey ya patpatombok; et sano sikato so magmaliw ya ontan sikato so gawaen yo'n mamiddua ni ya anak na infierno nen say sikayo'n dili. 

Mat 23:16 Kasi kayo la, ya bubulag a manangibasbas, ya mankuan, Siopaman a mansamba naani lapu'd templo, angapo'y bengatla; ingen say siopaman a mansamba lapu'd balitok na templo, sikato'y makautang. 

Mat 23:17 Sikayo ya andikalakal tan bulag dinan ta so manonaan, say balitok ono say templo ya amasantos ed balitok? 

Mat 23:18 Tan, Siopaman ya mansamba naani lapu'd altar, angapo'y bengatla; ingen siopaman a mansamba la pu'd bagat ya wala ed tapew to, sikato'y makautang. 

Mat 23:19 Sikayo'n bubulag: dinan sc manonaan, say tokdol ono say altai ya mamasantos ed tokdol? 

Mat 23:20 Say mansamba sirin lapu'd al tar; mansamba lapu'd sikato, tai lapu'd saray amin a bengatla ya wal ed tapew to. 

Mat 23:21 Tan say mansamba lapu'd tern plo, masamba lapu'd sikato, tan la pu'd saman so manaayam diman. 

Mat 23:22 Tan say mansamba lapu'd ta wen, mansamba lapu'd trono na Dios tan lapu'd saman so manyoron diman. 

Mat 23:23 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas ta: Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! t manbayar kayo na kakaplo na yei babuena tan anis tan comino, bale pinaulian yo ya ag sinumpal so si ray ambelbelat a pamaakara'y kat nongan salanti, kaalasan, tan pi nangasi tan pananisia: balet saray komon so nepeg yo'n gawaen, tan z yo paulian iray arum ya ag gawaen. 

Mat 23:24 Sikayo'n bubulag a manangibasbas, a sapiten yo so ageyet, et bikleren yo so camello! 

Mat 23:25 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta urasan yo'y paway na vaso tan lipang, say dalem da balet napno na kasibaan tan inkalablabas. 

Mat 23:26 Sika Fariseo a bulag, urasan mo ni ya unonay dalem na vaso tan lipong, pian say paway to et nalinisan met. 

Mat 23:27 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta mipadpara kayo ed saray pinutin lobok, ya dia'd paway nengneng toy marakerakep, balet dia'd dalem napno pokepokel na saray totoo ya inaatey, tan amin a karutakan. 

Mat 23:28 Ontan yo met ya nengneng yo so matunong ed saray totoo, balet dia ed loob napno kayo na pansimpisimpitan tan kaugsan. 

Mat 23:29 Kasi kayo la, ya escribas tan Fariseos, a mansimpisimpitan! ta ipaalage'yo so saray lobok na saray profetas, tan parakepen yo so saray angiponponan ed saray matunong, 

Mat 23:30 Tan kuan yo, No komon ta wala kami la ed saray agew na saray ama mi, ag kami komon akapibiang ed sikara dia ed dala na saray profetas. 

Mat 23:31 Kanian tasian yo so inkasikayo, ya anak da kayo na saray amatey ed saray profetas. 

Mat 23:32 Panoan yo sirin so sukat na saray ama yo. 

Mat 23:33 Sikayo ya uleuleg, sikayo a poli na saray tadioko, panon so ibatic yo naani ed panangokom na infierno? 

Mat 23:34 Kanian, nia, ibakik ed sikayo ray profetas, tan mangakabat a totoo, tan escribas: arum ed sikara pateyen yo naani tan ipasak yo ed cruz; tan arum ed sikara bakbaken yo naani ed saray sinagogas yo, tan usilan yo ra manlapu ed sakey a ciudad anga ed sananey a ciudad: 

Mat 23:35 Pian dia'd sikayo onsabi so amin a dala na saray matonong ya naibung ed tapew na dalin, manlapu ed dala nen Abel ya matunong anga ed dala nen Zacarias ya anak nen Baraquias, a sikato so pinate'yo ed laet na santuario tan say altar. 

Mat 23:36 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Amin irayan bengatla onsabi naani ed sayan kapolian. 

Mat 23:37 O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ya mamatey ed saray profetas, tan tupaken to ray nibaki ed sikato! aminpigapigan nilabay ko komon ya tinipon ya inpandaragup iray anak mo, a singa sakey a nganak ya tiponen to 'ray siwsiw to ed silong na saray payak to, et ag mo nilabay! 

Mat 23:38 Nia, say abung yo natainan ed sikayo ya andi lugan. 

Mat 23:39 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, Ag yo ak la naani nanengneng a manlapu'd natan, anga ed pangikuan yo naani, Mapalar so onla dia ed ngaran na Katawan. 



Mat 24:1 Tan si Jesus pinmaway ed templo tan oonla la; et saray babangatan to dinmago ra ed sikato pian ipanengneng da'd sikato so saray palpaalagey na templo. 

Mat 24:2 Sikato balet inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, Ag yo nanengneng so sarayan amin a bengatla? tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Angapo naani so natilak dia ya sakey a bato ed tapew na sananey, ya ag ingen nageba. 

Mat 24:3 Et sanen imyorong ed palandey na saray Olivas, saray babangatan dinmago ra ed sikato ya maamot, a kuan da, Ibagam ed sikami, kapigan so kagawa na sarayan bengatla? tan anto kasi so tanda ed isabim tan say angaan na mundo? 

Mat 24:4 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, Manlikas kayo pian angapoy too a mangibalang ed sikayo. ya inala da ray panagsilewan da, tan linmara'n onabet ed novio. 

Mat 24:5 Ta dakel naani onla dia ed ngaran ko, ya kuan da, Siak si Cristo; et da kel naani ontombok ya nabalang. 

Mat 24:6 Tan makadngel kayo naani na saray bakal tan dalamurom na bakal; nengneng yo ta ag kayo komon nagolo: ta sarayan bengatla kaokolan ya napalabas; balet aliwa nin sika to'y angaan. 

Mat 24:7 Ta ontalindeg naani nacion sumpa ed nacion, tan panarian sumpa ed panarian; tan wala ra naani eraeras tan yegyeg ed nambabangil a pasen. 

Mat 24:8 Ingen saraya ya amin a bengabengatla sikara sa gapo na kairapan. 

Mat 24:9 Saman la yawat da kayo ed pakapasegsegang, tan pateyen da kayo naani: tan gulaen da kayo naani na saray amin a nacion nisengeg ed nga ran ko. 

Mat 24:10 Tan saman la dakel so nagapol, tan manaawatan naani sakey tan sakey. 

Mat 24:11 Tan amayamay iray tilatila'n profetas ya onalagey naani, tan ibalang da naani so saray amayamay. 

Mat 24:12 Tan lapu'd ondakel naani so kaugsan, say aro ray amayamay onbetel. 

Mat 24:13 Balet say misongdo ya anga ed kasampotan, sikato lamlamang so nilaban naani. 

Mat 24:14 Tan saya ya evangelio na pana rian nipulong naani ed sankamundoan ya onkanan pamintuaan ed saray amin a naciones; et saman la onsabi angaan. 

Mat 24:15 Sano nanengneng yo sirin so kadimlaan na kapalis, ya asalita nen prof eta Daniel, a manal-alagey ed santo a pasen (say manbasa, talosan to komon), 

Mat 24:16 Saman la saray wala ed Judeaonbatik ira komon ed saray palandey: 

Mat 24:17 Say wala ed toktok na abung ag onlasor komon ya mangala'd saray bengabengatlan wala ed abung to: 

Mat 24:18 Tan say wala ed uma ag komon ompawil a mangala na kawes to. 

Mat 24:19 Kasi la balet so saray mamalokon, tan saray manpapasoso ed ratan ya agew! 

Mat 24:20 Et mikasi kayo a say kababaiyik yo aliwa'n dia'd ambetel komon, tan aliwan dia'd sabaton: 

Mat 24:21 Ta wala naani baleg ya irap ed satan, ya angapo so ontan a nanlapu'd gapo na mundo ya anga ed na- tan, angapo, angapo la naani. 

Mat 24:22 Et no ag apatikeyan iratan ya agew, angapo komon naani laman ya nilaban: balet nisengeg ed saray pinili napatikeyan so saratan ya agew. 

Mat 24:23 Kanian no siopaman a too ikuan to naani ed sikayo, Nia, wadia si Cristo, ono, Dia; agyo sigsiaen. 

Mat 24:24 Ta onalagey naani so saray tila tila'n Cristo, tan tilatila'n profetas, tan mangipanengneng ira naani na ankabaleg a tanda tan makpakelaw, pian mangibalang ira, no nayari, pati saray pinili. 

Mat 24:25 Nia, inbagak ed sikayo'n inpasakbay. 

Mat 24:26 Kanian no ibaga ra naani ed sikayo, Nia, sikato'y wala ed kalawakan; ag kayo oonla: Nia, sikato so wala ed kaloolooban ya silir; ag yo sigsiaen. 

Mat 24:27 Ta onong a say kirmat ya ompaway ed bukig, et nanengneng ya an ga 'd sagud; ontan naani so isabi na Anak na too. 

Mat 24:28 Angan ined so kawalaan na bangkay, diman so pantitiponan na saray aguila. 

Mat 24:29 Et kapagdaka ed kayari kaira pan ed saratan ya agew, say banwa onbilunget naani, tan say bulan agto naani iter so sinag to, tan saray bibitewen napaptak ira naani a manlapu ed tawen, tan saray pakayari tawen nagalaw ira naani. 

Mat 24:30 Insan onpatnag so tanda na Anak na too ed tawen: et manermen naani ed satan so amin a polipoli na dalin, tan nanengneng da naani so Anak na too ya onsasabi ed tapew na lurelurem na tawen a napno'y pakayari tan baleg a gloria. 

Mat 24:31 Et ibaki to ra naani angeles to a pati baleg a tanol na trumpeta, et tiponen da ra naani pinili to a marilapu'd saray apatira'n dagem, mahlapu'd sakey a sambot na tawen anga ed sananey. 

Mat 24:32 Natan aralen yo ed kiew ya higos so alimbawa to: sano onlangwer la'y sanga to, tan mamapaway na bulobulong to ra, amtayo ya say tiagew asinger la; 

Mat 24:33 Ontan yo met, sano nanengneng yo so saraya'n amin a bengabengatla amtaen yo ya sikato'y asinger la, salanti, ed saray pinto. 

Mat 24:34 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Saya'n kapolian ag naani napaso anga ed kagawa na saraya'n bengatla. 

Mat 24:35 Say tawen tan dalin napaso ra naani, balet saray salitak ag ira na ani napaso. 

Mat 24:36 Balet satan ya agew tan horas angapo'y mikabat, angan saray ange les ed tawen, angan say Anak, noag say Ama lambengat. 

Mat 24:37 Tan unong ed saray agew nen Noe, ontan naani so isabi na Anak na too. 

Mat 24:38 Ta singa dia'd saraman ya agew ed arapen na delap nankakakan ira tan naninum ira, angaasawa ra tan akiaasawa ra anga'd agew ya inloob nen Noe ed biong, 

Mat 24:39 Tan ag da akabkabatan anga ed sinmabi' delap, et inyanor to ra ya amin; ontan naani so isabi Anak na too. 

Mat 24:40 Saman la walara naani duara'n lalaki ed uma; say sakey naala, et say sakey natilak: 

Mat 24:41 Wala ra naani duara'n bibii ya mangigiling ed gilingan, say sakey naala, et say sakey natilak. 

Mat 24:42 Manpuyat kayo sirin: ta ag yo amta no anto'n agew so isabi Katawan yo. 

Mat 24:43 Balet amtaen yo so saya, ya no say makan-abung akabatan to no an to'n horas ed panagbantay so isabi matakew, sikato komo'y nanpuyat, tan ag to komon inabuloyan ya nabungawan so abung to. 

Mat 24:44 Kanian manparaan kayo met komon: ta dia ed horas ya ag yo isisipen onsabi' Anak na too. 

Mat 24:45 Siopa sirin so matoor tan makabat ya aripen, a sikato'y inpasen na katawan to ya mangimaton ed sankaabongan to, a mangiter ed sika ra na tagano ed panaon a kinepegto? 

Mat 24:46 Mapalar so satan ya aripen, a si kato'y nasabian na katawan to ya onta'y gagawaen to. 

Mat 24:47 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, ya sika to'y ipasento'd amin a wala ed sikato. 

Mat 24:48 Balet no satan a mauges ya ari pen ikuan to naani ed puso to, Say katawan ko mabayag; 

Mat 24:49 Tan igapo to'n pekpeken iray ibiba to'n aripen, tan mikan tan miinum ed saray buanges; 

Mat 24:50 Say katawan na satan ya ari pen onsabi naani ed sakey ya agew ya ag to pantalaran, tan dia ed sa key horas ya ag to amta, 

Mat 24:51 Et sikato naani balsigen to'n palduaen tan ituro to'y betang to ed saray mansimpisimpitan: diman naa ni paningel tan panngalatenget na ngipengipen. 



Mat 25:1 Say panaria'y tawen niolibay si rin naani ed samplora'n mamarikit, 

Mat 25:2 Et limara ed sikara so maksay, tan limara so makalakal. 

Mat 25:3 Ta saray maksay, sanen inala ra so saray panagsilewan da, ag ira nanbalo'y larak ed sikara: 

Mat 25:4 Ingen saray makalakal angala ra'y larak ed saray vaso ra pati saray panagsilewan da. 

Mat 25:5 Natan leleg na novio ya atantan, nantumeg tan naupig ira'n amin. 

Mat 25:6 Balet dia ed pegley labi wala'y sakey ya akis a kuan to, Nia la, so novio! Paway kayo'n onabet ed sikayo. 

Mat 25:7 Dia'd saman la inmalagey ya amin iray mamarikit tan intadia ra so saray panagsilewan da. 

Mat 25:8 Et saray maksay inkuan da ed saray makalakal, Itdan yo kami pa'y larak yo; ta saray panag silewan mi nanaerap ira. 

Mat 25:9 Balet saray makalakal inmebat ira, a kuan da, Onpan angapo'y masarag naani ed sikami tan sikayo: onla kayo ingen ed saray manlalako, tan manaliw kayo'y onkana'd sikayo. 

Mat 25:10 Et leleg da'n linma'n manaliw, sinmabi so novio; et saraman so wala'n sipaparaan akiolop ira ed sikato ya linmoob ed bansal: tan say pinto akapotan. 

Mat 25:11 Kayari to sinmabi met so saray arum ya mamarikit, a kuan da, Katawan, Katawan, lukasan mo'd sikami. 

Mat 25:12 Sikato balet inmebat tan inkuan to, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Agta kayo kabat. 

Mat 25:13 Manpuyat kayo sirin, ta ag yo amta so agew ono horas. 

Mat 25:14 Ta nagawa naani a singa say sakey a too, sanen onla ed sananey a dalin, tinawag to ray ariripen to, tan inyawa'to'd sikara so saray kayarian to. 

Mat 25:15 Et inted to'y limara'n talento ed sakey, duaran talento ed sananeV, tan sakey a talento ed sakey; ed balang sakey unong ed nanbabangii a nasamel to; tan linma ed kurang to/ 

Mat 25:16 Tampol a samay angawat nallimara'n talento linma tan sikaray inyanap to et akatobo'y sananey a limara'n talento. I 

Mat 25:17 Ontan to met na samay angqwat na duara anobo na sananey a duaifa. 

Mat 25:18 Balet say angawat na sakey linma tan nankotkot ed dalin, et inyamo'to so pilak nen katawan to. 

Mat 25:19 Natan kayari andukey a panaon say katawan na saraman ya ariripen onsabi, tan mibilangan ed sikara. 

Mat 25:20 Et say angawat na limara'n talento dinmago tan angyakar na sananey a limara'n talento, a kuan to, Katawan, sika inyawat mo'd siak so limara'n talento: nia, anobo ak na sananey a limara'n talento. 

Mat 25:21 Say katawan to inkuan to'd sikato, Maabig a gawa, maong tan napanmatalkan ya aripen: sika apanmatalkan ka'd saray bengatla'n pigara, ipasentaka naanid saray amayamay a bengatla: onloob ka ed gayaga na katawan mo. 

Mat 25:22 Tan dinmago met so angawat na duaran talento tan kuan to, Katawan, sika inyawat mo'd siak so duara'n talento: nia, anobo ak na sananey a duara'n talento. 

Mat 25:23 Inkuan na katawan to ed sikato, Maabig a gawa, maong tan napanmatalkan ya aripen: sika apanmatalkan ka'd saray pigara a bengatla; ipasen taka ed saray amayamay a bengatla; onloob ka'd gayaga ns katawan mo. 

Mat 25:24 Tan saman met so angawat ns sakey a talento dinmago tan inkuar to, Katawan, kabkaba'taka ya toe ka'n anawet, a manani ka'd ag mc nantaneman, tan mantipon ka'd a mo nansiboan: 

Mat 25:25 Et tinmakot ak, linma ak tan in yamot ko so talento'm ed dalin; nia alaen mo so kayarian mo. 

Mat 25:26 Say katawan to balet inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikato, Sika marelmeng tan mangiras ya aripen, amtaVn ya mananiak ed ag ko nantaneman, tan mantiponak ed ag ko nansiboan ; 

Mat 25:27 Nepeg mo komon sirin ya inyan so pila'ko ed saray managsalat na pil k, et dia'd isabik awaten ko komon ya ompawil so kayarian ko'n pati tobo. 

Mat 25:28 Alaen yo sirin so talento ed sikato tan sikato'y ited yo ed saman so walaan na samploran talento. 

Mat 25:29 Ta dia ed balang sakey a walaan naitdan naani, et sikato so walaan naani na daakan: balet dia ed andian say wala ni ed sikato naekal naani. 

Mat 25:30 Et ibantak yo so andikakanaan ya aripen ed kabilungtan na paway: diman sikato naani so paningel tan panngalatenget na ngipengipen. 

Mat 25:31 Balet sano onsabi so Anak na too ed gloria to, tan kaolop to ray amin ya angeles saman la onyorong ed trono na gloria to: 

Mat 25:32 Tan natipon naani ed arap to so saray amin a nacion: tan panbibiiganen to ra naani sakey tan sakey, a singa say pastol ibiig to so saray kanding; 

Mat 25:33 Tan ipasen to 'ray carnero ed nikawanan a lima to, balet saray kanding ed nikawigi. 

Mat 25:34 Saman la say Ari ikuan to'd saray wala'd nikawanan a lima to, Galidia, sikayo bendito nen Amak, tawiren yo'y panarian ya inparaan ed sikayo a nanlapu ed inletneg na mundo: 

Mat 25:35 Ta narasan ak nen saman, et initdan yo ak na nakan; napgaanak nen saman, et initdan yo ak na inumen; sangkailiak nen saman, et pinarawes yo ak; 

Mat 25:36 Lakseb ak, et kinawesan yo ak; agmakayari ak, et dinalaw yo ak; nipangaw ak, et linma kayo ed siak. 

Mat 25:37 Saman la saray matunong onebat ira ed sikato, a kuan da, Katawan, kapigan so inpakanengneng mi'd sika a narasan, et pinakan mi ka? ono napgaan, tan initdan mi ka na inumen? 

Mat 25:38 Tan kapigan so inpakanengneng mi'd sika a sangkaili, et pinarawes mi ka? ono lakseb, et kinawesan mi ka? 

Mat 25:39 Tan kapigan so inpakanengneng mi'd sika ya agmakayari, ono dia ed pangawan, et linma kami ed sika? 

Mat 25:40 Et say Ari onebat naani tan kuan to ed sikara, Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Bangta sikato'y ginawa yo ed sakey ed saraya'n agik, angan saraya a kamelagan, sikato'y ginawa yo ed siak. 

Mat 25:41 Saman met la kuan to ed saray wala ed nikawigi'n lima, Arawi kayo ed siak, sikayo ya inayew, onla kayo ed andi angaan ya apuy a sikato so inparaan ed diablo tan saray angeles to. 

Mat 25:42 Ta narasan ak nensaman, et ag yo ak initdan na nakan; napgaan ak nensaman, et ag yoak initdan na inumen; 

Mat 25:43 Sankaili ak nensaman et ag yo ak pinarawes; lakseb ak, et ag yo ak kinawesan; ag makayari ak, tan wala nawesan; agmakayari ak, tan wala ak nensaman ed pangawan, et ag yo ak dinalaw. 

Mat 25:44 Saman la ra onebat met, a kuan da, Katawan, kapigan so inpakanengneng mi ed sika a narasan, ono napgaan, ono sangkaili, ono lakseb, ono agmakayari, ono wala ed pangawan, et ag mi ka nanlinkoran? 

Mat 25:45 Saman la onebat ed sikara, a kuanto, Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Bangta sikato so ag yo ginawa ed sakey ed saraya ya kamelagan ya agik sikato'y ag yo met ginawa ed siak. 

Mat 25:46 Et saraya onla ra naani ed dusa ya andi angaan: bang ira balet so matunong dia ed bilay ya andi angaan. 



Mat 26:1 Tan Agawa, sanen asumpal nen Jesus so saraya'n amin a salita, inkuan to'd saray babangatan to, 

Mat 26:2 Amta yo ya kalabas na duara'n agew onsabi so pasko, et say Anak na too niyawat pian ipasak ed cruz. 

Mat 26:3 Saman la nantitipon so saray manonaan a sacerdote, tan saray mamasiken na ombaley, dia ed palacio na katagtagyan a sacerdote a sikato'y tinawag na Caifas; 

Mat 26:4 Et nansisingbat ira pian komon nasiliban da ya alaen si Jesus, tan sikato'y pateyen da. 

Mat 26:5 Ingen inkuan da, Aliwa'n dia'd peles na fiesta, ta ompan nagawa'y sakey a golo ed saray ombaley. 

Mat 26:6 Natan sanen si Jesus wala ed Betania, dia ed abung nen Simon ya akating, 

Mat 26:7 Dinmago ed sikato'y sakey a biin sankaawito'y sakey a vaso ya alabastro a napno na sankablian ya unguento, et sikato'y inkalbo to ed olo to, nen akarongo ed pananganan. 

Mat 26:8 Balet nen sikato'y anengneng na saray babangatan, apasnokan ira, a kuan da, Et anto'n kanonotan so pandarakan ed saya? 

Mat 26:9 Ta saya ya unguento alako komon ed dakel a bili, tan initer ed saray duruka. 

Mat 26:10 Si Jesus balet ta atebek to, inkuan to'd sikara, Akin et gonigonen yo so bii? ta nangawa na maong a gawa ed siak.

Mat 26:11 Ta wala ed sikayo lawas so saray duruka; et andiak lawas ed sikayo. 

Mat 26:12 Ta dia'd inpangikalbo to'd sayan unguento ed laman ko, sikato'y ginawa to'n pangiparaan ed siak a nipaakar ed pangiponpon. 

Mat 26:13 Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, Angan ined so pangipulongan ed sayan evangelio, ed sankamundoan, satan so jginawa na sayan bii nasalsalita niet naani a pakanodnonotan ed sikatoy. 

Mat 26:14 Saman la say sakey ed saray labindua, a sikato so manngaran na Judas Iscariote, linma'd saray raanonaan a sacerdotes, 

Mat 26:15 Tan inkuan to, Anto'y laba'yo'n iter ed siak, et sikato naani yawat ko ed sikayo? Et sikato'y insimbangan da'y talomplo'n tapi na pilak. 

Mat 26:16 Et nanlapu'd saman a panaon nan-anap na maong a pangyawa' to'd sikato ed sikara. 

Mat 26:17 Bangnen unona ya agew na andilevadura a tinapay saray babangatan linma ra ed Jesus, a kuan da, Ined so labay mo'n pangitariaan mi panganan mo na pasko? 

Mat 26:18 Et inkuan to, Onla kayo ed ciudad ed ontan a too, tan kuan yo'd sikato, Say Managbangat kuan to, Sinmabi la so panaon ko; gawaen ko'y pasko ed abung mo a pati saray babangatan ko. 

Mat 26:19 Et saray babangatan ginawa ra'y unong na inbilin nen Jesus ed sikara; tan intaria ra so paseo. 

Mat 26:20 Bangnen ngarem la, imyorong ed pananganan a pati saray labindua'n babangatan; 

Mat 26:21 Et sanen mangakan ira, inkuan to, Tua kuan ko'd sikayo, ya sakey ed sikayo yawa' to ak naani. 

Mat 26:22 Et inmermen ira'n mapalalo tan ginapoan da so nankuan ed sikato a sakey sakey, Siak ta, Katawan? 

Mat 26:23 Tan sikato inmebat, tan inkuan to, Saman so angyan na lima to ya aki-okob ed siak ed lipong, sikato lailamang so mangyawat ed siak naani. 

Mat 26:24 Say Anak na too onla, unong na nisulat a nipaakar ed sikato: ingen kasi la so too ya lapu'd sikato niyawat so Anak na too! maong komon ed satan a too ya agla nianak. 

Mat 26:25 Tan si Judas, ya angyawat ed sikato, inmebat tan inkuan to, Siak ta, Managbangat? Kuan to'd sikato, Sika inbagam. 

Mat 26:26 Tan dia'd pangakan da, angala'y Jesus na tinapay, tan binendicionan to, tan sikato'y pinipisag to; tan inted to'd saray babangatan, inkuan to, Ala yo, kanen yo; saya sikato'y laman ko. 

Mat 26:27 Et angala na sakey a copa, tan angited na pisasalamat, tan inted to'd sikara, a kuan to, Oninum kayo ya amin ed saya; 

Mat 26:28 Ta sikato ya'y dalak ed sipan, a sikato'y naibong nipaakad ed amayamay a pangekal ed saray kasalanan. 

Mat 26:29 Balet kuan ko'd sikayo, Siak agak la oninum a manlapu'd natan ed saya'n bunga na uvas, anga ed saman ya agew sano sikato so inu menko lamet a pati sikayo dima'd panarian nen Amak. 

Mat 26:30 Et sanen acanta ray sakey ya himno, linma ra'd palandey na saray Olivas. 

Mat 26:31 Saman la kuan nen Jesus ed sikara, Amin yo nagolo kayo naani nisengeg ed siak ed saya a labi: ta wala'n nisulat, Sugatan ko so pastol naani, et saray ovejas a nanoolop nabuybuyak ira. 

Mat 26:32 Balet kayarik ya onoli ed bilay, onlaak naani ed onaan yo ed Galilea. 

Mat 26:33 Si Pedro balet inmebat, tan inkuanto ed sikato, No nagolo ra ya amin nisengeg ed sika, agak balot nagolo. 

Mat 26:34 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Tua kuan ko' ed sika, ya saya'n labi, no agni kinmokaok so lalong, iburi moak a mamitlo. 

Mat 26:35 Si Pedro kuan to'ed sikato, Angan ompatey ak a midamay ed sika, ag taka ni iburi, Ontan met so inkuan ya amin na saray babangatan. 

Mat 26:36 Saman la linma'y Jesus a pati sikara ed sakey a pasen ya inngaran na Getsemani et kuan to ed saray babangatan to, Yorong kayo dia, leleg ya onlaak diman tan manpikasiak. 

Mat 26:37 Et inala to'd sikato'y Pedro tan saray duara'n anak nen Zebedeo, et ginmapo'n nanermen tan naningel na baleg. 

Mat 26:38 Saman la kuan to'd sikara, Say kamarerwak maermen a toloy anga ed ipapatey: ontila'kayo dia, ta mipuyat kayo ed siak. 

Mat 26:39 Et sikato inmona'y daiset, tan indakmomo to'y lupa to, et nanpikasi, a kuan to, O Amak, no nayari, onlabas komon so saya'n copa ed siak: angaman ontan, aliwa'n unong ed kaliktan ko, ingen unong ed kaliktan mo. 

Mat 26:40 Tan linma ed saray babangatan to, et aromog to ra'n naugip; et inkuan to'd Pedro: panon, ag yo nayarian so mipuyat ed siak na sakey horas? 

Mat 26:41 Manpuyat tan manpikasi kayo, pian ag kayo onloob ed katotokso: say espiritu tua a sikato'y malikeliket, balet say laman makapoy. 

Mat 26:42 Linma lamet si Jesus ed koma dua, tan nanpikasi, a kuan to, O Amak, no saya ag nayari'n onlabas, liko'd no sikatoy inumen ko, say linawam so nagawa. 

Mat 26:43 Tan linma lamet et aromog to ra'n naugip, ta saray mata ra nensaman ambelat. 

Mat 26:44 Et tinainan to ra lamet, tan inmarawi, et nanpikasi ed komatlo, a kuan to lamet so saraman lanlamang a salita. 

Mat 26:45 Saman la linma ed saray babangatan, tan inkuan to'd sikara, Ugip kayo la natan, tan manpainawa kayo: nia say horas asinger la, tan say Anak na too niyawat ed limalima ray makasalanan. 

Mat 26:46 Bangon kayo, ta onla iti'la, nia, asinger la so mangyawat ed siak. 

Mat 26:47 Tan diad leleg a mansasalita, nia, si Judas, sakey ed saray labindua, sinmabi, tan akiolop ed sikato so dakel a totoo ya nankampilan tan akaawit na saray pekpek a nanlapu'd saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray mamasiken na ombaley. 

Mat 26:48 Bang say mangyawat ed sikato initdan to ra na sakey a tanda, a kuan to, Say angoban ko naani, sikato man: sikato so ala yo. 

Mat 26:49 Et tampol a linma ed Jesus, tan inkuan to, Nagalang ka, Managbangat; tan sikato'y inangoban to. 

Mat 26:50 Et si Jesus inkuan to'd sikato, Kaaro, gawam so satan ya inakaran mo dia. Saman la dinmago ra tan siningkat day Jesus, tan sikatoy inalara. 

Mat 26:51 Et nia, sakey ed saray kaolop nen Jesus inyuna'toy lima to, tan binago'to so kampilan to, et sinugatan to'y aripen na katagyan a sacerdote, tan atipaang so layag to. 

Mat 26:52 Saman la inkuan nen Jesus ed sikato, Ipawil mo so kampilan mo ed pasen to: ta saray amin a mangala na kampilan onpatey ira naani ed kampilan. 

Mat 26:53 Ono isipen mo ya ag ko nayarian a kerewen ed Amak, et sikatoy ibaki to ya angan natan ed siak so masolok a labindua'n legion na angeles? 

Mat 26:54 Panon balet so kasumpal na saray sulsulat, ya ontan so kaokolan a nagawa? 

Mat 26:55 Dia ed saman ya horas inkuan nen Jesus ed saray dakerakel a katooan, Pinmaway kayo a singa sumpa ed sakey a matakew ya nankar/ipilan tan akaawit na saray pekpety a mangerel ed siak? Nanyorangak /ya agew-agew ed templo a nanbabangat, et ag yo ak inala. 

Mat 26:56 Balet saya'n amin nagawa, pian saray sulsulat na saray profetas et nasumpal ira. Diad saman la a min iray babangatan sikato so tinainan da, tan binmatik ira. 

Mat 26:57 Et saray angerel ed Jesus sikato'y inyakar da ed Caifas a kaatageyan a sacerdote, a diman so atiptiponan na saray escribas tan saray mamasiken. 

Mat 26:58 Si Pedro balet tinmombok ed sikato ed arawi, anga ed olsoran na saban ya atagey a sacerdote, et akiyorong ed saray oficiales, pian nengnengen to'y kasumpalan. 

Mat 26:59 Natan saray manonaan ya sacerdote tan say amin a concilio nananap ira na tilatila a tasi sumpa ed Jesus, pian sikato so papatey da: 

Mat 26:60 Et ag ira akalmo, angan dakel iray linma a tilatila'n tasi. Balet nagogonoyan walaray duara'n linma, 

Mat 26:61 Tan inkuan da, Saya'n too inkuan to, Nayarian kon bagbagen so templo na Dios, tan sikato'y ipaalagey ko dia ed talo ra'n agew. 

Mat 26:62 Et say atagey a sacerdote inmalagey, tan inkuan to'd sikato, Angapo so yebat mo? anto ta so tasian na saraya sumpa ed sika? 

Mat 26:63 Si Jesus balet ag inmesel. Et say atagey a sacerdote inkuan to ed sikato, Ibilin ko'd sika lapu ed Dios a mabilay, ya ibagam ed sikami no sika kasi so Cristo, ya Anak na Dios. 

Mat 26:64 Kuan nen Jesus ed sikato, Sika inbagam la: angan ontan kuan ko'd sikayo, Manlapu ed natan anga ed arapen nanengneng yo naani so Anak na too ya manyudyorong ed nikawanan a lima na Pakayari, tan onla dia ed tapew na saray lurem na tawen. 

Mat 26:65 Saman la say atagey a sacerdote pinila'to so saray kawes to, a kuan to, Sikato'y nansalita na ayew: anto ni piankaokolan tayo ed saray tasi? nia, natan sikayo nadngel yo so ayew: 

Mat 26:66 Anto so isip yo? Sikara inmebat ira tan inkuan da, Sikato so makana ed ipapatey. 

Mat 26:67 Saman la nilupdaan da so lupa to, tan sikato'y tinampal da: et saray arum sikato'y kinabil da ed saray talog da, 

Mat 26:68 A kuan da, Iprofetam ed sikami, sika Cristo: siopa so angabil ed sika? 

Mat 26:69 Bang si Pedro manyudyorong nen samen ed paway na okoman; et sakey a bii ya aripen linma ed sikato, a kuan to, Sika met akiolopolop ka ed Jesus a taga Galilea. 

Mat 26:70 Balet sikato inburi to ed arap da ya amin, a kuan to, Ag ko amta toy ibabagam. 

Mat 26:71 Tan sanen pinmaway ed sasapatan sikato'y anengneng na sananey a bii'n aripen, et inkuan to ed saray wadman nensaman, Saya'n too met akiolop ed Jesus a Nazareno. 

Mat 26:72 Et inburi to lamet a tinekepan to'y samba, Ag ko kabat so satan a too. 

Mat 26:73 Tan kayari nagogonoyan saray manal-alagey ed asinger dinmago ra tan inkuan da ed Pedro, Dia ed tua sika sakey ka met ed sikara; ta say panagsalitam iparongtal to ka. 

Mat 26:74 Saman la ginapuan to so nanayew tan nansamba, Ag ko kabat so satan a too. Et tampol a kinmokaok so lalong. 

Mat 26:75 Et si Pedro anonotan to so salita ya inbaga nen Jesus, No agni onkokaok so lalong iburi mo ak a mamitlo. Et sikato so pinmaway, tan nannangis na sankapaitan. 



Mat 27:1 Bangnen kabuasan la, amin so saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray mamasiken na ombaley nansisingbat ira sumpa ed Jesus pian sikato'y pateyen da: 

Mat 27:2 Tan sikato'y binalor da, tan inyakar da, tan insaklang da ed Pilato ya gobernador. 

Mat 27:3 Saman la si Judas, ya angyayawat ed sikato, sanen anengneng to'n sikato'y nadusa, nagbabawi, tan inpawil to so saray talomplo'n apiger na pilak ed saray manonaan a sacerdote tan mamasiken, 

Mat 27:4 A kuan to, Nankasalanan ak ed inpangyawat ko na dala ya andi kasalanan. Balet inkuan da, Anto so wala ed satan ed sikami? sika'y akauley ed satan. 

Mat 27:5 Et inbasileng to so saray apiger na pilak ed santuario, tan tinmainan; tan inmarawi tan inbitay to'y laman to. 

Mat 27:6 Et saray manonaan a sacerdote inalara so saray apiger na pilak, tan inkuan da, aliwan katunongan a sikara'y yan ed panagisimpenan, lapu'd sikatoy bili na dala. 

Mat 27:7 Tan nansisingbat ira, tan sikara insaliw da'y uma na gumagaway banga, pian panponponan da'd saray sangkaili. 

Mat 27:8 Kanian saman ya uma inngaray, Say uma na dala, anga'd saya'n agew. 

Mat 27:9 Saman la asumpal so sinalita nen Jeremias a profeta, a kuan to, Et inalara so saray talomplo'n apiger na pilak, ya bili na binilian, a sikato so binilian na sakey ed saray anak na Israel; 

Mat 27:10 Tan sikara'y inter da nipaakar ed uma na gumagawa'y banga, onong na tinoro ed siak na Katawan. 

Mat 27:11 Natan nanalagey si Jesus ed arap na gobernador: et say gobernador tinepe'to'd sikato, a kuan to, Sika so Ari na sayay Judios? Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Sika kuan mo. ponja, et pinaesepan to'y tuka, tan sikato'y inyan to'd sakey a kawayan, tan inted to ed sikato ya ipainum. 

Mat 27:12 Tan sanen sikato'y indalem na saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray mamasiken, ag inmebat a balot. 

Mat 27:13 Saman la kua'nen Pilato ed sikato, Ag mo narengel no kaonongan karakel na bengabengatla'n itasi ra sumpa ed sika? 

Mat 27:14 Et sikato'y ag angited na ebat, ya angan sakey a salita: ed ontan la ya say gobernador nikelaway baleg. 

Mat 27:15 Bang dia ed fiesta naugalian na gobernador so mangibolos ed karaklan na sakey ya inpangaw, a samay labay da. 

Mat 27:16 Et wala met so sakey a bantog ya inpangaw a manngara'y Barrabas. 

Mat 27:17 Bang sirin nen atiptipon ira, inkua'nen Pilato ed sikara, Siopa so labay yo'n ibolos ko'd sikayo: Si Barrabas ono si Jesus ya tatawagen na Cristo? 

Mat 27:18 Ta amta to'n nisengeg ed siblet so inpangyawat da'd sikato. 

Mat 27:19 Et legan a manyodyorong ed panangokoman to, nanbaki ed sikato'y asawa to, a kuan to, Ag ka mibibiang ed satan so matunong a too; ta dakel a bengabengatla so niliknak ed sayan agew ed sakey a kugip nisengeg ed sikato. 

Mat 27:20 Bang saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray mamasiken inlagyat da so saray dakerakel a katooan ya si Barrabas so kerewen da, tan bagbagen da'y Jesus. 

Mat 27:21 Say gobernador balet inmebat tan inkuan to'd sikara, Dinan ed saraya'n dua so laba'yo ya ibolos ko ed sikayo? Et inkuan da, Si Barrabas. 

Mat 27:22 Kua'nen Pilato ed sikara, Anto sirin so gawaen ko ed Jesus a tatawagen na Cristo? Sikara ya amin kuan da, Sikato so nipasak komon ed cruz. 

Mat 27:23 Et inkuan to, Akin, anto a mauges so ginawa to? Balet ineyaeyag da a mapalalo, a kuan da, Sikato so nipasak komon ed cruz. 

Mat 27:24 Kanian sanen anengneng nen Pilato ya angapo so talonaan to, no ag ingen sakey a golo so onbabaleg, angala na danum, tan inorasan to so saray lima to ed arap na karaklan, a kuan to. Andi kasalanan ko ed dala na saya'n matunong a too: sikato so nengnengen yo komon. 

Mat 27:25 Et amin ya ombaley inmebat ira tan inkuan da, Say dala to ondetdet ed sikami, tan ed saray anak mi. 

Mat 27:26 Saman la inbolos to ed sikara si Barrabas: si Jesus balet binakbak to ta'n inyawa'to pian nipasak ed cruz. 

Mat 27:27 Saray sondalo na gobernador ed satan inloob da si Jesus ed palacio tan tinipon da ed sikato so amin ya olop. 

Mat 27:28 Et sikato'y nilakseban da tan inkolibenben da'd sikato so sakey a kolibenben ya ambalanga. 

Mat 27:29 Tan nanlaga ra'y sakey a balanget ya sabisabit tan sikato'y intoon da'd olo to, tan sakey a kawayan ed lima to a kawanan; tan tinmalimokor ira'd arap to, tan sikato'y niludlurey da, a kuan da, Nagalang ka, Ari na saray Judios! 

Mat 27:30 Tan sikato so nilupdaan da, tan inala ray kawayan tan inpekpek da'd olo to. 

Mat 27:31 Tan sanen aludlurey da la inekal da'd sikato'y kolibenben, et insolong da'd sikato'ra may kawes to, tan sikato'y inyakar da pian sikato'y ipasak ed cruz.
