Mat 27:32 Et nen akapaway ira arumog da'y sakey a too a taga Cirene, a manngara'y Simon; pinasoot da'n milad sikara pian awiten to so cruz to. 

Mat 27:33 Et sanen akasabi ra'd sakey a pasen a mangara'y Golgota, a kabaliksan toy Pasen na sakey a lapislapis, 

Mat 27:34 Sikato'y initdan day inumen ya alak ya nilaokan na apgo; et sanen sikato'y atawayan to, ag to ginabay ya ininum.

Mat 27:35 Et sanen sikato'y nipasak da ed cruz, nanaapagan da saray kawes to, ya nanpapalaran ira: 

Mat 27:36 Tan nanyorong ira tan sikato'y binantayan dad'man. 

Mat 27:37 Tan inpasen da ed tagtagey na olo to so angidaleman da'd sikato ya insulat na onia, SAYA SIKATO SI JESUS YA ARI NA SARAY JUDIOS. 

Mat 27:38 Dia ed saman inpasak da'd cruz ya indingan ed sikato so duara'n tulisan, sakey ed nikawanan a lima, et sakey ed nikawigi. 

Mat 27:39 Et saray linmalabas diman sikato'y minudmura ra a mameyengpeyeng ira. 

Mat 27:40 Tan kuan da, Sika ya bagbagen mo so templo, tan sikato'y ipaalagey mo ed talora'n agew, ilaban mo so laman mo'n dili: no sika so Anak na Dios, epas ka a manlapu ed cruz. 

Mat 27:41 Ontan met saray manunaan a sacerdote sikato so niludlurey da, pati saray escribas tan saray mamasiken, inkuan da, 

Mat 27:42 Inlaban to so saray arum; say inkasikato ag to nayarian ya ilaban. Sikato so Ari na Israel; onlasor komon natan a manlapu ed cruz, tan manisia kami naani ed sikato. 

Mat 27:43 Sikato manmatalek ed Dios; sikato'y ilaban to komon natan, no sikato'y pinabli to: ta sikato inkuan to, Siak so Anak na Dios. 

Mat 27:44 Tan saray tulisan met ya nidingan ed sikato ya nipasak ed cruz inturing da'd sikato so saraman met a panbalaw. 

Mat 27:45 Natan nanlapu ed komanem ya horas wala'y bilunget ed tapew na amin a dalin anga ed komasiam ya horas. 

Mat 27:46 Et nen asinger la'y komasian ya horas, inmakis si Jesus na maksil a voces, akuan to, Eli, Eli, lama sabactani? salanti, Dios ko, Dios ko, akin et inkaindan mo ak? 

Mat 27:47 Et arum ed saray wadman, nen sikato so nadngel da; inkuan da, Saya'n too tatawagen to si Elias. 

Mat 27:48 Et tampol a binmatik so sakey ed sikara, tan angala'y sakey ya esponja, et pinaesepan to'y tuka, tan sikato'y inyan to'd sakey a kawayan, tan inted to ed sikato ya ipainum. 

Mat 27:49 Et saray arum inkuan da, Paulian mo; nengnengen tayo no onla dia kasi Elias a mangilaban ed sikato. 

Mat 27:50 Et si Jesus inmakis lamet na maksil a voces tan inderew to'y espiritu to. 

Mat 27:51 Tan nia, say sakbong na templo apilat ya nankadua manlapu'd tagey anga ed leksab; tan say dalin yinmegyeg; tan saray batobato apisagpisag ira; 

Mat 27:52 Tan saray lobok alukasan ira; et amayamay a laman na saray sasantos ya akaugip binmangon ira; 

Mat 27:53 Et dia ed inpaway da a nanlapu'd lobok ed kayari inkioli to linmoob ira ed masanto'n ciudad tan pinmatnag ira ed saray amayamay. 

Mat 27:54 Bang say centurion, tan saray ibiba to a manbabantay ed Jesus, sanen anengneng da so yegyeg, tan saray bengabengatla ya agawa, tinmakot iran mapalalo, ,a kuan da, Petepeteg a saya sikato so Anak na Dios. 

Mat 27:55 Et walarad'man so amayamay a bibii ya maniimaton ed arawi, ya tinmombok ira'd Jesus a nanlapud Galilea, ya nanlilinkor ira ed sikato: 

Mat 27:56 Arum ed sikara wadman di Maria Magdalena, tan Maria ya ina nen Santiago tan Jose, tan say ina na saray anak nen Zebedeo. 

Mat 27:57 Et nen asabi ngarem, sinmabi' sakey a too'n mayaman a nanlapu ed Arimatea, a manngaran na Jose, a babangatan met nen Jesus nen saman: 

Mat 27:58 Saya'n too linma'd Pilato, tan kinerew to so laman nen Jesus. Dia ed saman si Pilato ingangan to a sikato'y niiter.

Mat 27:59 Et si Jose inala to so laman, tan sikato so binalko'to ed sakey a malinis ya abel a lienzo. 

Mat 27:60 Tan sikato so inyan to ed balo'n lobok to ya dili, ya inungiban to'd bato, tan angitulin na sakey a baleg a bato ed wangalan na lobok, tan iman la. 

Mat 27:61 Et si Maria Magdalena wadman, tan say sananey a Maria, a manyodyorong ira ed arapan na lobok. 

Mat 27:62 Bang dia'd kaimbwasan, a sikato so agew ed kayari Panagparaan, saray manunaan a sacerdote tan saray Fariseos nantitipon ira ed Pilato. 

Mat 27:63 A kuan da, Katawan, anonotan mi ya saman so manamalingo inkuan to, nen mabilay ni, Kayari talo ra'n agew onoli ak ed bilay lanlamang. 

Mat 27:64 Igangan mo sirin ya say lobok napaletan komon anga ed komatlo'n agew, agla piga no saray babangatan to onla ra tan sikato'y takewen da, tan kuan da'd saray ombaley, Sikato so inmoli ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inaatey: et say kaonoran ya lingo maug-uges naani nen say akaona. 

Mat 27:65 Si Pilato inkuan to'd sikara, Wala so panbantayen yo: onla kayo la, sikato so gawaen yo a malet onong na nayarian yo. 

Mat 27:66 Kanian linma ra, tan pinaletan da so lobok, a tinatakan da so bato, ya ibara so saray bantay. 



Mat 28:1 Bang nen mansumpa'lay agew a sabaton, nen manbalatabat so onona'n agew na simba, linma'y Maria Magdalena tan say sananey a Maria pian nengnengen da so lobok. 

Mat 28:2 Et nia, wala nensaman so yegyeg a baleg; ta sakey ya angel na Katawan linmeksab a nanlapu'd tawen, tan linma tan intolin to so bato, tan imyorong ed tapew to. 

Mat 28:3 Say nengneng to singa sakey a kidmat, tan say kawes to ampoti'n singa nieve: 

Mat 28:4 Et dia'd takot da sikato ginmiwgiw so saray manbabantay, tan agawa ra a singa totoo'n inatey. 

Mat 28:5 Et say angel inmebat tan inkuan to'd saray bibii, Ag kayo antakot: ta amtak ya anapen yo si Jesus, a sikato'y inpasak ed cruz. 

Mat 28:6 Sikato'y andi dia; ta inmoli'd silay, onong na inkuan to. Gali dia, nengneng yo'y pasen ya anginan ed Katawan. 

Mat 28:7 Et onla kayo a maganat, tan ibaga yo ed saray binangatan to, Sikato so inmoli ed bilay a nanlapu'd saray inaatey; tan nia, sikato onla'd Galilea ed onaan yo, diman sikato'y nanengnengyo: nia, inbagak la'd sikayo. 

Mat 28:8 Et nanpikal ira'n maganat a nanlapu'd lobok a napno'y takot tan gayaga, tan binmatik ira a mangyakar na balita ed saray binangatan to. 

Mat 28:9 Et nia, si Jesus inabet to ra, a kuan to, Nagalang kayo. Et inmasinger ira tan inegnaan da so saray salito, tan sikato'y ingalgalangda. 

Mat 28:10 Saman la kua'nen Jesus ed sikara, Ag kayo antakot: onla kayo'n mangibaga ed saray agagik ya onpikal ira'n onla ed Galilea, et nanengneng da ak diman. 

Mat 28:11 Natan leleg da'n oonla, nia, arum ed saray bantay linma ra'd ciudad, et inbaga ra ed saray manunaan ya sacerdote so amin a bengatla'n agawa. 

Mat 28:12 Et sanen nandaragup ira'n pati saray mamasiken, tan akapansisingbat ira, angited ira'y dakel a pilak ed saray sondalo. 

Mat 28:13 A kuan da, Kuan yo, Saray binangatan to linma ra ed labi, tan sikato so tinakew da nen peles mi'n naugip. 

Mat 28:14 Et no saya onsabi ed layag na gobernador, sikato naani so tangoyoren mi, tan yagel mi kayo ed kapagaan. 

Mat 28:15 Kanian saray sondalo inala ra so pilak, tan ginawa ra so onong na nibangat ed sikara: et sayan salita nikayat ed saray Judios, tan siansia ni anga ed saya ya agew. 

Mat 28:16 Balet saray labinsakey a binangatan linmara'd Galilea, anga ed palandey ya intoro nen Jesus ed sikara. 

Mat 28:17 Et sanen sikato so anengneng da, sikato'y ingalgalang da: balet saray arum nanduarua ra. 

Mat 28:18 Et si Jesus linma ed sikara tan akisalita ed sikara, a kuan to, Amin a pakauley niiter ed siak ed tawen tan dia ed dalin. 

Mat 28:19 Onla kayo sirin, tan mangawa kayo na saray babangatan ed amin a naciones, ya binyagan yo ra ed ngara'y Ama, tan say Anak, tan say Espiritu Santo: 

Mat 28:20 Ya ibangat yo ra'n mangonor na amin a bengabengatla ya ingangan ko ed sikayo: tan nia, walaak a naynay ed sikayo, ya anga ed kasampotan na mundo. 

PANGASINENSE JOHN


Joh 1:1 Dia ed gapo wala la so Verbo, tan say Verbo wala ed Dios, tan say Verbo sikato so Dios. 

Joh 1:2 Sikato lanlamang walala ed Dios dia ed gapo. 

Joh 1:3 Amin a bengabengatla agawara ed panamegley to; et no sikato so andi angapo'y anto kaman ya agawa ed saray agawa 

Joh 1:4 Dia ed sikato so kawalaan nen saman na bilay; et say bilay sikato so silew na saray totoo. 

Joh 1:5 Et say silew onsinag ed kabilungtan; et sikato'y ag atalosan na kabilungtan. 

Joh 1:6 Sinmabi sakey a laki, ya inbaki' Dios, a say ngaran to Juan. 

Joh 1:7 Sikato lanlamang linma dia a panagka tasi, pian makapan tasi ed silew, pian amin manisia komon lapu'd sikato. 

Joh 1:8 Aliwa a sikato so silew, noag say linma dia pian makapan tasi ed silew. 

Joh 1:9 Wala nen saman so tua ya silew, salanti silew a sikato so manilew na balang sakey a totoo ya onloloob ed mundo. 

Joh 1:10 Sikato so wala nen saman ed mundo, tan say mundo agawa ed panamegley to et sikato so ag kinabat na mundo. 

Joh 1:11 Sikato linma dia ed saray kayarian to, et saray kayarian to nen saman sikato so ag da inawat. 

Joh 1:12 Balet amiamin ya angawat ed sikato, inter to'd sikara so pankatonongan a magmaliw ya anak na Dios, salanti saray manisia ed ngaran to: 

Joh 1:13 A nianak ira, aliwa a dia'd dala ni say dia'd linawa na laman, ni say diad linawa na laki noag ingen dia ed Dios. 

Joh 1:14 Et say Verbo nagmaliw a laman, tan akipan-ayam ed sikatayo (ed anengneng mi so gloria to, singa gloria na bogbogtong a nanlapu ed Ama), ya napno na gracia tan katuaan. 

Joh 1:15 Sikato so tasian nen Juan, tan man-akis, a kuanto, Sikatoya'man so inkuan ko, Say mantombok ed siak nagmaliw ya onaan nen siak; ta sikato nen saman so onaan nen siak. 

Joh 1:16 Ta dia ed inkapno to angawat itayo ya amin, tan say gracia dia met ed gracia. 

Joh 1:17 Ta say gangan niiter ed panamegley nen Moises;say gracia tan katuaan dinmateng ed panamegley nen Jesu-Cristo.

Joh 1:18 Angapo so too ya akanengneng ed Dios angan kapigan; say Bogbogtong ya Anak, ya wala ed akwalan na Ama, sikato so angipaliwawa ed sikato. 

Joh 1:19 Et sikatoya so pantasi nen Juan, sanen saray Judios angibaki ra ed sikato na saray sacerdote tan Levitas nanlapu ed Jerusalem ya manepet ed sikato, Siopa ka? 

Joh 1:20 Et inpatua to, tan ag nanburi; et inpatua to, Aliwa a siak si Cristo. 

Joh 1:21 Et tinepet da ed sikato, Anto sirin? Sika si Elias? Et kuan to, Aliwa a siak. Sika so profeta? Et inmebat, Andi. 

Joh 1:22 Kanian inkuanda ed sikato, Siopa ka? pian niiter mi ebat ed saray angibaki ed sikami. Anto'y kuan mo nipaakar ed inkasika? 

Joh 1:23 Inkuan to, Siak so voces na sakey a maningal ed kalawakan, Petekenyo so dalan na Katawan, singa inkuan nen Isaias a profeta. 

Joh 1:24 Et sikara no inbaki na saray Fariseos. 

Joh 1:25 Et tinepet da ed sikato, tan inkuan da ed sikato, Akin sirin et maminyag ka, no aliwa'n sika si Cristo, ni si Elias, ni say profeta? 

Joh 1:26 Inmebat si Juan ed sikara, a kuanto, Siak maminyagak ed danum: dia ed pegley yo manal-alagey so sakey ya sikato so agyo kabat, 

Joh 1:27 Salanti say mantombok ed siak, a say singer na sapinto agak makana a mangokbar. 

Joh 1:28 Sarayan bengabengatla agawa ed Betania ed labas na Jordan, a diman mamibinyag si Juan. 

Joh 1:29 Dia'd kaimbuasan nanengneng nen Juan si Jesus a yala ed sikato, et kuan to, Nia, so Cordero'y Dios, ya mangekal na kasalana'y mundo! 

Joh 1:30 Sikato ya man so inkuan ko ed sikayo, Mantombok ed siak so sakey a laki'n magmaliw ya onaan nen siak: ta sikato nen saman so onaanla nen siak. 

Joh 1:31 Et sikato'y ag ko wari a kabat; balet pian sikato'y nipatnag ed Israel, nisengeg ed saya linma ak dia a maminyag ed danum. 

Joh 1:32 Et si Juan angiter na pantasi, a kuan to, Anengneng ko so Espiritu ya onleleksab a singa malapati a nanlapu ed tawen; et pinmetek ed olo to. 

Joh 1:33 Et sikato so ag ko wari a kabat: balet say angibaki ed siak a maminyag ed danum, inkuan to ed siak, Dia ed tapew na siopaman a pakanengnengen mo na Espiritu ya onleksab, tan ompetek ed olo, to sikato lanlamang so maminyag ed Espiritu Santo. 

Joh 1:34 Et anengneng ko, tan angiterak na pantasi a saya sikato so Anak na Dios. 

Joh 1:35 Dia ed kaimbuasan lamet si Juan manal-alagey, tan duara ed saray babangatan to; 

Joh 1:36 Et ninengneng to si Jesus nen manaakar, tan kuan to, Nia, so Cordero na Dios! 

Joh 1:37 Et saray duaran babangatan sikato'y nadngel da'n nansalita, et tinmombok ira ed Jesus. 

Joh 1:38 Et si Jesus linmingay, tan ninengneng to ra ya ontotombok, kuanto ed sikara, Anto so anapen yo? Et inkuan da ed sikato, Rabbi (a kabaliksan to, no ipatalos, Managbangat), iner so panaayaman mo? 

Joh 1:39 Sikato kuan to ed sikara, Galidia, et nanengneng yo. Kanian linmara et anengneng da so nan-ayaman to; et akipanayam ira ed saman ya agew: asinger la a komaplo so horas. 

Joh 1:40 Sakey ed saray duara ya akadngel ed Juan a nansalita, tan tinmombok ed sikato, si Andres, agi nen Simon Pedro. 

Joh 1:41 Sikato naromog to'n onona si agi to lanlamang a Simon, tan kuanto ed sikato, Aromog mi Mesias (a kabaliksan to, no ipatalos, Cristo). 

Joh 1:42 Sikato so inyakar to ed Jesus. Si Jesus tinmangwa ed sikato, tan inkuan to, Sika si Simon ya anak nen Jonas: ingaran ka naani Cefas (a no ipatalos, Pedro). 

Joh 1:43 Dia ed kaimbuasan ninono' to so onla ed Galilea, et naromog to si Felipe: et kuan nen Jesus et sikato, Tombok mo ak. 

Joh 1:44 Bang si Felipe taga Betsaida, et ciudad nen Andres tan Pedro. 

Joh 1:45 Si Felipe naromog to si Natanael, et kuan to ed sikato, sikato so Aromog mi a si Moises dia ed gangan, tan saray profetas, insulat da, si Jesus a taga Nazaret, ya anak nen Jose. 

Joh 1:46 Et si Natanael inkuan to ed sikato, Nayari ta'd antokaman a maong so ompaway ed Nazaret? Si Felipe kuan to ed sikato, Gala ta nengneng mo. 

Joh 1:47 Si Jesus anengneng to si Natanael ya oonla ed sikato, et kuan to nipaakar ed sikato, Nia, so sakey a peteg ya Israelita, a dia ed sikato angapo so panamalingo! 

Joh 1:48 Si Natanael kuan to ed sikato, Kapigan so inpakapikabat mo ed siak? Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Sanen ag to ka ni tinawag nen Felipe, sanen wala ka ed silong na kiew ya higos, anengneng taka. 

Joh 1:49 Inmebat si Natanael ed sikato, Rabbi, sika so Anak na Dios; sika so Ari na Israel. 

Joh 1:50 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Lapu ed inkuan ko ed sika, anengneng taka ed silong na kiew ya higos, manisia ka? makanengneng ka na ankakabaleg a bengatla nen saraya. 

Joh 1:51 Et kuan to ed sikato, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Nanengneng yo so tawen ya akalukas, tan saray angeles na Dios ya onsesegep tan onlalasor ed Anak na too. 



Joh 2:1 Et nen komatlo'n agew wala so sakey a bansal ed Cana na Galilea; et say ina nen Jesus wadman: 

Joh 2:2 Et si Jesus abagaan met, tan saray babangatan to, ed bansal. 

Joh 2:3 Et sanen kinmulang so alak, say ina nen Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Angapo'y alak da. 

Joh 2:4 Et si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Bii, Anto'y pibibiangan ko ed sika? say horas ko ag ni sinmabi. 

Joh 2:5 Si ina to kuan to ed saray mansisirve, Angan anto a kuan to ed sikayo gawa yo. 

Joh 2:6 Et wala so anem ina'n pasig a bato ya akapasen diman onong na ugali a panaggogol na saray Judios, a maniyan na duara ono talora a boyog a danum so balang sakey. 

Joh 2:7 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Panoyo so saray pasig na danum. Et pinano da ra anga ed sangab. 

Joh 2:8 Et kuan to ed sikara, Ala en yo natan, tan yakar yo ed manangoksoy na bansal. Et inyakar da. 

Joh 2:9 Et nen say manangoksoy na bansal tinawayan to so danum a nagmaliw ya alak, tan agto amta no iner so lapuan to (balet saray managsirve ya angyakar na danum amtara), say manangoksoy tinawag to so novio, 

Joh 2:10 Tan kuan to ed sikato, Balang too iparongo to ya onona so maong ya alak; et sano saray totoo akainum ira la a maong, insan say makapuy: sika inyatol mo so maong ya alak angar natan. 

Joh 2:11 Sayan gapo na saray tanda to ginawa nen Jesus dia ed Cana na Galilea, tan inpatnag to so gloria to; et saray babangatan to anisia ra ed sikato. 

Joh 2:12 Kayari saya linmasor ed Capernaum, sikato, tan si ina to, tan sa-ray agagi to, tan saray babangatan to: et diman ira nanayam na ag amayamay ya agew. 

Joh 2:13 Et asinger la so pasko na saray Judios, et si Jesus tinmatdang ed Jerusalem. 

Joh 2:14 Et asabian to ed templo so saray manlako na vacvaca tan carcarnero tan malmalapati, tan saray managsalat na pilak ya manyudyurong ira: 

Joh 2:15 Et nangawa na sakey a lewet a lubir, tan pinapaway to ya amin ed templo, nanpadpara saray carnero tan vacvaca; tan inbuyandak to so pilak na saray managsalat, tan binalintuag to ray lamisaan da; 

Joh 2:16 Tan inkuan to ed saray nanlako'y malmalapati, Ekal yo dia so saraya'n bengatla; agyo gawaen so abung nen Amak ya abung na tagtagilako. 

Joh 2:17 Saray babangatan to anonotan da a nisulat, Say paga ed abung mo akmonen to ak. 

Joh 2:18 Kanian saray Judios inmebat ira tan inkuan da ed sikato. Anto'n tanda so ipanengneng mo ed sikami, bangta gawaen mo so saraya'n bengatla? 

Joh 2:19 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Igebayo so sayan templo, et dia ed loob na taloran agew ipaalagey ko. 

Joh 2:20 Kanian saray Judios inkuan da, Apataplo tan anem taon ya inpaalagey so sayan templo, et ipaalagey mo ed loob na taloran agew? 

Joh 2:21 Balet sinalita to so nipaakar ed templo na laman to. 

Joh 2:22 Kanian sanen inmoli ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inatey, saray babangatan to anonotan da a sinalita to so saya; et sinisiara so saray sulat, tan say salita ya inkuan nen Jesus. 

Joh 2:23 Et sanen wala ed Jerusalem ed pasko, leleg na fiesta, amayamay so anisia ed ngaran to, a nengnengnengen da so saray tanda to a ginawa to 

Joh 2:24 Balet si Jesus ag to inmatalek so inkasikato ed sikara, ta kaba'to so amin a totoo, 

Joh 2:25 Tan nisengeg ed agto kinaoko Ian so siopaman ya mantasi nipaaka: ed too; ta sikato lanlamang amta to la no anto so wala ed loob na too. 



Joh 3:1 Wala nen samen so sakey a too ed saray Fariseos, a man ngaran na Nicodemo, sakey a makauley na saray Judios: 

Joh 3:2 Sikato lanlamang linma ed sikato ed labi, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Rabbi, amta mi'n sakey ka a managba ngat a nanlapu ed Dios; ta angapso too a makagawa ed saraya'n tan da a gagawen mo, likod no wala ed sikato so Dios. 

Joh 3:3 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sika No say sakey a too ag nianak a na pasimbalo, ag to nanengneng so pa naria'y Dios. 

Joh 3:4 Si Nicodemo kuan to ed sikato Panon so pakayari sakey a too ya nianak no masiken la? nayarian to ta so onloob a pidua ed eges na ina to, tan nianak lamet? 

Joh 3:5 Si Jesus inmebat, Tua, tua, kuar ko ed sika, No say sakey a too ag nianak ed danum tan ed Espiritu, ag to makaloob ed panaria'y Dios. 

Joh 3:6 Say nianak ed laman sikato so laman; et say nianak ed Espiritu sikato so espiritu. 

Joh 3:7 Agmo pankelawan ya inkuan ko ed sika, Kaokolan a nianak kayo a napasimbalo. 

Joh 3:8 Say dagem onsiplog ed iner a labay to, tan narengel mo so tanol to. balet agmo amta no iner so panlapuan to, tan no iner so laen to: ontan so amin a nianak ed Espiritu. 

Joh 3:9 Inmebat si Nicodemo tan inkuan to ed sikato, Panon so kayari na sarayan bengatla? 

Joh 3:10 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Sika so managbangat ed Israel, et agmo natalosan so saraya'n bengatla? 

Joh 3:11 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sika, Sikami salitaen mi so amta mi, tan tasian mi anengneng mi; et agyo awaten so pantasi mi. 

Joh 3:12 No inbagak ed sikayo so bengatlaran mangaraldalin, et ag kayo nanisia, panon so panisia yo no ibagak ed sikayo so saray mangatatawen a bengatla? 

Joh 3:13 Et angapo so too a sinmegep ed tawen, noag say linmasor nanlapu ed tawen, salanti, Anak na too, ya wala ed tawen. 

Joh 3:14 Et onong a si Moises angipaalagey na uleg ed kalawakan, ontan met nakaokolan a nipaalagey so Anak na too: 

Joh 3:15 Pian siopaman a manisia wala ed sikato so bilay ya andi angaan. 

Joh 3:16 Ta ontan la'y inpangaro na Dios ed mundo, ya inter to so bogbogtong ya Anak to, pian siopaman a manisia ed sikato agnatawtaw, no ag ingen wala so bilay to'n andi angaan. 

Joh 3:17 Ta say Dios ag to inbaki so Anak ed mundo ya mangokom ed mundo; no ag ingen pian say mundo nilaban ed panamegley to. 

Joh 3:18 Say manisia ed sikato agnaokom: say agmanisia naokom la, lapu'd aganisia ed ngaran na bogbogtong ya Anak na Dios. 

Joh 3:19 Et sikato ya so pakaokoman, a say silew linmadia ed mundo, et saray totoo inaro ra so kabilungtan a nen say silew; ta saray gawa ra mauges. 

Joh 3:20 Ta balang sakey a mangawa na mauges gulaen to so silew et ag ondago ed silew, ompan nabalaw so saray gawa to. 

Joh 3:21 Balet say mangawa na tua ondago ed silew, pian saray gawa to niparongtal ira ya sikara so agawa dia ed Dios. 

Joh 3:22 Kayari sarayan bengatla linma'y Jesus tan saray babangatan to ed dalin na Judea; et diman akipanayam ed sikara, tan aminyag. 

Joh 3:23 Et si Juan maminbinyag met ed Enon asinger ed Salim, ta wala so dakel a danum diman: et dinmago ra, tan abinyagan ira. 

Joh 3:24 Ta si Juan ag ni nitobong ed panangipangawan. 

Joh 3:25 Kanian linmesay sakey a supiatan ed biang na saray babangatan nen Juan tan sakey a Judio nipaakar ed pan-gogol.

Joh 3:26 Et linma ra ed Juan, tan inkuan da ed sikato, Rabbi, saman so wala ed sika ed labas na Jordan, a sikato so tinasian mo, nia, sikato lanlamang maminbinyag, et amin a totoo onla ra'd sikato. 

Joh 3:27 Inmebat si Juan et inkuan to, Say sakey a too agto nayarian so mangawat na antokaman, likod no niiter ed sikato a manlapu ed tawen. 

Joh 3:28 Sikayo lanlamang, tasian yo ak, ya inkuan ko, Aliwa a siak so Cristo, ingen inbaki ak ed onaan to. 

Joh 3:29 Say novio sikato so kawalaan na novio: balet say kaaro na novio, ya man-alagey tan mandengel ed sikato, manliket na balbaleg lapu'd voces na novio: kanian saya'n liket ko sikato'y nagnap. 

Joh 3:30 Sikato so nakaokolan ya onbaleg, balet nakaokolan ko so onmelag. 

Joh 3:31 Spy onladia a manlapu ed tagey sikato so atagey ed amin: say taga dalin sikato so mangaraldalin, tan mangaraldalin so salitaen to: say onla dia a manlapu ed tawen atagey ed amin. 

Joh 3:32 Say anengneng to tan say nadngel to, satan so tasian to; et angapo so mangawat na pantasi to. 

Joh 3:33 Say angawat na pantasi to intatak to so sello to ed saya ya say Dios sikato so tua. 

Joh 3:34 Ta say inbaki Dios salitaen to so saray salita na Dios: ta agto iter so Espiritu ed panamegley na sukat. 

Joh 3:35 Say Ama inaro to so Anak, et inter to so amin a bengabengatla ed lima to. 

Joh 3:36 Say manisia ed Anak wala'y bi-lay to andian gaan; balet say agma-ngonod ed Anak ag to nanengneng so bilay, say sanok ingen na Dios so manayam ed sikato. 



Joh 4:1 Kanian sanen say Katawan naamtaan to a saray Fariseos nadngelan da ya si Jesus mangagawa tan mamibiniag na dakdakel ya babangatan nen si Juan. 

Joh 4:2 (Angan si Jesus lanlamang agaminiag, noag saray babangatan to), 

Joh 4:3 Tinainan toy Judea, tan linma la met ed Galilea. 

Joh 4:4 Et kaokolan to so ondalan ed Samaria. 

Joh 4:5 Kanian sikato'y linma ed sakey a ciudad na Samaria, a man ngaran na Sicar, asinger ed gaton na uma ya inter nen Jacob ed anak to'n Jose: 

Joh 4:6 Et say bobon nen Jacob wad-man. Si Jesus sirin, a naksawan ed inpanaakar to, imyorong ya ontan ed abay na bobon. Asinger a komanem so horas. 

Joh 4:7 Onsabi sakey a bii a taga Samaria ya onasol: inkuan nen Jesus ed sika to, Itdan moak na inumen. 

Joh 4:8 Ta saray babangatan to linmara ed ciudad a manaliew na tagano. 

Joh 4:9 Say bii a Samaritana sirin kuanto ed sikato, Panon a sika, anta sakey ka'n Judio, mikerew ka'y inumen ed siak, ya sakey ak a bii'n Samaritana? (Ta saray Judios ag ira misalita ed saray Samaritanos). 

Joh 4:10 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, No naamtaan mo komon so pamalangkap na Dios, tan no siopa so mankuan ed sika, Itdan moak na inumen; akikerew ka komon ed sikato, et initdan to ka komon na danum a mabilay. 

Joh 4:11 Say bii kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, andian ka na antokaman a pangasol, tan say bobon aralem: iner sirin so pangalaan mo na danum a mabilay? 

Joh 4:12 Babaleg ka ta nen si ama mi a Jacob, ya angiter ed sikami na bobon, tan ininuman to lanlamang tan saray anak to, tan saray ayayep to? 

Joh 4:13 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Balang sakey ya oninum ed saya a danum naapgaan lamet: 

Joh 4:14 Balet siopaman ya oninum ed danum ya iter ko ed sikato ag naapgaan angan kapigan; ingen say danum ya iter ko ed sikato magmaliw ed sikato a sakey a bobon na danum ya mansosbol anga ed maando'n bilay. 

Joh 4:15 Say bii kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, iter mo ed siak so saya'n danum, pian agak naapgaan, tan agak met onla dia a manasol. 

Joh 4:16 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Laka, tawag mo so asawam, tan onla kayo dia. 

Joh 4:17 Say bii inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Angapo so asawak. Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Sika maong so kuan mo, Angapo so asawak: 

Joh 4:18 Ta walaan ka nensaman na limara'n asawa; tan say wala ed sika natan agmo asawa: saya inkuan mo a sankatuaan. 

Joh 4:19 Say bii kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, natebe'ko a sakey kan profeta. 

Joh 4:20 Saray kaamaan mi angigalang ira dia ed saya'n palandey; et sikayo kuan yo, ya dia ed Jerusalem so pasen a nepeg day totoo'n pangigalangan. 

Joh 4:21 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Bii, sisia moak, say horas onsabi, sano angan dia ed saya'n palandey, ni say dia ed Jerusalem, agyo igalang so Ama. 

Joh 4:22 Sikayo igalang yo so agyo amta: sikami igalang mi so amta mi; ta say kilabanan manlapu ed saray Judios. 

Joh 4:23 Ingen say horas onsabi, tan natan la, sano saray tua a manangigalang igalang da so Ama dia ed espiritu tan katuaan; ta saray ontari so anapen na Ama a manangigalang ed sikato. 

Joh 4:24 Say Dios sikato'y sakey ya Espiritu: et saray mangigalang ed sikato nepeg da'n igalang ed espiritu tan katuaan. 

Joh 4:25 Say bii kuan to ed sikato, Amtak a say Mesias onsabi (a sikato so inngaran a Cristo): sano onsabi, ipaliwawa to ed sikatayo so amin a bengabengatla. 

Joh 4:26 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Siak a misasalita ed sika, siak so sikato. 

Joh 4:27 Et dia'd saya sinmabi so saray babangatan to; et nankelaw ira a sikato'y misasalita ed sakey a bii; angaman ontan angapo'y too'n angikuan, Anto so anapen mo? ono, Akin et misalita ka ed sikato? 

Joh 4:28 Dia ed ontan say bii tinainan to'y boyog to, tan linma ed ciudad, tan kuan to ed saray totoo, 

Joh 4:29 Galidia, nengneng yo so sakey a too, ya inbaga to'd siak so amin a bengabengatla'n ginawak: nayari a saya so Cristo? 

Joh 4:30 Sikara pinmaway ira ed ciudad, tan dinmago ra ed sikato. 

Joh 4:31 Kaleganan to nia saray babangatan akikasi ra ed sikato, a kuan da, Rabbi, mangan ka. 

Joh 4:32 Balet inkuan to ed sikara, Wala so kanen a kanen ko ya ag yo amta. 

Joh 4:33 Kanian saray babangatan nagsikuan ira, Wala kasi sakey a too ya angyakar ed sikato na bengatla'n kanen? 

Joh 4:34 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Say kanen ko sikato so pangawak na linawa na saman so angibaki ed siak, tan manumpal na kimey to. 

Joh 4:35 Agyo ta kuan, Wala ni apat bulan, tan insan onsabi panagani? nia, kuan ko ed sikayo, itangoa yo ray mata yo, tan nengneng yo so kaumaan, ya ampoti la ra'n maparaan ed panagani. 

Joh 4:36 Say manani mangawat na upa, tan mangilosbo na bunga ya onkana ed bilay a maando; pian say mantanem tan say manani makapangayaga ra. 

Joh 4:37 Ta dia ed saya tua so salita, Sakey so mantanem, et sananey so manani. 

Joh 4:38 Ibaki takayo a manani ed agyo dinalusan: saray arum so dinmalus, et linmoob kayo ed dinalusan da. 

Joh 4:39 Nanlapu ed saman a ciudad amayamay so Samaritanos ya anisia ed sikato nisengeg ed salita na sama'y bii, a nantasi, Inbaga to ed siak so amin a bengabengatla'n ginawak. 

Joh 4:40 Kanian sanen saray Samaritanos sinmabi ra ed sikato, kinerew da ed sikato ya mipanayam ed sikara; et nanayam diman a dua!y agew 

Joh 4:41 Et lalo ya amayamay so anisia nisengeg ed sara'y salita to; 

Joh 4:42 Et inkuan da ed bii, Natan manisia kami, ag nisengeg ed salitam: ta sikami lanlamang nadngelmi, tan amta mi a saya sikato'n tua so Manangilaban na mundo. 

Joh 4:43 Et kayari dua'y agew pinmaway diman a linma ed Galilea. 

Joh 4:44 Ta si Jesus lanlamang tinasian to, a say sakey a profeta angapoy so dayew to ed dalinto'n dili. 

Joh 4:45 Dia'd ontan sanen sinmabi ed Galilea saray Galileos sikato so inawat da, bangta anengneng da so amin a bengabengatla'n ginawa to ed Jerusalem nen fiesta: ta linmara met ed fiesta. 

Joh 4:46 Linma sirin lamet ed Cana na Galilea, a nangawaan to ed danum ya alak. Et wala'd man so sakey a manonaan a too, a say anak to agmakayari fed Capernaum. 

Joh 4:47 Sanen nadngelan to a si Jesus pinmaway ed Judea anga ed Galilea, linma ed sikato, tan kinerew to ya onlasor a mila, tan tambalen to komon so anak to; ta sikato so ngalngali ompatey. 

Joh 4:48 Si Jesus sirin inkuan to ed sikato, No ag yo anengneng so saray tanda tan saray pakelaw, agkayo manisia. 

Joh 4:49 Say manonaan too kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, gala ta agni inatey so ana ko. 

Joh 4:50 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Onlaka la; say anak mo nabilay. Say too sinisia to so salita a sinalita nen Jesus ed sikato, et iman la. 

Joh 4:51 Et nen onlalasor, saray ariripen to inmabet ira ed sikato, a kuan da, a say anak to abilay. 

Joh 4:52 Dia ed on tan tinepe'to ed sikara so horas nen ongapo ya inmabig. Inkuan da sirin ed sikato, Karuman nen komapito so horas say petang tinmaina'd sikato. 

Joh 4:53 Dia ed ontan say ama akabatan to ya dia ed saman ya horas so inpangikuan nen Jesus ed sikato, Say anak mo nabilay: et sikato lanlamang anisia, tan amin ya abung to. 

Joh 4:54 Saya sikato lamet so komadua'n tanda a ginawa nen Jesus, nen pinmaway ed Judea anga ed Galilea. 



Joh 5:1 Kayari saraya'n bengatla wala so sakey a fiesta na saray Judios; et si Jesus tinmarttang ed Jerusalem. 

Joh 5:2 Wala ed Jerusalem ed abay na wangalan na saray carnero so sakey a tangke, a tinawag ed salita na Hebreo na Bethesda, ya wala so limara'n pinto to. 

Joh 5:3 Dia ed saraya akapasen so sakey karakel na saray agmakayari, bulag, piley, amagaan, a man-aalagar ed igalaw na danum: 

Joh 5:4 Ta dia'd tinandaan a panaon onlasor so sakey ya angel ed tangke, tan kimbogen to so danum: say makaona ya onlasor ed tangke kayari kakimbog na danum, onabig ed bengatla a sakit ya wala ed sikato. 

Joh 5:5 Et sakey a too wadman, a talomplo tan walo'y taon to lan agmakayari. 

Joh 5:6 Sanen sikato so anengneng nen Jesus a mandokdokol, tan akabatan to ya wadman la'n abayag ed saman a kipapasen, kuan to ed sikato, Labay mo so onabig? 

Joh 5:7 Say agmakayari inmebat ed sikato, Katawan, angapo so took ya mangilasor ed siak ed tangke, sano akimbog so danum: leleg ingen ya onlasor ak say sananey onaan la nen say siak. 

Joh 5:8 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Alagey ka, libit mo so dokolan mo, tan manakar ka. 

Joh 5:9 Et tampol ya inmabig so too, tan nilibi'to so dokolan to, tan nanakar. Et sabaton nen saman ya agew. 

Joh 5:10 Dia ed ontan saray Judios inkuan da ed saman so atambal, Natan sikato'y sabaton, et agmatonong ed sika ya libiten mo so dokolan mo. 

Joh 5:11 Balet inmebat ed sikara, Say amaabig ed siak, sikato lanlamang so nankuan ed siak, Libit mo so dokolan mo, tan manakar ka. 

Joh 5:12 Tinepet da ed sikato, Siopa so too a narrkuan ed sika, Libit mo so dokoian mo tan manakar ka? 

Joh 5:13 Saman balet so atambal agto amta no siopa: ta si Jesus tinmainan la, ta sakey a karakel na katooan so wala nensaman ed saman apasen. 

Joh 5:14 Naogonoyan sikato'y naromog nen Jesus ed templo, et inkuan to ed sikato, Nia, sika apaabig ka: agka la mankasalanan, ompano sakey a bengatla'n mauguges so ondapo ed sika. 

Joh 5:15 Say too iman la, tan inbaga to ed saray Judios a si Jesus amaabig ed sikato. 

Joh 5:16 Et nisengeg ed saya saray Judios pinasegsegang da si Jesus, lapu'd ginawa to so saraya'n bengatla ed agew a sabaton. 

Joh 5:17 Balet si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, Si Amak mankikimey ni anga ed natan, tan siak mankimey ak. 

Joh 5:18 Kanian lapu'd saya saray Judios sikato so lalo a sineetan da'n pateyen, ta aliwa labat ni loksoan to so sabaton, noag ingen met tinawag to so Dios ya Ama to, a pipaparaen to'y inkasika to ed Dios. 

Joh 5:19 Kanian si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say Anak angapn'y nagawaan to ed inkasikato, noag say nanengneng to a gagawaen na Ama: ta ganagana'y gawaen to, saraya met so gawaen na Anak ya ontan. 

Joh 5:20 Ta say Ama aroen to so Anak, tan ipanengneng to ed sikato so saray amin a bengatla'n gawaen to lanlamang: tan ankakabaleg a gawa nen saraya so ipanengneng to ed sikato, pian nikelawan kayo. 

Joh 5:21 Ta onong a say Ama paulien to 'ray inatey tan itdan tora na bilay, ontan to met nia'y Anak mangiter na bilay ed labay to. 

Joh 5:22 Ta say Ama agmangokom na siopaman a too, inter to ingen so amin a panangokom ed Anak; 

Joh 5:23 Ta piano amin igalang da so Anak, a singa say panangigalang da ed Ama, Say agmangigalang ed Anak agto igalang so Ama ya angibaki ed sikato. 

Joh 5:24 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say ondengel na salitak, tan manisia ed saman so angibaki dia ed siak, wala so bilay to a maando, tan ag onloob ed panangokoman, noag ingen pinmaway ed ipapatey ya onloob ed bilay. 

Joh 5:25 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say horas onsabi, tan natan la, sano narengel na saray inaatey so voces na Anak na Dios: et saray ondengel nabilay ira. 

Joh 5:26 Ta onong a say Ama wala so bilay to ed inkasikato, ontan met so inpangiter to ed Anak a wala so bilay ed inkasika to: 

Joh 5:27 Et sikato so initdan to na pakauley a mangokom, lapu'd sikato so Anak na too. 

Joh 5:28 Ag kayo mankelaw ed saya: ta onsabi horas, ya amin so saray wala ed saray lobok narengel da so voces to. 

Joh 5:29 Et onpaway ira; saray nangawa na maong, nipaakar ed kioli ed bilay; bang saray nangawa na mauges, dia met ed kioli ed bilay ed kaokom. 

Joh 5:30 Angapo so nagawaan ko ed inkasiak: onong na narengel ko, mangokomak, et say panangokom ko matonong; ta ag ko anapen so linawak a dili, noag say linawa na saman so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 5:31 No tasian ko so inkasiak, say pantasik aliwa'n tua. 

Joh 5:32 Sananey so mantasi ed siak; et amatak a say tasi ya itasi to ed siak sikato so tua. 

Joh 5:33 Nanbaki kayo ed Juan, et tinasian to so katuaan. 

Joh 5:34 Balet say tasi ya awaten ko ag manlapu ed too: ingen ikuan ko so saraya a bengatla, pian nilabari kayo. 

Joh 5:35 Sikato so silew nensaman a mandarlang tan onsindag: et kinaliktan yo so nangayaga ed liwawa to ed sakey a panaon. 

Joh 5:36 Balet say pantasi ya wala ed siak babaleg nen say pantasi nen Juan; ta saray kimey ya inter ed siak na Ama a sumpalen ko, saray dili a kimey a gawaen ko, mantasira ed siak, ya say Ama inbaki toak. 

Joh 5:37 Et say Ama ya angibaki ed siak, tinasiantoak. Agyo ni nadngel so voces to angan kapigan, agyo met anengeneng so ereng to. 

Joh 5:38 Et angapo ed sikayo so salita'to a manaayam ed sikayo: ta say inbaki to, agyo sisiaen. 

Joh 5:39 Osisaen yo so saray sulsulat, ta nonoten yo a dia'd sikara wala so bila'yo'n maando; et saraya so mantasi ed siak; 

Joh 5:40 Et agyo labay so ondago ed siak, pian wala komon so bila'yo. 

Joh 5:41 Ag ko awaten so dayew a manlapu'ed saray totoo. 

Joh 5:42 Balet kabat takayo, ya angapo ed inkasikayo so aro'y Dios. 

Joh 5:43 Siak linmaak dia ed ngaran nen Amak, et ag yoak awaten: no sananey so onladia ed dili'n ngaranto, sikato so awaten yo. 

Joh 5:44 Panon so pakapanisia yo, sikayo ya awaten yo so dayew na sakey tan sakey, et say dayew a manlapu ed Dios a bokor agyo anapen? 

Joh 5:45 Agyo isisipen a sikayo so idalem ko ed Ama: wala so sakey a mangidalem ed sikayo, salanti si Moises, a sikato so angipasenan yo na ilalo yo. 

Joh 5:46 Ta no sinisia yo si Moises, sisiaen yo ak met komon; ta sikato insula'to so nipaakar ed siak. 

Joh 5:47 Balet no ag yo sisiaen so saray sulsula'to, panon so pananisia yo ed salitak? 



Joh 6:1 Kayari saraya'n bengatla linmay Jesus ed pagpag a gilig na dayat na Galilea, a sikato so dayat na Tiberias. 

Joh 6:2 Et tinmombok ed sikato so dakel a katooan, ta anengneng da so saray tanda a ginawa to'd saray agmakayari. 

Joh 6:3 Et sinmegep si Jesus ed palandey, tan nanyurong diman a pati saray babangatan to. 

Joh 6:4 Bang say pasko, a fiesta na saray Judios asinger la. 

Joh 6:5 Kanian si Jesus nen intangwa to' ray mata'to, tan anengneng to so dakel a katooan ya onla nensaman ed sikato, kuan to ed Felipe, Iner so panaliwan tayo na tinapay pian saraya mangan ira? 

Joh 6:6 Et saya inkuan to ya panobok ed sikato: ta sikato a dili amta to no anto so gawaen to. 

Joh 6:7 Si Felipe inmebat ed sikato, say tinapay a petek na duan lasus a denarios ag masarag ed sikara, pian balang sakey makapangan na daiset. 

Joh 6:8 Sakey ed saray babangatan to, si Andres, agi nen Simon Pedro, kuan to ed sikato, 

Joh 6:9 Wala so sakey ya ugaw dia, ya wala'y limara'n tinapay to a cebada, tan duara'n sira: balet anto so saraya ed ontana kinarakel? 

Joh 6:10 Inkuan nen Jesus, Payorong yo ray totoo. Et wala so dakel a dika ed saman a pasen. Dia ed ontan saray totoo imyorong ira, ed bilang a ngalngali limanlibo. 

Joh 6:11 Si Jesus sirin inala to so saray tinapay; et nen akapisalamat, inyotob to ed saray manyudyurong; ontan met saray sira unong na karakel a gabay da. 

Joh 6:12 Et sanen napsel ira, kuan to ed saray babangatan to, Dokdok yo ray pisagpisag a sulok, pian angapo'y nadarak. 

Joh 6:13 Dia ed ontan dinokdok dara, et napno so labindua'n boksot ed saray pisagpisag na saray limara'n tinapay a cebada, a nakdaan na saray angan. 

Joh 6:14 Kanian sanen anengneng na saray totoo so tanda a ginawa to, inkuan da, dia'd katuaan sikato ya so profeta ya onladia ed mundo. 

Joh 6:15 Si Jesus sirin nen atebek to a ngalngalira onla tan sikato so alaenda a pilit, pian sikato so gawaen da ya ari, sinmian lamet ed palandey ed kabokbokoran. 

Joh 6:16 Et nen sinmabi labi, saray babangatan to linmasor ira ed dayat; 

Joh 6:17 Et linmugan ira ed sakey a paraw, tan onbabaliw ira ed dayat anga ed Capernaum. Et ambilunget la nen saman, et si Jesus ag ni akila ed sikara. 

Joh 6:18 Et say dayat maburakan lapu ed dagem a baleg ya sinmiplog. 

Joh 6:19 Bang nen akapanbegsay lara na ngalngali limara tan duamplo ono talomplo ya estadios, anengneng da'y Jesus a manaakar ed tapew na dayat, tan manasinger ed paraw: et ataktakot ira.. 

Joh 6:20 Balet inkuan to ed sikara, Siak; ag kayo antakot. 

Joh 6:21 Kanian aiiketan ira ya angawat ed sikato ed paraw: et tampol say paraw sinmabi ed dalin a laen da. 

Joh 6:22 Diad kaimbuasan saray dakel a katooan a nanaalagey ed pagpag a gilig na dayat anengneng da ya angapo so arum a paraw diman, noag saksakey, tan si Jesus ag linmoob a pati saray babangatan to ed paraw, noag saray babangatan to tinmainan ira a bokbokor, 

Joh 6:23 (Angan wala so saray paraw a sinmabi nanlapu ed Tiberias ya asinger ed pasen ya anganan da na tinapay kayari ya akisalamat so Katawan): 

Joh 6:24 Sanen anengneng lanti na karakel na totoo ya andid man si Jesus, ni angan saray babangatan to, sikara'y linmugan ed saray paraw, tan linmara ed Capernaum, ya aanapen da si Jesus. 

Joh 6:25 Et sanen sikato so nalmo ra ed pagpag a gilig na dayat, inkuan da ed sikato, Rabbi, kapigan so insabim dia? 

Joh 6:26 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikara tan inkuan to, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Anapen yo ak, ag lapu'd akanengneng kayo na saray tantanda, noag lapu ed angan kayo ed saray tinapay, tan napsel kayo. 

Joh 6:27 Agkayo mankimey nipaakar ed tagano a natawtaw, noag say nipaakar ed tagano a magnayon anga ed maando a bilay, ya iter na Anak na too ed sikayo: ta say Ama, salanti Dios, sikato so tinatakan to. 

Joh 6:28 Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Anto so nakaokolan mi a gawaen, pian nakimeyan mi so saray kimey na Dios? 

Joh 6:29 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Sikato ya so kimey na Dios, a manisia kayo ed inbaki to. 

Joh 6:30 Inkuan da lanti ed sikato, Anto sirin so gawaen mo a panagkatanda, pian nanengneng mi, et manisia kami ed sika? anto so gawaen mo? 

Joh 6:31 Saray atateng tayo angan ira na mana dia ed kalawakan; unong na nisulat, Sikato initdan to ra na tinapay a nanlapu ed tawen a kanen da. 

Joh 6:32 Si Jesus inkuan to sirin ed sikara, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Aliwa a si Moises so angiter ed sikayo na tinapay a nanlapu ed tawen; balet si Amak itdan to kayo na tuan tinapay a manlapu ed tawen. 

Joh 6:33 Ta say tinapay nr. Dios sikato so onleksab a manlapu ed tawen, et mangiter na bilay ed mundo. 

Joh 6:34 Inkuan da sirin ed sikato, Katawan, itdan mo kami lawas na saya'n tinapay. 

Joh 6:35 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Siak so tinapay na bilay: say ondago ed siak ag naerasan, tan say manisia ed siak ag balot naapgaan. 

Joh 6:36 Balet inkuan ko ed sikayo, ya anengneng yo ak, et ag kayo ni manisia. 

Joh 6:37 Am in ya iter na Ama ed siak ondago ed siak; et say ondago ed siak ag kon balot ipulisay. 

Joh 6:38 Ta linmasor ak a nanlapu ed tawen, aliwan piano gawaen ko so linawak a dili, noag say linawa na angibaki ed siak. 

Joh 6:39 Et saya sikato so linawa na angibaki ed siak, ya amin ya inter to ed siak angapo so nabalang ko, noag ingen paulien ko ed bilay ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 6:40 Ta saya sikato so linawa nen Amak, ya amin a makanengneng ed Anak, tan manisia ed sikato, nawalaan na bilay ya andi angaan; et sikato so paolien ko ed bilay ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 6:41 Kanian saray Judios nantalabotob ira nipaakar ed sikato, lapu'd inkuan to, Siak so tinapay a linmasor a nanlapu ed tawen. 

Joh 6:42 Et inkuan da, Ag ta sikato ya si Jesus, ya anak nen Jose, a say ama to tan ina to kaba'tayo? Panon so pangibaga to natan Siak linmasor ak a nanlapu ed tawen? 

Joh 6:43 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Ag kayo mantatalabotob ed inkasikayo. 

Joh 6:44 Angapo so too a makadago ed siak, likod no say Ama ya angibaki ed siak sikato so yasinger to: et sikato so paolien ko ed bilay ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 6:45 Nisulat ed saray profetas, Et nabangatan ira ya amin ed Dios. Balang sakey ya akadngel ed Ama, tan akaaral, ondago ed siak. 

Joh 6:46 Aliwan say angan siopan too so akanengneng ed Ama, nilikod so samay nanlapu ed Dios, anengneng to so Ama. 

Joh 6:47 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say manisia walaan na maando a bilay. 

Joh 6:48 Siak so tinapay na bilay. 

Joh 6:49 Saray atateng yo angan ira na mana ed kalawakan, et inatey ira. 

Joh 6:50 Saya sikato so tinapay ya onlasor a manlapu ed tawen, pian say too a makapangan ed sikato, et ag onpatey. 

Joh 6:51 Siak so tinapay a mabilay a linmasor a nanlapu ed tawen: no wala so mangan ed saya a tinapay, manbilay lawas: on, et say tinapay ya iter ko sikato so laman ko, nipaakar ed bilay na mundo. 

Joh 6:52 Kanian saray Judios nansasangsang so sakey tan sakey ed sikara a kuan da, Panon so pakayari na sayan too a mangiter ed sikatayo na laman to a kanen? 

Joh 6:53 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, No ag kayo mangan ed laman na Anak na too tan ag kayo oninum ed dala to, andian kayo na bilay ed inkasikayo. 

Joh 6:54 Say mangan na laman ko tan oninum na dalak walaan na maandon bilay; tan sikato so paolien ko ed bilay ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 6:55 Ta say laman ko sikato'y peteg a tagano, tan say dalak sikato'y peteg ya inumen. 

Joh 6:56 Say mangan na laman ko tan oninum na dalak mansiansia ed siak, tan siak mansiansia ak ed sikato. 

Joh 6:57 Unong a say mabilay ya Ama inbaki to ak, tan manbilayak lapu'd Ama; dia ed ontan say mangan ed siak, manbilay met lapu ed siak. 

Joh 6:58 Sikatoya so tinapay a linmasor a nanlapu ed tawen: aliwan singa say kinan na saray atateng yo, et inatey ira: say mangan ed saya a tinapay manbilay lawas. 

Joh 6:59 Saraya'n bengatla inkuan to dia ed sinagoga, nen nanbangat ed Capernaum. 

Joh 6:60 Kanian amayamay ed saray babangatan to, nen nadngel da ya, inkuan da, Saya masoliwet a salita; siopa so makayari'n ondengel ed sikato? 

Joh 6:61 Si Jesus balet bangta amta to ed inkasikato a saray babangatan to nantalabotob ira ed saya, inkuan to ed sikara, Patiroren to kayo ta na saya? 

Joh 6:62 Anto sirin no nanengneng yo so Anak na too ya ontotokotok ed kawalaan to nensaman? 

Joh 6:63 Say espiritu sikato, so mangiter na bilay; say laman angapo so gongonato: saray salita a sinalita ed sikayo sikara so espiritu, tan sikara so bilay. 

Joh 6:64 Balet walaray arum ed sikayo ya ag manisia. Ta si Jesus amta to la a nanlapu ed gapo no siopa so saray ag manisia, tan no siopa so mangyawat ed sikato. 

Joh 6:65 Et inkuan to, Nisengeg ed saya inkuan ko ed sikayo, ya angapo so too a makadago ed siak, likod no sikato so niiter ed sikato manlapu ed Ama. 

Joh 6:66 Nisengeg ed saya amayamay ed saray babangatan ton sinmoner ira, tan ag la'ra akila ed sikato. 

Joh 6:67 Kanian inkuan nen Jesus ed saray labindua, Laba'yo met so ontainan? 

Joh 6:68 Si Simon Pedro inmebat ed sikato, Katawan, siopa so laen mi? wala ed sika so saray salita na maando a bilay. 

Joh 6:69 Et anisia kami tan amta mi ya sika so Santo na Dios. 

Joh 6:70 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, Ag ta kayo ta pinili a labindua, et sakey ed sikayo sikato'y sakey a diablo? 

Joh 6:71 Bang say sinalita to nipaakar ed Judas ya anak nen Simon Iscariote, ta sikato nen saman so mangyawat ed sikato, anta sakey ed saray labindua. 



Joh 7:1 Et kayari sarayan bengatla nanakar si Jesus ed Galilea: ta ag to ginabay so manakar ed Judea, lapu ed saray Judios sikato so inanap da a pateyen. 

Joh 7:2 Bang say fiesta na saray Judios, say fiesta na saray tabernaculo, asinger la. 

Joh 7:3 Kanian saray agagi to inkuan da ed sikato, Tainan ka dia, tan onla ka ed Judea, pian saray babangatan mo nanengneng da met so saray gawam a gagawaen mo. 

Joh 7:4 Ta angapo so too a mangawa na antokaman ed maamot, tan sikato lanlamang anapen to so nakabatan a mapatnag. No gawaen mo so saraya'n bengatla, iparongtal mo so inkasika ed mundo. 

Joh 7:5 Ta angan saray agagi to ag ira anisia nen saman ed sikato. 

Joh 7:6 Kanian si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Say panaon ko agni sinmabi; bangbalet say panaon yo maralato lawas. 

Joh 7:7 Say mundo ag to kayo nayari'n gulaen: balet sikato gulaen to ak, lapu'd panatasik ed sikato, a saray gawa to sikara so mauges. 

Joh 7:8 Tatdang kayo ed fiesta: Siak agak ni on tatdang ed saya'n fiesta: ta say panaon ko agni asapot. 

Joh 7:9 Et bangnen asalita to la rayan bengatla ed sikara, tinmilak ni ed Galilea. 

Joh 7:10 Bangnen akatatdang so saray agagi to ed fiesta, saman la tinmatdang met, ed ag maparongtal, noag say singa maamot. 

Joh 7:11 Kanian saray Judios sikato so inaanap da ed fiesta, tan inkuan da, Ined so kawalaan to? 

Joh 7:12 Et wala so dakel a dalamurom ed saray karaklan nipaakar ed sikato: arum inkuan da, Sikato so maong a too; saray arum inkuan da, Andi ingen ibalang to so dakel a katooan. 

Joh 7:13 Angaman ontan angapo so too ya nansalita ed mapatnag nipaakar ed sikato iapu ed takot ed saray Judios. 

Joh 7:14 Bangbalet nen mamepegley so fiesta tinmatdang si Jesus ed templo tan nanbangat. 

Joh 7:15 Kanian saray Judios nikelawan ira, a kuan da, Panon so pikakabat na saya'n too ed saray letra, bangta ag nanaral a balot? 

Joh 7:16 Kanian si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, tan inkuan to, Say bangat ko ag ko kien, balet kien na angibaki ed siak. 

Joh 7:17 No siopaman a too manlinawa a gawaen to so linawa to, nakabatan to so bangat ko, no nanlapu kasi ed Dios, ono mansalita ak kasi na manlapu ed inkasiak. ed sikato, Sika tasian mo so inkasika; say tasim aliwa'n tua. 

Joh 7:18 Say mansalita a manlapu ed inkasikato anapen to so dayew to'n di-li: balet say mananap na dayew na angibaki ed sikato, sikato lanlamang so tua, tan angapo'y agmatonong ed sikato. 

Joh 7:19 Ag ta inted nen Moises ed sikayo so gangan, et angapo ni ed sikayo so mangoonor na gangan? Akin a seetan yo ak a pateyen? 

Joh 7:20 Say karaklan inmebat, Sika walaan ka'y sakey a demonio: siopa ta'y maneseet a mamatey ed sika? 

Joh 7:21 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Siak ginawak so sakey a gawa, et mankelaw kayo'n amin. 

Joh 7:22 Si Moises inited to 'd sikayo so pangalsim (aliwa a nanlapu ed Moises, noag dia ed saray atateng); et dia ed sabaton galsiman yo so too. 

Joh 7:23 No say sakey a too awaten to so pangalsim ed agew a sabaton, pian agnasumlang so gangan nen Moises; kaingongot yo ak, lapu ed pinaabig ko a sigpot sakey a too ed agew a sabaton? 

Joh 7:24 Ag kayo mangokom unong ed kanengnengan, ingen mangokom kayo ed matonong a panangokom. 

Joh 7:25 Kanian saray arum ed saray taga Jerusalem inkuan da, Aliwa ta'n saya so seseetan da'n pateyen? 

Joh 7:26 Et nia, sikato so mansasalita a maparongtal, et angapo so kuan da ed sikato. Ompan saray makauley peteg ya amta ra a saya sikato si Cristo? 

Joh 7:27 Manwarin ontan amta tayo yan too no ined so lapuan to: balet sano onsabi so Cristo, angapo so makaamta no ined so lapuan to. 

Joh 7:28 Kanian si Jesus inmingal ed templo a nanbabangat tan nankuan, Sikayo nanpadpara a kabat yoak, tan amta yo so lapuan ko; et agak nanlapu'd inkasiak, ingen say angi-bakidia ed siak sikato so tua, a sikato so ag yo kabat. 

Joh 7:29 Sikato so kabat ko; lapu'd nanlapu ak ed sikato, tan inbaki to ak. 

Joh 7:30 Kanian sineetan da ya erelen: et angapo'y so too ya aningkat ed sikato, lapu'd ag ni asabi' horas to. 

Joh 7:31 Balet amayamay ed saray dakel a katooan so anisia ed sikato; tan inkuan da, Sano say Cristo onsabi, mangawa kasi naani dakdakel a tanda nen saratan a ginawa na saya'n too? 

Joh 7:32 Saray Fariseos nadngel da so karakel day katooan a maralamurom ed saraya'n bengatla'n nipaakar ed sikato: et saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray Fariseos angibaki ra na oficiales a mangala ed sikato. 

Joh 7:33 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to, Wala ni daiset ya panaon a piayam ko ed sikayo, insan orila ak ed saman so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 7:34 Sikayo anapen yoak naani, et ag yoak naalmo: tan no iner so kawalaan ko, ag yo nayarian a laen. 

Joh 7:35 Kanian saray Judios inkuan da ed inkasikara, Iner kasi laen to nian too ya ag tayo naani naalmo? onla kasi naani ed Nibuyakan dia ed saray Griegos tan inbanga'to so saray Griegos? 

Joh 7:36 Anto so saya'n salita ya inkuan to, Anapen yoak naani, et ag yoak naalmo: tan no iner so kawalaan ko, ag yo nayarian a laen? 

Joh 7:37 Sanen kaonoran y a agew, say baleg ya agew na fiesta, nanalagey si Jesus tan nan-ingal, a kuan to, No napgaan so siopaman a too, ondago ed siak, tan oninum. 

Joh 7:38 Say manisia ed siak, onong na kuan na sulat, onagos ya ompaway ed loob to so saray ilog na mabilay a danum. 

Joh 7:39 Balet saya sinalita to so nipaakar ed Espiritu, ya awaten na saray anisia ed sikato: ta say Espiritu ag ni niiter nensaman; lapu ed si Jesus ag ni nigloria. 

Joh 7:40 Kanian saray arum ed dakel a katooan, nen nadngel da so saraya'n salita, inkuan da, Saya sikato a tua so profeta. 

Joh 7:41 Saray arum inkuan da, Saya sikato si Cristo. Balet saray arum in kuan da, Anto, manlapu ed Galilea so Cristo? 

Joh 7:42 Ag ta inkuan na sulat, a say Cristo manlapu ed poli nen David, tan manlapu ed Bethlehem, say aldea a .kawalaan nen David nensaman? 

Joh 7:43 Kanian agawa so sakey a inkaapag na dakel a Katooan nipaakar ed sikato. 

Joh 7:44 Et saray arum ed sikara labayda komon ya inerel; balet angapoy too'n aningkat ed sikato. 

Joh 7:45 Kanian saray oficiales linma ra ed saray manonaan a sacerdotes tan saray Fariseos; et inkuan da ed sikara, Akin et ag yo inawit? 

Joh 7:46 Saray oficiales inmebat ira, Angapo ni too a nansalita na onia. 

Joh 7:47 Kanian saray Fariseos inmebat ira ed sikara, Fati sikayo met so nibalang? 

Joh 7:48 Anisia ta so siopaman ed saray manouley, ono ed saray Fariseos? 

Joh 7:49 Balet saraya a katooan ya agda amta so gangan naayew ira. 

Joh 7:50 Si Nicodemo (saman so linma ed sikato nensaman, anta sakey ed sikara), kuan to ed sikara, 

Joh 7:51 Say gangan tayo okomen to ta so sakey a too, ya agni dengelen ya unona so inkasikato tan amtaen no anto so gagawaen to? 

Joh 7:52 Inmebat ira tan inkuan da ed sikato, Sika met taga Galilea ka? Osisaen mo, et nanengneng mo ya angapo so profeta ya onletaw ed Galilea. 

Joh 7:53 Et sinmempet so balang sakey ed dilin abung to: 



Joh 8:1 Si Jesus balet linma ed palandey na Olivas. 

Joh 8:2 Et dia ed kabkabuasan linma lamet ed templo, et amin ya ombaley linma ed sikato; et imyorong, tan sikara so binangatan to. 

Joh 8:3 Et saray escribas tan saray Fariseos inakar da so sakey a bii ya narel ed pikakalugoran; et nen sikato so nipasen da ed pegley, 

Joh 8:4 Kuan da ed sikato, Managbangat saya'n bii narel ed pikakalugoran, ed kaplesan a toloy. 

Joh 8:5 Bang dia ed gangan si Moises ingangan to ed sikami ya tupaken so ontan a bii: anto sirin so kuan mo nipaakar ed sikato? 

Joh 8:6 Et saya inkuan da lan bengat pian wala so pakapangidalman da ed sikato. Balet si Jesus tinmoek tan inpansulat to so tamoro to ed dalin. 

Joh 8:7 Ingen nen intoloy da so mantepet ed sikato, inmalagey tan inkuan to ed sikara, Say andian na kasalanan ed sikayo, sikato so unona a mangitupak na bato ed sikato. 

Joh 8:8 Et tinmoek lamet, tan inpansula'to so tamoro to ed dalin. 

Joh 8:9 Et sikara, sanen nadngelan da, pinmaway ira'n sansakey, manlapu ed saray kamasikenan anga ed kaonoran: et si Jesus atilak a bokod, tan say bii, diman ed kawalaan to ed pegley. 

Joh 8:10 Et si Jesus inmalagey, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Bii, iner so kawalaan da? angapo so anusa ya too ed sika? 

Joh 8:11 Et sikato inkuan to, Angapo, Katawan. Et si Jesus inkuan to Angan siak ag ta ka dusaen: onlaka la; manlapu'd natan ag ka la mankakasalanan. 

Joh 8:12 Kanian si Jesus nansalita lamet ed sikara, a kuan to, Siak so silew na mundo: say ontombok ed siak ag manakar ed kabilungtan, balet wala ed sikato so silew na bilay. 

Joh 8:13 kanian saray Fariseos inkuan da 

Joh 8:14 Inmebat si Jesus tan inkuan to ed sikara, Angan tasian ko so inkasiak, say tasik sikato'y tua; ta amtak no iner so nanlapuan ko, ono iner so laen ko; balet sikayo ag yo amta no iner so panlapuan ko, ono iner so laen ko. 

Joh 8:15 Sikayo mangokom kayo unong ed laman; siak angapo'y okomenko'n too. 

Joh 8:16 On, et no mangokom ak, say panangokom ko sikato'y tua; ta agko bokbokor, noag siak tan say Ama ya angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 8:17 On, tan dia ed gangan yo nisulat, a say pantasi na duara'n too sikato so tua. 

Joh 8:18 Siak tasian ko so inkasiak, tan say Ama ya angibaki dia ed siak tasian to ak. 

Joh 8:19 Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Iner so kawalaan na Amam? Inmebat si Jesus, Sikayo ag yo ak kabat angan si Amak: no akabatan yo ak, akabatan yo met komon si Amak. 

Joh 8:20 Sarayan salita binalikas to dia ed panangisimpenan na kayamanan, nen nanbangat dia ed templo: et an-gapo so too ya angerel ed sikato; ta ag ni asabi horas to. 

Joh 8:21 Kanian inkuan to lamet ed sikara, Onla ak la et anapen yo ak et ompatey kayo ed kasalanan yo: diman ed laen ko ag yo nayarian so onla. 

Joh 8:22 Kanian saray Judios inkuan da, Pateyen to kasi so laman to, ta kuan to, No ined so laen ko, ag yo nayarian so onla? 

Joh 8:23 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Sikayo nanlapu kayo ed leksag; siak nanlapu ak ed tagey: taga dia kayo ed saya'n mundo; siak agak taga dia ed saya'n mundo. 

Joh 8:24 Kanian inkuan ko ed sikayo, ya ompatey kayo ed saray kasalanan yo; ta no ag yo sisiaen a siak (Cristo,) ompatey kayo ed saray kasalanan yo. 

Joh 8:25 Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Siopa ka ta? Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Saman lanlamang so inkuan ko ed sikayo nanlapu ed gapo. 

Joh 8:26 Walaan ak na amayamay a bengatla'n salitaen tan okomen nipaakar ed sikayo: bangbalet say angibaki dia ed siak sikato so tua; et saray bengatla'n nadngel ko a nanlapu ed sikato, saraya so salitaen ko ed mundo. 

Joh 8:27 Sikara agda atalosan ya sinalita to ed sikara so nipaakar ed Ama. 

Joh 8:28 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Sano inpaalage'yo la so Anak na too, saman la nakabatan yo a siak iman, tan angapo so gawaen ko ed inkasiak, noag onong na inbangat na Ama ed siak, salitaen ko so saraya'n bengatla. 

Joh 8:29 Et say angibaki dia ed siak wala ed siak; agto ak pinaulian a manbokbokor; ta gawaen ko lawas so saray bengatla a makapaliket ed sikato. 

Joh 8:30 Legan na inpansalita to na sarayan bengatla, amayamay so anisia ed sikato. 

Joh 8:31 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to ed saraman so Judios ya anisia ed sikato, No mansiansia kayo ed salitak, sirin petepeteg a sikayo so babangatan ko; 

Joh 8:32 Et nakabatan yo so katuaan, et say katuaan sikayo so gawaen to a bolos. 

Joh 8:33 Inmebat ira ed sikato, Sikami poli kami nen Abraham, tan ag kami inpaaripen a balot ed siopaman a too: panon so pangibagam, nagawa kayo a bolos? 

Joh 8:34 Inebatan ira nen Jesus, Tua, tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Balang sakey a mangawa na kasalanan sikato so aripen na kasalanan. 

Joh 8:35 Tan say aripen ag manayam ed abung lawas: say anak manayam lawas. 

Joh 8:36 Kanian no say Anak gawaen to kayo'n bolos, sikayo so peteg ya bolos naani. 

Joh 8:37 Amtak ya poli kayo nen Abraham; angan on tan ya seseetan yo ak a pateyen, nisengeg ed say salitak ag onopot ed sikayo. 

Joh 8:38 Salitaen ko so saray bengatla ya anengneng ko ed Amak: et sikayo met gawaen yo so saray bengatla a nadngel yo ed ama yo. 

Joh 8:39 Inmebat ira, tan inkuan da ed sikato, Say ama mi si Abraham. Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, No ana' kayo nen Abraham, gawaen yo komon so saray gawa nen Abraham. 

Joh 8:40 Balet natan seseetan yo ak a pateyen, anta sakey ak a too ya angibaga ed sikayo na katuaan, ya nadngel ko ed Dios: saya ag ginawa nen Abraham. 

Joh 8:41 Sikayo gawaen yo so saray gawa na ama yo. Sikara inkuan da ed sikato, Sikami ag kami nianak ed inpilawan; wala so sakey ya Ama mi, salanti Dios. 

Joh 8:42 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, No saya Dios so Ama yo, aroen yo ak komon: lapu ed pinmaway ak tan nanlapu ak ed Dios; ta agak nanlapu ed inkasiak, noag say inbaki to ak. 

Joh 8:43 Akin et ag yo natalosan so salitak? Salanti lapu'd ag yo nayarian a dengelen so salitak. 

Joh 8:44 Sikayo kien kayo na amayo ya diablo, et saray kalikaliktan nen ama yo sikato so labay yo a gawaen. Sikato so akapatey nanlapu ed gapo, tan ag tinmalindeg ed katuaan, ta angapo ed inkasikato so katuaan. Bangno mansalita na tila, mansalita nipaakar ed kayarian to: ta sikato matila, tan ama na tila. 

Joh 8:45 Ingen lapu ed ibagak so katuaan, ag yo ak sisiaen. 

Joh 8:46 Siopa ed sikayo so makapangipatnag ya nankasalanan ak? No ibagak so katuaan, akin et ag yo ak sisiaen? 

Joh 8:47 Say kayarian na Dios dengelen to so saray salita na Dios: lapu ed saya ag yo ra dengelen, nisengeg ed ag kayo kayarian na Dios. 

Joh 8:48 Saray Judios inmebat ira tan inkuan da ed sikato, Ag kasi maong so pankuan mi ya sakey ka a Samaritano, tan walaan ka na demo nio? 

Joh 8:49 Si Jesus inmebat, Angapo so demonio ed siak; ingen pagalangan ko so Amak, et sikayo ibabaing yo ak. 

Joh 8:50 Balet ag ko anapen so galang ko a dili: wala so sakey a manganap, tan mangokom. 

Joh 8:51 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, No say sakey a too onoren to so salitak, sikato ag to nanengneng so ipapatey angan kapigan. 

Joh 8:52 Saray Judios inkuan da ed sikato, Natan amta mi ya walaan ka na demonio. Si Abraham inatey, tan saray prof etas; et kuan mo, No sakey a too onoren to so salitak, ag to natawayan so ipapatey angan kapigan. 

Joh 8:53 Babaleg ka ta nen si ama mi'n Abraham, a sikato inatey? tan saray profetas inaatey ira; siopa so pangipasenan mo na inkasika? 

Joh 8:54 Si Jesus inmebat, No dayewen ko so inkasiak, say dayew ko andikakanaan; say Amak so mangidayew ed siak: saman so kuan yo a sikato so Dios yo; 

Joh 8:55 Et sikato so ag yo akabatan; ingen sikato so kabat ko; et no kuan ko, Sikato so ag ko kabat, mipadparaak komon ed sikayo, a matitila: balet sikato so kabat ko, tan onoren ko so salita to. 

Joh 8:56 Si ama yo'n Abraham nangayaga'n akanengneng ed agew ko; et anengneng to, tan nanliket. 

Joh 8:57 Kanian saray Judios inkuan da ed sikato, Sika angapo ni limamplon taon mo, et anengneng mo si Abraham? 

Joh 8:58 Inkuan nen Jesus ed sikara, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Nen ag ni nianak si Abraham, wala ak la. 

Joh 8:59 Kanian nandemet ira na batobato ya itupak da ed sikato: balet si Jesus sinmanib, tan pinmaway ed templo. 



Joh 9:1 Et nen onlalabas, anengneng to so sakey a too'n bulag nanlapu'd inkianak to. 

Joh 9:2 Et tinepet na saray babangatan to ed sikato, a kuan da, Rabbi, siopa so nankasalanan, saya'n too, ono saray ateng to, kanian sikato so nianak a bulag? 

Joh 9:3 Si Jesus inmebat, Ag nankasalanan so saya'n too, angan saray ateng to: ingen pian saray gawa na Dios nipatnag ira ed sikato. 

Joh 9:4 Nakaokolan tayo'n gawaen so saray kimoy na angibakidia ed siak, leleg ya agew ni: say labi onsabi, sano angapo lay too a makapankimey. 

Joh 9:5 Angad wadia ak ed mundo, siak so silew na mundo. 

Joh 9:6 Nen kapansalita to na ontan, linmup da ed dalin, et nangawa na pitek ed saman so lupda, tan kinapolan to so matamata to na pitek, 

Joh 9:7 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Onlaka, mandilamos ka ed tangke na Siloe (a kabaliksan to no ipatalos, Inbaki). Kanian tinmainan, tan nandilamos, et pinmawil a makanengneng. 

Joh 9:8 Kanian saray kaababay, tan saray akanengneng ed sikato nensaman, ya mipapayabol inkuan da, Aliwa ta a sikato ya 'man so nanyurong ya akipabpayabol? 

Joh 9:9 Saray arum inkuan da, Sikato ya'man: saray arum inkuan da,' Andi ingen kapadpara to. Sikato inkuan to, Siak iman.

Joh 9:10 Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Panon sirin so inkalukasan na saray matam? 

Joh 9:11 Sikato inmebat, Say too a man ngaran na Jesus nangawa na pitek, tan kinapolan to so saray matak tan inkuan to ed siak, Onla ka ed Siloe, tan mandilamos ka: kanian linma ak tan nandilamos ak, et inawat ko so pakanengneng. 

Joh 9:12 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Ined so kawalaan to? Sikato kuan to, Ag ko amta. 

Joh 9:13 Inyakar da ed saray Fariseos so bulag nensaman. 

Joh 9:14 Et agew a sabaton nen ginawa nen Jesus so pitek, tan linuksan to 'ray mata to. 

Joh 9:15 Kanian saray Fariseos tinepet da lamet ed sikato no panon so inpangawa'to na pakanengneng to. Et sikato inkuan to ed sikara, Sikato'y angyan na pitek ed saray matak; tan nandilamos ak, et akanengneng ak la. 

Joh 9:16 Kanian saray arum ed saray Fariseos inkuan da, Saya'n too ag nan-lapu ed Dios, lapu ed ag to ngilinan so sabaton. Balet saray arum inkuan da, Panon so pakayari sakey a too'n managkasalanan a mangawa na onia'ra a tanda? Et agawa so supiatan ed sikara. 

Joh 9:17 Kanian inkuan da lamet ed saman so bulag wari, Anto so kuan mo nipaakar ed sikato, dia ed inpangilukas to ed saray matam? Et inkuan to, Sikato so sakey a profeta. 

Joh 9:18 Kanian saray Judios ag ira anisia nipaakar ed sikato, a bulag nensaman tan inawa'to so pakanengneng to, anga ed tinawag da so saray ateng na saman so angawat na pakanengneng, 

Joh 9:19 Tan tinepet da ed sikara, a kuan da, Sikato ta ya so anak yo, ya kuan yo a nianak a bulag? panon so pakanengneng to sirin natan? 

Joh 9:20 Saray ateng to inmebat ira tan inkuan da, Amta mi a saya sikato so anak mi, tan nianak a bulag: 

Joh 9:21 Ingen no panon so pakanengneng to natan, ag mi amta; ono no siopa so angilukas na mata to'ra, ag mi amta: tepet yo ed sikato; sikato so mataon la; isalitaan to so inkasikato. 

Joh 9:22 Saraya'n bengatla so inkuan na ateng to lapu ed tinakotan da so saray Judios: ta saray Judios nannononongan da la, ya no say siopaman a too et ipatua to a sikato man si Cristo, sikato'y papawayen ed sinagoga. 

Joh 9:23 Kanian inkuan na saray ateng to, Sikato so mataon la; tepet yo ed sikato. 

Joh 9:24 Kanian tinawag da a pidua so too ya bulag wari, et inkuan da ed sikato, Pagalangan mo so Dios: sikami amta mi ya saya'n too managkasalanan. 

Joh 9:25 Kanian inmebat, No sikato kasi managkasalanan, ag ko amta: sakey a bengatla so amtak, ya, unong a bulag ak nen saman, natan makanengneng ak. 

Joh 9:26 Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Anto'y ginawa to ed sika? pano'y inpangilukas to ed saray matam? 

Joh 9:27 Inmebat ed sikara, Inbagak lanti ed sikayo natan, et ag yo dinengel: akin et laba'yo lamet a dengelen? laba'yo ta met so magmaliw a babangatan to? 

Joh 9:28 Et sikato so pinabaingan da, tan inkuan da, Sika so babangatan to; balet sikami babangatan kami nen Moises. 

Joh 9:29 Sikami amta mi ya say Dios akisalita ed Moises: balet nipaakar ed saya a too, ag mi amta so ined so lapuan to. 

Joh 9:30 Say too inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Dia lanti, ed saya so kawalaan na makapakelaw, ta ag yo amta no ined so lapuan to, et angan ontan nilukasan to so saray matak. 

Joh 9:31 Amta tayo a say Dios ag to dengelen so saray managkasalanan: ingen no siopaman a too sikato so manangigalang ed Dios, tan gawaen to so linawa to, sikato so dengelen to. 

Joh 9:32 Nanlapu ed in gap o na mundo ag nadnadngelan angan kapigan ya wala so sakey ya angilukas na saray mata na sakey a too a nianak a bulag. 

Joh 9:33 No saya'n too ag nanlapu ed Dios, angapo komon so ayarian to a gawaen. 

Joh 9:34 Inmebat ira tan inkuan da ed sikato, Sika niana'ka a sigpot ed saray kasalanan, et ibangat mo kami? Et sikato so pinapaway da. 

Joh 9:35 Nadngelan nen Jesus a sikato so pinapaway da; et sanen aromog to, inkuan nen Jesus, Manisia ka ed Anak na Dios? 

Joh 9:36 Sikato inmebat tan inkuan to, Et siopa ta, Katawan, pian manisia ak ed sikato? 

Joh 9:37 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Sika anengneng mo la, tan sikato so misasalita ed sika. 

Joh 9:38 Et inkuan to, Katawan, manisia ak. Et angigalang ed sikato. 

Joh 9:39 Et si Jesus inkuan to, Nisengeg ed pangokom linmaak dia ed mundo, pian saray ag makanengneng makanengneng ira; tan saray makanengneng magmaliw ira'n bulag. 

Joh 9:40 Saraman so Fariseos ya wala ed sikato nadngel da so saraya a bengatla, et inkuan da ed sikato, Bulag kami ta met?

Joh 9:41 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, No komon ta bulag kayo, angapo komon so kasalanan yo: balet natan kuan yo, Makanengneng kami: say kasalanan yo mansiansia. 



Joh 10:1 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say ag onloob ed pinto na panangipokokan ed saray carnero, ingen onkalab ed sananey a dalan, sikato lanlamang so matakew tan tulisan, 

Joh 10:2 Balet say onloob ed pinto sikato so pastor na saray carnero. 

Joh 10:3 Sikato so ilukasan na bantay pinto; tan saray carnero dengelen da so voces to: et tawagen to so saray carnero to ed dilin ngaran da, tan sikara so ipaway to. 

Joh 10:4 Et sano nipaway to so amin a kien to, sikato'y onla ed onaan da, et saray carnero sikato'y tomboken da: ta sikara kabat da so voces to. 

Joh 10:5 Et ag da tomboken so sankaili, ingen sikato'y ibatikan da: ta agda kabat so voces na saray sankaili. 

Joh 10:6 Saya'n alimbawa sinalita nen Jesus ed sikara: balet ag da atalosan no anto a bengabengatla so sinalita to ed sikara. 

Joh 10:7 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara lamet, Tua, tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Siak so pinto no saray carnero. 

Joh 10:8 Amin so saray sinmabi ya akaona nen siak matakew tan tulisan ira. ingen sikara so ag dinengel na saray carnero. 

Joh 10:9 Siak so pinto: no wala'y onloob ed siak, sikato so nilaban, tan sikato'y onloob tan onpaway naani, tan makaromog na panangipakanan. 

Joh 10:10 Say matakew ag onla, no agpian makapantakew, tan manpatey, tan mamagbag: siak linma ak dia pian nawalaan ira na bilay, tan nawalaan ira na daakan. 

Joh 10:11 Siak so maong a pastor: say maong a pastor italaga to so bilay to nipaakar ed saray carnero. 

Joh 10:12 Say mioupa, ya aliwa'n pastor, ya ag to kayarian so saray carnero, nanengneng to so lobo a yala, tan tainan to so saray carnero, tan onbatik, et sikara so sibaren na lobo, tan buybuyaken to ra: 

Joh 10:13 Sikato'y onbatik lapu'd sikato so mioupa, tan agmangkawanan ed saray carnero. 

Joh 10:14 Siak so maong a pastor; et kabat ko so saray kayarian ko, tan saray kayarian ko kabat da ak, 

Joh 10:15 Salanti unong a say Ama kabat to ak, tan siak kabat ko so Ama; et italagak so bilay ko nipaakar ed saray carnero.

Joh 10:16 Et wala ni ray arum a carneroc, ya ag ira taga dia ed saya a panangipokokan: kaokolan ya awiten ko ra met, et dengelen da so voces ko; et magmaliw ira'n saksakey a polok, saksakey ya pastor. 

Joh 10:17 Kanian aroen to ak nen Ama, lapu'd ited ko so bilay ko, pian sikato'y alaen ko lamet. 

Joh 10:18 Angapo so mangekal ed siak na bilay ko, ingen sikato so iter ko manlapu ed inkasiak. Wala'y pakayarik ya mangited na bilay ko, tan wala so pakayarik a mangala lamet ed sikato Saya'n gangan inawat ko ed Amak. 

Joh 10:19 Agawa lamet so sakey a supiatan ed saray Judios nisengeg ed saraya'n salita. 

Joh 10:20 Et amayamay ed sikara inkuan da, Sikato so walaan na demonio, tan makulangkulang; akin et sikato'y dengelen yo? 

Joh 10:21 Saray arum inkuan da, Saraya ag ira salita na aselepan na demonio, Nayarian ta na demonio so mangilukas na saray mata na bulag? 

Joh 10:22 Et fiesta na panangyapay ne saman ed Jerusalem: 

Joh 10:23 Et panaon na ambetel ed saman; et si Jesus manaakar nensaman ed loob na templo ed pinto nen Salomoi 

Joh 10:24 Kanian saray Judios sikato so liniktob da, tan inkuan da ed sikato, Kaonongan kabayag so panpaduruam ed sikami? No sika si Cristo, ibagam a malinew ed sikami. 

Joh 10:25 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, Inbagak ed sikayo, et ag kayo manisia: saray gawa a gawaen ko ed ngaran nen Amak, sikara ya so mantasi ed siak. 

Joh 10:26 Balet ag kayo manisia, ta aliwa kayo a kaiba na saray carnerok. 

Joh 10:27 Saray carnerok dengelen da voces ko, et kabat ko ra, tan ontombok ira ed siak: 

Joh 10:28 Et iter ko ed sikara so maando a bilay; et ag ira natawtaw ang kapigan, tan angapo so manamss ed sikara ed limak. 

Joh 10:29 Si Amak, ya angiter ed sikara ed siak, sikato so balbaleg nen amin; et angapo so makayari'n manamsam ed sikara ed lima na Ama. 

Joh 10:30 Siak tan say Ama saksakey kami. 

Joh 10:31 Saray Judios nandokdok ira na batobato a panupak da ed sikato lamet. 

Joh 10:32 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, Amayamay a maong a gawa so inparong-tal ko ed sikayo a nanlapu ed Ama; dinan ed saratan a gawa so makasengeg na panupakan yo ed siak? 

Joh 10:33 Saray Judios inmebat ira ed sikato, Ag mi ka tupaken nisengeg ed maong a gawa, ingen lapu ed salita a mabanday; tan lapu ed sika, anta too ka, gawaen mo so inkasika a Dios. 

Joh 10:34 Si Jesus inebatan to ra, Ag ta nisulat ed gangan yo Inkuan ko, Sikayo dirios kayo? 

Joh 10:35 No sikato inngaran to ra a dirios so saray, sinabian na salita na Dios (tan say sulat ag nayari'n sumlangen), 

Joh 10:36 Ikuan yo ed saya so pinasantos tan inbaki nen Ama dia ed mundo, Sika mansalita ka na mabanday; nisengeg ed inkuan ko, Siak so Anak na Dios? 

Joh 10:37 No ag ko gawaen so saray gawa nen Amak, ag yo ak sisiaen. 

Joh 10:38 Balet no sikara so gawaen ko, angan ag yo ak sisiaen, sisiaen yo so saray gawa: pian nakabatan yo tan natalosan yo ya say Ama wala ed siak, tan siak wala ak ed Ama. 

Joh 10:39 Sikato so sineetan da lamet ya erelen: et sikato so linmokpos ed lima ra. 

Joh 10:40 Et linma lamet ed labas na Jordan ed pasen a kawalaan nen Juan nen inmona ya aminbinyag; tan nanayam diman.

Joh 10:41 Et amayamay so dinmago ed sikato; tan inkuan da, Si Juan peteg ya ag nagawa na tanda: balet ami bengabengatla'n sinalita nen Juan nipaakar ed saya'n too sikara so tua, 

Joh 10:42 Et amayamay so anisia ed sikato'd man. 



Joh 11:1 Wala nensaman so sakey a too ya asakitan, si Lazaro a taga Betania, ed baley nen Maria tan si agi to a Marta. 

Joh 11:2 Tan sikato man si Maria ya amoyok ed Katawan na unguento, tan pinonasan to so saray sali nen Jesus ed saray buek to, a say agi to a Lazaro asakitan. 

Joh 11:3 Kanian saray agagi to a bibii nanbaki ra ed sikato, a kuan da, Katawan, nia, saman so inararon agmakayari. 

Joh 11:4 Balet sanen nadngelan nen Jesus, inkuan to, Saya a sakit ag nipaakar ed patey, ingen nipaakar ed kirayewan na Dios, pian say Anak na Dios narayew ed satan. 

Joh 11:5 Bang si Jesus inaro to si Marta, tan say agi to, tan si Lazaro. 

Joh 11:6 Kanian sanen nadngelan to ya agmakayari, nanayam ed saman a panaon a duay agew ed pasen a kawalaan to. 

Joh 11:7 Insan kayari saya, kuan to ed saray babangatan, Onla itayo ed Judea lamet. 

Joh 11:8 Saray babangatan kuan da ed sikato, Rabbi, saray Judios wala'ra natan a toloy a manaanap a manupak ed sika; et onlakad man lamet? 

Joh 11:9 Inmebat si Jesus, Ag ta labindua ya horas so wala ed san-agew? No say too manakar ed agew, agnagapol lapu'd nanengneng to so liwawa na saya'n mundo. 

Joh 11:10 Balet no say too manakar ed labi, nagapol, lapu'd say liwawa andi ed sikato. 

Joh 11:11 Saraya'n bengatla so sinalita to: tan kayari saya kuan to ed sikara, Si kaaro tayo'n Lazaro naugip; ingen onla ak, pian sikato so liingen ko ed ugip. 

Joh 11:12 Kanian saray babangatan inkuan da ed sikato, Katawan, no naugip, onbangon naani. 

Joh 11:13 Bang si Jesus sinalita to so nipaakar ed inpatey nen Lazaro: balet inisip da'n sinalita to so panagpainawa ed ugip. 

Joh 11:14 Kanian saman la inkuan nen Jesus ed sikara ed maliwawa, Si Lazaro inatey. 

Joh 11:15 Et maliket ak nisengeg ed sikayo ya andi ak nensaman diman, pian manisia kayo; angaman on tan onla itayo ed sikato. 

Joh 11:16 Kanian si Tomas, ya inngaran na Didimo, inkuan to ed saray iba to a babangatan, Onla itayo met, pian onpatey itayo a midamay ed sikato. 

Joh 11:17 Dia ed ontan sanen sinmabi Jesus, sikato so aromog to ya apat agew la ed lobok. 

Joh 11:18 Bang say Betania asinger ed Jerusalem, singa labinlima ya estadios; 

Joh 11:19 Ed dakel ed saray Judios so linma ed Marta tan Maria, pian ligliwaen da'ra nipaakar ed agi ra. 

Joh 11:20 Kanian sanen akabatan nen Marta a niala si Jesus, linma tan inmabet ed sikato: si Maria balet atilak ed abung ya akayorong. 

Joh 11:21 Inkuan ed satan nen Marta ed Jesus, Katawan, no komon ta wadia ka, ag inatey si agik. 

Joh 11:22 Et angan natan amtak, ya angan anto a kerewen mo ed Dios, say Dios iter to ed sika. 

Joh 11:23 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Si agim onoli ed bilay. 

Joh 11:24 Kuan nen Marta ed sikato, Amtak ya onoli ed bilay sano kioli ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 11:25 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Siak so kiolian, tan say bilay: say manisia ed siak, angan inatey la nabilay ni: 

Joh 11:26 Tan siopa man a manbilay tan manisia ed siak ag balot ompatey. Sisiaen mo ya? 

Joh 11:27 Kuanto ed sikato, On, Katawan: Siak sinisiak ya sika so Cristo, ya Anak na Dios, salanti onsabi dia ed mundo. 

Joh 11:28 Et sanen nikuan to so say a, tinmainan, tan tinawag to si Maria ya agi to ed maamot, a kuan to, Say Manag bangat wadia, et tatawagen to ka. 

Joh 11:29 Et sikato, nen nadngelan to, inmalagey a maganganat, tan linma ed sikato. 

Joh 11:30 (Bang si Jesus ag ni sinmabi ed baley, ingen wadman ni ed pasen ya akabetan nen Marta ed sikato.) 

Joh 11:31 Saray Judios ed satan ya walarad sikato ed abung, tan manliligliwa ed sikato, sanen anengneng da'y Maria, ya inmalagey a maganganat tan pinmaway, tinmombok ira ed sikato ya inisip da ya onla ed lobok a mannangis diman. 

Joh 11:32 Si Maria ed satan, sanen akasabi ed kawalaan nen Jesus, tan sikato'y anengneng to, dinmakmomo ed saray sali to, a kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, no wadia ka komon, say agik ag inatey. 

Joh 11:33 Kanian nen anengneng nen Jesus a sikato so mannangis, tan saray Judios met ya akila ed sikato a mannangis, nan-ingel si Jesus ed espiritu tan agonigon, 

Joh 11:34 Tan inkuan to, Ined so anginan yo ed sikato? Sikara kuan da ed sikato, Katawan, gala tan nengneng mo. 

Joh 11:35 Si Jesus nannangis. 

Joh 11:36 Kanian saray Judios inkuan da, Nengneng yo, agay la so inpangararo to ed sikato! 

Joh 11:37 Balet saray arum ed sikara inkuan da, Ag ta ayarian na saya'n too, ya angilukas na saray mata na saman so bulag, a ginawa to a saya'n too ag komon inatey? 

Joh 11:38 Si Jesus nen naningel lamet ed satan ed inkasikato onsabi ed lobok. Bang saya sakey ya ongib, tan wala so sakey a bato ya impasaral ed sikato. 

Joh 11:39 Si Jesus kuan to, Ekal yo so bato. Si Marta, agi to n ma'y inatey, kuan to ed Jesus, Katawan, natan say bankay abolok la: ta apat agew la ya inatey. 

Joh 11:40 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Ag ko ta inkuan ed sika, ya no manisia ka, nanengneng mo so gloria na Dios? 

Joh 11:41 Kanian inekal da so bato. Et si Jesus intangay to so saray mata to, tan inkuan to, Araa, misalamatak ed sika ta dinengel mo ak. 

Joh 11:42 Tan amtak ya sika dengelen mo ak lawas: ingen nisengeg ed katooan ya akaalagey ed liberliber sikato so inkuan ko, pian manisia ra ya sika inbaki mo ak. 

Joh 11:43 Et nen capansalita to na ontan, inmingal na macsil a voces, Lazaro, paway ka. 

Joh 11:44 Saman so inatey pinmaway, ya apotipotan so saray lima tan saray sali to na saray berber ya abel; tan say lupa to apotipotan na sakey a ules. Kuan nen Jesus ed sikara, Okbaran yo, tan paulian yo. 

Joh 11:45 Kanian amayamay ed saray Judios, a linma ed Maria tan akanengneng na ginawa nen Jesus, anisia'ra ed sikato. 

Joh 11:46 Bang saray arum balet ed sikara linma ra ed saray Fariseos, tan inbaga ra ed sikara so saray bengatla a ginawa nen Jesus. 

Joh 11:47 Saray manona a sacerdotes ed satan tan saray Fariseos tinipon da so sakey a singbatan, et inkuan da, Anto so gawaen tayo? ta saya'n too mangawa na amayamay a tanda. 

Joh 11:48 No sikato so paulian tayo labat ya ontan, amin day totoo manisia naani ed sikato; et saray taga Roma onsabi ra et ekalen da so pasen tayo tan say nacion tayo. 

Joh 11:49 Balet sakey ed sikara, si Caifas, a sikato so peles a katageyan a sacerdote ed saman a taon, inkuan to ed sikara, Angapo'n balot so amta yo, 

Joh 11:50 Ag yo met nanonotan a makana ed sikayo ya sakey a too so ompatey nipaakar ed saray katooan, tan pian say sankanacionan ag natawtaw. 

Joh 11:51 Bang saya ag to inbaga nanlapu ed inkasika to: ingen bangta sikato so katageyan a sacerdote ed saman a taon, inprofetan to a si Jesus nakaokolan ya onpatey nipaakar ed nacion: 

Joh 11:52 Tan ag nipaakar ed nacion lanbengat, no ag pian natipon to met ed saksakey so saray anak na Dios a nikaykayat. 

Joh 11:53 Kanian nanlapu ed saman ya agew nansisingbat ira pian yanda si Jesus ed ipapatey. 

Joh 11:54 Si Jesus ed satan agla nanakar a maparongtal ed pegley na saray Judios, no ag say tinmainan diman a linma ed dalin ya asinger ed lawak, ed sakey a ciudad a manngaran na Efraim; et nanayam diman pati saray babangatan to. 

Joh 11:55 Bang say pasko na saray Judios asinger la: et amayamay so tinmatdang ed Jerusalem a manlapu ed saman a dalin ed arapen na pasko, pian ma ngogol ira. 

Joh 11:56 Inanap da ed satan si Jesus, tan nan sasalita so sakey tan sakey, nen nanalagey ira ed templo, Anto so isisip yo? Ya ag kasi onla dia ed fiesta? 

Joh 11:57 Bang saray manona a sacerdotes tan saray Fariseos angited ira na gangan, ya, no amta na siopa man a too so kawalaan to, sikato'y itoro to, pian naerel da. 



Joh 12:1 Si Jesus ed satan sinmabi ed Betania nen anem agew ed arapen na pasko, ed kawalaan nen Lazaro nensaman, a pinaoli ed bilay nen Jesus ed saray inaatey. 

Joh 12:2 Dia ed ontan sikato so ingawaan da na pangdeman diman: et si Marta nanservi; si Lazaro balet sakey ed saray akirongo ed sikato ed panan ganan. 

Joh 12:3 Si Maria angala ed satan na sakey a libra ya unguento a nardo, a mabmabli, et pinoyokan to so saray sali nen Jesus, tan pinunasan to so saray sali to ed buek to: et say abung napno ed balingit na unguento. 

Joh 12:4 Balet si Judas Iscariote, sakey ed saray babangatan to, a mangyawat ed sikato, inkuan to, 

Joh 12:5 Akin et ag inlako so saya'n unguento ed talonlasus a denarios, tan inter ed saray duruka? 

Joh 12:6 Bang saya inkuan to, aliwan lapu'd panangimaton to ed duruka; noag lapu'd sikato'y matakew, tan lapu'd wala ed sikato so supot inala to so inpepelag diman. 

Joh 12:7 Si Jesus ed satan inkuan to, Paulian mo pian sikatoy yatol to nipaakar ed agew na ponpon ko. 

Joh 12:8 Ta saray duruka walaran naynay ed sikayo; balet andi ak a naynay ed sikayo. 

Joh 12:9 Saray totoo'n karaklan ed saray Judios ed satan akabatan da a sikato so wadman: et linma ra ag nisengeg ed Jesus labat, no ag pian naneng-neng da si Lazaro met, pinaoli to ed saray inaatey. 

Joh 12:10 Balet saray manona a sacerdotes nansisingbat ira pian napapatey da met si Lazaro; 

Joh 12:11 Ta nisengeg ed sikato amayamay ed saray Judios so sinmian, tan anisia ra ed Jesus. 

Joh 12:12 Dia ed kaimbuasan sakey a baleg a karakel na katooan a linma ed fiesta nen nadngelan da ya onsabi Jesus ed Jerusalem. 

Joh 12:13 Angala ra na sangasanga na kiew na palma, tan pinmaway ira'n onabet ed sikato, tan inbeliaw da, Hosanna: Bendito so onladia ed ngaran na Katawan, salanti say Ari na Israel.
