Joh 12:14 Et si Jesus, nen akaromog na sakey a kilaw ya asno, nankabayo ed saman; onong na nisulat, 

Joh 12:15 Ag ka antakot, anak a bii na Zion: nia, say Arim onsabi, a raangabkabayo ed sakey a kilaw na asna. 

Joh 12:16 Sarayan bengatla ag atalosan na saray babangatan to nen ona: balet sanen nitandoro si Jesus, saman la anonotan da a saraya'n bengatla nisulat nipaakar ed sikato, tan ginawa ra so saraya'n bengatla ed sikato. 

Joh 12:17 Kanian saray katooan ya iba nen Jesus nen tinawag to si Lazaro ed lobok, tan sikato so pinaoli to ed saray inaatey, tinasian da. 

Joh 12:18 Lapu met ed saya saray karaklan linma ra tan inmabet ira ed sikato, lapu'd saman a nadngelan da'n ginawa to so sayan tanda. 

Joh 12:19 Kanian saray Fariseos inkuan da ed inkasikara, Nengnengen yo ya angapo so panaegan yo; nia, say mundo tinmombok ed sikato. 

Joh 12:20 Wala nen saman so pigaran Griegos ed saray tinmatdang a mangigalang ed fiesta: 

Joh 12:21 Kanian saraya linmara ed Felipe, a taga Betsaida a Galilea, tan akikasira ed sikato, a kuan da, Katawan, labay mi komon a nanengneng si Jesus. 

Joh 12:22 Si Felipe onla tan ibaga to ed Andres, si Andres, tan si Felipe, ibagara ed Jesus. 

Joh 12:23 Et si Jesus ebatan to ra a kuan to, Say horas sinmabi la, a say Anak na too nitandoro. 

Joh 12:24 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, No say bokel na trigo ag napelag ed dalin tan ag ompatey, sikato so mansiansia ed inkasikato a bokor, balet no ompatey, manbunga'y dakel. 

Joh 12:25 Say mangaro na bilay to sikato so nabalang to, et say mangula ha bilay to ed saya'n mundo sikato so yatol to anga ed bilay a maando. 

Joh 12:26 No siopaman a too manlinkor ed siak, ontombok ed siak; et no ined so kawalaan ko, manayam met diman so aripen ko: no siopaman a too manlinkor ed siak, sikato so pagalangan na Ama naani. 

Joh 12:27 Natan say kamareruak agonigon; et anto so ikuan ko? Ama, ilaban moak ed sayan horas. Balet nisengeg ed saya sinmabiak ed sayan horas. 

Joh 12:28 Ama, pagloriaen moy ngaran mo. Kanian sinmabi sakey a voces a nanlapu ed tawen, a kuan to, Sikato so pinagloriak, tan sikatoy pagloriaen ko lamet. 

Joh 12:29 Kanian say karaklan a manalalagey diman, tan sikato so nadngel da inkuan da a kinmarol; saray arum inkuan da, Sake'ya angel so akisalita ed sikato. 

Joh 12:30 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to, Saya'n voces ag sinmabi nisengeg ed siak, ingen nisengeg ed sikayo. 

Joh 12:31 Natan so panangokom ed saya'n mundo: natan say principe na saya'n mundo nibantak. 

Joh 12:32 Et siak, no nipalageyak a manlapu ed dalin, aguaten ko naani amin a totoo anga ed inkasiak. 

Joh 12:33 Ingen saya inkuan to, ya ipatalos to no anto a nengneng na ipapa-tey so pateyan to. 

Joh 12:34 Kanian saray karaklan inmebat ed sikato, Sikami nadngelan mi ed gangan ya say Cristo mansiansia lawas: et panon so pangikuan mo, Say Anak na too kaokolan a nipatagey? siopa so saya'n Anak na too? 

Joh 12:35 Si Jesus ed satan inkuan to ed sikara, Wala ni daiset a panayam na silew ed nanleleetan yo. Manakar kayo ambegyan wala so silew ed sikayo, pian agkayo naabot na kabilongetan: et say manakar ed kabilungetan ag to amta no iner so laen to. 

Joh 12:36 Ambegya ya wala so silew yo, manisia kayo ed silew, pian makapagmaliw kayon anak na silew. Sarayan bengatla sinalita nen Jesus, tan tinmainan tan inyamotan to ra. 

Joh 12:37 Balet angan nangawa na amayamay a tanda ed arapan da, agni ra anisia ed sikato; 

Joh 12:38 Pian nasumpal so salita nen Isaias a prof eta, a kuan to, Katawan, siopa so anisia ed inbalita mi? Tan siopa so nipuyanan na taklay na Katawan? 

Joh 12:39 Nisengeg ed saya ag ira akapanisia, ta si Isaias inkuan to lamet, 

Joh 12:40 Sikato binulag to so saray mata ra, tan pinaawe'to so puso ra; Ompan makanengneng ira ed saray mata ra, tan makatalos ira ed puso ra, Et manpataoli ra, Et paabigen ko'ra. 

Joh 12:41 Saraya'n bengatla sinalita nen Isaias, lapu'd anengneng to so gloria to; tan nansalita na nipaakar ed sikato. 

Joh 12:42 Angaman ontan angan saray mamakauley amayamay so anisia ed sikato; ingen nisengeg ed saray Fariseos sikatoy ag da inpatua, ompan napapaway ira ed sinagoga: 

Joh 12:43 Ta inaro ra so dayew na totoo a nagkalalo nen say dayew na Dios. 

Joh 12:44 Et si Jesus inmingal tan inkuan to, Say manisia ed siak, aliwa a siak so sisiaen to, no ag say angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 12:45 Et say makanengneng ed siak, nanengneng to so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 12:46 Siak sinmabi ak a silew dia ed mundo, pian say siopaman a manisia ed siak ag mansiansia ed kabilungtan. 

Joh 12:47 Et no siopaman ya ondengel ed saray salitak, et ag to ra onoren, sikatoy ag ko okomen: ta agak linmadia'n mangokom na mundo, no ag mangilaban na mundo. 

Joh 12:48 Say mangipolisay ed siak, tan agmangawat na saray salitak, walay sakey a mangokom ed sikato: say salita a sinalitak, sikato lanlamang so mangokom ed sikato ed kaonoran ya agew. 

Joh 12:49 Ta agak mansalita na manlapu ed inkasiak; ingen say Ama ya angibaki dia ed siak, initdan to ak na sakey a gangan, no anto so nepeg ko'n ibaga, tan anto so nepeg kon salitaen. 

Joh 12:50 Et amtak a say gangan to sikato so bilay ya andiangaan, kanian tin saray bengatla a sinalitak, unong na inkuan na Ama ed siak ontan so salitaen ko. 



Joh 13:1 Natan nen arapen na fiesta na pasko, si Jesus bangta sikakabat a say horas to asabila ya nepeg to so ontainan ed saya'n mundo ya onla ed Ama, bangta inaro to so saray totoo to ya wala ed mundo, inaro to ra anga ed kasampotan. 

Joh 13:2 Et legan na panamangdem, bangta say diablo ayari to la ya inyan ed puso nen Judas Iscariote, anak nen Simon, so pangyawa'to ed sikato. 

Joh 13:3 Si Jesus, bangta sikakabat a say Ama inter to so amin a bengabengatla ed saray lima to, tan sikato so nanlapu ed Dios, tan onla ed Dios, 

Joh 13:4 Onalagey ed panamangdeman, et ipireg to so saray kawes to; et inala to so sakey a tobatas, tan inbalkes to. 

Joh 13:5 Insan angikalboy danum ed palangana, tan ginmapo a mangoras na salisali ray babangatan, tan punasan to ra ed tobatas ya inbalkes to. 

Joh 13:6 Dia ed ontan dinmago ed Simon Pedro. Kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, orasan mo ta met so saray salik? 

Joh 13:7 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Say gawaen ko ag mo amta natan; ingen natalosan mo naani. 

Joh 13:8 Si Pedro kuan to ed sikato, Ag mon balot oorasan so saray salik, Si Jesus inmebat ed sikato, No ag ta ka orasan, angapo so pi-apagan mo ed siak. 

Joh 13:9 Si Simon Pedro kuan to ed sikato. Katawan, ag saray salik labat, no ag pati saray limak tan say olok met. 

Joh 13:10 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Say nanames ag to la nakaokolan noag lambengat orasan so saray sali to, ingen malinis ya amin: et malinis kayo, balet aliwan amin. 

Joh 13:11 Ta amta to man so mangyawat ed sikato; kanian inkuan to, Ag kayo malinis ya amin. 

Joh 13:12 Kanian sanen naorasan to la so saray sali ra, tan inala to so saray kawes to, tan akayorong lamet, inkuan to ed sikara, Amtayo no anto so ginawak ed sikayo? 

Joh 13:13 Sikayo tawagen yo ak na, Managbangat, tan, Katawan: et maong so kuan yo; ta ontan ak. 

Joh 13:14 No siak sirin so Katawan tan Managbangat, et inorasan ko so saray sali yo, sikayo met nepeg yo so manoorasan na sali sakey tan sakey. 

Joh 13:15 Ta initdan takayo na sakey ya pangaligan, pian sikayo gawaen yo met so singa ginawak ed sikayo. 

Joh 13:16 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say aripen aliwan babaleg nen say katawan to; aliwa met a babaleg so inbaki nen say angibaki ed sikato. 

Joh 13:17 No amta yo so sarayan'n bengatla, mapalar kayo no sikaray gawaen yo. 

Joh 13:18 Agak mansalita na nipaakar ed sikayon amin: Amtak so saray pinilik: balet pian say sulat nasumpal, Say mangan na tinapay ko intagey to so mokor to ya inkonsil ed siak. 

Joh 13:19 Manlapu'd natan ibagak ed sikayo ed arapen a nagawa, pian, sano nagawa, manisia kayo a siak iman. 

Joh 13:20 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say mangawat na siopaman ya ibakik siak so awaten to; et say mangawat ed siak awaten to so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 13:21 Sanen nikuan nen Jesus so ontan, agonigon ed espiritu, tan pinatua to tan inkuan to, Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, a sakey ed sikayo yawa'to ak. 

Joh 13:22 Saray babangatan nanlilimgisan ira, a nanduarua'ra no siopa so sinalita to. 

Joh 13:23 Wala nen saman so sakey ed pananganan a mansadsaral ed pagew nen Jesus, a sakey ed saray babangatan to, ya inaro nen Jesus. 

Joh 13:24 Kanian sikato so tinangeran nen Simon Pedro, tan kuan to ed sikato, Ibagam ed sikami no siopa so sasalitaen to. 

Joh 13:25 Sikato ya akasaindal, a singa onman, ed pagew nen Jesus, kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, siopa ta? 

Joh 13:26 Si Jesus onebat ed satan, Sikato man so idelnetan ko na sankakamot tan iter ko ed sikato. Dia ed ontan nen angidelmet na sankakamot, alaen to tan iter to ed Judas, ya anak nen Simon Iscariote. 

Joh 13:27 Et kayari sankakamot, saman la linmoob si Satanas ed sikato, Kanian kua'nen Jesus ed sikato, Satan so gawaen mo, gawam a magano. 

Joh 13:28 Bangbalet angapo so too ed pananganan ya akapikabat no anto'n kanonotan so angisalitaan to na saya ed sikato. 

Joh 13:29 Ta saray arum inisip da, lapud si Judas wala ed sikato so supot, a si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Manaliw ka na bengabengatla'n nakaokolan tayo ed fiesta; ono, mangiter na bengatla ed saray duruka. 

Joh 13:30 Sikato lanti sanen naawa'to so sankakamot pinmaway a tampol: et labi la ed saman. 

Joh 13:31 Bangnen akapaway la, kuan nen Jesus, Natan say Anak na too nigloria, tan say Dios nigloria ed sikato; 

Joh 13:32 Et say Dios sikato so igloria to ed inkasikato, et tampol a sikato so igloria to. 

Joh 13:33 Ugugaw, wala ni daiset a kiwalak ed sikayo. Anapen yo ak naani: et unong na inkuan ko ed saray Judios, No ined so laen ko, ag kayo makakar; ontan so kuan ko natan ed sikayo. 

Joh 13:34 Sakey a balo'n gangan so iter ko ed sikayo, a manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo: salanti unong na inpangarok ed sikayo, pian manaaroan met so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo. 

Joh 13:35 Lapu ed saya amin a too nabirbiran da'ya sikayo ray babangatan ko, no wala so aro yo ed sakey tan sakey. 

Joh 13:36 Si Simon Pedro kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, iner so laen mo? Inmebat si Jesus, No ined so laen ko, ag mo nayarian so ontombok ed siak natan; ingen ontombo'ka naani. 

Joh 13:37 Si Pedro kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, akin et ag ko nayarian so ontombok ed sika natan? Siak italagak so bilay ko nipaakar ed sika. 

Joh 13:38 Si Jesus onebat, Labay mo ya italaga so bilay mo nipaakar ed siak? Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sika, Say lalong ag onkokaok, angad pangiburim ed siak a mamitlo. 



Joh 14:1 Ag nagonigon so puso yo: manisia kayo ed Dios, manisia kayo met ed siak. 

Joh 14:2 Dia ed abung nen Amak walaray amayamay a panayaman; no ag ontan, inbagak komon ed sikayo; ta onlaak a mangiparaan na pasen ya onkana'd sikayo. 

Joh 14:3 Et no onlaak tan mangiparaanak na pasen ya onkana'd sikayo, onlaak dia lamet, tan awaten ta kayo ed inkasiak; pian no iner so kawalaan ko, diman makapanayam kayo met. 

Joh 14:4 Et no iner so laen ko, amta yo so dalan. 

Joh 14:5 Si Tomas kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, ag mi amta no ined so laen mo; panon so pakaamta mi na dalan? 

Joh 14:6 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Siak so dalan, tan say katuaan, tan say bilay: angapo so ondateng ed Ama, no ag dia ed panamegley ko. 

Joh 14:7 No akabatan yo ak, akabatan yo met so Amak; manlapu ed natan sikato so kabat yo, tan sikato so anengneng yo. 

Joh 14:8 Si Felipe kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, ipanengneng mo ed sikami so Ama, et masarag la ed sikami. 

Joh 14:9 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Andukey a panaon la ya wala ak ed sikayo, et ag mo ak kabat, Felipe? say akanengneng ed siak anengneng to so Ama; panon so pangikuan mo, Ipanengneng mo ed sikami so Ama? 

Joh 14:10 Ag mo ta sisiaen ya wala ak ed Ama, tan say Ama ed siak? saray salita a salitaen ko ed sikayo ag ko salitaen a manlapu ed inkasiak: ingen say Ama a manaayam ed siak gawaen to so saray kimey to. 

Joh 14:11 Sisia mo ak ya wala ak ed Ama, tan say Ama ed siak: ono andi sisia mo ak nisengeg ed saray gawa. 

Joh 14:12 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, Say manisia ed siak, saray kimey a gawaen ko gawaen to met, tan ankabkabaleg a kimkimey nen saraya so gawaen to;lapu'd onla ak ed Ama. 

Joh 14:13 Et angan anto'n kerewen yo ed ngaran ko, satan gawaen ko, pian say Ama nigloria ed Anak. 

Joh 14:14 No onkerew kayo na anto kaman ed ngaran ko, satan so gawaen ko. 

Joh 14:15 No inaro yo ak, sumpal yo so saray gangan ko. 

Joh 14:16 Et mikasi ak ed Ama, et itdan to kayo na sananey a Managligliwa, pian manayam ed sikayo lawas, 

Joh 14:17 Salanti say Espiritu rw katuaan; a sikato'y ag nayarian ya awaten na mundo; ta ag to nanengneng, ag to met kabat: sikato so kabat yo, ta manayam ed sikato, tan wala naani ed sikayo. 

Joh 14:18 Ag ta kayo tainan a manbokbokor: onla ak dia ed sikayo. 

Joh 14:19 Wala ni daiset, et say mundo ag to ak la nanengneng; balet sikayo nanengneng yo ak: lapu'd mabilay ak, sikayo met manbilay kayo. 

Joh 14:20 Dia ed satan ya agew naamtaan yo ya wala ak ed Amak, et sikayo ed siak, tan siak ed sikayo. 

Joh 14:21 Say walaan na saray gangan ko, et sumpalento'ra, sikato so mangaro ed siak: et say mangaro ed siak sikato so inaro nen Amak, tan sikato so aroen ko, et ipatnag ko naani so inkasiak ed sikato. 

Joh 14:22 Si Judas (aliwa a si Iscariote) kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, Anto so nagawa ya ipatnag mo naani inkasika ed sikami, et aliwan dia ed mundo? 

Joh 14:23 Si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, No say sakey a too aroen to ak, onoren toy salitak: et sikato so aroen nen Amak, tan onla kami ed sikato, tan gawaen mi panayaman mi pati sikato. 

Joh 14:24 Say ag mangaro ed siak ag to sumpalen so saray salitak: et say salita'n narengel yo ag ko kien, ingen kien na Ama ya angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 14:25 Saraya'n bengatla sinalitak ed sikayo, ambegya'n wadia ak ni ed sikayo. 

Joh 14:26 Balet say Managligliwa, salanti say Espiritu Santo, a sikato so ibaki dia na Ama ed ngaran ko, ibanga'to ed sikayo so amin a bengabengatla, tan ipanono'to ed sikayo so amin ya inbagak ed sikayo. 

Joh 14:27 Say kareenan so itila'ko ed sikayo; say kareenan ko iter ko ed sikayo: aliwan singa panangiter na mundo, so pangiter ko ed sikayo. Ag nagonigon so puso yo, ag met sitatakot. 

Joh 14:28 Nadngel yo no panon so inpangikuan ko ed sikayo. Ontainanak, tan onla ak ed sikayo. No inaro yo ak, nangayaga kayo komon, lapu ed onla ak ed Ama; ta say Ama babaleg nen say siak. 

Joh 14:29 Et inbagak ed sikayo natan ta ag mi nagawa, pian, sano nagawa, mart isia kayo. 

Joh 14:30 Agak la misalita na dakel ed sikayo, ta say principe na mundo onsabi: et angapo so pibibiangan to ed siak; 

Joh 14:31 Balet pian nakabatan na mundo ya inarok so Ama, tan onong a say Ama initdan to ak na gangan, ontan so gawaen ko. Alagey kayo, onalis itayo dia. 



Joh 15:1 Siak so tua a sengeg na uvas, et say Amak sikato so managtanaman, 

Joh 15:2 Balang sanga ed siak ya agmanbunga, sikato so ekalen to: et balang sanga a manbunga, sikato so palinan to, pian makabunga na dakdakel a bunga. 

Joh 15:3 Sikayo malinis kayo la nisengeg ed salita a sinalitak ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:4 Mansiansia kayo ed -siak, tan siak ed sikayo. Onong a say sanga agmakapanbunga ed inkasikato, likod no sikato so mansiansia ed uvas; ontan met ag yo nayarian, likod no mansiansia kayo ed siak. 

Joh 15:5 Siak so uvas, sikayo so sangasanga: Say mansiansia ed siak, tan siak ed sikato, sikato so manbunga na dakel: ta no andi ak angapo so nagawaan yo. 

Joh 15:6 No siopaman a too agmansiansia ed siak, sikato so nibantak a singa sanga, et namagaan; et sikara so tiponen da, tan ibontok da ra ed apuy, et napoolan ira. 

Joh 15:7 No mansiansia kayo ed siak, tan saray salitak mansiansia ra ed sikayo, kerew kayo na antokaman a laba'yo, ed nagawa ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:8 Dia ed saya so kigloriaan nen Amak, say panbunga yo na dakel: tan dia ed ontan sikayo so babangatan ko. 

Joh 15:9 Salanti singa inpangaro na Ama ed siak, inaro ta kayo met: mansiansia kayo ed arok. 

Joh 15:10 No sumpalen yo so saray gangan ko, mansiansia kayo ed arok; salanti singa inpangonor ko ed saray gangan nen Amak, tan mansisiansia ak ed aro to. 

Joh 15:11 Saraya a bengatla sinalitak ed sikayo, pian say gayagak makapanayam ed sikayo, tan pian say gayaga yo nagnap. 

Joh 15:12 Saya so gangan ko, a manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo, salanti singa inpangarok ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:13 Andian so too na babaleg ya aro nen saya, a sakey a too italaga to so bilay to nipaakar ed saray kakaaro to. 

Joh 15:14 Sikayo so kakaarok, no gawaen yo so saray bengatla ya ingangan ko ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:15 Ag ta kayo la tawagen ya ariripen; ta say aripen ag to amta so gawaen na katawan to: balet tinawag takayo a kakaaro; ta amin a bengabengatla a nadngel ko ed Amak inpaamtak ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:16 Sikayo ag yo ak pinili, balet pinili ta kayo, tan tinoro ta kayo, pian onla kayo tan manbunga kayo, tan pian say bunga yo mansiansia: pian antokaman a kerewen yo naani ed Ama lapu ed ngaran ko, iter to ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:17 Saraya'n bengatla so igangan ko ed sikayo, pian makapanaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo. 

Joh 15:18 No say mundo bosolen to kayo, amta yo a binosol to ak ya akauna nen sikayo. 

Joh 15:19 No taga mundo kayo say mundo aroen to so saray kayarian to: ba let lapu'd aliwa kayo a taga mundo, no ag say pinili ta kayo ed mundo, kanian say mundo bosolen to kayo. 

Joh 15:20 Pakanonoten yo so salita ya inkuan ko ed sikayo, Say aripen aliwan babaleg nen say katawan to. No pinasegsegang da ak, pasegsegangen da kayo met; no inonor da so salitak, onoren da met naani salita yo. 

Joh 15:21 Balet amin irarayan bengabengatla gawaen da ed sikayo nisengeg ed ngaran ko, lapu'd ag da amta so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 15:22 No agak linma dia tan akisalita ed sikara, andian ira komon na kasalanan et balet natan angapo so nibaraan da ed kasalanan da. 

Joh 15:23 Say mamosol ed siak, bosolen to met si Amak. 

Joh 15:24 No ag ko ginawa ed pegley da so saray gawa ya angapo so arum ya akagawa, andian ira na kasalanan: balet natan anengneng da tan binosol da ak tan si Amak. 

Joh 15:25 Ingen nagawa so saya, pian nasumpal so salita ya akasulat ed gangan da, Binosol da ak ya angapo so makasengeg. 

Joh 15:26 Balet sano onsabi Managligliwa, a sikato so ibakik ed sikayo a manlapu ed Ama, salanti say Espiritu na katuaan, ya manlapu ed Ama, sikato so mantasi nipaakar ed siak: 

Joh 15:27 Et mantasi kayo met, lapu ed akiolop kayo ed siak nanlapu'd gapo. 



Joh 16:1 Saraya'n bengatla sinalitak ed sikayo, pian ag kayo nagapol. 

Joh 16:2 Papawayen da kayo naani ed saray sinagogas; on say horas ondateng a siopaman a mamatey ed sikayo isipen to a mangisaklang na panlinkor ed Dios. 

Joh 16:3 Et saraya'n bengatla gawaen da, lapu ed ag da akabatan so Ama, angan say siak. 

Joh 16:4 Balet saraya'n bengatla sinalitak ed sikayo, pian sano onsabi horas da, nanonotan yo ra, no panon so inpangibagak ed sikayo. Et suraya'n bengatla ag ko inkuan ed sikayo a nanlapu ed gapo, lapu'd wala ak nin ibayo 

Joh 16:5 Balet natan onla ak ed saman so angibaki dia ed siak; et angapo ed sikayo so manepet ed siak, Iner so laen mo? 

Joh 16:6 Balet lapu'd sinalitak so saraya'n bengatla ed sikayo, say ermen pinano to so puso yo. 

Joh 16:7 Angaman ontan say katuaan so ibagak ed sikayo: makana ed sikayo ya ontainan ak; ta no agak ontainan, say Managligliwa ag onla dia ed sikayo; ingen no onla ak, sikato'y ibakik ed sikayo. 

Joh 16:8 Et sikato, sano onsabi ipaliwawa to ed mundo so nipaakar ed kasalanan, tan inkatunong, tan kaokom: 

Joh 16:9 Nipaakar ed kasalanan, lapu'd ag ira anisia ed siak; 

Joh 16:10 Nipaakar ed inkatunong, lapu'd onla ak ed Ama, et ag yo ak la nanengneng; 

Joh 16:11 Nipaakar ed kaokom, lapu'd say principe na sayan mundo naokom la. 

Joh 16:12 Wala ni amayamay a bengatla'n ibagak ed sikayo, balet ag yo ni nayarian ira'n talosan natan. 

Joh 16:13 Manwari'n ontan sano onsabi Espiritu na katuaan, itonton to kayo ed amin a katuaan: ta ag mansalita na manlapu ed inkasikato; no ag say dinan man a narengel to, saraya so salitaen to: et ipaliwawa to ed sikayo so bengatla'n onsabi. 

Joh 16:14 Sikato pagloriaen to ak: ta mangala ed kayarian ko, tan sikato so ipaliwawa ed sikayo. 

Joh 16:15 Amin a bengabengatla ya wala ed Ama kayarian ko ra: kanian inkuan to, a sikato mangala ed kayarian ko, tan sikato so ipaliwawa to ed sikayo. 

Joh 16:16 Wala ni daiset, et ag yo ak la nanengneng; tan wala ni daiset lamet, et nanengneng yo ak. 

Joh 16:17 Kanian arum ed saray babangatan to inkuan da ed sakey tan sakey, Anto so saya'n kuan to ed sikatayo, Wala ni daiset, et ag yo ak nanengneng: tan wala ni daiset lamet, et nanengneng yo ak: tan, Lapud no onla ak ed Ama? 

Joh 16:18 Kanian inkuan da, Anto so saya'n kuan to, Wala ni daiset? Ag mi amta so kuan to. 

Joh 16:19 Si Jesus atebek ton pirawat da so mantepet ed sikato, et inkuan to ed sikara, Opapeten na sakey tan sakey ed sikayo so nipaakar ed saya'n inkuan ko, Wala ni daiset, et ag yo ak nanengneng, tan wala ni daiset lamet, et nanengneng yo ak? 

Joh 16:20 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, a mannangis tan manermen kayo, balet say mundo mangayaga: maermen kayo naani, balet say kaermenan yo magmaliw a gayaga. 

Joh 16:21 Say bii sano manpasakit maermen, lapu'd asabi la'y horas to; balet sano inanak to la so ugaw, ag to la nanonotan so irap, lapu bengat ed gayaga a sakey a too so nianak ed mundo. 

Joh 16:22 Et sikayo natan sirin maermen kayo: balet nanengneng ta kayo lamet, et say puso yo mangayaga, et say gayaga yo angapo so mangekal ed sikayo. 

Joh 16:23 Et dia ed satan ya agew angapo so tepeten yo ed siak. Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sikayo, No onkerew kayo na bengatla ed Ama, sikato so iter to ed sikayo ed ngaran ko. 

Joh 16:24 Anga ed natan angapo ni kinerew yo ed ngaran ko: kerew kayo, et awaten yo, pian say gayaga yo nayadyari. 

Joh 16:25 Saraya sinalitak ed sikayo dia ed alimbawa: onsabi horas, sano agak la mansalita ed sikayo dia ed alalimbawa, ingen salitaen ko ed sikayo a maliwliwawa so nipaakar ed Ama. 

Joh 16:26 Dia ed satan ya agew onkerew kayo ed ngaran ko: et ag ko ikuan ed sikayo a mikasiak ed Ama nipaakar ed sikayo; 

Joh 16:27 Ta say Ama lanlamang inaro to kayo, lapu'd inaro yo ak, tan sinisia yo a nanlapu ak ed Ama. 

Joh 16:28 Nanlapu ak ed Ama, tan linma ak dia ed mundo; tainan ko lamet so mundo, et onla ak ed Ama. 

Joh 16:29 Saray babangatan to kuan da, Nia, natan mansalita ka a maliwawa, et angapo so alimbawa a salitaen mo. 

Joh 16:30 Natan amta mi a sika amtam ya amin so bengabengatla, et ag mo kaokolan so siopaman a too a ontepet ed sika: lapu ed saya manisia kami a nanlapu ka ed Dios. 

Joh 16:31 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikara, Manisia kayo natan? 

Joh 16:32 Nia, say horas onsabi, on, sinmabila, a nabuybuyak kayo, balang sakey a too ed kayarian to, tan tainan yo ak a bokbokor: et angan ontan ag ko bokbokor, lapu'd say Ama wala ed siak. 

Joh 16:33 Saraya'n bengatla sinalitak ed sikayo, pian dia ed siak nawalaan kayo na kareenan. Dia ed mundo walaan kayo na kairapan: balet man-ilalo kayo'd siak tinalok so mundo. 



Joh 17:1 Sarayan bengatla sinalita nen Jesus; et sanen intangay to 'ray mata to ed tawen, inkuan to, Ama, sinmabi la so horas: igloriam so Anak mo, pian say Anak igloria to ka: 

Joh 17:2 Salanti onong na inpangiter mo ed sikato na pakaoley ed amin a laman, pian diad saray amin ya inter mo ed sikato, dia ed sikara iter to so andiangaan a bilay. 

Joh 17:3 Et saya sikato so andiangaan a bilay, ya naantaan da ka a saksakey a tua'n Dios, tan saman so inbakim, salanti Jesu-Cristo. 

Joh 17:4 Ingloria ta ka ed dalin, bangta asumpal ko so kimey ya inter mo ed siak a gawaen ko. 

Joh 17:5 Et natan, O Ama, igloria mo ak laktip ed inkasika ed samay gloria ya wala'd sikata nen andi ni mundo. 

Joh 17:6 Inparongtal ko so ngaran mo ed saray totoo ya initer mo ed siak a nanlapu ed mundo: sikara nen saman so kayarian mo, et inter mo ra ed siak, et inonor da so salitam. 

Joh 17:7 Natan amta ra ya amin a bengabengatla ya iter mo ed siak nanlapu ed sika: 

Joh 17:8 Ta saray salita ya inter mo ed siak initer ko ed sikara; et sikara so inawat da, tan akabatan da a peteg a nanlapu ak ed sika, tan sinisia ra a sika so angibaki dia ed siak. 

Joh 17:9 Pikasik ira; agko pikasi so mundo, no ag dia'd saramay initer mo ed siak ta kayarian mo ra: 

Joh 17:10 Et ami' bengabengatla a kayarian ko, kayarianmo'ra tan saray kayarian mo kayarian ko 'ra: et nigloria ak ed sikara. 

Joh 17:11 Et andi ak la ed mundo, et saraya wadia ra ed mundo, tan onla ak ditan ed sika. Ama'n Masantos, talimam ira ed ngaran mo so saray initer mo ed siak, pian saksakey ira, a singa sikata. 

Joh 17:12 Leleg na inkiwalak ed sikara, tinalimak ira ed ngaran mo so saray initer mo ed siak: tan inyagel ko'ra, tan angapo so sakey ya atawtaw ed sikara, no ag say anak na kaderalan; pian nasumpal so sulat. 

Joh 17:13 Balet natan onla ak ed sika; et saraya'n bengatla salitaen ko dia ed mundo, pian wala ed sikara so gayagak a nagnap ed inkasikara. 

Joh 17:14 Inter ko ed sikara so salitam; et say mundo ginula to ra, lapu'd ag ira taga mundo, salanti onong ya agak taga mundo. 

Joh 17:15 Ag ko pikasi ya ekalenmo'ra ed mundo, no ag ingen ilaban mo ra ed mauges. 

Joh 17:16 Ag ira taga mundo, salanti onong ya ag ak taga mundo. 

Joh 17:17 Pasantos mo 'ra ed katuaan: say salitam sikato so katuaan. 

Joh 17:18 Onong ya inbaki mo ak mo ak ed mundo, ontan met inbakik ira ed mundo. 

Joh 17:19 Et nisengeg ed sikara pasantosen ko so inkasiak, pian sikara met napasantos ira ed katuaan. 

Joh 17:20 Aliwa'n saraya labat so pikasik, no ag saraman met so manisia ed siak ed panamegley na salita ra; 

Joh 17:21 Pian saksakey ira'n amin; salanti singa sika, Ama, wala ka ed siak, tan siak ed sika, pian walara met ed sikata: pian say mundo manisia ya inbaki mo ak. 

Joh 17:22 Et say gloria ya initer mo ed siak initer ko ed sikara; pian saksakey ira, salanti singa sikata saksakey ita; 

Joh 17:23 Siak ed sikara, tan sika ed siak, pian nayadyari ra ed inkasaksakey; pian nakabatan na mundo a sika so angibaki dia ed siak, tan inarom ita, onong na inpangarom ed siak. 

Joh 17:24 Ama, pirawat ko a saray initer mo ed siak, walara met ed siak ed kawalaan ko, pian nanengnengda so gloriak ya initer mo ed siak: lapu'd inaro mo ak nanlapu nen agni inletneg so mundo. 

Joh 17:25 O Ama ya matonong, say mundo ag to ka akabatan, siak balet akabatan ta ka; tan saraya akabatan da a sika so angibaki dia ed siak; 

Joh 17:26 Et inpakabat ko ed sikara so ngaran mo, tan ipakabat kon siansia pian say aro ya inpangarom ed siak wala ed sikara tan siak ed sikara. 



Joh 18:1 Bang nen si Jesus asalita to so saraya'n salita, pinmaway pati saray babangatan to ed biek na kolos na Cedon, a kawalaan na sakey a tanamanan, a sikato so nilooban to, tan saray babangatan to. 

Joh 18:2 Bang si Judas met, a mangyawat ed sikato, amta to so pasen: ta si Jesus mabetbet ya akiragup diman ed saray babangatan to. 

Joh 18:3 Si Judas sirin, nen naawat to so olop na saray sondalos tan oficiales a nanlapu ed saray manonaan a sacerdotes tan Fariseos, onlad man pati saray farol tan sinigit tan ayura. 

Joh 18:4 Kanian si Jesus bangta kaba'to so amin a bengatla ya onsabi ed sikato, pinmaway, tan inkuan to ed sikara, Siopa so anapen yo? 

Joh 18:5 Inmebat ira ed sikato: Si Jesus a taga Nazaret. Kua'nen Jesus ed sikara, Siak itan. Et si Judas met, a mangyawat ed sikato, manalalagey ya iba ra. 

Joh 18:6 Kanian sanen inkuan to ed sikara, Siak itan; sinmoner ira, tan alokbob ira ed dalin. 

Joh 18:7 Kanian tinepe'to lamet ed sikara, Siopa so anapen yo? Et inkuan da, Si Jesus a taga Nazaret. 

Joh 18:8 Inmebat si Jesus, Inkuan ko ed sikayo a siak itan: no siak so anapen yo sirin, paolian yo so saraya ya onla: 

Joh 18:9 Pian nasumpal so salita a sinalita to, Angapo'y abalang ko ed saray initer mo ed siak. 

Joh 18:10 Si Simon Pedro ed satan ya walaan na kampilan binago'to, tan sinugatan to so aripen na atagey a sacerdote, tan piningol to so layag to a kawanan. Bang say ngaran na aripen sikato so Malco. 

Joh 18:11 Kanian si Jesus inkuan to ed Pedro: Isolong mo so kampilan ed kaloban: say copa ya initer nen Ama ed siak, ag ko ta nepeg ya inumen? 

Joh 18:12 Dia ed ontan say olop na sondalo tan say manona a capitan, tan saray oficiales na saray Judios, siningkat da si Jesus tan sikato so binalor da, 

Joh 18:13 Tan sikato so inyakar da ya inmuna ed Anas; ta sikato so katulangan a laki nen Caifas, a sikato so atagey a sacerdote ed saray Judios ed saman a taon. 

Joh 18:14 Bang si Caifas sikato so animbawa ed saray Judios, a makana a sakey a too ompatey nipaakar ed katooan. 

Joh 18:15 Et si Simon Pedro tinmombok ed Jesus, tan ontan so ginawa na sananey a babangatan. Bang saman a babangatan kabat na atagey a sacerdote, et akiloloob ed Jesus ed saman na atagey a sacerdote; 

Joh 18:16 Balet si Pedro manal-alagey ed paway na pinto. Dia ed ontan samay sananey a babangatan, a kabat na atagey a sacerdote, pinmaway tan akisalita ed manbabantay na pinto, tan inloob to si Pedro. 

Joh 18:17 Say bii ed satan a manbabantay na pinto kuan to ed Pedro, Sika, sakey ka ta met ed saray babangatan na saya'n too? Kuan to, Aliwa ak. 

Joh 18:18 Bang saray aripen tan saray oficiales manalalagey irad' man, bangta nangawa ra na apuy ed ngalab; ta ambetel nensaman; et mandarangdang ira, et si Pedro ibara, a manalalagey tan mandarangdang. 

Joh 18:19 Say atagey a sacerdote ed satan tinepe'to ed Jesus so nipaakar ed saray babangatan to, saray ibabanga'to. 

Joh 18:20 Inmebat si Jesus ed sikato, nansalita ak dia ed maparongtal ed mundo; nanbangat ak a naynay ed saray sinagogas, tan ed templo, a diman so pantitiponan na saray amin a Judios; et angapo so sinalitak ed amot. 

Joh 18:21 Akin et tepeten mo ed siak? tepet mo ed saray akadngel ed siak, no anto so sinalitak ed sikara; nia, saraya amta ra so bengabengatla ya inkuan ko. 

Joh 18:22 Et sanen asalita to so say a, sakey ed saray oficiales a manalalagey diman kinabil to si Jesus na lima to, a kuan to, Onebat ka na ontan ed atagey a sacerdote? 

Joh 18:23 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikato, No nansalita ak na mauges, tasian mo so mauges: ingen no maong so sinalitak, akin et kabilen mo ak? 

Joh 18:24 Kanian sikato so inpaiyakar nen Anas a sibabalor ed Caifas ya atagey a sacerdote. 

Joh 18:25 Bang si Simon Pedro manalalagey tan mandarangdang. Kanian inkuan da ed sikato, Sika met sakey ka ed saray babangatan to? Sikato so nanburi, tan inkuan to, Aliwa ak. 

Joh 18:26 Sakey ed saray aripen na atagey a sacerdote, a sikato so kanayon na piningolan nen Pedro na layag kuan to, Ag taka ta anengneng ya iba to dia ed tanamanan? 

Joh 18:27 Si Pedro nanburi lamet ed satan: et tampol kinmokaok so lalong. 

Joh 18:28 Inyakar da si Jesus ed satan nanlapu ed Caifas dia ed Pretorio:et kabkabuasan ed saman: et ag ira linmoob ed Pretorio, pian ag ira natilolan, ingen pian nakan da so pasko. 

Joh 18:29 Kanian si Pilato pinmaway ed sikara, tan kuan to, Anto so tarok yo ya idalem sumpa ed sayan too? 

Joh 18:30 Inmebat ira tan kuan da ed sikato, No sayan too ag komon managgawa na mauges, sikato so ag mi komon yawat ed sika. 

Joh 18:31 Kanian inkua'rien Pilato ed sikara, Sikato so alayo ed sikayo, tan okomen yo onong ed katonongan yo. Saray Judios inkuan da ed sikato, Ag nikatonongan ed sikami so mamatey na siopaman a too: 

Joh 18:32 Pian nasumpal so salita nen Jesus, a sinalita to, ya mangipaliwawa no anto a nengneng na ipapatey so pateyan to.

Joh 18:33 Si Pilato linmoob lamet ed satan ed Pretorio, et tinawag to si Jesus, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Sika so Ari na saray Judios? 

Joh 18:34 Si Jesus inmebat, Kuan mo so saya a nanlapu ed inkasika ono inbaga na arum ed sika so nipaakar ed siak? 

Joh 18:35 Si Pilato inmebat, Judio ak ta? Say nacion mo a dili tan saray manona a sacerdote inyawat da ka ed siak: anto so ginawam? 

Joh 18:36 Si Jesus inmebat, Say panarianko aliwan taga dia ed mundo: no say panarian ko taga dia ed mundo, saray ariripen ko mibakal ira komon sirin, pian ag ak niyawat ed saray Judios: balet bang say panarian ko ag manlapu dia. 

Joh 18:37 Si Pilato inkuan to ed satan ed sikato, Ari ka sirin? Si Jesus inmebat, Sika kuan mo ya ari ak. Nisengeg ed saya nianak ak, tan nisengeg ed saya linma ak dia ed mundo, pian tasian ko so katuaan. Balang sakey a kayarian na katuaan dengelen to so voces ko. 

Joh 18:38 Si Pilato kuan to ed sikato, Anto so katuaan? Et sanen inkuan to so saya, pinmaway lamet ed saray Judios, tan kuan to ed sikara, Angapo so kasalanan a naromog ko ed sikato. 

Joh 18:39 Balet wala so ugali yo, ya ibolos ko ed sikayo so sakey'ed pasko: laba'yo kasi sirin ya ibolos ko ed sikayo so Ari na saray Judios? 

Joh 18:40 Inmingal ira ed satan lamet, a kuan da, Aliwan sayan too, noag si Barrabas. Bang si Barrabas sakey a tulisan. 



Joh 19:1 Diad saman sirin si Pilato inala to ed satan si Jesus, tan binakbak to. 

Joh 19:2 Et saray sosondalo nanlaga ra na sakey a balanget a sabisabit, tan inyan da ed olo to, tan kinawesan da na sakey a kawes a purpura; 

Joh 19:3 Et dinmago ra ed sikato, tan inkuan da, Nagalang ka, Ari na saray Judios! tan sikato so kinabil da na limalima ra. 

Joh 19:4 Et si Pilato pinmaway lamet, tan kuan to ed sikara, Nia, sikato so ipaway ko ed sikayo, pian nakabatan yo ya angapo so naromog ko a kasalanan ed sikato. 

Joh 19:5 Si Jesus pinmaway ed satan, a sisosolong na balanget a sabisabit tan purpura a kawes. Et si Pilato kuanto ed sikara, Nia so too! 

Joh 19:6 Sanen sikato so anengneng na saray manona a sacerdotes tan saray oficiales, inmingal ira a inkuan da, Ipasak mo ed cruz, ipasak mo ed cruz. Si Pilato kuan to ed sikara, Sikato so ala yo ed sikayo tan ipasak yo ed cruz: ta angapo so naromog ko a kasalanan ed sikato. 

Joh 19:7 Saray Judios inmebat ira ed sikato, Wala an kami gangan, et lapu ed satan a gangan nepeg to so ompatey, ta ginawa to so inkasikato ya Anak na Dios. 

Joh 19:8 Sanen nadngel nen Pilato so saya'n salita lalo ya atakot ed satan; 

Joh 19:9 Et linmoob lamet ed Pretorio, tan kuan to ed Jesus, Taga iner ka? Balet si Jesus ag to inebatan. 

Joh 19:10 Kanian kua'nen Pilato ed sikato, Ag ka misalita ed siak? agmo ta amta ya wala so pakayarik a mangibolos ed sika, tan wala so pakayarik a mangipasak ed sika ed cruz? 

Joh 19:11 Si Jesus inmebat ed sikato, Sika angapo so pakayarim sumpa ed siak, nilikod no niiter ed sika a nanlapu ed tagey; kanian say angiyawat ed siak ed sika wala an na babaleg a kasalanan. 

Joh 19:12 Lapud saya si Pilato sineetan to ya ibolos: balet saray Judios inmakis ira, a kuan da, No ibolos mo so sa yan too, ag to ka kaaro nen Cesar; balang sakey a mangawa ed inkasika to ya ari mansalita na sumpa ed Cesar. 

Joh 19:13 Sanen nadngel nen Pilato so sarayan salita ed satan, inpaway to si Jesus, tan imyorong ed yorongan a panangokoman ed pasen ya inngaran, Say Nilarioan, balet dia ed Hebreo Gabbatha. 

Joh 19:14 Bang nen saman sikato so Panagparaan na paskua: asinger lad saman so horas a komanem. Et kuan to ed saray Judios, Nia, so Ari yo! 

Joh 19:15 Sikara inmingal ira ed satan, Ekal mo, ekal mo, ipasak mo ed cruz. Si Pilato kuan io ed sikara. Ipasak'ko ed cruz so Ari yo? Saray manona a sacerdote inmebat ira, Angapo so Ati mi no ag si Cesar. 

Joh 19:16 Kanian sikato so inyawa'to ed satan ed sikara pian ipasak ed cruz. 

Joh 19:17 Kanian inala ra si Jesus; et pinmaway, a sankasakba'to so cruz nipaakar ed sikato, anga ed pasen ya inngaray Say pasan na lapislapis na olo, ya inngaran ed Hebreo a Golgotha: 

Joh 19:18 A diman so angipasakan da ed sikato ed cruz, a pati sananey a duara, sakey ed balang diking, et si Jesus dia ed pegley. 

Joh 19:19 Et si Pilato angisulat met na sakey a pangaran, tan inyan to ed oloan na cruz. Et diman akasulat, SI JESUS NAZARENO, ARI NA SARAY JUDIOS. 

Joh 19:20 Kanian saya a pangaran binasa na amayamay ed saray Judios; ta say pasen ya angipasakan da ed Jesus asinger ed ciudad: et akasulat ed Hebreo tan ed Latin, tan ed Griego. 

Joh 19:21 Saray manona a sacerdotes na saray Judios ed satan inkuan da ed Pilato, Ag mo isulat so, Say Ari na saray Judios; ingen saman so inkuan to, Siak so Ari na saray Judios. 

Joh 19:22 Si Pilato inmebat, Say insulat ko, insulat ko. 

Joh 19:23 Saray sosondalo ed satan, nen nipasak da la si Jesus, inala ra so saray kawes to et inpankapat da, sakey a kakapat ed balang sakey a sondalo; tan ontan met na aysing; bang say aysing andi nandaitan, inabel ya amin nanlapu ed tagey. 

Joh 19:24 Inkuan sirin na sakey tan sakey, Ag tayo pilaten, ingen panpapalaran tayo, no siopa kasi makankien: pian say sulat nasumpal, a kuan to, Nanaapagan da so saray kawes ko ed sikara, Tan nanpapalaran da so aysing ko. 

Joh 19:25 Sarayan bengatla sirin so ginnawa na saray sondalo. Balet di-man manalalagey ed abay na cruz nen Jesus si ina to, tan say agi a bii nen ina to, si Maria ya asawa nen Cleofas, tan si Maria Magdalena. 

Joh 19:26 Sanen anengneng nen Jesus ed satan so ina to, tan say inaro to a babangatan, ya akaalagey diman, kuan to ed ina to, Bii, nitan so anak mo! 

Joh 19:27 Insan kuan to ed babangatan, Nitan so inam! Et nanlapu'd saman ya horas, sikato so inala na babangatan ed abung to. 

Joh 19:28 Kayari saya si Jesus, bangta sikakabat ya am in a bengabengatla asumpal lara, pian nasumpal so sulat, kuan to, Napgaan ak. 

Joh 19:29 Walad may nipasen a sakey a pasig ya napno na tuka: angyan ira ed hisopo na esponja a napno na tuka, tan indandan da ed sangi to. 

Joh 19:30 Sanen naawat nen Jesus ed satan so tuka, inkuan to, Asumpa'la: et intuek to so olo to, tan initer to so espiritu to. 

Joh 19:31 Saray Judios ed satan, lapu ed sikato so Panagparaan, pian saray bangkay ag ira natilak ed cruz ed agew a sabaton (ta say agew na saman a sabaton et mablin agew), kinerew da ed Pilato pian napiley so saray sali ra, tan naekal ira. 

Joh 19:32 Kanian saray sosondalo linma ra tan piniley da so saray sali na onaan, tan samay sakey a nipasak ed cruz a pati sikato: 

Joh 19:33 Balet sanen akasabi ra ed Jesus, tan anengneng da ya inatey la, ag da piniley so salito: 

Joh 19:34 Angaman ontan sakey ed saray sondalo sinegkal to na sakey a gayang so diking, et tampol walay pinmaway a dala tan danum. 

Joh 19:35 Et say akanengneng tinasian to, tan say panagtasi to sikato so tua: et amta to a tua so kuan to, pian manisia kayo met. 

Joh 19:36 Ta sarayan bengatla agawara, pian say sulat nasumpal, Angan sakey bengat a pokel to ag naputer. 

Joh 19:37 Et sananey ni a sulat, kuan to, Onnengneng ira naani, Ed samay sinegkal da. 

Joh 19:38 Et kayari na saraya'n bengatla. si Jose a taga Arimatea, bangta babangatan nen Jesus, ingen maamot lapu'd takot ed saray Judios, kinerew to ed Pilato ya tangtangen to so laman nen Jesus: et si Pilato initdan to na aboloy. Kanian linma, tan ina la to so bangkay to. 

Joh 19:39 Et linma met si Nicodemo, saman so nen inmona linma ed Jesus ed labi, a sankatarok to so sakey a laok na mirra tan aloe a ngalngal sanlasus a libras. 

Joh 19:40 Dia ed ontan inalara so bangkay nen Jesus, tan pinongos da ed abe a lienzo a pati saray balingit, onong na ugali na saray Judios ed panangiponpon da. 

Joh 19:41 Bang dia ed pasen a nipasakanto wala so sakey a tanamanan; et dia ed tanamanan sakey a balo'n lobok ya angapo ni too ya insinop angan kapigan. 

Joh 19:42 Diman lanti nisengeg ed Panag paraan na saray Judios (lapu ed sa; lobok asinger) insinop da si Jesus. 



Joh 20:1 Bang dia ed onona'n agew na simba, si Maria Magdalena linma ed kabkabuasan, nen ambilunget ni, dia ed lobok, et anengneng to a niarawi so bato ed lobok. 

Joh 20:2 Kanian binmatik, tan linma ed Simon Pedro, tan ed sananey a babangatan, ya inaro nen Jesus, tan kuan to ed sikara, Inalara ya inpaway a Katawan ed lobok, et ag tayo amta no iner so anginan da ed sikato. 

Joh 20:3 Si Pedro ed satan pinmaway, tan say sananey a babangatan, et amaarap ira ed lobok. 

Joh 20:4 Et binmatik iran dua a nanolop: et say sakey a babangatan nilaslasan to si Pedro, et akaona a sinmabi ed lobok; 

Joh 20:5 Et sanen yinmoko tan ninmengneng ed dalem, anengneng to so saray abel a lienzo a nigaton; ingen ag linmoob. 

Joh 20:6 Si Simon Pedro ed satan sinmabi met, a manomtombok ed sikato, et linmoob ed lobok; et anengneng to so saray abel a lienzo a nigaton. 

Joh 20:7 Tan say abel, ya insakbong ed oloto, ag akagaton a pati saray abel a lienzo, ingen alokot ya akagaton ed sakey a pasen a bokbokor to. 

Joh 20:8 Saman la linmoob ed satan so sananey a babangatan met, a sinmabi ya akaona ed lobok, et anengneng to, tan anisia. 

Joh 20:9 Ta onong ya ag da ni naamtaan so sulat, a sikato so kaokolan ya onoli lamet ed bilay manlapu ed saray inaatey. 

Joh 20:10 Dia ed ontan saray babangatan linmara lamet ed saray kaabonganda. 

Joh 20:11 Balet si Maria manal-alagey ed paway ed arap na lobok a mannangis: dia ed ontan, leleg a mannangis, tinmuek tan tinmakiling ed lobok; 

Joh 20:12 Et anengneng to so duara ya angeles ya amosiak a manyudyurong, sakey ed oloan, tan sakey ed salian, ed angigatonan da na bangkay nen Jesus. 

Joh 20:13 Et kuan da ed sikato, Bii, akin et mannangis ka? Sikato kuan to ed sikara, Lapud inala ra so Katawan ko, et ag ko amta no iner so anginan da. 

Joh 20:14 Nen inkuan to so ontan, pinmigar ed beneg to, et anengneng to si Jesus a manal-alagey, et ag to amta a sikato si Jesus. 

Joh 20:15 Kua'nen Jesus ed sikato, Bii, akin et mannangis ka? siopa so anapen mo? Et diad inpangisip to a sikato so managtanamanan, kuan to ed sikato, Katawan, no sikato so inalam dia, ibagam ed siak no iner so anginan mo ed sikato, tan sikato so alaen ko naani. 

Joh 20:16 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Maria. Sikato so pinmigar, tan kuan to ed sikato ed Hebreo, Rabboni; a kabaliksanto, Managbangat. 

Joh 20:17 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Ag mo ak diwiten; ta ag ak ni tinmokotok ed Ama: ingen onla ka ed saray agagik, tan kuan mo ed sikara, Siak ontokotok ak ed Amak tan Ama yo, tan Dios ko tan Dios yo. 

Joh 20:18 Si Maria Magdalena onla tan ibaga to ed saray babangatan, Siak anengneng ko so Katawan; tan sinalita to so saraya a bengatla ed sikato. 

Joh 20:19 Bang nen ngarem la ed saman ya agew, say ononan agew na simba tan sanen saray pinto na kawalaan day babangatan akakapot, lapu'd takot ed saray Judios, si Jesus linma tan inmalagey ed pegley, tan kuan to ed sikara, Say kareenan so wala ed sikayo. 

Joh 20:20 Et sanen inkuan to so saya, inpanengneng to ed sikara so saray limalima to tan say diking to. Saray babangatan ed satan magaygayaga'ra, nen anengneng da so Katawan, 

Joh 20:21 Si Jesus ed satan inkuan to ed sikara lamet, Say kareenan so wala ed sikayo: onong a say Ama inbaki to ak dia, ontan met so pangibakik ed sikayo. 

Joh 20:22 Et sanen inkuan to so saya, nilinawaan to ra, tan kuan to ed sikara, Awat yo so Espiritu Santo: 

Joh 20:23 Dia ed siopaman a pamerdonaan yo na saray kasalanan, sikara'y naperdona ed sikara; ed saray pangabalaan yo na saray kasalanan, sikara so naabala. 

Joh 20:24 Balet si Tomas a sakey ed saray labindua, ya inngaran na Didimo, andi ed sikara nen linma si Jesus. 

Joh 20:25 Kanian saray arum a babangatan inkuan da ed sikato, Anengneng mi' Katawan. Balet inkuan to ed sikara, No ag ko nanengneng ed saray lima to so tinalos na saray pasak, tan yan ko so tamorok ed nanlapuan na saray pasak, tan itobong ko so limak ed diking to, ag ak manisia. 

Joh 20:26 Et kayari waloy agew saray babangatan wala ra lamet ed loob, tan ibara si Tomas. Si Jesus niala, anta saray pinto akakaput ira, tan inmalagey ed pegley, tan inkuan to, Say kareenan so wala ed sikayo. 

Joh 20:27 Saman la kuan to ed Tomas, Idandan mo dia so tamorom, tan nengneng mo so saray limak; tan idandan mo dia so limam, tan itobong mo ed diking ko: et aleg ya andi pananisiam, no ag ingen manisia ka. 

Joh 20:28 Si Tomas inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Katawan ko tan Dios ko. 

Joh 20:29 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Lapu'd anengneng mo ak, anisia ka: mapalar so saray ag akanengneng, et anisia'ra. 

Joh 20:30 Amayamay so saray sananey a tanda ed satan a ginawa nen Jesus ed arap na saray babangatan, ya ag ira insulat ed saya'n libro: 

Joh 20:31 Saraya balet insulat ira, pian manisia kayo a si Jesus sikato so Cristo, ya Anak na Dios; tan dia'd pananisia yo nawalaan kayo na bilay ed ngaran to. 



Joh 21:1 Kayari sarayan bengatla pinmatnag si Jesus lamet ed saray babangatan ed dayat a Tiberias; et inpatnag to so inkasikato ya onia. 

Joh 21:2 Wala ran nanoolop di Simon Pedro, tan Tomas ya inngaran na Didimo, tan si Natanael a taga Cana ed Galilea, tan saray anak nen Zebedeo, tan duara ni ed saray babangatan to. 

Joh 21:3 Si Simon Pedro kuan to ed sikara, Onla ak a mansigay, Sikara kuan da ed sikato, Mila kami met ed sika. Linma ra, tan linmugan ed paraw; et saman a labi angapo so nala ra. 

Joh 21:4 Balet sanen palbangon la, inmalagey si Jesus ed pangdel: angaman ontan saray babangatan ag da abidbir a sikato si Jesus. 

Joh 21:5 Si Jesus kuan to sirin ed sikara, Ugugaw, walaan kayo na bengatla a nakan? Sikara'y inmebat ed sikato, Angapo. 

Joh 21:6 Et sikato inkuan to ed sikara, Ipelag yo so iket ed nikawanan na paraw, et makaromog kayo. Kanian inpelag da, et sikato so ag da la nayarian a goyoron lapu ed kinarakel na sirasira. 

Joh 21:7 Samay babangatan sirin ya inaro nen Jesus kuan to ed Pedro, Sikato so Katawan. Dia ed ontan sanen nadngel nen Simon Pedro a sikato so Katawan, inbalkes to so kawes to (ta akalakseb), tan tinmaboy ed dayat. 

Joh 21:8 Balet saray arum a babangatan dinmago ra ed melag a paraw (ta ag ira arawi ed dalin, ingen singa duan lasus a kasiko), ya ingogoyor da so inet a napno na sirasira. 

Joh 21:9 Dia ed ontan sanen akasakbit ira ed dalin, anengneng da so sake'ya apuy na ngalangalab diman, tan sira ya akatoon, tan tinapay. 

Joh 21:10 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Mangyakar kayo dia na sira a nala yo natan. 

Joh 21:11 Si Simon Pedro sinmakbit tan ingoyor to ed dalin so iket a nakno na ankakabaleg a sira, sanlasus tan limamplo tan talo, et amin nipaakar ed ontan la ya karakel, ag apilat so iket. 

Joh 21:12 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Galidia ta mangalmosal. Et angapo ed saray babangatan so akakpel ya anepet ed sikato, Siopa ka? lapu'd amta ra a sikato so Katawan. 

Joh 21:13 Ondago si Jesus, et alaen to so tinapay tan itdanto'ra, tan ontan met na sira. 

Joh 21:14 Saya sikato natan so mikatlo ya inpatnag nen Jesus ed saray babangatan, kayari to ya inmoli ed bilay. 

Joh 21:15 Dia ed ontan sanen ayari la ran angan, ikuan nen Jesus ed Simon Pedro, Simon, ya anak nen Jonas inaro mo ak a nagkalalo nen saraya? Kuan to ed sikato, On, Katawan; sika amtarn ya inaro ta ka. Kuan to ed sikato, Pakan mo so saray carnerok. 

Joh 21:16 Kuan to lamet ed sikato ed komadua, Simon, anak nen Jonas, inaro mo ak? Kuan to ed sikato, On, Katawan; sika amtam ya inaro ta ka. Kuan to ed sikato, Ipakabkab mo so saray carnerok. 

Joh 21:17 Kuan to ed sikato ed pitlo. Simon, ya anak nen Jonas, inaro mo ak? Si Pedro naermenan lapu'd inkuan to ed sikato ed pitlo, Inaro mo ak? Et inkuan to ed sikato, Katawan, sika amtam ya ami' ganagana; sika amtam ya inaro ta ka. Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Pakan mo so saray carnerok. 

Joh 21:18 Tua, tua, kuan ko ed sika, Sanen ugaw ka ni, binalkesan mo so inkasika, tan nanakarka ed labay mo; balet sano masiken ka la, yunat mo so saray limam, et sananey so mamalkes ed sika, tan yakar da ka ed ag mo labay. 

Joh 21:19 Bang saya sinalita to, ya ipaliwawa to no anton nengneng na ipapatey so pamagloriaan to ed Dios. Et sanen asalita to so saya, kuan to ed sikato, Tombok mo ak. 

Joh 21:20 Si Pedro, nen onarap ed biek, nanengneng to so babangatan ya inaro nen Jesus ya ontotombok; a sikato met so sinmaral ed pagew to sanen panamangdem, tan inkuan to, Katawan, siopa so mangyawat ed sika? 

Joh 21:21 Si Pedro ed satan nen sikato so nanengneng to kuan to ed Jesus, Katawan, et anto so gawaen na saya'n too? 

Joh 21:22 Si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, No labay ko a sikato'y natilak ya anga ed yakar ko dia, anto so wala ed satan ed sika? tombok moak. 

Joh 21:23 Kanian saya'n salita kinmayat ed saray agagi, ya saman a babangatan ag ompatey, anta ag inbaga nen Jesus ed sikato ya ag ompatey; ingen. No labayko, a sikato natilak anga ed yakar ko dia, anto so wala ed satan ed sika? 

Joh 21:24 Sikato ya so babangatan a makatasi ed saraya'n bengatla, et insula'to so saray a bengatla: et amta mi a say panagtasi to sikato so tua. 

Joh 21:25 Et wala met niray amayamay a sananey a bengatla'n ginawa nen Jesus, ya no nisulat ya amin a sansakeyen, isipen kon angan say mundo ed inkasika to ag to naiyan so saray libro a nasulatan. 

PANGASINENSE I Corinthians


1Co 1:1 Si Pablo, atawag a manapostol nen Jesu-Cristo, lapu ed linawa na Dios, tan si Sostenes ya agitayo, 

1Co 1:2 Ed iglesia na Dios ya wala ed Corinto, dia ed saray apasantos ed Cristo Jesus, atawag ira a mansantos, a pati amin a manawag ed ngaran na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo ed balang pasen, a Katawan da tan Katawan tayo met: 

1Co 1:3 Say gracia tan kareenan ed sikayo na Dios ya Ama tayo, tan say Katawan a Jesu-Cristo. 

1Co 1:4 Misalamat ak lawas ed Dios ko, nisengeg ed sikayo, lapu ed gracia Jesu-Cristo so manayam komon ed sikayo. . 

1Co 1:5 Ta dia ed ganagana apayaman kayo ed sikato, ed amin a pananalita, tan amin a kakabatan; 

1Co 1:6 Onong a say pananasi nen Cristo apabiskeg ed sikayo: 

1Co 1:7 Ta pian angapo so kakulangan yo ed bengatla a palangkap; a manaalagar ed ipatnag na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo; 

1Co 1:8 A sikato met so mamabiskeg ed sikayo ya anga ed kasampotan, pian andigapo so pakabalawan yo no agew la na Katawan tayo a JesuCristo. 

1Co 1:9 Matoor so Dios, a dia ed sikato atawag kayo ed pinanabang ed Anak to a Jesu-Cristo a Katawan tayo. 

1Co 1:10 Pikasik sirin ed sikayo, agagi, dia ed ngaran na Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo, ta sikayon amin salitaen yo so saksakey a bengatla, tan angapo so pansisian ed sikayo: no ag ingen ayadyari a pannononong yo ed saksakey a nonot tan saksakey ya isip. 

1Co 1:11 Lapu ed inbaga ra ed siak, so nisengeg ed sikayo, agagik, na saray kaamong nen Cloe, dia ed sikayo wala so saray siblangan. 

1Co 1:12 Labay ko ya ibaga, ya balang sinansakey ed sikayo kuan to, Siak kien ak nen Pablo; tan Siak kien ak nen Apolos; tan Siak kien ak nen Cefas; tan Siak kien ak nen Cristo. 

1Co 1:13 Naapagapag ta si Cristo? nipasak ta ed cruz si Pablo nisengeg ed sikayo? odino abinyagan kayo ta ed ngaran nen Pablo? 

1Co 1:14 Misalamat ak ed Dios, ta angapo so bininyagan ko ed sikayo, no ag bengat si Crispo tan si Gayo; 

1Co 1:15 Pian angapo so mangibaga ya abinyagan kayo ed ngaran ko. 

1Co 1:16 Tan bininyagan ko met so sankaabungan nen Estefanas: likod ni ed saraya, ag ko amta no ni arum. 

1Co 1:17 Ta si Cristo agto ak inbaki a maminyag no ag mangipulong na evangelio: aliwa ya dia ed kakabatan ed salita, ag la piga no say cruz nen Cristo ed nagawa ya andi kanato. 

1Co 1:18 Ta say salita na cruz kakulangkulangan ed saray nabalang; bangbalet pakayari Dios ed sikatayo a nilaban. 

1Co 1:19 Tanisulat, Erepen ko so kakabatan na saray makabat, Ta paandien ko so pakatalos na saray matodio. 

1Co 1:20 Iner so kawalaan na makabat? iner so kawalaan na escriba? iner so kawalaan na misusupiat ed sayan panaon? say Dios ag to ta ginawa a makulangkulang so kakabatan na mundo? 

1Co 1:21 Ta dia ed kakabatan na Dios, say mundo, lapu ed kakabatan to a dili, ag to binirbir so Dios, pinalike'to so Dios lapu ed kakulangkulangan na panangipulong a mangilaban ed saray manisia. 

1Co 1:22 Ta saray Judios kerewen da so tanda, tan saray Griego anapen da so karonongan: 

1Co 1:23 Balet sikami ipulong mi Cristo ya inpasak ed cruz, sakey akagapolan ed saray Judios, tan kakulangkulangan ed saray Gentiles; 

1Co 1:24 Balet dia ed saray atawag, Judio man ono Griego, si Cristo pakayari Dios tan karonongan na Dios. 

1Co 1:25 Tan say kakulangkulangan na Dios maroronong nen saray toto-o; tan say kakapuyan na Dios mabibiskeg nen saray toto-o. 

1Co 1:26 Ta, nengneng yo, agagi, so katawagan yo, ta angapo so dakel a makabat onong ed laman, angapo so dakel a makapanyari, angapo so dakel a mabli a to-o, ed saray natawag: 

1Co 1:27 No ag ingen pinili Dios so saray bengatla a makulangkulang na mundo ya onkana a pamabaing to ed saray makabat; tan pinili to so saray bengatla a makapuy na mundo, ya onkana a pamabaing to ed saray bengatla a mabiskeg; 

1Co 1:28 Tan saray bengatla ya andi kana ed mundo, tan saray ag pinabli, sikara so pinili Dios, tan saray bengatla ya angapo, pian paandien da so saray bengatla ya wala: 

1Co 1:29 Ta pian angapo so laman a manpangta ed arap na Dios. 

1Co 1:30 Et lapu ed sikato wala kayo ed Cristo Jesus, a sikato so agawa ed sikatayo a kakabatan a manlapu ed Dios, tan katonongan, tan panamasantosan, tan pananondon, 

1Co 1:31 Ta onong ed nisulat, Say ongloria mangloria ed Katawan. 



1Co 2:1 Kanian agagi, sanen sinmabiak ed sikayo, agak sinmabi ed kaatageyan na pananalita, odino dia ed kakabatan, a mangipakabat ed sikayo na pananasi Dios. 

1Co 2:2 Ta ninonot ko so ag mangamta a balot ed sikayo, likod si JesuCristo, tan sikato a nipasak ed cruz. 

1Co 2:3 Tan akiayam ak ed sikayo ed kakapuyan tan takot, tan baleg a giwgiw. 

1Co 2:4 Tan say salitak tan panangipulong ko aliwara a salita a makaayayat na kakabatan, no ag dia ed panangipatnag na Espiritu tan pakayari. 

1Co 2:5 Ta pian say pananisia yo aliwan dia ed kakabatan na saray totoo, no ag dia ed pakayari Dios. 

1Co 2:6 Bangbalet sasalitaen mi kakabatan ed saray matatken: ya aliwa a say kakabatan ed saya a mundo, tan saray mamakauley ed saya a mundo, ta saray a onandi ra: 

1Co 2:7 No ag say sasalitaen mikakabatan na Dios ed inkamisterio, a salanti, inamot a kakabatan, a say Dios intadia to nen agni apalsa so mundo ya onkana a gloria tayo: 

1Co 2:8 Saya, angapo so akapikabat ed saray manuley ed saya a mundo, ta no akabatan da komon, ag da inpasak ed cruz so Katawan na gloria: 

1Co 2:9 Et, onong na nisulat. Saray bengatla ya ag anengneng na mata, tan ag nadngel na layag, Tan ag linmoob ed puso na to-o Intadia'ra na Dios ed saray mangaro ed sikato. 

1Co 2:10 Ta say Dios inpuyan to'ra ed sikami ed panamegley na Espiritu: ta say Espiritu kusimaten to so ami bengatla, pati saray kaaralman na bengatla na Dios. 

1Co 2:11 Ta siopa ed saray toto-o kasi mikabat na saray bengatla akien na to-o, no ag say espiritu na dili'n to-o ya wala ed sikato? ontan met, saray bengatla ya kien na Dios angapo so mikabat, no ag say Espiritu na Dios. 

1Co 2:12 Et ingen ta inawa'tayo, aliwa'n say espiritu na mundo, no ag say espiritu a manlapu ed Dios; ta pian nakabatan tayo so saray bengatla a niiter a mabolos ed sikatayo ed Dios. 

1Co 2:13 Saraya'n bengatla sasalitaen tayo met, ya aliwa a dia ed saray salita ya ibabangat na kakabatan na to-o, no ag say ibabangat na Espiritu; a panpaparaen so saray bengatla a maespiritu ed saray maespiritu. 

1Co 2:14 Balet, say to-o a gendat ag to awaten so bengatla na Espiritu'y Dios: ta kakulangkulangan ira ed sikato; tan ag to ra natalosan, ta asumal ira lapu ed espiritu. 

1Co 2:15 Et say too a maespiritu, sumalen to so ami bengatla, tan sikaton dili ag nasukayan nasiopaman a to-o. 

1Co 2:16 Ta siopa kasi akapikabat ed kanonotan na Katawan, ya makapangibangat ed sikato? Sikatayo balet wala ed sikatayo so kanonotan nen Cristo. 



1Co 3:1 Tan siak, agagi, agak akapisalita ed sikayo a singa ed saray totoo a maespiritu, no ag singa saray mangaraldalin, a singa ed saray ugugaw ed kinen Cristo. 

1Co 3:2 Tinagano ta kayo na gatas, ya aliwan tira; ta saya ag yo ni nayarian, tua, angan natan ag yo ni nayarian; 

1Co 3:3 Ta mangaraldalin kayo ni; tan legan ya wala ed sikayo so saray imun tan siblangan, ag kayo ta mangaraldalin tan manaakar ed inkaugali na toto-o? 

1Co 3:4 Ta no kuan na sakey, Siak kien ak nen Pablo; tan say sakey, Siak kien ak nen Apolos ag kayo kasi totoo a mangaraldalin ? 

1Co 3:5 Siopa sirin si Apolos? tan siopa sirin si Pablo? Saray ministros a lapu ed sikara so anisiaan yo; singa say inter na Katawan ed balang sinansakey. 

1Co 3:6 Siak so angitanem, si Apolos so analog; bangbalet say Dios so amabaleg. 

1Co 3:7 No ontan sirin say mantanem tan manalog andi gapo'ra, no ag say Dios a sikato so mamabaleg. 

1Co 3:8 Natan say mantanem tan manalog saksakey ira: et balang sakey awaten to so upa ton dili ya onong na sagpo'to. 

1Co 3:9 Ta sikami kakimeyan na Dios: sikayo so dalin ya ataneman na Dios, sikayo so abung na Dios a paalageyen to. 

1Co 3:10 Onong na gracia na Dios ya niiter ed siak singa sakey a maronong a manangipaalagey, inyan ko so angiletnegan, tan say sananey mangipaalagey ed tapew to. Bang balet imanoen komon na balang sakey no panon so pamaalagey to ed tapew. 

1Co 3:11 Ta angapo so to-o a makapangyan na arum ya angiletnegan nen say inyan la, a salanti si Jesu-Cristo. 

1Co 3:12 Et no siopaman a to-o mangipaalagey ed tapew na sayan angiletnegan, na balitok, pilak, batobato a mabli, kiew, dika ya amagaan, sengeg na day ami; 

1Co 3:13 Balang kimey na to-o nipatnag: ta say agew ipaliwawa to, ta saya nipuyan ed apuy; tan say apuy a dili salien to no anto a nengneng na kimey na balang sakey. 

1Co 3:14 Et no say kimey na siopaman a to-o ya inpaalagey to ed tapew na angiletnegan mansiansia, awaten to so sakey ya tumang. 

1Co 3:15 Et no say kimey na bengatlan to-o naolam sikato so nalogi: et ingen ta sikaton dili nilaban: angan singa lapu ed apuy. 

1Co 3:16 Ag yo ta amta a sikayo so sakey a templo na Dios, tan say Espiritu na Dios manaayam ed sikayo? 

1Co 3:17 Et no siopaman a to-o deralen to so templo na Dios, say Dios deralen to met; ta say templo na Dios masantos, saya a templo sikayo. 

1Co 3:18 Angapo komoy to-on tilaan toy inkasikaton dili, Et no wala so bengatla ed sikayo ya isipen to a makabat ed sayan mundo paolian yo a mankulangkulangan pian ondonong. 

1Co 3:19 Ta say karonongan na sayan mundo kakulangkulangan ed Dios. Ta nisulat, Sikato erelen to so saray makabat ed kasiliban da: 

1Co 3:20 Tan aminsan lamet, Say Katawan amta to so kanonotan na saray maronong, a mapangta ra. 

1Co 3:21 No ontan sirin angapo komoy siopaman ya ongloria ed saray toto-o, Ta ami ganagana kien yo; 

1Co 3:22 Angan si Pablo, odino si Apolos, odino si Cefas, odino say mundo, odino say bilay, odino say ipapatey, odino saray wala natan, odino saray onsabi; amin da kien yo ra; 

1Co 3:23 Tan sikayo kien kayo nen Cristo; tan si Cristo kien na Dios, 



1Co 4:1 Ibilang kami komon na sakey a to-o a singa saray ministros nen Cristo, tan manangasikaso na misterios na Dios. 

1Co 4:2 Et dia, nakaokolan ed saray manangasikaso a sakey a toon naromog a matoor komon. 

1Co 4:3 Bangbalet dia ed siak, sankamelagan a tua so kaokom ko komon ed sikayo, odino say panangokom na to-o: say angan siak ag ko naokom so inkasiak a dili. 

1Co 4:4 Ta angapo so amtak a balot a sumpa ed siak a dili; et angaman ontan aliwa a lapu ed saya nibilang ak a matonong: balet say mangokomed siak say Katawan. 

1Co 4:5 Kanian ag kayo ni mangokom a balot anga ed isabi panaon, anga ed isabi Katawan, a sikato so mangiparongtal ed saray bengatlan niamot ed kabilungetan, tan ipaliwawa to met so saray getma na kapusoan; tan sirin balang sakey makala ed Dios na dayew to. 

1Co 4:6 Tan sarayan bengatla, agagi, inalis ko ra ed alimbawa ed siak a dili tan si Apolos lapu ed sikayo ta pian angapo komon so mantagey na linawa nisengeg ed sakey ya onsumpa ed sakey. 

1Co 4:7 Ta siopa so mangawa ed sika ta pian miduma ka ed arum? tan anto so wala ed sika ya ag no naawat? et no inawat mo akin et manpaspasirayew ka a singa ag mo naawat? 

1Co 4:8 Sikayo napnek kayo la, sikayo mayaman kayo la, akapanari kayo ya andi kami: tan labay ko komon a manari kayo, ta pian makapiari kami met komon ed sikayo. 

1Co 4:9 Ta isipen ko, a say Dios inpasen to kami ya apostoles ya onor ed amin a singara dinusa a pateyen: ta agawa kami ya iimatonan dia ed mundo, tan dia ed saray angeles, tan dia ed saray toto-o. 

1Co 4:10 Makulangkulang kami lapu ed Cristo, sikayo balet makabat kayo ed Cristo; makapuy kami, balet mabiskeg kayo; wala so kagalangan yo, balet sikami namormora kami. 

1Co 4:11 Anga ed saya ya horas natan narasan kami, tan napgaan kami met, tan lakseb kami, tan atamtampal kami, tan angapo so tinandaan a panayaman mi; 

1Co 4:12 Tan mansagpot kami, mankimey kami ed saray lima mi'n dili: anta naayew kami, bendicionan mi; anta osilan kami, itepel mi; 

1Co 4:13 Anta aderal so galang mi, mikasikami: agawa kamin singa dutak na mundo, bulirek na ami ganagana anga ed saya nin agew. 

1Co 4:14 Ag ko isulat so sarayan bengat la a pamabaing ko ed sikayo; no ag say pamilin ko'd sikayo a singa ana' ko ran inararok. 

1Co 4:15 Ta angan wala so samplon libo a bumabangat yo ed Cristo, angaman ontan angapo so dakel ya ama yo: ta inanak ta kayo ed Cristo Jesus lapu ed evangelic 

1Co 4:16 Kanian pikasik ed sikayo ta sikayo komon so manangalig ed siak. 

1Co 4:17 Nisengeg ed saya inbakik ed sikayo si Timoteo, ya ana' ko ya inara rok tan matoor ed Katawan, a sikato so mangipanonot ed sikayo ed saray dalan ko ed Cristo, singa ibabangat ko ed amin a pasen ed balang iglesia. 

1Co 4:18 Et saray arum tinmagey so linawa ra, a singa samay agak la onla ed sikayo. 

1Co 4:19 Balet dia ed magano onla ak ed sikayo, no labay na Katawan; tan nakabatan ko, ya aliwan salita na saray nantagey na linawa, no ag say pakayari. 

1Co 4:20 Ta say panarian na Dios andi ed salita no ag dia ed pakayari. 

1Co 4:21 Anto ta so labay yo? onla ak ed sikayo ya wala so lewet, odino dia ed aro, tan dia ed espiritu na kaoyamoan? 



1Co 5:1 Ta dia ed tua dengel a wala ed sikayo so lawanan, tan satan a lawanan angapo ni ed saray Gentiles, ta sakey ed sikayo kayarianen to so asawa na ama to. 

1Co 5:2 Tan sikayo atagey so linawa yo, tan ag kayo nanermen nen saman, ta pian naekal ed pegley yo so nangawa ed satan a gawa. 

1Co 5:3 Ta dia ed katuaan to, siak, angan andid tan ak ed arap yo dia ed laman, wadtan ak ya akaarap ed espiritu, inokom ko la, a singa wadtan ak ya akaarap, so satay nangawa na sayan gawa. 

1Co 5:4 Dia ed ngaray Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo, atiptipon kayo, tan say espirituk, a pati pakayari Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

1Co 5:5 Pian yawat komon itan ya too ed Satanas a kaderal na laman, pian say espiritu nilaban no agew na Katawan a Jesus. 

1Co 5:6 Say pasirayew yo aliwa'n maong. Ag yo ta amta a say daiset a levadura palebagen to so ami tipay? 

1Co 5:7 Punas yo sirin so daan ya levadura, ta pian onbalo kayo a tipay, a singa kayo andian na levadura. Ta say pasko tayo nibagat met, salanti si Cristo; 

1Co 5:8 Kanian ngilinan tayo so fiesta, aliwa a pati daan a levadura, aliwa met a dia ed lavadura na panangisip na mauges tan say karelmengan, no ag dia ed angapo a levadura na tinapay na kalinisan tan katuaan. 

1Co 5:9 Insulat ko ed sikayo ed sulat ko ya ag ki miolop komon ed saray managlawan; 

1Co 5:10 Agto kabaliksan ya amin na saray managlawan ed saya'n mundo, odino ed saray maagum tan managpatobo, odino ed saray manangigalang ed talintao; ta no ontan sirin nakaokolan yo so onpaway naani ed mundo: 

1Co 5:11 Balet natan, isulat ko ed sikayo ya ag ki miolop ed bengatlan to-o ya angan tatawagen ni na agi no managlawan, odino maagum, odino manangigalang ed talintao, odino managayew, odino managbuanges, odino managpatobo; dia ed satan a to-o ag kayo miolop a mangan. 

1Co 5:12 Ta anto so pibiangan ko a mangokom ed saray wala ed paway? Ag yo ta ra okomen so saray wala edloob? 

1Co 5:13 Balet saray wala ed paway okomen ira na Dios. Paekal yo sirin so mauges a to-o ed pegle'yo. 



1Co 6:1 Wala kasi makapangitepel ed sikayo, a no wala so kolkol to sumpa ed arum, onla ya idalem to ed arap na aliwan matunong, ya aliwan dia ed arap na sasanto? 

1Co 6:2 Odino, Ag yo ta amta a saray sasanto okomen da so mundo? et no say mundo naokom lapu ed sikayo, ag kayo kasi makana a mangokom ed sankamslagan iran pamaakaran? 

1Co 6:3 Ag yo ta amta ya okomen tayo so saray angeles? insan la kasi ed saray bengatla a nabebetangan na sayan bilay? 

1Co 6:4 Kanian no okomen yo so bengatla a nabebetangan na sayan bilay, ipasen yo'ra a mangokom so saray abebbeba ya wala ed iglesia? 

1Co 6:5 Salitaen ko so sayan pamabaing ed sikayo. Ontan kasi ya angapo so naalmo ed sikayo a sakey a maronong a too, a makayari a mangokom ed saray agagi to, 

1Co 6:6 No ag ingen say agi kolkolen to so agi, tan saya dia ed arap na saray ag manisia? 

1Co 6:7 Ontan sirin, sakey Ian kasalanan ya ambelat ed sikayo ya wala ed sikayo so kolkol ya sakey sumpa ed sakey Akin ta ag yo nitepel ya onona so saol? Akin ta et ag yo itepel ya onona so pakalames? 

1Co 6:8 Andi la ingen ta sikayon dili mangawa kayoy saol tan lames, tan dia nimet ni ed saray agagi yo. 

1Co 6:9 Odino Ag yo amta kasi ta saray ag matonong agda natawir so panaria'y Dios? Ag ki patitilaan: angan saray managlawan, angan saray manangigalang ed talintao, angan saray managsinger ed ag da asawa, angan saray binabai, angan saray milawanan ed kapara ra a laki, 

1Co 6:10 Angan saray matakew, angan saray maagum, angan saray managbaunges angan saray managpabanday, angan saray managpatobo, ag da natawir so panariay Dios. 

1Co 6:11 Tan on tan so saray arum ed sikayo nen saman: balet naurasan kayo la, balet apasantos kayo la, balet nibilang kayo la a matunong ed ngaran na Katawan a Jesu-Cristo tan dia ed Espiritu na Dios tayo. 

1Co 6:12 Ami ganagana nayari ra ed siak; balet aliwa ya amin onnepeg ira ed siak. Ami ganagana nayari ed siak; balet agak ontoek ed pakayari siopaman. 

1Co 6:13 Saray kanen onkana ra ed eges, tan say eges onkana ed saray kanen: balet say Dios deralen to so saman tan saray a. Balet say laman ag onkana ed lawanan, balet onkana ed Katawan; tan say Katawan onkana ed laman; 

1Co 6:14 Tan say Dios binangon to so Katawan, tan ontan to met bangonen to itayo lapu ed pakayari to. 

1Co 6:15 Ag yo ta amta a saray laman yo kabiangan ira nen Cristo? alaen ko ta ed saya sirin so saray kabiangan nen Cristo ta gawaen kon kabiangan na bii a paabang? Andi'n balot. 

1Co 6:16 Odino ag yo amta a say mitipon ed sakey a bii'n paabang, sakey a laman ed sikato? ta sikato kuan to ed sulat, Sikaran dua magmaliw ira'n saksakey a laman. 

1Co 6:17 Balet say mitipon ed Katawan sakey ira ya espiritu. 

1Co 6:18 Ibatikan yo so lawanan. Balang kasalanan a gawaen na to-o, wala ed paway na laman; et balet ta say mangawa na lawan mankasalanan ya onsumpa ed laman ton dili. 

1Co 6:19 Odino, ag yo ta amta a say laman yo et templo na Espiritu Santo, ya wala ed sikayo, a sikato so naawat yo ed Dios? tan aliwa a sikayo so makankien ed sikin dili; 

1Co 6:20 Ta sikayo, asaliw kayo na sakey a bill: kanian igalang yo so Dios ed laman yo. 



1Co 7:1 Natan no nipaakar ed saray bengatla ya insulat yo ed siak; Maong ed laki ya ag to diwiten so bii. 

1Co 7:2 Angaman ontan, lapu'd lawanan, balang laki wala so asawa to ya dili, tan balang bii wala komon so asawa to'y a dili. 

1Co 7:3 Say laki iter to komon ed asawa so kanepegan, tan ontan met say bii ed asawa. 

1Co 7:4 Say bii aliwa'lan sikato'y makankien ed laman ton dili, no ag say asawa: tan ontan met, say laki aliwa Ian sikato'y makankien ed laman to'n dili, no ag say bii. 

1Co 7:5 Ag kayo manpapalingoan, sakey tan sakey ed sikayo, likod lambengat no nanpaknaan yo ed pigara'n panaon, ta pian naarap yo so mikasi, tan mantipon ki lamet, ta pian si Satanas ag to kayo toksoen lapu'd ag yo pakatpel. 

1Co 7:6 Et salitaen ko so saya lapu ed panangiaboloy, aliwa a dia ed gangan. 

1Co 7:7 Balet labay ko komon ya amin a totoo singa ra siak a dili. Et balang sakey wala so dili a palangkap to a manlapu ed Dios, say sakey singa saya tan say sananey singa saman. 

1Co 7:8 Et kuan ko ed saray andian na asawa tan saray bibii a balo, Ta maong ed sikara no makapansiansia ra a singa siak. 

1Co 7:9 Et no ag ira makatpel, mankakasal ira: ta magmaong ni mankasal nen say napoolan. 

1Co 7:10 Et dia ed saray nankasal, igangan ko, aliwan siak, no ag say Katawan, Ta say bii ag misian ed asawa to. 

1Co 7:11 (Et no sikato so misian, mansiansia ya ag miasawa, no ag ingen mipolangan komon ed asawa to); tan say laki ag to kaindanen so asawa to. 

1Co 7:12 Et dia ed saray arum, siak kuan ko, aliwan say Katawan: No wala so siopaman ya agi a laki ya wala so asawa to ya ag manisia, tan no linawa to so miamong ed sikato, ag to komon kaindanen. 

1Co 7:13 Tan say bii'n wala'y asawa to'n ag manisia, tan no linawa to so mia mong ed sikato, ag to kaindanen so asawa to. 

1Co 7:14 Ta say asawan laki ya ag manisia napasanto ed bii ya asawa, tan say asawan bii ya ag manisia napasantos ed agi: ta no aliwa'n ontan saray anak yo marutak ira komon; natan balet masantos ira. 

1Co 7:15 Et no ontainan so ag manisia, paolian yo ya ontainan: say agi'n laki odino agi'n bii andi ed sirum na inkaaripen no dia ed saraya a bengatla: balet say Dios tinawag to itayo ed kareenan. 

1Co 7:16 Ta panon so pakaamtam, O bii, no nilaban mo lagi asawam? odino panon so pakaamtam, O laki, no nilaban mo lagi asawam? 

1Co 7:17 Onong a singa say inpangiotob na Katawan ed balang sakey, tan singa say inpanawag na Dios ed balang sakey, ontan komon so panakar to. Tan onia so igangan ko ed amin ya iglesia. 

1Co 7:18 Atawag so bengatla a to-o ya agalsiman? ag onpawil ya ag agal siman. Atawag so bengatla a to-o ya ag agalsiman? ag pagalsiman. 

1Co 7:19 Say kagalsiman andi kakanaan to, tan say ag kagalsiman andi kakanaan to; no ag say pananumpal na saray gangan na Dios. 

1Co 7:20 Balang to-o mansiansia komon ed pasen ya atawagan to. 

1Co 7:21 Atawag ka kasi anta aripen ka? ag mo kapagaan: et no nayarian mo so onpawil a bolos, anamot mo. 

1Co 7:22 Ta say atawag ed Katawan, anta aripen, sikato so bolos a too na Katawan: ontan met a say atawag anta bolos, sikato so aripen nen Cristo. 

1Co 7:23 Sikayo asaliw kayo ed sakey a bili; ag kayo magmaliw ya aripen na toto-o. 

1Co 7:24 Agagi, balang sakey, manayam komon ed Dios dia ed atawagan to. 

1Co 7:25 No nipaakar ed saray mamarikit, angapo ed siak so gangan na Katawan: angaman ontan iter ko'y kaisipan ko, a singa sakey ya akagamor na panangasi Katawan ta pian napanpiaan. 

1Co 7:26 Kanian isipen ko a saya et maong lapu'd irap tayo natan, a salanti maong ed asawan ya ontan to la. 

1Co 7:27 Asinger ka ed asawan bii? ag mo aanapen so kabolos mo. Nablos ka ed asawan bii? ag mo aanapen so bi-i. 

1Co 7:28 Et angan mangasawa ka, ag ka makapankasalanan: tan no sakey a marikit miasawa, ag makapankasalanan. Balet saraya wala naani irap da ed laman: tan labay ko ya ilaban takayo. 

1Co 7:29 Et kuan ko yo, agagi, ta say panaon apatikeyan la, ta pian manlapu ed natan, saray lalaki ya walaan na asawa, magmaliw ira a singa angapo so asawa ra; 

1Co 7:30 Tan saray mannangis, singa ra ag mannangis; tan saray mangayaga, singa ra ag mangayaga; tan saray manaliw, singa angapo ed sikara; 

1Co 7:31 Tan saray managamil ed mun do, agda komon aagamilen ya alabas: ta say ugali na saya'n mundo nana-ebas. 

1Co 7:32 Et labay ko komon a bolos kayo ed saray kapagaan. Say ag angasawa panpagaan to so saray kien na Katawan, no panon kasi pamalike'to ed Katawan: 

1Co 7:33 Balet say angasawa panpagaan to so saray kayarian na mundo, no panon kasi pamalike'to ed asawa to. 

1Co 7:34 Tan wala met so pandumaan na bi-i ya akiasawa tan say marikit. Say ag ni akiasawa panpagaan to so saray kayarian na Katawan, ta pian nayarian to so onsanta ed laman tan espiritu met: et say akiasawa panpagaan to so saray kayarian na mundo, no panon kasi pamalike'to ed asawa to. 

1Co 7:35 Tan salitaen ko so saraya ed kaabigan yo; aliwan pangalot ko ed sikayo, no ag lapu ed manepeg, pian panlinkoran yo so Katawan ed andi talibaga. 

1Co 7:36 Et no siopaman a to-o a mangawa na ag manepeg ed mariki'to, no onlabas la ed bulaklak na taon to, tan nakaokolan, gawaen to so panaglabay to; ag mankasalanan; manaasawa ra. 

1Co 7:37 Balet say mabiskeg ed puso to ya angapo so pankaokolan to'n mabiskeg nipaakar ed linawa to'n dili, tan ginetma to ed puso ton dili so pangyatol to na mariki'to, maong so gawaen to. 

1Co 7:38 Kanian say mamaasawa ed anak to'n marikit maong so gawaen to; tan say ag mamaasawa ed sikato, magmaong so gawaen to. 

1Co 7:39 Say bi-i asinger legan a mabilay so asawa to; balet no onpatey so asawa, sikato so bolos a miasawa ed labay to; dia ed linawa na Katawan lambengat. 

1Co 7:40 Et lalon magayaga no ontan to la natan, onong ed isip ko: tan isip ko ya wala ed siak met so Espiritu na Dios. 



1Co 8:1 Natan no nipaakar ed saray bengatla'n nibagat ed saray talintao: Amta mi ta sikitin amin wala so kakabatan tayo. Say kakabatan patageyen to so linawa, balet say panangaro so mamaabig. 

1Co 8:2 No say siopaman a to-o a mangisip a kaba'to so anto kaman a bengatla, angapo ni kaba'to a singa nepeg to a kabaten; 

1Co 8:3 Et no siopaman a to-o kaba'to so Dios, ontan met a sikato'y kabat na Dios. 

1Co 8:4 No nipaakar sirin ed pangan ed saray bengatla ran nibagat ed saray talintao, amta tayo a sakey a talintao angapo so kakanaan ko ed mundo, tan angapo so arum a Dios no ag saksakey a bokor. 

1Co 8:5 Ta angan wala so tatawagen ya dirios, angan dia ed tawen odino dia ed dalin; a singa wala so dakel a dirios tan dakel a kakatawan; 

1Co 8:6 No dia'd sikami wala so saksakey a Dios, say Ama, a sikato so panlapuan na ami ganagana, tan sika-tayo dia ed sikato; tan saksakey a Katawan, si Jesu-Cristo, a diad panamegley to wala so ami ganagana, tan sikatayo diad panamegley to. 

1Co 8:7 Angaman ontan, angapo ed saray amin a totoo so saya'n kakabatan: no ag ingen saray arum angar natan niluam ira ed talintao, mangan ira a singa'ra mangan na sakey a bengatla ya inbagat ed sakey a talintao; tan say linawara ed puso ra, bangta makapuy nadutakan. 

1Co 8:8 Balet say kanen ag to itayo pagmaliwen ya mabli ed Dios: ag itayo mauguges no ag itayo mangan'; tan ag itayo magmaong no mangan itayo. 

1Co 8:9 Et imano yo, ta ag la piga no saya'n inkabulos yo magmaliw a kagapolan na saray makapuy. 

1Co 8:10 Ta no wala so makanengneng ed sika, ya wala so kakabatan mo a manyodyorong ka a mangan diman ed templo na talintao, ag kasi narag-dag so linawa na puso to, sikato anta makapuy, a mangan na saray bengatla'n nibagat ed saray talintao? 

1Co 8:11 Ta lapu ed kakabatan mo say makapuy nabalang, say agi a lapu ed sikato inatey si Cristo. 

1Co 8:12 Tan mankasalanan kayo na onia ya onsumpa ed saray agagi, tan sinugatan yo so linawa na puso ra bang nen makapuy, mankasalanan kayo na onsumpa ed Cristo. 

1Co 8:13 Kanian no say kanen so makalanor a katiroran na agik, agak mansira na asalian a balot angan kapi-gan man, ta pian aliwa siak so sengeg na katiroran na agik. 



1Co 9:1 Agak ta bolos? agak ta apostol? ag ko ta anengneng si Jesus a Katawan tayo? aliwa tan sikayo ra so kimey ko ed Katawan? 

1Co 9:2 No aliwa ak ya apostol ed saray arum, andi duarua balet ya apostol ak ed sikayo: ta sikayo lanti so tata'k na inkaapostol ko ed Katawan. 

1Co 9:3 Say ebat ko ed saray manumal ed siak saya. 

1Co 9:4 Angapo ta so pankatonongan mi a mangan tan oninum? 

1Co 9:5 Angapo ta so pankatonongan mi a mangawit na sakey ya asawa a mananisia, a singa saray arum ya apostoles, tan saray agagi Katawan, tan si Cefas? 

1Co 9:6 Odino siak lambengat tan si Bernabe angapo ta so katonongan mi ya ontonda'n onkimey? 

1Co 9:7 Siopatan sondalo so mansian sia'n manlinkor a bayaran to so gastos to'n dili? siopa ta so mantanem na uvas ya ag mangan na bunga to? odino, siopa ta so mamastol na ayep ya ag natagano ed gatas na ayep? 

1Co 9:8 Ibagak ta so sarayan bengatla onong na ugali na toto-o? odino say gangan ag to ta ibabaga met lanlamang? 

1Co 9:9 Ta nisulat ed gangan nen Moises, Ag mo balongosan so vaca a mangiilik na maiz. Panpagaan ta na Dios so saray vaca, 

1Co 9:10 Odino kuan to a tua lapu'd sikatayo? On, lapu ed sikatayo, andi duarua, nisulat so saya, ta say manbaka nepeg to so manbaka a siiilalo, tan say mangiling, mangiling a siiilalo ed pinabang to. 

1Co 9:11 No intane'mi ed sikayo so saray bengatla a nipaakar ed espiritu, baleg so kana to a manani kami ed sa ray bengatla a kien yo nipaakar ed laman? 

1Co 9:12 No saray arum minabang ira ed saya a pakauley ed sikayo, ag lalo kasi ed sikami? Et angaman ontan, ag mi inagamil so sayan pakauley; noag ingen itepel mi ya amin, ta pian ag kami mangaway makasbel ed evangelio nen Cristo. 

1Co 9:13 Ag yo ta amta a saray mankimey ed saray bengatla a sagrado, mangan ira ed saray kien na templo, tan saray manlinkor ed altar mibiang ira ed altar? 

1Co 9:14 Ontan met ya ingangan na Katawan ya saray mangipulong ed evangelio, manbilay ira ed evangelio. 

1Co 9:15 Balet angapo so inagamil ko ed saraya'n bengatla: tan ag ko isulat iraya ta pian nagawa ya ontan ed siak; ta magmaong ni onpatey ak nen say siopaman a too pagmaliwen to ya andi kakanaan so gloria. 

1Co 9:16 Ta no ipulong ko so evangelio, angapo so pangloriaan ko; ta say kapilitan sikato so amasuut ed siak; et abagey ak la no ag ko ipulong so evangelic 

1Co 9:17 Ta no gawaen ko so saya ed bolos na linawak a dili, wala so upak: et no andi ed linawak a dili, wala so betang ko a managasikaso a nipia ed siak. 

1Co 9:18 Anto sirin so upak? Ta, bang no ipulong ko so evangelio, gawaen ko ya angapo so bayar na evangelio, tan say panagamil ko ag onlabas ed pakauley ko ed evangelio. 

1Co 9:19 Ta angan bolos ak ed ami to-o, inpaaripen ak ed amin, ta pian makatalo ak ni dakdakel. 

1Co 9:20 Tan dia ed saray Judio, nagmaliwak a singa Judio, ta pian na alak so saray Judio; dia ed saray wala ed silong na gangan, singa wala ed silong na gangan, angan andi ak a dili ed silong na gangan, ta pian na alak so saray wala ed silong na gangan; 

1Co 9:21 Dia ed saray angapo so gangan, singa angapo so gangan, ali-wa ya angapo ak ed gangan na Dios, no ag dia ed silong na gangan nen Cristo, pian naalak so saray angapo so gangan. 

1Co 9:22 Dia ed saray makapuy nagmaliwak a makapuy, pian naalak so saray makapuy: nagmaliwak ya ami ganagana ed ami'n day toto-o, ta pian dia ed ami gawa nilaban ko so saray arum. 

1Co 9:23 Tan gagawaen ko ra ra ya amin nisengeg ed evangelio, pian makapinabang ak ed sikato. 

1Co 9:24 Ag yo ta amta a saray manlolomba ombatik ira ya amin, et saksakey so makala na upa? Batik kayo siri on tan; ta pian makala kayo. 

1Co 9:25 Tan amin a mampapasal ed batikan, sikara so mandang ka ed ami ganagana. Natan sikara gagawaen da so saya pian naawat da so naderal a balanget; balet sikatayo say ag naderal. 

1Co 9:26 Kanian onia ombatik ak, aliwa a singa panduaruaan; onia miponi tian ak, aliwa a singa say manlewet ed dagem: 

1Co 9:27 No ag ingen leweten ko so laman ko, tan yan ko ed silong na kaaripenan: ta ag la piga no nagawa, no kayarik ya angipulong ed saray arum, siak a dili so nipulisay. 



1Co 10:1 Ta ag ko labay, agagi, ya ag yo naamtaan a saray kaamaan tayo amin da wala'ra nensaman ed silong na lurem, tan amin da dinmalan ira ed pegley na dayat; 

1Co 10:2 Tan amin da abinyagan ira ed Moises dia ed lurem tan dia ed dayat; 

1Co 10:3 Tan angan iran amin ed saman met ya maespiritu'n kanen; 

1Co 10:4 Tan inminum iran amin ed saman met ya maespiritu'n iinumen: lapu ed inminum ira ed maespiritu a baton dampay ya tinmombok ed sikara: tan say baton dampay si Cristo. 

1Co 10:5 Angaman on tan karaklan ed sikara ag da apaliket so Dios: ta nagbara ed kalawakan. 

1Co 10:6 Natan saraya'n bengatla panuliranan ed sikatayo, ta pian ag itayo unagum ed saray mauges a bengatla, a singa inaguman da met. 

1Co 10:7 Tan ag kayo komon mangigalang ed saray talintao, singa saray arum ed sikara; onong na nisulat, Saray toto-o imyorong ira a mangan tan oninum, tan inmalagey ira a mangalaw. 

1Co 10:8 Tan ag itayo met manlawan, a singa arum ed sikara a mangawara, tan naplag ed sikara ed sanagew so duamplo tan talon libo. 

1Co 10:9 Tan ag tayo komon gawaen so panalsali ed Katawan a singa saray arum ed sikara nangawa ra na panalsali, tan abagbag ira ed saray uleg. 

1Co 10:10 Tan ag kayo mantalabutob komon, a singa arum ed sikara nantalabutob ira, tan inatey ira ed managbagbag. 

1Co 10:11 Natan saraya'n bengatla agawa ed sikara a singa uliran: tan nisulat ira a bilin ed sikatayo, ya asabian da so kasumpalan na saya'n panaon.
