1Co 10:12 Kanian say mangisip a manalalagey, imanoen to komon ompan napelag. 

1Co 10:13 Ag kayo asabian na bengatla'n katotokso no ag samay nitepel na ami to-o: bangbalet say Dios matoor, ta ag to kayo paulian a natokso na onlabas ed nayarian yo; no ag ingen pati tokso, mangawa met na dalan a paliisan, ta pian nayarian yo ya itepel. 

1Co 10:14 Kanian, inararok ira, ibatikan yo so saray talintao. 

1Co 10:15 Misasalita ak a singa ed saray makabat; nonoten yo so kuan ko. 

1Co 10:16 Say copa na bendicion a sikatoy bendicionan tayo, aliwa ta'n sikato so pakapinabangan tayo ed dala nen Cristo? Say tinapay a pisagen tayo, aliwa ta'n sikato so pakapinabangan tayo ed laman nen Cristo? 

1Co 10:17 Ta angan dakel itayo, saksakey itayo a tinapay, saksakey a laman: ta amin tayo minabang itayo ed saksakey a tinapay, 

1Co 10:18 Nengneng yo so Israel onong ed laman: saray mangan na bagat ag ira kasi makapinabang ed altar? 

1Co 10:19 Anto so ikuan ko sirin? ta say bengatla ya inbagat ed saray talintao wala so kakanaan to, odino say talintao wala so kakanaan to? 

1Co 10:20 Balet kuan ko, ta saray bengatla ya ibagat na saray Gentiles, ibagat da ed saray demonios, ya aliwan dia ed Dios: tan ag ko labay komon a minabang kayo ed saray demonios. 

1Co 10:21 Ag yo nayarian so oninum ed copa na Katawan, tan say copa na saray demonios: ag yo nayari minabang ed dulang na Katawan, tan say dulang na saray demonios. 

1Co 10:22 Naragdag tayo kasi Katawan a mangimon? mabibiskeg itayo ta nen sikato? 

1Co 10:23 Ami bengatla niaboloy, bangbalet aliwa'n amin et manepeg. Ami bengatla niaboloy; bangbalet ta aliwa ya amin da mamabiskeg. 

1Co 10:24 Angapo komon so siopa'n to-o a mananap na kaabigan to'n dili, no ag say kaabigan na kapara to'n to-o, 

1Co 10:25 Dia ed amin ya ilako ed tindaan, mangan kayo, angapo la so tepettepeten yo lapu ed conciencia; 

1Co 10:26 Ta say dalin kien na Katawan, tan ganagana a lugan to. 

1Co 10:27 No sakey ed saray ag manisia bagaan tc kayo ed sakey a fiesta, tan labay yo so onia; ganagana'n isaklang da ed arap yo, akan yo, angapo la so tepettepeten yo lapu ed conciencia. 

1Co 10:28 Bangbalet no wala so siopaman a to-o'n mangibaga ed sikayo, Saya niiter ed bagat, ag yo kakanen, a nisengeg ed saman so angipaliwawa, tan nisengeg ed conciencia; 

1Co 10:29 Conciencia, kuan ko, aliwa'n say kien mo, no ag say kien na sakey; ta akin kasi et naokom so kabolosan ko lapu ed conciencia na sananey? 

1Co 10:30 No minabang ak a tekep na pisasalamat, akin kasi et paugsen ak nisengeg ed saman so pisalamatan ko? 

1Co 10:31 Angan mangan kayo sirin, odino oninum, odino antokaman a gawaen yo, gawa yo ya amin ed gloria na Dios. 

1Co 10:32 Ag kayo mangiiter na sengeg na katiroran, angan dia ed saray Judio, angan dia ed saray Griego, angan dia ed iglesia na Dios: 

1Co 10:33 Singa met siak paliketen ko ya ami too ed amiganagana, ag ko aanapen so gungunak a dili, no ag say gunguna na karaklan, pian nilaban ira. 



1Co 11:1 Mialig kayo komon ed siak, singa siak met ed Cristo. 

1Co 11:2 Natan dayewen takayo ta nonoten yo ak ed ami ganagana, tan yatol yo a malet so saray bangat ed onong na inpangyawat ko ed sikayo. 

1Co 11:3 Bangbalet labay ko komon ya kabaten yo a say olo na balang laki si Cristo; tan say olo na balang bi-i say laki; tan say olo nen Cristo say Dios. 

1Co 11:4 Balang laki a manpipikasi odino manpaparles a pinandongan so olo to, pabandayen to so olo to. 

1Co 11:5 Balet balang bi-i a manpipikasi odino manpaparles ya ag to pinandongan so olo pabandayen to so olo to, ta singa met no akiskisan so olo to. 

1Co 11:6 Ta no sakey a bi-i ag nanpandong, mankiskis met: et no sakey a makapabaing ed bii a manpoklis odino nakiskisan, manpandong komon. 

1Co 11:7 Ta say laki diad tua, ag manepeg a pandongan to so olo to, ta sikato so talintao tan gloria na Dios: bang say bi-i sikato so gloria na laki. 

1Co 11:8 Ta say laki ag dia ed bi-i, no ag say bi-i dia ed laki: 

1Co 11:9 Ta ag met apalsa so laki a nitalaga ed bi-i; no ag say bi-i nitalaga ed laki: 

1Co 11:10 Lapu ed saya a sengegan manepeg a say bi-i wala so sakey a tanda na pakayari ed tapew na olo to lapu ed saray angeles. 

1Co 11:11 Angaman ontan say bi-i ag ayadyari ya andi laki, ontan met na laki ya andi bi-i, ed Katawan. 

1Co 11:12 Ta singa say bi-i kien na laki, ontan met say laki lapu ed bii; balet ami ganagana kien ira na Dios. 

1Co 11:13 Isisip yo pa ed sikayo'n dili: manepeg kasi ed sakey a bi-i a manpipikasi ed Dios ya ag manpandong? 

1Co 11:14 Say dili'n inkato-o ag to kayo ta ibangat a no sakey a laki andukey so buek to ed sakey a makapabanday ed sikato? 

1Co 11:15 Balet ta no sakey a bi-i andu key so buek to, sakey a galang ed sikato: ta say buek to niiter ed sikato a sakbong to. 

1Co 11:16 Et no wala so siopan too a nengneng to so makolkol, ag mi naugalian itan, tan angapo met ed saray iglesia na Dios. 

1Co 11:17 Et dia ed pangibilin ko ed sikayo ed saya, ag ta kayo idayew ta bangno mantitipon kayo aliwa'n lapud magmaong, no ag ingen mauguges. 

1Co 11:18 Ta onona ed amin, bang no mantitipon kayo ed iglesia narengelan ko ya wala'ra'y kolkolan ed kasiksikanan yo; tan no maminsan manisia ak. 

1Co 11:19 Tan nakaokolan met ya wala'ra so herejias ed kasiksikanan yo, pian saray naabobonan nipatnag ira ed kasiksikanan yo. 

1Co 11:20 Bang no mantitipon kayo sirin, ag nayari a kanen yo so pangdeman na Katawan: 

1Co 11:21 Ta say panamangdem yo balang sakey kanen to ed ona na sakey so dilin pangdeman to, tan say sakey narasan, say sakey abuek. 

1Co 11:22 Anto? angapo tay kaabungan yo a panganan yo tan inuman yo? odino modmoraen yo so iglesia na Dios tan pabaingan yo'ra so andian? Anto kasi ibagak ed sikayo? idayew ta kayo kasi ed saya? Ag ta kayo idayew ed saya. 

1Co 11:23 Ta inawat ko ed Katawan a sikato met so inyawat ko ed sikayo, a say Katawan a Jesus dia eo. saman a labi ya inkiawa'to, angala na tinapay; 

1Co 11:24 Tan nen akapisalamat la, pinisag to, tan inkuan to, Saya sikato so laman ko, a napisag lapu ed sikayo: gawa yo so saya a pannodnonotan yo ed siak. 

1Co 11:25 Ontan met say copa, nen kayari to a nangdem, kuan to, Saya'n copa sikato so Balon Sipan ed dalak: gawa yo so saya kapag no inuman yo, a pannodnonotan yo ed siak. 

1Co 11:26 Ta kapag no kanen yo so saya a tinapay, tan inuman yo so copa, ipakabat yo so inpatey na Katawan anga ed isabi to. 

1Co 11:27 Kanian say siopaman a mangan ed tinapay tan oninum ed copa na Katawan ya ag makana mankasalanan ed laman tan dala na Katawan. 

1Co 11:28 Et salien na to-o ed sikaton dili, tan ontan mangan na tinapay, tan oninum ed copa. 

1Co 11:29 Ta say mangan tan oninum, kanen to tan inumen to so kaokom ed inkasikaton dili, no agto ibiig so laman. 

1Co 11:30 Lapud sayan sengegan dakel ed kasiksikanan yo so makapuy tan mainagem, tan aliwan daiset iray naugip. 

1Co 11:31 Et no ibiig tayo'y inasikatayon dili komon, ag itayo naokom. 

1Co 11:32 Et sano naokom itayo, adusa itayo ed Katawan, ta pian ag itayo nadusa a pati mundo. 

1Co 11:33 Kanian, agagik, sano mantitipon kayo a mangan, manaalagaran kayo. 

1Co 11:34 No siopaman a to-on narasan mangan ni ed abung; pian say pantitipon yo ag magmaliw a kaokom. Tan saray arum oksoyen ko ra sano onsabi ak. 



1Co 12:1 Natan no nipaakar ed saray maespiritu'n langkap, agagi, ag ko labay komon ya ag yo nakabatan. 

1Co 12:2 Amta yo ta nen Gentil kayo ni, intengteng kayo ed sarayan emel a talintao, ed angan panon ya inkitengteng yo. 

1Co 12:3 Kanian ipakabat ko ed sikayo, ta angapo so to-o a mansalita dia ed Espiritu na Dios a kuan to, Si Jesus naayew; tan angapo so to-o a makapangibaga, Si Jesus sikato so Katawan, no ag ingen dia ed Espiritu Santo. 

1Co 12:4 Natan wala so panduruma na saray langkap, balet saksakey ya Espiritu. 

1Co 12:5 Tan wala so panduruma na saray panagpangolo tan saksakey a Katawan. 

1Co 12:6 Tan wala so panduruma na saray panagkimey, balet saksakey a Dios, a sikato so mangawa ed ami ganagana ed amin. 

1Co 12:7 Balet niiter ed balang sakey so kipapatnag na Espiritu a paninawaan met. 

1Co 12:8 Ta dia ed sakey niiter so salita na kakabatan lapu ed Espiritu; tan ed arum say salita ya karonongan, onong ed dilin Espiritu: 

1Co 12:9 Ed arum pananisia, lapu ed dili ya Espiritu; tan ed arum saray langkap ed pananambal, lapu ed saksakey ya Espiritu; 

1Co 12:10 Tan ed arum say pakagawa ed saray pakelaw; tan ed sananey say profecia, tan ed arum say panangibiig ed saray espiritu: ed arum saray nanbabangil a nengneng na salita; tan ed arum say panangipatalos ed saray salita: 

1Co 12:11 Et amin da ra nia gawaen na saksakey tan say dili ya Espiritu, yotob to ed balang sakey onong na panaglabay to. 

1Co 12:12 Ta singa say laman sakey, tan wala so dakel, a kabiangan to, tan amin a kabiangan na laman, anta dakel, saksakey ira a laman; ontan met si Cristo. 

1Co 12:13 Ta dia ed sakey ya Espiritu abinyagan itayo amin ed sakey a laman, angan Judios odino Griegos, angan aripen odino bolos; tan apainum itayo'n amin ed sakey ya Espiritu. 

1Co 12:14 Ta say laman aliwan sakey a kabiangan, no ag amayamay. 

1Co 12:15 No say sali ibaga to, Bangta aliwa ak a lima, agak kabiangan na laman; aliwan lapu ed satan ed ag kabiangan na laman. 

1Co 12:16 Tan no say layag ibaga to, Bangta aliwa ak a mata, agak kabiangan na laman; aliwa a lapu ed satan ya ag kabiangan na laman. 

1Co 12:17 Et no say masimoon a laman et mata komon, iner so kawalaan na pakadngel? Et no say amin et pakadngel komon, iner so kawalaan na pakaangob? 

1Co 12:18 Balet natan say Dios inpasen to ra so kabiangan balang sakey ed sikara ed laman, a singa say apaabig to. 

1Co 12:19 Ta no amin da sakey iran kabiangan komon, iner so kawalaan na laman? 

1Co 12:20 Balet natan dakel ira'n kabiangan, balet sakey a laman. 

1Co 12:21 Tan say mata ag to nayarian ya ibaga ed lima, Ag ta ka nakaokolan: odino say olo met ed saray sali, Ag ta kayo nakaokolan. 

1Co 12:22 Sumlang ingen, ta saray kabiangan na laman ya iisipen ira'n nagkalalon makapuy sikara so nakaolan: 

1Co 12:23 Tan saray kabiangan na laman, ya isipen tayo ra a kulang na galang, sikara so kawesan tayo na daakan a galang; tan saray mabanday tayo a kabiangan lalo'n daakan so karakpan da; 

1Co 12:24 Ta saray marakep tayo a kabiangan ag ira kaokolan: balet say Dios inoksoy to so laman ed sikato a initdan to na lalo'n daakan a galang so kabiangan a makulang; 

1Co 12:25 Pian angapo so pansisian ed laman, no ag saray kabiangan wala so dili a panagpaga ra ed sakey tan sakey. 

1Co 12:26 Tan no nairapan so sakey a kabiangan, amin a kabiangan miiirap ira ed sikato; odino sakey a kabiangan so napagalangan, amin da'y kabiangan mililiket ira ed sikato. 

1Co 12:27 Natan sikayo so laman nen Cristo, tan balang sakey kabiangan to. 

1Co 12:28 Tan say Dios inpasen to so arum ed iglesia, inmona saray apostoles, komadua saray profetas, komatlo saray managbangat, insan saray pakelaw, insan saray langkap ed pananam-bal, saray pananolang, saray panaguley, saray nagsisananey a salita. 

1Co 12:29 Apostoles ira kasi ya amin? profetas ira kasi ya amin? managbangat ira kasi ya amin? managawa ra kasi ya amin na pakelaw? 

1Co 12:30 Walaan ta ra'n amin na langkap da ed pananambal? makasalita ta ra'n amin ed saray salita? makapangitalos ya amin? 

1Co 12:31 Balet panpirawatan yo a sisese seg so saray ankabkabaleg a langkap. Tan sakey a sankaabigan ni a dalan so ipanengneng ko ed sikayo. 



1Co 13:1 No mansalita ak komon ed dila na toto-o, tan saray angeles, balet angapo'y arok, nagawaak a singa mantaknol a gansa odino manbanengbeng a piangpiang. 

1Co 13:2 Tan no wala komon so langkap na inkaprofeta ed siak, tan amtak komon ya amin so misterios tan amin ya karonongan; tan no wala komon ya amin ed siak so pananisia, ta pian napaalis ko komon so saray kapa-landeyan, et no angapo'y arok andi kakanaan ko. 

1Co 13:3 Tan no ipayabol ko komon ya ami kayarian ko pian napakan ko'ray duruka, tan no iter ko komon so laman ko a papoolan, et no angapo'y arok komon, angapo so nagungunak. 

1Co 13:4 Say aro manangitepel, tan maoyamo; say aro angapoy sible'to; say aro ag to ipasirayew so inkasikato, aliwa'n mapangta, 

1Co 13:5 Aliwa'n mabanday so kagagawa to, ag to anapen so kien to, ag manpasnok, ag manisip na mauges; 

1Co 13:6 Ag to panliketan so ag onkatunongan, balet manliket ed katuaan; 

1Co 13:7 Amin itepel to, amin sisiaen to, amin ilaloan to, amin songduan to. 

1Co 13:8 Say aro ag balot manganga: et angan wala ni so saray profecias, manganga ira, angan wala ni ray salita, ontonda ra; angan wala ni ray karonongan, naerep ira. 

1Co 13:9 Ta amta tayo so arum, tan profetaan tayo so arum: 

1Co 13:10 Et bang no say ayadyari so ondateng, say ag ni ayadyari so naekal. 

1Co 13:11 Nen ugaw ak, nansasalita ak a singa ugaw, akalikna ak a singa ugaw, nanisip ak, a singa ugaw: natan ta nagmaliwak a to-o, paulian ko ray kagagawa na ugaw. 

1Co 13:12 Ta natan onnengneng itayo ed sakey a salming ed mabilunget; balet insan lupalupaan; natan amtak so arum; et no ontan kabaten ko a nagnap a singa met inpakapikabat ed siak a nagnap. 

1Co 13:13 Et natan mansiansia so pananisia, ilalo, aro, sarayan talo; et say kabalbalgan ed saraya say aro. 



1Co 14:1 Tomb ok yo so aro; panpirawatan yo ni marlang so maespiritu'n lang kap balet lalo la no manprofeta kayo. 

1Co 14:2 Ta say mansalita na ag kabat a salita ag misalita ed saray totoo, no ag dia ed Dios; ta angapo so to-o makatalos; et dia ed espiritu sikato'y mansalita na saray misterios. 

1Co 14:3 Et say manprofeta mansalita ed ibibiskeg na toto-o, tan panbilin, tan panligliwa. 

1Co 14:4 Say mansalita na agkabat a salita pabiskegen to so sikaton dili; et say manprofeta pabiskegen to so iglesia. 

1Co 14:5 Natan labay ko komon a makasalita kayo ya amin na ag kabat ira a salita, et lalo la komon no manprofeta kayo: tan babaleg so manprofeta nen say mansalita na saray ag kabat a salita, likod no ipatalos to, pian say iglesia et onbiskeg. 

1Co 14:6 Et natan, agagi, no onla ed sikayo a mansalita na ag kabat ira'n salita, anto kasi nagungunak ed sikayo, likod no kasalita takayo, balang la ed pamaakaran na puyan, ono pikakabat, ono panamarles, odino lapu ed bangat? 

1Co 14:7 Angan saray bengat la'ran andian na bilay, ya ontanol; say tololi odino arpa, no ag dara itdan na pandurumaan na tanol da, panon kasi sirin so pakapangibiig ed tanol na tololi odino arpa? 

1Co 14:8 Ta no say trumpeta ontanol natanol a panduaruaan, siopa kasi makapanparaan a mibakal? 

1Co 14:9 Ontan kayo met, no dia ed dila ag yo bitlaen so saray salitan mainomay a talosan, panon so pakaamta na sasalitaen? ta mansalita kayo ed dagem. 

1Co 14:10 Wala ray amayamay a nengneng na voces ed mundo, tan angapo'y nengneng ya angapo so kabaliksan to. 

1Co 14:11 No sirin ag ko natalosan so ka baliksan na voces, sankaili ak ed mansasalita, tan say mansasalita sankaili ed siak.

1Co 14:12 Ontan met sikayo, nanlapu ed sikayo sa maagum ed saray maespiritu'n langkap, seetan yo ya ondaak ed sikayo so ibiskeg na Iglesia. 

1Co 14:13 Kanian say mansalita na ag kabat a salita, manpikasi tan nipataios to komon. 

1Co 14:14 Ta no manpikasi ak et dia ed salita ya ag kabat, say espirituk so manpikasi, et say kalakal ko ag mangiter na bunga. 

1Co 14:15 Anto so wala sirin? manpikasiak a tekep na espiritu, tan manpikasi ak a tekep na pakatalos ko met: mikanta ak a tekep na espiritu, tan mikanta ak a tekep na pakatalos ko met. 

1Co 14:16 Ta no andi, no sika bendicionan mo a tekep na espiritu, say onletneg ed pasen ya andi kabat, panon to'n mangibaga na Amen ed sangpot na pangiter mo na pisasalamat, lapu ed ag to natalosan so ibagam? 

1Co 14:17 Ta sika tua a maong so pisasalamat mo, et say sananey ag apabiskeg. 

1Co 14:18 Misalamat ak ed Dios ko ta makasalita ak na dakdakel ni a salita ya ag kabat nen say sikayon amin: 

1Co 14:19 Angaman ontan dia ed iglesia lablabay ko ni mansalita na limaran salita a tekep na pakatalos ko, pian nabangatan ko met komon so saray arum, nen say samplonlibo ya salita ag kabat. 

1Co 14:20 Agagi, ag kayo manugawugawan ed isip: angaman ontan manugawugawan kayo ed kaugsan, et matatken kayo ed isip. 

1Co 14:21 Dia ed gangan nisulat, Lapu ed saray toto-o na ag kabat a salita, tan ed bibil na saray sankaili, mansalita ak ed saya'n baley; tan angaman ontan ag da ak dengelen, kuan na Katawan. 

1Co 14:22 Kanian saray salita sakey ira'n tanda, aliwan saray manisia, no ag dia ed saray ag manisia: et say panangiprofeta sakey a tanda, aliwan dia ed saray ag manisia, no ag dia ed saray manisia. 

1Co 14:23 No ontan sirin say amin ya iglesia mantitipon, tan amin mansasalia' ra na ag kabat a salita, tan onloob so totoo ya angapo so bangat odino saray ag manisia, ag da kasi ibaga a makulangkulang kayo? 

1Co 14:24 Et no profeta'ra ya amin, tan onloob so bengatla ya ag manisia odino andi aral, napasoot da so linawa to, tan naokom ira ya amin. 

1Co 14:25 Saray maamot na puso to nipatnag ira; tan ontan idakmomo to so lupa to ed dalin tan igalang to so Dios, patuaen to a say Dios wala ed sikayo dia ed tua. 

1Co 14:26 Anto sirin agagi? Sano mantitipon kayo, balang sakey wala so salmo, wala so banga'to, wala so puyan to, wala so salita to ya ag kabat, wala so panangipatalos to. Na-gawa komon iraya ya amin pian sikara so lalo ya biskegan. 

1Co 14:27 No wala'y siopaman a to- a mansalita na salitan ag kabat, mamidua labat odino mamitlo katagtageyan to la tan, tan mantotombokan; tan sakey so mangipatalos: 

1Co 14:28 Et no angapo so mangipatalos ag oneseesel komon ed Iglesia; tan misalita ed sikaton dili tan dia'd Dios. 

1Co 14:29 Tan saray prof etas, mansalita ra komon na duara odino talora, tan saray arum manisip ira. 

1Co 14:30 Et no walay bengatla nipuyan ed sakey a manyodyorong say akaona onton da komon a mansalita. 

1Co 14:31 Ta amin yo nayarian yo so mangiprofetay sakey, pian makaaral ira'n amin, tan naligliwa ra'n amin, 

1Co 14:32 Tan say espiritu na saray profetas pauleyan ira ed saray prof etas; 

1Co 14:33 Ta say Dios aliwa'n Dios na kolkol, no ag kareenan. Singa dia ed amin ya iglesias na saray sasantos, 

1Co 14:34 Ag ira komon oneesel so bibi-i ed saray iglesia: ta ag niaboloy ed sikara so mansalita; et pauleyan ira komon a singa kuan na gangan met. 

1Co 14:35 Tan no labay da komon ya aralen so bengatla, tepeten da ed asawara ed abung: ta mabanday ed' sakey a bi-i so mansalita ed iglesia. 

1Co 14:36 Anto? nanlapu ed sikayo kasi so salita na Dios, odino sinmabi a bokor ed sikayo? 

1Co 14:37 No siopaman a to-o isipen to ed sikaton dili a profeta odino maespiritu, kabaten to komon ira-ya a isulat ko ed sikayo ta sikara so gangan na Katawan. 

1Co 14:38 Et no siopaman a to-o labay to ya angapoy amta to, angapo komon sirin so amta to. 

1Co 14:39 Kanian, agagi, panpirawatan yo a marlang so manprofeta, tan ag yo isebel so pansalita na saray salita ya ag kabat. 

1Co 14:40 Et nagawa komon so sarayan amin ed kasimpitan tan maoksoy. 



1Co 15:1 Natan ipakabat ko ed sikayo, agagi, so evangelio ya inpulong ko ed sikayo, a sikato met so inawat yo, dia ed sikato met so kawalaan yo, 

1Co 15:2 Lapu ed sikato met nilaban kayo; no egnaan yon malet so saray salitan inpulong ko ed sikayo, likod no anisia kayo ya angapo'y kabaliksan to. 

1Co 15:3 Ta inbangat ko ed sikayo ya inmona so inawat ko met, si Cristo inatey lapu ed saray kasalanan tayo onong na saray sulat; 

1Co 15:4 Tan inkotkot; tan inmolin binmilay nen komatlon agew onong na saray sulat; 

1Co 15:5 Tan pinmanengneng ed Cefas insan dia ed saray labindua; 

1Co 15:6 Insan pinmanengneng ed masolok a limanlasus ya agagi ya aminpinsan, say karaklan ed sikara atilak nira anga ed natan, et saray arum naugip lara; 

1Co 15:7 Insan pinmanengneng ed Santiago; insan dia ed saray Apostoles; 

1Co 15:8 Tan dia ed kaonoran na amin, singa sakey a lukon a nakal, pinmanengneng met ed siak. 

1Co 15:9 Ta siak so kamelagan ed saray Apostoles, tan agak manepeg ya ingaran na Apostol, ta inosilosilan ko so iglesia na Dios. 

1Co 15:10 Et lapu'd gracia na Dios siak la onong a siak natan: tan say gracia to ya inaboloy to ed siak ag aromog ya angapo'y kabaliksan to; no ag ingen lalon daakan a nankimeyak nen say amin da: aliwan siak ni, no ag say gracia na Dios ya wala ed siak nen saman. 

1Co 15:11 No sirin siak komon odino sikara, ontan so inpangipulong mi, tan ontan so inpanisia yo. 

1Co 15:12 Natan no si Cristo nipulong ya inmolin binmilay ed saray inatey, panon kasi pangikuan na arum ed sikayo ya angapo so kioli ed bilay na saray inatey? 

1Co 15:13 Et no angapo so kioli ed bilay na saray inatey, angan si Cristo'n ag met inmoli a binmilay: 

1Co 15:14 Tan no si Cristo et ag inmoli'n binmilay, sirin say panagpulong mi andi kabaliksan to, say pananisia yo met andi kabaliksan to. 

1Co 15:15 On, tan sikami nasukayan ya a tasi'n matila na Dios; ta tinasian mi so Dios a pinaoli to ed bilay si Cristo: a sikato so ag to pinaoli, no ontan a saray inatey ag ira onoli ed bilay. 

1Co 15:16 Ta no saray inaatey ag ira onoli ed bilay, angan si Cristo ag met pinaoli a binmilay: 

1Co 15:17 Tan no si Cristo ag pinaoli a binmilay, say pananisia yo andi kabaliksan to; sikayo wala kayo ni ed saray kasalanan yo. 

1Co 15:18 Saraman met sirin so akaugip ed si Cristo atawtaw ira. 

1Co 15:19 No dia ed saya'n bilay wala so ilalo tayo ed Cristo lanbengat sikatayo la'y sankaugsan na palar ed ami to-o. 

1Co 15:20 Et natan si Cristo pinaoli a binmilay ed saray inatey, a sikato so inmona'n bunga na saray naugip. 

1Co 15:21 Ta lapu'd too so sinabian napatey, lapu ed too met so sinabian na kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey. 

1Co 15:22 Lapud kinen Adan so pateyan na amin, ontan met diad kinen Cristo onoli'ra ed bilay. 

1Co 15:23 Et balang sakey dia ed dilin bilang to: si Cristo so inmona; insan saray kien nen Cristo ed isabi to. 

1Co 15:24 Insan onsabi kasampotan, sano iter to so panarian ed Dios tan Ama; sano naekal to la'ra ya ami panagari, tan ami pananguley tan pakayari. 

1Co 15:25 Ta sikato so nakaokolan a manari, anga ed pakapangian to'd saray kabusol to ed silong na saray salito. 

1Co 15:26 Say kaonoran a kabusol ya naekal naani say patey. 

1Co 15:27 Ta, inpasen to so ami ganagana ed silong na saray sali to. Et sanen ibaga to, Ami ganagana pauleyan la'ra, maliwawa ta nilikod so angyan na ami ganagana ed lepsag na pakayari to. 

1Co 15:28 Tan sano ami ganagana inpauleyan lara ed sikato, sirin say Anak met a dili pauleyan ed anguley ed ami ganagana, pain say Dios wala ed amin ed ami ganagana. 

1Co 15:29 No aliwa'n ontan, anto so gawaen da kasi na saray nabinyagan nipaakar ed saray inatey? no ag iran balot onoli ed bilay so saray inatey, akin sirin a nabinyagan ira a nipaakar ed sikara? 

1Co 15:30 Akin ta wala itayo ta met ed kaatapaan ed balang horas? 

1Co 15:31 Agak ononor lapu ed satan a gloria ya wala'd kasiksikanan yo agagi, a sikato so wala ed siak dia ed Cristo Jesus a Katawan tayo, onpateyak ya inagewagew. 

1Co 15:32 No siak, onong ed ugali to-o, akibakal ak ed saray ayep ed Efeso, anto so gungunak? No saray inaatey ag ira onoli ed bilay, mangan itayo tan oninum itayo, sirin ta nabuas onpatey itayo. 

1Co 15:33 Ag kayo patitilaan: saray mauges a kaolop deralen da so saray maong ya ugugali. 

1Co 15:34 Bangon kayo onong ed katonongan, tan ag kayo mankakasalanan; lapu ed saray arum ag da kabat so Dios: salitaen ko ya a pamabaing ko ed sikayo. 

1Co 15:35 Balet say sakey ikuan to, Panon so ioli'ra ed bilay so saray inaatey? tan Dinan kasi a nengneng na laman so awiten da? 

1Co 15:36 Makulangkulang, say itane'mo ag nabilay, no ag ni inatey: 

1Co 15:37 Tan say itane'mo, ag mo itanem so laman ya onbutay, no ag sakey a labos ya ilik, nayari a trigo odino arum a nengneng; 

1Co 15:38 Balet say Dios itdan to na sakey a laman singa kinaliktan to, tan balang sakey a bukel sakey a laman ton dili. 

1Co 15:39 Amin a laman aliwan nanpaparan laman; et wala so sakey a laman na to-o, tan sananey, a lamen na saray ayep, tan sananey na saray sira. 

1Co 15:40 Wala met iray laman a mangatatawen, tan laman a mangaraldalin; balet say gloria na mangatatawen sakey, tan say gloria na mangaraldalin sananey. 

1Co 15:41 Wala so gloria na banua, tan sananey so gloria na bulan, tan sananey so gloria na saray bibitewen; ta sakey a bitewen miduma ed sakey a bitewen dia ed gloria. 

1Co 15:42 Ontan met so kioli ed bilay na saray inatey. Nitanem ed kaderal can onoli ya onbilay ya ag naderal: 

1Co 15:43 Nitanem ed kababaingan; onoli ya onbilay ed gloria; nitanem ed kakapuyan; onoli ya onbilay ed pakayari: 

1Co 15:44 Nitanem ed laman na inkato-o; onoli ya onbilay a maespiritun laman. No wala so laman ed inkato-o, wala met so laman ed inkaespiritu. 

1Co 15:45 Ontan met nisulat, Say inmona'n to-o, si Adan, nagmaliw a kamarerwa'n sibibilay. Say onor ya Adan nagmaliw a sakey ya espiritu a manamilay. 

1Co 15:46 Angaman ontan ag onona so inkaespiritu, no ag say inkato-o, insan say inkaespiritu. 

1Co 15:47 Say inmona'n to-o dia ed dalin so nanlapuan to, mangaraldalin; say komadua to-o dia ed tawen so nanlapuan to. 

1Co 15:48 Singa say nanlapu ed dalin ontan da met.na saray nanlapu ed dalin: singa say nanlapu ed tawen, ontan da met na saray nanlapu ed tawen. 

1Co 15:49 Tan no panon so inpangawi' tayo na talintao na nanlapu ed dalin, ontan met ya awiten tayo so talintao na nanlapud tawen. 

1Co 15:50 Natan saya so kuan ko, agagi, say laman tan dala ag da nayarian a tawiren so nanarian na Dios; tan say naderal ag to natawir so ag naderal. 

1Co 15:51 Nia, tongtongen ko ed sikayo so sakey a misterio: Ag itayo naugip ya amin, balet nauman itayo ya amin, 

1Co 15:52 Dia ed kabekta, dia ed sankakirem, dia ed onor a trumpeta; ta say trumpeta ontanol, tan saray inatey enolira ed bilay ya ag naderal, tan nauman itayo. 

1Co 15:53 Ta saya a naderal kaokolan a kawesan na ag naderal, tan sayan onpatey kaokolan a kawesan na ag ompatey. 

1Co 15:54 Et sano saya a naderal nakawesan naani na ag naderal, tan saya ya onpatey nakawesan naani na ag ompatey, sirin nasumpal so salita a nisulat, Say patey inakmon na inpanalo. 

1Co 15:55 O patey, iner so kawalaan na inpanalom? O patey, iner so kawalaan na otot mo? 

1Co 15:56 Say otot na patey say kasalanan: tan say pakayari kasalanan say gangan: 

1Co 15:57 Et salamat ed Dios, ta itdan to itayo na panalo lapu ed Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

1Co 15:58 Kanian inararok ira ya agagi, mansiansia kayo a malet, ag kayo nagiing, lawas padaak yo so kime'yo ed Katawan, bangta amta yo a say kimey yo aliwa ya angapo so kabaliksan to ed Katawan. 



1Co 16:1 Natan nisengeg ed osos lapu ed saray sasantos, on on ? na ingangan ko ed saray iglesia na Galacia, ontan met so gawaen yo. 

1Co 16:2 Dia ed balang ononan agew na sinimbasimba balang sakey ed sikayo mangibiig na yatol to, onong ed yaaliguas to, pian ag gawaen so panipon no onsabi ak. 

1Co 16:3 Tan sano onsabi ak, saray abobonan yo ed saray sulat, sikara so ibabik a mangawit m panangasi yo ed Jerusalem: 

1Co 16:4 Tan no manepeg ya onla ak met, milara ed siak. 

1Co 16:5 Et ken takayo, no ondalanak ed Macedonia; ta labasan ko so Macedonia. 

1Co 16:6 Et angan ko makapanayamak ed sikayo odino ed lcabejebetelan to, pian indalan yo ak ed'angan iner a laen ko, 

1Co 16:7 Ta ag ko labay a nengnengen ta kayo natan ed ilabas Kod tan; ta kaliktan ko so ontonda ed sikayo ed pigaran agew, no yaboloy na Katawan. 

1Co 16:8 Et ontonda ak ecj Efeso anga ed Pentecostes; 

1Co 16:9 Lapu ed sakey a baleg a kaput tan mabiskeg so alukasan ed siak, et dakel so saray kabusol. 

1Co 16:10 Natan no si Tirfloteo onsabi, nengneng yo ta pian manayam ed sikayo ya angapoy takot; ta kimeyan to so kimey na Katawan, a singa met siak: 

1Co 16:11 Kanian angapo komon so to-o a manmodmora ed sikato. Et idalan yo ed kareenan ed pajiakar to, pian onladia ed siak ta sikato so aalagden ko pati saray agagi. 

1Co 16:12 Et no nipaakar ed si Apolos ya agi, akikasiak ed sikatc a maong, ya onla ed sikayo a pati saray agagi: et agton balot ginabay so onla natan; et sikatoy onla sano walay arum a makasengeg. 

1Co 16:13 Manpuyat kayo rnansiansia kayo ed pananisia, manugali kayo na singa ugali laki, tan onbiskeg kayo. 

1Co 16:14 Nagawa ya amin so saray gawaen yo komon dia ed aro. 

1Co 16:15 Natan pikasik ed sikayo, agagi (sikayo amtayo so abung nen Estephanas, a sikato so inmona a bunga nen Achaya, tan binmetang ira ed panulong da ed saray sasantos), 

1Co 16:16 Ya sikayo met pauleyan kayo ed sikara, tan ed balang sakey ontulong tan mansagpot. 

1Co 16:17 Tan makaliliket ak ed insabi nen Estephanas, tan si Fortunato, tan si Achaico: ta say kakulangan yo sikato so sinapotan da. 

1Co 16:18 Ta niligliwa'ra so espirituk tan say Espiritu yo: birbiren yo sirin so saray ontan. 

1Co 16:19 Saray iglesia na Asia paibabanoan ira ed sikayo. Si Aquila, tan si Prescilla ibabanoan da kayo a maong dia ed Katawan, pati say iglesia ya wala ed abung da. 

1Co 16:20 Amin day agagi ibano'ra kayo. Manbabanoan kayo ed sinansakey ed sikayo ed masantos ya angoban 

1Co 16:21 Say pabanok, si Pablo, ed dili a limak nisulat. 

1Co 16:22 No wala so bengatlan to-on ag mangaro ed Katawan, Anatema komon. Maranatha 

1Co 16:23 Say gracia na Katawan a JesuCristo so wala komon ed sikayo. 

1Co 16:24 Say arok wala komon ed sikayo ya amin ed Cristo Jesus. Amen. 

PANGASINENSE EPHESIANS


Eph 1:1 Si Pablo, sakey ya apostol nen Cristo Jesus lapu ed linawa na Dios, isulat ko ed saray sasantos ya wala ed Efeso, tan saray mananisia ed Cristo Jesus: 

Eph 1:2 Say gracia komon ed sikayo tan deen a manlapu ed Dios ya Ama tayo tan say Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

Eph 1:3 Daydayewen komon so Dios tan Ama na Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo, a sikato so amendicion ed sikatayo ed Cristo na amin a nengneng na bendicion na espiritu ed saray kawalaan a mangatatawen: 

Eph 1:4 Onong ed inpanpili to ed sikatayo ed sikato nen agni nipasen so mundo, pian napasanto itayo tan angapo so kabalawan tayo ed arap to ed panangaro: 

Eph 1:5 Sanen tinandaan to itayo nen ona a nibilang ya anak to lapu ed Jesu-Cristo a nipaakar ed sikaton dili, onong ed apaabig na linawa to, 

Eph 1:6 Pian nidayew so gloria na gracia to, a sikato so impangasito ed sikatayo ya angapo so bayar ed Inararo to ya Anak: 

Eph 1:7 A dia ed sikato so kawalaan na karundun tayo ed panamegley na dala to, say pakapaandian na saray kasalanan tayo, onong ed saray kayamanan na gracia to, 

Eph 1:8 A pinarakel to ya onkana ed sikatayo dia ed amin a karonongan tan kabintaan. 

Eph 1:9 Ya impakaba'to ed sikatayo so misterio na linawa to, onong ed apaabig to a sikato so ninonot to ed sikaton dili, 

Eph 1:10 Say kipaakaran na pamaakaran a pakasumpal na saray panaon, say panagtipon ed saray amin a bengatla ed Cristo, na saray bengatlan wala ed tawen, a singa met saray wala ed tapew na dalin; dia ed sikato, kuan ko, 

Eph 1:11 A dia ed sikato met agawa itayon sakey a tawir, a sanen atandaan itayo nen ona onong na kanonotan na saman ya mangawa ed saray amin a bengatla onong ed kuan na linawa ton dili; 

Eph 1:12 Pian dia ed kaonoran sikatayo komon so onkanan dayew na gloria to, sikatayo a nanilalo nen saman ed Cristo: 

Eph 1:13 A dia ed sikato sikayo agawa kayo a tawir, nen kadngel yo na salita a matua, say evangelio na kilalaban yo, a dia ed sikato nen sinisia yo, atatakan kayo na Espiritu Santo na sipan, 

Eph 1:14 A sikato so sanla na tawir tayo anga ed karundun na dilin kayarian na Dios, a nipaakar ed dayew na gloria to. 

Eph 1:15 Lapu ed saya siak met, sanen kadngel koy pananisia yo ed Katawan a Jesus a sikatoy wala ed sikayo, tan say aro yo ed saray amin a sasantos, 

Eph 1:16 Andi tondak ya mangiter na pisasalamat lapu ed sikayo, a nononoten takayo ed saray pikakasik; 

Eph 1:17 Pian say Dios na Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo, say Ama na gloria, itdan to kayo komon na sakey ya espiritu na karonongan tan say panangipuyan na kakabatan ed sikato; 

Eph 1:18 A aliwawaan so saray mata na puso yo, pian nakabatan yo komon no anto so ilalo ed pantawag to, no anto so saray kayamanan na gloria ya ipatawir to ed saray sasantos, 

Eph 1:19 Tan say ontanlan kinabalgan na pakayari to ed sikatayo a mananisia, onong ed saman so mangagawa na kabiskegan na pakayari to, 

Eph 1:20 A sikato so ginawa to ed Cristo, nen sikato so binangon to ed saray inaatey, tan sikato so pinayorong to ed kawanan to dia ed saray pasen a mangatatawen, 

Eph 1:21 A sangkatageyan nen say amin ya uley, tan manuley, tan pakayari, tan nanarian, tan dia ed amin a ngaran ya abitla, aliwa labat ed sayan mundo, no ag dia met onsabi ni: 

Eph 1:22 Tan inyan ton amin so saray bengatla dia ed lepsag na saray salisali to, tan sikato so inyan to ya olo ed saray lapag a bengatla a nipaakar ed iglesia, 

Eph 1:23 Saya sikato so laman to, say kapnoan na saman a mamano ed amiamin. 



Eph 2:1 Tan sikayo so binilay to, sanen inatey kayo ed saray inpakalokso yo tan saray kasalanan, 

Eph 2:2 A nanakaran yo nen saman a panaon onong ed kaugalian na sayan mundo, onong ed pangolo na pakayari dagem, na espiritu a natan mangawa ed saray anak na kasusumpa; 

Eph 2:3 Diad pegley na saraman sikatayo met ya amin nen saman a panaon nanbilay itayo ed saray kaalakan na laman tayo, a sinumpal tayo so saray kaliktan na laman tan saray kanonotan, tan dia ed inkatoo anak to itayo ed sanok, a singa saray arum: 

Eph 2:4 Balet say Dios, bangta mayaman ed panangasi, lapu ed baleg ya aro to ya inpangaro to ed sikatayo, 

Eph 2:5 Angan wala itayo nen saman ya inatey la lapud saray inpankakasalanan tayo, binilay to itayo ya inpiolop ed Cristo (lapu ed gracia nilaban kayo), 

Eph 2:6 Tan binangon to itayo ya inpiolop ed sikato, tan pinayorong to itayo ya inpiolop ed sikato ed saray pasen a mangatatawen, ed Cristo Jesus: 

Eph 2:7 Pian dia ed saray panaon ya onsabi ipaliwawa to so manlepwas a kayamanan na gracia to dia ed kaabigan to ed sikatayo ed Cristo Jesus: 

Eph 2:8 Ta lapu ed gracia nilaban kayo ed panamegley na pananisia; et saya ag nanlapu ed sikayon dili: ta sikato so langkap na Dios: 

Eph 2:9 Aliwan diad saray gawa, pian ag nagloriaan so angan siopaman. 

Eph 2:10 Ta sikatayo gawa to itayo, a pinalsa ed Cristo Jesus a nipaakar ed saray maong a gawa, a sikara so inparaan na Dios pian manakar itayo komon ed sikara. 

Eph 2:11 Kanian nonnonot yo, a nen saman a panaon sikayo so saray Gentiles ed laman, ya inngaran kayo na aliwan Galsim lapud inngaranan a Galsim, a ginawa na saray lima ed laman; 

Eph 2:12 Nonnonot yo a sikayo nen saman a panaon wala kayo ya asian ed Cristo, ya arawi kayo ed pibabaley ed Israel, tan sankaili kayo nipaakar ed saray sipanan na sipan, ya angapo so ilalo yo tan wala kayo ed sayan mundo ya angapo so Dios yo. 

Eph 2:13 Balet natan dia ed Cristo Jesus sikayo a nen saman a panaon wala kayo ya arawi, niasinger kayo ed sikato lapu ed virtud na dala nen Cristo. 

Eph 2:14 Ta sikato so kareenan tayo, a sikato so amakasakey ed saray duara, tan tinebag to so pader na nilaet a managpasian nen saman ed sikara, 

Eph 2:15 A salanti say irap na linawa ra ya inbalang to ed laman to a nipasak, say gangan na saray bilibilin ya inmaralem ed saray panontonan; pian mamalsa ed sikato a dili na sakey a balon too ed saray duara, a gagawaen to so kareenan; 

Eph 2:16 Tan pian panpolanganen to ra ed Dios a mantipun ed saksakey a laman ed panamegley na cruz ya pinatey to so irap na linawa ra ed sikato: 

Eph 2:17 Tan linma et inpulong toy kareenan ed sikayo ya wala ed arawi, tan say kareenan ed saraman so wala ed asinger: 

Eph 2:18 Ta diad panamegley to sikatayo a parapara wala ed sikatayo a bolos so iloloob ed Ama lapud virtud na saksakey a Espiritu. 

Eph 2:19 Diad ontan sirin, aliwa kayo la a sankaili tan manaakarakar, noag ingen kabaleyan kayo la na saray sasantos, tan kaamong na Dios. 

Eph 2:20 A nipaalagey ed tapew na niletnegan na saray apostoles tan saray profetas, a sikato si Cristo Jesus a dili so bato a manonaan ed suyok; 

Eph 2:21 A dia ed sikato balang sakey ed saray dakel ya abung, maong so inkasangal to ed sikato'n dili, ombaleg a magmaliw a sakey ya templo a masantos ed Katawan; 

Eph 2:22 A dia ed sikato sikayo met apaalagey kayo ya amin ya onkanan panabungan na Dios ed inka Espiritu. 



Eph 3:1 Lapu ed saya, siak si Pablo, a pinangaw nen Cristo Jesus lapud sikayo a Gentiles--- 

Eph 3:2 No ontan ya nadngel yo so saman a panangipia na gracia na Dios a niiter ed siak a kaabigan yo; 

Eph 3:3 No panon so inkipakabat na misterio lapud panangipuyan a niiter ed siak, singa insulat ko ed tagtagey ed saray pigaran salita, 

Eph 3:4 Kanian, sano nabasa yo, nayarian yon talosan no panon so pakatalos ko ed misterio nen Cristo; 

Eph 3:5 A dia ed saraman a nagsisananey a kapolian agnipakabat ed saray anak na saray totoo, a singa say inkipuyan to natan ed saray sasantos apostoles to tan saray profetas ed inka Espiritu; 

Eph 3:6 Labay ton salitaen, a saray Gentiles sikara so makapitawir, tan kabiangan na saksakey a laman, tan kaapag ira ed sipan ed Cristo Jesus ed panamegley na evangelio, 

Eph 3:7 A sikato so nipasenan ko ministro, onong ed langkap na saman a gracia na Dios a niiter ed siak onong ed gawa na pakayari to. 

Eph 3:8 Dia ed siak, a kamelagan ak nen say kamelamelagan ed saray amin a sasantos, niiter so saya a gracia, pian ipulong ko ed saray Gentiles so saray agnatukor a kayamanan nen Cristo; 

Eph 3:9 Tan pangawa ed amin a totoo a makanengneng komon no anto so pananulong na misterio a nanlapu ed amin a panaon akaamot nen saman ed Dios ya amalsa ed saray lapag a bengatla; 

Eph 3:10 Pian natan dia ed panamegley na iglesia nipakabat komon ed saray arari tan manuley ed saray pasen a mangatatawen so akamayamay a karonongan na Dios, 

Eph 3:11 A onong ed andi angaan a pilalek a ninono'to nen saman ed Cristo Jesus a Katawan tayo: 

Eph 3:12 Ya wala ed sikato so kabayanian tayo tan say ibolaslas na panilalo lapu ed panamegley na pananisia tayo ed sikato. 

Eph 3:13 Kanian kerewen ko ya ag kayo komon onkapuy lapu ed saray irirap ko a nisengeg ed sikayo, ta sikara so sakey a gloria a nipaakar ed sikayo. 

Eph 3:14 Lapu ed saya italimokor ko 'ray pueg ko ed arap na Ama na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo, 

Eph 3:15 A dia ed sikato so pangalaan na ngaran na amin a sankaamongan ed tawen tan dia ed dalin, 

Eph 3:16 Ya ya boloy to ed sikayo, onong na kayamanan na gloria to, a napabiskeg kayo komon ed pakayari a ed panamegley na Espiritu to ed toon dapit loob; 

Eph 3:17 Pian manayam komon si Cristo ed saray kapusoan yo ed panamegley na pananisia; pian sano sikayo dia ed kaonoran, onlamot kayo tan ompasen kayo ed aro, 

Eph 3:18 Onbiskeg kayo komon a manalos a maong a pati saray lapag a sasantos no panon so kaawang tan karokey tan kaatagey tan kaaralem, 

Eph 3:19 Say pangamta na aro nen Cristo a manalonggaring ed kakabatan, pian napano kayon anga ed amin ya inkapno na Dios. 

Eph 3:20 Et ipaakar ed sikato a makapanyarin mangawa na ontan la a daakan nen saray amin a nayarian tayo a kerewen odino nonoten, onong ed pakayari ya ongawa ed sikatayo, 

Eph 3:21 Ipaakar ed sikato komon so gloria ed iglesia tan dia ed Cristo Jesus ya anga ed amin a kapulian ed ando Ian ando. Amen. 



Eph 4:1 Pikasik sirin, ed sikayo, siak a pinangaw ed Katawan, a manakar kayo komon a makanakana ed kimey ya akatawagan yo, 

Eph 4:2 A tinekepan na amin a kaabebaan na linawa tan kaoyamoan, pati panagsungdo, manoonoran so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo ed aro; 

Eph 4:3 A sesegan yo ya imatonan so pankakasakey na Espiritu ed balor na kareenan. 

Eph 4:4 Wala so saksakey a laman, tan saksakey ya Espiritu, a singa say inkatawag yo met ed saksakey ya ilalo ed akatawagan yo; 

Eph 4:5 Sakey a Katawan, sakey a pananisia, sakey a binyag, 

Eph 4:6 Sakey a Dios tan Ama na saray lapag, a sikato so wala ed tagey na ganagana, tan wala ed nanleleetan na amin, tan wala ed loob na amin. 

Eph 4:7 Balet say balang sakey ed sikatayo sikato so naitdan na gracia onong ed sukat na pamalangkap nen Cristo. 

Eph 4:8 Kanian kuan to, Sanen sinmegep ed tagey, inawi'to ya dinakep so inkadakep, Tan angiter na langkap ed saray totoo. 

Eph 4:9 (Natan saya so kuan a, Sikato so sinmegep, anto ta so labay ton ibaga no ag say sikato so linmasor met ed saray pasen a kalekleksaban dia ed dalin? 

Eph 4:10 Saman so linmasor sikato lanlamang met so sinmegep ed katagtageyan na amin a katawenan, pian panayaman to ya ami bengatla.) 

Eph 4:11 Et saray arum inyan to ra ya apostoles; tan saray arum, profetas; tan saray arum, manangipulong na maabig a pakabat; tan saray arum, pastor tan manangibangat, 

Eph 4:12 Ya onkana a pakayadyarian na saray sasantos, a nipaakar ed gawa na panaglinkor, anga ed kipaalagey na laman nen Cristo: 

Eph 4:13 Anga ed sikatayo ya amin so makarateng ed pankakasakey na pananisia, tan say pikakabat ed Anak na Dios, dia ed too ya andi pankulangan to, dia ed sukat na kinaatagey na inkapno nen Cristo: 

Eph 4:14 Pian ag itayo la manugaw-ugawan, a' nipalpalig itayo dia tan diman tan nitektekiab ed antokaman a dagem na bangat, onong ed saray kasiliban na totoo, dia ed kasaolan da, onong ed panamalingo na kalingo; 

Eph 4:15 Et ingen salitaen yo so tua ed loob na aro, et ombaleg kayo komon ed amin a bengatla ed sikato, a sikato so Olo, salanti si Cristo; 

Eph 4:16 A manlapud sikato say amin a laman maong so inkasangal to tan mankakasakey ed sikato met lamlamang ed panamegley na mangiter na nanlalangoan, onong ed pangagawa na sukat na balang sakey a kabiangan, pabalegen to so laman ed pangipaalagey to ed sikaton dili ed aro. 

Eph 4:17 Saya sirin so ibagak, tan tasian ko ed Katawan, ya ag kayo la manakar a singa kakaakar met na saray Gentiles ed maapan kalakal da, 

Eph 4:18 Ya abilungetan so kalakal da, a niarawi ra ed bilay na Dios, lapu ed agpikakabat ya wala ed sikara, a nisengeg ed yaawet na puso ra; 

Eph 4:19 A diad inkamaonor da ed liknaan da inter da so inkasikara a dili ed kaalakan na laman, pian gawaen da a siaagap so amin a nengneng na karumsisan. 

Eph 4:20 Balet sikayo ag yo inaral so ontan ed Cristo: 

Eph 4:21 No ontan a nadngel yo ed sikato, tan abangatan kayo ed sikato, a salanti say katuaan wala ed Jesus: 

Eph 4:22 Ya ipulisay yo komon so nipaakar ed abangonan a panagbilay yo, say toon daan, a sikato so manderal onong ed saray panamalingo na kagletan na laman; 

Eph 4:23 Tan napasimbalo kayo komon ed espiritu na kalakal yo, 

Eph 4:24 Tan ikawes yo so too a balo, a sikato so pinalsay Dios ed loob na kaptekan tan matuan kasantosan. 

Eph 4:25 Kanian ipaliis yo so katilaan, salitaen yo so tua, balang sakey ed kapara ton too: ta sikatayon arum kabiangan da itayo na saray arum. 

Eph 4:26 Onsanok kayo, ingen ta ag kayo mankakasalanan: ag komon onselek so agew a sipapasnok kayo ni: 

Eph 4:27 Tan ag yo palonkitan so diablo. 

Eph 4:28 Saman so nantatakew nen saman ag komon la mantakew: no ag mansagpot, a gawaen na saray limalima to so bengatla a makapaabig, pian wala so niiter to ed satay walay pankaokolan to. 

Eph 4:29 Angapo komon so salita a mabanday ya ompaway ed sangi yo, no ag say maabig lawas a nipaakar ed pakapansimpit onong na nakaokolan, pian mangiter na gayaga ed saray ondengel, 

Eph 4:30 Tan ag yo paeermenen so Espiritu Santo na Dios, a sikato so akatatakan yo a niparaan ed agew na karundon. 

Eph 4:31 Saray amin a kapaitan, tan sanok, tan ingongot, tan ingal, tan mauges a panagsalsalita, naekal komon ed sikayo, pati amin a mauges a kanonotan: 

Eph 4:32 Tan manaanusan kayo ed sakey tan sakey, mapangasi, manpiperdonaan so sakey tan sakey, a singa met say Dios pinerdona to kayo ed Cristo. 



Eph 5:1 Aligen yo sirin so Dios, singa anak to kayon inararo; 

Eph 5:2 Tan mankurang kayo ed aro, a singa met inpangaro nen Cristo ed sikayo, tan inter to so laman to lapu ed sikatayo, singa sakey a saklang tan bagat ed Dios a maabig so balingit to. 

Eph 5:3 Et ingen say lawan, tan say amin a nengneng na karumsisan, odino say agum, ag la komon nabitla ed sikayo, onong a manepeg ed saray sasantos; 

Eph 5:4 Ni say karutakan tan angan saray mabanday a panagsalsalita, tan saray panaglurey, bengabengatla ya pisasalamat. 

Eph 5:5 Ta kabat yo so saya a petepeteg, angapo so managlawan, odino toon marumsis, odino maagum, a diosen to so saray talintao, a makatawir na antokaman ed panarian nen Cristo tan say Dios. 

Eph 5:6 Angapo komon so mamalingo ed sikayo lapu'd saray salitan andi kakanaan: ta lapu ed sarayan pamaakaran onsabi sanok na Dios ed saray anak na kasusumpa. 

Eph 5:7 Ag kayo sirin mibibiang ed sikara; 

Eph 5:8 Ta sanen aminsan a panaon sikayo so kabilungetan, balet natan sikayo so silew ed Katawan: manakar kayon singa anak na liwawa 

Eph 5:9 (Ta say bunga na liwawa sikato so amin a kaabigan tan kaptekan tan katuaan), 

Eph 5:10 Ya anapen yo so kaliktan komon na Katawan; 

Eph 5:11 Tan angapo komon so pilpilaan yo ed saray gawa na saray bilunget ya ag onbunga, no ag ingen simbawaen yo komon ira; 

Eph 5:12 Ta saray bengatlan agawa ed maamot makapabaing labat a salitaen ira. 

Eph 5:13 Balet amin a bengatla no sikaratan so asimbawa nipatnag ira lapud liwawa: ta say amin a nipatnag sikato so liwawa. 

Eph 5:14 Kanian kuan to, Onli-ing ka, sika nanaugip, tan bangon ka ed nanleleetan na saray inaatey, et sinagan toka naani nen Cristo. 

Eph 5:15 Nengneng yo sirin a tinekepan na panlikas no panon so panakar yo, aliwan singa andi kalakal, no ag ingen singa makalakal; 

Eph 5:16 Ya anamoten yo so panaon, ta saray agew sikara so mauges. 

Eph 5:17 Kanian aliwa kayo komon a makulangkulang, no ag ingen talosan yo no anto so linawa na Katawan. 

Eph 5:18 Tan ag kayo manbuanges na alak, a sikato so kawalaan na pisesepakan, no ag ingen napano kayo komon na Espiritu; 

Eph 5:19 A mansasalita so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo na saray salmo tan saray himno tan kankancion a nipaakar ed espiritu, ya mankankanta tan irayrayew yo ed saray kapusoan yo so Katawan; 

Eph 5:20 A mangiter kayo na andi ebas a pisasalamat lapud saray amin a bengatla dia ed ngaran na Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo ed Dios, a salanti say Ama; 

Eph 5:21 A mantotolokan so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo dia ed katatakot ed Cristo. 

Eph 5:22 Sikayo ya asawan bibii, paoleyan kayo ed saray kaasawaan yo a dili, a singa met ed Katawan. 

Eph 5:23 Ta say asawan laki sikato so olo na asawan bii, a singa si Cristo met sikato so olo na iglesia, a sikaton dili so manangilaban ed laman. 

Eph 5:24 Et onong a say iglesia wala ed katotolok ed Cristo, kanian saray asawan bibii pauleyan ira met ed saray kaasawaan da ed ganagana. 

Eph 5:25 Asawan lalaki, aroen yo so saray kaasawaan yo, a singa met si Cristo ya inaro to so iglesia, tan insaklang to so inkasikato nisengeg ed sikato; 

Eph 5:26 Pian sikatoy pasantosen to, tan sikatoy inurasan to ed panangoras na danum, lapud salita, 

Eph 5:27 Ta pian isaklang to so iglesia ed sikaton dili a sakey ya iglesia a sigogloria, ya angapoy tilol to odino kumanet odino anton bengatla; no ag ingen komon masantos tan angapo so pakabalawan to. 

Eph 5:28 Ontan met so nepeg na saray asawan lalaki a panangaro ra ed saray kaasawaan dan dili a singa panangaro ra ed laman dan dili. Say mangaro ed asawa ton dili aroen toy dilin laman to: 

Eph 5:29 Ta angapo ni toon amosol ed laman ton dili; no ag ingen sikato so taganoen to tan pablien to a singa met si Cristo ya pinabli to so iglesia; 

Eph 5:30 Ta sikatayo ray kabiangan na laman to. 

Eph 5:31 Lapud saya say laki tainan to naani so ama to tan ina to, tan miandoan naani a mangyabung ed asawa to; tan sikaran dua magmaliw ira naanin saksakey a laman. 

Eph 5:32 Saya sikato so sakey a baleg a misterio: balet siak mansalitaak na nipaakar ed Cristo tan dia ed iglesia. 

Eph 5:33 Dia ed ganagana gawaen yo met, balang sakey aroen to so dilin asawa to a bii a singa dilin laman to; et imanoen to komon a say asawan bii nepeg ton takotan so asawa to. 



Eph 6:1 Sikayon anak, ontolo'kayo ed saray kaatatengan yo dia ed Katawan; ta saya sikato so matonong. 

Eph 6:2 Igalang mo so amam tan inam (a sikato so manonan gangan ya wala so sipan to), 

Eph 6:3 Ta makapaabig ed sika tan makapanbilay ka na andukey dia ed tapew na dalin. 

Eph 6:4 Tan, sikayo ya atateng, ag yo ilagyat a pasanoken so saray anak yo: no ag ingen bangatan yo'ra ed kadudusa tan panamilin na Katawan. 

Eph 6:5 Sikayo ya araripen, matolo'kayo komon ed saray kakatawan yo nipaakar ed laman, a natekepan na takot tan giwgiw, dia ed katooran na puso yo, a singa ed Cristo; 

Eph 6:6 Ya ag kayo manlinkor ed mata, a singa saray managpaliket ed saray totoo; no ag ingen singa araripen nen Cristo, gawaen yo a manlapu ed puso so kaliktan na Dios; 

Eph 6:7 A gawaen yo a sililiket so panaglinkor, a singa ipaakar yo ed Katawan, et aliwan dia ed saray totoo: 

Eph 6:8 Kabaten yo ya angan anton bengatla a maabig a gawaen na balang sakey, ontan so awaten to lamet naani a manlapu ed Katawan, aripen man tan bolos. 

Eph 6:9 Tan, sikayon kakatawan, ontan met so gawaen yo ed sikara tan paulian yo so panangigagaem; kabaten yo a say Katawan da tan Katawan yo wala ed saray katawenan, tan angapoy pandurumaan na totoo ed sikato. 

Eph 6:10 Kaonoran, agagi, onbiskeg kayo komon ed Katawan, tan dia ed biskeg na pakayari to. 

Eph 6:11 Isolong yo so sankabokel a kinlong na Dios, pian nayarian yo so ontalindeg ya onsumpa ed saray pangalot na diablo. 

Eph 6:12 Ta ag itayo mitolot ed laman tan dala, no ag ingen onsumpa itayo ed saray manonaan, onsumpa ed saray pakayari, onsumpa ed saray manuley ed mundo na sayan kabilungtan, sumpa ed saray mauges ya espiritu ed pasen a mangatatawen. 

Eph 6:13 Kanian alaen yo so sankabukel a kinlong na Dios, pian nayarian yo so mitalindegan ed mauges ya agew, tan, sano agawa yo la yan amin, wala kayo a sitatalindeg. 

Eph 6:14 Talindeg kayo sirin, balkesan yo so awak yo na katuaan, tan ikawes yo so kinlong na kaptekan, 

Eph 6:15 Bangta sinapinan yo so saray salisali yo na panangiparaan ed evangelio na kareenan; 

Eph 6:16 Nagkalalo et eegnaan yo so kinlong na pananisia, a sikato so nayarin pangerep yo naani ed saray amin a mandarlang a gayang na mauges. 

Eph 6:17 Tan alaen yo so pamulaw na kilalaban, tan say kampilan na Espiritu, a sikato so salita'y Dios: 

Eph 6:18 Ya onkerew kayo ed Espiritu ed amin a nengneng na pikakasi tan pikekerew ed amin a panaon, tan manpuyat kayo na nipaakar ed amin a kasiansiaan tan panangipikasi ed saray lapag a sasantos. 

Eph 6:19 Tan lapud siak, pian niiter komon ed siak so pansalita ed pangilukas ko na sangik pian ipakabat ko a tinkepan na tepel so misterio na evangelio, 

Eph 6:20 Lapud onia siak sakeyak ya igagangan ya agolong-golongan; pian dia ed onia mansalitaak komon a sitetepel, a singa kanepegan kon panagsalita. 

Eph 6:21 Et pian nakabatan yo met so saray kapagaan ko, no panon so gagawaen ko, si Tiquico, inararo ya agi tan matoor a ministro na Katawan, ipakaba'to naani ya ami bengabengatla ed sikayo: 

Eph 6:22 A sikato so imbakik ed sikayo lapu ed sayan getma pian nakabatan yo so nipaakar ed sikami, tan pian ligliwaen to so saray kapusoan yo. 

Eph 6:23 Say kareenan komon so wala ed saray agagi, tan aro a katekep na pananisia, a nanlapu ed Dios Ama tan dia ed Katawan a Jesu-Cristo. 

Eph 6:24 Say gracia wala komon ed saray amin a mangaro ed Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo dia ed aro ya agnaderal. 

PANGASINENSE II Timothy


2Ti 1:1 Si Pablo, sakey ya apostol nen Cristo Jesus ed panamegley na linawa'y Dios, onong ed sipan na bilay ya wala ed Cristo Jesus, 

2Ti 1:2 Isulat ko ed Timoteo, ya inararok ya anak: Gracia, panangasi, tan deen na Dios Ama tan si Cristo Jesus a Katawan tayo. 

2Ti 1:3 Misalamat ak ed Dios, a sikato so panlilinkoran ko manlapu'd saray lakik dia ed malinis a linawa, ya andi ebas a pinono'taka ed saray pikakasik, ed labi tan agew, 

2Ti 1:4 A pirawrawat ko a maposapos a nanengneng taka, a pinonot ko so lua-Iuam, ta pian komon napano ak na gayaga; 

2Ti 1:5 A pinonot ko so pananisia a matua ya wala ed sika; a sikato so nanayam ya inmuna ed baim a Loida, tan si inam a Eunice; tan siak amtak ya wala met ed sika. 

2Ti 1:6 Lapu ed saya ibilin ko ed sika a bilayen mo sa langkap na Dios ya wala ed sika, dia ed panamegley na panangitapew ed sarayan limak. 

2Ti 1:7 Ta ag itayo initdan na Dios na espiritu na katakotan; no ag say pakayari tan say aro tan say maong a linawa. 

2Ti 1:8 Ag mo sirin ibaing so pamatua na Katawan tayo, tan say siak a pinangaw to: no ag ingen midamay ka ed saray irap lapu'd evangelio, onong ed pakapanyari na Dios; 

2Ti 1:9 A sikato so angilaban ed sikatayo, tan tinawag to itayo ed sakey ya impanawag a masantos, aliwa ya onong ed saray gawa tayo, no ag onong ed pamaakaran ton dili, tan say gracia, a ni-iter ed sikatayo ed Cristo Jesus sanen agni sinmabi so saray panaon na andi anga, 

2Ti 1:10 Balet nipatnag natan dia ed panamegley na impayawar na Manangilaban ed sikatayo a si Cristo Jesus, a sikato so angibalang ed patey, tan intarok to so bilay tan say ag ipapatey lapu ed inkipasen na evangelio. 

2Ti 1:11 A sikato so akatoroan ko a managpulong, tan apostol, tan managbangat. 

2Ti 1:12 Lapu ed saya itepel ko so saraya'n bengatla: angaman ontan agak ambaing; ta amtak so samay sinisiak, tan amtak lanti a sikato so makapanyari a mantalima ed inmatale'ko ed sikato a nipaakar ed saman ya agew. 

2Ti 1:13 Tandaan mo'n maong so uliran na saray maabig a salita a nadngel mo ed siak, dia ed pananisia tan panangaro ya wala ed Cristo Jesus. 

2Ti 1:14 Saman so maong a bengatla ya nimatalek ed sika sikato so talimaen mo dia ed panamegley na Espiritu Santo a manayam ed sikatayo. 

2Ti 1:15 Amtam la so saya, a sinmian ira'd siak ya amin so saray taga Asia; tan sakey ed sikara di Figello tan Hermogenes. 

2Ti 1:16 Say Katawan yaboloy to komon so panangasi ed abung nen Onesiforo: ta aramarama a sikato so nanligliwa ed siak, tan ag to imbaing so golong-golong ko; 

2Ti 1:17 No ag ingen, sanen wadman ed Roma, inanap to ak a siseseseg tan nalmo to ak. 

2Ti 1:18 (Say Katawan yaboloy to komon ed sikato a naromog to so paanangasi na Katawan ed saman ya agew): Tan no kaonongan so inpanlinkor to ed siak diman ed Efeso, sikato'y kabat mo a maomaong. 



2Ti 2:1 Sika sirin, ana'ko, pabiskegmo so linawam ed gracia ya wala ed Cristo Jesus. 

2Ti 2:2 Tan saray bengatla ran nadngel mo ed siak a tinasian na dakerakel, sikara so imatalek mo ed saray tootoo a matoor, a sikara so manepeg a mangibangat met ed saray arum. 

2Ti 2:3 Midamay ka ed saray irirap a singa maabig a sondalo nen CristoJesus. 

2Ti 2:4 Angapo so manlinkor a sondalo a manpaligotgot ed saray pananapan na saya'n bilay, pian nayarian to a paliketen so angilista ed sikato a sondalo. 

2Ti 2:5 Ontan met sakey a too mibakal dia ed panpapalaboan, ag nabalangetan, no-ag akibakal ed matonong. 

2Ti 2:6 Nakaokolan a say domaralos a mansagpot sikato so onona a miapag ed saray bunga. 

2Ti 2:7 Talosan mo so salitaen ko; et say Katawan itdan to ka na pakatalos ed amin. 

2Ti 2:8 Nonnonot mo si Jesu-Cristo, a kapolian nen David, a inmoli ed bilay dia ed pegley na saray inaatey, onong ed evangeliok: 

2Ti 2:9 A sikato so panakoan ko ed saray irirap a singa manag-gawa na mauges, anga ed inkabalor ko dia ed saray panangipangawan; balet say salita na Dios ag abalor. 

2Ti 2:10 Kanian itepel ko'n amin lapu ed saray apili, pian sikara met nagamoran da so kilalaban ya wala ed Cristo Jesus dia ed gloria ya andi anga. 

2Ti 2:11 Tua so saya'n salita: Ta no inatey itayo ya akidamay ed sikato, nabilay itayo met a minabang ed sikato: 

2Ti 2:12 No mantepel itayo, manari itayo met a minabang ed sikato: no sikato so itapa'tayo, sikato itapa'to itayo met: 

2Ti 2:13 No sikatayo so ag matoor, sikato mansiansia a matoor; ta agto nayarian ya itapat so laman to. 

2Ti 2:14 Ipanonot mo so saraya'n bengatla ed sikara, ya ibilin mo ed arap na Katawan, ya ag ira mansusupiatan ed saray salita, ya angapo'y kaabigan, no ag ingen kadederalan na saray onderengel. 

2Ti 2:15 Seetan mo a sikukuli so ompatnag a naabobonan ed arap na Dios, a singa tometeger ya angapo so ibaing to, ya agamilen mo ed matonong so salita a tua. 

2Ti 2:16 Bangbalet arawiyan mo so salsalita ya ag manepeg ed Dios tan angapo so kabaliksan da: ta ondenden ira sa ondenden ed aliwa'n inkamaridios, 

2Ti 2:17 Tan say salitara manderal a singa say gangrena: tan sakey ed sikara di Himeneo tan Fileto; 

2Ti 2:18 Totoo a sinmipa'ra nipaakar ed tua, ya ibabaga ra a say kioli ed bilay apalabas la, tan gogotgoten da so pananisia na saray arum. 

2Ti 2:19 Angaman ontan, say malet a cimiento na Katawan magnayon, ya wala ed sikato so saya'n tatak; Amta na Katawan so saray totoo to: tan, Balang sakey a manngaran na ngaran na Katawan onarawi ed ag inkatunong. 

2Ti 2:20 Balet dia ed sakey ya abung a baleg, aliwa labat ya wala so saray vaso a balitok tan pilak, no ag met saray agawa ed kiew tan pitek; et saray arum sikara so kirayewan, tan saray arum makapabaing. 

2Ti 2:21 Kanian no wala so mangogol ed inkasikato ed saraya, sikato naani sakey a vaso a kirayewan, apasantos, nitalaga ya ikana na makankien, sipaparaan ed ganagana ya gawa'n maabig. 

2Ti 2:22 Balet tainan ka ed saray ibibeg ya inougaw, tan tombo'ka ed kaptekan, pananisia, aro, kareenan, a miolop ka ed saray ontawag ed Katawan a sililinis so puso'ra. 

2Ti 2:23 Et ingen arawyan mo so saray supsuppiat a ma-atiw tan nisengeg ed kamusmusan, ta amtam a pansengegan na pikokolkol. 

2Ti 2:24 Et say aripen na Katawan ag to kanepegan so makolkol, no ag ingen maamo ed ganagana, maong a mangibangat, matpel, 

2Ti 2:25 A bangatan to a matayarno so saray masumpa: ag la piga no say Dios iter to ed sikara so panagbabawi pian nakabatan da so tua, 

2Ti 2:26 Tan pian makaokpos ira ed kalot na diablo, a sikato so anakep ed sikara pian gawaen da so linawa to. 



2Ti 3:1 Et ingen kabaten mo so saya, a dia ed saray kaonoran ya agew onsabi so saray panaon a maatap. 

2Ti 3:2 Ta saray totoo sikara naani so mangaro ed saray lamalaman da, maaro ra na pilak, managpasirayew, atagey a linawa, maayew, matulay ed saray kaatengan da, malamang, aliwa ran masimpit, 

2Ti 3:3 Angapo so aro ra a nianakan, angapo so panangasi'ra, managpauges, aliwa ra'n maadia, maruksa ra, maingongot ed saray maabig, 

2Ti 3:4 Managliput, mayu-uges, mapasang, maaro ed saray likeliket, a lalo nen say dia ed Dios; 

2Ti 3:5 Ya wala so nengneng da ya inkasanto, et ingen itapat da so pakayari na saya'n inkasanto: unarawika met ed saray ontan. 

2Ti 3:6 Ta wala ed saraya so saray onloob ed saray kaabungan, tan dakepen da so bibi-i a napno ed saray kasalanan, ya atangoyor ed saray nambabangil a kaalakan, 

2Ti 3:7 Sara tan walara a siansia a manaaral et angan kapigan ag da nayarian so makarateng ed pikakabat ed tua. 

2Ti 3:8 Tan no panon so insumpara ed Moises di Janes tan Jambres, ontan met nirania sumpaen da so katuaan; totoo ya aderal so kanonotan da, tan ag naabobonan nipaakar ed pananisia. 

2Ti 3:9 Et ingen agla'ra naani onaligwas ed arapen: ta nipatnag naani ed saaray ganagana so kaandian na kalakal da, a singa met nipatnag so inkaandi kalakal na saraman. 

2Ti 3:10 Et ingen sika tinombok mon maong so bangabangat ko, say panagbilay ko, say getmak, say pananisiak, say abayag ya impantepel ko, say arok, say anos ko, 

2Ti 3:11 Saray inkapasegsegang ko, saray irirap ko; saray bengatla ya apasabik diman ed Antioquia, ed Ikonio, ed Listra; no anto so saray impamasegsegang ya intepel ko: et dia ed sikara ya amin inlaban ak na Katawan. 

2Ti 3:12 On, et amin so saray malabay a manbilay ed sinasanto ed Cristo Jesus, manako'ra naani pamasegsegang. 

2Ti 3:13 Balet saray totoo a mauges tan saray managsaol onuges lara'n onuges, a managsaol ira, tan nasaol ira met a dili. 

2Ti 3:14 Balet sika mansiansia ka ed saray bengatla ya inaral mo tan sinisiam, ya amtam no siopa so nanaralan mo ed sikara; 

2Ti 3:15 Tan nanlapu ed inkaugaw mo akabatan mo so saray masanto a Sulsulat, a makayari a mangawa ed sika a makabat ed kilalaban, lapu ed panamegley na pananisia ya wala ed Cristo-Jesus. 

2Ti 3:16 Amin a Sulat ya inpuyan na Dios sikato met so maabig a pakaaralan, pakasumalan, pakasimbawaan, tan pakapanontonan a sikato so wala ed katunongan: 

2Ti 3:17 Pian say too na Dios angapo komon so pankulangan to, a nabangatan a maong ed amin a gawa a maabig, 



2Ti 4:1 Ibilin ko ed sika ed malet ed arap na Dios, tan si Cristo Jesus, a sikato so mangokom naani ed saray mabilay tan inatey, tan dia ed panaon na kipatnag to tan say panarian to: 

2Ti 4:2 Ipulong mo so salita; manseet ka no panaon to; tan ag to panaon; mamaat ka, manimbawa ka, manbilin ka: a sitatayarno'n mabayag tan say panangibangat, 

2Ti 4:3 Ta onsabi so panaon ya ag da nitepel so maabig a bangat; no ag ingen dia ed kiwala na gatel ed layag da mantipon ira ed saray managbangat ed sikara, onong ed sa ray dili'n kaalakan na laman da; 

2Ti 4:4 Et itainan da so saray pandengel da ed tua, tan sikara so pandengel da ed saray labilabir. 

2Ti 4:5 Et ingen sika manpaga ka ed saray ami-amin a bengatla, mantepel ka ed saray irirap, gawam so gawa na evangelista, sumpalmo so ministeriom. 

2Ti 4:6 Ta siak wala ak la'n nisasaklang a bagat tan say panaon na itatainan ko sinmabila. 

2Ti 4:7 Akibakal ak ed maabig a pibabakal, asumpal ko so binati'ko, inonor ko so pananisia: 

2Ti 4:8 Manlapu ed natan anga ed arapen wala a niparaan ed siak so balanget na kaptekan, ya iter naani ed siak na Katawan, say maptek ya okom, ed saman ya agew: tan aliwa labat ed siak, no ag dia met ed saray amin a mangaro ed ipayawar to. 

2Ti 4:9 Gawam so nayarian mo pian onla ka ed siak a magano: 

2Ti 4:10 Ta si Dimas tinainan to ak, a nilabay to so saya'n mundo a peles tan linma ed Tesalonika; si Crescente ed Galacia, si Tito ed Dalmacia. 

2Ti 4:11 Si Lucas labat so wala ed siak, Alam si Marcos, tan sikato so piolopen mo ed sika: ta natulongan to ak ed ministerio. 

2Ti 4:12 Balet si Tiquico sikato so imbakik diman ed Efeso. 

2Ti 4:13 Saman so kolibenben a tinainanko ed Troas ed kinen Carpo, sikato so awit mo, sano onlakadia, tan saray libro, naglalo so saray pergamino. 

2Ti 4:14 Si Alejandro a manpapanday na gambang, dakel so mauges a ginawa to ed siak: say Katawan sikato naani so bayaran to onong ed saray gawa to: 

2Ti 4:15 Sika manlikas ka met ed sikato; ta sinumpa to'n toloy so saray salita mi. 

2Ti 4:16 Sanen inmona ya inpangilaban ko na laman ko angapo'y sinmanaawat ed siak , no ag ingen sikara ya amin tinainan da ak: ag komon nipakasalanan ed sikara ya. 

2Ti 4:17 Balet say Katawan akisanawat ed siak, tan pinabiskeg to ak; pian dia ed panamegley ko, say panagpulong nagawa komon a maabig, ta pian dengelen na saray amin a Gentil; et siak nipaliisak ed sangi na leon. 

2Ti 4:18 Ontan met ipaliis to ak naani na Katawan ed ami-amin a mauges a gawa, tan ilaban to ak naani a yakar diman ed panarian to a mangatatawen: a sikato so pangitdan komon na gloria ed ando lan ando. Amen. 

2Ti 4:19 Ibanom si Prisca tan si Aquila, tan saray wala ed abung nen Onesiforo. 

2Ti 4:20 Si Erasto atilak ed Corinto: balet si Trofimo sikato so tinainan ko a mabeblay dim an ed Mileto. 

2Ti 4:21 Gawam so nayarian mo pian makakar ka dia ed arapen na betel. Si Eubulo ibano to ka, tan si Pudente, tan si Lino tan si Claudia, tan saray amin ya agagi, 

2Ti 4:22 Say Katawan so wala komon ed espiritum. Gracia komon so wala ed sikayo. 

PANGASINENSE II Peter


2Pe 1:1 Si Simon Pedro, aripen tan apostol nen Jesu-Cristo diad saramay akagamor na mabli met a pananisia, a singa dia ed sikami, ed tunong na Dios tayo tan Manangilaban a JesuCristo: 

2Pe 1:2 Gracia tan kareenan komon so ondakel ed sikayo dia ed pikakabat ed Dios tan Katawan tayo a Jesus; 

2Pe 1:3 Bangta ganagana a bengatla a nipaakar ed bilay tan kasantosan initer ed sikatayo na madivino'n pakayari to, lapu ed pikakabat ed anawag ed sikatayo a nisesengeg ed gloria tan kasimpitan to: 

2Pe 1:4 Lapu ed saraya niiter ed sikatayo so sankablian tan ankabaleg a sipasipan, pian dia ed panamegley da nagawa kayo a minabang ed inkadios to nen imbatikan yo so dumsis dia ed mundo lapu ed gawa na lawan. 

2Pe 1:5 On, sikayo met, dia ed pangyan yo na seseg yo nisesengeg ed saya, ipatnag yo komon ed pananisia yo so virtud, tan dia ed virtud yo say kakabatan; 

2Pe 1:6 Tan dia ed kakabatan yo say benbe'y linawa: tan dia ed benbe'y linawa yo say anos; tan dia ed anos yo say kasantosan; 

2Pe 1:7 Tan dia ed kasantosan yo say kaoyamoay sanaagi; tan dia ed kaoyamoay sanaagi, say aro. 

2Pe 1:8 Ta no kien yo so sarayan bengatla, tan daakan ira, ag da kayo paulian a manmenengmeneng tan ag onbunga ed pikakabat ed Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

2Pe 1:9 Sa balet so andian na saraya'n bengatla bulag, nanengneng to labat so asinger, dia ed inpakalingoan to na panaglinis ed saray kasalanan to laran gendat. 

2Pe 1:10 Kanian, agagik, panpelengan yo ni komon a paligenen so inkatawag tan inkapili yo: ta dia ed pangawa yo ed saraya'n bengatla, ag kayo natiror angan kapigan: 

2Pe 1:11 Ta dia ed onia masolosolok so kiabuloy ed sikayo ed iloloob ed andi angaan a nanarian na Katawan tan Manangilaban tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

2Pe 1:12 Lapu ed saya sipaparaan ak lawas a mangipanonot ed sikayo ed saraya'n bengatla, angan amtayo ra tan maligen kayo ed saya'n katuaan a walad sikayo. 

2Pe 1:13 Et isisipen ko a matunong legan ko ed sayan tabernaculo, so mangilagyat ed sikayo dia ed gawa na panangipanonot; 

2Pe 1:14 Amtak a peteg a dia ed magano tainan ko la so sayan tabernaculo unong na impaliwawa ed siak na Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo. 

2Pe 1:15 On, pansesegan ko a mapeleng a dia ed kayari ipatey ko nanonotan yo komon a siansia so saraya a bengatla. 

2Pe 1:16 Ta ag mi impakabat ed sikayo so pakayari tan idateng na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo, lapu ed impanomtombok a sisisilib na palbuangen a salsalita, no ag ingen lapu'd inpakanengneng ed katagyan to. 

2Pe 1:17 Ta inawa'to ed Dios Ama so galang tan gloria, nen sinmabi ed sikato a nanlapu ed Sankatagian a gloria so sakey a voces a nankuan; Saya sikato so Ana'ko ya inararo, diad sikato apaliket ak a maong: 

2Pe 1:18 Et sikami nadngel mi so saya'n voces a nanlapu ed tawen, nen iba to kami ya wala ed masantos a palandey. 

2Pe 1:19 Wala met ed sikami so salita na profecia a lalo'n maando; et maong no imatleken yo a singa bilang sakey a silewan a onsisinag ed pasen ya ambilunget, anga ed ipelnak na kabkabuasan, tan say bitewen ed kabuasan onpelnak ed kapusoan yo; 

2Pe 1:20 Amtaen yo ya onona ya angapo so inprofeta a sulat ya inpatpatalos ya indumaduma 

2Pe 1:21 Ta angapo so profecia a nanlapu ed linawa na too, no ag saray totoo nansalita ra a nanlapu ed Dios, diad inpanenieg ed sikara na Espiritu Santo. 



2Pe 2:1 Bangbalet inmalagey met nen saman so tilatilan profetas ed otel na baley, unong na wala met naani ed sikayo so saray tilatilan managbangat a mangiloob ed maamot na inkaherejes a pakaderalan, tan ibeneg da ingen so Managbangat ya analiw ed sikara, et tarok da ed inkasikara a dili so magano a kaderal da. 

2Pe 2:2 Tan dakel so ontombok naani ed saray binabagel a gawara, et lapu ed satan say dalan na katuaan napauges naani. 

2Pe 2:3 Tan lapu ed agum gawaen da kayo a panagka-tagilako ra a tekep na konkonwarin salita, et say panusa ed sikara natan a nanlapu ed abayag ag manbayag, tan say kaderal da ag ontemeg. 

2Pe 2:4 Ta no ag intepel na Dios so saray angeles nen nankasalanan ira nen saman, no ag ingen inpelag to ra ed infierno ya asinger ira na golonggolong na kabilungtan, inyawa'to ra pian atadia ra ed panangokom; 

2Pe 2:5 Et ag to intepel so daan a mundo bangbalet inlaban to si Noe, a pati arum nin pitora, sakey a managpulong na katunongan, dia ed inpangitarok to na delap ed mundo na saray momoan; 

2Pe 2:6 Tan no dinusa to ra, dia ed inpaneral to, ed saray ciudad na Sodoma tan Gomorra, inpagmaliw to ra a dapol, tan ginawa to ra a panuliranan na saray totoo ya manbilay na marumsis, 

2Pe 2:7 Tan inlaban to si matunong a Lot, nen apaermen a toloy na sankaugsan a inpanbilay na saray mauges a totoo 

2Pe 2:8 (Ta saya a matunong a too, a nanayam ed limog da ya diad inpakanengneng to tan inpakadngel to, apadpaermen ya agew-agew so matunong a kamarerwa to lapu ed kagagawa na saraman a mangaruksa): 

2Pe 2:9 Amta na Katawan so pangiliktar to ed saray masantos ed katokso, tan mangikana ed saray aliwan matunong ed lepsag na kadudusa no nasabi agew na panangokom; 

2Pe 2:10 Tan lalo la a toloy, saraman so manakar a ontombok ed laman ed gawa na lawan na karutakan, tan pabpabandayen da so pakauley. Managkabengat ira, atagey ira a linawa ya ag da antakot so manalabotob ed saray atagey a pakauley; 

2Pe 2:11 Anta saray angeles a babaleg ira ed biskeg tan pakayari, ag ira angitarok na pamabpabanday ya onsumpa ed sikara ed arap na Katawan. 

2Pe 2:12 Bangbalet saraya, singa ra monanakap ya andiay pankatunongan, ayayep ya apalsa ra lambengat a deralen ya erel-erelen, tan masalita ra na mauges ed saray agagamil ya bengatla ya ag da natalusan; et mauges diad inkabolok da naani naderal ira, 

2Pe 2:13 Tan akoen da naani kaugsan a tumang na kaugsan da; totoon igaton da a gayaga so pakapnek da ed likeliket ed agew, matik tan tilol, a dia ed piokob da ed sikayo a mangan, panliketan da so lingo-lingo ra; 

2Pe 2:14 Walay mata ra a napno na panagderal na panamaley, tan ag da nayariay ontonda ed kasalanan; ilayat da ra so saray magapil a kamarerua; a ni-iluam so puso ra ed agum; anak ira na ayew; 

2Pe 2:15 Ta nilingoanan da so dalan a maptek, tan abalang ira, dia ed inpanombok da na dalan nen Balaam, ya anak nen Beor, a kinaliktan to so gunguna na kaugsan; 

2Pe 2:16 Balet inbano lapu ed inpakalukso to: sakey ya emel ya asno nansalita ed voces na too, tan binenbenan to so kasnokan na profeta. 

2Pe 2:17 Saraya so sobol ya andi danum, tan kelpa ya isisiplog na bagyo, a dia ed sikara so nitadiaan na deket na kabilungetan. 

2Pe 2:18 Ta dia ed pangibesngaw da na ankakabaleg a pasirayew a salitan maapa, ilayat da ra lapud kasibaan na gawa na lawan ed laman, so saray ibabatikan da la a peteg so saray manbibilay ed lingo; 

2Pe 2:19 Pangpangakoan da ra na kabobolos, anta dili a sikara so aripen na inkabolok, ta say too a natalo, talaga a nipangaw ed inkaaripen ed analod sikato. 

2Pe 2:20 Ta tuan peteg ya diad kayari inyarawi ra la ed karutakan na mundo lapu ed pikakabat da ed Katawan tan Manangilaban tayo a Jesu-Cristo, insan ira pasakop lamet, tan atalo ra, say kaonoran a kipapasen da mauguges nen say inmona. 

2Pe 2:21 Ta magmaong ni komon no ag da akabkabatan so dalan na katunongan, nen say diad kayari inpi-kabat da, et benegan da so masantos a gangan a niiter ed sikara. 

2Pe 2:22 Bangbalet agawa ed sikara so peteg ya uliran: Say aso pinawil to so uta to lamet, tan say kaong a naorasan nantiblak lamet. 



2Pe 3:1 Inararok ira, gawaen ko so saya natan a komaduan sulat ed sikayo, tan diad sikara a dua liingen ko so malinis a kanonotan yo lapud pangipasen kod sikayo ed pakanonotan; 

2Pe 3:2 Pian nanonotan yo so saray salita a inbalikas nen saman na saray masantos a profetas, tan say gangan na Katawan tan Manangilaban ed lepsag na saray apostoles yo; 

2Pe 3:3 Amtaen so saya ya unona, a dia ed kaonoran ya agew onsabi so saray managlurey a pati panaglurey, a manakar irad dilin lawan da, 

2Pe 3:4 Tan kuanen da: Iner so kawalaan na sipan ed idateng to? ta nanlapu la ed saman so agew ya inkaplag dad ugip na atateng, ganagana a bengatla, ontotoloy a singa nen gapu na inkapalsa. 

2Pe 3:5 Ta nanlinawaan da a inlingoan a wala ray katawenan nanlapu lad inmonan panaon, tan say dalin ya wala ed danum tan otel na danum lapud salita na Dios: 

2Pe 3:6 Lapu ed saya say mundo nen saman, dia ed inkayanep to na danum atawtaw: 

2Pe 3:7 Balet saray tawen ya wala natan, tan say dalin, inpansiansia ra na dilin salitan niatol ya onkana ed apuy ed agew na panangokom, tan dia ed kaderal na saray mangaruksan totoo. 

2Pe 3:8 Balet, inarok ira, ag yo lilingngoanan so sakey a bengatla: a say sanagew dia ed arap na Katawan singa sanlibon taon, tan say sanlibo a taon singa sanagew. 

2Pe 3:9 Say Katawan ag to bayagen so sipan to, a singa say arum igaton da a mabayag; no ag ingen masungdo ed sikayo, ag to labay ya wala so siopaman a natawtaw no ag ingen amin komon nagegemtan da so panagsibkel. 

2Pe 3:10 Balet say agew na Katawan onsabi a singa matakew; a dia ed satan saray tawen manganga ra a pati baleg ya ongol, tan say elementos natunaw ed manliob a petang, tan say dalin tan saray gawa ya wala ed sikato napo-olan ira. 

2Pe 3:11 Et diad inengneng a saraya ya amin a bengatla naderal ira naani, anton nengneng na inkato-o so nepeg yon pagmaliwan ed amin a masantos a panagbilay tan kasimpitan, 

2Pe 3:12 Dia ed panalagar tan panpilalek yo ed isabi agew na Dios, a sikato so katunaw na saray tawen dia ed idalang da, tan saray eiementos natunaw ed manliob a petang? 

2Pe 3:13 Balet, unong ed sipan to alagden tayo so saray tawen a balo tan dalin a balo, a sikara so pana-ayaman na katunongan. 

2Pe 3:14 Lapu ed saya, inararok ira, bangta kaliktan yo so saraya a bengatla, panpelengan yo ta pian naromog kayod kareenan, ya andi matik tan karumsisan ed imaton to. 

2Pe 3:15 Tan ibilang yo a sikatoy kilalaban so sungdo na Katawan, a singa met si inararo ya agi tayo a Pablo ya unong na kakabatan a niiter ed sikato insulat to met ed sikayo: 

2Pe 3:16 Amin a sula' to sasalitaen to ed sikara so sarayan bengatla; a say arum ed saraya mairap a talosan, a saray werek tan palawpaw a totoo pi-keweten da ra, a singa met saray arum a sulsulat, pian sikato so kaderalan da dili. 

2Pe 3:17 Kanian sikayo, inararok, diad pikakabat ed sarayan bengatla alwaran yo ompan, dia ed kasagiat yo ed lingo na saray mangarumsis a totoo napelag kayo ed satan a kaligenan yo. 

2Pe 3:18 No ag ingen ombona kayo komon ed gracia tan pikakabat ed Katawan tan Manangilaban tayo a JesuCristo. Dia ed sikato komon so gloria natan tan andi angaan. Ontan pa komon. 

PANGASINENSE III John


3Jn 1:1 Say masiken ed inararok a Gaio, ya aroen ko ed katuaan. 

3Jn 1:2 Inaro, pirawat ko ya onaliguas ka komon ed ganagana a bengatla, tan maksil ka komon, salanti onong na yaliguas na kamarerwam. 

3Jn 1:3 Ta nangayaga ak na baleg nen linma ra dia so agagi tan angiter ira na pantasi ed katuaan mo, unong ed manaakar ka lanti ed katuaan. 

3Jn 1:4 Angapo so babaleg a liket ko nen say saya, salanti say pakadngel ko a saray ana'ko manaakar ira ed katuaan. 

3Jn 1:5 Inaro, gawaen mo so matoor a kimey ed ganagana a gawaen mo ed saray agagi tan dia ed saray sankaili; 

3Jn 1:6 Ya angiter ira na pantasi ed panangarom ed arap na iglesia: amaong so gawaen mo a ibalap mo ra ed kurang da a makanakana ed Dios: 

3Jn 1:7 Ta sikara nisengeg ed Ngaran sinmolong ira ya andi bengatla ya inala ra ed saray Gentiles. 

3Jn 1:8 Sikatayo sirin nepeg tayo ra ya akoen so saraya, pian mankatangbayan itayo ed katuaan. 

3Jn 1:9 Siak sinulat ko na daiset so iglesia: balet si Diotrefes, ya aroen to a wala ed sikatoy katagtagian ed sikara ed kalimog da, ag to kami akoen. 

3Jn 1:10 Kanian no onsabi ak, ipanonot ko so kagagawa to, a gagawaen to, a pitalabotob to itayo na maramsak iran salita: tan ag ni napenek ed saraya, ni say akoen to ed inkasikato ray agagi, tan sebelan to ray malabay a mangako, tan paekalen to ra ed iglesia. 

3Jn 1:11 Inaro, ag mo aaligen itan so mauges, no ag satay maong. Say mangawa na maong, kien na Dios: say mangawa na mauges, ag to anengneng so Dios. 

3Jn 1:12 Si Demetrio walad sikato so pantasi amin a too, tan say dili a katuaan; on, tasian mi met; tan amtam a matua so panagtasi mi. 

3Jn 1:13 Siak wala wari dakel a bengatla ya isulat ko ed sika, balet ag ko labay a isulat ira ed sika ed tinta tan pluma: 

3Jn 1:14 Ta ilaloan ko so pakanengneng ko ed sika a magano, tan insan ita la mansalita ed lupalupaan. Saray kakaaro lugayan da ka. Ilugay yo ray kakaaro ed ngaran. 

3Jn 1:15 Say kareenan komon so wala ed sika. Saray kakaaro lugayan da ka. Ilugay yo ray kakaaro ed ngaran. 

PANGASINENSE MARK


Mar 1:1 Say gapo na evangelio nen JesuCristo, ya Anak na Dios. 

Mar 1:2 Salanti onong na nisulat dia ed Isaias ya profeta, Nia, ibakik so igagangan ko ed arapan na lupam, ya sikato'y mangiparaan na dalan mo; 

Mar 1:3 Say voces na sakey a mantawtawag ed kalawakan, Iparaan yo so dalan na katawan, Petek yo so saray basbas to; 

Mar 1:4 Si Juan linma dia, ya aminbinyag ed kalawakan tan angipulong na binyag na panagbabawi ya onkana'd pamaandi ed saray kasalanan. 

Mar 1:5 Et pinmaway ed sikato so saray amin a taga dalin na Judea, tan saray amin a taga Jerualem; et abinyagan ira ed sikato ed flog ya Jordan, ya inpapatua ra so saray kasalanan da. 

Mar 1:6 Et is Juan sikakawes nensaman na bago'y kamello, tan walaan na sakey a balkes a katat a nibariber ed awak to, tan nankakakan na saray doron tan dilo na takel. 

Mar 1:7 Et sikato'y nanpulong, a kuan to, Onla dia a mantombok ed siak so makapanyari nen siak, say taker na saray sapin to agak onkanan onyoko tan mangokbar. 

Mar 1:8 Siak binyagan takayo ed danum: sikato balet binyagan to kayo naani na Espiritu Santo. 

Mar 1:9 Et agawa ed saraman ya agew, ya si Jesus sinmabi a nanlapu ed Nazaret na Galilea, et bininyagan nen Juan ed Jordan. 

Mar 1:10 Et tampol ya sanen ontatatdang a nanlapu ed danum, anengneng to so saray katawenan ya linmukas, tan say Espiritu ya singa malapati ya onleleksab ed sikato: 

Mar 1:11 Tan sakey a voces a nanlapu ed saray katawenan, a kuan to, Sika so inadarok ya Anak, napaliket ak ya maong ed sika. 

Mar 1:12 Et tampol ya sikato 'y inyakad na Espiritu ed kalawakan. 

Mar 1:13 Tan sikato'y wadman ed kalawakan ed apataplo'n agew a tinok-tokso nen Satanas; tan akipanayam ed saray monanakap; et saray angeles nanlinkor ira ed sikato. 

Mar 1:14 Natan sanen nipangaw la si Juan, linma si Jesus ed Galilea, ya angipolpulong na evangelio na Dios, 

Mar 1:15 Tan inkukuan to, Say panaon asumpa'la, tan say panarian na Dios asinger la: mansibkel kayo, tan manisia kayo ed evangelo. 

Mar 1:16 Et nen onlalabas ya manaakar ed gilig na dayat na Galilea, anengneng to si Simon tan si Andres ya agi nen Simon a mangipepeleg ira na sakey ya iket ed dayat: ta somisigay ira. 

Mar 1:17 Et inkuan nen Jesus ed sikara, Tombo'kayo ed siak, et gawaen ta kayo'n magmaliw a somisigay na totoo. 

Mar 1:18 Et tampol ya tinainan da so saray iket da tan tinmombok ira ed sikato. 

Mar 1:19 Et nen nanakar na aragdawi daiset, anengneng to si Santiago ya anak nen Zebedeo, tan si Juan ya agi to, ya wala ra met ed baloto'n mana 

Mar 1:20 Et tampol a tinawag to ra: et tinaynan da si ama ra a Zebedeo ed baloto pati saray inopaan ya ariripen, tan tinmombok ari ed sikato. 

Mar 1:21 Tan linma ra ed Capernaum; et tampol ya diad agew a sabaton linmoob ed sinagoga tan nanbangat. 

Mar 1:22 Et nikelkelawan ira ed saray bangato': ta inbanga'to ra'n singa walaa'y pakauley ya aliwa'n singa saray escribas. 

Mar 1:23 Et wala nensaman met la so sakey a too ed sinagoga ra ya walaan na sakey a marumsis ya espiritu et inmakis, 

Mar 1:24 A kuan to, Anto'y pibibiangan mi ed sika, Jesus, sika a Nazareno? linma ka dia'n mamagbag ed sikami? Amta taka no siopa ka, sika so Santo na Dios. 

Mar 1:25 Et si Jesus sikato so nanpasnokan to, a kuan to, Ag ka oneesel, tan ompaway ka ed sikato. 

Mar 1:26 Et say marumsis ya espiritu, diad inpankolandag to tan nen manakis na baleg, pinmaway ed sikato. 

Mar 1:27 Et atalagnaw ira'n amin, ed ontan la ya nantetepetan ira, a kuan da, Anto ya? sakey a balo'n bangat! siouley a mangangan angan saray marumsis ya espiritu, et ontolok ira ed sikato. 

Mar 1:28 Et say balita ed sikato kinmayat a tampol ed amin a dalin na Galilea a rnanliberliber. 

Mar 1:29 Et tampol sanen pinmaway ira ed sinagoga, linma ra ed abung nen Simon tan Andres, pati di Santiago tan Juan. 

Mar 1:30 Et say bii a katulangan nen Simon mandokdokol a mabeblay na petang; et inbaga ra'n tampol ed sikato so nipaakar ed bii. 

Mar 1:31 Et sinminger tan sikato'y iriala to'd lima, tan sikato'y pinaalagey to; tan sikato'y tinainan na petang, et sikato'y nanlinkor ed sikara. 

Mar 1:32 Tan dia'd ngarem, sanen say banwa sinmelek la, inyakar da ed sikato so saramay amin ya agmakayari, tan saray aselepan na demonio. 

Mar 1:33 Et amin a taga ciudad atipon nensaman ed pinto. 

Mar 1:34 Et pinaabig to ray amayamay ya agmakayari ed nanbabangil a sakisakit, tan pinapaway to ray amayamay a demonio: tan ag to inaboloyan so saray demonio ya mansalita, ta sikato'y kabat da.
