Mar 1:35 Tan dia'd kaimbuasan, ed palbangon, binmangon tan pinmaway, et linma ed sakey a pasen a lawak, tan diman nanpikasi. 

Mar 1:36 Et si Simon tan saray akiolop ed sikato tinmombok ira ed sikato; 

Mar 1:37 Et sikato'y aromog da tan kuan da ed sikato, Amin da, aanapen da ka. 

Mar 1:38 Et sikato kuan to ed sikara, Onla itayo ed angan ined a pasen ed saray ontombok a balbaley, pian manpulong ak met diman: ta linma ak dia lapu ed saya'n getma. 

Mar 1:39 Et sikato'y tinmotobong ed saray sinagoga ra ed amin a Galilea, ya nanpopulong tan nanpapapaway na saray demonio. 

Mar 1:40 Et dinmago ed sikato'y sakey ya akating a mankekerew ed sikato, tan manaltalimokor ed sikato, tan kuan to ed sikato, No labay mo, nayarian mo ak a linisan. 

Mar 1:41 Et lapu'd atenyeg so panangabagey to, inuna'to'y lima to, et sikato'y diniwi'to tan inkuan to, ed sikato, Labay ko; nalinisan ka komon. 

Mar 1:42 Tan dingan na intainan na kating ed sikato, et agawa'n malinis. 

Mar 1:43 Et malmalet ya inbilibilin to ed sikato tan sikato'y inbaki to'n tampol. 

Mar 1:44 Et kuan to ed sikato, Nengneng mo ya angapo'y too'n pangibagaanmo: balet onla ka ipatnag moy inkasika ed sacerdote tan isaklang mo'y nipaakar ed inkalinisan mo so saray bengatla ya inbilin nen Moises, pian pakapamintuaan ed sikara. 

Mar 1:45 Balet sikato'y pinmaway tan ginapoan to'n inpalapag a mapalalo, tan inwakawak to so agawa, ed onmanla ya si Jesus ag to la ayarian so onloob a maparongtal ed sakey a ciudad, noag ingen nanayam ed paway ed paspasen a lawak: et linma ra ed sikato a nanlapu ed amin a pasen. 



Mar 2:1 Tan sanen linmoob lamet ed Capernaum nen kayari pigaran agew nadngelan a wala ed abung. 

Mar 2:2 Et nantitipon so amayamay, ed ontan la ya angapo so napanayaman, angapo, angan dia ed liberliber na pinto: et inpopulong to ed sikara so salita. 

Mar 2:3 Et sinmabi arum, ya angyakad ed sikato na sakey a too ya apagpag, ya inawit na apat ira. 

Mar 2:4 Et nen ag ira makaasinger ed sikato lapu ed karaklan, linukasan da so bobongan ed kawalaan to, tan sanen abongaw da la, inlusor da so dalagan ya pandokdokolan na apagpag. 

Mar 2:5 Et si Jesus lapu ed anengneng to so pananisia ra, kuan to,ed apagpag, Anak, saray kasalanan mo aperdona la ra. 

Mar 2:6 Balet wadman ira a manyudyurong so pigara ed saray escribas, ya nannodnonot ed puso ra'n dili, 

Mar 2:7 Akin et mansalita so saya'n too na onia? sikato'y manayew. Siopa so makapamerdona na saray kasalanan no ag saksakey, salanti say Dios? 

Mar 2:8 Et tampol si Jesus lapu'd alikas to ed espiritu to ya mannodnonot ira na ontan ed loob da'n dili, kuan to ed sikara, Akin et nonoten yo so saraya'n bengatla ed kapusoan yo? 

Mar 2:9 Dinan so maig-inomay, ya ikuan ed apagpag, Saray kasalanan mo, aperdona ra; ono say pangikuan, Alagey ka, tan alam so dokolan mo, tan manakar ka? 

Mar 2:10 Balet pian nakabatan yo ya say Anak na too wala so pakauley to dia ed dalin a mamerdona na kasalanan, (kuan to ed apagpag), 

Mar 2:11 Kuan ko ed sika, Alagey ka, alam so dokolan mo, tan onlaka ed abung mo. 

Mar 2:12 Et inmalagey, tan tampol inala to so dokolan to tan pinmaway ed arapan da'n amin; ed ontanla ya nikelawan ira'n amin, tan ingalgalang da so Dios, a kuan da, Ag-itayo ni akanengneng na onia. Inkatawag nen Levi. 

Mar 2:13 Tan sikato pinmaway lamet ed baybay; tan ami' katooan linma ra ed sikato, et inbabanga'to ra. 

Mar 2:14 Et nen onlalabas anengneng to si Levi, ya anak a laki nen Alfeo, a manyudyurong ed panagsingilan na buis, tan kuan to ed sikato, Tombok mo ak. Et sikato'y inmalagey tan tinmombok ed sikato. 

Mar 2:15 Et agawa, ya sanen sikato'y wala'd pananganan ed abung to'n man; amayamay iray publicanos tan makasalanan ya akiyorong ed Jesus tan saray babangatan to: ta amayamay ira tan sikato'y tinombok da. 

Mar 2:16 Et saray escribas na saray Fariseos, sanen anengneng da ya sikato'y mamangan ya iba to ray publicanos tan saray makasalanan, inkuan da ed saray babangatan to Panon ita'n a sikato'y mikan tan mfinum ed saray publicanos tan saray makasalanan? 

Mar 2:17 Et nen sikato'y nadngel nen Jesus, kuan to ed sikara, Saray maksil ag ira mankaokolan na mananambal, noag saray mabeblay: agak linma dia'n manawag ed saray matunong no ag saray makasalanan. 

Mar 2:18 Et saray babangatan nen Juan tan saray Fariseos manaayunal ira nensaman: et linma ra tan kuan da ed sikato Akin et saray babangatan nen Juan tan saray babangatan na saray Fariseos manayunal ira, balet saray babangatan mo et ag ira manayunal? 

Mar 2:19 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara. Nayarian ta na saray anak na panbansalan so manayunal, leleg ya wala so novio ed sikara? legan a wala ni ed sikara so novio, agda nayarian so manayunal. 

Mar 2:20 Balet onsabi so saray agew, ya kiarawi novio ed sikara, tan insan ira manayunal ed satan ya agew. 

Mar 2:21 Angapo so too'n mangisakab na balo'n abel ed kawes ya daan: ta no andi say panakab guyoren to'man, say balo guyoren to so daan, et maug-uges ya pilat so nagawa. 

Mar 2:22 Tan angapo'y too ya mangyan na balo'n alak ed saray daan ya supot katat; ta no andi say alak pilaten to so saray katat, et say alak naibung, tan saray katat naderal ira; balet yan da so balo'n alak ed saray balo'n supot a katat. 

Mar 2:23 Tan agawa, ya sikato manakakar ed agew na sabaton ed saray minaisan ya uma; et saray babangatan to, ed panaakar da, ginapoan da'y nanbodbor na saray balibal. 

Mar 2:24 Et saray Fariseos inkuan da ed sikato, Nia, akin et gawaen da ed agew a sabaton so ag onkatonongan? 

Mar 2:25 Et sikato inkuan to ed sikara, Ag yo ni abasa so ginawa nen David, sanen wala'y inpankaokolan to, tan narasan, sikato, tan saray ibiba to? 

Mar 2:26 No pano'y inloob to ed abung na Dios sanen si Abiatar so atagey a sacerdote tan kinan to ray tinapay ya wadman ya ag manepeg a kanen nilikod ed saray sacerdote, et initdan to met so saray akiolop ed sikato? 

Mar 2:27 Tan inkuan to ed sikara, Say sabaton agawa'n onkana'd too, et ag agawa so too ya onkana ed sabaton: 

Mar 2:28 Kanian say Anak na too sikato so katawan ni na sabaton. 



Mar 3:1 Tan sikato'y linmoob lamet ed sinagoga; et wala nensaman diman so sakey a laki ya amagaan so lima to. 

Mar 3:2 Et sikato'y binantayan da, no sikato so tambalen to kasi ed agew na sabaton; pian sikato'y nidalem da komon. 

Mar 3:3 Et kuan to ed laki ya amagaan so lima to, Alagey ka. 

Mar 3:4 Et kuan to ed sikara, Matonong kasi ed agew a sabaton so pangawa'y maong, ono pangawa'y duksa? say pangyagel na bilay, ono say pamatey? Balet ag ira inmesel. 

Mar 3:5 Tan sanen ninengneng to ra a manliberliber a sisasanok, dia'd inkaermenan to ed kaawetan na puso ra, kuan to ed laki, Unat mo so limam. Et sikato'y inyuna'to: et say lima to inmabig. 

Mar 3:6 Et saray Fariseos pinmaway ira, tan tampol ya akisingbatan ira ed saray Herodianos na sumpa ed sikato, no panon so pamagbag da ed sikato. 

Mar 3:7 Et si Jesus pati saray babangatan to inmarawi ra anga ed dayat: et sakey a baleg ya olop na katooan a nanlapu ed Galilea so tinmombok; tan nanlapu ed Judea, 

Mar 3:8 Tan nanlapu ed Jerusalem, tan nanlapu ed Idumea, tan labas na Jordan, tan asinger ed Tiro tan Sidon, sakey a baleg ya olop na katooan, lapu'd nadnadngelan da so saray ankakabaleg a bengatla a ginawa to, dinmago ra ed sikato. 

Mar 3:9 Tan sikato'y nansalita ed saray babangatan to, ya sakey a melag ya paraw so niparaan komon ed sikato nisengeg ed saray karakel, onpan sikato'y aposan da: 

Mar 3:10 Lapu'd no amaabig na amayamay; ed ontanla a say lapag na saray walaa'y sakisakit nanbolobol ira ed sikato pian sikato komon so nadiwit da. 

Mar 3:11 Et saray marumsis ya espfritu, bangnen sikato'y anengneng da, dinmakmomo ra ed arap to, tan nanakis ira, a kuan da, Sika so Anak na Dios. 

Mar 3:12 Et inbilin ton malmalet ed sikara ya sikato'y ag da ipakabat. 

Mar 3:13 Tan tinmatdang ed palandey, et tinawag to ed sikato so saray ginabay to; et linma ra ed sikato. 

Mar 3:14 Et anoro na labindua, pian sikara so miolop ed sikato, tan pian ibaki to ra ya manpulong, 

Mar 3:15 Tan nawalaan iray pakauley ya mamaekal ed saray demonio; 

Mar 3:16 Et pinangaranan to si Simon na Pedro; 

Mar 3:17 Tan si Santiago ya anak nen Zebedeo, tan si Juan ya agi nen Santiago; et sikara so pinangaranan to na Boanerges, salanti, Anak na karol: 

Mar 3:18 Tan si Andres, tan si Felipe, tan si Bartome, tan si Mateo, tan si Tomas, tan si Santiago ya anak nen Alfeo, tan si Tadeo, tan si Simon a taga Canaan, 

Mar 3:19 Tan si Judas Iscariote, a sikato met so angyawat ed sikato. 

Mar 3:20 Tan sikato onla ed sake'ya abung. Et say dakel a katooan ondago ra a mantitipon lamet, et ontan ya ag da la ayarian so angan na angan tinapay. 

Mar 3:21 Et sanen sikato'y nadngelan na saray kakaaro to, pinmaway iran mangala ed sikato: ta inkuan da, Wala ed paway na inkasikato. 

Mar 3:22 Et saray escribas ya linmasor a nanlapu ed Jerusalem inkuan da, Wala ed sikato si Beelzebub, tan Lapu'd samay principe na saray demonio papawayen to so saray demonio. 

Mar 3:23 Et tinawag to ra ed sikato, tan inkuan to ed sikara ed saray alimbawa, Panon so pakayari nen Satanas a mamatainan ed Satanas? 

Mar 3:24 Tan no say sakey a panarian naapag a sumpa ed inkasikato, satan a panarian agmakapanbayag. 

Mar 3:25 Ta no say sakey ya abung naapagapag sumpa ed inkasikato, satan ya abung ag to nayaria'y makapanbayag. 

Mar 3:26 Et no si Satanas tinmalindeg sumpa ed sikato'n dili, tan naapag, ag makapanalagey, wala ingen so angaan to, 

Mar 3:27 Balet angapo'y makaloob ed abung na mabiskeg a too, tan samsamen to so saray kayarian to, no ag to onona'n baloren so mabiskeg a too; tan saman to la samsaman so abung to. 

Mar 3:28 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Amin a kasalanan da naperdona ed saray anak na totoo, tan saray ayew da ya angan anto a panayew da naani: 

Mar 3:29 Ingen siopaman a mangayew sumpa ed Espiritu Santo angapon balot so kaperdona to, no ag ingen mankasalanan ed andiangaan a kasalanan: 

Mar 3:30 Lapu ed kuan da, Sikato'y Walaan na sakey a marumsis ya espiritu. 

Mar 3:31 Tan sinmabi si ina to tan saray agagi to; et, nen manalalagey ira ed paway, nanbaki ra ed sikato, a sikatoy tatawagen da. 

Mar 3:32 Et sakey a karakel na katooan so manyudyurong ed liberliber to; tan kuan da ed sikato, Niraman, di inam tan saray agagim ed paway a manaanap ed sika. 

Mar 3:33 Et inmebat ed sikara, tan kuan to, Siopa so inak tan saray agagik? 

Mar 3:34 Et nen ninmengneng ed saray manyudyurong ed liberliber to, kuan to, Niyara, so inak tan saray agagik! 

Mar 3:35 Ta siopaman a manumpal na linawa na Dios, sikato lanlamang so agik a laki, agik a bii, tan inak. 



Mar 4:1 Tan ginapoan to lamet so nanbangat ed abay na bay bay. Tan wala so nantitipon ed sikato a sankabalgan ya olop na katooan, kanian sikato'y linmoob ed sakey a paraw, tan nanyurong ed dayat: et amin day karakel wala ra ed abay na dayat ed sakbit. 

Mar 4:2 Et binangatan to ra na amayamay a bengabengatla ed panamegley na saray alimbawa, tan inkuan to ed sikara ed banga'to, 

Mar 4:3 Dengel yo: Nia, say managtanem linma ya mantanem: 

Mar 4:4 Et agawa, nen nantanem, arum a bukel dinmapo ed gilig na dalan, et saray manok ya atap linma ra tan sikato'y kinan da. 

Mar 4:5 Tan say arum dinmapo ed mabato'n pasen, ya andian na dakel a dalin; et tampol, ya tinmobo, lapu ed angapo'y aralem a dalin to: 

Mar 4:6 Et sanen tinmayagtag so banwa. sikato'y naldab; tan lapu ed angapo so lamo'to sikato'y amagaan. 

Mar 4:7 Tan say arum dinmapo ed leet na saray sabitan, et saray sabitar tinmobo ra et sikato'y tinabonan da et sikato'y ag nanbunga. 

Mar 4:8 Tan saray arum dinmapo ed maong ya dalin, et nanbunga, a tinmotobo tan binmobona; et nanbunga, na santatlomplo tan sananemaplo, tan tungal-lasus. 

Mar 4:9 Et inkuan to, Say walaan na la yag a pandengel sikato so ondengel. 

Mar 4:10 Et sanen bokbokod to saramay wala ed abay to pati saray labindus tinepet da ed sikato so saray alimbawa. 

Mar 4:11 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Dia'd sikayo niiter so misterio na panaria'y Dios; balet ed saray wala ed paway amin a bengabengatla ed panamegley na saray alimbawa: 

Mar 4:12 Pian onnengneng ira makanengneng ira, et ag da natebek; tan ondengel ira makadngel ira et ag da natalusan; agla piga no onpawil ira lamet, et saray kasalanan da naperdona ed sikara. 

Mar 4:13 Tan kuan to ed sikara, Ag yo amta so saya'n alimbawa? et panon so pangamta yo naani ed saray amin ya alimbawa? 

Mar 4:14 Say managtanem itanem to so salita. 

Mar 4:15 Et sikaraya so dinmapo ed gilig na dalan, a diman so nitaneman na salita, et sanen nadngel da tampol a linma si Satanas, tan inekal to so salita ya nftanem ed sikara. 

Mar 4:16 Tan saraya on tan met sikara'y nftanem ed saray mabato a paspasen, a sikara, nen nadngel da so salita, sikato'y inawat da'n tampol a magay aga; 

Mar 4:17 Et angapo'y lamot da ed inkasikara, no ag say manbilay iran magangano; saman la, no say pakapairap ono pakapasegsegang so nagawa nisengeg ed salita, nitiror ira a tampol. 

Mar 4:18 Tan saray arum sikara'y nitanem ed nanleleetan na saray sabitan; sikaraya so akadngel sa salita, 

Mar 4:19 Et saray kapagaan na mundo, tan say panamalingo na saray kayamanan, tan saray pankaliket ed arum a bengabengatla ya onloob ed nonot, leneren da so salita, et sikato'y magmaliw ya ag manbunga. 

Mar 4:20 Tan saraya sikara so nitanem ed maong a dalin; saray ondengel na salita, et akoen da tan pabungaen da, na santatlomplo, tan sananemaplo, tan tungal-lasus. 

Mar 4:21 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Niakar kasi silew pian sikato so 'yan ed dalem na boksot ono silong na dalagan tan ag ingen yan ed panangitapewan? 

Mar 4:22 Ta angapo'y bengat Ian maamot, no ag ingen pian sikato'y nipatnag; angapo met so bengatla'n agawa a maamot, no ag pian nipaliwawa. 

Mar 4:23 No siopaman a too walaan na layag a pandengel, ondengel. 

Mar 4:24 Tan inkuan to ed sikara, Imatleken yo so narengel yo: ed anto'n sukat a pansukat yo sikato naani isukat ed sikayo; tan dakdakel ni so nfiter ed sikayo. 

Mar 4:25 Ta say walaan, sikato so naitdan: et say andian, naekal ed sikato so angan pati say wala ed sikato. 

Mar 4:26 Et inkuan to, Onia so panaria'y Dios, singa no say sakey a too mangipopor na bukel ed dalin; 

Mar 4:27 Tan naugip tan onbangon ed labi tan agew, et say bukel onsulming, tan ontobo, sikato ag to amta no panon. 

Mar 4:28 Say dalin mamabunga ed sikato'n dili, onona say tangkay, insan say eba, insan say balibal a napno'y bukel na mats. 

Mar 4:29 Balet sano aloco so bunga, tampol a 'yan to so kompay, ta asabi la'y panagani. 

Mar 4:30 Et kuan to, Panon so pangyolibay tayo ed panaria'y Dios? ono anto ya alimbawa so pangipaakaran tayo'd sikato? 

Mar 4:31 Sikato so kaolibay na sakey a bukel na mostaza'ya sano sikato'y nitanem ed dalin, angan sikato'y melag nen saray amin a bukel a wala ed dalin, 

Mar 4:32 Manwari'n ontan sano sikato'y nitanem, ontobo, tan magmaliw ya balbaleg nen saray amin a pisipising, tan mangipaway na ankakabaleg a sanga; ed ontan ya saray kamanokan ed tawen nayarian da so onpokok ed sirum da. 

Mar 4:33 Tan ed amayamay ya ontan ya alimbawa inbalikas to so salita ed sikara, onong na nayarian da'n dengelen: 

Mar 4:34 Tan ag to akisalita ed sikara no angapo'y sakey ya alimbawa: ingen dia ed kabokoran inpaliwawa to so saray amin a bengatla ed saray babangatan ton dili. 

Mar 4:35 Dia ed saman ya agew nen ngarem la, kuan to ed sikara, Onbaliksat itayo ed pagpag a gilig. 

Mar 4:36 Et nen tinainan to ray dakel a katooan, sikato'y inala ra ed sikara, onong na kiwawala to ed paraw. Tan wala met ira'y sananey a paraw ya iba to. 

Mar 4:37 Et imalagey so sakey a baleg ya bagyo na dagem, tan saray daluyon onsasaboyag ira ed paraw, ed ontan la ya say paraw napapano la. 

Mar 4:38 Et sikato met so wala ed dapit olin, a naugip ed tapew na tandakan: et sikato'y niliing da tan kuan da ed sikato, Managbangat, andi pagam to a natawtaw itayo? 

Mar 4:39 Et binmangon tan binano to so dagem, tan inkuan to ed dayat, Deen ka, ag ka ongagalaw. Et say dagem tinmonda, tan agawa so baleg a linak. 

Mar 4:40 Tan inkuan to ed sikara Akin et antakot kayo? angapo tani pananisia yo? 

Mar 4:41 Et tinmakot ira'n mapalalo, tan inkuan da ed sakey tan sakey, Siopa sirin so saya, ya angan say dagem tan say dayat ononor ira ed sikato? 



Mar 5:1 Tan akasabi ra ed pagpag a gilig na dayat, ed luyag na saray Gedareno. 

Mar 5:2 Et sanen pinmaway ed paraw, inmabet a tampol ed sikato so sakey a too ya nanlapu ed saray lobok, ya wala so sakey a marumsis ya espiritu ed sikato, 

Mar 5:3 A say panag-ayaman to dia ed saray lobok: tan angapola'y too'n akayari'n mamalor ed sikato, angapo, angan diad sakey a golongolong; 

Mar 5:4 Lapu no sikato'y abalor a mabetbet na saray panglaw tan golongolong, et pinoltot to so saray golonggolong, tan saray panglaw abuybuyak ira: et angapo'y too ya walaan na biskeg ya makapaano ed sikato. 

Mar 5:5 Tan naynay, labi tan agew, ed saray lobok tan palpalandey, sikato'y manakis, tan susugaten to so inkasikato ed saray bato. 

Mar 5:6 Et sanen anengneng to si Jesus ed arawi, binmatik tan angigalang ed sikato; 

Mar 5:7 Tan sanen inmakis na maksil a voces, kuan to, Anto so pibiangan ko ed sika, Jesus, sika Anak na Sankatageyan a Dios? Pikasik ed sika lapu ed Dios, ag mo ak pairapen. 

Mar 5:8 Lapu'd inkuan to ed sikato, Paway ka, sika marumsis ya espiritu, a manlapu ed sayan too. 

Mar 5:9 Et tinepet' to ed sikato, Anto'y ngaran mo? Et kuan to ed sikato, San ngaran ko Sanbakir; ta lapud no dakel kami. 

Mar 5:10 Et akikaskasi a mapalalo ed sikato ya ag to ra komon ibaki ed arawi ed paway na saman a dalin. 

Mar 5:11 Bang diman wala ed asinger ed palandey so sakey a baleg ya polok na babuy a mankakakan. 

Mar 5:12 Et akikasi ra ed sikato, a kuan da, Igangan mo kami ed saray babuy, pian onloob kami ed sikara, 

Mar 5:13 Et inaboloyan to ra. Et saray marumsis ya espiritu pinmaway ira tan linmoob ira ed saray babuy; et say polok na saray babuy tinmaboy ed sakey a pangdel ed dayat, say billing da ngalngali'n duanlibo; et nalner ira ed dayat. 

Mar 5:14 Tan saramay nanpapakan ed sikara binmatik ira, tan sikato'y inbaga ra ed ciudad, tan diad uma. Et linma ra pian nengnengen da no anto so saman ya agawa. 

Mar 5:15 Et ondago ra ed Jesus, tan nengnengen da man so sinelepan na saray demonio ya manyudyurong, ya akawesan tan naspot sa kalakal to, saman so walaan nen saman na sanbakir: et ataktakot ira. 

Mar 5:16 Et saray akanengneng ed sikato inpaliwawa ra ed sikara no panon so agawa ed samay sinelepan na saray demonio, tan say nipaakar ed saray babuy. 

Mar 5:17 Et ginapuan da'y akikasi ed sikato ya ontainan ed saray ketegan da. 

Mar 5:18 Et nen onloloob ed paraw, saman so sinelepan na saray demonio akikasi ed sikato pian miayam ni komon ed sikato. 

Mar 5:19 Et sikato so ag to inaboloyan, no ag say kuan to ed sikato, Onla ka ed abung mo ed saray kakaarom, tan ibagam ed sikara no panon kabaleg so bengabengatla a say Katawan ginawa to nipaakad ed sika, tan no panon so panangasi to ed sika. 

Mar 5:20 Et iman la, tan ginapoan to ya inpalapag ed Decapolis so ontanlan kabaleg na bengabengatla'n ginawa nen Jesus nipaakar ed sikato, et amin iray totoo nikelawan ira. 

Mar 5:21 Tan sanen binmaliw lamet si Jesus ed pagpag ya gilig a nanparaw, sakey a baleg a karakel na totoo so atipon ed sikato; et sikato'y wala nensaman ed baybay. 

Mar 5:22 Et yala so sakey ed saray makauley na sinagoga, ya say ngaran to Jairo; et nen sikato'y anengneng to, dinmakmomo ed saray salito, 

Mar 5:23 Tan mikakasi ed Jesus a mapalalo, ya kuan to, Say melag ya anako'n bii ngangali ompatey; pikasik ed sika, ya gala komon tan itapew mo so saray limam ed sikato, pian onabig komon, tan nabilay. 

Mar 5:24 Et akila ed sikato; tan sakey a baleg a karakel na totoo so tinmombok ed sikato, tan sikato so dinesdes da. 

Mar 5:25 Et sakey a bii, ya walaa'y pantoro na dala a labindua'y taon. 

Mar 5:26 Tan nanlikna na amayamay a bengatla lapu'd saray managtambal, tan ginastos to ya amin so wala ed sikato, et ag bengat ginmangana, no ag ingen linmoor, 

Mar 5:27 Nen nadngelan to so saray bengatla'n nipaakar ed Jesus, linma ed saray karaklan ed beneg, tan diniwi' to so saray kawes to. 

Mar 5:28 Ta inkuan to, No nadiwit ko lambengat so saray kawes to onabigak. 

Mar 5:29 Et tampol say sobol na dala to amagaan; tan alikna to ed laman to ya inmabig ed sakit to. 

Mar 5:30 Et tampol si Jesus, nen alikna to ed inkasikato ya say pakayari pinmaway a nanlapu ed sikato, linmingay ed saray karaklan, tan inkuan to, Siopa so aniwit na saray kawes ko? 

Mar 5:31 Et saray babangatan to inkuan da ed sikato, Sankanengneng mo a say karaklan dedesdesen da ka, tan kuanmo, Siopay aniwit ed siak? 

Mar 5:32 Et sikato ninengneng ed manliberliber pian nengnengen to so nangawa ed saya a bengatla. 

Mar 5:33 Balet say bii a natatakot tan mangiwgiw, ed pikakaba' to na agawa ed sikato, dinmago tan dinmakmomo ed arap to, tan inbaga to ed sikato so amin a katuaan. 

Mar 5:34 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Anak say pananisiam pinaabig to ka, onla ka'd kareenan, et onabig ka ed sakit mo. 

Mar 5:35 Leleg a mansasalita ni, onsabi ray nanlapu ed abung na makauley na sinagoga, a kuan da, Say anak mon bii inatey la: akin et sagpoten mo ni Managbangat. 

Mar 5:36 Balet si Jesus, ya ag to iimanoen so salita a sinalitara, kuanto'd makauley na sinagoga, Ag ka antakot, manisia ka labat. 

Mar 5:37 Et angapoy too ya inaboloyan to'n ontombok ed sikato, nilikod di Pedro, tan Santiago, tan Juan ya agi nen Santiago. 

Mar 5:38 Et linma ra ed abung na makauley na sinagoga; et nanengneng toy sakey ya ungol, tan amayamay a mannangis tan manogaog na baleg. 

Mar 5:39 Et sanen akaloob kuan to ed sikara, Akin et mangawa kayo na ungol, tan mannangis kayo? say ugaw ag inatey, balet naugip. 

Mar 5:40 Et sikato inelekan da ya balawen. Sikato balet, nen pinapapaway to ra'n amin, inala to so amay ugaw a bii tan say ina to tan saray akila ed sikato, tan linmoob ed kawalaan na ugaw. 

Mar 5:41 Et nen inala to so ugaw ed lima kuan to ed sikato, Talitha kumi; a sikato no ipatalos, Marikit, kuan ko ed sika, Onalagey ka. 

Mar 5:42 Et say marikit tampol ya inmalagey, tan nan-akar; ta sikato labindua'y taon to. Et atalagnaw ira ed baleg ya inkatalagnaw. 

Mar 5:43 Et inbilin ton malmalet ed sikara, ya angapo komon so makapikabat ed say a: et ingangan to ya niiter so bengatla komon ed sikato ya kanen to. 



Mar 6:1 Et tinmainan diman; tan linma ed dalin to; et sikato'y tinombok na saray babangatan to. 

Mar 6:2 Et sanen sinmabi sabaton, ginmapo a manbangat ed sinagoga: et saray dakel nen mandengdengel ira ed sikato nikelawan ira, a kuan da, Ined so angalaan na sayan too na saraya'n bengatla? tan, Anto'n kakabatan so niiter ed saya'n too, tan anto so kabaliksan na saray ontan a makapanyari'n gawa ya ginawa na saray lima to? 

Mar 6:3 Aliwa tan saya man so pan day, ya anak nen Maria, tan agi nen Santiago, tan Jose, tan Judas, tan Simon? tan andi ta ra dia ed sikatayo so saray agi to'n bibii? Et abaingan ira ed sikato. 

Mar 6:4 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Say profeta aliwan angapo'y dayew to, nilikod ed dalin to'n dili, tan ed saray kakanayon to, tan dia ed abung to. 

Mar 6:5 Et ag to akagawad'man na makapanyari'n gawa, nilikod so inpangitapew to'd lima to ed saray pigaran agmakayari, tan pinaabig to ra. 

Mar 6:6 Et sikato'y nankelkelaw lapu'd agda pananisia. Et niliber to'so saray aldea a nanbabangat. 

Mar 6:7 Tan tinawag to so saray labindua ed sikato, et ingapo to ra'n inbaki a sanderua; tan initdan to ray pakaoley ed saray marumsis ya espiritu; 

Mar 6:8 Et inbilin to ed sikara ya ag ira mangitarok na antokaman nipaakad ed pan-akar da, nilikod so sakey a tayokod labat; angapo'y tinapay, angapo'y panagbalonan, angapo'y pilak ed supot da; 

Mar 6:9 No ag say mantapakan ira: tan inkuan to, ag kayo mangisolong na duara'n kawes. 

Mar 6:10 Tan inkuan to'd sikara, Angan ined a looban yo ed sakey ya abung, manayam kayod'man anga ed itainan yod'man. 

Mar 6:11 Et dinanman a pasen ya agmangawat naani ed sikayo, tan ag da kayo dengelen, sano onpaway kayod' man, pagpag yo'y dabok ya wala ed dapan na saray salisali yo a nipaakar ya sakey a pakapatnagan ed sikara. 

Mar 6:12 Et linma ra, tan inpulong da, a saray katooan mansibkel ira komon. 

Mar 6:13 Et pinapaway da so saray amayamay a demonio, tan amayamay ya agmakayari ya inilotan da ray larak, tan atambal da ra. 

Mar 6:14 Et si ari Herodes nadngelan to; ta say ngaran to nagmaliw a bantog; ed inkuan to, Si Juan a Bautista inmoli ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inaatey, kanian saraya'n pakapanyari ongagawa ed sikato. 

Mar 6:15 Balet saray arum kuan da, Sikato si Elias. Tan saray arum inkuan da, Sakey a profeta, salanti singa sakey ed saray profeta. 

Mar 6:16 Si Herodes balet, sanen nadngelan to inkuan to, Si Juan, a sikato'y pinotolan ko, inmoli ed bilay. 

Mar 6:17 Ta si Herodes a dili angibaki tan inerel to si Juan, tan sikato'y binalor to ed loob na pangawan nisengeg ed Herodias, ya asawa nen agi to'n Felipe; ta sikato'y inasawa to. 

Mar 6:18 Ta si Juan inkuan to ed Herodes, Ag nikatunongan ya yamong mo'd sika so asawa na agim. 

Mar 6:19 Et si Herodias intalaga to'y inkasikato sumpa ed Juan, tan sikato'y nanpirawatan to'n pateyen; et ag to ayarian: 

Mar 6:20 Tan si Herodes tinakotan to si Juan, ta amta to ya sikato'y sakey a too'n matonong tan masanto, tan sikato'y insinagel to. Tan sanen sikato'y nadngelan to, atalagnaw na mapalalo; et sikato'y dinengel to'n sililiket. 

Mar 6:21 Tan sanen sinmabi agew a makana, a si Herodes ed agew ya inkianak to nanpaga na sakey a pangdeman ed saray ankabli to tan saray atagey a kapitan, tan saray manonan lalaki ed Galilea; 

Mar 6:22 Et sanen linmoob so bii ya anak nen Herodias tan nansayaw, pinaliket to si Herodes tan saray akirongo ed sikato ed pananganan; et say ari inkuan to ed marikit, Kerew ka ed siak na antokaman a labay mo, et si kato'y iter ko ed sika. 

Mar 6:23 Tan sinambaan to ed sikato, Antokaman ya kerewen mo ed siak, iter ko'd sika, angan say kapaldua na panarian ko. 

Mar 6:24 Et sikato'y pinmaway, tan inkuan to ed ina to, Antoy kerewen ko? Et sikato inkuan to, Say olo nen Juan a Bautista. 

Mar 6:25 Et sikato'y linmoob a tampol a maganganat ed ari, tan kinerew to a kuan to, Labay ko ya iter mo'd siak natan so olo nen Juan a Bautista ed sakey a lipong. 

Mar 6:26 Et say ari naermenan a mapalalo; balet nisengeg ed saray samba to, tan ed saray manyudyurong ed pananganan, sikato'y ag to pinabaingan. 

Mar 6:27 Et say ari angibaki'n tampol na sakey a sondalo ed saray bantay to, tan ingangan to a yakar da'd man so olo to: et linma tan sikato'y pinotolan to ed pangawan. 

Mar 6:28 Tan inyakar to'y olo to ed sakey a lipong, et sikato'y inted to ed marikit; et sikato'y inted na marikit ed ina to. 

Mar 6:29 Et sanen nadngelan na saray binangatan to, linma ra tan inala ra so bangkay to, tan sikato'y inparokol da ed sakey a lobok. 

Mar 6:30 Et saray apostoles tinmipon ira ed Jesus; tan tinongtong da ed sikato so amin a bengabengatlan antokaman ya ginawa ra, tan antokaman ya inbangat da. 

Mar 6:31 Et kuan to ed sikara, Galidia ed arawi ed sakey a pasen a lawak, tan manpainawa kayo'n magano. Ta amayamay nensamen iray onsasabi tan ontatainan, et angapo so pankanawnawa a masarag pian mangan ira. 

Mar 6:32 Et tinmainan ira a nanparaw anga ed sakey a pasen a lawak ya arawi. 

Mar 6:33 Et anengneng ira na saray katooan ya oonla, tan amayamay iray akabidbir ed sikara, et binmatik irad man a nanoolop a nanakad nanlapu ed saray amin iran ciudad, et inonaan da ra. 

Mar 6:34 Et sikato'y pinmaway et anengneng to so saray dakel a katooan, tan habagey to ra, lapu ed singa ra saray carnero ya andian na managpastol: et ginapoan to so nanbangat ed sikara na amayamay a bengabengatla. 

Mar 6:35 Et sanen say agew ngarem la, saray babangatan to linma ra ed sikato, tan inkuan da, Say pasen sikato'y lawak, et say agew onngangarem la: 

Mar 6:36 Ibakim la ra, pian onla ra ed uma tan ed saray aldeas ed kaliberliber, tan manaliw ira na nakan da. 

Mar 6:37 Balet sikato inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Itdan yo ray nakan da. Et kuan da ed sikato, Onla kami'n manaliw na duanlasus denario a bili tinapay, tan iter ed sikara'n kanen da? 

Mar 6:38 Et kuan to ed sikara, Pigara'n tinapay so wala ed sikayo? lakayo tan nengneng yo. Et sanen akabatan da, kuan da, Limara, tan duara'n sira. 

Mar 6:39 Et inbilin to ed sikara ya amin komon onyorong a manoolop ed karikaan ya malambot. 

Mar 6:40 Et imyorong ira a nandarasig, a tungal lasus, tan sanlilimamplo. 

Mar 6:41 Et inala to ray limaran tinapay tan saray duara'n sira, et nen tinmangay ed tawen, binendicionan to, tan pinisagpisag to so sa saray tinapay; tan inted to ed saray babangatan pian iparongo ra ed sikara; tan saray sira inapagapag to ed sikara'n amin. 

Mar 6:42 Et angan ira'n amin, tan napsel ira. 

Mar 6:43 Et dinokdok da so mekmek, ya labindua'n boksot, tan ontan met ed saray sira. 

Mar 6:44 Et saray angan ed saray tinapay limanlibo ran totoo. 

Mar 6:45 Et tampol a pinilitan to so saray babangatan to ya onlugan ed paraw, tan onla ra ed onaan to ya anga ed pagpag a gilig na Betsaida, leleg a pasipoten to so saray dakel a katooan. 

Mar 6:46 Et kayari' to'n amasipot ed sikara, linma ed palandey a manpikasi. 

Mar 6:47 Et sanen sinmabi labi, say paraw wala nensaman ed taew na dayat, et sikato wadman a bokbokor ed dalin. 

Mar 6:48 Et nen nanengneng to ra ya nasasagpotan ya mangagaor, ta say dagem sumpa ed sikara, sanen ngangali la so komapat a panagbantay ed labi, Sikato'y ondago ed sikara ya manaakar ed tapew na dayat; tan labay to wari a lagsanan ira: 

Mar 6:49 Balet sanen sikato so anengneng da a manaakar ed tapew na dayat, ingaton da'n sikato'y sakey ya anyani et nanakis ira; 

Mar 6:50 Ta sikato so anengneng da ya amin, tan agolo ra. Balet tampol ya akisalita ed sikara tan kuan to ed sikara, Manpakpel kayo: siak; agkayo antakot. 

Mar 6:51 Et sinmapat ed sikara ed paraw; et say dagem tinmonda; et atalagnaw iran toloy ed inkasikara; 

Mar 6:52 Ta ag da atalosan so nipaakar ed saray tinapay, no ag say inmawet so puso ra. 

Mar 6:53 Tan sanen akabaliw la ra, linmara ed dalin na Genesaret, tan sinmakbit ira. 

Mar 6:54 Et sanen akapaway ira ed paraw saray katooan sikato so abidbir da'n tampol. 

Mar 6:55 Et binatik da so liberliber na sa man ya amin a dalin, tan ginapoan da ya inyakar a nanlapu ed amin a pasen so saray agmakayari ed dokolan da, dia ed nadngelan da'n kawalaan to. 

Mar 6:56 Tan angan ined ya nilooban to, ed saray aldea, ono saray ciudad, ono ed uma, ingatgaton da so saray agmakayari ed saray plaza, tan inpikasi ra ed sikato ya angan say saloy na kawes to so nadiwit da labat komon: et amin iray aniwit inmabig ira. 



Mar 7:1 Et diman nantitipon ed sikato so saray Fariseos, tan saray arum ed saray escribas a nanlapu ed Jerusalem, 

Mar 7:2 Tan anengneng da ya arum ed saray babangatan to kinan da so saray tinapay da a pati dutak, salanti ag-inurasan a limalima. 

Mar 7:3 (Ta saray Fariseos, tan amin so saray Judios, nilikod no urasan da a maong so saray lima ra, ag ira mangan, ya onoren da so ugali na saray mamasiken; 

Mar 7:4 Et bang no onsabi ra'n manlapu ed plaza, nilikod no manames ira ag ira mangan: tan amayamay ya arum a bengabengatla so wala, ya inawat da ya onoren, saray pananguras ed saray copa, tan bangabanga, tan saray vaso a gansa). 

Mar 7:5 Et saray Fariseos tan saray escribas tepeten da ed sikato, Akin et saray babangatan mo ag ira manakad onong na ugali na saray mamasiken, ingen kanen da so tinapay da ed saray arutakan a lima ra? 

Mar 7:6 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Maong so inpangiprofeta nen Isaias ed sikayo ya mansimpisimpitan, onong na nisulat, Saya'n baley galangen to ak ed saray bibil da, Bangbalet say puso ra arawi ed siak. 

Mar 7:7 Balet dia ed kaapaan so panangigalang da ed siak, A ibabangat da'n singa bangat da so saray bilin na saray totoo. 

Mar 7:8 Sikayo ya paulian yo so gangan na Dios, et onoren yo so tradicion na saray totoo. 

Mar 7:9 Tan inkuan to ed sikara, Naspot ya ikaindan yo so gangan na Dios, pian naonor yo so tradicion yo. 

Mar 7:10 Ta si Moises inkuan to, Igalang mo so amam tan say inam; tan, say mansalita na mauges ed ama ono ed ina, sikato komon so onpatey ed ipapatey: 

Mar 7:11 Balet kuan yo, No say sakey a too kuan to ed ama to ono ina to, Say pakapinabangan mo komon ed siak sikato'y Corban, a kuan to, Initer ed Dios; 

Mar 7:12 Sikayo agyo la aboloyan a mangawa'y anto'n nipaakar ed ama to ono ina to, 

Mar 7:13 Ya gagawaen yo'n andikakanaan so salita'y Dios lapu ed tradicion yo, a sikato so inyawat yo: tan amayamay so ontan a bengabengatla'n gawaen yo. 

Mar 7:14 Tan tinawag to so karaklan lamet ed sikato, tan inkuan to ed sikara, Amin yo denglen yo ak, tan talosan yo: 

Mar 7:15 Angapo so bengatla'n manlapu ed paway na too, ya onloob ed sikato a sikato so nayarian to a dutakan: ingen saray bengatla'n onpaway ed too sikara so mandutak ed too. 

Mar 7:16 Say walaan na layag a pandengel ondengel komon . 

Mar 7:17 Et sanen linmoob ed abung a nanlapu ed karaklan, saray babangatan to tinepet da ed sikato so alimbawa. 

Mar 7:18 Et kuan to ed sikara, Ontan yo met ya andian na pakatalos? Ag yo natebek, ya angan anto'n manlapu'd paway ya onloob ed too, sikato so agto nayarian a dutakan; 

Mar 7:19 Ta ag-onla ed puso to, no ag dia ed eges to, tan onla ed sebekan? Saya inkuan to, dia ed panaglinis na amin a kanen. 

Mar 7:20 Tan inkuan to, Satay ompaway a manlapu ed too, sikato'y mandutak ed too. 

Mar 7:21 Ta manlapu ed dalem, ed puso na totoo, saray mauges a nonot so ompaway, saray panaglawan, panagtakew, panagpatey, pikakalugoran. 

Mar 7:22 Kaaguman, karelmengan, panamalingo, kakaalak na laman, tan mauges a mata, siblangan, panbalegbalegan, kaatiwan: 

Mar 7:23 Saraya'n amin a bengatla manlapu ed loob, tan dutakan da'y too. 

Mar 7:24 Tan nanlapud'man inmalagey, tan linma ed saray ketegan na Tiro tan Sidon. Et linmoob ed sakey ya abung, tan angapo komon so too a makapikabat; et ag to ayarian a sikato so niamot. 

Mar 7:25 Balet, tampol sakey a bii, ya say anak to'n melag ya bii walaan na marumsis ya espiritu, dia ed inpakadngel to ed sikato, linma tan din-makmomo ed saray sali to. 

Mar 7:26 Bang say bii sakey a Griega, Sirofenisa so poli to. Et kinerew to ed sikato ya papawayen to komon so demonio ed anak to. 

Mar 7:27 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Paulian mo so saray anak ya onona'n napesel: ta ag manepeg ya alaen so tinapay na saray anak tan sikato so ibontok ed saray aso. 

Mar 7:28 Balet inmebat tan kuan to ed sikato, On, Katawan; angan saray aso ed silong na dulang mangan ira na mekmek na saray ugugaw. 

Mar 7:29 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Lapu'd saya'n salita onla ka la; say demonio pinmaway la ed anak mo. 

Mar 7:30 Tan sikato'y linma la ed abung to, et aromog to so ugaw a mandokdokol ed dokolan, tan say demonio pinmaway la. 

Mar 7:31 Tan pinmaway lamet ed saray ketegan na Tiro, tan linmabas ed Sidon linma ed dayat na Galilea, a linmabas ed saray ketegan na Decapolis. 

Mar 7:32 Et inyakar da ed sikato so sakey a telek tan walaan na makasbel ed pansalita to; et kerewen da'd sikato ya itapew to komon so lima to ed sikato. 

Mar 7:33 Et sikato'y inala to'n insian a maamot ed saray dakel a katooan, tan inyan to ray tamoro to ed saray layag to, tan linmup da, et diniwi'to so dila to; 

Mar 7:34 Et nen tinmangay ed tawen, nanermen, tan kuan to ed sikato, Ephphatha, kabaliksan to so, Nalukasan. 

Mar 7:35 Et saray layag to alukasan ira, tan say balor na dila to naokbar, et nansalita'n maliwawa. 

Mar 7:36 Et inbilin to ed sikara ya ag da ibaga ed siopaman a too: balet no panon so inpangibilin to ed sikara, nagkalalo ni so inpangiwakawak da. 

Mar 7:37 Tan alabas so inkikelawan da, a kuan da, Sikato ginawa to so amin a bengatla'n maong; gawaen to ni ya makadngel so telek, tan mansalita so umel. 



Mar 8:1 Diad saraman ya agew, sanen wala lamet so dakel a katooan tan andian ira na anto'n naka'n, tinawag to ed sikato so saray babangatan to, tan kuan to ed sikara, 

Mar 8:2 Walay panangabagey ko ed saray katooan, lapu'd akipanayam ira ed siak natan a taloy agew, et andian ira na anto'n nakan: 

Mar 8:3 Et no ibakik ira ed kaabungan da ya ag mangan, napunaw ira ed dalan; tan arum ed sikara nanlapu ra ed arawi. 

Mar 8:4 Et saray babangatan to inmebat ira ed sikato, Ined so pakayarian na sakey a mamesel ed saraya'n totoo na tinapay dia ed sakey a pasen a lawak? 

Mar 8:5 Et tinep'to ed sikara, Pigara'n tinapay so wala ed sikayo? Et inkuan da, Pitora. 

Mar 8:6 Et ibilin to ed saray dakel a katooan ya onyorong ira ed dalin: et inala to so saray pitora'n tinapay, et nen akapisalamat, pinisagpisag to, tan inted to ed saray babangatan to, pian iparongo ra ed sikara; et inparongo ra ed karaklan. 

Mar 8:7 Tan walaan ira'y pigaran ankekelag ya sira: et nen abendicionan to ra, inbilin to ya iparongo ra so saraya met ed sikara. 

Mar 8:8 Et angan ira, tan napsel ira: et inala ra so saray mekmek a kera, ya pitoran boksot. 

Mar 8:9 Et sikara'y ngalngali'n apat a libo: tan inbaki to la 'ra. 

Mar 8:10 Et linmugan a tampol ed sakey a paraw pati saray babangatan to, tan linma 'rad saray pasen na Dalmanuta. 

Mar 8:11 Et saray Fariseos pinmaway ira, tan ginapoan da'y akisangsangan ed sikato, a manaanap ira ed sikato na sakey a tanda a nanlapu ed tawen a sikato so salsalien da. 

Mar 8:12 Et naningel na araldalem ed espiritu to, tan kuan to, Akin a saya'n kailalakan mananap na sakey a tanda? tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Angapo'y tanda ya niiter naani ed saya'n kailalakan. 

Mar 8:13 Et sikara'y tinainan to, tan nen linmugan lamet ed paraw pinmikal ed pagpag a gilig. 

Mar 8:14 Et alingoanan da so angitarok na tinapay; tan angapo'y wala'd sikara ed paraw noag saksakey a tinapay. 

Mar 8:15 Et inbilin to'd sikara, a kuan to, Manimano kayo, manlikas kayo ed levadura na saray Fariseos tan say levadura nen Herodes. 

Mar 8:16 Et nansusupiatan so sakey tan sakey et sikara, a kuan da, Angpo'y tinapay tayo. 

Mar 8:17 Et si Jesus sanen alikas to kuan to ed sikara, Akin et mansusupiatan kayo, nisengeg ed angapo so tinapay yo? ag yo ta ni natebak, tan ag yo natalosan? anawe'ta ni puso yo? 

Mar 8:18 Anta wala'y mata yo, ag kayo makanengneng? tan anta wala'y layalayag yo, ag kayo makadngel? et ag yo ta nanonotan? 

Mar 8:19 Sanen pinisagpisag ko so limara'n tinapay ed saray limanlibo, pigara'n boksot a napno na mekmek so inala yo? Kuan da ed sikato, Labindua. 

Mar 8:20 Tan sanen saray pitora ed saray apat a libo, pigara'n boksot na mekmek so inala yo? Kuan da ed sikato, Pitora. 

Mar 8:21 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Ag yo ni natalosan? 

Mar 8:22 Tan linma ra ed Betsaida. Et inyakar da ed sikato so sakey a bulag, tan kinerew da ed sikato a diwiten to komon. 

Mar 8:23 Et inegnaan to ed lima so bulag, tan sikato so inyakad to ed paway na aldea; et sanen nilupdaan to so saray mata to, tan intapew to so saray lima to ed sikato, tinepet to ed sikato, Makanengneng ka na bengatla? 

Mar 8:24 Et sikato so tinmangwa, tan inkuan to, Makanengneng ak na totoo; ta sikara so naimanok a singa saray kiew, a manaakar. 

Mar 8:25 Diad saman intapew to lamet so saray lima to ed saray mata to; et sikato so tinmangwa ya abaybayag, et nipawil, tan anengneng to so amin a bengatla a malinlinew. 

Mar 8:26 Et sikato'y inbaki to ed abung, a kuan to, Angan dia ed aldea ag ka onloloob. 

Mar 8:27 Tan si Jesus pinmaway, tan saray babangatan to, ed saray aldea na Cesarea na Filipo: et dia ed dalan tinepe'to ed saray babangatan to, a kuan to ed sikara, Siopa ak ed pankuan na saray totoo? 

Mar 8:28 Et inbaga ra ed sikato, a kuan da, si Juan a Bautista: et saray arum, si Elias; balet saray arum, Sakey ed saray profeta. 

Mar 8:29 Et tinepe'to ed sikara, Balet siopa ak ed pankuan yo? Si Pedro onebat tan kuan to ed sikato, Sika so Cristo. 

Mar 8:30 Et inbilin to ed sikara ya angapo'y pangibagaan da nipaakar ed sikato. 

Mar 8:31 Tan ginapoan to so nanbangat ed sikara, ya say Anak na too nakaokolan so panlikna to na amayamay a bengabengatla, tan ipulisay na saray mamasiken, tan saray manonaan a sacerdote, tan saray escribas, tan ompatey, et kayari talo ra'n agew onoli lanlamang. 

Mar 8:32 Et inbaga to so salita ya manawanawag. Et sikato so inala nen Pedro, tan sikato so ginapoan to'n banoen. 

Mar 8:33 Sikato balet nen pinmigar, tan sankanengneng to so saray babangatan to, pinoot to si Pedro, et kuan to,Onla ka ed beneg ko, Satanas; ta ag mo nononoten so saray nipaakar ed Dios, noag saray nipaakar ed saray totoo. 

Mar 8:34 Et tinawag to ed sikato so karaklan a pati saray babangatan to, et inkuan to ed sikara, No siopaman a too labay to'y ontombok ed siak, iburi to so inkasikato, et awiten to so cruz to, tan tomboken to ak. 

Mar 8:35 Ta siopaman a mangilaban na bilay to, sikato so nabalang to naani; tan siopaman ya makabalang na bilay to nisengeg ed siak tan say evangelio sikato naani nilaban to. 

Mar 8:36 Ta anto so pinabangan na sakey a too, ya makagamor na sankamundoan, tan nabalang to so bilay to? 

Mar 8:37 Ta anto tay niiter na too ya isandi ed bilay to? 

Mar 8:38 Ta siopaman a mangibaing ed siak tan saray salitak dia ed saya'n mikakalugoran tan makasalanan ya kailalakan, say Anak na too sikato met so ibaing to naani, sano onla ed gloria nen Ama to pati saray masanton angeles. 



Mar 9:1 Tan inkuan to ed sikara, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Wala dia ed saray manal-alagey, ya ag da natawayan a balot so patey, anga ed pakanengneng da na panarian na Dios ya onsabi a tekep na pakayari. 

Mar 9:2 Et kayari anem agew inala nen Jesus ed sikato di Pedro, tan Santiago, tan Juan, tan intakdang to ra ed sakey a palandey ya atagey ed arawi a bokbokor da: et nauman so ereng to ed arap da; 

Mar 9:3 Et saray kawes to nagmaliw a masnag, tan mapalaloy poti, ya angapo'y pumepesak dia ed dalin a makapapoti ed sikara. 

Mar 9:4 Et diman pinmatnag ed sikara si Elias a pati Moises: tan akisalsalita ra ed Jesus. 

Mar 9:5 Et si Pedro onebat tan kuan to ed Jesus, Rabbi, maong ed sikatayo so manayam dia: et mangawa kami na talora ya abungabung; sakey so nipaakar ed sika, tan sakey so nipaakar ed Moises, tan sakey so nipaakar ed Elias. 

Mar 9:6 Ta ag to amta so yeba'to, ta atakot ira'n toloy. 

Mar 9:7 Et sinmabid'man so sakey a lurem ya narong ed sikara: tan wala'y sakey a voces a nanlapu ed lurem a kuan to, Say a sikato so inadarok ya Anak; sikato so denglen yo. 

Mar 9:8 Et bigla nen ninmengneng ira ed manliberliber angapo so angan sakey ya anengneng da, nilikod si Jesus a bokod a pati sikara. 

Mar 9:9 Et sanen onlalasor ira ed palandey, inbilin to ed sikara ya angapo'y too ya pangibagaan da na saray bengatla ya anengneng da, nilikod sano say Anak na too inmoli la ed bilay a manlapu ed saray inaatey. 

Mar 9:10 Et inememan da so salita, a nantetepetan ira no anto so kabaliksan na kioli ed bilay a manlapu ed saray inaatey? 

Mar 9:11 Et tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da, Panon ya saray escribas kuan da ya si Elias nepeg ya onsabi ya onona? 

Mar 9:12 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Si Elias peteg ya onsabi ya unona, tan ipawil to so amin a bengatla: et panoon a nisulat nipaakad ed Anak na too, a kaokolan a manlikna na amayamay a bengatla tan nipasen ya andikana? 

Mar 9:13 Balet kuan ko ed sikayo, ya si Elias sinmabi la, et ginawa ra met ed sikato so antokaman a kinaliktan da, salanti onong na walan nisulat nipaakar ed sikato. 

Mar 9:14 Et sanen sinmabi ra ed saray babangatan, anengneng da so dakerakel a katooan ed liberliber da, tan saray escribas ya rcisasangsangan ed sikara. 

Mar 9:15 Et tampol say dakel a katooan, sanen sikato so anengneng da atalagnaw ira a mapalalo, tan sanen binmatik ira ed sikato ingalang da. 

Mar 9:16 Et tinepe'to ed sikara, Anto so pisasangsanganan yo ed sikara? 

Mar 9:17 Et sakey ed saray dakel a katooan so inmebat ed sikato, Managbangat, inyakar ko dia ed sika so ana'ko'n laki, ya walaan na sakey ya emel ya espiritu; 

Mar 9:18 Et angan ine'd a pangalaan to ed sikato, sikato'y igeba to: et manbura so sangito, tan manngalatenget so saray ngipen to, tan namagaan: et akisalitaak ed saray babangatan mo pian sikato'y papawayen da konon; et ag da ayarian. 

Mar 9:19 Et onebat ed sikara tan kuan to, O andian na pananisia a kailalakan, anga ed kapigan so panayam ko dia ed sikayo? anga ed kapigan so pantepel ko ed sikayo? sikato'y yakar yo dia ed siak. 

Mar 9:20 Et sikato'y inyakar da ed sikato: tan sanen anengneng to, tampol say espiritu sikato'y ginuyguyames to a masakit; tan ingeba to ed dalin, et nanbalbalintokar ya nanburabura so sangito. 

Mar 9:21 Et tinepet to ed ama to, Kaonongan la so kabayag to nia nanlapu'd insabi to ed sikato? Et inkuan to, Nanlapu la nen sikato'y ugaw ni. 

Mar 9:22 Tan mabetbet a sikato'y ipelag to nanpadpara ed apuy tan ed saray danum, pian sikato'y bagbagen to: et no nayarian mon gawaen so bengatla, abagey mo kami, tan tulongan mo kami. 

Mar 9:23 Et inkuan nen Jesus ed sikato; No nayarian mo! Amin a bengabengatla nayari ed manisia. 

Mar 9:24 Say ama na ugaw tampol ya inmakis tan kuan to. Manisiaak; tulongan mo so kulang a pananisiak. 

Mar 9:25 Et sanen anengneng nen Jesus ya dakel a katooan sinmabi ra a mambabtik a nanoolop, nanpasnokan to so marumsis ya espiritu, a kuan to ed sikato, Sika emel tan telek ya espiritu, igangan ko ed sika, onpaway ka ed sikato, tan ag ka la onloob ed sikato. 

Mar 9:26 Et sanen inmakis, tan sikato'y ginuyames to a mapalalo, pinmaway: et say ugaw nagmaliw a singa sakey ya inatey; ed ontan la ya say karaklan inkuan da, sikato'y inatey la. 

Mar 9:27 Sikato balet so inala nen Jesus ed lima, tan sikato'y inpaalagey to; et sikato'y inmalagey. 

Mar 9:28 Et sanen linmoob ed abung, saray babangatan to tinepet da a maamot ed sikato, a kuan da, Panon a sikato so ag mi ayarian a pinapaway? 

Mar 9:29 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Saya a nengneng ag ompaway lapu ed antokaman, nilikod ed pikakasi. 

Mar 9:30 Et kinmurang ira a nanlapud' man, tan linmabas ira e Galilea; et ag to komon labay a sikato so nakabatan na siopaman a too. 

Mar 9:31 Ta inbanga'to so saray babangatan to, tan inkuan to ed sikara, Say Anak na too niyawat ed lima na saray totoo, tan sikato so pateyen da naani, et sano apatey da la, kayari taloy agew sikato so onoli lanlamang. 

Mar 9:32 Balet ag da atalosan so salita, tan tinmakot ira'n manepet ed sikato. 

Mar 9:33 Et linma ra ed Capernaum: et sanen wala ed abung tinepe'to ed sikara, Anto so pansasangsangan yo ed dalan? 

Mar 9:34 Sikara balet ag ira inmese; ta nansasangsangan so sakey tan sakey ed dalan, no siopa so kabalbalgan. 

Mar 9:35 Et sikato imyorong tan tinawag to so saray labindua: tan kuan to ed sikara, No siopaman a too labay to'n sikato'y unaan, sikato so kaonoran naani ed amin, tan aripen na amin. 

Mar 9:36 Tan angala na sakey a melag ya ugaw, tan sikato'y inyan to ed pegley da: et nen sikato'y inala to ed saray taklay to, inkuan to ed sikara, 

Mar 9:37 Siopaman a mangawat na sakey ed saray onia ya ankekelag ya ugugaw nisengeg ed ngaran ko, awaten to ak: tan siopaman a mangawat ed siak, aliwa'n siak so awaten to, noag say angibaki dia ed siak. 

Mar 9:38 Si Juan inkuan to ed sikato, Managbangat, anengneng mi sakey ya manpapapaway na demonio dia ed ngaran mo; et insebel mi ed sikato, lapu'd ag to tinmombok ed sikatayo. 

Mar 9:39 Balet si Jesus inkuan to, Ag yo sebelan: ta angapo'y too a mangawa na sakey a makapanyarin gawa dia ed ngaran ko, tan makayari'n magangano a mansalita na mauges nipaakad ed siak. 

Mar 9:40 Ta say ag onsumpa ed sikatayo, sikayo'y iba tayo. 

Mar 9:41 Ta siopaman a mangiter naani ed sikayo na san-vaso a danum ya inumen, lapud kien kayo nen Cristo, tua kuan ko ed sikayo, ag to nabalang a balot so tumang to. 

Mar 9:42 Et siopaman a mangigapol na sakey ed saraya ya ankekelag ya ugugaw a manisia ed siak, magmaong ni komon ed sikato no sakey a baleg a bato na gilingan so nisabit ed beklew to, tan ibontok ed day at. 

Mar 9:43 Et no say limam so mangigapol ed sika, sikato'y potot mo: magmaong ed sikasoonloobyapokoldima'd bilay, nen say wala ray duara'n taklay mo ya onloob ed Gehenna, ed agnaerep ya apuy. 

Mar 9:44 Ya diman say bigis to ag ompatey, tan say apuy angan kapigan ag naerep . 

Mar 9:45 Et no say salim so mangigapol ed sika, sikato'y potot mo: magmaong ed sika so onloob ed bilay ya pokol, nen say duara so salim ya onloob ed Gehenna. 

Mar 9:46 Ya diman ag ompatey so bigis to, tan say apuy angan kapigan ag naerep. 

Mar 9:47 Et no say matam so mangigapol ed sika, sikato'y sukit mo: magmaong ed sika so onloob ed panarian na Dios a saksakey so matam, nen say duara so matam a nibantak ed Gehenna; 

Mar 9:48 Ya diman say bigis da ag ompatey, tan say apuy ag naerep. 

Mar 9:49 Ta amin naasinan naani ed apuy. 

Mar 9:50 Say asin sikato'y maong: balet no say asin tinmabang la, anto so pamananam yo ed sikato? Wala komon so asin ed sikayo, tan manpaknaan so sakey tan sakey ed sikayo. 



Mar 10:1 Et inmalagey a nanlapud'man tan onloob ed ketegan na Judea tan labas na Jordan: et dakel a katooan so onla a mantitipon ed sikato lamet; et onong ed ugali to, inbabanga'to ra lamet. 

Mar 10:2 Et diman linma ed sikato so saray Fariseos, et tinepet da ed sikato, Nikatonongan kasi ed sakey a laki so pangisian to na asawa to? a sikato so sasalien da. 

Mar 10:3 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Anto so inbilin nen Moises ed sikayo? 

Mar 10:4 Et inkaun da, Si Moises inaboloy to so pansulat na sakey a sulat na pansian, ta pian sikato so inkaindan. 

Mar 10:5 Si Jesus balet ikuan to ed sikara, Lapu'd kaawetan na puso yo insula'to ed sikayo so saya'n gangan. 

Mar 10:6 Balet nanlapu'd gapu na inkapalsa, Say Dios ginawa to ra a laki tan bii. 

Mar 10:7 Nisengeg ed saya say laki tainanto naani so ama to tan ina to, tan mitipon ed asawa to; 

Mar 10:8 Et saray duara magmaliw ira'n sakey a laman: dia ed ontan ya aliwa la ran duara, no ag sakey a laman. 

Mar 10:9 Say inpantipon sirin na Dios, ag pansianen na too komon. 

Mar 10:10 Et dia ed abung saray babangatan tinepet da ed sikato lamet so nipaakar ed saya. 

Mar 10:11 Et kuan to ed sikara, Siopaman a mangisian na asawa to, tan mangasawa na sananey mangawa na pikakalugoran sumpa ed sikato; 

Mar 10:12 Et no say bif so mangisian ed asawa to tan miasawa ed sananey, mangawa na pikakalugoran. 

Mar 10:13 Et inyakar da ed sikato so saray ankekelag ya ugugaw, pian diwiten to ra; et saray babangatan binano da ra. 

Mar 10:14 Balet sanen sikato'y anengneng nen Jesus, asanokan, et inkuan to ed sikara, Paulian yo so saray ankekelag ya ugugaw ya ondago ed siak; ag yo ra sebelan: ta sikara so makankien na panaria'y Dios. 

Mar 10:15 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Siopaman ya agmangawat na panaria'y Dios a singa sakey a melag ya ugaw, ag makaloob a balot diman. 

Mar 10:16 Et inala to ra ed saray taklay to, tan binendicionan to ra, ya intapew to so saray lima to ed sikara. 

Mar 10:17 Et sanen pinpaway ed dalan, diman binmatik so sakey ed sikato, tan tinmalimokor ed sikato tan tinepe'to ed sikato, Maong ya Managbangat, anto so gawaen ko, pian natawir ko so bilay ya andi angaan? 

Mar 10:18 Et inkuan nen Jesus ed sikato, Akin et tawagen mo ak na maong? angapo so maong nilikod so sakey, salanti Dios. 

Mar 10:19 Amtam so saray gangan, Agka mamatey, Agka mikalugoran, Agka mantakew, Agka mantasi na aliwa'n tua, Agka mansaol, Igalang mo so amam tan inam. 

Mar 10:20 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Managbangat, amin irayan bengatla sinumpal ko a nanlapu ed inkaugaw ko. 

Mar 10:21 Et nen sikato'y ninengneng nen Jesus sikato so inaro to, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Sakey a bengatla so kulang ed sika: onla ka, ilakom so angan anto'n wala ed sika, et iter mo ed saray duruka, et wala naani kayamanan mo ed tawen: et gala, tombok mo ak. 

Mar 10:22 Balet say lupa to inmermen ed saya'n salita, et tinmainan ya maerermen: ta sikato'y sakey ya walaan na baleg a kayarian. 

Mar 10:23 Et si Jesus ninmengmeng ed manliberliber, tan kuan to ed saray babangatan to, Agay lay irap na saray walaan na kayamanan ya onloob ed panaria'y Dios! 

Mar 10:24 Et saray babangatan atalagnaw ira ed saray salita to. Si Jesus balet onebat lamet, tan kuan to ed sikara, Ugugaw, agay lay kairapan na saray manmatalek ed saray kayamanan ya onloob ed panaria'y Dios! 

Mar 10:25 Magmainomay ni sakey a camello ya onlabot ed abot na sakey a dagum, nen say sakey a too a mayaman ya onloob ed panaria'y Dios. 

Mar 10:26 Et nikelawan ira'n mapalalo, a kuan da ed sikato, Siopa sirin so nayarin nilaban? 

Mar 10:27 Si Jesus dia ed innengneng to ed sikara, kuan to, Diad saray totoo ag nayari, balet aliwan ontan ed Dios: ta amin a bengabengatla nayarian ria na Dios. 

Mar 10:28 Si Pedro ginapoan ton inkuan ed sikato, Nia, sikami tinaynan mi so amin, et tinombok mi ka. 

Mar 10:29 Inkuan nen Jesus, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Angapo'y too ya anainan na abung, ono agagin lalaki, ono agagi'n bibii, ono ina, ono saray anak, ono daldalin, nisengeg ed siak, tan nisengeg ed evangelio. 

Mar 10:30 Ingen awaten to so maminlasus natan ed say'an panaon, abu-abung, tan agagi'n lalaki, tan agagi'n bibii, tan saray ina, tan saray anak, tan daldalin, pati saray kapasegsegang; tan dia ed mundo ya onsabi say bilay a maando. 

Mar 10:31 Balet amayamay so saray onaan ya sikaray naonor; tan saray onor ya sikaray onona. 

Mar 10:32 Et wala ra nen saman ed dalan, ya ontatatdang ed Jerusalem; et si Jesus wala ed onaan da: et nikelawan ira; tan saray tinmombok ataktakot ira. Et inala to lamet so saray labindua, tan ginapoan to'n inbaga ed sikara so saray bengatla'n nagawa ed sikato, 

Mar 10:33 A kuan to, Nia, ontatdang itayo ed Jerusalem; et say Anak na too niyawat ed saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray escribas; tan sikato'y dusaen da naani na ipapatey, tan sikato'y yawat da naani ed saray Gentiles : 

Mar 10:34 Tan sikato'y ludlureyen da naani, tan sikato'y lupdaan da, tan sikato'y bakbaken da naani, tan sikato'y pateyen da; et kayari talo ra'n agew onoli ed bilay lanlamang. 

Mar 10:35 Et sinminger ed sikato di Santiago tan Juan, ya anak ira nen Zebedeo a kuan da ed sikato, Managbangat, labay mi komon a gawaen mo ed sikami so antokaman a kerewen mi ed sika. 

Mar 10:36 Et inkuan to'd sikara Anto'y laba'yo'n gawaen ko nipaakar ed sikayo? 

Mar 10:37 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Yaboloy mo ed sikami a makayorong kami komon, sakey dia'd nikawanan a limam, tan sakey dia'd nikawigi a limam, ed gloriam. 

Mar 10:38 Si Jesus balet inkuan to ed sikara, Ag yo amta so kerewen yo. Nayarian yo ta so oninum ed copa ya inuman ko? ono nabinyagan ed binyag ya akabinyagan ko? 

Mar 10:39 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Nayarian mi. Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Say copa ya inuman ko inuman yo naani; tan say binyag ya akabinyagan ko so kabinyagan yo naani: 

Mar 10:40 Balet say iyorong yo ed nikawanan a limak ono dia ed nikawigi a limak ag ko betang so pangiter; ingen sikato 'y onkana ed saray niparaanan to. 

Mar 10:41 Et sanen sikato'y nadngel na saray samplora, ginmapo ra'n asanokan nipaakar ed Santiago tan Juan. 

Mar 10:42 Et si Jesus tinawag to ra ed sikato, tan kuan to ed sikara, Amta yo ya saray inbilang ya man-uley ed saray Gentiles pakatawan ira ed sikara; et saray angatagey da agamilen da'y pakauley ed sikara. 

Mar 10:43 Balet aliwa'n ontan ed sikayo: ingen siopaman a malabay a magmaliw a baleg ed sikayo, sikato naani managlinkor yo; 

Mar 10:44 Tan siopaman a malabay a sikato'y onaan ed sikayo sikato naani aripen na amin. 

Mar 10:45 Ta say Anak na too ag linma dia a palinkoran, noag say manlinkor, tan mangiter na bilay to a sakey a dondon nipaakar ed amayamay. 

Mar 10:46 Et linma ra ed Jerico, et nen pinmaway nanlapu ed Jerico, pati saray babangatan tan sakey a dakerakel a katooan, say anak a laki nen Timeo, si Bartimeo, sakey a mipapayabol a bulag, manyudyorong ed gilig na dalan. 

Mar 10:47 Et sanen nadngel to ya sikato si Jesus a Nazareno, ginapoan to'y manakis, tan kuan to, Jesus, sika anak nen David, kasian mo ak. 

Mar 10:48 Et amayamay so nanpasnok ed sikato, pian ag onesel: balet inmakis ni na abalbaleg, Sika anak nen David, kasian mo ak. 

Mar 10:49 Et si Jesus tinmonda, tan inkuan to, Sikato'y tawag yo. Et tinawag da so bulag, a kuan da ed sikato, Mangayaga ka: alagey ka, tatawagen to ka. 

Mar 10:50 Et sikato, nen inbantak to'y kolibenben to, limmokso, tan linma ed Jesus, 

Mar 10:51 Et si Jesus inmebat ed sikato, tan inkuan to Anto so labay mo ya gawaen ko ed sika? Et say laki a bulag inkuan to ed sikato, Rabboni, naawat ko komon so pakanengneng ko. 

Mar 10:52 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Onla ka la: say pananisiam pinaabig to ka. Et tampol inawat to so pakanengneng to, et tinmombok ed sikato ed dalan. 



Mar 11:1 Et sanen akaasinger ira ed Jerusalem, ed Betfage tan Betania, ed palandey na saray Olivas, sikato'y mangibaki na duara ed saray babangatan to, 

Mar 11:2 Tan kuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo ed aldea ya wala'd naparong yo: tan tampol a kaloob yo ed sikato, naromog yo so sakey a kilaw ya asno ya akasinger, ya angapo ni too a kinmabayo ed sikato; sikato so okbaran yo, tan sikato so yakar yo dia. 

Mar 11:3 Et no wala so sakey a mankuan ed sikayo, Akin et gawaen yo so sa ya? kuan yo, Say Katawan sikato'y kaokolan to; et tampol sikato so ipawi'to naani dia. 

Mar 11:4 Et iman la ra, et aromog da so sakey a kilaw ya akasinger ed pinto ed paway dia ed mapalaway a dalan; et sikato'y inokbaran da. 

Mar 11:5 Et arum ed saray wad'man inkuan da ed sikara, Anto so gawaen yo, ya ookbaran yo so kilaw? 

Mar 11:6 Et inkuan da ed sikara so onong na inkuan nen Jesus: et pinaulian da ra ya onla. 

Mar 11:7 Et inyakar da so kilaw ed Jesus, tan insapin da ed sikato so saray kolibenben da; et sikato so kinmabayo ed sikato.

Mar 11:8 Tan amayamay ira'y angibilkag na kolibenben da ed dalan; et saray arum, sangasanga ya sinipi ra a nanlapu ed uma. 

Mar 11:9 Et saray linma ed onaan, tan saray manomtombok, inyakis da, Hosanna; Bendito so onla dia ed ngaran na Katawan: 

Mar 11:10 Bendito so panarian ya onsabi, say panarian nen ama tayo a David: Hosanna ed sankatag'yan. 

Mar 11:11 Et linmoob ed Jerusalem, ed templo; et nen anengneng to so amin a bengabengatla ed manliberliber, bangta onlalabi la, pinmaway ed Betania a pati saray labindua. 

Mar 11:12 Et dia'd kaimbuasan, nen pinmaway ira ed Betania, sikato'y narasan. 

Mar 11:13 Et nen anengneng to'y sakey a kiew ya higos ed arawi ya walaan na bolobolong, dinmago, ompan makalmo na bengatlad'man: et sanen sinmabi ed sikato angapo'y aromog to noag saray bolobolong lambengat; ta aliwa'n sikato so panaon day higos. 

Mar 11:14 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Angapo'y too'n mangan na bungam a manlapu ed sika natan ya anga ed anga. Et sikato'y nadngel na saray babangatan to. 

Mar 11:15 Et linma ra ed Jerusalem: et linmoob ed templo, tan gihapoan to'n pinapaway so saray nantagilako tan saray nansasaliw dia ed templo, tan binalintuag to ray dulang na saray managsalat na pilak, tan saray yorongan na saray nantagilako na malapati; 

Mar 11:16 Tan ag to inaboloyan so siopa-man a too ya mingitarok na boksot ed templo. 

Mar 11:17 Tan nanbangat, tan inkuan to ed sikara, Agta nisulat, Say abung ko natawag ya abung na pikakasi nipaakar ed saray amin a naciones? balet sikayo sikato'y ginawa yo a sakey a balaong na mamatakew. 

Mar 11:18 Et sikato so nadngel na saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray escribas, et inisisip da no panon so pamatey da ed sikato: lapu'd tinmakot ira ed sikato, ta amin a katooan nikelkelawan ed ibabanga'to. 

Mar 11:19 Et nilabilabf ya pinmaway ed paway na ciudad. 

Mar 11:20 Tan nen onlabas ira ed kabuasan anengneng da so kiew ya higos ya amagaan manlapu ed saray lamot. 

Mar 11:21 Et si Pedro dia ed inpakanonot to kuan to ed sikato, Rabbi, nia, say kiew ya higos ya insambam amagaan. 

Mar 11:22 Et nen inmebat si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Manisia kayo ed Dios. 

Mar 11:23 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Siopaman a mangikuan ed saya'n palandey, Naagwat ka tan ontaboy ka ed dayat; et ag naani manduarua ed puso to, ingen manisia a say salita to nagawa; sikato'y nagamoran to. 

Mar 11:24 Kanian kuan ko ed sikayo, Amin a bengabengatla ya pikasi yo tan kerewen yo, sisiaen yo ya awaten yo, et wala ra naani ed sikayo. 

Mar 11:25 Tan sano mikakasi kayo'n sialagey mamerdona kayo, no walaan kayo'y bengat Ian pamosolan ed siopaman; pian say Ama yo met a wala ed tawen perdonaen to kayo ed saray kasalanan yo. 

Mar 11:26 (Ta no ag kayo mamerdona, say Ama yo ya wala ed tawen ag to met perdonaen ed sikayo so saray kasalanan yo.) 

Mar 11:27 Et onla ra lamet ed Jerusalem: et nenmanaakar ed templo, dinmagoed sikato so saray manona a sacerdote, tan saray escribas, tan saray mamasiken; 

Mar 11:28 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Ed anto'n pakauley so pangagawaan mo ed saraya a bengatla? ono siopa so angiter ed sika na saya'n pakauley pian gawaen mo so saraya a bengatla? 

Mar 11:29 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Tepeten ko ed sikayo so sakey a tepet, et ebatanyo ak, et ibagak ed sikayo na anto'n pakauley so pangagawaan ko ed saraya a bengatla. 

Mar 11:30 Say binyag nen Juan, nanlapu ed tawen, one ed saray totoo? ebatan yo ak. 

Mar 11:31 Et minolimoli ra'd sikara'n dili, a kuan da, No kuan tayo, Nanlapu ed tawen; ikuan to, Akin sirin et sikato'y ag yo sinisia? 

Mar 11:32 Balet no kuan tayo, Nanlapu ed saray totoo-tinakotan da so ombaley: ta amin peteg a sinisia ra si Juan a sikato'y sakey a profeta. 

Mar 11:33 Et inmebat ira ed Jesus tan kuan da, Agmi amta. Et si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Ag ko met ibaga ed sikayo na anto'n pakauley so pangawaan ko ed saraya'n bengatla. 



Mar 12:1 Et ginapoan to'y akisalita ed sikara ed saray alimbawa. Sakey a too nantanem na sakey a kauvasan, et niliber to na alar, tan angotkot na panalakan, tan angipaalagey na sakey ya ilang, tan sikato so inpaabang to ed saray tomatalon, tan linma ed sananey a dalin. 

Mar 12:2 Et nen panaon la angibaki sakey ya aripen ed saray tumatalon, pian awaten to ed saray tumatalon so abang na saray bunga na kauvasan. 

Mar 12:3 Et sikato so inala ra, tan sikato so pinepekpek da, tan sikato so inbaki ra a paoypaoy. 

Mar 12:4 Et angibaki lamet ed sikara na sananey ya ripen; et sikato'y sinugatan da ed olo tan makapabaing a toloy so ginawa ra'd sikato. 

Mar 12:5 Tan angibaki sananey; et sikato'y pinatey da: tan amayamay a sananey; pinepekpek da so saray arum, tan pinatey da so saray arum. 

Mar 12:6 Walaan ni sakey, sakey ya inadaro'n anak: sikato'y inbaki to'n kaonoran ed sikara, a kuan to, Pagalangan day ana'ko. 

Mar 12:7 Balet saray tumatalon kuan da ed sikara lanlamang, Saya sikato'y mananawir; galidia, sikato so pateyentayo, et say tawir kien tayo naani. 

Mar 12:8 Et sikato'y inala ra, tan sikato'y pinatey da, tan sikato'y inbantak da ed paway na kauvasan. 

Mar 12:9 Anto sirin so gawaen na makankien na kauvasan? onla naani tan bagbagen to so saray tumatalon, tan iter to so kauvasan ed sananey. 

Mar 12:10 Ag yo ta ni abasa so saya'n sulat; Say bato ya inbantak na saray manangipaalagey na abung, Sikato lanlamang so agawa'n olo na suyok. 

Mar 12:11 Saya nanlapu ed Katawan, Et sikato'y makapakelaw ed saray mata tayo? 

Mar 12:12 Et sikato y sineseetan da ya erelen; antakot ira balet ed saray dakel a katooan; ta atebek da ya sinalita to so alimbawa sumpa ed sikara; et sikato'y tinainan da, tan iman la ra. 

Mar 12:13 Et angibaki ra ed sikato na saray Fariseos tan Herodianos, pian sikato'y erelen da komon ed salita. 

Mar 12:14 Et sanen akasabi ra kuan da ed sikato, Managbangat, amtami ya matua ka, et ag ka mapaga ed siopaman; ta ag mo biig-biigen so kanengnengan na saray totoo, noag dia'd katuaan ibangat mo so dalan na Dios: Nikatonongan kasi pangiter na buis ed kinen Cesar, odino andi? 

Mar 12:15 Mangiter kami ono ag kami mangiter? Sikato balet ta kaba'to so pankonkonwari ra, inkuanto'd sikara, Akin et toksoen yo ak? mangyakar kayo'y sakey denario ed siak, pian sikato'y nanengneng ko. 

Mar 12:16 Et sikato'y inyakaran da. Et kuan to ed sikara, Siopa so akantalintao tan akansulat ed saya? Et inkaun da ed sikato, Si Cesar. 

Mar 12:17 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Bayaran yo ed Cesar so bengabengatlan kien nen Cesar, tan ed Dios so saray kien na Dios. Et nikelawan ira na baleg ed sikato. 

Mar 12:18 Et wala ra'y dinmago ed sikato a Saduceos, ya cuanda'n angapo so kioli ed bilay; et tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da, 

Mar 12:19 Managbangat, si Moises insulat to'd sikami, No say agi a laki na sakey a toon ompatey et natainan to so asawa to, et angapo so anak to, say agi to'n laki alaen to komon so asawa to, tan ibangonan to na puli so agi to. 

Mar 12:20 Wala nensaman so pitoran lalaki a sanaagi: et say pangoloan angasawa, et nen inatey ag angitilak na puli; 

Mar 12:21 Et sikato so inala na komadua, tan inatey, ya angapo'y intilak to'n puli; et say komatlo ontan met: 

Mar 12:22 Tan saray pitora ag ira angitilak na puli. Kaonoonoran inatey met so bii. 

Mar 12:23 Dia ed kioli ed bilay siopa so makan-asawa ed sikato? ta saray pitora sikato'y inasawa ra. 

Mar 12:24 Si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Ag ta nisengeg ed saya so kalingoan yo, ya ag yo amta so saray sulsulat, ni say pakapanyari Dios? 

Mar 12:25 Ta sano onoli ra a manlapu'd saray inatey, ag ira mangasawa, tan ag ira met miasawa; balet singara angeles ed tawen. 

Mar 12:26 Balet nipaakar ed saray inatey, ya onili ra ed bilay; ag yo ta abasa ed libro nen Moises, ed pasen a pa-katohgtongan nipaakar ed Zarza, no panon so inpisalita na Dios ed sikato, a kuan to, Siak so Dios nen Abraham, tan say Dios nen Isaac, tan say Dios nen Jacob? 

Mar 12:27 Sikato so aliwa'n Dios na saray inatey, ingen Dios na saray mabilay: baleg a toloy so kalilingo yo. 

Mar 12:28 Et sakey ed saray escribas dinmago, et nadngel to ra'n mansusupiatan, et bangta amta to ya inebatan to ra'n maong, tinepet to ed sikato, Anto'n gangan so manonaan ed ganagana? 

Mar 12:29 Si Jesus inmebat, Say manonaan sikatoya, Dengel mo, O Israel; Say Katawan a Dios tayo, say Katawan saksakey: 

Mar 12:30 Et sika aroen mo so Katawan a Dios mo ed amin a pusom, tan ed amin a kamarerwam, tan ed amin a nonot mo, tan ed amin a biskeg mo. 

Mar 12:31 Say komadua sikato ya, Aroen mo so kaparam a too a singa sika lanlamang. Angapo lay sananey a gangan ya babaleg nen saraya. 

Mar 12:32 Et say escriba inkuan to ed sikato, Dia'd tua, Managbangat, maong so inpangikuan mo a sikatoy saksakey; tan angapo'y sananey noag sikato lambengat: 

Mar 12:33 Tan say pangaro ed sikato ed amin a puso, tan ed amin a pakatalos, tan ed amin a biskeg, tan say pangaro ed kapara'n too a singa sikato lanlamang, sikato'y dakdakel nen saray amin a lapag ya panangaro ya poolan tan saray bagat. 

Mar 12:34 Tan sanen anengneng nen Jesus ya inmebat a sikakalakal, inkuan to ed sikato, Sika ag ka arawi ed panaria'y Dios. Et angapo la'y too ed kayari ton man ya akakpel a mantepet ed sikato na antokaman a tepet. 

Mar 12:35 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to, nen manbabangat ed templo, Pano'y pangikuan na saray escribas a si Cristo sikato'y anak nen David? 

Mar 12:36 Si David lanlamang inkuan to ed Espfritu Santo, Say Katawan inkuan to ed Katawan ko, Onyorong ka ed nikawanan a lima, Anga ed pangawak ed saray kakabosol mo a gagatinan na saray salisalim. 

Mar 12:37 Si David sikato'y tawagen to na Katawan; et panon sirin a sikato so anak to? Et saray karaklan ya ombaley sikato'y dinedengel da'n suliliket. 

Mar 12:38 Et dia'd panbabanga'to inkuan to, Manlikas kayo ed saray escribas, ya kaliktan da'y manakar ed andukey a sokbong, tan saray panangilugay ed sikara ed saray plaza, 

Mar 12:39 Tan saray manona'n yorongan ed saray sinagoga, tan saray manonaan a paspasen ed saray fiesta: 

Mar 12:40 Sikara ya akmonen da so saray abung na saray balo a bib if, tan panagbaraan da'n a mangawa ra na saray andurukey a pikakasi; saraya awaten da so babaleg a dusa. 

Mar 12:41 Tan sikatoy nanyorong ed petek na panangisimpenay kayamanan, tan ninengneng to no panon so panangipelag na saray dakel a katoaan na pilak ed panangisimpenan na kayamanan: et amayamay iray mayayaman ya angipelag na dakel.

Mar 12:42 Et dinmago so sakey a duka ya bii'n balo et angipelag na duaran blankas, ya katiponan to so sakey a marabilis. 

Mar 12:43 Et tinawagan to'ray babangatan to ed sikato, tan inkuan to ed sikara, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Sayan duka ya bii a balo angipelag na dakdakel nen saray amin a manpepelag ed panangisimpenan na kayamanan: 

Mar 12:44 Ta sikara 'n amin angipelag ira ed nasosolokan da; sikato balet dia ed inka-okolan to inpelag to ya amin so wala ed sikato, salanti amin a panbilay to. 



Mar 13:1 Et nen onpapaway ed templo, sakey ed saray babangatan to kuan to ed sikato, Managbangat, nengneng mo, agay la a nengneng na batobato tan agay la a nengneng na palpaalagey! 

Mar 13:2 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Nanengneng mo so saraya'n ankakabaleg a palpaalagey? angapo naani natilak dia a sakey a bato ed tapew na sakey, ya ag nigeba naani. 

Mar 13:3 Et nen manyudyorong ed palandey na saray Olivas ed petek na templo, di Pedro tan Santiago tan Juan tan Andres tinepet da ed sikato ed kabokoran, 

Mar 13:4 Ibagam ed sikami, kapigan so kagawa na saraya'n bengatla? tan anto naani tanda no sarayan bengatla asinger ta la ra ya amin a nasumpal? 

Mar 13:5 Et si Jesus ginapoan to'n inkuan ed sikara, Manlikas kayo ya angapoy too'n mangibalang ed sikayo. 

Mar 13:6 Amayamay naani onla dia ed ngaran ko, a mankuan, Siak iman; tan ibalang to naani so amayamay. 

Mar 13:7 Tan sano narengelan yo so bakabakal, tan saray dalamurom na bakabakal, ag kayo nagolo: sarayan bengatla nakaokolan a nagawa; ingen aliwa ni'n sikato'y kasampotan. 

Mar 13:8 Ta saya a nacion onalagey naani'n sumpa ed nacion, tan panarian sumpa ed panarian: wala naani yegyegyeg ed nanbabangil a pasen; wala naani eraeras: saraya'n bengatla sikara'y gapo na ermen. 

Mar 13:9 Ingen manlikas kayo ed inkasikayo: ta yawat da kayo ed saray concilio; tan dia ed saray sinagogas nabakbak kayo; tan ed arap na saray gobernadores tan arari onalagey kayo nisengeg ed siak ya onkanan pamintuaan ed sikara. 

Mar 13:10 Tan say evangelio kaokolan ya nipulong ya unona ed saray amin a naciones. 

Mar 13:11 Et sano yakar da kayo ed Ottoman, tan yawat da kayo, ag yo kapagaan ya unona no anto so salitaen yo naani: noag say antokaman a niiter ed sikayo ed satan ya horas, satan so salitaen yo: ta aliwa'n sikayo so mansalita, noag say Espfritu Santo. 

Mar 13:12 Tan say agi a laki yawat to naani so agi'n laki ed ipapatey, tan say ama, so anak to; tan saray anak ontalindeg ira naani sumpa ed saray ateng, tan gawaen da ra a niyan ed ipapatey. 

Mar 13:13 Tan gulaen da kayo naani na amin a totoo nisengeg ed ngaran ko: ingen say mansongdo ya anga ed kasampotan, sikato lanlamang so nilaban naani. 

Mar 13:14 Balet sano nanengneng yo so pangula ed kadederal a manalalagey ed ag to kanepegan (say manbabasa talosan to), saman la saray wala ed Judea onbatik ira'n anga ed saray palandey: 

Mar 13:15 Tan say wala ed toktok na abung ag onlasor, ono onloob, a mangala na angan anto ed abung to: 

Mar 13:16 Tan say wala ed uma ag komon ompawil a mangala na kolibenben to. 

Mar 13:17 Balet kasi la so saray mamalokon tan saray manpapasoso ed saratan ya agew! 

Mar 13:18 Et mikasi kayo ya ag nagawa komon dia ed panaon na betel. 

Mar 13:19 Ta dia ed saratan ya agew wala naani kairapan, ya agni agawa so ontan nanlapu ed gapo na inkapalsa na pinalsa'y Dios anga ed natan, tan angapo lawas. 

Mar 13:20 Et no say Katawan ag to komon pinatikeyan so saray agew, angapo komon so laman a nilaban: balet nisengeg ed saray apili, a sikara'y pinili to, pinatikey to so saray agew. 

Mar 13:21 Et saman la no siopaman a too ikuan to ed sikayo, Nia, wadia si Cristo; ono, Nia, wadman; sikato'y ag yo sisigsiaen: 

Mar 13:22 Ta onalagey naani so tilatilan Cristo tan tilatila'n profetas, tan mangipanengneng ira, naani na saray tantanda tan pankelawan, pian makapangibalang ira, a no nayari, saray apili. 

Mar 13:23 Balet manlikas kayo: nia, inbagak so amin a bengabengatla ed sikayo ya inpasakbay. 

Mar 13:24 Ingen dia ed saratan ya agew kayari na satan kairapan, say banwa onbilunget, tan say bulan ag mangiter naani liwawa to, 

Mar 13:25 Tan saray bibitewen napelag ira naani manlapu ed tawen, tan saray pakayari ya wala ed tawen natenyeg ira naani. 

Mar 13:26 Et saman la nanengneng da so anak na too ya onsabi ya manluglugan ed saray lurem pati baleg a pakayari tan gloria. 

Mar 13:27 Tan saman la ibaki to so saray angeles, et tiponen da naani a pandaragupen so saray pinili to manlapu ed saray apatira'n dagem, manlapu ed kasampotan na dalin anga ed ksampotan na tawen, 

Mar 13:28 Natan aralen yo ed kiew na higos so alimbawa to: sano say sanga to et linmambot, tan papawayen to so saray bolong to, amtaen yo ya say tiagew asinger la; 

Mar 13:29 Ontan met ed sikayo, sano nanengneng yo so saraya'n bengatla ya nagawa, amtaen yo a sikato'y asinger la, ed saray pinto. 

Mar 13:30 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Saya'n kailalakan ag naani onlabas anga ed kasumpal na saraya ya amin a bengatla. 

Mar 13:31 Say tawen tan say dalin onlabas ira: saray salitak balet ag ira onlabas. 

Mar 13:32 Balet ed satan ya agew ono satan ya horas angapo so makapikabat, angan saray angeles ed tawen, angan say Anak, noag say Ama. 

Mar 13:33 Manlikas kayo, manbantay tan mikasi kayo: ta ag yo amta no kapigan a panaon. 

Mar 13:34 Sikato so singa sakey a too, sanen onla ed sananey a dalin, ya tinainan to so abung to, tan inted to so pakauley ed saray aripen to, ed balang sakey say gawaen to, a binilin to met so bantaypinto ya manpuyat. 

Mar 13:35 Manpuyat kayo sirin: ta ag yo amta no kapigan so isabi na katawan na abung, no dia ed ngarem, ono dia ed pegley labi, ono dia ed panagkokaok na lalong, ono dia ed kabuasan; 

Mar 13:36 Agla piga no onsabi a bigla et nasabian to kayo'n naugip. 

Mar 13:37 Et no an to so kuan ko ed sikayo, kuan ko ed amin, Manpuyat kayo. 



Mar 14:1 Bang nen kayari dua ra'n agew sikato so fiesta na pasko tay andilevadura a tinapay: et saray manona'n sacerdote tan saray escribas inisipi sip da no panon so pangerel da ed sikato, ed palingo, tan sikato so pateyen da: 

Mar 14:2 Ta inkuan da, Aliwan dia'd peles na fiesta, ompan wala'y nagawa'n sakey a gewgew na ombaley. 

Mar 14:3 Et leleg ya sikato'y wala ed Betania dia ed abung nen Simon a katingen, nen manyudyorong ed pananganan, dinmago so sakey a bii ya sankaawi'to'y sakey a vaso ya alabastro a napno'y unguento a sankablian ya nardo espique; et binetag to so vaso, tan sikato'y inkalbo to ed olo to. 

Mar 14:4 Balet walaray pigara'n asanokan ed inkasikara, a kuan da Anto'n getma ya agawa so inpandarak ed saya'n unguento? 

Mar 14:5 Ta saya'n unguento alako komon ed masolok a talonlasus a denarios, tan inter ed saray duruka. Et ngorongoro ra sumpa ed sikato. 

Mar 14:6 Si Jesus balet inkuan to, Paulian yo'n bokod; Akin et sikato'y gonigonen yo? sikato'y nangawa na maong a gawa ed siak. 

Mar 14:7 Ta saray duruka wala ra ed sikayo lawas, tan bang no kaliktan yo nayarian yo so mangawa ed sikara na maong: balet siak andi ak ed sikayo lawas. 

Mar 14:8 Sikato ginawa to so ayarian to; pinasakbayan to a pinoyokan so laman ko nipaakar ed kiponpon ko. 

Mar 14:9 Et tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Angan ined a kipulongan na evangelio ed iapag a mundo, satan met so ginawa na saya'n bii nasalita naani ya onkanan pakanodnonotan ed sikato. 

Mar 14:10 Tan si Judas Iscariote, a sakey ed saray labindua, linma ed saray manona'n sacerdote, pian sikato'y yawa'to ed sikara. 

Mar 14:11 Et sikara, nen sikato'y nadngel da, malikeliket ira, tan insipan da ed sikato ya itdan da'y pilak. Et ninono'to na panon so makana a pangyawa'to'd sikato dia ed sikara. 

Mar 14:12 Tan dia ed unona'n agew na andi levadura a tinapay, sanen inbagat da so pasko, saray babangatan to kuan da ed sikato, Ined so labay mo ya laen mi tan pantariaan pian nakan mo so pascua? 

Mar 14:13 Et mangibaki na duara ed saray babangatan, tan kuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo ed ciudad, ed diman naromog yo'y sakey a too a sankaawi'to'y sakey a buyog na danum: sikato'y tombok yo; 

Mar 14:14 Et angan ined a tobongen to, kuan yo ed katawan na abung, Say Managbangat kuan to, Ined so silid a pananangkailian ko, a sikato so panganan ko na pasko pati saray babangatan ko? 

Mar 14:15 Et sikato lanlamang ipanengneng to naani ed sikayo so sakey a baleg a silir ed tagey a naapiger tan akaparaan; et diman mangitadia kayo na onkana ed sikatayo. 

Mar 14:16 Et saray babangatan iman la ra, tan linmoob ira ed ciudad, et arumog da so onong na inkuan to ed sikara: tan intadia ra so pasco. 

Mar 14:17 Et sanen labi la sikato'y linma pati saray labindua. 

Mar 14:18 Et sanen dinmongo tan mangakan ira, si Jesus inkuan to, Tua kuanko ed sikayo, Sakey ed sikayo yawat to ak naani, salanti say mipangan ed siak. 

Mar 14:19 Ginmapo ra'n naermenan, tan nankuan so sakey tan sakey ed sikato, Siak ta kasi? 

Mar 14:20 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Sikato so sakey ed saray iabindua, sata'y miookob ed siak ed lipong. 

Mar 14:21 Ta say Anak na too onla, onong lanti ed nisulat nipaakar ed sikato ingen kasi la so too ya lapu'd sikato et niyawat so Anak na too! maong komon ed satan a too no ag nianak. 

Mar 14:22 Et dia ed pangakan da, angala'y tinapay, tan sanen amendicion, sikato'y pihisagpisag to, tan inter to ed sikara, tan kuan to, Ala yo, saya sikato'y laman ko. 

Mar 14:23 Tan angala na sakey a copa, et sanen akapisalamat, inter to ed sikara: et inminum ira ya amin ed sikato. 

Mar 14:24 Et inkuan to ed sikara; Saya so dalak ed sipan, ya naibung nipaakar ed amayamay. 

Mar 14:25 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Agak la oninum ed bunga na uvas, anga ed saman ya agew sano inumen ko a balo dia ed panarian na Dios. 

Mar 14:26 Tan sanen acanta ra so sakey ya himno, pinmaway ira ed palandey na Olivas. 

Mar 14:27 Tan si Jesus kuan to ed sikara, Amin yo napasakitan kayo naani: ta nisulat, Kabilen ko naani so pastol et saray carnero nakaykayat ira. 

Mar 14:28 Bang balet, kayarik ya onoli ed bilay, onlaak naani ed arap yo ed Galilea. 

Mar 14:29 Si Pedro balet inkuan to ed sikato, Angan napasakitan iran amin, ingen ta andi ed siak. 

Mar 14:30 Et si Jesus kuan to ed sikato, Tua kuan ko ed sika ya sika natan ya agew, salanti saya'n labi, no ag ni onkokaok so lalong a mamidua, iburi mo ak naani a mamitlo. 

Mar 14:31 Balet nansalita ed mapalalo nin panangipurek, No kaokolan so ipatey ko'n midamay ed sika, ag taka iburi. Et ontan met so inkuan da ya amin. 

Mar 14:32 Et onla ra ed sakey a pasen ya inngaran na Getsemani: et kuan to ed saray babangatan to, Yurong kayo dia, leleg a mikasi ak. 

Mar 14:33 Et inala to ed sikato di Pedro tan Santiago tan Juan, tan ginmapo'n apagaan na balbaleg, tan agonigon a toloy. 

Mar 14:34 Et kuan to ed sikara, Say kamarerwak maermen a toloy ya anga ed ipapatey: natila'kayo dia, tan manbantay kayo. 

Mar 14:35 Et inmakar na daiset, tan dinmakmomo ed dalin, tan akikasi, a no nayari, onlabas komon so horas ed sikato. 

Mar 14:36 Tan inkuan to, Abba, Ama, amin a bengabengatla nayari ed sika; ipalns mo komon so sayan copa ed siak: angaman ontan aliwa'n say kaliktan ko, noag say kaliktan mo. 

Mar 14:37 Et ondago, et nasabian to ra'n naugip, et kuan to ed Pedro, Simon, naugip ka? agmo nayarian so manbantay a sakey horas? 

Mar 14:38 Manbantay kayo tan manpikasi kayo, pian ag kayo onloob ed katotokso: say espiritu tua a maaboloy, balet say laman makapoy. 

Mar 14:39 Tan inmarawi lamet, tan nanpikasi, ya inoli'to so saraman lamlamang a salita. 

Mar 14:40 Et dinmago lamet, et asabian tora'n naugip, ta saray mata ra ambelabelat; tan ag da amta no anto so yebat da ed sikato. 

Mar 14:41 Tan linma ed komatlo, tan kuan to ed sikara, Naugip kayo la natan, tan manpainawa kayo: sarag la; say horas asabi la; nia, say Anak na too niyawat ed limalima na saray managkasalanan. 

Mar 14:42 Alagey kayo, onla itayo la: nia; say mangyawat ed siak asinger la. 

Mar 14:43 Et tampol, legan na pansasalita to ni, onsabi Judas, sakey ed saray labindua, tan akila ed sikato so dakel iran totoo ya akakampilan tan akaegna'y pekpek, nanlapu ed saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray escribas tan saray mamasiken. 

Mar 14:44 Bang say mangyawat ed sikato initdan tora'y sakey a panamidbiran, a kuan to, No siopa sa angoban ko, satan sikato'y alaen yo, tan tarok yo ed malmalet.
