Mar 14:45 Tan sanen akasabi, tampol a dinmago ed sikato, tan kuan to. Rabbi; et inangoban to. 

Mar 14:46 Et sikato'y siningkat da, tan sikato'y inala ra. 

Mar 14:47 Balet sakey ed saraman so manal-alagey ed asinger binago'toy kampilan to, et kinabil to so aripen na atagey a sacerdote, tan piningas to'y layag to. 

Mar 14:48 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Pinmaway kayo a singa sumpa ed sakey a matakew, a nankampilan tan akaegna'y pekpek pian orelen yo ak? 

Mar 14:49 Agew-agew ya wala ak ed sikayo nensaman ed templo ya nanbabangat, et ag yo ak inala: balet saya agawa pian saray sulsulat nasumpal ira. 

Mar 14:50 Et sikara ya amin sikato so tinainan da, tan binmatik ira. 

Mar 14:51 Tan sakey a tobon balo a laki tinmombok ed sikato, a walaa'y abel a lienzo ya akasakbong ed sikato, ed laman to a lakseb: et sikato'y inerel da wari; 

Mar 14:52 Balet tinainan to so abel a lienzo, tan binmatik a lakseb. 

Mar 14:53 Et inyakar da si Jesus ed atagey a sacerdote: tan onla ra a mitipon ed sikato so saray amin ya manonaan a sacerdote tan mamasisiken tan saray escribas. 

Mar 14:54 Et sikato so tinomb ok nen Pedro ed arawi anga ed loob, dia ed saman ya atagey a sacerdote; tan akiyurong ed saray oficiales, tan nandarangdang ed apuy. 

Mar 14:55 Bang saray manonaan a sacerdote tan lapag na concilio nan-anap ira na tasi sumpa ed Jesus pian sikato so yan da ed ipapatey; et ag ira akalmo. 

Mar 14:56 Ta amayamay so angiter na tila'n tasi sumpa ed sikato, tan say tasi ra sikara'y nankakasipa. 

Mar 14:57 Et walara'y inmalagey ya arum tan angited ira na tilatila'n tasi sumpa ed sikato, a kuan da, 

Mar 14:58 Sikato'y nadngel mi yanankuan, Gebaen ko naani so saya'n templo ya ginawa ed saray lima, et dia'd talo ra'n agew mangipaalagey ak na sananey ya ag gawaen na saray lima. 

Mar 14:59 Et angaman ontan ag ni nannononong so tasi ra. 

Mar 14:60 Et say atagey a sacerdote inmalagey ed pegley, tan tinepe'to ed Jesus, a kuan to, Angapo so yebat mo? anto so saya'n tasian na saraya a sumpa ed sika? 

Mar 14:61 Balet sikato'y ag inmesel, tan angapo so inyeba'to. Tinepet lamet na atagey a sacerdote ed sikato, tan kuan to ed sikato, Sika so Cristo, ya Anak na Mabendito? 

Mar 14:62 Et si Jesus inkuan to, Siak: et nanengneng yo naani so Anak na too a manyudyorong ed nikawanan a lima na Pakayari, tan onsabi a pati saray lurem na tawen. 

Mar 14:63 Et say atagey a sacerdote pinila' to so saray kawesto, tan kuan to Anto ni pankaokolan tayo na tastasi? 

Mar 14:64 Sikayo nadngel, yo so ayew; anto so isipen yo? Et sikara ya amin sikato so dinusaan da ya makana ed ipapatey. 

Mar 14:65 Et saray arum sikato'y ginapuan da a lupdaan, tan sakbongan so lupa to, tan sikato so tampalen da, tan kuan da ed sikato, Profetaan mo: et sikato so inawat na saray oficial ed dampil na limalima ra. 

Mar 14:66 Et nen wala si Pedro ed leksab dia ed saban sinmabi sakey ed saray bibif ya aripen na atagey a sacerdote; 

Mar 14:67 Et nen anengneng to si Pedro ya mandarangdang, ninmengneng ed sikato , tan kuan to, Sika met akiolopolop ka ed Nazareno, salanti ti Jesus. 

Mar 14:68 Balet sikato inburito, a kuan to, Agko amta, tan agko met natalosan so kuan mo: et pinmaway ed pinto: et say lalong kinmokaok. 

Mar 14:69 Et sikato so anengneng na bii ya aripen, et gihapoan to lamet a ikuan ed saramay akaalagey diman, Saya sikato'y sakey ed sikara. 

Mar 14:70 Sikato balet pinaandito lamet. Et kayari nagogonoyan a daiset sa ray akaalagey diman inkuan da lamet ed Pedro, Et tua sika so sakey ed sikara; ta sika Galileo ka. 

Mar 14:71 Balet ginapuan to'y nanayew, tan nansamba, Agko kabat so saya a too a sasalitaen yo. 

Mar 14:72 Et tampol kinmokaok so lalong ed komadua. Et si Pedro anonotan to so salita, no panon so inkaun nen Jesus ed sikato, Noag ni onkokaok so lalong a mamidua, sika iburi moak ya mamitlo. Et nen ninodnonot to, nannangis. 



Mar 15:1 Et tampol ed kaimbuasan saray manonaan a sacerdote pati saray mamasiken tan saray escribas, tan lapag a coneilio, ginawa ra'y sakey ya inpansisingbat, et binalor da si Jesus, tan inpaway da, tan inyawat da ed Pilato. 

Mar 15:2 Et si Pilato tinepet to ed sikato, Sika so Ari na saray Judios? Et sikato nen inmebat kuan to ed sikato, Sika inkuan mo. 

Mar 15:3 Tan saray manonaan a sacerdotes sikato so indalem da ed amayamay a bengatla. 

Mar 15:4 Et si Pilato tinepe'to lamet ed sikato, a kuan to, Angapo so yebat mo? nengneng mo no panon kaamayamay na bengabengatla so pangidalemanda ed sika. 

Mar 15:5 Si Jesus balet agla inmebat na mogmo; ed ontan la ya si Pilato nikelawan. 

Mar 15:6 Bang dia ed fiesta naugalian to ya bolosan ed sikara so sakey a pinangaw, unong ya kerewen da ed sikato. 

Mar 15:7 Tan wala nensaman so sakey a manngaran na Barrabas, ya nipangaw pati saray ibiba to ya nangawa na golo, lalaki a dia ed golo nanpapatey ira. 

Mar 15:8 Et saray dakel a katooan sinmegep ira tan ginapoan da'n kerewen ed sikato ya gawaen to komon so unong na naugalian to a gawaen ed sikara. 

Mar 15:9 Et si Pilato inmebat ed sikara, a kuan to, Labay yo ya bolosan ko ed sikayo sa Ari na saray Judios? 

Mar 15:10 Ta sikato atebec to ya lapu'd siblet sikato so inyawat na saray manonaan a sacerdote. 

Mar 15:11 Balet saray manonaan a sacerdote inupitan da so dakel a katooan, ya si Barrabas ingen so bolosan to ed sikara. 

Mar 15:12 Et si Pilato inmebat lamet tan inkuan to Anto sirin so gawaen ko ed tatawagen yo ya Ari na saray Judios? 

Mar 15:13 Et inyakis da lamet, Sikato so ipasak mo ed cruz. 

Mar 15:14 Et si Pilato inkuan to ed sikara, Akin, anto'y mauges ya ginawa to? Balet sikara inyakis da a mapalalo, Sikato so ipasak mo ed cruz. 

Mar 15:15 Tan si Pilato, nen labay to a peraen so saray dakel a katooan, binolosan to ed sikara si Barrabas, tan inyawat to si Jesus, sanen sikato so abakbak to, pian sikato so ipasak ed cruz. 

Mar 15:16 Et sikato so inyakar na saray sondalo ed loob na panangokoman, a sikato so Pretorio; tan tinawag dan tinipon so lapag na kompania. 

Mar 15:17 Et sikato'y kinawesan day purpura, tan sanen nanlaga ra na balanget ya sabisabit, sikato 'y intoon da ed sikato; 

Mar 15:18 Tan ginapoan day mangigalang ed sikato, Nagalang ka, Ari na saray Judios! 

Mar 15:19 Tan pinekpek da so olo to na sakey a kawayan tan sikato so nilupdaan da, tan nen intalimokor da so pueg da sikato so ingalang da. 

Mar 15:20 Tan sanen aludlurey da la si Jesus, nilakseb da ed sikato so purpura, et insolong da ed sikato so saray kawes to. Tan sikato so inpaway da ya ipasak ed cruz. 

Mar 15:21 Et pinilitan da so sakey ya onlalabas diman, si Simon a Cirineo, ya nanlapu ed uma, ama di Alejandro tan Rufo, ya mila ed sikara, pian mangawit ed cruz to. 

Mar 15:22 Et sikato so inyakar da anga ed pasen a Golgota, a no nipatalos, Say pasen na sakey a lapislapis. 

Mar 15:23 Et sikato so initdan da na alak ya linaokan na mirra: Balet sikato ag to inawat. 

Mar 15:24 Tan sikato so ipasak da ed cruz, tan panaapagan da so kawe kawes ed sikara, ya nanpapalaranan da'ra, no anto so alaen na balang sakey. 

Mar 15:25 Et sikato so komatlo ya horas nensaman, et sikato so inpasak da ed cruz. 

Mar 15:26 Et say sulat ya ipapakasalanan da ed sikato insulat ed tagey, SAY ARI NA SARAY JUDIOS. 

Mar 15:27 Tan pati sikato inpasak da ed cruz so duara'n tulisan; sakey ed nikawanan a lima to, sakey ed nikawigi to. 

Mar 15:28 Et asumpal so Sulat, a kuan to: Tan sikato so inbilang ed saray marelmeng. 

Mar 15:29 Et saray linmabas diman sikato so pinabpabaingan da, ya ipeyengpeyeng da'ray olo'ra, tan kuan da, Ja! sika ya bagbagen mo so templo, tan sikato so paalageyen mo ed taloran agew. 

Mar 15:30 Ilaban mo so inkasika, tan epaska ed cruz. 

Mar 15:31 Ontan met a saray manonaan a sacerdote sikato so niludlurey da dia ed inkasikara pati saray escribas ya inkuan da, Sikato ilaban to so saray arum; say inkasikato ag to nilaban. 

Mar 15:32 Onepas komon natan ed cruz so Cristo, say Ari na Israel, pian nanengneng mi et manisia kami. Tan saraman so nipasak a pati sikato ed cruz sikato so binalaw da met. 

Mar 15:33 Tan sanen asabi komanem ya horas, wala nen saman so bilunget ed tapew na lapag a dalin anga ed komasiam ya horas. 

Mar 15:34 Et dia ed komasiam ya horas, si Jesus inmakis na maksil a voces Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? a sikato, no nipatalos, Dios ko, Dios ko, akin et inkaindan mo ak? 

Mar 15:35 Et arum ed saray manal-alagey diman, sanen sikato'y nadngel da, inkuanda, Nia, tatawagen to si Elias. 

Mar 15:36 Et sakey so binmatik, tan nen inpaesep to so sakey ya esponja ed tuka, sikato'y inyan to ed sakey a kawayan, tan inter to ed sikato ya ipainom, a kuan to, Paulian yo; nengnengen tayo no onla dia kasi' Elias ya mangyepas ed sikato. 

Mar 15:37 Et si Jesus inbesngaw to so sakey a maksil a voces, tan inderew to so espiritu. 

Mar 15:38 Et say sakbong na templo apilat a nankadua nanlapu'd tagey anga ed leksab. 

Mar 15:39 Et say centurion, ya nan-alagey ed arap nen Jesus, sanen anengneng to ya onman so inpangiderew na espiritu, inkuan to, Petepeteg saya'n too sikato so Anak na Dios. 

Mar 15:40 Et wala ra met so bibii ya naniimaton ed arawi: ed sikara wadman ira a nanpadpara di Maria Magdalena, tan Maria ya ina nen Jacobo ya melag tan ina nen Joses, tan Salome; 

Mar 15:41 Ya sanen sikato so wala ed Galilea, tinmombok ira ed sikato, tan nanlinkor ira ed sikato; tan amayamay ya arum a bibii a tinmatdang pati sikato anga ed Jerusalem. 

Mar 15:42 Et sanen ngarem la, lapu'd sikato so Panagtaria, salanti, say agew ed onaan na sabaton. 

Mar 15:43 Sinmabi Jose a taga Arimatea, sakey a consejero, pasen a dederlenen, a sikato met aalagden to so panarian na Dios; tan linmoob a makmakpel ed Pilato, et kinerew to so bangkay nen Jesus. 

Mar 15:44 Et si Pilato nankelaw nen sikato so inatey la: et nen tinawagan to ed sikato so centurion, tinepe'to ed sikato no abaybayag la a naamtaan ya inatey. 

Mar 15:45 Et sanen naamtaan to ed centurion, inyabuloy to so bangkay ed kinen Jose. 

Mar 15:46 Et analiw na abel a lienzo, tan nen sikato'y inyepas to, sikato so binalko'to na abel a lienzo, tan sikato so inparokol to ed sakey a lobok ya inungib to ed sakey a bato; tan angitolin na sakey a bato ed pinto na lobok. 

Mar 15:47 Et si Maria Magdalena tan si Maria ya ina nen Jose naimatonan da so angiparokolan ed sikato. 

Mar 16:1 Et bangnen apalabas so Sabaton, si Maria Magdalena tan si Maria ya ina nen Santiago, tan si Salome, analiw ira na pabalingit, pian onlara tan sikato'y poyokan da. 

Mar 16:2 Et asaksakbay dia ed onona ya agew na simba, linma ra ed lobok nen tinmayagtag so agew: 

Mar 16:3 Tan inkukuan da ed inka sikara, Siopa kasi so mangitolin ed sikatayo ed bato manlapu ed pinto na lobok? 

Mar 16:4 Et nen tinmangwa ra anengneng da ya say bato nitolin a nisoner: ta sikato'y baleg a toloy. 

Mar 16:5 Et nen linmoob ira ed lobok, anengneng da'y sakey a tobonbalo ya laki a manyudyurong ed diking a nikawanan, ya akawesan na ampotin kawes; et ataktakot ira. 

Mar 16:6 Et kuan to ed sikara, Ag kayo natalagnaw: anapen yo si Jesus, ya Nazareno, ya nipasak ed cruz: sikato so inmoli ed bilay; sikato so andi dia: nia, so pasen ya angiparokolan da ed sikato! 

Mar 16:7 Ingen onla kayo, ibagayo ed saray babangatan to tan ed kinen Pedro, Sikato so onla ed onaan yo ed Galilea: sikato so nanengneng yod man, unong na inkuan to ed sikayo. 

Mar 16:8 Et pinmaway ira, tan binmatik ira nanlapu ed lobok; ta sinmabi ed sikara so pangiwgiw tan pankelaw: et angapo so inkuan da ed siopaman; ta ataktakot ira. 

Mar 16:9 Bangnen sikato so inmoli ya asaksakbay ed onona'n agew na lawas, pinmatnag ya inmona ed Maria Magdalena, a sikato so amapawayan to na pitora'n demonios. 

Mar 16:10 Sikato linma tan inbaga to ed saray akiolop-olop ed sikato, nen wala ni ra a maniingel tan mannanangis. 

Mar 16:11 Et sikara, sanen nadngelan da a sikato so mabilay, tan anengneng to nen Maria Magdalena ag da sinisia. 

Mar 16:12 Et kayari na saraya a bengatla, sikato so pinmatnag ed sananey ya ereng ed duara ed sikara, nen manaakar ira, ed dalan da ya onarap ed uma. 

Mar 16:13 Et linmara tan sikato so inbaga ra ed saray arum: agda'ra met sinisia. 

Mar 16:14 Tan kaonoran pinmatnag ed saray labinsakey lanlamang a babangatan to nen manyudyurong ira ed pananganan; et sikara so binalaw to ed kaandian na pananisia ra tan say kaawetan na puso ra, lapu'd agda sinisia so akanengneng ed sikato nen kayari to ya inmoli la. 

Mar 16:15 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo ed amin a mundo, tan ipolong yo so evangelio ed lapag a pinalsa. 

Mar 16:16 Say manisia tan nabinyagan sikato so nilaban naani; balet say agmanisia nadusa naani. 

Mar 16:17 Et saraya a tanda ontombok ira ed saray manisia: dia ed ngaran ko manpapaway ira naani na demonios; mansalita'ra naani na saray balo a pansasalita; 

Mar 16:18 Mansingkat ira na ule-uleg, tan no oninum ira na bengatla a makapatey, sikato ag to ra anoen; itapew da naani so saray lima ra ed saray agmakayari, et onabig ira. 

Mar 16:19 Ontan la say Katawan a Jesus, kayari to ya akisalita ed sikara, sikato so naawat ed tawen, tan imyorong ed nikawanan na Dios. 

Mar 16:20 Et pinmaway ira, tan nanpulong ira ed angan-iner, a say Katawan akikimey ed sikara, tan pinaletan to so salita na saray tanda ya sinmaginonor. Amen. 

PANGASINENSE ACTS


Act 1:1 Say inmuna a tongtong ginawak O Teofilo, nipaakar ed amin ya ingapo nen Jesus a ginawa tan inbangat, 

Act 1:2 Anga ed agew na inkaawa'to ed tagey, kayari inpangiter to na gangan ed panamegley na Espiritu Santo ed saray apqstoles a pinili to: 

Act 1:3 Ed sikara met, kayari inkairirap to, pinmanengneng a mabilay, ed dakel a pamintuaan, a pinmatnag ed sikara ed loob na apataploy agew, tan akisalita ed sikara na saray bengatla nipaakar ed panarian na Dios: 

Act 1:4 Et, nen akitipon ed sikara, inbilin to ed sikara ya ag-ira onalis ed Jerusalem, ingen alagden da so sipan na Ama a sinalitaton nadngel yo ed siak, inkuan to: 

Act 1:5 Ta si Juan peteg aminyag na danum; sikayo balet nabinyagan kayo na Espiritu Santo ed aliwa Ian dakel ya agew a manlapu ed natan. 

Act 1:6 Sikara sirin, nen walara ya atipon, tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da: Katawan, ipawil mo so panarian ed Israel ed sayan panaon? 

Act 1:7 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Ag nipabtang ed sikayo so pikabat na saray panaon ono kinepeg, ya ingeted na Ama ed pakaoley to'n dili. 

Act 1:8 Balet mangawat kayo na pakayari, no onsabi ed sikayo so Espiritu Santo: et sikayo so tasik ed Jerusalem, tan ed amin a Judea tan Samaria, tan anga ed kasampotan na dalin. 

Act 1:9 Et nen inkuan to so saraya'n bengatla, nipatagey a sankanengneng da; et sikatoy inawat na sakey a lurem a sinaniban to ed kamataan da. 

Act 1:10 Et nen sankanengneng da so tawen legan ya oonla, nia, duara'n lalaki so inmabay ed sikara a sikakawes ira na ampoti; 

Act 1:11 Ya inkuan da met: Lalaki a taga Galilea, akin ya akaalagey kayo ya onnenengneng ed tawen? saya si Jesus, a naawat ed tawen a nanlapu'd sikayo, ontan so isabi to onong na anengneng yo ya inyakar to ed tawen. 

Act 1:12 Saman la ra pinmawil ed Jerusalem nanlapu ed palandey ya inngaran na Kaolivaan, ya asinger ed Jerusalem, ya akaren ed agew a sabaton. 

Act 1:13 Et nen akoloob ira, sinmegep ira ed silir ya atagtagey, a diman so panaayaman da; di Pedro tan Juan tan Santiago tan Andres; Felipe tan Tomas, Bartolome tan Mateo, Santiago ya anak nen Alfeo, tan Simon Zelotes, tan Judas ya anak nen Santiago. 

Act 1:14 Saraya'n amin nansiansia ra ed sakey a kanonotan ed pikakasi, pati saray bibii, tan si Maria ya ina nen Jesus, tan pati saray agagito. 

Act 1:15 Et dia ed saraya'n agew, si Pedro inmalagey ed pegley na agagi, tan inkuan to (et wala so sakey a karakel na to too a nantitipon, singa sanlasus tan duamplo). 

Act 1:16 Agagi, akaokolan ya asumpal so sulat ya sinalita na Espiritu Santo ed sangi nen David nipaakar ed Judas, a sjkato so angitonton ed saray angerel ed Jesus. 

Act 1:17 Ta apibilang ed sikatayo, tan inawa'to so nabebetangan to ed sayan ministerio. 

Act 1:18 (Bang sayan too akala na sakey ya uma tumang na kaugsan to: et nen naplag ya olsong, tinmerak ed pegley, tan abuyak so amin a pai'to. 

Act 1:19 Et sikato so akabatan na saray amin a manaayam ed Jerusalem; ed ontan a saman ya uma inngaran ed salita'ra na Aceldam, a salanti, Say uma na dala.) 

Act 1:20 Ta nisulat ed libro na saray Salmos, Nagawan atainan komon so ayaman to, Tan angapo so manayam ed sikato:Tan: Alaen na sananey komon so betang to. 

Act 1:21 Ed saray totoo sirin ya akiolop ed sikatayo ed amin ya agew a say Katawan a si Jesus linmoob tan pinmaway ya iba tayo, 

Act 1:22 Nanlapud inpaminyag nen Juan, anga ed agew ya inkitagey to a nanlapu ed sikatayo, sakey ed saraya so nagawa a tasi, ya ibatayo nipaakar ed inkioli to ed bilay. 

Act 1:23 Et sikara so angitoro na duara, si Jose ya inngaran a Barsabas, natatawag na Matunong, tan si Matias. 

Act 1:24 Et sikara so akikasi a kuan da: Sika, Katawan, a kabat mo so kapusoan na amin a totoo, ipanengneng mo no dinan kasi pilien mo ed sarayan dua. 

Act 1:25 A mangawat na betang ed sayan ministerio tan inkaapostol, sikaton naplagan nen Judas, pian onla ed pasen ton dili. 

Act 1:26 Et sikara so inpanalaan da na palar, et naplag so palar ed kinen Matias: et nibilang ed saray labinsakey ya apostoles. 



Act 2:1 Et sanen sinmabi agew na Pentecostes, walara ya amin ya atipon ed saksakey a pasen. 

Act 2:2 Et kapagdakan sinmabi a nanlapu ed tawen so sakey a tanol a singa sakey a dagem a mabiskeg a sinmabi a maksil, et pinano to so sankaabungan a kawalaan dan akayurong. 

Act 2:3 Et pinmatnag ed sikara so diladila a singa apuy a niotob, et dinmapo ed tapew na sinansakey ed sikara. 

Act 2:4 Et sikaray napno ya amin na Espiritu Santo, et ginmapo ra a nansalita na salitan nagsikasikmat onong na inpangiter ed sikara na Espiritu a pakapansalita. 

Act 2:5 Et walara nen saman dia ed Jerusalem so masisimpit a lalaki a taga Judea, a nanlapu ra ed lapag a nacion ed lepsag na tawen. 

Act 2:6 Et sanen nadngel so sayan tanol, nantitipon so karaklan, et nikel-kelawan ira, lapu'd sikara so narengel da a mansalita a sinansakey ed salita ran dili. 

Act 2:7 Et atalagnaw ira tan nikelawan ira ya amin, a kuan da; Nia, ag ira kasi Galileo so saraya'n amin a mansasalita? 

Act 2:8 Panon sirin a sikara so narengel tayo a mansalita so sakey tan sakey ed salita a nianakan tayo a dili? 

Act 2:9 A taga Partia, tan taga Media, tan taga Elam, tan sikami a manaayam ed Mesopotamia, ed Judea, tan ed Capadocia, ed Ponto, tan ed Asia. 

Act 2:10 Ed Frigia tan Pamfilia, ed Egipto tan ed saray sakop na Libia ya wala ed abay na Cirene, tan saray nanlapu ed Roma, saray Judio-man tan tinmombok ed inkajudio. 

Act 2:11 Saray taga Creta tan Arabia, sikara so narengel tayo a mansalita ed salita tayo a dili nipaakar ed saray makapakelaw a gawa na Dios. 

Act 2:12 Bt atalagnaw ira tan sikara so nanduarua ya amin a kuan na sakey tan sakey: anto so kabaliksan na saya? 

Act 2:13 Balet saray arum balbalawen da ra a kuan da: Napno ra na balo'n alak. 

Act 2:14 Balet sanen manalalagey si Pedro, pati saray labinsakey, inkasil to so voces to, tan nansalita ed sikara a nankuan: Sikayon lalaki a taga Judea, tan sikayon amin a manaayam ed Jerusalem, saya so amtaen yo, tan dengel yo so saray salitak. 

Act 2:15 Ta ag-iraya abuek, onong na isip-yo, ta horas a komatlo labat ed agew; 

Act 2:16 No ag ingen sikato ya so inbaga nen profeta Joel, 

Act 2:17 Et nagawa ed saray kaonoran ya agew, kuan na Dios, Yibung ko so Espirituk ed amin a laman: Et saray anak yon lalaki tan bibii manprofeta ra naani, Et saray balolaki yo makanengneng ira na paspasingawey, Et saray mamasiken yo mankogip ira na kogip: 

Act 2:18 On, tan ed saray aripen ko a lalaki tan bibii, ed saratan ya agew, Yibung ko so Espirituk; et manprofeta ra naani: 

Act 2:19 Et mangipatnag ak naani na saray makapakelaw ed tagey ed tawen, Tan saray tanda ed lepsag ed dalin; Dala tan apuy, tan alingasew na asewek: 

Act 2:20 Say banwa magmaliw a bilunget naani, Et say bulan magmaliw naani a dala, Dia'd arapen na isabi agew na Katawan, Saman baleg tan ban tog ya agew: 

Act 2:21 Et nagawa ya amin ya ontawag ed ngaran na Katawan, nilaban ira. 

Act 2:22 Sikayon lalaki a taga Israel, dengel yo so saraya'n salita: Si Jesus a taga Nazaret, laki ya inabobonan na Dios ed sikayo ed panamegley na saray gawa a makapanyari, tan makapakelaw, tan saray tanda a ginawa na Dios ed panamegley to, dia ed sikayo, onong na kabat yo met la, 

Act 2:23 So saya'n niyawat lapu ed tinandaan a linawa tan lawas a pikakabat na Dios, pinate'yo tan inpasak yo ed cruz ed panamegley na lima na saray maramsak a to too: 

Act 2:24 Say Dios, balet, pinaoli to ed bi-lay, a naokpos ed saray irap na patey: lapu'd ag nayari a pokpokan na patey. 

Act 2:25 Ta in kuan nen David nipaakar ed sikato, Sankanengneng ko lawas so Katawan ed arap ko; Ta wala ed nikawanan ko, pian agak naani nagalaw: 

Act 2:26 Kanian linmiket so pusok, tan ginmayaga so dilak; Laot ni say laman ko manpainawa ed ilalo: 

Act 2:27 Ta agmo paolian so kamarerwak a manayam ed Hades, Tan agmo met yabuloy a say Santom nanengneng to so ka-bolok. 

Act 2:28 Inpakabat mo ed siak so saray dalan na bilay; Panoen mo ak naani gayaga ed arap mo. 

Act 2:29 Agagi, nayarian ko ya ibaga ed sikayo dia ed mabolos, so nipaakar ed patriarka David, ya inatey tan inponpon, et say lobok to wala ed sikatayo anga ed saya'n agew. 

Act 2:30 Et bangta sikato'y sakey a profeta, tan lapu'd amta to ya insipan na Dios ed sikato ed sakey a samba, a dia ed saray bunga na banel to wala naani payurongen to a sakey dia ed trono to; 

Act 2:31 Sikato, nen apatnag to so saya, sinalita to so nipaakar ed kioli ed bilay nen Cristo, ya ag napaolian ed Hades, ni say laman to met agto nanengneng so kabolok. 

Act 2:32 Saya'n Jesus pinaoli Dios ed bilay, a sikato so natasian mi ya amin. 

Act 2:33 Nen nitandoro sirin ed nikawanan na Dios, tan nen inawa'to ed Ama so sipan na Espiritu Santo, inibung to so saya, a sikato so nanengneng yo tan narengel yo. 

Act 2:34 Ta si David ag sinmegep ed saray tawen; balet sikato'n dili kuan to: Kuan na Katawan ed Katawan ko: Yurong ka ed nikawanan, 

Act 2:35 Anga ed pangawak ed saray kabusol mo a gagatinan na saray salim. 

Act 2:36 Amtaen a peteg siriii, na lapag ya abung na Israel, a saya'n Jesus ya inpasak yo ed cruz, ginawa na Dios a sikato so Katawan tan Cristo. 

Act 2:37 Et nen narengel da so saya nanermen ira ed kapusoan da, tan inkuan da ed Pedro tan saray arum ya apostoles: Lalaki ya agagi anto'y gawaen mi? 

Act 2:38 Et si Pedro kuan to ed sikara; Magbabawi kayo, tan manbinyag so sinansakey ed sikayo ed ngaran nen Jesu-Cristo, pian pakapaandian na kasalanan yo: et awaten yo naani langkap na Espiritu Santo. 

Act 2:39 Ta onkanad sikayo so sipan, tan ed saray anak yo tan ed amin na saray wala ed arawi; salanti ed amin a tawagen na Dios a Katawan tayo. 

Act 2:40 Et dia ed arum ni a dakel a salita pinatua to, tan sinimbawa to ra, a kuan to: Ilaban yo so inkasikayo ed saya'n pikewet a kapolian. 

Act 2:41 Saraman sirin so angawat na salita to, nanbinyag ira; et niarum ed saray binangatan ed saman ya agew, so ngalngalin talon libo a kamarerua. 

Act 2:42 Et nansiansiara'n malet ed bangat na saray apostoles, tan ed panmomoyong tan panagpisag na tinapay tan ed saray pikakasi. 

Act 2:43 Et sinmabi so takot ed balang kamarerua; et dakel a makapakelaw tan saray tanda so ginawa na saray apostoles. 

Act 2:44 Et amin so saray anisia nanti tipon ira, tan ami' bengatla nanmomoyongan da; 

Act 2:45 Et inlako ra so saray kayamanan tan kayarian da, tan inyotob da ed sikara ya amin ed onong na kaokolan na sinansakey. 

Act 2:46 Et inagewagew, ya nansiansia ra a malet ed sakey a kanonotan ed dalem na templo, tan ed panagpisag da na tinapay ed abung, inalara so kanen a malikeliket tan sililinis so kapusoan da, 

Act 2:47 Ya ingalgalang da so Dios tan kakaliktanen ira ya amin na ombaley, Et say Katawan inyarum to ed sikara ya inagewagew so saray nilaban. 



Act 3:1 Et di Pedro tan Juan linma ra ed templo ed horas na pikakasi, salanti komasiam ya horas. 

Act 3:2 Et niakar so sakey a toon piley a nanlapu ed eges nen ina to, a sikato so inyan da ya inagewagew ed abay na pinto na templo a manngaran na Marakep, pian mipayabol ed saray onloob ed templo; 

Act 3:3 Saya, nen anengneng to di Pedro tan Juan ya ngalngali onloob ed templo, kinmerew ed sikara napayabol. 

Act 3:4 Et si Pedro, nen sikato so nineng neng to, ya pati ibato a si Juan, kuanto: Nengneng mo kami. 

Act 3:5 Et sikara so ninengneng to, a siaalagar a mangawat na bengat la ed sikara. 

Act 3:6 Et si Pedro inkuan to: Angapo ed siak so angan pilak tan balitok; balet say wala ed siak sikato so iter ko ed sika. Dia ed ngaran nen JesuCristo a taga Nazaret, manakar ka. 

Act 3:7 Et sikato so binenbenan to ed lima ton kawanan, et sikato so pinaalagey to: et tampol a binmiskeg so saray salito tan kalitkali'to. 

Act 3:8 Et nen linmokso, inmalagey, tan ginmapo a nanakar; et linmoob ya akiolop ed sikara dia ed templo, a nanakar, tan manlokso, tan igalgalang to so Dios. 

Act 3:9 Et saray amin ya ombaley sikato'y anengneng da a manaakar tan mangigagalgalang ed Dios: 

Act 3:10 Et abirbjr da a sikato'man so manyudyurong a mipapayabol ed abay na Pinto a Marakep na templo: et napno ra na kelaw tan takot ed saman so agawa ed sikato. 

Act 3:11 Et nen akitabinan ed kindi Pedro tan Juan, amin na saray ombaley batik ira a linma ed sikara ed pinto ya inngaran na pinto nen Salomon, a sitatalagnaw ira. 

Act 3:12 Et saya nen anengneng nen Pedro, inmebat ed ombaley: Lalaki'n taga Israel, akin et nikelawan kayo ed saya'n too? odino, akin et ilimgis yo so mata yo ed sikami, a singa lapu ed pakayari odino kasantosan mi, pinaakar mi so saya'n too? 

Act 3:13 Say Dios nen Abraham, tan Isaac, tan Jacob, say Dios na saray atateng tayo, pinagloria to so Aripen to a Jesus, a sikato so inyawat yo, tan pinaandi yo ed arap nen Pilato nen labay to warin bolosan. 

Act 3:14 Sikayo balet inlikod yo so Masanto tan Matunong, et kinerew yo ya niiter ed sikayo so sakey ya akapatey, 

Act 3:15 Et pinate'yo so Makan gawa na bilay; a pinaoli na Dios ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inaatey, a sikato so tasian mi. 

Act 3:16 Et lapu'd pananisia ed ngaran to, pinabiskeg na ngaran to so saya'n too a nanengneng yo tan kabkabat yo: on, say pananisia ya wala ed panamegley to initer to ed saya'n too sa saya'n ayadyari ya inkatambal ed arap yo ya amin. 

Act 3:17 Natan balet, agagi, amtak a lapu ed ag-yo pikakabat ginawa yo, so singa ginawa met na saray makaule'yo. 

Act 3:18 Balet saray bengatla'n inpakabat na Dios nen inmuna ed sangi na saray profetas, salanti panirap nen Cristo, onia so inkasumpal to. 

Act 3:19 Magbabawi kayo sirin, tan manpataoli kayo, pian napunas so saray kasalanan yo: pian onsabi so saray panaon na painawa a manlapu ed arap na Katawan; 

Act 3:20 Tan pian ibaki to so Cristo a tinandaan nipaakar ed sikayo, salanti Jesus: 

Act 3:21 A sikato so kaokolan ya awaten na tawen anga ed saray panaon a kipawil na ami' ganagana a sinalita na Dios ed sangi na saray masantos a profeta a nanbilay nan lapu'd gapo. 

Act 3:22 Ta si Moises tua kuan to; Say Katawan a Dios-yo ipaalagey to ed sikayo so sakey a profeta manlapu ed saray agagi yo a singa siak: sikato so denglen yo naani ed antokaman a salitaen to ed sikayo. 

Act 3:23 Et nagawa ya amin a kamarerua ya ag ondengel ed satan a profeta nabagbag naani a sigpot ed saray ombaley. 

Act 3:24 On, et amin so saray profetas met manlapu ed Samuel tan saray sinmaginonor ed sikato, ami' nansalita, inpakabat da so saraya'n agew met. 

Act 3:25 Sikayo ray anak na saray profetas, tan say sipan a ginawa na Dios ed saray atateng yo, a nankuan ed Abraham: et dia ed polim naben dicionan so amin a sankabaley dia ed dalin. 

Act 3:26 Say Dios, kayari inpamaoli to ed bilay ed Aripen to a si Jesus, sikato so imbaki to ya inmuna ed sikayo, pian bendicionan to kayo, ya iyarawito so sinansakey ed sikayo ed saray kaugsan yo. 



Act 4:1 Et lelegda'n mansasalita ed ombaley, sikara so nilo a ginotgot na saray sacerdotes tan say capitan ed templo, tan saray Saduceos, 

Act 4:2 A sigogonigon ira'n toloy lapu'd ibabangat da so saray ombaley tan ipapakabat da so kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey, dia ed ngaran nen Jesus. 

Act 4:3 Et inerel da ra tan inyan da rad pangawan anga ed ongendan ya agew, ta ngarem la nen saman. 

Act 4:4 Balet dakel ed saray akadngel na salita so anisia, et say bilang na lalaki sinmapot a limanlibo. 

Act 4:5 Et agawa ed on gendan ya agew a nantitipon ed Jerusalem so saray mamakauley da, tan saray mamasiken tan saray escribas; 

Act 4:6 Tan si Anas a manonaan a sacerdote, tan si Caifas, tan Juan tan Alejandro, tan ami' na manonaan a sacerdote. 

Act 4:7 Et nen inyanda ra ed pegley da, tinepet da ed sikara: Anto a pakayari, odino siopa ngaran so nangawaan yo na saya.

Act 4:8 Insan si Pedro, a napno na Espiritu Santo, inkuan to ed sikara: Mamakauley ed baley, tan mamasiken, 

Act 4:9 No sikami nasalaysay natan nipaakar ed maong a gawa ya agawa ed sakey a too'n ag-makayari, no anto a pakayari inabigan na say an too; 

Act 4:10 Amtaen yo ya amin, tan lapag na baley ya Israel, ya dia ed ngaran nen Jesu-Cristo a taga Nazaret, ya sikato so impasak yo ed cruz, et si kato so pinaoli Dios ed bilay dia ed saray inaatey, lapu'd sikato saya'n too wadia'n makmaksil ed arap yo. 

Act 4:11 Sikato so bato ya inpulisa'yo a managpaalagey na abung, et sikato so agawa'n olo ed suyoc. 

Act 4:12 Et angapo so arum ya kilabanan: ta angapo so arum a ngaran ed lepsag na tawen, ya niiter ed saray totoo, a nayarin kilabanan tayo. 

Act 4:13 Et nen anengneng da so kabayanian di Pedro tan Juan, tan atebek da ra a totoon andi aral tan kabanyakan, nikelawan ira, et abidbir da ran akiolop ed Jesus. 

Act 4:14 Et lapu'd sankanengneng da so too ya atambal, ya akaalagey ed pegley da, angapo so nayarian da a salitaen ya isumpa. 

Act 4:15 Balet nen sikara so ginangan da ya ompaway ed singbatan, nansasalita ra a bokor. 

Act 4:16 A kuan da: Anto'y gawaen tayo ed saraya'n totoo? ta peteg ed amin a manaayam ed Jerusalem, sakey a bantog a pakelaw so agawa ed panamegley da, et sikato so ag tayo nayari'n paandien. 

Act 4:17 Balet, pian ag la nibuyak ed baley, isebel tayo ed sikara manlapu'd natan ya ag ira misalita ed siopaman dia ed sayan ngaran. 

Act 4:18 Et sikaray tinawagan da tan inbilin da ed sikara ya ag da salitaen a balot odino manbangat ed ngaran nen Jesus. 

Act 4:19 Ingen di Pedro tan Juan, nen inmebat ira, kuan da ed sikara: No katunongan kasi ed arap na Dios so pangonor a manona ed sikayo nen say Dios, okom yo pa; 

Act 4:20 Ta agmi nayari'n ag salitaen so anengneng tan nadngel mi. 

Act 4:21 Et sikara, nen ayari da la ingagaem ira na nagkalaloni, inbolos da ra, bangta andi napanpamaakaran da a manusa ed sikara, nisengeg ed ombaley, amin a totoo ingalgalang da so Dios, nisengeg ed saman ya agawa. 

Act 4:22 Ta samay toon akagawaan na sayan makapakelaw ya inkatambal, masolok ya apataplo so taon to. 

Act 4:23 Et nen nablos lara, linmara ed saray ibiba ra, et inulit da ya amin so inbaga ed sikara na saray manonaan a sacerdotes tan saray mamasiken. 

Act 4:24 Et sanen nadngel da so saya nankakasakey-ira, ya angipaatagey na voces da ed Dios a kuan da: O Katawan, sika ya amalsa na tawen tan dalin, tan say dayat, tan saray amin ya wala ed sikara: 

Act 4:25 A lapu'd Espiritu Santo, dia ed sangi nen ama mi'n David ya aripen mo, inkuan mo: Akin ya inmalsa so saray Gentiles Tan saray ombaley mannunot ira na bengabengatla ya andi kana? 

Act 4:26 Akitulong iray arari ed dalin, Et saray pangolo nantitipon ira a nankakasakey, Sumpa ed Katawan tan sumpa ed Pinuyokan to: 

Act 4:27 Ta tua nantitipon ira ed sayan ciudad di Herodes tan Poncio Pilato, pati saray Gentiles tan ombaley ed Israel, a sinmumpa ed masanto ya Aripen mo a Jesus, sikato a pinuyokan mo, 

Act 4:28 Pian gawaen da ya so amin a say limam tan say linawam ingeter da a nagawa. 

Act 4:29 Et natan, Katawan, nengnengmo so saray gagaem da; tan yabuloy mo ed saray aripen mo a salitaen da a makmakpel so salitam. 

Act 4:30 Legan ya yunat mo so limam ya manambal, tan pian nagawa so saray tanda tan pakelaw lapu ed ngaran na masanto'n Aripen mo a Jesus. 

Act 4:31 Et nen akapikasi la ra, saman so pasen a nantitiponan da ginmiwgiw; et napno ra ya amin na Espiritu Santo, et sinalita ra so salita na Dios a makmakpel. 

Act 4:32 Et saksakey so puso tan kamarerua na lapag ya anisia: et angapo so nansalita a kien to so bengatla ya wala ed sikato'n dili, no ag saray amin a bengatla moyong da ya amin. 

Act 4:33 Et saray apostoles tinasian da ed baleg a pakayari so inkioli ed bilay na Katawan a Jesus: et baleg a gracia so wala ed sikara'n amin. 

Act 4:34 Ta angapo ed sikara so kinmulang; ta amin ya walaan na kaumaan odino kaabungan inlako da ra, tan inawit da so bili na saray bengatla ya inlako ra, 

Act 4:35 Et inyan da ed saray salian na apostoles: et agawa so inpangiotob ed sinansakey, onong ed wala a nakaokolan na siopaman. 

Act 4:36 Et si Jose, ya inngaran na saray apostoles na Bernabe, (a no ipatalos kabaliksan to so anak na ligliwa;, sakey a Levita, too a tobo ed Chipre, 

Act 4:37 Lapu'd wala so sakey ya uma to, sikato so inlako to, et inawi'to so pilak, tan inyan to ed salian day apostoles. 



Act 5:1 Balet sakey a laki a manngaray Ananias, pati si Safira ya asawa to, inlako to so sakey a kayarian to. 

Act 5:2 Et angyamot na nanlakuan, a saya kabat met na asawa to, et inawi'to so sakey a kabiangan na nanlakuan to, tan sikato'y inyanto ed salian na saray apostoles. 

Act 5:3 Balet kuan nen Pedro: Ananias, akin a pinano nen Satanas so pusom a mantila ka ed Espiritu Santo tan angyamot ka na bili na dalin? 

Act 5:4 Nen ag mo ni inlako, ag kasi wala ed sika? et nen alako la, ag kasi wala ed pakauley mo? Akin kasi a ninonot mo so saya'n bengatla ed pusom? Ag ka nantila ed saray totoo no ag dia ed Dios. 

Act 5:5 Et kadngel nen Ananias ed saraya'n salita alokbob tan inatey; et sinmabi baleg a takot ed saray amin ya akadngel na saya. 

Act 5:6 Et inmalagey so saray babalolaki tan binalkot da, et sikato'y inpaway da tan inpompon da. 

Act 5:7 Et nen linmabas so singa taloy horas, linmoob met so asawa to, ya ag to amta no anto so agawa. 

Act 5:8 Et si Pedro inmebat ed sikato: Ibagam ed siak no inlako yo so uma ed ontan a bili. Et inkuan to: On, dia ed ontan a bili. 

Act 5:9 Balet inkuan nen Pedro ed sikato, Akin a nankasakey kayo a manokso ed Espiritu na Katawan? Nia, wala ra ed pinto so salisali na saray angiponpon ed asawam, et ipaway da ka naani. 

Act 5:10 Et tampol ya alokbob ed saray salian to, tan inatey: et linmoob so saray babalolaki et asabi ra ya inatey, et inpaway da tan impompon da ed abay nen asawa to. 

Act 5:11 Et sinmabi baleg a takot ed amin ya Iglesia, tan ed saray amin ya akadngel na saraya'n bengatla. 

Act 5:12 Et dakel so saray tanda tan makapakelaw ya agawa ed ombaley lapu ed lima na saray apostoles; et walara'n amin a nankakasakey ed pinto nen Salomon. 

Act 5:13 Et dia ed saray arum angapo'y akapangitepel a mitipon ed sikara; angaman sikara'y indaydayew na saray ombaley;

Act 5:14 Et saray mananisia ed Katawan lalo nin naaruman ira, ya dinmakel so bilang na saray lalaki tan bibii; 

Act 5:15 Dia ed onman la ya inpaway da so saray agmakayari ed daladalan, et inyan dara ed saray dokolan tan dalagan, pian dia ed ilabas nen Pedro, angan say anino to bengat nasiruman to so arum ed sikara. 

Act 5:16 Et dakel so dinmago a katooan ed Jerusalem a nanlapu ed saray binaleybaley a kaabay to, a sankaawit da so saray agmakayari, tan papairapen na saray espiritu a marumsis; et atambal ira ya amin. 

Act 5:17 Et nen inmalagey so manonaan a sacerdote tan saray ibiba to, (a sikara so tinmombok ed saray Saduceos), napno ra na siblet, 

Act 5:18 Et inerel da so saray apostoles, et inyanda ra ed panangipangawan na baley. 

Act 5:19 Balet sakey ya angel na Katawan inlukas to so kapot na panangipangawan dia ed labi, et pinapaway to ra, a kuan to: 

Act 5:20 Nakila, et alagey kayo ed templo, tan salitaen yo ed saray ombaley so amin a salita na sayan Bilay. 

Act 5:21 Nen nadngel da so saya, linmoob ira ed templo ed kabkabuasan et nanbangat ira. Balet nen sinmabi manonaan na saray sacerdotes tan saray ibiba to, tinawag da so singbatan, tan saray amin a mamasiken na saray anak na Israel, et nanbaki ra ed panangipangawan, pian alaen da so saray apostoles. 

Act 5:22 Balet, nen sinmabi so saray oficiales ag da ra asabi ed panangipangawan, et pinmawil ira, tan inpakabat da, 

Act 5:23 A kuan da: Say panangipangawan tua asabi mi ya akakaput a malet, et saray bantay manalalagey ira ed arap na kaput, balet sanen inlukas mi, angapo so nalmo mi ed loob. 

Act 5:24 Et nen nadngel na manonaan na saray sacerdotes tan makaoley ed templo so saraya'n salita, nanduarua ra nipaakar ed sikara, no anto so kasumpalan na saya. 

Act 5:25 Et sinmabi sakey a too ya angipakabat ed sikara a nankuan: Nia, saray lalaki ya inpokok yo ed panangipangawan, wala ra ed templo ya akaalagey tan manbabangat ira ed saray ombaley. 

Act 5:26 Diad saman, linma so capitan pati saray oficiales et inawi'to ra ya andi pasoot, ta antakot da 'ray ombaley ompan tupaken da ra. 

Act 5:27 Et nen inyakar da ra, sikara so insaklang da ed singbatan: et say manonaan a sacerdote tinepe'to ed sikara. 

Act 5:28 A kuan to: Inbilin mi ed sikayo a malet ya ag kayo manbangat ed saya'n ngaran: et nia, pinano yo so Jerusalem na bangat yo, et getma yo ya ipakasalanan ed sikami so dala na saya'n too. 

Act 5:29 Balet inmebat si Pedro tan saray apostoles a kuan da, Nakaokolan ya enoren mi so Dios, nen saray totoo. 

Act 5:30 Say Dios na saray atateng tayo pinaoli to ed bilay si Jesus a pinate' yo ya inpasak ed sakey a kiew. 

Act 5:31 Sikato so intandoro na Dios ed nikawanan to, a sakey a Principe tan Manangilaban, pian iter to ed Israel so pagbabawi, tan panamaandi kasalanan. 

Act 5:32 Et sikami makatasi na saraya'n bengatla; tan ontan met so Espiritu Santo, a sikato'y initer na Dios ed saray ontulok ed sikato. 

Act 5:33 Balet sanen nadngel da so saya sinmakit so linawa ra, et siningbat da ra a pateyen. 

Act 5:34 Balet sakey a Fariseo, a manngaran na Gamaliel, makabat ed gangan, tan toon magalang ed baley, inmalagey ed pegley na singbatan, et ingangan to ya ipaway da nin magano so saray apostoles. 

Act 5:35 Et kuan to'd sikara: Sikayo, lalaki a taga Israel, manlikas kayo ed gawaen yo ed saraya'n totoo. 

Act 5:36 Ta nen ag ni asabi so saraya'n agew, inmalagey si Teudas, a kuan to sikato'y atagey a too, et tinombok na sakey a bilang na totoo, a ngalngali ran apat a lasus, nen sikatoy inatey saray amin a tinmombok ed si kato abuyak ira, et nagmaliw ira'n andigapo. 

Act 5:37 Kayari to, inmalagey met si Judas a Galileo ed saraman ya agew a panaglista, et arum ed saray totoo so apatombok to ed sikato. Sikato inatey met, et amin so saray tinmombok ed sikato abuyak ira. 

Act 5:38 Et natan kuan ko ed sikayo: Ag yo pibiangan so saraya'n totoo, et paolian yo ra lambengat: ta no saya'n kanonotan odino saya'n gawa nanlapu ed saray totoo, nabuyak naani: 

Act 5:39 Balet no nanlapu ed Dios ag yo ra nayarian a bagbagen; ompan la ingen no ompatnag kayo ya misupakan ed Dios.

Act 5:40 Et inabobonan da so simbawa to, et nen impatawag da so saray apostoles, tan kayari da ra'n nilewet inbilin da ed sikara ya ag da salitaen so ngaran nen Jesus, et inbolos da ra. 

Act 5:41 Sikara siri' pinmaway ed arap na singbatan, a malikeliket iralapu'd kinmana ra a nantepel na baing ed Ngaran nen Jesus. 

Act 5:42 Et inagewagew ed templo tan ed saray kaabungan, ag ira tinmon da a nanbabangat tan nanpupulong a si Jesus et Cristo. 



Act 6:1 Et dia ed sarayan agew, sanen ondadakel so bilang na binangatan, nantalabotob so saray Griego a Judio ya onsumpa ed saray Hebreos, lapu'd saray bibii a babalo ed sikara napapaolian ira ed pannanabangan ya inagewagew. 

Act 6:2 Et saray labindua tinipon da so moyong na saray binangatan, et inkuan da: Ag manepeg a paolian mi so Salita na Dios pian manlinkor kami ed dulang. 

Act 6:3 Anapen yo sirin, agagi, dia ed sikayo so pitora'n lalaki a maong so dengel da, napno na espiritu tan ka-kabatan, a sikara so igaton tayo ed sayan' gawa. 

Act 6:4 Balet mansiansia kami ed pikakasi tan dia ed panangipulong na salita. 

Act 6:5 Et saya'n kanonotan kinaliktan na kalapagan: et pinili ra si Esteban, laki a napno na pananisia tan Espiritu Santo, tan si Felipe, tan Procoro, tan si Nicanor, tan si Timon, tan si Parmenas, tan si Nicolas, taga Antioquia ya apatombok; 

Act 6:6 A sikara so indongo ra ed arap na saray apostoles; et sanen akikasi, ra ingaton da ed sikara so kalimaan da. 

Act 6:7 Et manbaleg so Salita na Dios; et say bilang na saray binangatan dinmakerakel a toloy ed Jerusalem; et baleg ya olop na saray sacerdotes so tinmolok ed pananisia. 

Act 6:8 Et si Esteban napno na gracia tan pakayari, nangawa na ankakabaleg a makapakelaw tan tanda ed saray ombaley. 

Act 6:9 Et inmalagey so arum ed saray wala ed sinagoga inngaran a sinagoga na saray Libertinos, tan saray taga Cirene tan Alejandria, tan saray taga Cilicia tan Asia, ya akisangsangan ira ed Esteban. 

Act 6:10 Balet ag da naraeg so kakabatan tan Espiritu a pisasalita to. 

Act 6:11 Dia ed saman, angupa ra na totoo a nankuan: Sikato so nadngel min nansalita na mabanday a sumpa ed Moises tan sumpa ed Dios. 

Act 6:12 Et ginewgew da so baley, tan saray mamasiken, tan saray escribas; et nen dinogpaan da, sikato'y insagar da, tan inakar ed singbatan, 

Act 6:13 Et angidongo ra na tasi ran matila a nankuan: Saya'n too ag ontonda a mansalita na mabanday a sumpa ed sayan masantos a pasen, tan dia ed gangan: 

Act 6:14 Ta nadngel mi a kuan to, a saya'n Jesus a taga Nazaret bagbagen to so saya naani a pasen, et omanen to naani so ugali ya initer nen Moises ed sikatayo. 

Act 6:15 Et saray amin ya wala a manyudyurong ed singbatan, nen sikato so ninengneng da, apatnag da so lupa to a singa lupa na sakey ya angel. 



Act 7:1 Et say manonaan a sacerdote, inkuan to: Tua kasi so saya a bengatla? 

Act 7:2 Et sikato inmebat: Lalakin agagi, tan atateng, dengel yo: Say Dios na gloria pinmanengneng ed ama tayo a si Abraham, sanen sikatoy wadman ed Mesopotamia, nen ag ni nanayam ed Haran, 

Act 7:3 Et inkuan to ed sikato: Ompaway ka ed dalin mo, tan ed kanayon mo, et onla ka ed dalin ya ipanengneng ko ed sika. 

Act 7:4 Dia ed saman, pinmaway ed dalin ria taga Caldea, et nanayam ed Haran: et manlapud man, sanen inatey so ama to, inyalis na Dios ed saya'n dalin a sikato so panaayaman tayo natan. 

Act 7:5 Et angapoy inter to a tawiren to, angapo, angan say ginatinan na sakey a salito: balet insipan to ed sikato a sayan dalin iter to ed sikato tan ed saray poli to a manlapu ed sikato, nen angapo ni anak to. 

Act 7:6 Tan sinalita na Dios ed sikato so onia a saray poli to sankaili ra naani ed dalin na sananey, et aripenen da ra'd man, tan pairapen da ra ed apat a lasus taon. 

Act 7:7 Siak, balet, okomen ko, kuan na Dios, so nacion a panlinkoran da, et kayari saya, ontainan ira, et manlinkor ira ed Siak ed sayan pasen. 

Act 7:8 Et initer to ed sikato so galsim a sipanan: et dia ed ontan, si Abraham inilalak to si Isaak, et sikato so inpagalsiman to ed komawalo ya agew; et si Isaak inilalak to si Jacob, et si Jacob inilalak to met so saray labindua a patriarca 

Act 7:9 Et saray patriarca, nen sinibletan da, si Jose sikatoy inlako ra pian niakar ed Egipto; say Dios, balet, wala ed sikato, 

Act 7:10 Et inlaban to ed amin a kairapan to, et initdan to na gracia tan kakabatan ed arap nen Faraon, ari ed Egipto; et ingaton to a gobernador ed Egipto tan ed amin ya abung to. 

Act 7:11 Et sinmabi nen saman so eras tan baleg a kairapan ed amin ya Egipto tan Canaan: et saray atateng tayo ag ira akalmo na kanen da. 

Act 7:12 Balet sanen nadngelan nen Jacob ya wala'y trigo ed Egipto, inbaki to'd man so saray atateng tayo ed ona'n danay. 

Act 7:13 Et nen komadua, si Jose inpabidbir la ed saray agagi to; et naamtaan nen Faraon so inkapoli nen Jose. 

Act 7:14 Et nanbaki Jose, et inpatawag to si ama to a Jacob, pati amin a kanayon to, ya pitonplo tan lima ran katao. 

Act 7:15 Et si Jacob linma ed Egipto, et inatey diman, pati saray atateng tayo; 

Act 7:16 Et saray bangkay da inawit da ra ed Sikem, et niyan ira ed lobok a sinaliw nen Abraham ed bili na pilak ed saray anak nen Hemor, et Sikem. 

Act 7:17 Balet sanen asinger la'y panaon na sipan a anambaan na Dios ed Abraham, binmaleg so ombaley tan dinmakel dia ed Egipto, 

Act 7:18 Anga ed inalagey na sananey ya ari ed Egipto, ya agto kabkabat si Jose. 

Act 7:19 Saya, inagamil to so kasiliban ed poli tayo, et pinairap to so saray atateng tayo, pian ibantak da so saray anak da, pian ag ira nabilay. 

Act 7:20 Dia ed saman a panaon nianak si Moises, et sikato so malimgas a tua, et akomisan ed abung nen ama to ed taloran bulan: 

Act 7:21 Et sanen inbantak da, say bii ya anak nen Faraon inala to et kinomisan ton singa anak ton dili. 

Act 7:22 Et abangatan si Moises ed amin a kakabatan na saray taga Egipto; et makapanyari ed saray salita tan gawa to, 

Act 7:23 Et nen mantaon na apat a plo, tinmobo ed puso to so pilalek ya ondalaw ed saray agagi to ya anak nen Israel. 

Act 7:24 Et nen anengneng to so sakey a nairapan ed ag-onkatonongan, sikatoy inlaban to, et imbales to so nilames, a pinatey to so taga Egipto: 

Act 7:25 Et inisip to a natalosan na saray agagi to a say Dios iter to ed sikara so kilalaban ed panamegley na lima to; balet ag da atalosan. 

Act 7:26 Et nen ontombok ya agew, pinmanengneng ed sikara nen mankokolkol ira, a labay to ra komon a pareenen, a kuan to: Lalaki, sanaagi kayo, akit gawen yo so panlalamesan na sakey tan sakey? 

Act 7:27 Balet saman so mangagawa na lames ed kapara to a too sikato so intulak to, a kuan to: Siopa so angigaton ed sika a manuley tan mangokom ed sikami. 

Act 7:28 Labay mo ak lagin pateyen onong na inpamatey mo karoman ed saman so taga Egipto? 

Act 7:29 Et dia ed sayan salita binmatik si Moises, et linma a nanngilin ed dalin na Madian; et diman inilalak to so duara ya anak a lalaki. 

Act 7:30 Et nen asumpal so apat a plo'y taon, pinmayawar ed sikato so sakey ya angel na Katawan ed lawak na palandey na Sinai ed dalang na apuy na sakey a zarza. 

Act 7:31 Et nen anengneng nen Moises, nikelawan ed saman a nengneng: et nen sinminger a nengnengen to, sinmabi ed sikato so voces na Katawan, 

Act 7:32 Siak so Dios na saray atateng mo, say Dios nen Abraham, tan si Isaak, tan si Jacob, Ginmiwgiw si Moises, et ag to nitepel a ninengnengneng. 

Act 7:33 Et kuan na Katawan ed sikato, Ekal mo so sapin ed saray salim, ta say pasen a kawalaan mo dalin a masantos. 

Act 7:34 Anengneng ko a peteg so kairapan na baley ko ya wala ed Egipto, tan nadngel ko so nangis da, et inmaksebak. a mangilaban ed sikara; et natan galadia, ta ibaki ta ka ed Egipto. 

Act 7:35 Saya'n Moises, a sikato so ag da binidbir a kuan da: Siopa so angigaton ed sika a manuley tan mangokom ed sikami? sikato so inbaki na Dios a pangolo tan manondon, ed panamegley na lima na angel a pinmatnag ed sikato ed zarza. 

Act 7:36 Saya'n too sikara so intonton to ed inpangawa to na makapakelaw tan tanda dia ed Egipto, tan dia ed Ambalanga'n Dayat, tan dia ed kalawakan ed apat a plo'y taon. 

Act 7:37 Saya si Moises a nankuan ed saray anak nen Israel: Say Dios ipaalagey to ed sikayo so profeta a manlapu ed saray agagi yo, a singa siak. 

Act 7:38 Saya so wala ed Iglesia ed lawak, pati angel ya akisalsalita ed sikato, ed palandey na Sinai, tan pati saray atateng tayo, a sikato so angawat na salita na bilay pian iter to ra ed sikatayo: 

Act 7:39 A sikato so ag da nilabay a tinulok na saray atateng tayo, no ag ingen inpulisay da et dia ed saray kapusoan da pinmawil ira ed Egipto. 

Act 7:40 A kuan da ed Aaron: Igawaan mo kami na dirios a mamangolo ed sikami, ta saya so Moises, ya angipaway ed sikami ed dalin na Egipto, ag mi amta no anto so agawa ed sikato. 

Act 7:41 Et nan-gawa ra na sakey a kinonvaca a kilaw ed saraman ya agew, et inpatanir da so bagat ed saman so talintao et nanliketan da so gawa na kalimaan da'n dili. 

Act 7:42 Balet say Dios binmeneg et pinaolian to ra a nanlinkor ed ejercito na tawen; onong na nisulat ed libro na saray prof etas: Angibagat kayo kasi ed siak na saray pinatey ya ayayep tan arum ni a patanir, Dia ed lawak ed apat a plo'y taon, oh! abung nen Israel? 

Act 7:43 Et inala yo so tabernaculo hen Moloch, Tan say bitewen nen dios a Refan: Taltalintao a ginawa ya pian igalang yo ra: Et iyakar ta kayo naani ed labas na Babilonia. 

Act 7:44 Say tabernaculo na panagtasi wala ed saray atateng tayo nen wadman ira ed kalawakan, onong na ingangan to'n may nankuan ed Moises, a sikato'y gawaen to onong na pangaligan ya anengneng ko. 

Act 7:45 Sikato a saray atateng tayo met, sanen nabtangan ira, inloob da a pati Josue nen nilooban da so kayarian na saray naciones a pinatainan na Dios ed arap na atateng, tayo, anga ed saray agew nen David; 

Act 7:46 Ya akal mo na gracia ed arap na Dios, et akikasi a niabuloy ed sikato so pakaromog na panayaman na Dios nen Jacob. 

Act 7:47 Balet si Salomon so angipaalagey ed sikato na abung a sakey. 

Act 7:48 Angaman ontan say Sankatagian ag manayam ed saray abung a ginawa na lima, onong na kuan na profeta: 

Act 7:49 Say tawen sikato so tronok, Et say dalin so gagatinan na saray salik: Anto ya abung kasi ipaalagey yo naani ed siak? kuan na Katawan; Odino, anto kasi a pasen so painawaan ko? 

Act 7:50 Ag kasi ginawa na limak so saraya ya amin a bengatla? 

Act 7:51 Sikayon anawet a beklew tan ag agalsiman ed puso tan layalayag, susumpaen yo lawas so Espiritu Santo; onong na ginawa na saray atateng yo ontan met so gawen yo. 

Act 7:52 Siopa kasi ed saray profetas so ag pinasegsegang na saray atateng yo? et pinatey da so saray angipasakbay ya angibaga na idateng na Matunong; a sikato natan so nagmaliwan yon liputan tan managpatey. 

Act 7:53 Sikayo ya angawat na gangan, singa say bilin na saray angeles, et ag yo inonor. 

Act 7:54 Et nen nadngel da so sarayan bengatla, napno ra na sanok ed kapusoan da, et manngayet so saray ngipen da ya onsumpa ed sikato. 

Act 7:55 Sikato balet a napno na Espiritu Santo, tinmangay a maligen ed tawen, et anengneng to so gloria na Dios, tan si Jesus a manalalagey ed kawanan na Dios, 

Act 7:56 Et inkuan to: Nia, nengnengnengen ko so katawenan ya alukasan tan say Anak na too a manalalagey ed kawanan na Dios. 

Act 7:57 Balet naningal ira na maksil, tan sinakbungan da so kalagayan da et aminpinsan a dinogpaan da; 

Act 7:58 Et sikato so pinapaway da ed paway na ciudad, et tinupak da na bato, et saray tasi inyan da so saray kawes da ed saray salian na sakey a balolaki a manngaran na Saulo. 

Act 7:59 Et tinupak da si Esteban ya ontatawag ed Katawan a kuan to: Katawan ko a Jesus, akoen mo so espirituk. 

Act 7:60 Et nen tinmalimokor, inkasil to so voces to: Katawan, ag mo ipasakbat ed sikara so saya'n kasalanan. Et nen kapansalita to na saya naugip ed Katawan. 



Act 8:1 Et si Saulo akinonongan to so inpatey nen Esteban. so baleg a pamasegsegang ed Iglesia ya wala ed Jerusalem, et nibuyak ira ya amin ed saray dalin na Judea tan Samaria, likod so saray apostoles. 

Act 8:2 Et saray lalaki a masimpit inponpon da si Esteban, et nangawa ra na nangis a baleg nisengeg ed sikato. 

Act 8:3 Balet si Saulo pinapairap to so Iglesia, a linmoob ed saray kaabungan et naneerel na lalaki tan bibii ya inpokok to ra ed panangipangawan. 

Act 8:4 Bang saray abuybuyak, nanakarakar ira ed amin a kadalinan ya angipulong na Salita. 

Act 8:5 Et si Felipe linma ed baley na Samaria, et inpulong to ed sikara si Cristo. 

Act 8:6 Et saray katooan dinengel da ya nankakasakey so saray bengatla'n inbaga nen Felipe, nen nadngel da tan anengneng da so saray tanda a ginawa to. 

Act 8:7 Ta diad saramay dakel ya aluganan na espiritun marumsis pinmaway ira a naningal na maksil: et dakel so saray ag makagalaw tan piley ya atambal ira. 

Act 8:8 Et wala so abalbaleg a liket nen saman diman a ciudad. 

Act 8:9 Balet wala nen saman so sakey a too, a manngaran na Simon, a gendat a nanayam ed saman a baley a nan gagawa na anito, et inpankelakelaw to so saray katooan ed Samaria, a kuan ton sikato'y sakey a baleg a too: 

Act 8:10 A sikato so sinisiara ya amin manlapu ed ankekelag, anga ed ankakabaleg, a kuan da: Saya'n too sikato so pakayari Dios a manngaran na Baleg. 

Act 8:11 Et anisiara ed sikato, lapu ed saray anito to inpankelawkelaw to ra ed andukey ya agew. 

Act 8:12 Bang nen anisia lara ed Felipe ya angipakabat na maong a balita na panarian na Dios tan ngaran nen Jesu-Cristo nanbinyag so saray lalaki tan bibii. 

Act 8:13 Et si Simon anisia met nen saman: et nen abinyagan akila ed Felipe; et nen anengneng to so saray tanda tan makapakelaw a pakapanyari, atalagnaw. 

Act 8:14 Et sanen saray apostoles ya wala ed Jerusalem nadngelan da a say Samaria inawa'to so Salita na Dios inbaki ra ed sikara di Pedro tan Juan: 

Act 8:15 A Sikara, nen linma ra inpikasidara ed Dios, pian naakora komon so Espiritu Santo: 

Act 8:16 Ta anga ed saman agni inmepas ed siopaman ed sikara; no ag say abinyagan ira lambengat ed ngaran nen Jesus a Katawan. 

Act 8:17 Diad saman, inyan da so kalimaan da ed tapew da, et inako ra so Espiritu Santo. 

Act 8:18 Et nen anengneng nen Simon a lapu ed inpangyan na saray apostoles na kalimaan da, niiter so Espiritu Santo, insaklangan to ra na pilak. 

Act 8:19 A kuan to: iter yo met ed siak so saya a pakapanyari, pian siopaman a pangitapewan ko na limak, awaten to so Espiritu Santo. 

Act 8:20 Si Pedro balet inkuan to ed sikato: Nabalang so pilak mo, pati sika komon, ta inisip mo a say palangkap na Dios nagamoran ed pilak. 

Act 8:21 Andi biang mo ono kapalaran mo ed saya ya inkabtang: ta aliwa'n maptek so pusom ed arap na Dios. 

Act 8:22 Manpataoli ka sirin ed saya'n karelmengan mo, et mikasika ed Katawan, pian napaandi, no nayari, so saya'n isip na pusom. 

Act 8:23 Ta nanengneng ko ya wala ka ed apgo na kapaitan tan inkabalor ed golonggolong na kaugsan. 

Act 8:24 Et nen inmebat si Simon, kuan to: Pikasi yo ak pa sirin ed Katawan, pian angapo komon ed saray bengatla'n sinalita yo so napasabik. 

Act 8:25 Sikara sirin, kayari ran tinasian tan inpolong so Salita na Katawan, pinmawil ira ed Jerusalem, et inpulong da so Evangelio ed dakel a polok na saray taga Samaria. 

Act 8:26 Et sakey ya angel na Katawan akisalita ed Felipe a kuan to: Alagey ka, et onla ka ed abalaten, ed dalan yo onarap ed Gasa manlapu ed Jerusalem, ya angapoy manaayam. 

Act 8:27 Et inmalagey tan linma: et nia, sakey a too a taga Etiopia, sakey ya eunuko, walaan na baleg a pakauley ed lepsag nen Candace a reina na saray taga Etiopia, a sikato so managimaton ed amin a kayarian ko, a linma ed Jerusalem a nanpikasi; 

Act 8:28 Et pinmawil a nanyurong ed luganan to, et babasaen to si profeta Isaias. 

Act 8:29 Et say Espiritu kuan to ed Felipe: Onasinger ka et miolop ka ed sayan luganan. 

Act 8:30 Et binmatik si Felipe ed sikato, et sikato so nadngel to a manbababasa ed profeta Isaias, et kuan to: Natalosan mo so babasaen mo? 

Act 8:31 Et kuan to ed sikato: Panon so pakayarik, no angapo so mangiwanwan ed siak? Et akikasian to si Felipe ya onsapat tan miyurong ed sikato. 

Act 8:32 Et say pasen a babasaen to, sikato ya: Singa sakey ya oveja a niakar ed panagpateyan; Tan singa kilaw na carnero a naumel ed arap na manangiskis ed sikato, Ontan ya ag to bisuaten so sangi to: 

Act 8:33 Dia ed inpanpaabeba to inekal da so katunongan to: Siopa naani mangipaliwawa ed kapolian to? Ta say bilay to naekal dia ed dalin. 

Act 8:34 Et say eunuco inmebat ed Felipe, ed kuan to: Kerewen ko ed sika, siopa so pansalitaan na profeta na onia? sikato'n dili odino wala so arum? 

Act 8:35 Et si Felipe binesua'to so sangi to, et bang nen inpalapu to ed saya a sulat, inpulong to ed sikato si Jesus. 

Act 8:36 Et bang nen manaakar ira ed dalan, akasabi ra ed sakey a danum, et kuan nen eunuco. Nia so danum, anto so makasbel a nabinyagan ak? 

Act 8:37 Et inkuan nen Felipe: No sisiaen mo ed masimoon a pusom, nayarian mo. Et inmebat a nankuan: Sisiaen ko a si Jesu-Cristo sikato so Anak na Dios. 

Act 8:38 Et ingangan to a patondaenda so luganan: et linmasor ira a dua ed danum, si Felipe tan say eunuko; et sikato so bininyagan to, 

Act 8:39 Et nen sinmakbit ira ed danum, say Espiritu na Katawan sinamsam to si Felipe; et say eunuko ag to la anengneng et intuloy to so dalan to a malikeliket. 

Act 8:40 Si Felipe balet nalmo ed Azote: et nen onlabas diman, inpakaba'to so Evangelio ed ganagana ya baley, anga ed insabi to ed Cesarea. 



Act 9:1 Balet si Saulo a maningas ni ed pangigagaem tan panagpatey ed saray binangatan na Katawan, linma ed manonaan na saray sacerdotes, 

Act 9:2 Et kinmerew ed sikato na sulat ya onla ed Damasco, ed saray sinagoga, piano no wala so naromog to arum ya wala ed saya'n Dalan, lalaki odino bibii, iyakar to ra a balor ed Jerusalem. 

Act 9:3 Et nen nanakarakar, agawa ya akaasinger ed Damasco; et kabekta ya aliber na sakey a liwawa a nanlapu ed tawen; 

Act 9:4 Et niparogso ed dalin, et nadngel to so sakey a voces a nankuan ed sikato: Saulo, Saulo, akin et uusilan mo ak? 

Act 9:5 Et inkuan to: Siopa ka, Katawan? Et kuan to: Siak si Jesus ya uusilan mo: (mairap ed sika so pa-ngidepak mo ed utok! 

Act 9:6 Onalagey ka, et onloob ka ed baley et nibaga naani ed sika so nakaokolan mo a gawaen. 

Act 9:7 Et saray totoo a nanakarakar ya iba to, tinmonda ra a naemel, a nadngel da so voces, balet angapo so anengneng da'n too. 

Act 9:8 Et si Saulo inmalagey ed dalin; et nen alukasan so saray mata to, angapo so anengneng to; et intabin da ed lima to, et inloob da ed Damasco 

Act 9:9 Et sikato so ag akanengneng ed talora'n agew; et ag angan tan ag met inminum. 

Act 9:10 Et wala nen saman ed Damasco so sakey a binangatan a manngaran na Ananias; et inkuan na Katawan ed sikato ed sakey a pasingawey: Ananias. Et inkuan to; Wadia ak, Katawan. 

Act 9:11 Et say Katawan inkuan to ed sikato: Alagey ka, tan onla ka ed lansangan ya inngaran a Maptek, et anapen mo ed abung nen Judas so sakey a manngaran na Saulo, sakey a taga Tarso, ta nia, sikato so mikakasi; 

Act 9:12 Et anengneng to ed pasingawey so sakey a laki a manngaran na Ananias ya onloloob tan iyan to ed tapew to so lima to pian naako to so pakanengneng. 

Act 9:13 Balet inmebat si Ananias, Katawan nadngelan ko ed dakel so nipaakar ed saya'n too, a dakel so kaugsan a ginawa to ed saray sasantom ed Jerusalem: 

Act 9:14 Et angan dia wala so pakauley to a nanlapu ed saray manonaan na sacerdotes, a mangerel ed amin ya ontawag ed ngaran mo. 

Act 9:15 Balet kuan na Katawan ed sikato: Onla ka, ta sikato so sakey a vaso a pinili, pian awiten to so ngaran ko ed arap na saray Gentiles, tan saray arari, tan saray anak na Israel: 

Act 9:16 Ta ipanengneng ko ed sikato no kaonongan karakel so bengatla a kaokolan ya itepel to lapu ed ngaran ko. 

Act 9:17 Et linma si Ananias, et linmoob ed abung; et nen intapew to so saray lima to ed sikato, inkuan to ed sikato: Agi Saulo, say Katawan, salanti Jesus, a pinmayawar ed sika ed dalan a nanlapuan mo, inbaki to ak ed sika, pian akoen mo so pakanengneng tan napano ka na Espiritu Santo. 

Act 9:18 Et tampol a naplag nanlapu ed saray mata to so singa ra siksik, et akanengneng: et inmalagey, et abinyagan; 

Act 9:19 Et nen akapangan la, kinmasil. Et akiayam si Saulo na pigaray agew ed saray binangatan ya wala ed Damasco nen saman. 

Act 9:20 Et tampol ed saman, inpulong to ed saray sinagoga a si Jesus sikato so Anak na Dios. 

Act 9:21 Et amin ya akadngel ed sikato atalagnaw ira, et inkuan da: Ag kasi saya'man so nanpapairap ed saray anawag ed saya'n ngaran ed Jerusalem? et saya a getma so inakaran to dia, pian yakar to ran balor ed arap na saray manonaan na sacerdotes. 

Act 9:22 Balet si Saulo lalo ya onbibiskeg, et ag to ra paebaten so saray Judio a manaayam ed Damasco, ya inpatnag to a saya, salanti Jesus, sikato so Cristo. 

Act 9:23 Balet sanen apalabas so dakel ya agew, nansisingbat so saray Judio pian pateyen da: 

Act 9:24 Balet atalosan nen Saulo so kanonotan da. Et binantayan da so saray kaput ed labi tan agew pian napatey da: 

Act 9:25 Balet saray binangatan to inalara ed labi, et inleksab da ed kuta, ya inlugan da ed sakey a babako. 

Act 9:26 Et nen akasabi ed Jerusalem, sineetan to so mitipon ed saray binangatan: et sikara ya amin atakot ira ed sikato, ya ag ira anisia a sikato sakey a binangatan. 

Act 9:27 Balet si Bernabe sikato so inalato, et inakar to ed saray apostoles, et inolit to ed sikara no panon so inpakanengneng to ed Katawan dia ed dalan a sikato so akisalitaan to, tan no panon so inpanpulong to ed Damasco a makmakpel nipaakar ed ngaran nen Jesus. 

Act 9:28 Et akiolopolop ed sikara ya onloob tan ompaway ed Jerusalem, 

Act 9:29 A nanpupulong a makmakpel ed ngaran na Katawan: et akisalsalita tan akisangsangan ed saray Griego a Judio; sikara balet labay da komon a pateyen. 

Act 9:30 Et saray agagi sanen saya so akabatan da, intulor da ed Cesarea et manlapud man inbakira ed Tarso. 

Act 9:31 Dia ed ontan, say Iglesia apadeen ed lapag na Judea tan Galilea tan Samaria, et binmiskeg; et nanakar ira ed takot ed Katawan tan diad panliligliwa na Espiritu Santo dinmakel ira. 

Act 9:32 Et agawa a si Pedro, ed inpanakarakar to ed amin a pasen, linma met ed saray sasantos a manaayam ed Lidda. 

Act 9:33 Et aromog tod man so sakey a laki a manngaran na Eneas, ya waloy taon la ya wala ed dokolan, a sikato so ag makagalaw. 

Act 9:34 Et inkuan nen Pedro ed sikato: Eneas, si Jesu-Cristo tambalen to ka; onalagey ka et isinop mo so dokolan mo. Et tampol ya inmalagey. 

Act 9:35 Et anengneng na amin a manaayam ed Lidda tan Sarona, et nanpa-taolira ed Katawan. 

Act 9:36 Wala met nen saman ed Joppe so sakey a binangatan a bii, a manngaray Tabita, a kabaliksan to so Dorcas: Saya'n bii napno na saray maong a gawa tan payabol a gina-gawa to. 

Act 9:37 Et agawa ya asakitan ed saraman ya agew, tan inatey; et nen ayarira ya inurasan, inyan da ed sakey a silir ya atagtagey. 

Act 9:38 Et lapu'd asinger so Lidda ed Joppe, saray binangatan nen nadngelan da ya wadman si Pedro, inbakira ed sikato so duaran katao, ya akikasi ed sikato; Ag ka mantantan ya onla ed sikami. 

Act 9:39 Et si Pedro inmalagey tan akila ed sikara. Et nen akasabi, sikato so inakar da ed atagtagey a silir: et sikato so niliktob na amin a bibii a babalo a mannangis, et inpapanengneng da ed sikato so saray aysing tan saray kawes a ginawa nen Dorcas nen walani ed sikara. 

Act 9:40 Balet si Pedro pinapaway to ra ya amin, et tinmalimokor, tan akikasi; et nen inmarap ed bangkay, inkuan to, Tabita, alagey ka, Et sikato inmurika'to so saray mata to, et sanen anengneng to si Pedro binmangon. 

Act 9:41 Et si Pedro inegnaan to ed lima, et pinaalagey to; insan to tinawag so saray sasantos, tan saray bibii a babalo, et inpanengneng to ed sikara a mabilay. 

Act 9:42 Et saya nipakabat ed lapag a Joppe: et dakel so saray anisia ed Katawan. 

Act 9:43 Et agawa, a nanayam na dakel ya agew ed Joppe ed abung na sakey a too a manngaran na Simon a managkurti katat. 



Act 10:1 Et wala nen saman so sakey a laki ed Cesarea a manngaran na Cornelio, Centurion na tropan manngaran na taga Italia. 

Act 10:2 Masimpit tan maitatakot ed Dios, pati amin a kabaley to, tan nangawa na dakel a payabol ed baley, et andi ebas a nanpipikasi ed Dios. 

Act 10:3 Anengneng to ed pasingawey a maliwliwawa, ed singa komasiam ya horas, so sakey ya angel na Dios ya onloloob ed kawalaan to, et kuan to ed sikato: Cornelio. 

Act 10:4 Et sikato so ninengneng to, et sitatakot a kuan to: Anto, Katawan? Et kuan na angel ed sika to, Saray pikakasim tan payabol mo nanpaatagey ira a singa pakanodnonotan ed arap na Dios. 

Act 10:5 Mangibaki ka, sirin, natan na totoo ed Joppe, et patawag mo so sakey a manngaran na Simon, a natatawag na Pedro: 

Act 10:6 Saya manaayam ed abung na sakey a Simon a managkurti, a say abung to wala ed abay na dayat: (siato ibaga to naani ed sika so nepeg mo'n gawaen.) 

Act 10:7 Et nen imanla so angel ya akisalita ed sikato, tinawag to so duara ed saray aripen to, tan sakey a sondalo a masimpit dia ed saray managlinkor ed sikato a gendat; 

Act 10:8 Et nen inoli'to so amin a bengatla ed sikara, inbaki to ra ed Joppe. 

Act 10:9 Et dia ed kaimbuasan, sanen sikara so wala la ed dalan ya asinger la ed baley, sinmegep ed tapew na abung si Pedro ya akikasi nen asinger la so komanem ya horas. 

Act 10:10 Et nen alikna to so baleg ya eras, labay to komon so mangan: et legan da a mantata dia, sinmabi sakey a pasingawey; 

Act 10:11 Et anengneng to ya alukasan so tawen, et onlalasor so sakey a vaso ya singa sakey a balbaleg ya oles ya akasabit ed apat ira'n suyok to, a linmeksab ed dalin: 

Act 10:12 Et wala ed sikato so amin a nengneng na saray ayep a nansali sanepat, tan saray korongkorong ed dalin tan saray manok ed tagey. 

Act 10:13 Et sinmabi sakey a voces ed sikato : Alagey ka, Pedro: manpatey ka tan mangan ka. 

Act 10:14 Balet kuan nen Pedro: Katawan, andi ta agak ni angan na antokaman a bengatla a karaklan tan aliwa'n malinis. 

Act 10:15 Et sakey a voces so sinmabi lamet ed sikato ed komadua, Say nilinisan na Dios, ag mo gawaen a karaklan. 

Act 10:16 Et agawa so saya ya amitlo, et saman la pinmawil a naala ed tawen. 

Act 10:17 Et bang si Pedro a manduarua ed inkasikaton dili no anto so kabaliksan na saya'n pasingawey ya anengneng to, nia, saray totoo ya inbakinen Cornelio sanen atepet da so abung nen Simon, wala ra ed arap na pinto. 

Act 10:18 Et tinmawag ira, tan tinepet da no manaayam diman so sakey a Simon a natatawag na Pedro. 

Act 10:19 Et nen nononoten nen Pedro so pasingawey, inkuan na Espiritu ed sikato: Nia, wala so talora a katao ya aanapen da ka. 

Act 10:20 Alagey ka, sirin, et lasor ka, tan mila ka ed sikara ya nadi duarua, ta siak so angibaki ed sikara. 

Act 10:21 Et linmasor si Pedro ed saray totoo, et kuan to: Nia, siak so aanapen yo, anto so makasengeg na inakaran yo dia? 

Act 10:22 Et inkuan da: Si Cornelio a Capitan, too a matunong tan maitatakot ed Dios, tan maong so dengel ed sikato na amin a nacion na Judio, pinasakbayan na Dios lapu ed panamegley na sakey a masanto ya angel, pian patawag to ka ed abung to, pian dengelen to ed sika so saray salita. 

Act 10:23 Kanian pinaloob to ra tan pinarawes to ra. Et dia ed kaimbuasan, sikato'y inmalagey tan akila ed sikara, et sikato so inibaan na saray arum ya agagi a taga Joppe. 

Act 10:24 Et dia ed kaimbuasan linmoob ira ed Cesarea. Et si Cornelio manaalagar ed sikara, a tinipon to so saray kakanayon to, tan saray kakaaro to a pinabpabli. 

Act 10:25 Et agawa a nen linmoob si Pedro, inabet nen Cornelio, tan dinmakmomo ed saray salisali to, tan ingalang to. 

Act 10:26 Balet si Pedro pinaalagey to, a nankuan: Alagey ka, ta siak too ak met. 

Act 10:27 Et nen akisalsalita ed sikato, linmoob, et aromog to so dakel ya atiptipon, 

Act 10:28 Et inkuan to ed sikara: Amtayo a mauges ed sakey a Judio so mitipon odino onasinger ed too a sananey a nacion; balet inpanengneng na Dios ed siak ya angapo so tawagen ko a siopa a too na karaklan tan aliwa a malinis; 

Act 10:29 Kanian nen inpatawag mo ak, agak nanduarua a linma dia. Tepeten ko sirin: anto so makasengeg ya inpatawag mo ak? 

Act 10:30 Et si Cornelio inkuan to: Wala so apat agew a nanayunalak anga ed saya'n horas, et dia ed horas a komasiam, nen manpipikasi ak dia ed abung ko, nia, sakey a laki inmalagey ed arap ko a sikakawes na makapulag, 

Act 10:31 Et kuan to: Cornelio, nadngel so pikakasim tan saray payabol mo a singa pakanodnonotan ed arap na Dios. 

Act 10:32 Manbaki ka sirin ed Joppe, et patawag mo si Simon, a natatawag na Pedro; saya manaayam ed abung nen Simon a managkurti, ed abay na dayat, sikato, sano onsabi, kasalita to ka. 

Act 10:33 Kanian tampol a nanbaki ak ed sika, et maong so ginawam ta linmaka dia. Natan, sirin, wadia kami ya amin ed arap na Dios, pian narengel mi ya amin so ingangan ed sika na Katawan. 

Act 10:34 Et si Pedro binesua'to so sangi to tan inkuan to: Tua a nanengneng ko a say Dios angapo so pangiduma to ed saray totoo; 

Act 10:35 No ag ingen dia ed balang nacion akuen to so antakot ed sikato tan mangawa na matunong. 

Act 10:36 Say salita ya inpawi'to ed saray anak nen Israel, ipulong so maong a balita na kareenan ed panamegley nen Jesu-Cristo (a sikato so Katawan na lapag) 

Act 10:37 Amtayo'tan a salita, a nibuyak ed lapag na Judea, a nanlapu ed Galilea, onong ed binyag ya inpulong nen Juan; 

Act 10:38 Nipaakar ed Jesus a taga Nazaret, no panon so inpamuyok na Dios ed sikato na Espiritu Santo tan say pakapanyari; a sikato so nanakarakar a nangawa na maong: et tinambal to so amin a nairapan ed tokso, ta say Dios wala ed sikato. 

Act 10:39 Et sikami makatasi ed saray amin a ginawa to ed dalin na saray Judio tan ed Jerusalem; a sikato met so pinatey da ya insabit da ed sakey a kiew. 

Act 10:40 Sikato so pinaoli Dios ed bilay ed komatlo'n agew, et inter to a nipatnag ed maliwawa, 

Act 10:41 Aliwa a dia ed amin ya ombaley, no ag dia ed saray tasi ya inmuna a pinili Dios, salanti sikami, ya akikan tan akiinum ed sikato, nen kayari to ya inmoli a binmilay ed saray inaatey. 

Act 10:42 Et inbilin to ed sikami so pampulong mi ed baley, tan mantasi a sikato so ingaton na Dios ya Okom ed saray mabilay tan inatey. 

Act 10:43 Sikato so patuaen na saray amin a profetas, a balang sakey a manisia ed sikato, awaten to so kaekal na saray kasalanan lapu ed ngaran to. 

Act 10:44 Sanen sasalitaen nen Pedro so saraya'n salita ninlamang, say Espiritu Santo linmeksab ed lapag ya akadngel na salita. 

Act 10:45 Et saray anisia a kabiangan na saray nangalsim nikelawan ira, ta niotob met ed saray Gentiles so palangkap na Espiritu Santo. 

Act 10:46 Ta sikara so nadngel da a nansasalita na sankaili a salita, et ingalang da so Dios. Diad saman inmebat si Pedro. 

Act 10:47 Nayari kasi'n isebel na siopaman a too so danum, pian ag nabinyagan so saraya'n angako na Espiritu Santo a singa sikata yo met? 

Act 10:48 Et inbilin to a pabinyagan ira ed ngaran nen Jesu-Cristo a Katawan. Samanla akikasi ra ed sikato a natilak ed sikara ed pigara'y agew. 



Act 11:1 Et nadngelan na saray apostoles tan saray agagi ya wala ed Judea a saray Gentiles inako ra met so Salita na Dios. 

Act 11:2 Et sanen linma si Pedro ed Jerusalem, sikato so akisangsangan na saray nangalsim, 

Act 11:3 A kuanda: linmoob ka ed saray totoo ya ag agalsiman, et akikan ka ed sikara. 

Act 11:4 Balet ginmapo si Pedro, et inpaliwawa to ed sikara ed maoksoy, a kuan to: 

Act 11:5 Wala ak nen saman ed baley na Joppe a mikakasi, et anengneng ko ed panmulimuli nonot so sakey a pasingawey, salanti: sakey a vaso a singa sakey a baleg a oles ya akasabit ed apatira'n suyok ya onleleksab nanlapu ed tawen; et sinmabin anga ed siak: 

Act 11:6 Dia ed saman, nen nilingay ko, inisisip ko, tan anengneng ko so saray ayayep a nansali sanepat ed dalin, tan ayayep ya atap, tan saray korongkorong ed dalin tan saray manok ed tagey. 

Act 11:7 Et nadngel ko so sakey a voces met a nankuan ed siak: Alagey ka, Pedro; rnanpatey ka et mangan ka, 

Act 11:8 Balet inkuan ko: Katawan, andi ta angan kapigan angapo ni linmoob ed sangik a karaklan tan aliwa'n malinis. 

Act 11:9 Balet sakey a voces so inmebat ed siak nanlapu ed tawen ed pidua: Say nilinisan na Dios, ag mo tatawagen a karaklan. 

Act 11:10 Et saya agawa ya amitlo, insan pinmawil a naala ed tawen. 

Act 11:11 Et nia, dingan so insabi taloran katao a nanalagey ed arap na kawalaan mi ya abung, a sikara so nibaki ed siak nanlapu ed Cesarea. 

Act 11:12 Et binilin ak na Espiritu Santo a mila ak ed sikara ya andi induma. Et akila ra met ya angolop ed siak so saraya'n anemiran agagi; et linmoob kami ed abung na saman a laki: 

Act 11:13 Et inoli'to ed sikami no panon so inpakanengneng to na angel dia ed abung to, a nanalagey a kuan to: Manbaki ka ed Joppe, et patawag mo si Simon a natatawag na Pedro: 

Act 11:14 Sikato ibaga to naani ed sika so saray salita, a sikara so kilabanan mo, sika tan amin ya abung mo. 

Act 11:15 Et nen ginmapo ak a nansalita, linmeksab so Espiritu Santo ed sikara, onong met ed sikatayo nen inmuna. 

Act 11:16 Et anonotan ko so salita na Katawan, onong na kuanto: si Juan tua a aminyag ed danum; sikayo balet nabinyagan kayo na Espiritu Santo. 

Act 11:17 No ontan, sirin, a say Dios inter to ed sikara so dili'n palangkap, singa ginawa to met ed sikatayo nen anisia itayo ed Katawan a Jesu-Cristo, siopa ak nen saman a makayarin manebel ed Dios? 

Act 11:18 Et nen nadngel da so saraya'n bengatla, dinmeen ira, et ingalang da so Dios a kuan da: Kanian initer met na Dios ed saray Gentiles so panagpataoli a kabilayan. 

Act 11:19 Saraman sirin so abuybuyak lapu ed panamasegsegang a nisengeg ed Esteban nanakarakar ira anga ed Fenicia, tan Chipre, tan Antioquia, et ag da inpulong so salita ed angan siopa no ag diad saray Judio lambengat. 

Act 11:20 Et wala 'ray arum ed sikara ya lalaki'n taga Chipre tan Cirene, a nen akaloob ira ed Antioquia akisalita ra met ed saray Griegos, ya inpulong da so Katawan a si Jesus. 

Act 11:21 Et wala ed sikara so lima na Katawan, et dakel so saray anisia tan nanpataoli ed Katawan. 

Act 11:22 Et sinmabi balita ed saray layag na Iglesia ya wala ed Jerusalem: et inbaki ra si Bernabe anga ed Antioquia: 

Act 11:23 Sikato sanen sinmabi, tan anengneng to so gracia na Dios, nanliket; et binilin to ra'n amin a mansiansia ra komon ed Katawan ed matalek a puso: 

Act 11:24 Ta sikato'y sakey a toon maong tan napno na Espiritu Santo tan sisia; et dakel so totoo'n nikasakey ed Katawan. 

Act 11:25 Et sikatoy linma ed Tarso pian anapen to si Saulo; 

Act 11:26 Et nen nalmo to, sikato'y intarok to ed Antioquia, et agawa ya akitipon ira ed Iglesia ed leleg na sakey taon, et binangatan da so dakel a katooan; et saray binangatan inngaran ira a Cristiano ya inmuna dia ed Antioquia. 

Act 11:27 Et dia ed saraman ya agew, saray profetas a nanlapu ed Jerusalem linma ra ed Antioquia. 

Act 11:28 Et inmalagey so sakey ed sikara a manngaran na Agabo, et inpakaba'to lapu'd Espiritu ya wala so onsabi a balbaleg ya eras ed sankamundoan: a sikato'y agawa ed saray agew nen Claudio. 

Act 11:29 Et saray binangatan, onong ed nayarian na sinansakey, nannononongan da so mangipawit na payabol ed saray agagi'n manaayam ed Judea; 

Act 11:30 A sikato met so ginawa ra ya inpawit da ed saray mamasiken ed panamegley na lima Bernabe tan Saulo. 



Act 12:1 Et sanen saman a panaon, si ari Herodes inyuna'to ray lima to pian duksaen to ray pigaran kabiangan na Iglesia. 

Act 12:2 Et pinatey to ed kampilan si Santiago ya agi nen Juan. 

Act 12:3 Et nen anengneng to ya apalike'to so saray Judios, tinuloy to met ya inerel si Pedro. Et sikaramay agew na saray tinapay ya andi levadura. 

Act 12:4 Et nen narel to la, inpaipangaw to, et initer to ed apatira'n sanepat a sondalo pian bantayan da, a labay to ya isaklang ed saray ombaley no kayari Pasko. 

Act 12:5 Si Pedro, sirin, wala'n nipokok ed panangipangawan: balet say Iglesia ginawa to so pikakasi ed Dios a sipipilalek, lapu'd sikato. 

Act 12:6 Et sanen ngalngali Ian paipaway nen Herodes, saman met lanlamang a labi si Pedro naugip ed pegley na duara'n sondalo, a sisisinger na duara a golonggolong: et saray manbabantay wala ra ed arap na kaput a babantayan da so panangipangawan. 

Act 12:7 Et nia, inmalagey so sakey ya angel na Katawan ed abay to, et sakey a silew niliwawaan to so silir: et diniwi'to si Pedro ed diking et niliin'to a nankuan: Onalagey ka'n magano. Et saray golonggolong to ayagyag ira a nanlapu ed saray lima to. 

Act 12:8 Et inkuan na angel ed sikato: Manbalkes ka, et iberber mo so saray sapin mo. Et ginawa to. Et kuan to ed sikato: Ikolibenben mo ed sika so kawes mo, et ontombo'ka ed siak. 

Act 12:9 Et pinmaway tan tinmombok ed sikato; et ag to atalusan a tua so ginawa na angel, no ag ingen inisip to ya akanengneng na sakey a pasingawey. 

Act 12:10 Et sanen alabsanan da so inmuna tan kumadua a bantay, akasabi ra ed wangalan a balatyang ya onarap ed ciudad, a sikato'y linmukas ed inkasikato'n dili ed sikara; et pinmaway ira, tan dinmalan ira ed sakey a lansangan; et insan kabekta tinmaihan so angel ed sikato. 

Act 12:11 Et si Pedro sanen pinmawil ed kabukbukoran to, inkuan to: Natan natalusan ko'n tua a say Katawan inbaki to so angel to tan inlaban to ak ed lima nen Herodes tan ed amin a panaalagar na totoo a Judio ed siak. 

Act 12:12 Et sanen abilibili to so saya'n bengatla sikato'y sinmabi ed abung nen Maria ya ina nen Juan ya apangaranan na Marcos, a kawalaan na dakel ya atipon a mikakasi. 

Act 12:13 Et sanen tinmoktok ed kaput na arapan, pinmaway ya onabet so sakey a marikit a manngaran na Rhoda. 

Act 12:14 Et sanen abidbir to so voces nen Pedro, dia ed gawa'y like'to, agto la alukasan so pinto noag ingen binmatik ed loob, et inpakaba'to a si Pedro wala ed arap na kaput. 

Act 12:15 Et inkuan da ed sikato: Makulangkulang ka. Sikato balet pinatua to ya ontan a tua. Et inkuan da: Say angel to 'tan. 

Act 12:16 Si Pedro balet tinuloy to so tinmoktok: et sanen nilukasan da, sikato'y anengneng da, et nikelawan ira. 

Act 12:17 Balet sikato, niwitwitan to ra ed saray lima to pian ag ira onesel: inoli'to'd sikara no panon so inpangala ed sikato na Katawan ed inkipangaw to, et inkuan to: Ipakabat yo so saya ed Santiago tan ed saray agagi. Et tinmainan tan linma ed sananey a pasen. 

Act 12:18 Et sanen kabuasan la, aliwan dagdaiset a gotgot na saray sondalos, no anto so agawa nen Pedro. 

Act 12:19 Et si Herodes inpaanap to, et sanen agto nalmo, sinalaysay to a maong so saray bantay, et ingangan to a sikara so pateyen. Et linma nanlapu ed Judea anga ed Cesarea, et nanayam diman. 

Act 12:20 Et mapalalo'y sanok to ed saray taga Tiro tan taga Sidon: et linmara ed sikato ed apasakey a linawa, et sanen kinaaro ra si Blasto a managpaga ed dukolan na ari, kinerew da so kareenan, lapu'd saray dalin da so mantatagano ed saray sakop na ari. 

Act 12:21 Et dia ed sakey ya agew a tinandaan, si Herodes, nankawes na kawes na ari et imyorong ed trono, et nanolit ed sikara. 

Act 12:22 Et say ombaley ineyag to: Say voces na Dios, ya aliwa a say voces na sakey a too. 

Act 12:23 Et sikato'y sinugatan a kabekta na sakey ya angel na Katawan, lapu'd agto angiter na galang ed Dios; et inatey tan kinan na saray bigis. 

Act 12:24 Balet say Salita'y Dios binmona tan dinmakel. 

Act 12:25 Et di Bernabe tan Saulo pinmawil ira a nanlapu ed Jerusalem, nen asumpal da la so nibakian da, ya intarok da met si Juan ya apangaranan na Marcos. 



Act 13:1 Et walara nen saman ed Antioquia, ed Iglesia ya wad man so saray profetas tan saray managbangat, si Bernabe, tan si Simon a manngaran na Niger, tan si Lucio a taga Cirene, tan si Manaben, agi ed soso nen Herodes a tetrarca, tan si Saulo. 

Act 13:2 Et sanen manlilinkor iraya ed Katawan, tan manayunal ira, kuan na Espiritu Santo: Ibiig yo ed siak si Bernabe tan si Saulo nipaakar ed gawa ya anawagan ko ed sikara. 

Act 13:3 Dia ed saman, nen ay ari la ran nanayunal tan akikasi, tan inyan da so lima ra ed tapew da, sikara so inbaki ra. 

Act 13:4 Kanian sikara, lapu'd sikara so inbaki Espiritu Santo, linmara ed Seleucia; et nanlapudman nansakay ira ya anga ed Chipre. 

Act 13:5 Et sanen wala ra ed Salamina, inpulong da so Salita'y Dios ed saray Sinagoga na saray Judio: et wala met ed sikara si Juan a katulongan da. 

Act 13:6 Et nen aliber da la so lapag a polo anga ed Pafo, aromog da so sakey a too a managanito, matila a profeta, Judio, a manngaran na Barjesus; 

Act 13:7 A sikato so wala ed kinen Proconsul Sergio Paulo, sakey a laki'n makabat. Saya inpatawag to si Bernabe tan si Saulo, et kinaliktan to a narengel so Salita na Dios. 

Act 13:8 Balet si Elimas a managanito (ta onia so kabaliksan na ngaran to), sinumpa to'ra, a sineetan to'n yarawi ed pananisia so proconsul. 

Act 13:9 Balet si Saulo a manngaran met na Pablo, napno na Espiritu Santo, sikato so nilimgis to,
