Act 13:10 Et inkuan to: O napno na amin a panamalingo tan amin a kaugsan, sika anak na tokso; sika kabosol na amin a katunongan, ag ka ta ontonda a manpauges ed saray maptek a dalan na Katawan? 

Act 13:11 Et natan, nia, say lima na Katawan wala ya ondapo ed sika, et nabulag ka naani ya ag mo nanengneng so liwawa na agew anga ed sakey a panaon. Et kabekta naplag ed sikato so kelpa, tan bilunget; et linma a mankarkarapas a nanaanap na mangitabin ed sikato ed lima. 

Act 13:12 Nen ontan, say proconsul, nen anengneng to so agawa, anisia a nikelawan ed bangat na Katawan. 

Act 13:13 Et si Pablo tan saray ibiba to nansakay ira a nanlapu ed Pafo et sinmabi ra ed Perge na Panfilia: et si Juan sinmian ed sikara tan pinmawil ed Jerusalem. 

Act 13:14 Et bang nen linmabas ira ed Per ge, sinmabi ra ed Antioquia na Pisidia; et linmoob ira ed sinagoga ed agew na Sabaton et imyorong ira. 

Act 13:15 Et kayari inpanbasa na gangan tan saray profetas, saray makauley na sinagoga nanbaki ra ed sikara a nankuan: Lalaki ya agagi, no wala ed sikayo so salita a pamilin ed baley, ibaga yo komon. 

Act 13:16 Et inmalagey si Pablo, et nen inandawesan to ra ed lima a padeenen, inkuan to: Lalaki a taga Israel, tan sikayo a maitatakot ed Dios, dengel kayo: 

Act 13:17 Say Dios na saya a baley na Israel pinili to so saray atateng tayo, tan intandoro to so baley nen nanayam ira ed dalin na Egipto, et dia ed atagey a taklay to inpaway to rad man. 

Act 13:18 Et dia ed leleg na apat a plo'y taon, singa managkumis ya ama, ineba to ra ed kalawakan. 

Act 13:19 Et nen binagbag to so pitora a naciones ed dalin na Canaan, inapag to ed sikara ya inpatawir so dalin na saraman a nacion ed loob na apat a lasus tan limamplo'y taon: 

Act 13:20 Et kayari na sarayan bengatla initdan to ra na okom ya anga ed profeta Samuel. 

Act 13:21 Et kayari to, kinmerew ira na ari, et inited na Dios ed sikara si Saul, anak nen Cis, sakey a laki ed poli nen Benjamin, ed loob na apat a plo'y taon. 

Act 13:22 Et sanen sikato so inekal to, pinaalagey to ed sikara si ari David ya initdan to met na panamalet a kuan to: Nalmok si David, anak nen Jesse, laki a maonor ed pusok, a sikato so mangawa naani na amin a kaliktan ko. 

Act 13:23 Dia ed poli na saya'n too, say Dios onong ed sipan to, impaalageyan to so Israel na sakey a Manangilaban, a si Jesus; 

Act 13:24 A sanen agni sinmabi, inpulong nen Juan ya inpasakbay so binyag ed pagbabawi, dia ed saray amin ya totoo na Israel. 

Act 13:25 Et diad panosumpal nen Juan na inkabtang to, kuan to; Siopa ak kasi ed isip yo? Aliwa ak ya sikato; balet nia, ontombok ed siak so sakey ya agak manepeg a mangokbar na sapin na saray salito. 

Act 13:26 Agagi, anak na kapolian nen Abraham, tan saray maitatakot ed sikayo ed Dios; dia ed sikatayo so nipawitan na salita na saya'n kilalaban. 

Act 13:27 Ta saray manaayam ed Jerusalem tan saray makauley da, lapu ed sikato so ag da kabat, angan saray salita na saray profetas ya abasbasa ed balang Sabaton, sinumpal da so saraman ed inpanusa ra. 

Act 13:28 Et angan ag da nalmo ed sikato so sengeg na pamateyan, kinerew da ed kinen Pilato a sikato so pateyen. 

Act 13:29 Et sanen asumpal da so saray amin a bengatla'n nisulat nipaakar ed sikato, inepas da ed kiew, et sikato'y inyan da ed sakey a lobok. 

Act 13:30 Balet say Dios sikato so pinaolito ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inaatey: 

Act 13:31 Et sikato so anengneng ed dakel ya agew na saray akila ed sikato nanlapu ed Galilea anga ed Jerusalem, a sikara natan so makatasi ed sikato ed baley. 

Act 13:32 Et itarok mi ed sikayo so maong a balita na saman a sipan ya agawa ed saray atateng, 

Act 13:33 A sikato so sinumpal na Dios ed sikatayo ya anak da, a pinaoli to ed bilay si Jesus; onong met a wala'n nisulat ed komadua'n Salmo: Sika so Ana'ko, inyanak taka natan. 

Act 13:34 Et nipaakar ed inpamaolito'd ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inaatey, pian angan kapigan ag la ompawil ed kabulok, onia so inkuan to: Iter ko ed sikayo so saray masanto tan ag onlaron a bendicion nipaakar ed kinen David. 

Act 13:35 Lapu'd kuan to met ed arum a Salmo: Ag mo naani yabuloy a say Santom nanengneng to so kabulok. 

Act 13:36 Ta si David, sanen nanlinkor, dia ed dilin kailalakan to, ed linawa na Dios, naugip, tan tinmipon ed saray atateng to, et anengneng to so kabulok: 

Act 13:37 Balet say pinaoli Dios ed bilay, ag to anengneng so kabulok. 

Act 13:38 Amtaen yo sirin, agagi, a lapu ed ngaran na sayan too nipakabat ed sikayo so kaekal na saray kasalanan: 

Act 13:39 Et diad saray amin ya agyo akapatunongan dia ed gangan nen Moises, lapu ed sikato napatunong ya amin so manisia. 

Act 13:40 Aluaran yo, sirin, ompan makasabi ed sikayo so sinalita na saray profeta: 

Act 13:41 Nengneng yo, sikayon managmudmora, tan mankelaw kayo, tan nabalang kayo; Ta gawaen ko so sakey a gawa ed saray agew yo, Sakey a gawa ya ag yo naani sisiaen angan panon, no wala so mangolit na saya ed sikayo. 

Act 13:42 Et sanen pinmaway ira, kinerew da a dia ed ontombok a Sabaton nipaliwawa komon ed sikara so saraya'n salita. 

Act 13:43 Et nen nansisian so moyong, dakel ed saray Judios tan saray masimpit ya apatombok, tinmombok ira ed kindi Pablo tan Bernabe; ya akisalsalita ra ed sikara et binilin da ra a mansiansia ed gracia na Dios. 

Act 13:44 Et dia'd ontombok a Sabaton ngalngali'n atipon so amin ya ombaley a mandengel na Salita'y Dios. 

Act 13:45 Balet sanen saray Judio anengneng da so karaklan, napno ra na imon, et sinumpa ra so saray sasalitaen nen Pablo, et nansalita ra na mabanday. 

Act 13:46 Et di Pablo tan Bernabe nansalita ra a makmakpel a kuan da: Akaokolan nen saman ya ibaga ed sikayo ya onona so Salita'y Dios. Balet bangta ipulisa'yo tan igaton yo ya ag kayo onnepeg ed bilay ya andi angaan, nia, onla kami ed saray Gentiles. 

Act 13:47 Ta on tan so ingangan na Katawan ed sikami, a nankuan; Ingaton ta ka a sakey a silew na saray Gentiles. Pian sika so onkanan kilabanan ya anga ed kasampotan na dalin. 

Act 13:48 Et saray Gentiles nen nadngel da so saya, akaliket ira, et ingalgalang da so salita'y Dios: et anisia ra ya amin so saray wala a tinandaan ed bilay ya andi angaan. 

Act 13:49 Et say Salita'y Katawan nisibuag ed saman ya amin a kadalinan. 

Act 13:50 Balet saray Judios sinagyat da so saray bibii a masimpit tan ankabli, tan saray manona a lalaki ed baley, et inpaalagey da so isumpa ed kindi Pablo tan Bernabe, et pinaekal da ra ed sakop da. 

Act 13:51 Diad onman pinokpokan da sumpa ed sikara so dabok ed saray sali ra, linma ra ed Ico'nio. 

Act 13:52 Et saray binangatan napno ra na gayaga tan Espiritu Santo. 



Act 14:1 Et agawa ed Iconio, a nanoolop ira'n linmoob ed sinagoga na saray Judios, et ontan la so inpansalita ra, ya anisia so sakey a baleg a karakel na saray Judios, tan saray Griegos. 

Act 14:2 Balet saray Judios ya ag tinmolok sinagyat tan pinasubeg da so linawa na saray Gentiles ya onsumpa ed saray agagi. 

Act 14:3 Tinmilak ira sirin ed andukey a panaon, a nansalita ra a makmakpel ed Katawan, a sikato so amalet ed salita na pamalangkap to, ya inaboloy to a gawaen na saray limara so saray tanda tan saray makapakelaw. 

Act 14:4 Balet nankadua so totoo ed ciudad; et saray arum akigampi ra ed saray Judios, et saray arum ed saray apostoles. 

Act 14:5 Et sanen ondogpa ra komon so saray Gentiles tan saray Judios, pati saray makauley da, pian kabilen da tan tupaken da ra, 

Act 14:6 Akabatan da so saya, et linma ra ya inmamot ed saray baley na Licaonia, Listra tan Derbe, tan ed saray dalin a kaliberliber; 

Act 14:7 Et diman inpulpulong da so evangelio. 

Act 14:8 Et diman ed Listra manyodyorong nen saman so sakey a too a makapuy ed saray sali to, piley a nanlapu ed eges nen ina to, ya angan kapigan ag akaakar. 

Act 14:9 Saya nadngel to si Pablo a mansasalita; sikato a nen nilingay to, et anengneng to ya wala so pananisiato a natambal, 

Act 14:10 Inkuan to ed maksil a voces: Alagey ka a manpetek ed saray salim. Et linmokso tan nanakar. 

Act 14:11 Et sanen anengneng na saray karaklan so ginawa nen Pablo, inkasil da so voces da, a nankuan ed salita na Licaonia: Saray dirios linmasor ira ed sikatayo a kaolibay na totoo. 

Act 14:12 Et inngaran da si Bernabe na Jupiter, et si Pablo, Mercurio, ta sikato nen saman so manonaan a mansasalita. 

Act 14:13 Et say sacerdote nen Jupiter, a say templo to wala nen saman ed arap na ciudad, angidago na saray vaca a kalakian tan balanget ed arap na pinto, et labay to komon so mangibagat, ya akikasakey ed saray karaklan. 

Act 14:14 Balet sanen saya so narengel di apostol Bernabe tan Pablo, pinilat da so saray kawes da, et linmokso ra ed pegley na karaklan, ya inyakis da, 

Act 14:15 A kuan da: Lalaki, akin et gawaen yo so saraya? Totoo kami met a singa sikayo, et ipakabat mi ed si kayo so saray maong a balita, pian dia ed saraya a kaapaan manpataoli kayo ed Dios a mabilay, a nangawa na tawen tan dalin tan say dayat, tan amin ya wala ed sikara: 

Act 14:16 A sikato dia ed saray kailalakan a linmabas, pinaulian to ray amin a naciones a manakar ira ed saray dalan da'n dili). 

Act 14:17 Angaman ontan ag to kinaindan ya angapo so makatasi ed sikato, a nangawa na maong, tan initdan to kayo na saray uran a nanlapu ed tawen tan mabunga a panaon, a pinano to so saray kapusoan yo na tagano tan gayaga! 

Act 14:18 Et dia ed saraya'n salita, samsamet so inpakaimaton da ra ed da-kel a too ed pangyapay da ed sikara na bagat. 

Act 14:19 Diad saman sinmabi so saray Judios a nanlapu ed Antioquia tan Iconio: et nen sinagyat da so karaklan, tinupak da si Pablo, et insagar da ed paway na baley, ya inisip da'n inatey la. 

Act 14:20 Balet nen sikato so niliktob na saray binangatan, inmalagey et linmoob ed ciudad; et dia ed kaimbuasan, linma, pati si Bernabe, diman ed Derbe. 

Act 14:21 Et sanen nipulong da so Evangelio ed saman a baley tan aparakel da so saray binangatan, pinmawil ira ed Listra, tan Iconio, tan Antioquia, 

Act 14:22 A pinabiskeg da so saray kamarerua na saray binangatan a binibilin da ra a mansiansia ed pananisia, tan dia ed dakel ya irap nakaokolan ya onloob itayo ed panaria'y Dios. 

Act 14:23 Et sanen akapangyanla ra na panagkamasiken ed balang sakey ya Iglesia, tan kayari inpampikasi ra a tinekepan na panayunal, inmatalek da ra ed Katawan, a sikato so sinisia ra. 

Act 14:24 Et linmabas ira ed Pisidia, et linmara ed Pamfilia. 

Act 14:25 Et kayari inpangipakabat da na salita ed Perge, linma ra ed Atalia; 

Act 14:26 Et nanlapud man nansakay ira a linma ed Antioquia, a diman ira nimatalek ed pamalangkap na Dios, nipaakar ed gawa a sinumpal da. 

Act 14:27 Et sanen akasabi ra, tan atipon da so iglesia, inolit da so saray amin a bengat Ian ginawa na Dios ed sikara tan say inpangilukas to ed saray Gentiles na pinto na pananisia. 

Act 14:28 Et nanayam irad man, ed saray binangatan ed aliwa daiset a panaon. 



Act 15:1 Et walaray totoo a nanlapu ed Judea et inbangat da so saray agagi ya inkuan da: No ag kayo pagalsiman onong ed ugali nen Moises ag yo nayarian so nilaban. 

Act 15:2 Dia ed ontan, nen agawa so sakey ya aliwa'n daiset a sangsangan tan gotgot ed kindi Pablo tan Bernabe ya onsumpa ed sikara, nankakasakey ira ya onla ed Jerusalem di Pablo tan Bernabe, pati saray arum ed sikara, pian amtaen da so saya a sangsangan ed saray apostol tan ed saray mamasiken. 

Act 15:3 Sikara sirin, nen sikara so intonton na Iglesia, linmabas ira ed Fenicia tan Samaria, ya inpaliwawa ra so inpanpataoli na saray Gentiles, tan sikara so akapangiter na baleg a liket ed saray amin ya agagi. 

Act 15:4 Et sanen akasabi ra ed Jerusalem, sikara so inawat na Iglesia tan saray apostoles tan mamasiken, et inolit da so amin a bengatlan ginawa na Dios ed sikara. 

Act 15:5 Balet inmalagey so arum ya anisia, a kabiangan na saray Fariseo, a nankuan: Kaokolan a galsiman ira, et ibilin ed sikara a sumpalen da so gangan nen Moises. 

Act 15:6 Et nantitipon so saray apostoles tan saray mamasiken pian motecteken da so saya'n bengatla. 

Act 15:7 Et sanen agawa so baleg a sangsangan, inmalagey si Pedro, et inkuan to ed sikara: Agagi, amta yo a dia ed saray inmuna'n agew, say Dios pinili to ed sikayo a saray Gentiles dengelen da ed sangik so salita na evangelio tan pian manisia ra. 

Act 15:8 Et say Dios, a kaba'to so saray kapusoan, pinaletan to ra ya initer to ed sikara met so Espiritu Santo a singa dia ed sikatayo, 

Act 15:9 Et ag nangawa na nandumaan dia ed sikara tan dia ed sikatayo, et ginogolan to so kapusoan da dia ed pananisia. 

Act 15:10 Natan sirin, akin et mangawa kayo na panali ed Dios, ya iyan yo ed tenger na saray babangatan so pako ya angan saray atateng tayo, angan sikatayo ag tayo ayarian ya inawit? 

Act 15:11 Balet manisia itayo a nilaban itayo ed panamegley na gracia nen Jesus a Katawan, a singa met sikara 

Act 15:12 Dia ed saman sara'y amin a karakel ag ira inmesel ed dinengel da si Bernabe tan si Pablo, ya inolit da so saray tanda tan makapakelaw a ginawa na Dios ed Gentil ed panamegley da. 

Act 15:13 Et nen tinmon da ra a nansalita, si Santiago inmebat, a nankuan: Agagi, dengel yo ak: 

Act 15:14 Si Simon inoli'to no panon so indalaw na Dios ya inmuna ed saray Gentiles, pian mangala ed sikara na totoo a nipaakar ed ngaran to. 

Act 15:15 Et matukoy ed saya so saray salita na saray profetas, onong ya wala'n nisulat: 

Act 15:16 Dia ed kayari na saraya ompawil ak naani, Et omanen ko naani ya ipaalagey so abung nen David ya wala'n naplag la, Et omanen ko naani ya ipaalagey so saray pader to ya aderal, Tan ipaalagey ko naani: 

Act 15:17 Ta pian say kera ed saray totoo anapen da so Katawan, Tan amin na saray Gentiles a sikara so natawag ed ngaran ko, 

Act 15:18 Kuan na Katawan, a nangawa ed saray a'n bengatla ya akabatan nanlapu ed inmuna. 

Act 15:19 Kanian isipen ko ya ag tayo komon gotgoten so saray manpataoli ed Dios a manlapu ed saray Gentiles, 

Act 15:20 Noag ingen insula'tayo ed sikara, ya onarawi ra ed saray bagat a maani to ed saray aliwan tuan Dios tan ed pilalawan, tan ed anto a nalner, tan ed dala. 

Act 15:21 Ta si Moises, nanlapu ed saray daan a kapulian, wala ed binaleybaley so mangipulong ed sikato, a nabasbasa ed saray sinagoga ed balang Sabaton. 

Act 15:22 Diad saman apaabig na saray apostoles tan saray mamasiken, pati say lapag ya Iglesia, a maong no manpili ra ed saray lalaki ya ibara, et ibaki da ra ed Antioquia, pati si Pablo tan si Bernabe: salanti si Judas ya inngaran a Barsabas, tan si Silas, lalaki a manonaan ed saramay 

Act 15:23 Et insulat da so say a ed pana-megley da: Sikami ya apostol tan mamasiken, agagi, ipabano mi ed saray agagi ya wala ed saray Gentil ed Antioquia, tan Siria tan Cilicia: 

Act 15:24 Lapu'd nadngelan mi a pigara'n totoo a nanlapu ed sikami, impanegagel da kayo ed salita a ginotgot da so saray kamarerwa yo, ya agmi ta ginangan; 

Act 15:25 Apaabig mi a nankasakeyan, a maong so panili ed saray lalaki et ibakimi ra ed sikayo, pati saray inadaro mi a Bernabe tan Pablo, 

Act 15:26 Lalaki ya insanla ra so bilay da lapu'd ngaran nen Katawan tayo a Jesus-Cristo. 

Act 15:27 Imbaki mi lanti di Judas tan Silas a sikara so mangipaam ta ed sikayo met ed sangi ra a dili na saya'n bengatla. 

Act 15:28 Ta say Espiritu Santo tan sikami so ag mangipasakbat ed sikayo na babaleg ya awit nen saraya'n bengatla'n kaokolan: 

Act 15:29 Ya onarawi kayo ed saray bengatla'n nibagat ed saray talintao, tan saray dala, tan ed bengatla a nalner, tan ed pilalawan; et no manlikas kayo ed saraya'n bengatla, maong naani nagawaan yo. Maong komon so palabasen yo. 

Act 15:30 Kanian sikara, nen inbakida la ra linma ra ed Antioquia, et nen tinipon da so karaklan, initer da so sulat. 

Act 15:31 Et nen abasa ra, akaliket ira lapu ed saray inpamaligliwa. 

Act 15:32 Et si Judas tan si Silas, a profeta ra met, niligliwada'ra so agagi ed dakel a salita, tan pinaletan da ra. 

Act 15:33 Et sanen tinmilak iradman ed pigara'n agew, sikara'y inbaki a mareereen na saray agagi ed saray nangangan ed sikara. 

Act 15:34 (Balet pinaabig nen Silas so natilak diman). 

Act 15:35 Et di Pablo tan Bernabe nanayam ira ed Antioquia, ya inbangat da tan inpulong da so salita na Katawan pati saray arum a dakel met a totoo. 

Act 15:36 Et nen linmabas so pigaran agew, si Pablo kuan to ed Bernabe: Ompawil ita la et dalawen ta so saray agagi ed balang ciudad ya angipulongan ta na Salita na Katawan, no panon ira. 

Act 15:37 Et si Bernabe labay to komon ya itarok da met si Juan a manngaran na Marcos. 

Act 15:38 Balet si Pablo ag to pinaabig ya itarok so akisian ed sikara nanlapu ed Pamfilia, tan ag tinmombok ed sikara ed saman a gawa. 

Act 15:39 Et agawa ed sikara so baleg a sansangan, a nansian ira a dua, et si Bernabe inala to si Marcos, et nansakay ira a linma ed Chipre; 

Act 15:40 Balet si Pablo, nen pinili to si Silas, sinmipot ya inpipikasi na saray agagi ed gracia na Katawan. 

Act 15:41 Et. linma ed Siria tan Cilicia, a pinaletan to so saray Iglesia. 



Act 16:1 Et linma met ed Derbe tan Listra: et nia, waladman so sakey a binangatan, a manngaran na Timoteo, anak na sakey a bii a Judia a mananisia, balet say ama to taga Grecia. 

Act 16:2 Sikatoy walaan maong a dengel na inkasikato a nanlapu ed saray agagi ya wala ed Listra tan Iconio. 

Act 16:3 Saya kinaliktan nen Pablo a mila ed sikato; et nen inala to, ginalsiman to lapu ed saray Judio ya wala ed saraman a pasen, ta amin kabat da a say ama to taga Grecia. 

Act 16:4 Et dia ed indalan da ed saray ciudad, initer da ed sikara, pian sumpalen da so saray gangan a pinaabig na saray apostoles, tan saray mamasiken ya wala ed Jerusalem. 

Act 16:5 Kanian saray Iglesia apaletan ira ed pananisia, et dinmakel so bilang da ed inagewagew. 

Act 16:6 Et linmabas ira ed dalin na Frigia tan Galacia, ya inyawa na Espiritu Santo ya ipulong da so salita diman ed Asia; 

Act 16:7 Et nen sinmabi ra ed arap na Misia, ninonot da so onla ed Bitinia; et say Espiritu nen Jesus ag to ra inabuloyan; 

Act 16:8 Et nen nilabsanan da so Misia, linmara ed Troas. 

Act 16:9 Et pinmayawar so sakey a pasingawey ed Pablo ed labi: Sakey a laki a taga Macedonia nanalagey ya akikasi ed sikato, a kuan to: Gala ed Macedonia et tulongan mo kami. 

Act 16:10 Et sanen anengneng to so pasingawey, tampol a siniglatan mi so linma ed Macedonia, ya inisip mi a say Dios tinawag to kami pian ipulong mi ed sikara so evangelio. 

Act 16:11 Sanen nansakay kami sirin nanlapu ed Troas, tinmalus kami ed Samotracia, et dia ed ontombok ya agew, diman ed Neapolis; 

Act 16:12 Et nanlapud man, diman ed Filipos, a sikato so ononan ciudad na Macedonia, onona'n dalin ed saya'n distrito ya panuleyan na Roma: et nanayam kami ed saya'n ciudad ed pigaran agew. 

Act 16:13 Et dia ed agew na Sabaton linma kami ed paway na pinto ed gilig na sakey ya ilog, a diman so inisip min kawalaay pasen na panagpikasian: et imyorong kami, tan akisalitaan mi so saray bibii a linma, a nantitipon. 

Act 16:14 Et sakey a bii a manngaran na Lidia, managla ko na kawes a purpura, taga ciudad na Tiatira, sakey ya angigalang ed Dios, dinengel to kami: a nilukasan na Katawan so puso to, pian imatonan to so saray sasalitaen nen Pablo. 

Act 16:15 Et sanan abinyagan a pati saray kaamong to, akikasi ed sikami a nankuan: No inisip yo a mananisia ak ed Katawan, loob kayo ed abung ko, tan ondawes kayod man. Et pinilitan to kami. 

Act 16:16 Et agawa, a sanen linma kami ed pasen na panagpikasian, sakey a marikit ya wala so espiritu to ed panagparles inabe'to kami, a dakel so nalmo to ed panagparles to, ya initer to ed saray katawan to. 

Act 16:17 Saya, nen tinmombok ed beneg nen Pablo tan ed sikami, nanakis a kuan to: Sarayan totoo ariripen ira na Sankatageyan a Dios a sikara so mangipaliwawa ed sikayo na dalan na kilalaban 

Act 16:18 Et saya ginagawgawa to ed andukey ya agew. Balet si Pablo sinmanok, et nen inarap to, inkuan to ed saman so espiritu: Igangan ko ed sika ed ngaran nen Jesu-Cristo ya ompaway ka ed sikato. Et pinmaway ed saman lanlamang ya horas. 

Act 16:19 Et sanen anengneng na saray katawan to ya abalang so ilalo na pinanabang da, inerel da di Pablo tan Silas, et ingayogoy da ra ed plaza ya inyakar ed arap na saray makauley, 

Act 16:20 Et sanen nidongo da'ra ed saray okom, inkuan da; Saray a'n totoo, anta Judio ra, gogoloen da'n toloy so ciudad tayo. 

Act 16:21 Et ibabangat da so saray ugali ya ag manepeg ed sikami ya akoen tan gawaen, lapu ed Romano kami. 

Act 16:22 Et inmalagey a nantitipon so karaklan ya onsumpa ed sikara: et saray okom pinipilat da so kawes da, et inpalewet da ra. 

Act 16:23 Et nen alewet da la ra na dakel, inloob da ra ed panangipangawan et inbilin da ed managbantay ed panangipangawan ya imatonan to ra a maong: 

Act 16:24 Sikato nen naawa'to so saya a gangan, inloob to ra ed karaldalman na panangipangawan, et inyan to so sali ra ed cepoan. 

Act 16:25 Balet dia ed pegley labi, nen si Pablo tan si Silas manpipikasira, nankakanta ra na himno pinaakar ed Dios, et saray pinangaw ya wadman sikara so dengdenglen da; 

Act 16:26 Et kasanlilik na agawa so sakey a baleg a yegyeg, a saray cimiento na panangipangawan ginmalaw ira: et alukasan ira'n tampol so saray amin a kaput; et naokbar so saray balor dan amin. 

Act 16:27 Et sanen aliing ed ugip to so bantay ed panangipangawan, tan nen anengneng to ya alukasan so saray kaput na panangipangawan, binago'to so kampilan to, et ngalngali pinatey to so sikaton dili, ta inisip to a tinmainan so saray pinangaw. 

Act 16:28 Balet si Pablo inmakis ed maksil a voces, a nankuan: Ag mo gawaen so bengatla a duksa ed laman mo, ta wadia kami ya amin. 

Act 16:29 Et sikato nen kinmerew na silew, binmatik ed loob, et mangiwgiw a dinmakmomo ed arap di Pablo tan Silas, 

Act 16:30 Tan inpaway tora a kuan to: Kakatawan, anto so nakaokolan ko gawaen pian nilabanak? 

Act 16:31 Et kuan da: Manisia ka ed Katawan a Jesus, et nilaban ka, sika tan say abung mo. 

Act 16:32 Et inpaliwawa ra ed sikato so Salita na Katawan, a pati saray amin ya wala ed abung to. 

Act 16:33 Et nen inala to ra ed saman met lanlamang ya horas ed labi, inurasan to so bilerbiler; da; et tampol ya inpabinyagan, sikato tan amin a kabaley to. 

Act 16:34 Et inawi'tora ed abung to, tan indongoan to ra na kanen, et aliketan na baleg, ya anisia ed Dios, pati amin a kaamong to. 

Act 16:35 Et sanen kabuasan la, saray ekom inbaki ra so saray sargentos a kuan da: Ibulos mo so saray totoo. 

Act 16:36 Et say managbantay na panangipangawan inpakaba'to so saray salita ed Pablo, a kuan to: Saray okom nanbaki ra pian ibolos takayo: natan, sirin, paway kayo la, tan nakila ed kareenan. 

Act 16:37 Balet kuan nen Pablo ed sikara: Nilewet da kami ed karaklan na too ya andi inkaokom, anta too kami a taga Roma, et inpokok da kami ed panangipangawan; et natan papawayen da kami ed maamot? Tua ya andi ingen no ag sikara so onla dia a dili tan mangaon ed sikami. 

Act 16:38 Et saray sargentos inbaga ra ed saray okom so saraya'n salita, et atakot ira nen nadngel da a sikara so taga Roma; 

Act 16:39 Et linma ra tan akikasian da ra; et sanen inpaway da ra, kinerew da ed sikara ya onarawi ra ed baley. 

Act 16:40 Et pinmaway ira ed panangipangawan; tan linmoob ira ed abung nen Lidia, et sanen anengneng da so saray agagi, niligliwa da ra, et insan ira tinmainan. 



Act 17:1 Et sanen nilabsanan da so Amfipolis tan Apolonia, sinmabi ra ed Tesalonica, a sikato so kawalaan na sinagoga na saray Judios: 

Act 17:2 Et si Pablo, onong ed ugali to, linmoob ed sikara, et dia ed talora'n agew na Sabaton akiebebatan ed sikara nipaakar ed saray sulat, 

Act 17:3 Ya inpaliwawa to, tan inpatnag to a kaokolan nen saman a manirap si Cristo, tan onoli ed bilay dia ed saray inatey; et saya a Jesus ya inpakabat ko ed sikayo, inkuan to, sikato so Cristo. 

Act 17:4 Et saray arum ed sikara anisia ra, tan akiolop ira ed kindi Pablo tan Silas; ontan met ed saray masimpit a Griego sakey a baleg a karaklan, tan ed bibii a manonaan aliwa a dagdaiset. 

Act 17:5 Balet saray Judios, bangta sinmiblet ira, angala ra na pigara ed saray totoo'n mauges dia ed plaza, et nen anipon ira na totoo, ginotgot da so ciudad, et nen sinegep da so abung nen Jason, sineetan da ra a yakar komon ed saray ombaley. 

Act 17:6 Et sanen agda ra nalmo, insagarsagar da si Jason tan pigara ya aga,gi ed arap na saray makauley na baley, ya iyaakis da: Saraya a mangogotgot na mundo, linmara dia met; 

Act 17:7 A sikara so pinarawes nen Jason: et sarayan amin mangawa ra na sumpa ed saray gangan nen Cesar, a kuan da ya wala so sananey ya ari, salanti Jesus. 

Act 17:8 Et ginolo ra so karaklan tan saray makauley ed ciudad sanen nadngel da so sarayan bengatla. 

Act 17:9 Et nen akaala ra na pangipegetan ed kinen Jason tan ed saray arum, insan da ra inbolos. 

Act 17:10 Et saray agagi, tampol inbaki ra ed labi di Pablo tan Silas diman ed Berea: sanen sikara so akasabi man, linmoob ira ed sinagoga na saray Judios. 

Act 17:11 Et mapagalang iraya nen saray wala ed Tesalonica, tan inako ra so salita ed sipaparaan a nonot; inagewagew ya inusisa ra so sulat, no peteg so sarayan bengatla, 

Act 17:12 Kanian dakel ed sikara so anisia; ed saray bibii a Griego a sankablian, tan ed saray lalaki, ya aliwa'n daiset. 

Act 17:13 Balet sanen akabatan na saray Judios ed Tesalonica, a diman ed Berea inpaliwawa met nen Pablo so Salita na Dios, linma'rad man lamet, a sinogsugan da tan ginotgot da so karaklan. 

Act 17:14 Et sanen ontan, tampol a saray agagi inbaki ra si Pablo ya onla anga ed dayat: et si Silas tan si Timoteo atilak irad man. 

Act 17:15 Balet saray angolop ed Pablo sikato so inawit da anga ed Atenas: et nen naawat da so gangan ed Silas tan Timoteo pian onla ra ed sikato a magangano, sinmipot ira. 

Act 17:16 Et legan nen Pablo a nanalagar ed sikara ed Atenas, agotgot so espiritu to ed loob to lapud inpakanengneng to ed baley a napno na talintao. 

Act 17:17 Kanian akisangsangan dia ed sinagoga na saray Judio tan ed saray totoo a masimpit, tan inagewagew ya aki-ebatan ed saray akaromog ed sikato ed plaza. 

Act 17:18 Et saray arum met ed saray filosofo ya Epicureo tan Estoico akisang sangan ira ed sikato; et saray arum kuan da: Anto so labay ton ibaga so saya'n malabir? Et saray arum kuan da met: Singa sakey a mangipupulong na saray sankaili a dirios; lapu'd inpangipulong to ed Jesus tan say kioli ed bilay. 

Act 17:19 Et sikato so inala ra, tan sikato so inyakar da ed Areopago, ya inkuan da: Nayarian mi ya amtaen no anto so sayan balo a bangat a sasalitaen mo? 

Act 17:20 Ta awiten mo ed saray kalayagan mi so saray balo abengatla: labay mi, sirin, ya amtaen no anto so saray kabaliksan na saraya. 

Act 17:21 (Ta amin so taga Atenas tan saray sankaili a manaayam diman, angapo so arum ya aarapen da no ag mansalita odino ondengel na balo a bengatla.) 

Act 17:22 Et inmalagey si Pablo ed pegley na Areopago, et kuan to: Lalakin taga Atenas, dia ed amin a bengatla, nanengneng ko a mapagalang kayo'n toloy ed pidiosan. 

Act 17:23 Ta dia'd inlabas ko tan innengneng ko ed saray pikakasian yo, aromog ko so sakey ya altar met a kawalaan na saya'n sulat: DIA ED SAKEY A DIOS YA AG AMTA. Saman sirin so igalgalang yo ya ag yo amta, sikato so ipakabat ko ed sikayo. 

Act 17:24 Say Dios a nangawa ed mundo tan saray amin a bengatla ya wala ed sikato, bangta sikato so Katawan na tawen tan dalin, ag manayam ed saray templos a ginawa na saray lima. 

Act 17:25 Tan ag met napanlinkoran na limalima na saray totoo, a singa bilang wala so nakaokolan to ya antokaman; anta sikato a dili so man giter ed amin na bilay, say linawa, tan amiami bengatla: 

Act 17:26 Et dia ed saksakey a too ginawa to a pansengegan na amin a naciones na saray totoo, pian manayam ira ed amin a tapew na dalin, onong a tinandaan to so pansasaginonor na panaon, tan saray pangangaan na panagayaman da; 

Act 17:27 Pian anapen da so Dios, ompan dia ed pankarkarapas da, sikato so naromog da, angan wala ed ag arawi ed sinansakey ed sikatayo: 

Act 17:28 Ta manbilay itayo ed sikato, tan ongalaw itayo, tan wala ed sikato so inkatoo tayo; singa met saray arum a poeta yo inkuan da: "Ta kailalakan to itayo met." 

Act 17:29 Bangta kailalakan itayo sirin na Dios, ag tayo nepeg a nonoten a say Dios mipara ed balitok, odino pilak, odino bato, odino talintao a ginawa na karunongan tan kakabatan na too. 

Act 17:30 Saray panaon sirin na andi pikakabat sikara so pinalabas na Dios, balet natan ibilin to ed amin a too, dia ed amin a pasen, a magbabawi ra: 

Act 17:31 Bangta tinandaan to so sakey ya agew a sikato so pangokom to naani ed mundo onong ed katunongan, ed panamegley na saman a laki a tinandaan to; a sikato so pinaletan to ed saray amin, a sikato so pinaoli to ed bilay a nanlapu ed saray inatey. 

Act 17:32 Et kadngel da na nipaakar ed kioli ed bilay na saray inatey, saray arum sikatoy, inelekan da, et saray arum inkuan da: Dengelen mi ka ed maminsan lamet nipaakar ed saya. 

Act 17:33 Dia ed ontan pinmaway si Pablo, dia ed pegley da. 

Act 17:34 Balet saray arum a totoo nen akitipon ira ed sikato, anisia ra; ed sikara sakey met si Dionisio ya Areopago, tan sakey a bii a manngara'y Damaris, tan arum ni ya ibiba ra. 



Act 18:1 Kayari na saraya'n bengatla, sikato so tinmainan ed Atenas, et linma ed Corinto. 

Act 18:2 Et aromog to so sakey a Judio a manngaran na Aquila, nianak ed Ponto, kasabisabi to a nanlapu ed Italia, tan si Priscila ya asawa to; ta si Claudio ingangan to ya amin so saray Judio ontainan ira ed Roma; et linma ed sikara; 

Act 18:3 Et lapu ed nanpara so anapen da, akituloy ed sikara, et kinmimey ira; ta say anapan da'y bilay managgawa'y tolda. 

Act 18:4 Et nankatonongan ed sinagoga ed amin a Sabaton et sineetan to a sinimbawa so saray Judios tan Griegos. 

Act 18:5 Balet sanen di Silas tan Timoteo sinmabi ra nanlapu ed Macedonia, si Pablo wala a naspot a toloy ed panagpulong a papaletan to ed saray Judios a si Jesus sikato so Cristo. 

Act 18:6 Et nen sinumpa ra tan inayew da, inpayag to so kawes to, tan inkuan to ed sikara: Say dala yo ondapo komon ed saray dilin olo yo; siak malinisak; manlapud natan onla ak ed saray Gentiles. 

Act 18:7 Et tinmainan diman, et linmoob ed abung na sakey a top a manngaray Tito Justo, a maitatakot ed Dios, a say abung to wala ed abay na sinagoga. 

Act 18:8 Et si Crispo ya pangolo na sinagoga anisia ed Katawan, pati amin a kaamong to: et dakel ed saray taga Corinto so nandengel, et anisiara, tan abinyagan ira. 

Act 18:9 Et say Katawan inkuan to ed Pablo dia ed labi ed sakey a pasingawey: Ag ka natakot, mansalita ka ingen, tan ag ka manermen: 

Act 18:10 Ta wala ak ed sika, et angapoy manenyeg ed sika a mangabil ed sika ; ta dakel so took ed sayan baley. 

Act 18:11 Et nanayam diman ed sakey ta on tan anem bulan, ya inbabanga'to ed pegley da so Salita na Dios. 

Act 18:12 Balet nen peles a proconsul na Acaya si Galion, saray Judios nankakasakey ira a dinmogpa ed Pablo, et sikato so inyakar da ed arap na panangokoman. 

Act 18:13 Ya inkuan da: Sayan too kokoyongen to so saray totoo a mangigalang ed Dios, a sumpa ed gangan. 

Act 18:14 Balet nen ngalngali besuaten nen Pablo so sangi to, si Galion inkuan to ed saray Judio: No wala komon so duksa odino kasalanan ya ambelat, oh! sikayo a Judio, onong na wala ed katunongan siak itepel takayo komon: 

Act 18:15 Balet no sangsangan labat ed saray salita, tan ngarangaran, tan say dilin gangan yo nengneng yo! siak ag ko labay so mangokom na saraya a bengatla. 

Act 18:16 Et pinaekal to 'rad man ed panangokoman. 

Act 18:17 Et sikara ya amin inalara si Sostenes, makauley na sinagoga, et sikato so kinabil da ed arap na panangokoman : et ag ya inimatonan nen Galion. 

Act 18:18 Et si Pablo kayari inpanayam to ed dakel ni ya agew, pinmatanir ed saray agagi, et nansakay a linma ed Siria, et akiolop ed sikato di Priscila tan Aquila, nen kayari inpangiskis to ed olo to diman ed Cencrea, ta wala so sipan to. 

Act 18:19 Et sinmabira ed Efeso et tinainan to rad man: et sikato so linmoob ed sinagoga, et akiebebatan ed saray Judio. 

Act 18:20 Et nen akikasianda a natilak ed andokey ya agew, ag to inmabuloy; 

Act 18:21 No ag ingen nanpatanir ed sikara, ya inkuanto: Ompawilak lamet ed sikayo no linawa na Dios, et nansakay nanlapu ed Efeso. 

Act 18:22 Et nen linmasor ed Cesarea, sinmakbit, et nen akapangibano ed Iglesia, linma ed Antioquia. 

Act 18:23 Et nen nanayam diman ed pigara ya agew, tinmainan ya inakar to so dalin na Galacia tan Frigia, a pinaletan to ya amin so saray babangatan. 

Act 18:24 Et linma ed Efeso so sakey a Judio, a manngaran na Apolos, tubo ed Alejandria, laki'n maronong a mansalita tan makapanyari ed saray sulat. 

Act 18:25 Sayan too abangatan ed dalan na Katawan, et lapu'd maralit ed espiritu, nansasalita tan nanbabangat a maseet na saray bengatlan nipaakar ed Jesus, et salambengat ya amta to so binyag nen Juan; 

Act 18:26 Et ingapo to so nansalita a sankapelelan dia ed sinagoga. Balet sanen sikato so nadngel di Priscila tan Aquila, sikato so inawit da, et inpaliwawa ra ed sikato ed lalo ya ayadyari so dalan na Dios. 

Act 18:27 Et sanen labay to so onalis ya onla ed Acaya, saray agagi pinabiskeg da so linawa to, et nansulat ira ed saray babangatan pian sikato so akoen da: et sanen akasabid man dakel so intulong to ed saray anisia, lapu ed panamegley na gracia; 

Act 18:28 Ta tinalo to so saray Judios ed sankabalgan a pakayari ed arap na karaklan, ya inpaliwawa to ed panamegley na saray sulat a si Jesus sikato so Cristo. 



Act 19:1 Et agawa a leleg ya nen Apolos ya wadman ed Corinto si Pablo, sanen naakar to so saray atagey a kadalinan, linma ed Efeso, et aromogto so saray pigaran babangatan. 

Act 19:2 Et kuan to ed sikara: Inako yo so Espiritu Santo nen sikayo so anisia? Et inkuan da ed sikato: Andi, et agmi met ni nadngelan ya wala so Espiritu Santo. 

Act 19:3 Et inkuan to: Anto sirin so akabinyagan yo? Et inkuan da: dia ed binyag nen Juan. 

Act 19:4 Et inkuan nen Pablo : Si Juan aminyag ed binyag na panagpataoli, ya inkuan to ed saray ombaley, a manisiara komon ed samay ontombok naani ed sikato, salanti, si Jesus. 

Act 19:5 Et nen nadngel da so saya, nanbinyag ira ed ngaran nen Jesus a Katawan. 

Act 19:6 Et sanen intapew to nen Pablo so saray lima to ed sikara, linma ed sikara so Espiritu Santo; et nansalita ra na nagsisananey a salita, et nanprofeta ra. 

Act 19:7 Et sikara ya amin wala so labindua a katao. 

Act 19:8 Et sikato'y linmoob ed sinagoga, et nansalita a sitetepel ed loob na talora'n bulan, akiebebatan tan inkalar to so saray bengatla'n nipaakar ed panarian na Dios. 

Act 19:9 Balet lapu'd no saray arum nanpaawet ira tan ag ira anisia, a binalaw da so Dalan ed arap na saray karaklan, tinmainan ed sikara, et inyarawi to so saray binangatan, ya akiebebatan ya inagewagew ed panbabangatan nen Tiranno. 

Act 19:10 Et saya agawa ed loob na duaran taon; dia ed ontan ya amin a manaayam ed Asia, saray Judios tan saray Griegos, nadngel da so salita na Katawan. 

Act 19:11 Et say Dios nangawa na makapakelaw a tanda ed panamegley na saray lima nen Pablo: 

Act 19:12 Dia ed ontan, a saray pafio tan tapiz a manlapu ed sikato a yakar da ed saray agmakayari, naandi ed sikara so sakisakit, et saray mauges ya espiritu pinmaway ed sikara. 

Act 19:13 Balet arum ed saray Judios a manakarakar ya exorcista, sinali ra a tinawag so ngaran nen Jesus a Katawan nipaakar ed saray wala a mauges ya espiritu ra, ya inkuan da: Ibilin ko ed sikayo ed panamegley nen Jesus ya ipupulong neng Pablo. 

Act 19:14 Et saray pitora ya anak nen Sceva, a Judio, sakey a manonaan na saray sacerdotes so nangawa na saya. 

Act 19:15 Balet samay espiritu a mauges inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara; Kabat ko si Jesus tan kabat ko met si Pablo; balet siopa kayo? 

Act 19:16 Et saman so too a kawalaan na mauges ya espiritu linmokso ed sikara, et inegnaan to so duara ed sikara, et tinalo to ra, kanian binmatik ira ed saman ya abung a silalakseb ira tan sugatan. 

Act 19:17 Et saya akabatan na amin a Judios, tan Griegos a nanayam ed Efeso; et sinmabi ed sikara ya amin so takot, et nigalgalang so ngaran nen Jesus a Katawan. 

Act 19:18 Et dakel met ed saray anisia so nanpatua ra tan inpatnag da so saray gawagawa ra. 

Act 19:19 Et aliwa'n daiset ed saray maanito so nantipon na saray libro ra, et pinoolan da ra ed arap da ya amin: et binilang da so bili ra, et aromog a limamplon libo a denario a pilak. 

Act 19:20 Dia ed ontan binmaleg so salita na Katawan tan tinmalona. 

Act 19:21 Et kayari saraya a bengatla, si Pablo ginetma to ed espiritu to so onla ed Jerusalem, ya ondalan ed Macedonia tan Acaya, a kuan to; Sano kayarik ya onlad man, kaokolan ko met a nengnengen so Roma. 

Act 19:22 Et nen inbaki to ed Macedonia so duara ed saray ontotolong ed sikato, di Timoteo, tan Erasto, sikato so atilak ed Asia ed pigaran agew. 

Act 19:23 Et diad saman met a panaon agawa so sakey ya aliwan melamelag ya gonigon nipaakar ed Dalan. 

Act 19:24 Ta sakey a manngaran na Demetrio, panday na pilak, a sikato so nangawa na ankekelag a simbaan a pilak nen Diana, angyakar na aliwan dagdaiset ya anapan ed saray komikimey: 

Act 19:25 A sikara so tinipon to, pati saray komikimey ed saraya a nengneng na anapan, tan inkuan to: Kakatawan: amta yo a manlapu ed sayan anapan so yamanan tayo. 

Act 19:26 Et nanengneng yo tan narengelyo, aliwa labat ed Efeso, no ag dia ed ngalngali a lapag na Asia, a sayan Pablo nankoyong tan pinapaliis to so dakel ya ombaley, ya inkuan to ya aliwa rayan dios kono so ginawa na saray lima: 

Act 19:27 Et aliwa labat ya wala so kaatapan ed kaandi kakanaan na sayan anapan tayo, no ag ingen say simbaan met na baleg a diosa Diana naandi naani kablian to, et ongapu met naani a nabagbag so katageyan to ya igagalang na amin ya Asia tan sankamundoan. 

Act 19:28 Et nen nadngel da so saya, napno ra na sanok, et naningal ira, a nankuan: Baleg si Diana na saray taga Efeso! 

Act 19:29 Et say ciudad napno na golo: et nankakasakeyan da a nilooban so teatro, ya inerel da di Gayo tan Aristarko, totoo ataga Macedonia, ya iba nen Pablo ra ed inpanakar to. 

Act 19:30 Et nen labay komon nen Pablo so onloob ed baley, saray binangatan sikato so ag da inabuloyan. 

Act 19:31 Et arum ed saray makauley met ed Asia a kakaaro to, nanbaki ra ed sikato na nankerew ya ag onpatnag ed teatro.

Act 19:32 Et saray arum inyaakis da so sakey a bengatla, et saray arum sananey met: ta say singbatan wala ed kagoloan, et say karaklan ag da amta no anto so nantitiponan da. 

Act 19:33 Et inakar da si Alejandro ed karaklan, a sikato so inyan da ed onaan na saray Judio. Et si Alejandro, nen pinatonda to ra ya inandawesan na limato, kinaliktan to ya ipaliwawa ed ombaley so katunongan to. 

Act 19:34 Balet nen akabatan da a sikato so Judio, amin da nankakasakey ira a naningal ed loob na dua ra ya horas: Baleg si Diana na saray taga Efeso! 

Act 19:35 Samanla, say Secretario na baley, nen pinadeen to so karaklan, inkuan to: Lalaki a taga Efeso, siopa a too kasi so ag mikabat a say baley na saray taga Efeso sikato so managbantay na simbaan nen baleg a Diana, tan say talintao a nanlapu ed kinen Jupiter? 

Act 19:36 Bangta saya ag nayari a sumpaen, nepeg yo so ondeen, tan angapo komon so gawaen yo ya pakaimatleken. 

Act 19:37 Ta inyakar yo dia so saraya a totoo, anta ag ira matakew ed saray simbaan tan ag ira nansalita na mabanday ed diosa tayo. 

Act 19:38 Sirin, no si Demetrio tan saray komikimey ya wala ed sikato wala so antokaman a nidalem da ya onsumpa ed siopaman, wala a silulukas so saray panangokoman, et walara met so proconsul a mangokom: mandadaleman, sirin, so sakey tan sakey. 

Act 19:39 Balet no wala so arum ya anapen yo a bengatla, naokom naani ed manepag a singbatan. 

Act 19:40 Ta tua a maatap itayo a nidalem nipaakar ed golo ed saya'n agew, ta angapo so antokaman a nayarian tayo ya ibaraan nipaakar ed saya ya inkatipon. 

Act 19:41 Et sanen akapansalitala naonia, pinasipot, to so singbatan. 



Act 20:1 Et Kayari a inton da so golo, nen tinawag nen Pablo so saray binangatan, tan binilin tora, pinmatanir ed sikara, et tinmainan a linma ed Macedonia. 

Act 20:2 Et sanen nakar to la so saraman a dalin, tan naitdan tola ra na dakel a bilin, linma ed Grecia. 

Act 20:3 Et sanen akapanayam lad man na taloy bulan, tan saray Judio labay da wari a liputan nen manpipikal ya onla ed Siria, ninono'to so onpawil ya ondalaw ed Macedonia. 

Act 20:4 Et sikato so inibaan ya anga ed Asia nen Sopatro a taga Berea, anak nen Pirro, et dia ed saray taga Tesalonica, di Aristarco tan Segundo, tan si Gayo a taga Derbe, tan si Timoteo; et dia ed saray taga Asia, di Tiquico tan Trofimo. 

Act 20:5 Balet saraya, inmuna la ra, inalagar da kami ed Troas. 

Act 20:6 Et nansakay kami a nanlapu ed Filipo, nen kalabas na saray agew na tintinapay ya andian na levadura, et linma kami ed sikara ed Troas ed loob na limara'n agew, a diman kami nanayam ed pitoy agew. 

Act 20:7 Et nen inmuna ya agew na simba, nen atiptipon kami pian apagapagen mi so tinapay, si Pablo inbabanga to ra, ta ontainan ed kaimbuasan; et indukey to so nanpulong anga ed pegley labi. 

Act 20:8 Et wala ray dakel a silew ed tagey na silir ya a tiptiponan mi. 

Act 20:9 Et sakey a balolaki a manngaran na Eutico ya imyorong ed dorongawen nala na sakey ya aralem a pakaugip, et leleg nen Pablo a manpapaliwawa ni, nala ed pakakaogip to, naplag nanlapu ed komatlo a grado na abung anga ed dalin, et inakop ya inatey. 

Act 20:10 Et linmasor si Pablo, et sikato so sinayakop to, tan nilakap to a nankuan: Ag kayo maningal; ta say bilay to wala ed sikato. 

Act 20:11 Et nen sinmegep tan pinisag to so tinapay tan angan, nansalita ed sikara na andukey anga ed kaimbuasan, insan tinmainan. 

Act 20:12 Et inakar da so balolaki a mabilabilay, et aligliwa ra na aliwa a daiset. 

Act 20:13 Balet sikami, nen inmuna kami a linma ed sakayan, nansakay kami a linma ed Asson, a diman mi awaten si Pablo, ta ontan so inbilin to, a ninono'to so onla a dili ya manakar. 

Act 20:14 Et sanen aromog to kami ed Asson, sikato so inlugan mi, et linma kami ed Mitiline. 

Act 20:15 Et sanen nansakay kami nanlapud man, sinmabi kami ed kaimbuasan ed petek na Chio, et dia ed ontombok ya agew dinmoong kami ed Samos; et (kayari intonda mi ed Trogilio), dia ed ongendan ya agew sinmabi kami ed Mileto. 

Act 20:16 Ta ginet ma nen Pablo a labsanan so Efeso, pian ag la manbayag ed Asia, ta sikato so maganat, ta no nayari komon, wala met ed Jerusalem ed agew na Pentecostes. 

Act 20:17 Et nanlapu ed Mileto nanbaki ed Efeso na anawag ed saray mamasiken ed Iglesia. 

Act 20:18 Et sanen sinmabi ra ed sikato, inkuan to ed sikara. Sikayo a dili amta yo, nanlapu ed inmuna'n agew ya inloob ko ed Asia, no panon so inpanayam ko ed sikayo ed amin ya agew, 

Act 20:19 A nanlinkor ed Katawan ed amin a kaabebaan na linawa, tan saray lua, tan saray inkasalsali a sinmabi ed siak lapu ed kasiliban na saray Judios; 

Act 20:20 Ya angapo so antokaman a pakapinabangan yo a pinaulian ko ya inpaliwawa ed sikayo tan inbangat ko ed sikayo a lapag, tan dia ed saray kaabungan, 

Act 20:21 A pinatuak ed saray Judios tan saray Griegos so panpatauli ed Dios, tan say pananisia ed Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo. 

Act 20:22 Et natan, nia posooten ak na Espiritu ya onla ed Jerusalem, ya ag ko amta so nagawa naani ed siak diman : 

Act 20:23 Ingen say Espiritu Santo ipatua to ed siak ed amin diad ciudad, a kuan to ya aalagden ak na saray kipangaw tan kairapan. 

Act 20:24 Balet angapo so antokaman a pankawanan ko ed bilay ko a singa bengatla a pablien ko, dapot nasumpal ko so akar ko, tan say betang ko ya inawat ko ed Katawan a Jesus, pian patuaen ko so evangelio na gracia na Dios. 

Act 20:25 Et natan, nia, amtak a sikayo ya amin a niliber ko ya angipulongan na panarian na Dios, ag yo la nanengneng so lupak. 

Act 20:26 Kanian patuaen ko ed sikayo ed saya'n agew, a malinis ak ed dala na saray amin a totoo. 

Act 20:27 Ta ag ko pinaulian so inpangipakabat ed sikayo na amin a kalar na Dios. 

Act 20:28 Aluaran yo so inkasika yo'n dili, tan say amin a kasimpokokan ya anginan na Espiritu Santo ed sikayo a managbantay, pian pastolan yo so Iglesia na Dios, a sikato so sinaliw to ed dala ton dili. 

Act 20:29 Amtak a kayari itainan ko, onloob naani ed pegley yo so saray masiban lobo, ya ag da perdonaen so kasimpokokan, 

Act 20:30 Et dia ed sikayo met lanlamang wala ra so onalagey naani a totoon mansalita na saray bengatla'n mabanday, pian tangoyoren da so saray binangatan ya ontombok ed sikara. -, 

Act 20:31 Kanian manpuyat kayo, a nodnonot yo a dia ed legan na taloran taon, ag ak tinmonda a nanbilin ed labi tan agew ed balang sakey a katekep na saray lua. 

Act 20:32 Et natan, imatalek ta kayo ed Dios, tan ed salita na gracia to; a sikato so makapanyari a mamasimpit tan mangiter ed sikayo na tawir, a mibiang ed saray amin a napasantos 

Act 20:33 Ag ko inaguman so pilak, odino balitok, odino kawes na siopaman. 

Act 20:34 Sikayo amta yo a dili a saraya so limak kinmana ra ed saray nakaokolan ko, tan saray wala ya ibak. 

Act 20:35 Dia ed amiamin a pamaakaran inter ko ed sikayo so pangaligan, a dia ed panagsagpot yo na ontan, nepeg yo a tulongan so saray makapoy, et nonot yo so saray salita nen Jesus a Katawan a sikato a dili kuan to: Lalo a mapalar so mangiter nen say mangawat. 

Act 20:36 Et nen nibaga to la so onia, tinmalimokor, et akikasi pati sikara ya amin. 

Act 20:37 Et sikara ya amin nannangis ira na baleg, et nilakap da ed beklew si Pablo, tan sikato so inangoban da, 

Act 20:38 A nanermen ira ya amin na mapalalo lapu ed salita ya inbaga to ya ag da la nanengneng naani so lupa to. Et sikato so inolop da ya anga ed sakayan. 



Act 21:1 Et sanen agawa so intulak mi, tan sinmian kami ed sikara, linma kami a mapmaptek ed Coos, et dia ed ontombok ya agew, dia ed Rodas, tan nanlapud man linma kami ed Patara: 

Act 21:2 Et sanen aromog mi sakey a sakayan ya onlabas ya onla ed Penicia, linmugan tan tinmulak kami. 

Act 21:3 Et sanen atandagan mi Chipre, sikatoy nilabasan mi ed dapit kawigi, et tinmula'kami a linma ed Siria, et sinmakbit kami ed Tiro: ta yepas diman na sakayan so lugan to. 

Act 21:4 Et sanen aromog mi so saray binangatan, nanayam kamid man na pito'y agew: et inkuan na saraya ed kinen Pablo, lapu ed pabano na Espiritu, ya ag komon onla ed Jerusalem. 

Act 21:5 Et sanen agawa ya apalabas mi la so saraman ya agew, tinmainan kami, et nanakar kami, et sikara ya amin inibaan da kami, pati saray kaasawaan da tan saray anak da, anga ed paway na ciudad; et nen tinmalimokor kami ed gilig na baybay, akikasi kami, (et nanpapataniran kami). 

Act 21:6 Et linmugan kami ed sakayan, et pinmawil ira ed kaabungan da. 

Act 21:7 Et nen asumpal mi la so inpansakay mi nanlapu ed Tiro, sinmabi kami ed Tolemaida; et nen nanpabano kami ed saray agagi, nanayam kami ed sikara a sakey agew. 

Act 21:8 Et dia ed kaimbuasan, tinmainan kami, et linma kami ed Cesarea: et linmoob kami ed abung nen Felipe ya evangelista, a sikato 'y sakey ed saray pitora tan akituloy kami ed sikato. 

Act 21:9 Et samay too wala so apatira ya anak to'n mamarikit a nanprofetara. 

Act 21:10 Et sanen nanayam kamid man na dakel ya agew, wala so sinmabin nanlapu ed Judea a sakey a too a managprofeta, a manngaran na Agabo. 

Act 21:11 Et sanen dinmago ed sikami, inala to so balkes nen Pablo, et nen binerber to so saray salito tan limato a dili, inkuan to: Onia so kuan na Espiritu Santo: Onia naani so pamalor na saray Judios ed Jerusalem ed laki a makankien na saya a balkes, et sikato naani yawat da ed lima na saray Gentiles. 

Act 21:12 Et sanen nadngel mi so sarayan bengatla, sikami tan saray totoo met ed saman a pasen, akikasi kami ed sikato ya ag komon onla ed Jerusalem. 

Act 21:13 Diad ontan, inmebat si Pablo: Anto so gawaen yo, a mannangis tan aaposen yo so pusok? ta siak aliwa labat ya akaparaan ak a nabalor, no ag met ompatey ed Jerusalem, lapu ed ngaran nen Jesus a Katawan. 

Act 21:14 Et sanen ag to labay so onabuloy, tinmon da kami, a kuan mi: Nagawa, shin, so linawa na Katawan. 

Act 21:15 Et kayari na saraya'n agew, nen akapantadia kami la, linma kami ed Jerusalem. 

Act 21:16 Et wala ra met so akila ed sikami a pigara ed saray binangatan nanlapu ed Cesarea, ya inawit da so sakey a manngaran na Mnason a taga Chipre, akauna'n binangatan, a sikato so iba mi a pituloyan. 

Act 21:17 Et sanen sinmabi kami ed Jerusalem, saray agagi inawat da kami a malikeliket. 

Act 21:18 Et dia ed kaimbuasan, linmoob si Pablo, pati sikami, ya onnengneng ed kinen Santiago, et saray mamasiken wadman ira ya akaarap. 

Act 21:19 Et kayari pabano to ed sikara, inoli'to a sinansakey so amin a bengatla a ginawa na Dios ed saray Gentiles ed panamegley na inkabetang to. 

Act 21:20 Et, sanen nadngel da so saya, ingalangda so Dios, et inkuan da ed sikato: Nanengneng mo la, agi, no pigan libo la ed saray Judios so anisia, et sikara ya amin mapilit iran manumpal na gangan: 

Act 21:21 Et akabatan da so nipaakar ed sika, ya ibabangat mo ed amin na saray Judios ya wala ed saray Gentiles, a benegan da si Moises, a kuan mo ed sikara, ya ag da galsiman so saray anak da, et ag da tomboken so saray kaugalian. 

Act 21:22 Anto, sirin, ey? Nayari a narengelan da a sinmabi ka. 

Act 21:23 Gawam, sirin, so saya ya ibaga mi ed sika: Wala ed sikami so apat iran katao ya wala so sipan da; 

Act 21:24 Alam sirin iraya, tan manlinis ka pati sikara, et bayaran mo so gastos da, pian napakatlian da so kaoloan da, et amin nakabatan da ya angapo so katuaan ed saray bengatla a nadngelan da nipaakar ed sika; no ag ingen, sika met oonoren mo so gangan. 

Act 21:25 Balet say nipaakar ed saray Gentiles ya anisia, insulat mi, ya inbilin ed sikara ya onarawi ra komon ed saray bengatla a nibagat ed saray talintao, tan say dala, tan say anto a nalner, tan pilalawan. 

Act 21:26 Diad onman, inala nen Pablo so saray totoo, et dia ed ontombok ya agew, kayari inpanlinis to a pati sikara, linmoob ed templo, ya inpaamta to so inkasumpal na saray agew na panaglinis, a nisaklang la so patanir nipaakar ed balang sakey ed sikara. 

Act 21:27 Et sanen ngalngalin nasumpal da la so pitoran agew, saray Judios a nanlapu ed Asia, sanen sikato so anengneng da templo, ginolo ra ya amin so karaklan, tan sikato so inerel da, 

Act 21:28 Ya yaakis da: Lalaki a taga Israel, tulong kayo. Saya so too a manbabangat ed saray amin ya totoo na sumpa ed ombaley tan ed gangan, tan diad sayan pasen; et aliwa nin saya, sikato angiloob met na saray Griegos dia ed templo, et dinutakan to so sayan masanton pasen. 

Act 21:29 Ta anengneng da nen saman ya akila ed sikato ed baley si Trofina a taga Efeso, a sikato so inpasen da ya inloob nen Pablo ed templo. 

Act 21:30 Et amin da ed baley agolo, et nantitipon so ombaley, et inerel da si Pablo, et sikato so ingayogoy da ed paway na templo, insan da inkaput so saray kaput. 

Act 21:31 Et diad panseseet dan mamatey ed sikato sinmabi so balita ed coronel na destacamento, a say amin a Jerusalem agulo. 

Act 21:32 Kanian tampol ya inala to so saray sondalos to tan saray capitanes; et binmatik iran linma a kaolop to ra. Et sanen anengneng da so coronel tan saray sondalo, intonda ra so inpankabil da ed Pablo. 

Act 21:33 Nen ontan, sinminger so coronel, et sikato 'y inerel to, tan inganganto a sikato so baloren da na duara a golonggolong, et tinepe'to no siopa, tan anto so ginawa to. 

Act 21:34 Et saray arum ed saray karaklan inyakis da so sakey a bengatla, et saray arum sananey met; et nen ag to akabatan so katuan lapu ed ingal da, ingangan to a sikato so yakar da ed Castillo. 

Act 21:35 Et kasabi to ed saray balitang agawa, a sikato so sinakbat na saray sondalos lapu'd sanok na karaklan; 

Act 21:36 Ta dakel so ombaley a tinmom bok ed beneg to, a maningal ira: Sikato so pateyen mo. 

Act 21:37 Et nen ngalngali iloob da la si Pablo ed Castillo, inkuan to ed Coronel: Nayari kasi a mansalita ak na mogmo ed sika? Et inkuan to: Antam so salita na Griego? 

Act 21:38 Aliwa tan sika, sirin, so samay taga Egipto, a dia ed sarayan agew a linmabas, angipaalagey ka na sakey a yaalza tan inyakar mo ra ed kalawakan so apat a libon a totoon akapatey? 

Act 21:39 Balet inkuan nen Pablo: Siak petepeteg ak a Judio a taga Tarso, ed Cilicia, onbaley ed baley ya aliwan maamot; et kerewen ko ed sika ya yabuloy mo ed siak a kasalitak so om baley. 

Act 21:40 Et nen inabuloy to ed sikato, si Pablo, nen manalalagey ed takayan, inandawes to so lima to ed ombaley. Et nen agawa so baleg a kareenan, nansalita ed sikara ed salita na Hebreo, a nankuan: 



Act 22:1 Agagi tan atateng, dengel yo so katunongan ko ya ited ko ed sikayo. 

Act 22:2 Et nen nadngel da a nansalita ed sikara ed salita na Hebreo lalo so indeen da: et kuan to: 

Act 22:3 Siak, Judio ak a nianak ed Tarso na Cilicia, balet binangatan ak ed sayan ciudad, dia ed salian nen Gamaliel, inpasal ak onong ed elet na gangan na saray atateng tayo, a napno na seseg ed Dios, a singa sikayo ya amin ed sayan agew: 

Act 22:4 Et pinasegsegang ko so sayan Dalan anga ed ipapatey, a binabalor tan initer ko ed saray panangipangawan so saray lalaki tan saray bibii ni. 

Act 22:5 Onong a natasian ak met na sankatageyan a sacerdote, tan say lapag a mamasiken, a dia ed sikara so angawatan ko met na saray sulat ed saray agagi; et linma ak ed Damasco pian awiten ko ra met ya ipangaw ed Jerusalem so saray angan wadman, pian nadusa ra. 

Act 22:6 Et agawa ya, nen manaakar ak tan manasinger ak ed Damasco, ed manpetek so agew, kasanlilikna sinminag nanlapu ed tawen so sakey a baleg a liwawa a linmiktob ed siak. 

Act 22:7 Et niparogso ak ed dalin, et nadngel ko so sakey a voces a kuan to ed siak: Saulo, Saulo, akin ya oosilan mo ak? 

Act 22:8 Et inmebat ak: Siopa ka, Katawan? Et kuan to ed siak: Siak si Jesus a taga Nazaret, a sikato so ousilan mo. 

Act 22:9 Et saray wala ya akila ed siak tua ya anengneng da so liwawa, balet ag da nadngel so voces na saman a nansalita ed siak. 

Act 22:10 Et inkuan ko: Anto naani gawaen ko, Katawan? Et kuan na Katawan ed siak: Alagey ka, tan onla ka ed Damasco, et diman nibaga naani ed sika so amin a nitadia a gawaen mo. 

Act 22:11 Et sanen ag ak makanengneng lapu ed sinag na saman a liwawa, linma ak, ya intabinda ak ed lima na saray walan ibak, ed Damasco. 

Act 22:12 Et sakey a manngaran na Ananias, laki'n masimpit unong ed gangan, maong so balita to ed amin na saray Judios a manaayam diman, 

Act 22:13 Linma ed siak, et inmalagey ed abay ko ya inkuan to ed siak: Agi Saulo, akoen mo so pakanengneng, Et dia ed saman met a dili ya horas sikato so anengneng ko. 

Act 22:14 Et inkuan to: Say Dios na saray atateng tayo tinoro to ka pian nakabatan mo so linawa to, tan nanengneng mo so Matunong, tan narengel mo so voces ed sangi to. 

Act 22:15 Ta sika naani so tasi to ed saray amin a totoo nipaakar ed anengneng tan nadngel mo. 

Act 22:16 Et natan, akin et ontonda ka? Alagey ka, et manbinyag ka et urasan mo so saray kasalanan mo, a tawagen mo so ngaran to. 

Act 22:17 Et agawa a sanen pinmawil ak ed Jerusalem, tan sanen peles ko a mikakasi dia ed templo, abalang so liknaan ko, 

Act 22:18 Et sikato so anengneng ko a kuan to ed siak: Siglatan mo et ompaway ka ed Jerusalem, ta ag da akoen ed sika so pamatuam nipaakar ed siak. 

Act 22:19 Et inkuan ko: Katawan, amtara ra sikaran dili ya angipangaw ak tan nanlewet ak dia ed balang sinagoga ed saray anisia ed sika: 

Act 22:20 Et nen nikalbo so dala nen Esteban a tasim, wadman ak met ya akaarap, et inabuloyan ko, tan binantayan ko so saray kawes na saray amatey ed sikato. 

Act 22:21 Et inkuan to ed siak: Onla ka, ta ibaki ta ka ed arawi, dia ed saray Gentiles, 

Act 22:22 Et sikato so dinengel da ed saya'n salita: diad satan intagey da so voces da a nankuan: Ekal mo dia ed dalin so onia a too ta ag manepeg a manbilay. 

Act 22:23 Et lapud naningal ira tan inbantak da so saray kawes da, tan nansibuag ira na dabok ed dagem, 

Act 22:24 Ingangan na coronel a sikato so yakar da ed Castillo, ya ingangan to a sikato so salaysayen da ed panamegley na lewet, pian nakabatan to no anto so makasengeg a maingal ira na ontanla sumpa ed sikato. 

Act 22:25 Et sanen sikato so sininger da na lubir, si Pablo inkuan to ed Capitan ya walan akaalagey ed aba'y to: Nikatunongan ta kasi ed sikayo so manlewet na sakey a too a taga Roma, et ag ni naokom? 

Act 22:26 Et sanen nadngel ya na Capitan, linma ed Coronel, tan inbaga to ed sikato a nankuan: Anto so gawaen mo? Ta saya a too taga Roma. 

Act 22:27 Et linma so Coronel, tan inkuan to ed sikato: Ibagam ed siak: Taga Roma ka kasi? Et inkuan to; On. 

Act 22:28 Et inmebat so Coronel: Sinaliw ko ed dakel a pilak so sayan pibabaley ed Roma. Et inkuan nen Pablo: balet taga Roma ak lapu ed inkiana 'ko. 

Act 22:29 Kanian tampol inmarawi ra ed sikato so saray manalaysay a mamakbak wari ed sikato: et pati say Coronel ataktakot nen akabatan to a sikato so taga Roma, ta lapu ed inpamalor to ed sikato. 

Act 22:30 Et dia ed kaimbuasan, nen labay to a nakabatan so matuan pangidaleman da ed sikato na saray Judio, sikato'y inokbaran to, et inpatipon to so saray pangolo na saray sacerdotes tan saray amin a singbatan, et inlasor to si Pablo tan sikato so inyarap to ed sikara. 



Act 23:1 Et si Pablo, nen ninengneng to so singbatan, inkuan to: Agagi, anga ed natan ed. saya'n agew nanbilay ak ed arap na Dios ed amin a kaabigan na conciencia. 

Act 23:2 Et ingangan nen Ananias, sankatageyan a sacerdote ed saray wala ed abay to, pian sikato so kabilen da ed sangi. 

Act 23:3 Diad onman, si Pablo inkuan to ed sikato: Say Dios kabilen to ka naani, sika'n pader a pinaputi: et manyorong ka a mangokom ed siak onong ed gangan, et iganganmo a kabilen da ak ya anta saya sumpa ed gangan? 

Act 23:4 Et saray wala ya akaarap inkuan da: Modmoraen mo so sankatageyan a sacerdote na Dios? 

Act 23:5 Et si Pablo inkuan to: Ag ko amta, agagi, a sikato so sankatageyan a sacerdote; ta wala a nisulat: Ag ka mansalita na mauges ed makauley na baley mo. 

Act 23:6 Et nen akabatan nen Pablo ya arum ed sikara ed Saduceos ira, et saray arum Fariseos inyakis to ed singbatan; Agagi, siak Fariseo ak, anak ak na saray Fariseo; atawag ak ed panangokoman nipaakar ed ilalo tan say kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey. 

Act 23:7 Et sanen nibaga to so ontan, agawa so sakey a siblangan ed saray Fariseos tan Saduceos; et naapagapag so kalapagan. 

Act 23:8 Ta saray Saduceos; kuan da ya angapo so kioli ed bilay, et angapo met so angel, odino espiritu; balet saray Fariseo sisiaen da so saraya'n duan bengatla. 

Act 23:9 Et agawa so baleg ya ingal; et inmalagey so arum ed saray escribas a gampi ed saray Fariseos, et akisiblangan ira a nankuan: Angapo so mauges a naalmo mi ed saya a too; et anto no sikato so akisalitaan na sakey ya espiritu, odino sakey ya angel? 

Act 23:10 Et sanen agawa so baleg a siblangan, say coronel, dia ed tako'to ompan ambisangen da si Pablo, pinalosor to so saray sondalos tan samsamen da si Pablo ed pegley da, et yakar da ed Castillo. 

Act 23:11 Et dia ed ontombok a labi, say Katawan inmalagey ed abay to, tan inkuan to: Manpakpel ka; ta no panon so inpamatuam na nipaakar ed siak ed Jerusalem, ontan met a nakaokolan so pamatuam ed Roma. 

Act 23:12 Et sanen kaimbuasan, saray Judios nantitipon ira, et insipan da ed lepsag na samba, a kuan da ya ag ira mangan odino oninum, anga ed ag da napatey si Pablo. 

Act 23:13 Et masolok iran apat a plo so nangawa na sayan samba. 

Act 23:14 Et linma ra ed saray manonaan na saray sacerdotes tan saray mamasiken et inkuan da: Insipan mi ed baleg a samba, ya ag kami'n balot ontimtim na antokaman anga ed agmi napatey si Pablo. 

Act 23:15 Natan, sirin, sikayo pati say singbatan, ibaga yo ed coronel a sikato so ilasor to ed sikayo, a singa labay yo a salaysayen so katuaan nipaakar ed sikato: et sikami, dia ed ag ni akaasinger, wala kami ya akaparaan a mamatey ed sikato. 

Act 23:16 Balet nadngel na laki ya anak na bii ya agi nen Pablo so gagaem-da, et linma tan linmoob ed Castillo, et inpaamta to ed Pablo. 

Act 23:17 Et si Pablo tinawag to so sakey ed saray capitanes et inkuan to: Yakar mo so sayan balolaki ed Coroiel, ta wala so ipaamta to a bengat la ed sikato. 

Act 23:18 Dia ed saman, sikato so inala to, et inakar to ed Coronel, tan kuan to: Si Pablo a pinangaw tinawag to ak et inpikasi to ed siak pian yakar ko so sayan balolaki ed sika, ta wala so bengatla ya ibaga to ed sika. 

Act 23:19 Et say Coronel sikato so inala to ed lima, et nen pinmaliis ira, tinepetan to ed maamot: Anto so wala ya ibagam ed siak? 

Act 23:20 Et inkuan to: Saray Judios nannonongan da a kerewen ed sika ya ilasor mo si Pablo nabuas ed singbatan, a singa wala so matua ya isalaysay da nipaakar ed sikato. 

Act 23:21 Ag ka balet komon onabobon ed sikara, ta masolok ya apat a plon katao ed sikara so mantatalaran ed sikato, ya insipan da ed lepsag na samba, ya ag ira mangan odino oninum anga'd sikato so ag da napatey: natan akaparaan ira a mantatalaran ed sipan mo. 

Act 23:22 Say Coronel, sirin, pinapawil to so balolaki ya inbilin to ed sikato: Ag mo ibabaga ed angan siopaman ya inpaamtam so sarayan bengatla ed siak. 

Act 23:23 Et tinawag to so duara ed saray Capitan, ed inkuan to: Iparaan yo so duanlasus a sondalo ya onla anga ed Cesarea, tan pitonplo a di kabayo, tan duanlasus a di pika, dia ed komatlo ya horas na labi: 

Act 23:24 Et inpantadia to ra na ayayep a pangipakabayoan da ed Pablo, pian sikato so yakar da ya andi kaatapan ed Felix a gobernador. 

Act 23:25 Et nansulat na sakey a sulat ya onia so inkasalita to: 

Act 23:26 Si Claudio Lysias ipabano to ed sankatageyan a Gobernador Felix. 

Act 23:27 Saya'n too inerel na saray Judios, et sikato so pateyen da wari, et inlaban ko ya indagok so saray sondalo nen atalosan ko a sikato so taga Roma. 

Act 23:28 Et lapu ed pirawat ko a nakabatan so makasengeg no akin a sikato'y indalem da, sikato'y inlasor ko ed singbatan da: 

Act 23:29 Tan nalmok a sikato so idadalem da ed saray kolkol nipaakar ed gangan da, et angapo so kasalanan to a manepeg ed pamatey odino pangipangaw. 

Act 23:30 Et sanen nipaamta ed siak ya wala so getma a panlipot ed sayan too, tampol a sikato so inbakik ed sika, tan ingangan ko met ed saray, manangidalem to ya onarap ira a mangibaga ed sika na onsumpa ed sikato. 

Act 23:31 Onman a saray sondalos, sirin, unong ed nigangan ed sikara, inala ra si Pablo, tan sikato so inakar da ed labi diman ed Antipatris. 

Act 23:32 Balet dia ed kaimbuasan pinaulian dan saray dikabayo so mila ed sikato, tan pinmawil ira ed Castillo: 

Act 23:33 Et sanen sinmabi ra ed Cesarea, initer da so sulat ed gobernador et indongo ra met si Pablo ed sikato. 

Act 23:34 Et sanen abasa to so sulat, tinepe'to no taga iner a luyag; et nen akabatan to a sikato so taga Cilicia, 

Act 23:35 Inkuan to: Dengelen ta ka a maong sano onsabi so saray mangidadalem ed sika met: et inbilin to a sikato so bantayan da dia ed palacio nen Herodes. 



Act 24:1 Et sanen linmabas so limaran agew, sinmabi sankatageyan a sacerdote Ananias, pati saray pigaran mamasiken, tan sakey a manngaran na Tertulo, marunong a mansalita, et inmarap ira ed gobernador a mangidalem ed Pablo. 

Act 24:2 Et sanen tinawag day Tertulo, ingapo to'n indalem, akuanto: Bangta lapu ed sika agamoran mi baleg a kareenan, tan lapu ed pasakbay mo dakel a mauges so abaat ed sayan nacion, 

Act 24:3 Andi ebas tan di a ed amin a pasen ya inawat mi so saya a sisasalamat na dakel, sankatageyan a Felix. 

Act 24:4 Et pian ag ta ka naabala ed mabayag, kerewen to ed sika a dengelen mo kamin magano onong ed kaabigan mo. 

Act 24:5 Ta aromog mi so sayan too a makasasalot, tan manamaalagey na saray yaalza ed saray amin a Judios ed sankamundoan, et sikato so pangolo ed secta na saray taga Nazaret: 

Act 24:6 A Sikato ninono'to met a pabandayen wari so templo, et sikato so inerel mi: (et labay mi ya okomen onong ed gangan mi: 

Act 24:7 Balet nen akibiang si Coronel Lysias, sikato so inekal to ed saray lima mi ed kapilitan, 

Act 24:8 Tan ingangan to a saray manangidalem ed sikato onarap ira ed sika): a sikato so nayari a pakapikabatan mo, sano nasalaysay mo a dili ed saray amin a bengatla a pangidadaleman mi ed sikato. 

Act 24:9 Et saray Judios akibiang met ira ed panangidalem, a pinatua ra ya ontan so saraya a bengatla. 

Act 24:10 Et si Pablo, nen inandawesan na gobernador a mansalita, inmebat: Bangta amtak a nanlapu ed dakel Ian taon a sika so okom ed sayan nacion, ipaliwawak so katunongan ko a sililiket: 

Act 24:11 Lapu ed nayarian mo ya amtaen, ya ag linmabas ed labindua ya agew a linma ak ed Jerusalem a mikasi komon: 

Act 24:12 Et ag da ak aromog ed templo a miaalaay salita ed siopaman odino mamapaalza ed saray karaklan, angan dia ed templo, angan dia ed sinagoga, odino dia ed ciudad. 

Act 24:13 Et ag da met nay arm paletan ed sika so saray bengatla a pangidadaleman da ed siak natan. 

Act 24:14 Balet say a so patuaen ko ed sika, ya onong ed Dalan a tatawagen da na secta, ontan so inpanlinkor ed Dios na saray atateng mi, a sisiaen ko so amin na saray bengatla a nisulat ed gangan, tan nisulat ed saray profetas; 

Act 24:15 Ya wala so ilalok ed Dios, a sikato met so aalagden a dili na saraya, ya wala naani kioli ed bilay na saray matunong tan ag matunong. 

Act 24:16 Et nisengeg ed say a, andi ebas met a sesesegan ko so sakey a conciensia ya angapo komon so pankasalananan ed Dios tan ed saray totoo. 

Act 24:17 Balet nen linmabas so dakel a taon, linma ak a mangayakar na saray payabol ed baley ko, tan patpatanir: 

Act 24:18 Sanen kaplesan da ra'n ya a gagawaen ko, aromog da ak ya agogolan ed templo, ya angapo so dakel a too odino ingal; ingen waladman so pigara a Judio a taga Asia; 

Act 24:19 A nepeg da komon so pinmatnag ed arap mo, tan mangidalem, no wala ed sikara so antokaman ya onsumpa ed siak. 

Act 24:20 Odino ibaga komon na sarayan dili a totoo, no anto kasi nalmo ran mauges a ginawak, nen wadman ak ed arap na singbatan, 

Act 24:21 No ag ingen lapu bengat ed sayan sakey a salita ya inyakis ko nen manalalagey ak ed pegley da: Nisengeg ed kioli ed bilay na saray inatey so pangokoman yo ed siak ed sayan agew. 

Act 24:22 Balet si Felix, lapu ed amtato a maong so nipaakar ed Dalan, inabala to ra a kuan to: No onlasor si Coronel Lysias salaysayen ko so getmayo. 

Act 24:23 Et inbilin to ed capitan a sikato so bantayan da tan palemewen to ed inkabolor, et ag to sebelan ed angan siopaman ed saray kakaaro to a manpaga ed sikato. 

Act 24:24 Et nen linmabas so pigaray agew, sinmabi Felix, pati si Drusila ya asawa to, a sikato so Judia, et inpatawag to si Pablo, et dinengel to ed sikato so nipaakar ed pananisia ed Cristo Jesus. 

Act 24:25 Et nen nansalitan nipaakar ed katunongan, tan say dang ka, tan say pangokom ya onsabi, akebiew si Felix, et inmebat: Naka la natan, et sano wala so makana a panaon, sika naani patawag ko. 

Act 24:26 Et nanilaloan to a nisengeg ed kinen Pablo sikato so itdan da na pilak, kanian sikato met so inpatawag to a maparanay, tan akisalsalita ed sikato. 

Act 24:27 Balet nen linmabas la so duaran taon, si Felix sinalatan nen Porcio Festo; et lapu ed labay nen Felix so makaala na maong a linawa ed saray Judios, pinaulian to si Pablo ed panangipangawan. 



Act 25:1 Si Festo lanti, sanen linmoob ed saman a luyag linma ed Jerusalem nen kayari talo ran agew a nanlapu ed Cesarea.

Act 25:2 Et saray pangolo na saray sacerdotes tan saray manonaan na saray Judio pinmatnag ira ed sikato, sumpa ed Pablo; et inpikasi ra ed sikato, 

Act 25:3 A kinmerew ira na aboloy a sumpa ed sikato, pian sikato so paitolor to komon ed Jerusalem, a talaranan na saray mamatey ed sikato dia ed dalan, 

Act 25:4 Balet inmebat si Festo, a si Pablo wala a babantayan diman ed Cesarea, tan sikato a dili ngalngali ontainan ya onlar man ed magano. 

Act 25:5 Saray makayari ed sikayo, sirin, kuan to, mila ra ed siak; et no wala so antokaman a kasalanan na saya a too, sikato so idalem yo. 

Act 25:6 Et sanen akiayam ed sikara na ag linmabas so walora odino samplo'y ya agew, linma ed Cesarea; et dia ed kaimbuasan imyorong ed panangokoman, tan ingangan to ya awiten da si Pablo. 

Act 25:7 Et sanen kasabi to, sikato so niliktob na saraya Judio a linma manlapu ed Jerusalem, ya inbaga ra so amayamay tan ambelat a dalem a sumpa ed sikato, ya ag da ayarian a pinatua; 

Act 25:8 Leleg a si Pablo inkuan to ed katunongan ko: Angan onsumpa ed gangan na saray Judios, odino onsumpa ed templo, odino onsumpa ed Cesar, angapo a balot so nankasalananan ko. 

Act 25:9 Balet si Festo, lapu ed pirawa'to so mangala na maong a linawa ed saray Judios, inmbebat ed Pablo, tan inkuan to: Labay mo so onia ed Jerusalem, tan naokom diman ed saraya a bengatla ed arap ko? 

Act 25:10 Balet inkuan nen Pablo: Siaalagey ak ed arap na panangokoman nen Cesar a sikato so manepeg a kaokoman ko: angapo so ginawak a mauges ed saray Judios, onong na kabat mo met la a maong. 

Act 25:11 No akagawa ak, sirin, na antokaman a manepeg ed ipapatey, ag ko sungayen so ompatey: ingen no angapo so katuaan na saraya a bengatla pa pangidaleman na saraya ed siak, angapo so makayari a mangiderew ed siak lapu ed pikakaaro. Ompanon ak ed Cesar. 

Act 25:12 Nen ontan, si Festo, nen ni tepe'to la ed singbatan, inmebat: Ompanon ka ed Cesar, onla ka naani ed Cesar. 

Act 25:13 Et nen linmabas so pigara ya agew, si ari Agripa, tan si Bernice, sinmabi ra ed Cesarea, et nanpabano ra ed Festo.

Act 25:14 Et lapu ed nanayam irad man ed dakel ya agew, si Festo inbaga to so kaliktan nen Pablo ed ari a kuan to: Wala so sakey a too ya atilak dia a pinangaw nen Felix; 

Act 25:15 Nipaakar ed sikato, nen linma ak ed Jerusalem, saray manonaan na saray sacerdotes tan saray mamasiken na saray Judios indalem da ed siak, ya onkekerew ira na dusa a makana ed sikato. 

Act 25:16 Inmebata ak, ed sikara, ya aliwan ugali na saray taga Roma ya iter so siopaman ed pikakaaro, anga ed ag napiarapan na indalem so saray mangidadalem, et naitdan na pankanawnawa a mangilaban ed sikato a dili, nipaakar ed dalem a sumpa ed sikato. 

Act 25:17 Sanen sikara lanti linma dia a nanoolop, ag ak nanabala, no ag ingen dia ed ontombok ya agew imyoiong ak ed panangokoman, et inbilin kon idongo ra so too. 

Act 25:18 Et nen walara ya akaarap so saray mangidadalem, angapo so nipatnag da ya antokaman a kaugsan ya onong na inisip ko wari; 

Act 25:19 Salambengat a sikato so indalem da lapu ed siblangan nipaakar ed religion da, tan nipaakar ed sakey a manngaran na Jesus, ya inatey a sikato so pinatua nen Pablo, ya wala'n mabilay. 

Act 25:20 Et siak, lapu ed manduarua ak ed saray onia a kolkol, tinepet ko no labay to so onla ed Jerusalem, tan diman naokom nipaakar ed saraya a bengatla. 

Act 25:21 Balet nen pinmanon si Pablo, pian sikato so okomen nen emperador, inbilin ko a bantayanda anga ed sikatoy ibakik ed Cesar. 

Act 25:22 Et si Agripa inkuan to ed Festo: Labay ko met komon a narengel itan a too. Nabuas, kuan nen Festo, sikato so narengel mo. 

Act 25:23 Kanian dia ed kaimbuasan, sanen linma si Agripa, tan si Bernice, ed baleg a liket, tan linmoob ira ed panangokoman, ya inolop na coronel, tan saray mablin totoo ed baley, lapu ed gangan nen Festo niakar diman si Pablo. 

Act 25:24 Et inkuan nen Festo: Ari Agripa, tan sikayon amin ya wadia ya akaarap ed sikami: nengneng yo so saya a too a sikato so indalem da ed siak na amin a karaklan na saray Judios ed Jerusalem tan dia met, ya inyakis da ya ag manepeg la a manbilay. 

Act 25:25 Balet aromog ko ya angapo so agawa to a kanepegan ed pamatey; et bangta sikaton dili pinmanon ed Augusto, ninonot ko a sikatoy paiyakar ko. 

Act 25:26 Nipaakar ed sikato angapo so anto kaman a tua a nayarian ko ya isulat ed katawan ko, kanian sikato so inyarap ko ed sikayo, et lalo ed sika, ari Agripa, pian kayari panalaysay, wala so nayarian ko ya antokaman ya isulat. 

Act 25:27 Ta isipen ko ya ag onkatunongan so pamayakar na sakey a pinangaw, ya ag ibaga met so saray dalem a sumpa ed sikato. 



Act 26:1 Et inkuan nen Agripa ed Pablo: Niabuloy ed sika a mansalita ka nipaakar ed sika a dili. Nen ontan, si Pablo inona'to so lima to, tan ginawa to so katunongan to. 

Act 26:2 Igaton koy inkasiak a mapalar, ari Agripa, ta dia ed arap mo nagawaan ko so mankatunongan nipaakar ed amin ya bengatla ya angidaleman da ed siak na saray Judio: 

Act 26:3 Laot la, ta kabat mo ya amin so saray kaugalian tan siblangan ya wala ed saray Judios; kanian kerewen ko ed sika ya imanesan mo ak a dengelen. 

Act 26:4 Say kipapasen na bilay ko lanti nanlapu ed inkaugaw ko, a sikato so pinalabas ko ed pegley na saray kabaleyan ko, nanlapu ed inmuna tan dia ed Jerusalem, kabat ya amin na saray Judio; 

Act 26:5 Sikara kabkabat da ak nanlapu ed inmuna, no labay da a tasian, a nanbilay ak a Fariseo ya ontotombok ed kaletan na muyong na pananisiami. 

Act 26:6 Et natan, lapu ed ilalo ed sipan a ginawa na Dios ed saray atateng mi, manalalagey ak a naokom; 

Act 26:7 Saya a sipan aalagden ya onsabi na saray labindua a kapolian mi, a siseseseg ira a manlinkor ed Dios ed labi tan agew. Et nipaakar ed saya ya ilalo, indalem da ak na saray Judios, O ari! 

Act 26:8 Akin et isipen yo ya ag nayarin sisiaen, no say Dios paolien to ed bilay so saray inaatey? 

Act 26:9 Tua ya inisip ko ed siak a dili a dakel a bengatla so nepeg kon gawaen a sumpa ed ngaran nen Jesus a taga Nazaret. 

Act 26:10 Et ginawak so saya ed Jerusalem: et inpoko'ko ed saray panangipangawan so dakel ed saray sasantos bangta nen saman wala so inawat ko a pakayari ed saray manonaan a sacerdotes; et nen sikara so inpapatey da, inter ko so abobon a sumpa ed sikara. 

Act 26:11 Et dinusak ira ya aminpigapiga ed amin a sinagoga, a pinasoot ko ra a nansalita'y ayew; et napno ak na alabas a sanok ed sikara, inosilan ko ra anga ed saray sananey a baley. 

Act 26:12 Dia ed ontan, sanen manaakar ak ya onla ed Damasko, ya awit ko so abuloy tan gangan na saray manonaan a sacerdotes, 

Act 26:13 Dia ed mampetek so agew, O ari anengneng ko ed dalan so sakey a liwawa nanlapu ed tawen, a maliwliwawa nen say sinag na banua, a linmiktob ed siak tan ed saray akila ed siak. 

Act 26:14 Et sanen apasag kami ya amin ed dalin, nadngel ko so sakey a voces a kuan to ed siak ed salita na Hebreo; Saulo, Saulo, akin ya ousilan mo ak? Mairap ed sika so mangidepak na utok. 

Act 26:15 Et inkuan ko: Siopa ka, Katawan? Et say Katawan, inkuan to ed siak: Siak si Jesus ya ousilan mo. 

Act 26:16 Balet onbangon ka, tan onalagey ka ed saray salim; ta lapu ed sayan kanonotan pinmayawar ak ed sika, pian igaton taka a ministro tan tasi ed saray bengatla ya anengneng mo tan saray bengatla a ipayawar ko ed sika, 

Act 26:17 Ya ilaban ta ka ed baley, tan ed saray Gentiles, a sikara so pangibakian ko ed sika, 

Act 26:18 Pian lukasan mo so kamataan da, pian ompawil ira ed liwawa a manlapu ed kabilungtan, tan manlapu ed pakayari nen Satanas onla ra ed Dios, pian awaten da so panamaandi ed saray kasalanan, tan say tawir a pakapinabang ed saray napasantos lapu ed pananisia ed siak. 

Act 26:19 Kanian, ari Agripa, agak sinmumpa ed mangatatawen a payawar; 

Act 26:20 No ag ingen inpakabat ko ya inmuna ed saray taga Damasco, tan ed Jerusalem, tan ed amin a dalin na Judea, tan ed saray Gentiles, a mansibkel ira, komon tan onpawil ira ed Dios, a mangawa ra na saray manepeg ed pagbabawi. 

Act 26:21 Lapu ed saya, saray Judios inerel da ak ed templo, et labay da ak warin pateyen. 

Act 26:22 Sanen agamoran ko lanti so tulong na Dios, manalalagey ak ya anga ed saya ya agew a mamatua ed saray ankekelag tan ankakabaleg, ya ag ko salitaen so antokaman ya ag inbaga na saray profetas tan si Moises, ya onsabi; 

Act 26:23 A si Cristo nakaokolan nen saman a manirap, et sikato so onuna ed kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey, pian ipaamta to so liwawa ed baley na Israel tan ed saray Gentiles, 

Act 26:24 Et sanen manpapaliwawa na ontan ed pankakatunongan to, si Festo kuan to ed maksil a voces: Makulangkulang ka, Pablo; say karakel na kakabatan mo pagmaliwen to ka a makulangkulang. 

Act 26:25 Balet si Pablo kuan to: Aliwa ak a makulangkulang sankablian a Festo; no ag ingen ooliten ko so saray salita a matua tan maalas, 

Act 26:26 Ta say ari amta to so saray an bengatla, a dia ed sikato mansalita ak a mabolos: ta kabat ko ya angapo so niamot ed sarayan bengatla dia ed sikato; ta saya ag agawa ed sakey a sokong. 

Act 26:27 Ari Agripa, Manisia ka ed saray profetas? Amtak a manisia ka. 

Act 26:28 Et si Agripa inkuan to ed Pablo: Dia ed dagdaiset a salita naoyot mo ak a mancristiano. 

Act 26:29 Et inkuan nen Pablo: Labay komon na Dios, a dia ed dagdaiset odino dia ed dakel, aliwa labat a sika no ag saray amin met a manderengel ed siak natan, magmaliw kayo komon a singa siak, likod labat ed sarayan balor. 

Act 26:30 Et inmalagey so ari, tan say gobernador, tan si Bernice, tan saray akayurong ya ibara: 

Act 26:31 Et sanen tinmainan ira, nagsisalita ra ed sakey tan sakey, a kuan da: Angapo so antokaman a ginawa na sayan too a manepeg ed pamatey odino ed pangipangaw. 

Act 26:32 Et inkuan nen Agripa ed Festo: Nayarian mo komon ya ibolos so saya a too, no ag pinmanon ed Cesar. 



Act 27:1 Et sanen nigangan a mansakay kami ya onla ed Italia, initer da si Pablo tan arum ni a pinangaw ed sakey a capitan a manngaran na Julio, ed compania nen Augusto. 

Act 27:2 Et nen linmugan kami ed sakey a sakayan a taga Adrumeto a ngalngali mansakay ed saray pasen ed gilig na Asia, tinmulak kami ya ibami si Aristarco, sakey a Macedonio a taga Tesalonica. 

Act 27:3 Et dia ed ontombok ya agew dinmoong kami ed Sidon: et maong so inpangimaton nen Julio ed Pablo, et inabuloy to ed sikato ya onla ed saray kakaaro to, pian manga ko na maong a linawa. 

Act 27:4 Et nen tinmula'kamin nanlapud man, nansakay kami ed nasaniban na Chipre lapud no sumlang so dagem. 

Act 27:5 Et sanen alabsanan mi so dayat ed petek na Cilicia tan Pamfilia, sinmabi kami ed Mira, sakey a ciudad na Licia. 

Act 27:6 Et say kapitan akalmo na sakey a sakayan a taga Alejandria a mansasakay ya onponta ed Italia; et inlugan to kami ed sikato. 

Act 27:7 Et sanen nansakay kami a matantan ed dakel ya agew, masuyat so insabi mi ed petek na Gnido; lapu'd ag kami arawyan na dagem, nansakay kami ed nasaniban na Creta, ed petek na Salmon; 

Act 27:8 Et nen dinigdigmi so gilig na saya ed masuyat, sinmabi kami ed sakey a pasen ya inngaran na Maong a Doroongan, ya asinger diman so baley na Lasea. 

Act 27:9 Et sanen apalabas so dakel ya agew, tan maatap la so panagsakay ta alabas la so panagayuno, sinimbawa ra nen Pablo, 

Act 27:10 Et inkuan to ed sikara: Lalaki, nanengneng ko a say panagsakay mangiter na kairapan tan dakel a kaugsan, aliwa labat ed awit tan say sakayan, no ag dia ed saray bilay tayo met. 

Act 27:11 Balet say kapitan lalo a sinisiato so piloto tan say makankien na sakayan, nen saray sinalita nen Pablo. 

Act 27:12 Et lapud aliwa'n maong a panabalaan so saman a doroongan, saray karaklan inpanonot da ya ontolak irad man, ag la piga no makasabira ed Fenix, et manabalarad man; a sikato so doroongan na Creta, ya arap ed baybay a bukig, tan abalaten a bukig. 

Act 27:13 Et sanen sinmibok na daiset so abalaten a dagem, inisip da ya agamoran da so pirawat da; intagey da so saray pataga, tan nansakay ira a nandigdig ed asinger ed Creta. 

Act 27:14 Balet ag abayag, sinmiplog nanlapud man so sakey a dagem a bagyo, ya ya inngaran na Euroclidon: 

Act 27:15 Et nen nipalir so sakayan, et ag napokpokan a sumlangen na dagem, pinaulian mi, et sinonson kami dagem. 

Act 27:16 Et sanen binmatik so sakayan ed sanib na sakey a melag a polo ya inngaran na Clauda, samsamet ya ayarian mi ya insinger so bote: 

Act 27:17 Et nen nitagey da, ginawa ra so pamaakaran a pamalkes ed sakayan; et lapu ed antakot da so onsadsad ed Sirte, inleksab da so saray layag, et ontan da so saray sinonson na dagem. 

Act 27:18 Et sanen pinaspas kami mapalalo a bagyo, ya dia ed ontombok ya agew ingapo ra so nanbantak na awit; 

Act 27:19 Et dia ed komatlo ya agew, ed saray kalimaan dan dili inbantak da so saray kagawaan na sakayan. 

Act 27:20 Et nen ag sinminag so agew odino saray bitewen ed sikami ed dakel ya agew, et binakbak kami bagio ya aliwan melamelag, abalang la ya amin so ilalo mi a nilaban.
