1Jn 2:1 Ana'kora ya ankekelag, saraya'n bengatla isulat ko ed sikayo pian ag kayo mankasalanan. Tan no wala so toon mankasalanan, wala so Apireng tayo ya onarap ed Ama, si JesuCristo a matunong; 

1Jn 2:2 Tan sikato so manamaandi kasalanan tayo, tan aliwa lambengat ed saray kasalanan tayo, no ag met kasalanan na lapag a mundo. 

1Jn 2:3 Tan dia ed saya amta tayo ya apikabatan tayo, no sumpalen tayo so saray gangan to. 

1Jn 2:4 Say mangikuan: Sikato so kabat ko, tan ag to sumpalen so saray gangan to, satan matila, tan angapo so katuaan ed sikato; 

1Jn 2:5 Bangbalet say manumpal na salita to, diad sikato'n peteg so ayadyariay aro na Dios. Kanian dia ed saya amta tayo ya wala itayo ed sikato. 

1Jn 2:6 Say mankuan ya mansiansia ed sikato, nepeg to so manakar a singa impanakar to. 

1Jn 2:7 Inararok, aliwa'n balo'n gangan so isulat ko ed sikayo, no ag say gendat a gangan ya wala ed sikayo a nanlapu ed gapo: say gendat a gangan sikato so salita a nadngel yo la. 

1Jn 2:8 Isulat ko lamet ed sikayo so sakey a balon gangan, a tua'n bengatla ed sikato tan dia ed sikayo: ta say kabilungetan onlalabas la, tan say peteg a silew onsisinag la. 

1Jn 2:9 Say mankuan ya walad silew, insan to busolen so agi to, satan wala ni ed kabilungtan ya angad natan. 

1Jn 2:10 Say mangaro ed agi to mansiansia ed silew tan angapo so katitiror ed sikato. 

1Jn 2:11 Ta balet so mamusol ed agi to wala ed kabilungetan, tan manaakar ed kabilungetan, tan ag to amta so laen to, ta say kabilungetan binulag to so mata to. 

1Jn 2:12 Pansulatan takayo, ana'ko ya ankekelag, ta saray kasalanan yo aperdona ra, dia ed panamegley na ngaran to. 

1Jn 2:13 Pansulatan takayo, atateng, ta apikabatan yo so samay wala la a nanlapu ed gapo. Pansulatan takayo, sikayo'n babalolaki, ta dinaeg yo so mauges. Pansulatan takayo, sikayo'n anak ya ankekelag, ta kabat yo so Ama. 

1Jn 2:14 Nansulatan takayo, sikayo'n atateng, ta apikabatan yo so wala la nanlapu ed gapo. Nansulatan takayo, sikayo a babalolaki, ta mabiskeg kayo, tan say salita na Dios manayam ed sikayo, tan dinaeg yo so samay mauges. 

1Jn 2:15 Aleg ya aroen yo so mundo, ni saray bengatla ya wala ed mundo. No siopaman a too aroen to so mundo say aro na Ama andi ed sikato. 

1Jn 2:16 Ta amin ya wala ed mundo, kilalawan na laman tan kilalawan na mata tan maapan gloria na bilay, aliwa a kien na Ama no ag kien na mundo. 

1Jn 2:17 Et say mundo mangan-ga, tan saray penel to: sabalet so mangonor ed linawa na Dios onsiansia lawas. 

1Jn 2:18 Ugugao ya ankekelag, sikato la so kaonoran a panaon: tan unong na inpakadngel yo a say anticristo et onsabi, ontan met natan ginmapo la ra a linmetaw so dakel ya anticristo; kanian amta tayo a sikato la so kaonoran ya horas. 

1Jn 2:19 Linmetaw ira ed sikatayo, bangbalet ag tayo ra kabiangan; ta no kabiangan tayo ra, nansiansia ra komon ed sikatayo; bangbalet linmetaw ira pian nipatnag ya amin dia et ag ti ra kabiangan, 

1Jn 2:20 Sikayo balet wala ed sikayo so puyok na Sakey a Santo, tan kabat yo so amin a bengatla. 

1Jn 2:21 Ag takayo nansulatan a lapo bilang ed ag yo amta so katuaan, no ag lapu ed amta yo la, tan angan dinan a tila ag kabiangan na tua. 

1Jn 2:22 Siopa so matila no ag say mamaandi a si Jesus sikato so Cristo? Saya sikato so anticristo, a paandien to so Ama tan say Anak. 

1Jn 2:23 Say mamaandi ed Anak, angapo met ed sikato so Ama: say mamatua ed Anak wala met ed sikato so Ama. 

1Jn 2:24 Sa sirin so nadngel yo nanlapu ed gapo magnayon komon ed sikayo. No say nadngel yo a nanlapu ed gapo magnayon ed sikayo, magnayon kayo met ed Anak tan say Ama. 

1Jn 2:25 Tan saya so sipan, ya inpangako tod sikatayo, salanti bilay ya andi anga. 

1Jn 2:26 Sarayan bengatla insulat ko ed sikayo nipaakar ed saray mangibasbas komon ed sikayo ed kabalangan. 

1Jn 2:27 Tan nipaakar ed sikayo, say puyok ya inako yo ed sikato, mansiansia ed sikayo, tan ag yo naka-okolan ya wala so mangibangat ed sikayo; bangbalet unong ed say dili a puyok ibanga'to kayo ed ganagana'y bengatla, tan matua ya aliwan tila, unong na imbanga'to ed sikayo, mansiansia kayo ed sikato. 

1Jn 2:28 Tan natan, ana'ko ran ankekelag, mansiansia kayo ed sikato; pian no sikatoy nipatnag, walay kabayanian tayo, tan ag itayo nabaingan ed arap to ed isabi to. 

1Jn 2:29 No amta yo a sikato et matunong, amtaen yo met a siopaman a mangawa na katunongan nianak ed sikato. 



1Jn 3:1 Nengneng yo no kaonongan so panangaro ya inpagamor na Ama ed sikatayo, a ningaran itayo ya anak na Dios; et ontan itayo. Kanian say mundo ag to itayo kabat, ta sikato so ag to kinabat. 

1Jn 3:2 Inararo, natan anak itayo na Dios, tan ag ni agaway kipatnag no antoy pagmaliwan tayo naani, Amta tayo a no ompanengneng, miolibay itayo ed sikato, ta nanengneng tayo naani a singa dili ya inkasikato. 

1Jn 3:3 Tan angan siopa ya wala so sayan ilalo ed sikato, linisan to so inkasikato unong a sikato et malinis. 

1Jn 3:4 Balang sakey a mangawa na kasalanan, gawaen to met so andid gangan, tan say kasalanan sikatoy isusumlang ed gangan. 

1Jn 3:5 Tan amta yo a sikato so pinmanengneng lapu'd pangekal to ed saray kasalanan; tan dia ed sikato angapo so kasalanan. 

1Jn 3:6 Angan siopa'n mansiansia ed sikato, ag mankasalanan: angan siopa a mankasalanan, sikato so ag to anengneng, tan ag to apikabatan. 

1Jn 3:7 Ana'ko ran ankekelag, ag kayo papaibalang ed too: say mangawa na katunongan matunong, unong a sikato so matunong met: 

1Jn 3:8 Say mangawa na kasalanan kien na diablo; ta say diablo nankasalanan nanlapu ed gapo. Lapu ed saya pinmanengneng so Anak na Dios a maneral na saray gawa na diablo. 

1Jn 3:9 Angan siopa a nianak ed Dios ag mangawa'y kasalanan, ta say bini to mansiansia ed sikato; tan ag nayari a mankasalanan ta nianak ed Dios. 

1Jn 3:10 Dia ed saya mapatnag ira so anak na Dios, tan saray anak na diablo: angan siopa a mangawa na ag katunongan ag kien na Dios, angan say ag to aroen so agi to. 

1Jn 3:11 Ta saya so balita a nadngel yo nanlapu ed gapo, a manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikatayo: 

1Jn 3:12 Aliwan singa si Cain, a betang na maramsak, tan pinatey to so agi to. Tan anto so akalanor na amateyan to ed sikato? Lapu ed saray gawa to mauges ira, sara balet so gawa nen agi to matunong. 

1Jn 3:13 Agagik ira, ag yo pankelawan no say mundo et busolen to kayo. 

1Jn 3:14 Amta tayo a linmabas itayo ed patey a pinmogta ed bilay, lapud aroen tayo so saray agagi. Say ag mangaro mansiansia ed patey. 

1Jn 3:15 Angan siopa a mamusol ed agi to sikato so managpatey: tan amta yo a siopaman ya managpatey angapo so bilay ya andi anga a mansiansia ed sikato. 

1Jn 3:16 Dia ed saya abirbir tayo so aro, ta sikato inter to so bilay to nisesengeg ed sikatayo: tan sikatayo nepeg tayo met ya italaga so bilay tayo nisesengeg ed saray agagi. 

1Jn 3:17 Bangbalet say walaan na kayamanan to ed sayan mundo, tan nanengneng to so agi to a naokolan, et kaputan to so panangasi to, panon so pansiansia na aroy Dios ed sikato? 

1Jn 3:18 Ana'ko ra ya ankekelag, aleg a mangaro itayo ed salita o dia ed dila; no ag dia ed gawa tan dia ed katuaan. 

1Jn 3:19 Et dia ed saya nabirbir tayo a kien itayo na tua, tan saray kapusoan tayo apaletan ira ed arap to: 

1Jn 3:20 Ta no say kapusoan tayo et puoten to itayo, babaleg so Dios nen say puso tayo, tan kaba'to so amin a bengatla. 

1Jn 3:21 Inararok ira, no say kapusoan tayo et ag to itayo puoten, wala so katalkan tayo ed Dios; 

1Jn 3:22 Et bengatlan kerewen tayo nagamoran tayo ed sikato, ta sumpalen tayo so saray gangan to, tan gawaen tayo so bengatla a makapaliket ed imaton to. 

1Jn 3:23 Tan saya so gangan to; ya manisia itayo ed ngaran na Anak to a Jesu-Cristo, tan manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikatayo, unong ed ingangan to. 

1Jn 3:24 Ta say manumpal na gangan to mansiansia ed sikato, tan sikato ed sikato. Tan dia ed saya amta tayo a sikato so magnayon ed sikatayo lapu ed Espiritu ya inter to ed sikatayo. 



1Jn 4:1 Inararok ira, ag yo ra sisiaen so amin ya espiritu; no ag ingen salien yo so saray espiritu no kien ira na Dios; ta dakel ya aliwan peteg a profetas so pinmaway dia ed mundo. 

1Jn 4:2 Dia ed saya nabirbir yo so Espiritu na Dios; balang espiritu a mamatua a si Jesu-Cristo linma dia a silalaman kien na Dios: 

1Jn 4:3 Tan balang espiritu ya ag to pamintuan si Jesus, ag kien na Dios: tan saya sikato so espiritu nen anticristo, a sikato so nadngel yo ya onsabi tan natan wadia la ed mundo. 

1Jn 4:4 Ana'ko ran ankekelag, sikayo kien kayo na Dios, et dinaeg yo ra; ta say wala ed sikayo babaleg nen say wala ed mundo. 

1Jn 4:5 Sikara kien ira na mundo: kanian salitaen da so nipaakar ed mundo, tan say mundo dengelen to ra. 

1Jn 4:6 Sikatayo kien itayo na Dios: say mikabat ed Dios dengelen to itayo; say ag betang na Dios ag to itayo dengelen. Lapu ed saya nabirbir tayo so espiritu na katuaan, tan say espiritu na lingo. 

1Jn 4:7 Inararok ira, manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikatayo; ta say aro kien na Dios; angan siopa a mangaaro nianak ed Dios, tan kaba'to so Dios. 

1Jn 4:8 Say ag mangaro ag to kabat so Dios; ta say Dios sikato so aro. 

1Jn 4:9 Dia ed saya nipatnag so aro na Dios ed sikatayo, a say Dios inbaki to ed mundo so Anak ton bugbugtong, pian manbilay itayo ed panamegley to. 

1Jn 4:10 Onia so panangaro: aliwa a lapu ed sikatayo so angaro ed Dios, no ag ingen sikato so angaro ed sikatayo, tan inbaki to so Anak to a makapamaandi kasalanan tayo. 

1Jn 4:11 Inararok ira, no say Dios on tan so inpangaro to ed sikatayo, nepegmet ya manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikatayo. 

1Jn 4:12 Angapo so toon akanengneng ed Dios ed anton panaon: no manaaroan so sakey tan sakey ed sikatayo, say Dios mansiansia ed sikatayo, tan say aro to ayadyari ed sikatayo: 

1Jn 4:13 Dia ed saya so pikabatan tayo ya mansiansia itayo ed sikato tan sikato so mansiansia ed sikatayo, ta initdan to itayo na Espiritu to. 

1Jn 4:14 Tan anengneng mi, tan tasian mi a say Ama inbaki to so Anak pian sikato so Manangilaban na mundo. 

1Jn 4:15 Angan siopa a mamatua a si Jesus sikato so Anak na Dios, say Dios mansiansia ed sikato, tan sikato ed Dios. 

1Jn 4:16 Tan sikami abirbir mi tan sinisia mi so aro a say Dios wala ed sikami. Say Dios sikato so aro; tan say mansiansia ed aro, mansiansia ed Dios, tan say Dios mansiansia ed sikato. 

1Jn 4:17 Dia ed saya say aro agawan ayadyari ed sikatayo, pian wala so bayani tayo ed agew na panangokom, ta no kaunongan to ontan itayo ed sayan mundo. 

1Jn 4:18 Dia ed aro angapo so takot: bang balet say ayadyarin aro ipaliis to so takot; ta say takot wala so dusa to, kanian say ontakot ag agawa ayadyari ed aro. 

1Jn 4:19 Aroen tayo ta sikato so angaro ed sikatayo ya inmuna. 

1Jn 4:20 No wala so mankuan, Aroen ko so Dios, tan busolen to so agi to, sikato so matila: ta say ag mangaro ed agi to, anta anengneng to, ag to nayarian ya aroen so Dios ya ag to anengneng. 

1Jn 4:21 Tan saya a gangan so wala ed sikami a nanlapu ed sikato ta say mangaro ed Dios aroen to met so agi to. 



1Jn 5:1 Siopaman a manisia a si Jesus sikato so Cristo, nianak ed Dios: tan angan siopan mangaro ed angyanak ed sikato, aroen to met so nianak ed sikato. 

1Jn 5:2 Dia ed saya kabat tayo ya inaro tayo so saray anak na Dios, no aroen tayo so Dios, tan sumpalen tayo so saray gangan to. 

1Jn 5:3 Ta saya so aro na Dios, a sumpalen tayo so saray gangan to: tan saray gangan to aliwa ran ambelat. 

1Jn 5:4 Ta siopaman a nianak ed Dios, daegen to so mundo: et saya so pananalo a manaeg ed mundo, salanti say pananisia tayo. 

1Jn 5:5 Tan siopa so manaeg ed mundo no ag satay manisia a si Jesus sikato so Anak na Dios? 

1Jn 5:6 Saya so linma dia ed panamegley na danum tan dala, salanti si JesuCristo aliwa a lapud danum lambengat no ag lapu ed danum tan dala. 

1Jn 5:7 Tan say Espiritu sikato sa mangiter na pantasi ta say Espiritu sikato so katuaan. 

1Jn 5:8 Ta talora so mangiter na pantasi, say Espiritu, tan say danum, tan say dala: tan sarayan talo saksakey so panmomoyong da. 

1Jn 5:9 No akuen tayo so pananasi na saray totoo, say pananasi na Dios babaleg: ta sikatoya so pananasi na Dios, ya angiter lay pantasi nipaakar ed Anak to. 

1Jn 5:10 Say manisia ed Anak na Dios wala ed sikato so tasi: say ag manisia ed Dios ginawa to a matila; ta ag anisia ed pamintuaan ya inter na Dios nipaakar ed Anak to. 

1Jn 5:11 Tan saya so pantasi, ya say Dios initdan to itayo na maandon bilay, et sayan bilay wala ed Anak to. 

1Jn 5:12 Say wala ed sikato so Anak, wala ed sikato so bilay; say andi ed sikato so Anak na Dios, andi ed sikato so bilay. 

1Jn 5:13 Sarayan bengatla insulat ko ed sikayo pian nakabatan yo ya wala so maandon bilay yo, salanti sikayo a manisia ed ngaran na Anak na Dios. 

1Jn 5:14 Tan saya so katalkan tayo ed sikato, ya no mankerew itayo na bengatla unong ed linawa to, sikato dengelen to itayo: 

1Jn 5:15 Tan no amta tayo a sikato dengelen to itayo ed bengatla a kerew tayo ed sikato, amta tayo ya wala ra so saray kerew a kinaliktan tayo ed sikato. 

1Jn 5:16 No siopaman a too nanengneng to a mankakasalanan so agi to na kasalanan ya aliwan makapatey, mankerew, tan say Dios itdan to na bilay a nipaakar ed saray mankasalanan na aliwa a makapatey. Wala so kasalanan a makapatey; ag ko kuan a mankerew kayo a nisesengeg ed saya. 

1Jn 5:17 Amin ya andid katunongan kasalanan; wala balet so kasalanan ya aliwan makapatey. 

1Jn 5:18 Amta tayo ya angan siopa a nianak ed Dios, ag mankasalanan; sa balet so tinmoo ed Dios yatol toy inkasikaton dili, et ag diwiten na mauges. 

1Jn 5:19 Amta tayo a kien itayo na Dios tan say sankamundoan mandokdokol ed kaugsan. 

1Jn 5:20 Bangbalet amta tayo a say Anak na Dios linma dia tan initdan to itayo na pakatalos, pian nakabatan tayo so matua. Tan wala itayo ed matua, salanti dia ed Anak to a Jesu-Cristo. Saya so matua a Dios tan say bilay ya andi anga. 

1Jn 5:21 Ana'ko ran ankekelag, arawian yo so saray kinondiosdiosan. 

PANGASINENSE Jude


Jud 1:1 Si Judas, ya aripen nen Jesu-Cristo, tan agi nen Santiago, ed saray atawag, inararo ed Dios Ama, tan niatol ed Jesu-Cristo: 

Jud 1:2 Panangasi, tan kareenan, tan aro so ondakel komon ed sikayo. 

Jud 1:3 Inararo, legan kon mangiiter na amin a seseg a mansulat ed sikayo nisengeg ed lapag a kilalaban, apasootak a mansulat ed sikayo dia ed panangibangat ko a mibangal kayo a nisesengeg ed pananisia a niiter nen aminsan ed saray sasanto. 

Jud 1:4 Ta wala so saray totoo a manakarakar ya agam-amta, a salanti nanlapo la nen saman nisulat la ra ed sayan panangokom, totoo ya aliwan maridios a say gracia na Dios tayo papagmaliwen da a kaugsan, tan paandien da so bogtong ya Maestro tan Katawan tayon Jesu-Cristo. 

Jud 1:5 Natan labay ko sirin ya ipanonot, angaman akabkabatan yo so ami bengatla ya aminsan a say Katawan, dia ed inpangilaban to ed baley nanlapud Egipto, insan diad kayari dineral to so saray ag anisia. 

Jud 1:6 Tan saray angeles ya ag da inonor so dilin oley da, no ag ingen pinaulian da so nigetar a panaayaman da, in gana to ed silong na kabilungtan ed andi angaan a panamangawan, anga ed panangokom na sankabalgan ya agew: 

Jud 1:7 Salanti singa say Sodoma tan Gomorra, tan saray kaliberliber da a ciudades, a no panon so inpangawa ra na lawan tan intombok da ed sananey a laman, ontan da met, nipasen ira a panuliranan, ed panliknara na dusa na andi angaan ya apuy. 

Jud 1:8 Balet singa onian ugali saraya met diad panagkugip da tilolan da so laman tan ipasen dan andikana so pakauley tan pagpaugsen da so saray atagey ya inkabtang. 

Jud 1:9 Anta si arcangel Miguel, nen mibabakal ed diablo nisesengeg ed laman nen Moises, ag pinmangaya a nanagamil na pamabpabanday a panangokom a sumpa ed sikato, no ag ingen inkuan to, Say Katawan pooten to ka. 

Jud 1:10 Bangbalet saray pamabpabanday ed sarayan bengatla ya ag da amta; tan saray gendat la ya amta ra, a singa pinalsa ya andiay pankatunongan, diad sarayan bengatla so inpakaderal da. 

Jud 1:11 Kasi la ra! ta tinombok da so dalan nen Cain, tan sinmegba ra ed kalilingo nen Balaam lapu ed tumang, tan atawtaw ira ed kasebegan nen Cora. 

Jud 1:12 Sikaraya so niamot a batobato ed saray panliliketan yo, no mililiket ira ed sikayo, pastol iran taganoen day inkasikara ya andi takot; lurem ira ya andi danum, ya itaroktarok na dagem; kiekiew ira ed panaon na betel ya andi bunga, amidua ya inatey tan abagot ed saray lamolamot, 

Jud 1:13 Maruksa ra a burakan na dayat, ya iboboraray dili ya kababaingan da; bitewen ira ya abalbalang a niganaan na andi angaan a deket na kabilungtan. 

Jud 1:14 Nipaakar ed saraya si Enoc met, komapito a manlapu ed Adam, inprofeta to tan inkuan to: Nia, say Katawan onladia a tarok to so saray samplon libolibo a sasantos to, 

Jud 1:15 A mangokom ed ganagana, tan mangipatnag na katuaan ed saray mangaruksa a nipaakar ed mangaruksan gawa ra, tan ganagana a bengatla ya ambelat ya agagamil a saray maruksan managkasalanan sinalsalita ra sumpa ed sikato. 

Jud 1:16 Saraya sikara so managtalabotob, managdalem, a manakar-akar unong na saray pilalawanan da; (tan say sangi ra tongtongen da so saray ankakabaleg iran pasirayew a salita) ipatnag day panangibiig dad saray totoo, nisengeg ed kaabigan da. 

Jud 1:17 Bangbalet sikayo, inararo, nonnonot yo so saray salita a nen saman inbalikas na saray apostoles na Katawan tayo a Jesu-Cristo; 

Jud 1:18 Ya inkuan da ed sikayo: Dia ed kaonoran a panaon wala so saray managlurey, a manakar-akar unong na mauges a kaalakan da. 

Jud 1:19 Sikaraya so mangawa na kasiansian, kaalakan, ya angapo ed sikara so Espiritu. 

Jud 1:20 Bangbalet sikayo, inaro, ipaalage'yo so inkasikayo ed sankasantosan a pananisia, a manpipikasi kayo ed Espiritu Santo, 

Jud 1:21 Mansiansia kayo ed panangaro na Dios, tan manalagar kayo ed pa nangasi na Katawan tayo a Jesu Cristo ya onkana ed bilay ya andi anga. 

Jud 1:22 Tan diad saray arum walaan kayo na panangasi, ya wala rad panduarua: 

Jud 1:23 Ilaban yo ra balet so arum, dia ed panamsam yo ed sikara ed apuy; tan dia ed arum walaan kayoy pana ngasi a katekep na takot; tan boso len yo so pati kawes ya atilolan na laman. 

Jud 1:24 Natan dia ed saman so makapanyari a mantalima ed sikayo ed kigagapol tan mangipatnag ed sikayo ya andi dumsis ed arap na gloria to, ed alablabas ya gayaga, 

Jud 1:25 Dia ed Dios a bokor a Manangilaban tayo, ed panamegley nen Jesu-Cristo a Katawan tayo, so ka walaan komon na gloria, katagian, uley, tan pakayari, ed arapey ami panaon, natan tan lawas ed ando Ian ando. Ontan pa komon. 

PANGASINENSE LUKE


Luk 1:1 Bangta dakel so nangetma ya angoksoy na sakey a pangolitan ed saray bengatla ya agawgawa ed sikatayo, 

Luk 1:2 Unong na inpangosaosa ed sikami na saray nanlapu'd gapu tasi ra ed mata tan katangbayan ed salita, 

Luk 1:3 Ninonot ko met a makapaabig, kayari inpangopapet ko'n maong ed amin a bengabengatla ya agawa nanlapu ed inmuna, ya isulat a maokoksoy ed sika, sankakanaan a Teofilo; 

Luk 1:4 Pian nakabatanmo so katuaan nipaakar ed bengabengatla a sikara so akapangibangatan ed sika. 

Luk 1:5 Wala nen saman ed saray agew nen Herodes, ari ed Judea, so sakey a sacerdote a manngaran na Zacarias, ed nengneng nen Abias: et say asawa to sakey ed saray anak nen Aaron, et say ngaran to Elizabet. 

Luk 1:6 Et matunong ira a nanpadpara ed arap na Dios, a nanakar ira ya andi binalaw ed sikara dia ed saray amin a gangan tan bilin na Katawan 

Luk 1:7 Et angapo so anak da, at si Elizabet lepes, tan nanpadpara ra a matatken ed taon. 

Luk 1:8 Et agawa a sanen pelesto'n mankakatangbayan a singa sacerdote ed arap na Dios, unong ed inkabtang to, 

Luk 1:9 Singa ugali ed inka sacerdote, tinuro na kapalaran ya onloob ed templo na Katawan a mangibagat na incienso. 

Luk 1:10 Et ami karaklan na ombaley wala ed paway a mikakasi leleg na horas na incienso. 

Luk 1:11 Et pinmayawar ed sikato so sakey ya angel na Katawan, a manalalagey ed nikawanan a diking na altar na incienso. 

Luk 1:12 Et apagaan si Zacarias nen anengneng to, et aselepan na takot. 

Luk 1:13 Balet inkuan na angel ed sikato, Zacarias, agka antakot; ta nadngel so pikakasim, et si asawam ya Elizabet mangianak ed sika na sakey ya anak a laki ed tawagen mo so ngaran to a Juan. 

Luk 1:14 Et nawalaan ka na liket tan ga yaga; tan dakel so napaliket ed kianak to: 

Luk 1:15 Ta baleg naani ed arap na Katawan, et ag oninum na alak tan inumen a mabayani; et napano na Espiritu Santo, angan manlapu ed eges nen ina to. 

Luk 1:16 Et dakel ed saray anak nen Israel so panpataoliento ed Katawan a Dios da. 

Luk 1:17 Et manakar naani ed arap to dia ed espiritu tan pakayari nen Elias, pian ipawil to so kapusoan na atateng ed saray anak, tan saray matulay panakaren to ra ed kakabatan na saray matunong; pian itadia-anto so Katawan na sakey a baley a maralato. 

Luk 1:18 Et inkuan nen Zacarias ed angel: Anto so pakapatnaganko nia? ta masikenak la, tan si asawak matatken la ed taon.

Luk 1:19 Et inmebat so angel a kuan to ed sikato, Siak si Gabriel ya manalagey ed arap na Dios; et nibakiak a misalita ed sika tan mangyakar ed sika na saraya'n maong a balita. 

Luk 1:20 Et nia, naemel ka tan agka makasalita, anga ed agew a kasumpal na saraya a bengatla, lapu ed agmo sinisia so saray salitak, a sikara so nasumpal sano kanepegan da. 

Luk 1:21 Et saray ombaley pialagar da si Zacarias, tan nankelaw ira ed inpantantanto ed templo. 

Luk 1:22 Et nen pinmaway, agto ayarian so akisalita ed sikara: et atebek da ya akanengneng na sakey a pasingawey dia ed templo: tan akisalitaan to ra ed andawes, et naemel. 

Luk 1:23 Et agawa, sanen linmabas so saray agew ya inpankatangbayan to, linma ed abung to. 

Luk 1:24 Tan kayari saraya ya agew, nanlokon si asawato a Elizabeth; et nanamot ed limara'n bulan, a kuanto; 

Luk 1:25 Onia so ginawa ed siak na Katawan ed saray agew ya inpangimatonto ed siak, pian naekal so kabandayan ko ed saray totoo. 

Luk 1:26 Bang dia ed komanem a bulan, si angel Gabriel nibaki a nanlapu'd Dios ed sakey a ciudad na Galilea, a man ngaran na Nazaret, 

Luk 1:27 Ed sakey a virgen ya akidesposada ed sakey a laki a man ngaran na Jose, tobo ed abung nen David; et say ngaran na virgen sikato so Maria. 

Luk 1:28 Et linmoob so angel ed kawalaan to, et inkuan to, Daray ka la, nasnaspot ya apalangkapan, say Katawan wala ed sika. 

Luk 1:29 Balet sikato apagaan a toloy lapu ed saya a salita, et inisisip to no anto kasi nengneng na saya'n panangigalang. 

Luk 1:30 Et say angel inkuan to ed sikato: Agka antakot, Maria, ta akaromog ka na pamalangkap ed Dios. 

Luk 1:31 Et nia, ilokon mo tan yanak mo so sakey ya anak a laki et tawagen mo so ngaran to a JESUS. 

Luk 1:32 Sikato naani baleg, et ningaran ya Anak na Sankatageyan; et ited na Dios a Katawan ed sikato so trono nen David ya ama to; 

Luk 1:33 Et manari lawas ed abung nen Jacob; et say panarian to andi anga to. 

Luk 1:34 Et inkuan nen Maria ed angel: Panon to nia, ta angapo so kabat ko a laki? 

Luk 1:35 Et inmebat so angel tan inkuan to ed sikato, Say Espiritu Santo onla ed sika, et say pakapanyari na Sankatageyan tarongan toka: kanian say nianak met ningaran naani Santo, say Anak na Dios. 

Luk 1:36 Et nia, si Elizabeth a kanayon mo, nanlokon met ed inkaakolaw to na sakey ya anak a laki; et saya so onkomanem a bulan ed sikato ya inngaran a lepes. 

Luk 1:37 Ta angapo so salita a manlapu ed Dios ya andian na pakayari. 

Luk 1:38 Et inkuan nen Maria: Nia, so aripen na Katawan; nagawa ed siak so unong na salitam. Et say angel tinmainan ed sikato. 

Luk 1:39 Diad sarayan agew inmalagey si Maria ed linma'n maganganat ed kapalandeyan, ed sakey a ciudad na Juda; 

Luk 1:40 Et linmoob ed abung nen Zacarias tan inbano to si Elizabet. 

Luk 1:41 Et agawa a sanen nadngel nen Elizabet so inpangibano nen Maria ginmalaw so ugaw ed egesto; et si Elizabet napno na Espiritu Santo; 

Luk 1:42 Et inkasil to so voces to a tinmawag tan inkuan to, Mapalar ka ed saray bibii, tan bendito so bunga na eges mo. 

Luk 1:43 Et iner so nanlapuan to nia ed siak a say ina na Katawan ko onla ed siak? 

Luk 1:44 Ta nia, sanen say tanol na panangibanom sinmabi ed saray layag ko, lapu ed gayaga ginmalaw so ugaw dia ed eges ko. 

Luk 1:45 Et mapalar so anisia; ta nasumpal so bengabengatla ya inpaipakabat ed sikato na Katawan. 

Luk 1:46 Et inkuan nen Maria, Itandoro na Kamarerwak so Katawan, 

Luk 1:47 Tan say espirituk nanliket ed Dios a Manangilaban ko. 

Luk 1:48 Ta ninengneng to so kaabebaan na aripen to: Ta nia, manlapu'd natan amin na saray kailalakan ingaran da ak na mapalar. 

Luk 1:49 Ta say makapanyari nangawa ed siak na ankakabaleg a bengatla; Et santo so ngaran to. 

Luk 1:50 Et say panangasi to wala ed kailalakan tan kailalakan Ed saray antakot ed sikato. 

Luk 1:51 Impatnag to so pakapanyari ed taklay to; Binuyak to so saray mapangta ed kanonotan na kapusoan da. 

Luk 1:52 Inekal to so saray principe ed saray trono ra, Et inatagey to so saray mapaabeba. 

Luk 1:53 Saray narasan pinesel to ra ed maong a bengabengatla; Et saray mayaman pinatainanto ra a paoypaoy. 

Luk 1:54 Tinulongan to so Israel ya aripen to, Pian nanonotan to so panangasi. 

Luk 1:55 (Unong na sinalita to ed saray atateng tayo) Ed Abraham tan say bini to lawas. 

Luk 1:56 Et nanayam si Maria ed sikato ed talo ran bulan; tan pinmawil ed abung to. 

Luk 1:57 Bang say panaon a pananak nen Elizabet asabi; et nananak na sakey ya anak a laki. 

Luk 1:58 Et nadngelan na saray kaababay tan kakanayon to a say Dios ginawato ed sikato so baleg a panangasi to; et akiliket ira ed sikato. 

Luk 1:59 Et agawa a dia ed komawalon agew, nila ra a ginalsiman so ugaw; et sikato komon so tawagen da a Zacarias, unong ed ngaran nen ama to. 

Luk 1:60 Et inmebat si ina to a kuan to, Aliwa'n ontan; noag ingen ingaran na Juan. 

Luk 1:61 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Angapo ed kakanayon mo so manngaran na saya. 

Luk 1:62 Et inandawesan da so ama to, no anto so labay to ya ipangaran ed sikato. 

Luk 1:63 Et kinmerew na tabla a pansulatan, et insula'to, a kuan to: Juan so ngaran to. Et nikelawan ira'n amin. 

Luk 1:64 Et tampol ya abesuat so sangi to, tan say dila to naokbaran, et nansalita, ya angigalgalang ed Dios. 

Luk 1:65 Et sinmabi takot ed amin a kaababay da; et amin so saraya a salita nibalita ed lapag a kapalandeyan na Juda. 

Luk 1:66 Et amin so saray akadngel ed sikara, inyanda ra ed kapusoan da, a kuan da: Anto sirin so pagmaliwan na saya ya ugaw? Ta say lima na Katawan wala'd sikato. 

Luk 1:67 Et si Zacarias ya ama to napno na Espiritu Santo, et inprofeta to, a kuan to, 

Luk 1:68 Nagalang komon so Katawan, say Dios na Israel; Ta dinalaw tan ginawa to so pananondon ed baley to, 

Luk 1:69 Tan pinaalagey to so sakey a saklor na panangilaban nipaakar ed sikatayo Dia ed abung nen David ya aripen to 

Luk 1:70 (Unong na insalita to ed sangi na saray masantos a profetas to a nanlapu nen inmuna), 

Luk 1:71 Kilalaban ed saray kabusol tayo, tan ed lima na saray amin ya mangula ed sikatayo; 

Luk 1:72 Pian mangipatnag na panangasi ed saray atateng tayo. Tan nonoten to so masantos a sipan to; 

Luk 1:73 Say samba a sinambaan to ed Abraham ya ama tayo, 

Luk 1:74 Ya ited to ed sikatayo a lapu ed kilaban tayo ed lima na saray kabusol kayo Sikato so panlingkoran tayo ya andi takot, 

Luk 1:75 Dia ed kasantosan tan kaalasan ed arap to ed saray amin ya agew tayo. 

Luk 1:76 On, tan sika, ugaw, ningaran ka a prof eta na Sankatageyan: Ta onlaka ed arap na Katawan, pian itadiam so saray dalan to; 

Luk 1:77 Ya ipakabat mo so kilalaban ed baley to Dia ed pamaandi ed saray kasalanan da; 

Luk 1:78 Lapu ed matmoy a panangasi Dios tayo, A sikato so panalawan ed sikatayo na banua ya onpepelnak manlapu ed tagey, 

Luk 1:79 Pian onliwawa ed saray manyorong ed kabilungtan tan anino na ipapatey; Pian mangitonton ed saray sali tayo ed dalan na kareenan. 

Luk 1:80 Et say ugaw, binmaleg tan binmiskeg ed espiritu, et nanayam ed kalawakan anga ed agew ya inpatnag to ed Israel. 



Luk 2:1 Et agawa ed saraman ya agew, inmakseb so sakey a gangan nen Augusto Cesar, pian nipadron so amin a mundo. 

Luk 2:2 Saya ya inkapadron agawa ya inmuna sanen gobernador ed Siria si Cirenio. 

Luk 2:3 Et linmara ya amin ya inpaipadron balang sakey ed ciudad to a dili. 

Luk 2:4 Et si Jose met, nanlapu ed Galilea, ed ciudad a Nazaret, linma ed Judea, ed ciudad nen David a manngaran na Bet-lehem, lapu'd no tinmubo ed abung tan kailalakan nen David; 

Luk 2:5 Pian paipadron pati si Maria, a nidesposada ed sikato, a sikato so malokon nen saman. 

Luk 2:6 Et agawa, a leleg dan wadman asabi la so saray agew a pananak to. 

Luk 2:7 Et inyanak to so anak to a pangoloan, et sikato so pinonggos to ed lampin, tan inparokol to ed sakey ya atotoug, ta angapo so napasenan da ed darawesan. 

Luk 2:8 Et wala so saray pomapastol ed saman lanlamang a dalin, a manaayam ed uma, tan babantayan da a panpupuyatan ed labi so ayayep da. 

Luk 2:9 Et sakey ya angel na Katawan nanalagey ed abay da, et say gloria na Katawan niliktob tora na liwawa: et apagaan ira na baleg a takot. 

Luk 2:10 Et say angel inkuan to ed sikara, Ag kayo antakot; ta, nia, yakad ko ed sikayo so saray maorig a balita na baleg a liket a nipaakar ed amin a totoo: 

Luk 2:11 Ta natan ya agew, dia ed ciudad nen David, nianak ed sikayo so sakey a Manangilaban, a sikato so Cristo a Katawan. 

Luk 2:12 Et saya so tanda ed sikayo: Naromog yo so ugaw ya apungos ed lampin tan niparokol ed sakey ya atotong. 

Luk 2:13 Et kasanlilikna wala so akiolop ed angel a sakey a karaklan na ejercito a mangatatawen ya angigalgalang ed Dios, a kuan da, 

Luk 2:14 Gloria ed Dios ed sankatage yan, Tan dia ed dalin deen ed saray totoo a sikara so panliketan to'n maong. 

Luk 2:15 Et agawa, a sanen sikara so tinainan na saray angeles dia ed inakarda ed tawen, saray pomapastol nansasalitara a kuan da, Onla itayo sirin anga ed Bet-lehem, tan nengnengen tayo so saya'n bengatla ya agawa ya inpaipakabat ed sikatayo na Katawan. 

Luk 2:16 Et linmara a maganganat, et aromog da di Maria tan Jose, tan say ugaw ya akarokol ed atotong. 

Luk 2:17 Et nen anengneng da, inpakabat da so balita a niited ed sikara nipaakar ed saya ya ugaw. 

Luk 2:18 Et amin so saray akadngel, nankelaw ira ed saray inbaga ed sikara na saray pomapastol. 

Luk 2:19 Balet si Maria inememan to so saraya ya amin a bengatla, a ninodnono'to ed puso to. 

Luk 2:20 Et pinmawil so saray pomapastol ya ingalgalang tan intantandoro ra so Dios lapu ed saray amin a nadngel tan anengneng da, unong na nipakabat ed sikara. 

Luk 2:21 Tan sanen nagnap so waloran agew a pangalsim ed ugaw, tinawag da so ngaranto a JESUS a sikato so tinawag na ontan na angel nen arapen a nilokon dia ed eges. 

Luk 2:22 Et sanen asumpal so saray agew na pangogol da unong na gangan nen Moises, sikato so inyakar da ed Jerusalem ya inpatnag ed Katawan. 

Luk 2:23 (Unong na nisulat ed gangau na Katawan, Amin a laki a mangilukas na eges, ingaran a santo nipaakar ed Katawan), 

Luk 2:24 Tan mangyapay na bagat, unong na nikuan ed gangan na Katawan, Duara'n palekpek ono duara'n malapati a sibong. 

Luk 2:25 Et nia, wala so sakey a laki ed Jerusalem a manngaran na Simeon; et saya'n laki, matunong tan mapangako, ya aalagden to so ligliwa na Israel: et say Espiritu Santo wala ed sikato. 

Luk 2:26 Et inpuyan na Espiritu Santo ed sikato, ya agto nanengneng so ipapatey no agto ni nanengneng so Cristo a Katawan. 

Luk 2:27 Et diad inka Espiritu linmoob ed templo: et sanen say ugaw a Jesus inloob na saray ateng to, pian gawaenda ed sikato so unong na ugali na gangan, 

Luk 2:28 Saman la sikato so inala to ed saray taklay to, et ingalang to so Dios, tan inkuan to, 

Luk 2:29 Natan pasipot mo, Katawan, so aripen mo, A mareereen, unong ed salitam; 

Luk 2:30 Ta anengneng na saray matak so panangilaban mo, 

Luk 2:31 A sikato so intadiam ed arap na amin a totoo; 

Luk 2:32 Sakey a Silew a panagkapuyan ed saray Gentiles, Tan galang na baley mo ya Israel. 

Luk 2:33 Et si ama to tan ina to nikelkelawan ira ed saray bengatla ya asalsalita nipaakar ed sikato; 

Luk 2:34 Et binendicionan ira nen Simeon, tan inkuan to ed kinen Maria ya ina to inkuan to, Nia, saya'n ugaw nigaton pian kagapolan tan ki-ala geyan na dakel ed Israel; tan panagkatanda a sumpaen da: 

Luk 2:35 On, tan sakey ya kampilan talosento so dili a kamarerwam; pian nipatnag so kanonotan na dakel a kapusoan. 

Luk 2:36 Et wala so sakey a prof eta a manngaran na Ana, bii ya anak nen Fanuel, ed poli nen Aser akulaw Ian maong, a pito'y taon ya akiamong ed asawa to nanlapu ed inkavirgen to , 

Luk 2:37 Et abalo ya walonplo tan apat taon la , et ag la onaalis ed templo a manlUinkor ed labi tan agew pati panagayunal tan pikakasi. 

Luk 2:38 Et nen onsabi ed saman ya horas akisalamat ed Dios, et nansalita nipaakar ed ugaw ed saray amin a manaalagar na karondon na Jerusalem. 

Luk 2:39 Et nen asumpal da so amin onong ed gangan na Katawan, pinmawil ira ed Galilea, ed dili'n ciudad da a Nazaret. 

Luk 2:40 Et say ugaw binmaleg, tan kinmasil, tan napno na kakabaran: et say gracia na Dios wala ed sikato. 

Luk 2:41 Et tinaontaon ya onla so atateng to ed Jerusalem ed fiesta na pasco. 

Luk 2:42 Et sanen mantaon na labindua, linmara unong na ugali ed fiesta; 

Luk 2:43 Et nen apalabas da la so saray agew, sanen ompapawil ira tinimilak si ugaw a Jesus ed Jerusalem; et ag kabat na saray atateng to; 

Luk 2:44 Et lapu'd ilaloan da ya wala ed olop, nanakar ira leleg na sakey agew, et inaanap da ed saray kakanayon tan kabkabat da: 

Luk 2:45 Et nen sikato'y ag da aromog, pinmawil ira ed Jerusalem, a mananap ed sikato. 

Luk 2:46 Et agawa, nen kayari talo'y agew sikato'y nalmora ed templo, a manyodyorong ed pegley na saray doctores, ya ondedengel tan ontetepet ed sikara: 

Luk 2:47 Et saray amin ya akadngel sikato nankelkelaw ira ed pakatalo to tan ed saray eba'to. 

Luk 2:48 Et nen anengneng da, nikelawa: ira; et inkuan ed sikato nen ina tc Anak, akin et onia so ginawam ei sikami? nia, si amam tan siak ins anap mika a maedermen. 

Luk 2:49 Et sikato inkuan to ed sikars Panon ya inaanapyoak? agyo amt a nakaokolan ko so wala ed abun nen Amak? 

Luk 2:50 Et ag da atalosan so salita y inbaga to ed sikara. 

Luk 2:51 Et linma ya akiolop ed sikara et sinmabi ra ed Nazaret; et mate lotolok ed sikara: et si ina to ine meman to so saraya ya amin a nasa salita dia ed puso to. 

Luk 2:52 Et si Jesus binmaleg ed kaka batan tan kabalgan, tan ed pamalang kap na Dios tan saray totoo. 



Luk 3:1 Bang dia ed taon a komalabin lima ya inkaari nen Tiberio Cesar a peles a gobernador ed Judea si Poncio Pilato, tan si Herodes, si kato so tetrarka ed Galilea, tan si agito a Felipe so tetrarka ed Iturei tan Traconite, tan si Lisanias tetrarka ed Abilinia, 

Luk 3:2 Dia ed atagey ya incasacerdoti di Anas tan Caifas, dia ed kalawakan sinmabi salita na Katawan ed Juan ya anak nen Zacarias. 

Luk 3:3 Et sikato so linma ed amin a dalin ed kaliberliber na Jordan, ya angipolpulong na binyag nipaakar ec pamaandi ed saray kasalanan; 

Luk 3:4 Unong na nisulat ed libro na saray salita nen profeta Isaias, Say voces na sakey a mantawag dia ed lawak, Itadia yo so dalan na Katawan, Peteken yo so saray basbas to. 

Luk 3:5 Saray abeba a dalin tageran ira Et amin a palandey tan pokdol palanasen ira; Et say pikewet napetek, Et saray dalan a matibagkol na patar ira; 

Luk 3:6 Et amin a laman nanengneng to so panangilaban na Dios. 

Luk 3:7 Et kanian kuan to ed saray dakel a totoo a pinmaway a pabinyagan ed sikato, Sikayo kapulian na saray uleg, siopa so angipasakbay ed sikayo ya onbatik ed sanok ya onsa bi? 

Luk 3:8 Mamapaway kayo sirin na bungabunga a manepeg ed pagbabawi, et agyo gapoan ya ikuan ed inkasikayo'n dili, Wala si Abraham a panagkaama mi: ta kuan ko ed sikayo, a nayarian na Dios so mamaalagey na saray anak ed kinen Abraham angan dia ed saraya a bato. 

Luk 3:9 Et natan lanlamang say wasay niyan met ed lamut na saray kiew: amin a kiew sirin ya ag mangiter na maong a bunga napopo, tan nibantak ed apuy. 

Luk 3:10 Et saray dakel a totoo tinmepet ira ed sikato, a kuanda, Anto sirin so nakaokolanmi a gawaen? 

Luk 3:11 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Say walaan na duara a kawes, yapag to so andian; et say walaan na kanen, ontan met so gawaen to. 

Luk 3:12 Et linma met so saray publicano pian pabinyagan ira, et inkuan da ed sikato, Managbangat, anto'y nepeg min gawaen? 

Luk 3:13 Et sikato inkuan to ed sikara, Agyo anapen so dakdakel nen say wala'n nigangan ed sikayo. 

Luk 3:14 Et saray sondalo tinepet da met ed sikato, a kuan da, Et sikami, anto'y nepeg min gawaen? Et ikuanto ed sikara, Ag kayo mangawa na damsak ed angan siopa, et ag kayo mangidalem na siopaman ya ag nikatonongan; et pasaragen yo so saray upa yo. 

Luk 3:15 Et nen manaalagar so ombaley, tan amin a totoo ninonot dad kapusoan da nipaakar ed Juan, no sikato kasi in gen so Cristo; 

Luk 3:16 Inmebat si Juan, a kuan to ed sikara ya amin, Siak a tua binyagan ta kayo ed danum; balet onsabi lalo a makapanyari nen sika, ya agak onnepeg a mangokbar na lubir na sapin to: sikato binyagan to kayo ed Espiritu Santo tan apuy; 

Luk 3:17 A say pay pay to wala ed lima to, pian panisan to a maong so taltagan to, tan pian tiponen to so trigo ed kamalir to; balet say taep poolan to, ed apuy ya ag naerep. 

Luk 3:18 Et pati dakel ni ya arum a kalkalar inpulong to ed saray totoo so saray maong a balita; 

Luk 3:19 Balet si Herodes a tetrarka, sanen binalaw to nisengeg ed kinen Herodias ya asawa na agito, tan lapu'd amin a kaugsan a ginawa nen Herodes, 

Luk 3:20 Inyarum to met ni so saya ed saray amin, ya inpokok to si Juan ed panangipangawan, 

Luk 3:21 Et agawa, sanen abinyagan so amin a totoo, a, si Jesus met nen abinyagan, tan nen nanpikasi, say tawen nilukas, 

Luk 3:22 Et inmakseb ed sikato so Espiritu Santo ed nengneng na laman, a singa malapati, tan sakey a voces nanlapu ed tawen, a kuan to, Sika so Ana'ko ya inadaro, dia ed sika napaliketak a maong. 

Luk 3:23 Et si Jesus a dili sanen ginmapo a manbangat, mantaon na talomplo, et sikato so anak (unong na inpangigaton) nen Jose, ya anak nen Eli, 

Luk 3:24 Ya anak nen Matat, ya anak nen Levi, ya anak nen Melqui, ya anak nen Jane, ya anak nen Jose, 

Luk 3:25 Ya anak nen Matatias, ya anak nen Amos, ya anak nen Nahum, ya anak nen Esli, ya anak nen Nage, 

Luk 3:26 Ya anak nen Maat, ya anak nen Matatias, ya anak nen Semei, ya anak nen Jose, ya anak nen Juda. 

Luk 3:27 Ya anak nen Joana, ya anak nen Resa, ya anak nen Zorobabel, ya anak nen Sealtiel, ya anak nen Neri, 

Luk 3:28 Ya anak nen Melqui, ya anak nen Adi, ya anak nen Cosam, ya anak nen Elmodam, ya anak nen Er, 

Luk 3:29 Ya anak nen Josue, ya anak nen Eliezer, ya anak nen Torim, ya anak nen Mata, ya anak nen Levi, 

Luk 3:30 Ya anak nen Simeon, ya anak nen Juda, ya anak nen Jose, ya anak nen Jonan, ya anak nen Eliaquim, 

Luk 3:31 Ya anak nen Malca, ya anak nen Mena, ya anak nen Matata, ya anafe nen Natan, ya anak nen David, 

Luk 3:32 Ya anak nen Jesse, ya anak nen Obed, ya anak nen Booz, ya anak nen Salmon, ya anak nen Naason, 

Luk 3:33 Ya anak nen Aminadab, ya anak nen Aram, ya anak nen Esrom, ya anak nen Fares, ya anak nen Juda, 

Luk 3:34 Ya anak nen Jacob, ya anak nen Isaac, ya cma/e nen Abraham, ya anak nen Tare, ya anak nen Nacor, 

Luk 3:35 Ya anak nen Serug, ya anak nen Ragan, ya anak nen Peleg, ya anak nen Selah, 

Luk 3:36 Ya anak nen Cainan, ya anak nen Arfaxad, ya anak nen Sem, ya anak nen Noe, ya anak nen Lamec, 

Luk 3:37 Ya anak nen Matusalem, ya anak nen Enoc, ya anafe nen Tared, ya anak nen Mahalaleel, ya anak nen Cainan, 

Luk 3:38 Ya anak nen Enos, ya anak nen Set, ya anak nen Adam, ya anak na Dios. 



Luk 4:1 Et si Jesus a napno na Espiritu Santo, pinmawil a nanlapu ed Jordan, et intonton na Espiritu dia ed lawak 

Luk 4:2 Leleg na apataplo'y agew, ya toktoksoen na diablo. Et angapo'y kinan to ed saraman ya agew: et nen apalabas la ra, naerasan. 

Luk 4:3 Et say diablo inkuan to ed sikato, No sika so anak na Dios, igangan mo ed saya'n bato a magmaliw a tinapay. 

Luk 4:4 Et si Jesus inmebat ed sikato, Nisulat, Aliwa lambengat a tinapay so panbilay na too, (noag ingen dia ed amin a Salita na Dios). 

Luk 4:5 Et sikato so inpaatagey to, tan inpanengneng to ed sikato ed sankasikmat so saray amin a panarian ed mundo. 

Luk 4:6 Et inkuan ed sikato na diablo, iter ko ed sika so saya ya amin a pakauley, tan say gloria ra: ta sikato so niiter ed siak; tan dia'd siopa a labay ko a pangiteran iter ko ed sikato. 

Luk 4:7 Kanian, no mikasika ed arap ko, sikato so kayarian mo ya amin. 

Luk 4:8 Et inmebat si Jesus tan inkuan to ed sikato, Nisulat, Mikasika ed Katawan a Dios mo tan sikato lambengat so panlingkoran mo. 

Luk 4:9 Et sikato'y inyakar to ed Jerusalem, tan sikato so inyan to ed toktok na templo, tan inkuan to ed sikato, No sika so Anak na Dios, ontaboy ka a manlapu dia: 

Luk 4:10 Ta nisulat, Ibilin to ed saray angeles to so nipaakar ed sika, pian talimaen da ka: 

Luk 4:11 Tan, Sika'y sakloyen da ed saray kalimaan da: Ompan lamang no nikena so salim ed sakey a bato. 

Luk 4:12 Et nen inmebat si Jesus ed sikato inkuan to: Nikuan la, Ag mo toksoen so Katawan a Dios mo. 

Luk 4:13 Et nen say diablo asumpal to so amin a pananokso, tinmainan ed sikato ed pigara'n panaon. 

Luk 4:14 Et si Jesus dia ed pakapanyari Espiritu pinmawil ed Galilea; et kinmayat so dayew a nipaakar ed sikato ed amin a pasen a kaliberliber. 

Luk 4:15 Et sikato so nanbabangat dia ed saray sinagogas da ya inggalgalang na amin. 

Luk 4:16 Et linma ed Nazaret, a diman so binalegan to: et linmoob, unong na ugalito, ed sinagoga ed agew a sabaton, et inmalagey a nanbasa. 

Luk 4:17 Et initer da ed sikato so libro nen profeta Isaias. Et binuskag to so libro, tan aromog to so pasen a nisulatan na saya, 

Luk 4:18 Say Espiritu na Katawan wala ed siak, Ta nilanaan toak a mangipulong na saray maong a balita ed saray duruka: Inbaki toak a mangipakabat na kawayangan ed saray arakep, Tan say pangipawil na pakanengneng na saray bulag, Pian ibolos ko so saray nanaaposan, 

Luk 4:19 Pian yabawag ko so makapaliket a taon na Katawan. 

Luk 4:20 Et niluko'to so libro, tan sikato'y inpawil to ed katangbayan, et imyorong; et saray mata na amin dia ed sinagoga sinenengneng ed sikato. 

Luk 4:21 Et ginapoan to so nankuan ed sikara, Natan ya agew asumpal ed kalayagan yo so saya'n sulat. 

Luk 4:22 Et pinatua ra ya amin, tan nikelawan ira ed saray salita a magracia a nanlapu ed sangi to: et kuan da, Aliwa ta a saya so anak nen Jose? 

Luk 4:23 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Andi duarua kuanyo ed siak so saya ya alimbawa, Mananambal, tambal mo so inkasika: angan anto a nadngelanmi a ginawam ed Capernaum, gawaen mo met dia ed baleymo a dili. 

Luk 4:24 Et inkuan to, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Angapo so profeta a naawat dia ed dili'n baley to. 

Luk 4:25 Balet tua a kuan ko ed sikayo, Dakel nen saman so bibii a balo dia ed Israel ed saray agew nen Elias, nen nikaput so tawen ed talo'y taon tan anem bulan, et agawa so baleg ya eras ed amin a dalin; 

Luk 4:26 Ingen angapo ed sikara so ni-bakian nen Elias, noag dia ed Zarepta, dia ed dalin na Sidon, ed sakey a bii'n balo. 

Luk 4:27 Et dakel nen saman so akating dia ed Israel ed panaon nen profeta Eliseo; et angapo ed sikara so alinisan, noag si Naaman lambengat a taga Siria. 

Luk 4:28 Et napno ra na sanok ya amin dia ed sinagoga, nen nadngel da so saraya'n bengatla; 

Luk 4:29 Et inmalagey ira, et sikato so pinaarawi ra ed paway na ciudad, et inyakar dan anga ed toktok na palandey ya inalageyan na ciudad da, pian sikato'y ibantak da komon. 

Luk 4:30 Balet sikato nen linmabas ed pegley da tinmainan. 

Luk 4:31 Et linma ed Capernaum, sakey a ciudad na Galilea. Ft sikara so inbabanga to ed agew na sabaton: 

Luk 4:32 Et nankelkelawan da so ibabanga to; ta say salita to walaan na pakapanyari. 

Luk 4:33 Et dia ed sinagoga wala so sakey a too ya walaan na sakey ya espiritu na marumsis a demonio; et nanakis ed baleg a voces, 

Luk 4:34 A! anto so pibiangan mi ed sika, Jesus a Nazareno? linmaka dia a mamagbag ed sikami? Siak kaba' taka no siopa ka, Sika so Santo na Dios. 

Luk 4:35 Et sikato so nanpasnokan nen Jesus, a kuan to, Ag ka oneesel, et ompaway ka ed sikato. Et sanen say demonio sikato'y inparokol to ed pegley, pinmaway ed sikato, ya agto naano. 

Luk 4:36 Et sinmabi kelaw ed amin, et nansasalita ra ed sakey tan sakey, a kuan da, Anto kasi so saya'n salita? ta pati pakauley tan pakapanyari ganganen to so saray espiritu a marumsis, et ompaway ira. 

Luk 4:37 Et say dengel nipaakar ed sikato kinmayat ed amin a pasen na dalin a kaliberliber. 

Luk 4:38 Et inmalagey a nanlapu ed sinagoga, tan linmoob ed abung nen Simon. Et say ina na asawa nen Simon pineketan na maksil a petang; et akikasian da lapu'd sikato. 

Luk 4:39 Et tinmoek ed sikato, et binano to so petang; et tinmainan ed sikato: et tampol ya inmalagey tan nanpaga ed sikara. 

Luk 4:40 Et sanen onseselek so banua, amin so saray walaan na mabebley ed nambabangil a sakit sikara so inyakar da ed sikato; et intapew to so lima to ed balang sakey ed sikara, et pinaabig to ra. 

Luk 4:41 Et pinmaway met so saray demonios a dakerakel, a manakis ira, tan kuan da, Sika so Anak na Dios. Et nen nanpasnokan to ra, agto ra pinasalita; ta amta ra a sikato si Cristo. 

Luk 4:42 Et nen kabuasan la, pinmaway tan linma ed pasen a lawak: et sikato so inanap na saray dakel a totoo, et linma ra ed sikato, tan sikato so pokpokan da komon, pian ag onarawi ed sikara. 

Luk 4:43 Balet sikato inkuan to ed sikara, Kaokolan ko met ya ipulong ko so evangelio na panaria'y Dios ed saray arum a ciudad: ta sikatoya so nibakianko. 

Luk 4:44 Et nanpopulong ed saray sinagoga ed Galilea. 



Luk 5:1 Et agawa, nen nantitipon so dakel a totoo ed sikato tan nadngel da so salita na Dios, a sikato manalalagey ed abay na libsong na Genesaret; 

Luk 5:2 Et anengneng to so duaran baloto ya wala ed gilig na libsong: balet saray sumisigay linmasor ira ed danum, tan uurasan da so saray iket da. 

Luk 5:3 Et sikato linmugan ed sakey ed saray baloto, a sikato so kayarian nen Simon, et kinerew to ed sikato ya yarawi to na diaset ed pandel. Et imyorong tan inbabangat to, manlapu ed baloto, so dakerakel a totoo. 

Luk 5:4 Et nen tinmon da a nansalita, inkuan to ed Simon, Ontaewka, ipelag yo so saray iket yo a pansigay. 

Luk 5:5 Et inmebat si Simon tan inkuanto, Katawan, nansagpot kami la a sanlabi, et angapo so naalami: ingen lapu ed salitam ipelag ko so saray iket. 

Luk 5:6 Et nen ginawa ra so saya, akapangipukok ira na akamayamay a sira; tan apilatpilat so saray iketda; 

Luk 5:7 Et inandawesan da so saray ibibara ed sananey a baloto, pian ondago ra tan ontulong ira ed sikara. Et dinmago ra, et pinano ra a nanpadpara so saray baloto, ed ontanla ya onlereg ira lawari. 

Luk 5:8 Et nen anengneng ya nen Simon Pedro, tinmalimokor ed arap nen Jesus, a kuan to, Onarawi ka ed siak, ta too ak a managkasalanan, O Katawan. 

Luk 5:9 Ta nikelawan, tan saramay amin a kaolop to, nisengeg ed inpakalara ed saray sira ya asigayan da; 

Luk 5:10 Tan ontan met di Santiago tan Juan, ya anak ira nen Zebedeo, a kaolop ira nen Simon. Et si Jesus inkuan to ed Simon, Agka antakot; manlapu'd natan mansigay ka na saray totoo. 

Luk 5:11 Et nen niyakar da ed dalin so saray baloto ra, tinainan da ya amin, tan tinmombok ira ed sikato. 

Luk 5:12 Et agawa, a nen sikato'y wala ed sakey ed saray ciudad, nia, so sakey a laki a napno na kating: et nen anengneng to si Jesus indakmomo to so lupa to, et nankerew ed sikato, a kuan to, Katawan, no labay mo, nayarianmoak a linisan. 

Luk 5:13 Et inyona'to so lima to, tan sikato so diniwi'to, a kuan to, Labay ko; nalinisan ka. Et tampol say kating inmandi ed sikato. 

Luk 5:14 Et inbilin to ed sikato ya agto salitaen ed angan siopa: ingen naka la, tan ompatnag ka ed sacerdote tan mangibagat ka ed inkalinisan mo, onong na inbilin nen Moises, pian pakapamintuaan ed sikara. 

Luk 5:15 Balet onkayat ya onkayat so dengel nipaakar ed sikato: et nantitipon so dakel a totoo ya ondengel, tan patambal ed sakisakit da. 

Luk 5:16 Ingen sikato so inmarawi a linma ed kalawakan tan nanpikasi. 

Luk 5:17 Et agawa ed sakey ed saraman ya agew, a sikato nanbabangat; et saray Fariseos tan makakabat ed gangan, a nanlapura ed amin a pulok na Galilea, tan Judea tan Jerusalem, walara ya akayorong: et wala ed Sikato so pakapanyari Katawan a manambal. 

Luk 5:18 Et nia, wala ra so lalaki ya angyakar ed sakey a dokolan na sakey a laki ya ag makagalaw: et inanapda so pangilooban da ed sikato, tan panginan da ed sikato ed arap to. 

Luk 5:19 Et nen angapo so naromog da a pangilooban ed sikato lapu ed karakel na totoo, sinmegep ira ed toktok na abung, et dia ed binutaw da ya atep sikato'y inepas da pati dokolan to dia ed pegley ed arap nen Jesus. 

Luk 5:20 Et nen anengneng to so pananisia ra, inkuan to, Too, saray kasalanan mo napaandi ra ed sika. 

Luk 5:21 Et saray escribas tan Fariseos ginapoan da so nannonot, a kuan da, Siopa'ya a mansalita'y ayew? Siopa so makayari a mamaandi ed saray kasalanan, no ag say Dios lamfa engat? 

Luk 5:22 Balet si Jesus nen natebek to so kanonotan da, inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Anto so nononotenyo ed kapusoan yo? 

Luk 5:23 Dinan so maininomay, say pangikuan, Saray kasalanan mo napaandi ed sika: ono say pangikuan, Onalagey ka tan manakar ka? 

Luk 5:24 Balet pian nakabatan yo ra say Anak na too walaan na pakapanyari ed dalin a mamaan di ed saray kasalanan, (inkuan to ed ag makagalaw): Kuan ko ed sika. Onalagey ka, tan libit mo so dokolan mo, et onia ka ed abung mo. 

Luk 5:25 Et tampol ya inmalagey ed arap da tan nilibi'to so dokolan to, et linma ed abung to, ya ingalgalang to so Dios. 

Luk 5:26 Et nankelaw ira ya amin, tan ingalgalang da so Dios; et napno ra na takot, a kuan da, Akanengneng kami natan na makapakelaw a bengabengatla. 

Luk 5:27 Et kayari na saraya'n bengatla pinmaway, et akanengneng na sakey a publikano, a manngaran na Levi, ya akayorong ed panagsingilan na buis, et inkuan to ed sikato, Tomboken moak. 

Luk 5:28 Et inkaindan to so amin, tan inmalagey tan tinmombok ed sikato. 

Luk 5:29 Tan sikato so ingawaan nen Levi na sakey a baleg a liket ed abung to: et wala so dakerakel a publikanos tan arum ira'n akirongo ed sikara ed pananganan. 

Luk 5:30 Et saray Fariseos tan saray escriba ra nantalobotob ira sumpa ed saray babangatan to, a kuan da, Akin a mikan tan miinum kayo ed saray publicanos tan saray makasalanan? 

Luk 5:31 Et nen inmebat si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Saray maksil agda nakaokolan so mananambal; noag ingen saray agmakayari. 

Luk 5:32 Agak linmadia a manawag ed saray matonong noag ingen ed saray managkasalanan pian magbabawira. 

Luk 5:33 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Saray babangatan nen Juan mabetbet ira a manayunal, tan manggawa ra na saray pikakasi; ontan met so saray babangatan na saray Fariseo; balet saray babangatan mo mangan tan oninum ira. 

Luk 5:34 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Nayarian yo a panayunalen so saray anak na panbabansalan, leleg a say laki ya asawa wala ed sikara? 

Luk 5:35 Balet onsabi so saray agew; et sano naekal ed sikara so asawa a laki saman la ra manayunal ed saraman ya agew. 

Luk 5:36 Et sinalita to met ed sikara so sakey ya alimbawa; Angapo'y too a mamilat na kawes a balo et isakab to ed daan a kawes; ta no andi pilaten naani na balo, tan say lagas a balo ag met manepeg ed daan. 

Luk 5:37 Et angapo'y too a mangyan na balon alak ed saray daan a birong na alak; ta no andi say balo ya alak pilaten to so saray birong, et sikato so naibung, tan naderal so saray katat. 

Luk 5:38 Balet say balo ya alak nakaokolan to so yan ed saray balo a birong na alak. 

Luk 5:39 Et angapo so too ya nen inminum na ombak ya alak kaliktanen to so balo: ta kuan to, Maong so ombak. 



Luk 6:1 Et agawa ed sakey a sabaton nen manaakar ed saray kamaumaan na maiz; et saray babangatan to nanbagot ira na balibal na maiz, tan angan ira, a binorbor dara ed kalimaan da. 

Luk 6:2 Balet arum ed saray Fariseos inkuan da, Akin a gawaen yo so ag matunong a gawaen ed sabaton? 

Luk 6:3 Et nen inmebat si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Agyo ta ni abasa so saya, no anto so ginawa nen David, nen narasan, sikato, tan saray wala ed sikato; 

Luk 6:4 No panon so inloob to ed abung na Dios, et inala to tan kinan to so tinapay a nisaklang ed altar, tan initdan tora met so saray wala ed sikato; sikato ya ag matunong a kanen nilikod ed saray sacerdotes lambengat? 

Luk 6:5 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Say Anak na too sikato so Katawan na Sabaton. 

Luk 6:6 Et agawa ed sananey lamet a sabaton a linmoob ed sinagoga et nanbangat: et wala'y sakey a tood'man, et say lima to'n kawanan amagaan. 

Luk 6:7 Et sikato so sisiimen na saray escriba tan Fariseo, no manambal kasi ed Sabaton; pian makaromog ira na pangidaleman da ed sikato. 

Luk 6:8 Balet amta to so saray kanonotan da; et inkuan to ed too ya amagaan so lima to, Bangon ka, tan alagey ka ed pegley. Et sikato binmangon tan tinmalindeg. 

Luk 6:9 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Tepeten ko ed sikayo, Matunong kasi ed sabaton so pangawa na maong, ono say pangawa na mauges? say pangilaban ed bilay ono say panderal ed sikato? 

Luk 6:10 Et ninengneng tora ya amin ed liberliber, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Unat mo so limam. Et ginawa to so ontan: tan say lima to apaa.big. 

Luk 6:11 Balet napnora na gula; et nannononong so sakey tan sakey no anto so nayarian da a gawaen ed Jesus. 

Luk 6:12 Et agawa ed saray an agew, a pinmaway ed palandey a manpikasi; et intoloy to a nansanlabi so akikasi ed Dios. 

Luk 6:13 Et nen kabuasanla, tinawag to so saray babangatan to; et amili labindua ed sikara, ya inngarantora met na apostoles: 

Luk 6:14 Si Simon, ya inngaran to met na Pedro, tan si Andres ya agi to, tan si Santiago tan si Juan, tan si Felipe tan si Bartolome. 

Luk 6:15 Tan si Mateo, tan si Tomas, tan si Santiago ya anak nen Alfeo, tan si Simon ya inngaran na Zelotes. 

Luk 6:16 Tan si Judas ya agi nen Santiago, tan si Judas Iscariote, a sikato so nagmaliw a liputan; 

Luk 6:17 Et linmasor a pati sikara, tan inmalagey ed sakey a pasen a patar, tan sakey a karaklan na saray babangatan to, tan sakey a karaklan na ombaley a nanlapu ed amin a Judea, tan Jerusalem, tan say baybay na Tiro, tan Sidon, a sikara so dinmago ya ondengel ed sikato, tan patambal ed sakisakit da; 

Luk 6:18 Et saray ginogonigon na saray espiritu a marumsis atambal ira. 

Luk 6:19 Et amin a karaklan sikato so sineetan da a diwiten: ta pinmaway ed sikato so pakapanyari, et sikara so pinaabig to ya amin. 

Luk 6:20 Et innengneng to ray mata to ed saray babangatan to, tan inkuan to, Mapalar kayo a duruka: ta kien yo so panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 6:21 Mapalar kayo a narasan natan: ta napesel kayo. Mapalar kayo a mannangis natan: tan onele'kayo. 

Luk 6:22 Mapalar kayo, sano busulenda kayo na saray totoo, tan sano isian da kayo ed olop da et modmoraen da kayo, et ipulisay da so ngaran yo a singa mauges, nisengeg ed Anak na too. 

Luk 6:23 Manliket kayo no saman ya agew, tan onlok so kayo ed gayaga: to nia say tomang yo baleg ed tawen; ta ontan lanlamang so ginawa na saray amara ed saray profetas. 

Luk 6:24 Balet; abagey kayo la sikayo'n mayayaman! ta inawat yo la so ligliwa yo. 

Luk 6:25 Abagey kayo la, sikayo a napsel natan! ta naerasan kayo. Abagey kayo la, sikayo a maneelek natan! ta maningel kayo naani tan mannangis kayo. 

Luk 6:26 Abagey kayo la, sano amin a totoo mansalita ra na maong ed sikayo! ta ontan lanlamang so ginawa na saray ama ra ed saray matila a profeta. 

Luk 6:27 Balet kuan ko ed sikayo a mandengdengel, Aroen yo so saray kabusol yo, mangawa kayo'y maong ed saray mamosol ed sikayo, 

Luk 6:28 Bendicionan yo so saray mangayew ed sikayo, pikasi yo so saray mandamsak ed sikayo. 

Luk 6:29 Say mangabil ed sika ed sakey ya aping ipatnag mo met so biek; et say mangekal ed sika na kolibenben mo ag mo ipokpok ed sikato met so ay sing mo. 

Luk 6:30 Itdan mo so amin a mankerew ed sika; et say mangala na kayarian mo agmo pawilen a kerewen. 

Luk 6:31 Et singa say laba'yo a gawaen komon ed sikayo na saray totoo, ontan met so gawaen yo ed sikara. 

Luk 6:32 Et no aroen yo so saray mangaro ed sikayo, anto a salamat so naalayo? ta angan saray makasalanan aroen da so saray mangaro ed sikara. 

Luk 6:33 Et no mangawa kayo na maong ed saray mangawa na maong ed sikayo. anto a salamat so naala yo? ta angan saray makasalanan ontan met so gawaen da. 

Luk 6:34 Et no pabayesen yo so saray ilaloan yo a pangawatan, anto a salamat so naala yo? angan saray makasalanan, mamabayes ira met ed saray makasalanan, pian ontan met so awaten da. 

Luk 6:35 Balet aroen yo so saray kabusol yo, tan mangawa kayo na maong ed sikara, tan mamabayes kayo,ya ag kayo manalagar angan kapigan; et say gunguna yo baleg naani, et sikayo so saray anak naani Sankatageyan: ta sikato mapanga ko ed saray malamang tan mauges. 

Luk 6:36 Mapangasi kayo komon, onong a mapangasi so Ama yo. 

Luk 6:37 Tan ag kayo mangokom, ag kayo naokom: Tan ag kayo manusa, et ag kayo nadusa, mangibolos kayo, ed nibolos kayo: 

Luk 6:38 Mangiter kayo, et naitdan kayo; sukat a maong, pinerner, aseksek tan manleplepwas, so iter da ed ak walan yo. Ta sukat a pansukat yo sikato met so pansukatan ed sikayo. 

Luk 6:39 Et sinalita to met ed sikara so sakey a alimbawa, Nayarian kasi na bulag so mangidawat na bulag? Ag ira kasi napelag a dua ed abut? 

Luk 6:40 Say babangatan aliwan atagtagey nen say managbanga'to: balet balang sakey no nayadyari mipara ed managbanga'to. 

Luk 6:41 Et akin a nengnengen mo so taep ya wala ed mata na agim, balet agmo nengnengen so pagsen ya wala ed matam lanlamang? 

Luk 6:42 Ono panon so pakapangiba-gam ed agim, Agi, paulian moak a mangekal na taep ya wala ed matam, sano agmo nanengneng so pagsen ya wala ed dili a matam? Sika pakalala, ekal mo ni ya onona ed matam so pagsen, et saman la makanengneng ka a malinlinew a mangekal na taep ya wala ed mata na agim. 

Luk 6:43 Ta angapo so maong a kiew a manbunga na mauges; angapo met so mauges a kiew a manbunga na maong. 

Luk 6:44 Ta balang kiew nabirbir ed bunga to lanlamang. Ta dia ed saray sabitan ag makaborbor so saray totoo na higos, ag ira met makaborbor na uvas dia ed zarza. 

Luk 6:45 Say maong a too ipaway to so maabig dia ed maong a kayamanan na puso to; et say mauges a too ipaway to so kaugsan dia ed mauges a kayamanan: ta dia ed inkadaakan na puso say sangi to mansalita. 

Luk 6:46 Et akin a tawagen yoak na, Katawan, Katawan et ag yo gawaen so saray bengatla ya ibagak? 

Luk 6:47 Balang sakey ya ondago ed siak, et denglen to so saray salitak, tan gawaen tora, ipanengneng ko ed sikayo no dinan so kapara to: 

Luk 6:48 Sikato so singa sakey a too a mamaalagey na sakey ya abung, ya angotkot et pinaaralem to, et inyanto so cimiento ed tapew na baton-dampay: et nen sinmabi delap, say agos tinopa to so abung, et ag to apaga law; ta wala a nipaalagey a maong. 

Luk 6:49 Ingen say ondengel, et ag to ga waen, singa sakey a too ya amaala gey na abung ed dalin ya andi cimiento; sikato so tinopa na agos, el tampol ya abagbag; et baleg so in kaderal na saman ya abung. 



Luk 7:1 Kayari inpakasumpal to na sa raya'n amin a salita ed kalayagar na ombaley, linmoob ed Capernaum. 

Luk 7:2 Et say aripen na sakey a Cen turion, a sikato so inararo to asakitan et ngalngali ompatey. 

Luk 7:3 Et nen nadngel to so nipaaka ed Jesus, angibaki ed sikato na mamasiken na saray Judio, a kerewen da ya onla komon tan ilaban to so aripen to. 

Luk 7:4 Et sikara, nen linmara ed Jesus sikato so akikasian da a maseseg, a kuan da, Sikato so manepeg a gawaen mo so saya nipaakar ed sikato; 

Luk 7:5 Ta inaro to so nacion tayo, tan impaalageyan to itayo na sinagoga tayo. 

Luk 7:6 Et si Jesus akila ed sikara. Et bang nen wala ed agla arawi ed abung, say centurion angibaki ed sikato na kakaaro, a kuan da ed sikato Katawan, agka mansagpot; agak onnepeg ya onloob ka ed silong na abung ko: 

Luk 7:7 Kanian agko met inpasen a manepegak ya ondago ed sika; balet ibagam so salita, et say aripen ko onabig. 

Luk 7:8 Ta siak too ak met a niyan ed lepsag na pakauley, ya wala ed lepsag ko so saray sondalo: et kuan ko ed saya, Naka, et onla; tan ed sakey, Gala, et ondago; tan ed aripen ko Gawam'ya, et gawaen to. 

Luk 7:9 Et nen narengel nen Jesus so saraya, nankelaw ed sikato, et inmarap tan inkuan to ed karaklan a mantombok ed sikato, Kuan ko ed sikayo, angan dia ed saray Israelitas, andi, agak ni akaromog na onia kabaleg na pananisia. 

Luk 7:10 Et saray nibaki, nen pinmawil ira ed abung, asabian da ya inmabig so aripen. 

Luk 7:11 Et agawa tampol ed kayari to, a sikato linma ed sakey a ciudad a manngaran na Nain; et akiolop ed sikato so saray babangatan to, tan sakey a dakel a totoo. 

Luk 7:12 Bang nen akaasinger ed pinto na ciudad, nia, ipapaway da so sakey ya inatey, a bugbugtong ya anak a laki nen ina to a balo ni nimet et dakel a totoo ed ciudad so akiolop ed sikato. 

Luk 7:13 Et nen sikato'y anengneng na Katawan, sikato so inabagey to, et inkuan to ed sikato, Agka mannangis. 

Luk 7:14 Et inmasinger tan diniwi'to so lungon: et saray nanawit tinmonda ra. Et inkuan to, Balolaki, kuan ko ed sika, Bangon ka. 

Luk 7:15 Et samay inatey, binmangon, et ginmapo a nansalita. Et inyawa'to ed kinen ina to. 

Luk 7:16 Et say takot sinmabi ed amin: et in galgalang da so Dios, a kuan da: Sakey a baleg a profeta so inmalagey ed sikatayo: tan, say Dios dinalaw to so baley to. 

Luk 7:17 Et saya a dengel kinmayat nipaakar ed sikato dia ed amin a Judea, tan amin a dalin a kaliberliber. 

Luk 7:18 Et saray babangatan nen Juan inbagara ed sikato so saraya'n amin a bengatla. 

Luk 7:19 Et nen tinawag nen Juan so duara ed saray babangatan to inbakito ra ed Katawan, a kuan to, Sika so satay onsabi, ono alagden mi sananey? 

Luk 7:20 Et nen sinmabi so saray lalaki ed sikato, inkuan da, Si Juan a Bautista inbaki to kami ed sika, a kuan to, Sika so satay onsabi, ono alagdenmi sananey? 

Luk 7:21 Dia ed saman ya horas tinambal to so dakel a sakisakit tan bakbaktan espiritu a mauges; et initdan to na pakanengneng so saray bulag. 

Luk 7:22 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo, et ibaga yo ed Juan so saray bengatla ya anengneng tan nadngel yo; saray, bulag akanengneng ira, saray piley akaakar ira, saray akating alinisan ira, et saray telek akadngel ira, saray inatey inmoli ra ed bilay, saray duruka wala a nipulong ed sikara so saray maong a balita. 

Luk 7:23 Et mapalar so siopaman, ya ag makaromog ed siak na kagapolan. 

Luk 7:24 Et nen tinmainan so saray inbaki nen Juan, ginapoan to ya inkuan ed saray dakel a totoo so nipaakar ed Juan, Anto so pinawayan yo a ninengneng ed lawak? sakey a kawayan a siniplog na dagem? 

Luk 7:25 Balet anto so pinawayan yo a ninengneng? Sakey a too a nankawes na mabli? Nia, saray nankawes na mabli, tan manbilay ira a malikeliket, wala ra ed saray palacio na arari. 

Luk 7:26 Balet anto so pinawayan yo a ninengneng? sakey a profeta? On, kuan ko ed sikayo, et lalo ni nen sakey a profeta. 

Luk 7:27 Saya so nisulatan na: Nia, siak ibakik so ibabakik dia ed arap mo, 

Luk 7:28 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, Dia ed saray nianak ed saray bibii angapo so babaleg nen si Juan: balet say kamelagan ed panarian na Dios babaleg nen sikato. 

Luk 7:29 Et amin ya ombaley sanen nadngel da, tan saray publikanos, pinatunong da so Dios, yo inpabinyagan ira ed binyag nen Juan. 

Luk 7:30 Balet saray Fariseos tan makakabat ed gangan inpulisay da nipaakar ed sikara so kalar na Dios, ya ag ira inpabinyagan ed sikato. 

Luk 7:31 Siopa sirin so pangiparaan ko ed saray totoo na saya'n kailalakan, et anto so kaolibay da? 

Luk 7:32 Kaolibay da so ugugaw a manyorong ed plaza, a maniingalan so sakey tan sakey ed sikara; a kuanda, Sikami tinogtoganmi kayo na tolali et agkayo sinmayaw; nanagogol kami, et agkayo nannangis. 

Luk 7:33 Ta linma dia si Juan a Bautista ya ag mangakan na tinapay ag met oninum na alak; et kuan yo, Sikato so walaan na demonic 

Luk 7:34 Linma dia so Anak na too a mangan tan oninum; et kuanyo, Nia, so sakey a too a masiba, tan mainum na alak, kaaro na saray publicanos tan saray makasalanan! 

Luk 7:35 Et say kakabatan napatunong ed saray amin ya anak to. 

Luk 7:36 Et kinerew ed sikato na sakey a Fariseo a mikan komon ed sikato. Et linmoob ed abung na Fariseo, et dinmongo ed pananganan. 

Luk 7:37 Et nia, so sakey a bii'n makasalanan ya wala ed ciudad; et nen akabatan to a dinmongo ed pananganan dia ed abung na Fariseo, angyakar na sakey ya alabastro a napno na unguento, 

Luk 7:38 Et nen inmalagey ed beneg ed saray salito, a mannangnangis, ginapoan to a sinalog ed saray lua to so saray sali to, tan pinunasan to'ra ed buek na olo to, tan inaangoban to so saray sali to, tan pinuyokan to'ra na unguento. 

Luk 7:39 Bang nen anengneng na Fariseo ya anawag ed sikato, nansalita ed dalem, to a kuan to, Saya a too, no profeta komon, naimano to no siopa tan no anto a nengneng na bii so saya a manidiwit ed sikato, ta sikato so sakey a makasalanan. 

Luk 7:40 Et si Jesus nen inmebat inkuanto ed sikato, Simon, wala so daiset ya ibagak ed sika. Et sikato kuan to, Ibagam, Managbangat. 

Luk 7:41 Sakey a managpautang walaan na duara ya akautang: say sakey akautang na limanlasus a denario, et say sakey limanpli 

Luk 7:42 Sanen andian ira na panbayar, pinerdona to'ra a nanparpara. Siopa ed sikara sirin so lalo'n mangaro ed sikato? 

Luk 7:43 Inmebat si Simon tan inkuan to, Isip ko a say amerdonaan to na dakdakel. Et inkuan to ed sikato, Maptek so inpangokom mo. 

Luk 7:44 Et nen inmarap ed bii, inkuanto ed Simon, Nanengneng mo so sayan bii? Linmoobak ed abung mo, agka angited na danum nipaakar ed saray salik: balet sinalog to so saray salik ed saray lua to, tan pinunasan to'ra ed buek to. 

Luk 7:45 Agmoak inangoban: balet sikato, nanlapu ed inloob to, ag tinmonda ya inmangob ed saray salik. 

Luk 7:46 Ag mo nilanaan so olok na larak: balet sikato pinuyokan to na unguento so saray salik. 

Luk 7:47 Kanian kuan ko ed sika, Saray kasalanan to, a sikara so dakel, napaandi'ra; ta angaro ya nagkalalo: balet say napaandian na daiset, daiset so panangaro to. 

Luk 7:48 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Saray kasalanan mo napaandi ra. 

Luk 7:49 Et saray akidongo ed sikato ed pananganan ginapoan da ya ikuan ed loob da, Siopa'ya a mamaandi met ed saray kasalanan? 

Luk 7:50 Et inkuan to ed bii, Say pananisiam inlaban toka; lakala ed kareenan. 

Luk 8:1 Et agawa ed agano, a linma ed saray ciudades tan aldeas, ya nanpopulong tan angyakar na saray maong a balita na panarian na Dios, et iba to so saray labindua, 

Luk 8:2 Tan saray arum a bibii ya atambal ed saray espiritu a mauges tan sakisakit: si Maria ya inngaran na Magdalena, a pinawayan na pitora'n demonio, 

Luk 8:3 Tan si Juana ya asawa nen Chuza a managpaga nen Herodes, tan si Susana, tan dakel ya arum ni a nanlinkor ed sikato ed saray kayamanan da. 

Luk 8:4 Et nen nantitipon so baleg a karaklan, tan saray wala ed balang ciudad linmara ed sikato, nansalita ed alimbawa: 

Luk 8:5 Say managtanem pinmaway, a linma'n mangitanem na ilik to: et nen nantanem, arum naplag ed saray gilig na dalan; et agatingatinan, tan saray manok ed tagey sikato so kinan da. 

Luk 8:6 Et say arum naplag ed bato; et katobo to, amagaan, lapu ed angapo so basa to. 

Luk 8:7 Et arum naplag ed kasabitan; et saray sabit tinmobo pati sikato, tan sikato so pinalereg da. 

Luk 8:8 Et arum naplag ed mabona a dalin, et tinmobo, tan angiter na bunga a tunggal lasus. Nen asalita to so saraya a bengatla, inyakis to, Say walaan na layag a pandengel, ondengel komon. 

Luk 8:9 Et saray babangatan to tinepet da ed sikato no anto'ya kasi ya alimbawa. 

Luk 8:10 Et inkuan to, Ed sikayo niiter so pakapikabat ed saray misterio na panarian na Dios; balet ed saray arum dia ed saray alimbawa; pian angan nengnengnengen da agda nanengneng, tan angan dengdenglen da agda natalosan. 

Luk 8:11 Bang say alimbawa sikato'ya: Say ilik sikato so salita na Dios. 

Luk 8:12 Et saramay naplag ed gilig na dalan sikara so saray dinmengel; saman la onsabi diablo, et ekalento so salita ed kapusoan da, pian ag ira manisia tan ag ira nilaban. 

Luk 8:13 Et saray naplag ed bato sikara so, nen dinmengel ira, inawat da so salita a malikeliket; et saraya angapo so lamut da, et manisiara ed magangano, et dia ed panaon na katokso onsian ira. 

Luk 8:14 Et saray naplag ed kasabitan, saraya so dinmengel, et nen onla ra ed dalan da nalner ira ed kapagaan tan kayamanan tan likeliket ed saya a bilay, et ag ira manbunga na naloto. 

Luk 8:15 Et say naplag dia ed mabuna a dalin, saraya so totoo a dia ed masimpit tan maong a puso, nen nadngel da so salita, sikato so binenbenan da, tan manbongara a maanus. 

Luk 8:16 Et angapo so too, a sano aselselan to so sakey a silew, sikato so sakoban to ed banga, ono yan to ed silong na sakey a dokolan; sikato ingen so yan to ed sakey a panangitoonan, pian saray onloob nanengneng da so silew. 

Luk 8:17 Ta angapo so maamot, ya ag nipatnag; ono angapo so inyamot, ya ag nakabatan ono ag nipaway ed liwawa. 

Luk 8:18 Manlikas kayo sirin onong na narengel yo: ta siopaman ya walaan, naitdan, et siopaman ya andian, angan say isisipen to ni a kayarian to naekal ed sikato. 

Luk 8:19 Et linma ed sikato si ina to tan saray agagi to et agda ayarian so dinmago ed sikato lapu ed karakel na totoo. 

Luk 8:20 Et nibaga ed sikato, Si inam tan saray agagim walara ed paway, a pirawat da ka'n nengnengen. 

Luk 8:21 Balet sikato inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Say inak tan saray agagik sikaraya so ondengel na salita na Dios, et sikato so gawaen da. 

Luk 8:22 Et agawa ed sakey ed saraman ya agew, a sikato linmugan ed sakey a baloto, sikato tan saray babangatan to; et inkuan to ed sikara, Onla itayo ed sakey a biek na libsong: et pinmikal ira. 

Luk 8:23 Balet nen mansasakay ira sikato so naugip: et sinmabi sakey a bagyo na dagem dia ed libsong; et napapano ra ed danum, tan maatatap ira. 

Luk 8:24 Et dinmago ra ed sikato, tan sikato so niliing da a kuan da, Managbangat, managbangat, natawtaw itayo la. Et aliing, tan nanpasnokan to so dagem tan say sebeg na danum: et tinmon da ra, et sinmabi linak. 

Luk 8:25 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Iner so kawalaan na pananisia yo? Et sikara a sitatakot, nankelaw ira, a kuan na sakey ed sakey, Siopa'ya sirin a mangangan angan saray dagem tan danum, et sikato'y onoren da? 

Luk 8:26 Et sinmabira ed dalin na saray Gadareno, ya wala ed arap na Galilea. 

Luk 8:27 Et nen inmepas ed dalin, inmabet ed sikato so sakey a laki a nanlapu ed ciudad, ya walaan na demonios; et dia ed andukey a panaon ag nansolong na kawes, tan ag nanayam ed bengatla ya abung, no ag dia ed saray lobok. 

Luk 8:28 Et nen nanengneng to si Jesus, inmakis, et tinmalimokor ed arap to, tan inkuan to ed maksil a voces. Anto so pibiangan ko ed sika, Jesus sika Anak na Dios a Sankatageyan? kerewen ko ed sika, ag moak pairapen. 

Luk 8:29 Ta ingangan to ed espiritu a marumsis ya ompaway ed too. Ta sikato'y abayag la a niluganan to: et inimatonan na bantay, tan sininger na golonggolong tan grillos; et nen pinolto'to so saray singer, inyakar na demonio ed kalawakan. 

Luk 8:30 Et si Jesus tinepe'to ed sikato, Anto so ngaran mo? Et inkuan to, Legion; ta dakel a demonio so linmoob ed sikato.

Luk 8:31 Et kinerew da ed sikato ya agto ra komon igangan ed kaaralman. 

Luk 8:32 Et wad'man so sakey a polok na dakel a babuy a mankakabkab ed palandey: et kinerew da ed sikato a paulian tora komon ya onloob ed sikara. Et inabuloy to ed sikara. 

Luk 8:33 Et pinmaway so saray demonio ed too, tan linmoob ira ed saray babuy: et say pulok tinmaboy ed sakey a kelas na libsong, et nalner ira. 

Luk 8:34 Et nen anengneng na saray manbabantay so agawa, binmatik ira, tan inbaga ra ed ciudad tan uma. 

Luk 8:35 Et pinmaway ira a nengnengen da so agawa; et dinmago ra ed Jesus, et aromog da so too, a pinawayan na saray demonio ya akayorong, a sikakawes tan makalkalakal, ed salian nen Jesus: et tinmakot ira. 

Luk 8:36 Et inulit ed sikara na saray akanengneng no panon so inabig na aselepan na demonio. 

Luk 8:37 Et amin ya ombaley ed uma na Gadara a manliberliber kinerew da ed sikato a tainan tora komon; ta linmoob ed sikara so baleg a takot: et sikato so sinmapat ed sakey a baloto, tan pinmawil. 

Luk 8:38 Balet say too a pinawayan na saray demonio akikasi ed sikato pian makapiolop komon ed sikato: balet sikato'y pinapawil to a kuan to, 

Luk 8:39 Pawilka ed abung. mo, tan ipaliwawam no panon kabaleg so saray bengatla ginawa ed sika na Dios. Et sikato'y linma, inbelbeliaw to ed amin a ciudad so saray ankabaleg a bengatla a ginawa nen Jesus ed sikato. 

Luk 8:40 Et nen pinmawil si Jesus, inako ran maliket na saray dakel a totoo; ta nanaalagar ira ya amin ed sikato. 

Luk 8:41 Et nia, dinmago so sakey a laki a manngaran na Jairo; et sikato so pangolo ed sinagoga: et dinmakmomo ed saray sali nen Jesus, et kinerew to ed sikato ya onloob ed abung to; 

Luk 8:42 Ta walaan na saksakey ya anak a bii, mantaon na labindua, et ngalngali ompatey, Balet nen manaakar nanbobonton so totoo ed sikato. 

Luk 8:43 Et sakey a bii a nanairapan ed panbolos na dala a labindua so taon to, ya inopo'to ed saray mananambal so amin a kayamanan to, et angapo so akapaabig ed sikato, 

Luk 8:44 Inmasinger ed beneg to, tan diniwi'to so saloy na kawes to; et tampol a tinmonda so pambolos na dala to. 

Luk 8:45 Et inkuan nen Jesus, Siopa so aniwit ed siak? Et nen nanpaandi so amin, inkuan nen Pedro tan saray ibiba to, Managbangat, say karakel na totoo onleletlet ed sika tan bobontonan daka. 

Luk 8:46 Balet inkuan nen Jesus, Wala so aniwit ed siak: ta alikasko ya pinmaway ed siak so pakapanyari. 

Luk 8:47 Et nen nanengneng na bii ya ag makaamot, dinmago a mangiwgiw, et nen tinmalimokor ed arap to inbaga to ed arap na amin ya ombaley so sengeg na aniwitan to'd sikato, tan say bigla ya inabig to. 

Luk 8:48 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Ana'ko, say pananisiam pinaabig toka; laka la ed kareenan. 

Luk 8:49 Et nen mansasalita ni, sinmabi sakey a nanlapu ed abung na pangolo ed sinagoga, a kuan to, Say anak mo inatey la; agmo pankesawen so Managbangat. 

Luk 8:50 Ingen nen narengel nen Jesus, inmebat ed sikato, Agka antakot: manisia ka lambengat, et sikato so onabig. 

Luk 8:51 Et nen linmoob ed abung, angapo'y pinaloob to a tinmombok ed sikato, nilikod si Pedro, tan si Juan tan si Santiago, tan say ama tan ina na marikit. 

Luk 8:52 Et mannangis ira ya amin, tan sikato so panagogolan da: balet sikato inkuan to, Agkayo mannangis; ta ag inatey, no ag ingen naugip. 

Luk 8:53 Et sikato so inelekan da a binalaw, ta amtara a sikato so inatey. 

Luk 8:54 Balet sikato, neninegnaan to ed lima, tinawagan to, a kuan to, Marikit, ombangon ka. 

Luk 8:55 Et say espiritu to pinmawil, et tampol a binmangon: tan ingangan to ya itdan da na kanen. 

Luk 8:56 Et saray atateng to nikelawan ira; balet inbilin to ed sikara ya angapo so panongtongan da na agawa. 



Luk 9:1 Et tinawag to a tinipon so labindua, tan initdan to'ra na pakayari tan pakauley ed saray amin a demonio tan manambal ed saray sakit. 

Luk 9:2 Et imbaki to'ra a mangipulong na panarian na Dios tan manambal ed saray asakitan. 

Luk 9:3 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Agkayo mangala na angan anto nipaakar ed panakar yo, angan tayukor, angan supot, angan tinapay, angan pilak; et agkayo mangitarok na duara a kawes. 

Luk 9:4 Et dia ed bengatla ya abung a looban yo, ontilak kayod'man et diman so panlapuan yo. 

Luk 9:5 Et amin ya ag mangawat ed sikayo, sano ompaway kayo ed saman a ciudad, pokpokan yo so dabok ed saray sali yo a pakatasian na sungpa ed sikara. 

Luk 9:6 Et linmara, tan inakar da so amin a binaleybaley, ya inpolong da so evangelio, tan nantatambal ira ed amin a pasen.

Luk 9:7 Bang si Herodes a tetrarka nadngelan to so amin ya agawgawa; et manduarua a maong, lapu ed kuan na arum a si Juan inmoli ed bilay ed saray inaatey; 

Luk 9:8 Et arum, a si Elias pinmanengneng; et saray sananey, a sakey ed saray profeta a daan so inmoli ed bilay. 

Luk 9:9 Et inkuan nen Herodes: Si Juan ya inpapotolan ko: balet siopa'ya, a pakadngelan ko na saraya a bengatla? Et sineetan to a nengnengen. 

Luk 9:10 Et saray apostoles, sanen pinma wil ira, inulit da ed sikato so bengabengatla a ginawa ra. Et inala tora, tan pinmawil ira a nanbok bokor ed sakey a ciudad a manngaran na Betsaida. 

Luk 9:11 Balet nen nakabatan na saray dakel a totoo tinmombok ira ed sikato et inawa' tora, tan akisalitaan tora ni paakar ed panaria'y Dios, et saray nankoakolan na pananambal tinambal tora. 

Luk 9:12 Et say agew ongagapo la ya onngarem; et dinmago so saray labindua, tan inkuan da ed sikato, Pasipot mo la so dakel a totoo, pian onlara ed baley tan kaabungan ed kaliberliber, ya ondawes, tan mananap na kanen: ta wadia itayo ed pasen a lawak. 

Luk 9:13 Balet inkuan to ed sikara, Itdanyora na kanen. Et inkuan da, Angapo ed sikami no ag say limlima ra a tinapay tan duara a sira; nilikod no onlakami a manaliw na kanen nipaakar ed saya ya amin a totoo. 

Luk 9:14 Ta mikaliman libo ra a totoo. Et inkuan to ed saray babangatan to, Payurong yo ra a pankokompogen, a sanlilimamplo. 

Luk 9:15 Et ontan so ginawara, et pinayorong dara ya amin. 

Luk 9:16 Et inala to so saray limara a tinapay tan duara'n sira, et tinmangay ed tawen, binendicionan tora, et pinisagpisag to; tan initer to ed saray babangatan to pian yanda ed arap na karaklan. 

Luk 9:17 Et angan ira, et napsel ira ya amin: et say nakdaan ed saray pisagpisag, akala ra na labindua a babako. 

Luk 9:18 Tan agawa, nen manpipikasi a bokor to, saray babangatan walara ed sikato: et tinepe'to ed sikara, a kuan to, Siopa ak ed kuan na saray karaklan? 

Luk 9:19 Et nen inmebat ira inkuan da, Si Juan Bautista; balet saray arum kuan da, Si Elias; et saray sananey, Inmoli ed bilay so sakey a profeta a daan. 

Luk 9:20 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Balet sikayo siopa ak ed kuanyo? Et nen inmebat si Pedro inkuan to, Say Cristo na Dios. 

Luk 9:21 Balet sikato imbilin to ed sikara, tan ingangan to ya agda'ya ibaga ed siopaman; 

Luk 9:22 A kuan to, Say Anak na too kaokolan a mantepel na dakel a bengatla, tan ipulisay na saray mamasiken tan makauley na saray sacerdotes tan saray escribas, tan ompatey, et onoli ed bilay ed komatlo ya agew. 

Luk 9:23 Et inkuan to ed amin, No siopaman a too maliket ya ontombok ed siak, iburi to so inkasika to, tan sakbaten to so cruz to ya inagewagew, tan tornboken toak. 

Luk 9:24 Ta siopaman a maliket a mangilabaii na bilay to, nabalang to; ingen siopaman a makabalang na bilay to nisehgeg ed siak, sikato lamlamang so nilaban to. 

Luk 9:25 Ta anto so napinabangan na too, no naala to so sankamundoan, et nabalang to ono naderal to so inkasikato? 

Luk 9:26 Ta angan siopa a mangibaing ed siak tan saray salitak, sikato so ibaing na Anak na too, sano onla ed dili a gloria to, tan gloria na Ama, tan saray sasanto ya angeles. 

Luk 9:27 Balet ibagak ed sikayo so katuaan, Wala so pigara ya wadia, ya agda natawayan so ipapatey, anga ed nanengneng da so panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 9:28 Et agawa nen komawalo ya agew kayari na saraya'n salita, intarok to si Pedro tan si Juan tan si Santiago, tan tinmakdang ed palandey a manpikasi. 

Luk 9:29 Et nen manpipikasi, say nengneng na lupa to naoman, et say kawes to nagmaliw ya ampoti tan masnag. 

Luk 9:30 Et nia, wala so duara'n lalaki a misasalita ed sikato, a sikara di Moises tan Elias; 

Luk 9:31 A pinmatnag ira a sigogloria tan sinalita ra so itainan to a ngalngali nasumpal ed Jerusalem. 

Luk 9:32 Bang si Pedro tan saray iba to akaogip ira a maong: balet nen aliing ira, anengneng da so gloria to, tan saray duara a lalaki ya akialagey ira ed sikato. 

Luk 9:33 Et agawa, nen ontatainan ira ed sikato, si Pedro inkuan to ed Jesus, Managbangat, maong ed sikatayo so panayam dia: et mangawa itayo na talora ya ayaman; sakey so nipaakar ed sika, tan sakey so nipaakar ed Moises, tan sakey so nipaakar ed Elias: ya agto amta so sasalitaen to. 

Luk 9:34 Et leleg ya inkuan to so saraya a bengatla, sinmabi sakey a lurem, ya anirum ed sikara: et atakot ira nen asakop ira ed lurem. 

Luk 9:35 Et pinmaway so sakey a voces ed lurem, a kuanto, Saya sikato so Ana'ko, a pinilik: sikato so denglen yo. 

Luk 9:36 Et nen imanla so voces, aromog a bokbokor nen Jesus. Et ag ira nansalita, et dia'd saraman ya agew angapo so sinalitara ed siopaman nipaakar ed anengneng da.
