Luk 9:37 Tan agawa, ed ontombok ya agew, sanen inmepas ira ed palandey, sakey a baleg a karakel na katooan so inmabet ed sikato. 

Luk 9:38 Et nia, sakey a laki ed karaklan so inmakis a kuan to, Managbangat, kerewen ko ed sika ya ilingaw mo komon so saray matam ed ana'ko; ta sikatoy bugbugtong ya ana'ko: 

Luk 9:39 Et nia, sikato so alaen na sakey ya espiritu, et tampol ya onakis; et sikato so itulintulin to anga ed manbora so sangi to, et mairap ya ompaway ed sikato, et mapalaloy pamairap to. 

Luk 9:40 Et kinerew ko ed saray babangatan mo a papawayen da komon; et agda ayarian. 

Luk 9:41 Et inmebat si Jesus tan inkuan to, O ilalak ya angapo so pananisia to tan mauges, kaonongan kabayag so panayam ko ed sikayo, tan pangitepel ko ed sikayo? Yakar mo dia so anak mo. 

Luk 9:42 Et nen ondadago, sikato so inggeba na demonio tan pinairap to a toloy. Balet nanpasnokan nen Jesus so espiritu a marumsis tan tinambal to so balolaki, et impawil to ed ama to. 

Luk 9:43 Et nikelawan ira ya amin ed baleg a pakapanyari Dios. Balet nen nankelkelaw ira ed amin a bengabengatla a ginawa to, inkuan to ed saray babangatan to, 

Luk 9:44 Yan yo ed kalayagan yo so saraya'n salita: to say Anak na too niyawat naani ed lima na saray totoo. 

Luk 9:45 Balet agda atalosan so saya'n salita, et niamot ed sikara, pian ag da natebek: et antakot ira a mangitepet ed sikato na saya'n salita. 

Luk 9:46 Et agawa so sangsangan ed sikara, no siopa kasi ed sikara so katagtageyan. 

Luk 9:47 Balet si Jesus nen anengneng to so panmolimoli na kapusoan da, angala'y sakey ya ugaw a melag et inyan to ed abay to, 

Luk 9:48 Tan inkuan to ed sikara, Angan siopa a mangawat na saya'n melag ya ugaw ed ngaran ko awaten to ak: et angan siopa a mangawat ed siak awaten to so angibaki ed siak: ta say kamelagan ed sikayo ya amin, sikato lamlamang so baleg. 

Luk 9:49 Et inmebat si Juan tan inkuanto, Managbangat, akanengneng kami sakey a mamapapaway ed saray demonios dia ed ngaran mo; et insebelmi ed sikato, ta ag ontombok ed sikatayo. 

Luk 9:50 Ingen si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Agyo sebelan: ta say ag onsumpa ed sikayo wala ed sikayo. 

Luk 9:51 Et agawa, sanen asinger a maong la so agew a kaawa'to ed tagey, pinaligen to so lupa'to a onla ed Jerusalem, 

Luk 9:52 Et nanbaki igagangan ed arapto; et linma'ra, tan linmoob ira ed sakey a ciudad na saray Samaritanos, pian mantadia ra nipaakar ed sikato. 

Luk 9:53 Et sikato so ag da inawat, lapu ed say lupa to singa oonla nen saman ed Jerusalem. 

Luk 9:54 Et sanen sikato'y anengneng na babangatan to a Santiago tan Juan, inkuan da, Katawan, Labay mo ya kerewen mi ya onepas so apuy manlapu ed tawen, pian upoten tora? 

Luk 9:55 Balet inmarap, tan binano to ra. 

Luk 9:56 Et linmara ed sananey ya aldea. 

Luk 9:57 Tan sanen manaakar ira ed dalan, inkuan na sakey a too ed sikato, Tomboken taka angan iner so laenmo. 

Luk 9:58 Et inkuan ed sikato nen Jesus, Saray koyangen wala'y ongib da, tan saray manok ed tawen walaan ira na obong; balet say Anak na too andian na napangisaralan to ed olo to. 

Luk 9:59 Et inkuan to ed sananey, Tomboken moak. Ingen inkuan to, Katawan, yaboloy mo ed siak ya onona pian onla ak tan iponponko so amak. 

Luk 9:60 Balet inkuan to ed sikato, Paulian mo so saray inatey a mangiponpon ed saray inatey da a dili; balet onlaka tan ipakabat mo so panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 9:61 Et inkuan met na sananey, Tomboken taka, Katawan; ingen yaboloy mo ed siak ya onona ya ompatanir ak ed saray wala ed abung ko. 

Luk 9:62 Balet si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Angapo so too o sano inyan to so lima to ed araro, et onlingay ed beneg, et makana ed panarian na Dios. 



Luk 10:1 Bang nen kayari na saraya'n bengatla say Katawan anoro na arum a pitomplo, tan inbaki tora.a sanderua ed arap to, ed amin a ciudad tan pasen, ya sikaton dili asinger la a laen to. 

Luk 10:2 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Say anien peteg a daakan, ingen saray komikimey daiset: pikasi yo sirin ed Katawan na anien, ta mangibaki komikimey ed anien to. 

Luk 10:3 Onla kayo la; nia, ibakita kayo a singa saray karnero ed pegley na saray lobo. 

Luk 10:4 Agkayo mangitarok na bolsa, angan supot angan sapin; et angapo so too ya ibano yo ed dalan. 

Luk 10:5 Et angan anto ya abung a looban yo, kuan yo ya onona, Say deen wala komon ed saya'n abung. 

Luk 10:6 Et no'wadman so sakey ya anak na kareenan, say deen yo manayam ed sikato: ingen no angapo, sikato so ompawil ed sikayo lamet. 

Luk 10:7 Et tonda kayo ed saman ya abung, a mangan tan oninum na bengabengatla ya iter da ed sikayo: ta say komikimey manepeg ed upato. Agkayo onalis ed sananey ya abung. 

Luk 10:8 Et angan anto a ciudad a looban yO, et awaten da kayo, kanen yo so isaklang da ed arap yo: 

Luk 10:9 Tan tambalen yo so saray agmakayari ya wadman, tan kuan yo ed sikara, Inmasinger ed sikayo so panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 10:10 Balet dia ed anto'n ciudad a looban yo, et agda kayo awaten, ompaway kayo ed saray polong, et kuan yo, 

Luk 10:11 Angan say dabok na ciudad'yo, a pinmeket ed saray salimi, pokpokan mi sumpa ed sikayo: angaman ontan amtaen yo so saya, a say panarian na Dios inmasinger. 

Luk 10:12 Kuan ko ed sikayo, Dia ed Satan ya agew anlemlemew so nipaakar ed Sodoma nen say nipaakar ed satan a ciudad. 

Luk 10:13 Abagey kala, Corazin! Abagey kala, Betsaida! ta no dia ed Tiro tan Sidon agawa komon so saray makapanyari a gawa ya agawa ed sikayo, abayag la komon a nanyurong ira ed cilicio tan dapol a nanpataoli ra. 

Luk 10:14 Ingen anlemlemew naani ed Tiro tan Sidon ed panangokom, nen dia ed sikayo. 

Luk 10:15 Et sika, Capernaum, nitandoroka ya anga ed tawen? nipaabeba ka naani ya anga ed Hades. 

Luk 10:16 Say ondengel ed sikayo denglentoak; et say mangipolisay ed sikayo, ipolisay toak; et say mangipolisay ed siak ipolisay to so angibaki ed siak. 

Luk 10:17 Et pinmawil so saray pitomplo a sililiket, a kuan da, Katawan, angan saray demonios apatolok mira lapu'd ngaran mo. 

Luk 10:18 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Anengneng ko si Satanas a naplag nanlapu ed tawen a singa kirmat. 

Luk 10:19 Nia, initdan ta kayo na pakaoley ya ongatin ed saray uleg tan alakdan, tan ed amin a pakayari na kabusol: et angapo naani makapauges ed sikayo. 

Luk 10:20 Angaman ontan agkayo manliket nisengeg ed saya, a saray espiritu ontolok ira ed sikayo; manliket kayo ingen ta saray ngaran yo nisulat ira ed tawen. 

Luk 10:21 Diad saman lanlamang ya horas linmiket ed Espiritu Santo, et inkuan to, Misalamatak ed sika, O Ama, Katawan na tawen tan dalin, ta inyamot mo so saraya'n bengatla ed saray makabat tan makatalos, et sikara so inpasingawey mo ed saray ugugaw: on, Ama, ta ontan so makapaliket ed saray matam. 

Luk 10:22 Amin, a bengabengatla inyawat ed siak nen Amak: et angapo so rnikabat no siopa so Anak, nilikod so Ama; tan no siopa so Ama, nilikod so Anak, tan say labay a pangipasingaweyan ed sikato na Anak. 

Luk 10:23 Et nen inmarap ed saray babangatan to, inkuan to ed kabokoran, Mapalar so saray mata a makanengneng ed saray nanengneng yo: 

Luk 10:24 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, a dakel so saray profetas tan arari a kinaliktan da a nanengneng so saray nanengneng yo, et agda'ra anengneng; tan dengelen so saray narengel yo, et agda'ra nadngel. 

Luk 10:25 Et nia, sakey a makabat ed gangan inmalagey tan sikato'y sinalito, a kuan to, Managbangat, anto'y gaaen ko, pian natawir ko so bilay ya andi angaan? 

Luk 10:26 Et sikato inkuan to ed sikato, Anto so nisulat ed gangan? Panon so panbabasam? 

Luk 10:27 Et nen inmebat inkuan to, Aroen mo so Katawan a Dios mo ed amin a pusom, tan amin a kamarerwam, tan amin a kasil mo, tan amin ya isip mo; tan say kaparani a too onong ed sika lanlamang. 

Luk 10:28 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Matunong so inebat mo: say a so gawam, et nabilay ka. 

Luk 10:29 Ingen sikato, pirawa'to so ompatnag a matunong, inkuan to ed Jesus, Et siopa so kaparak a too? 

Luk 10:30 Et si Jesus inmebat tan inkuanto, Sakey a too linmasor nanlapu ed Jerusalem ya onla ed Jerico; et naplag ed saray tulisan a sikato so nanparpara a sinamsaman tan kinabil da, tan tinmainan ira, a sikato'y pinaolian da a manpapanabos.

Luk 10:31 Et nibana so sakey a sacerdote a linmasor ed saman a dalan: et nen sikato so anengneng to, linmabas ed sananey a gilig. 

Luk 10:32 Et ontan met sakey a Levita, nen akasabi ed saman a pasen, et anengneng to, linmabas ed sananey a gilig. 

Luk 10:33 Balet sakey a Samaritano, nen manaakar, sinmabi ed kawalaan to; et nen sikato so anengneng to, atenyeg so panangabagey to, 

Luk 10:34 Et dinmago ed sikato, tan binerber to so saray suga'to, a kinalboan to ra na larak tan alak; et sikato'y inpakabayo to ed dili a sinakayan to, et inakar to ed darawesan, et sikato'y pinagaan to. 

Luk 10:35 Et dia'd ontombok ya agew angipaway na duara'n denario, et initer to ed akan abung, et inkuan to ed sikato, Sikato'y pagaan mo; et ganagana ni gastosen mo, et, no ompawilak lamet, bayaran ko ed sika. 

Luk 10:36 Siopa ed saraya'n talo, so, isipen mo ya angipatnag na kapara'n too naplag ed saray tulisan? 

Luk 10:37 Et sikato inkuan to, Say nanagamil na panangasi ed sikato. Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Laka, tan gawam so ontan. 

Luk 10:38 Bang nen manaakar ira, linmoob ed sakey ya aldea: et sakey a bii a manngaran na Maria so anangkaili ed sikato ed abung to. 

Luk 10:39 Et walaan na agi a manngaran na Maria a sikato met so imyorong ed salian nen Jesus, tan nandengel na salita to. 

Luk 10:40 Balet si Marta ataltalibaga ed dakel a kapagaan; et Sinminger ed sikato, tan inkuan to, Katawan, ag mo ta kapagaan a say agik panbokbokoren toak a manpaga? Ibagam ed sikato a tulongan toak. 

Luk 10:41 Balet say Katawan inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikato, Marta, Marta, makaliktan ka tan dakel so kagonigonan mo: 

Luk 10:42 Balet sakey so sankaokolan: ta si Maria pinili to so maong a betang, a sikato so ag naekal ed sikato. 



Luk 11:1 Et agawa, nen manpipikasi ed sakey a pasen, a nen asumpal, inkuan ed : sikato na sakey ed saray babangatan to, Katawan, ibangat mo kami a mikasi, onong met na inpangibangat nen Juan ed saray babangatan to. 

Luk 11:2 Et inkuan to ed sikara, No mikasikayo, kuan yo, Ama, Nagalang komon so ngaran mo. Onsabi komon so panarian mo. 

Luk 11:3 Iter mo ed sikami komon ya agewagew so kanen mi ya inagewagew. 

Luk 11:4 Tan paandien mo ed sikami so saray kasalanan mi; ta sikami met paandien mi so balang sakey ya akautang ed sikami. Tan agmo kami yak'af ed katokso. 

Luk 11:5 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Siopa ed; sikayo so walaan na kaaro, et onia-ised sikato ed pegley labi, tan kuafa to ed sikato, Kaaro, pabayes mo ak na talora'n tinapay; 

Luk 11:6 Ta sakey a kaarok linma ed siak a nanlapu ed panakar et angapo so iparongok ed sikato; 

Luk 11:7 Et sikato manlapu ed loob onebat tan kuan to, Agmoak gonigonen: say pinto akakapot la, et saray ana' ko kaakdol ko'ra; ag ko nayarian so onbangon tan mangiter ed sika? 

Luk 11:8 Kuan ko ed sikayo, angan ag onbangon tan mangiter ed sikato, lapu ed kaaro to, angan ontan lapu ed pangonigon to onbangon tan iter to ed sikato so amin a kaokolan to. 

Luk 11:9 Et kuan ko ed sikayo, Kerewkayo, et naitdan kayo; mananap kayo, et makaromog kayo; onpato kayo, et nalukasan ed sikayo. 

Luk 11:10 Ta balang sakey ya onkerew, mangawat; et say mananap, makaromog; et say onpatok, nalukasan. 

Luk 11:11 Et siopa ed sikayo so amasano say anak to onkerew ed sikato na tinapay, et sikato so itdan to na sakey a bato? ono sira, et sikato so mangiter na sakey ya uleg a panagkasira? 

Luk 11:12 Ono sikato'y onkerew na sakey ya iknol, iter to ed sikato so sakey ya alakdan? 

Luk 11:13 No sikayo sirin, anta mauges kayo, amta yo so mangiter na saray maong a panangaro ed saray anak yo ag kasi nagkalalo a say Ama yo a mangatatawen mangiter na Espiritu Santo ed saray onkerew ed sikato? 

Luk 11:14 Et papapawayen to so sakey a demonio ya sikato so emel. Et agawa, sanen pinmaway to so demonio, say too ya emel nansalita; et say karaklan nikelawan. 

Luk 11:15 Balet saray arum ed sikara inkuan da, Lapu ed pakapanyari nen Beelzebub a principe na saray demonio so pamapapawayan to ed saray demonios. 

Luk 11:16 Et saray arum a sikato'y totoksoen da kinmerew ira ed sikato na sakey a tanda a nanlap,u;ed tawen. 

Luk 11:17 Balet sikato, ya amta to so kanonotan da, inkuan to ed sikara, Balang panarian a naapagapag sumpa ed sikato lanlamang sikato so nageba; et say sakey ya abung a naapagapag sumpa ed sakey ya abung sikato so nageba. 

Luk 11:18 Et no si Satanas naapagapag met sumpa ed sikato lanlamang, panon so yalagey na panarian to kuan yo a lapu'd pakapanyari nen Beelzebub so pamapapaway ko ed saray demonios. 

Luk 11:19 Et no siak papawayen ko so saray demonio lapu ed pakapanyari nen Beelzebub, saray anak yo siopa so pamapapawayan da? kanian sikara so okom yo. 

Luk 11:20 Balet no lapu'd tamoro na Dios so pamapapawayan ko ed saray demonio, sirin say panarian na Dios sinmabi ed sikayo. 

Luk 11:21 No say mabiskeg a too siaayura a bantayan to so aban to, saray kayarian to walara ed kareenan: 

Luk 11:22 Balet no onsabi mabibiskeg nen sikato et sikato so taloen to, ekalen to ed sikato so amin ya ayura a nanilaloan to, tan apagen to so saray samsam to. 

Luk 11:23 Say agmibiang ed siak sumpa ed siak; et say agmantipon ya ibak mangibuyak. 

Luk 11:24 Sano say espiritu'n marumsis makapaway ed too, manakar ed saray pasen ya amaga, a mananap na inawa; et no ag makaromog, ikuan to, Ompawilak ed abung ko a pinawayan ko. 

Luk 11:25 Et sano onsabi, naromog to ya apanisan tan aparakep. 

Luk 11:26 Saman la onla, tan mangala na arum a pitora'n espiritu a lalo nin mauguges nen sikato; et onloob ira tan manayam irad man: et say onor a kipapasen na saman a too magmaliw a lalo'n mauges nen say inmona. 

Luk 11:27 Et agawa, nen sasalitaen to so saraya a bengatla, sakey a bii ed karaklan inkasil to so voces to, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Mapalar so eges ya angawit ed sika, tan saray pagew a sinosoan mo. 

Luk 11:28 Balet sikato inkuan to, Lalo'n mapalar so saray ondengel ed salita na Dios, tan sikato'y onoren da. 

Luk 11:29 Et nen nantitipon so dakel a totoo ed sikato, ingapo to so nankuan, Saya'n kapolian sakey a mauges a kapolian: anapen to so tanda; et angapo so tanda a niiter ed sikato no ag say tanda nen Jonas. 

Luk 11:30 Ta onong a si Jonas nagmaliw a tanda ed saray Ninivitas, ontan met say Anak na too sikato naani ed saya'n kapolian. 

Luk 11:31 Say reyna ed abalaten onalagey naani ed panangokoman a pati saray totoo na saya'n kapolian, et dusaen to ra: ta nanlapu ed saray sam-pot na dalin ya ondengel na kakabatan nen Salomon; et nia, babaleg nen si Salomon so wadia. 

Luk 11:32 Saray totoo ed Ninive onalagey ira ed panangokoman a pati saya'n kapolian, et sikato so dusaen da: tananpataoli ra ed inpanpulong nen Jonas; et nia, sakey a babaleg nen si Jonas so wadia. 

Luk 11:33 Angapo'y too, ya nen anelsel na sakey a silew, sikato'y iyan to ed sanib, ono ed silong na salop, no ag ingen ed panangiturekan, pian saray onloob nanengneng da so silew. 

Luk 11:34 Say silew na laman mo sikato so matam: no say matam naskey, amin a laman mo masnag met; balet no mauges, say laman mo met napno na bilunget. 

Luk 11:35 Nengnengen mo sirin a say silew ya wala ed sika aliwa komon ya ambilunget. 

Luk 11:36 Na sirin say amin a laman mo napno na liwawa, ya angapo so pasen ed sikato ya ambilunget, sikato ya amin masnag, a singa say silew no sinagan to ka ed silew to. 

Luk 11:37 Bang nen mansasalita, sakey a Fariseo kerewen to ed sikato a mikan komon ed sikato: et linmoob, tan dinmongo ed pananganan. 

Luk 11:38 Et sanen say Fariseo nanengneng to, nankelaw lapu'd ag to nanuras ya inmona nen marigan. 

Luk 11:39 Et say Katawan inkuan to ed sikato, Bang sikayo'n Fariseo linisanyo so paway na kopa tan lipong; balet say loob yo napno na panagsamsam tan kaugsan. 

Luk 11:40 Sikayo makulangkulang, say nangawa ed paway ag ta sikato so akangawa met ed loob? 

Luk 11:41 Ingen ipayabol yo so bengabengatla'n wala ed loob; et nia, nalinisan so amin a bengatla ed sikayo. 

Luk 11:42 Balet abagey kayo la a Fariseos! ta manbayar kayo na kakaplo na menta tan ruda tan amin a pising, et paliisan yo so kaalasan tan panangaro na Dios: balet saraya so nepeg yo komon a ginawa, ya ag yo pinaolian a ginawa so arum. 

Luk 11:43 Abagey kayo la a Fariseos! ta labay yo so saray manona a yurongan dia ed saray sinagoga, tan saray panangibano dia ed saray plaza. 

Luk 11:44 Abagey kayo la! ta singa kayo saray lobok ya ag nanengneng, et saray totoo a manakar ed tapew da agda amta. 

Luk 11:45 Et nen inmebat so sakey ed saray makabat ed gangan kuan to ed sikato, Managbangat, dia ed inpansalitam na saya balawen mo karni met. 

Luk 11:46 Et sikato inkuan to, Abagey kayo met makakabat ed gangan! ta pansakbaten yo so totoo ed saray awit ya ambelat ya awiten, et agyo lanlamang diwiten so saray awit na sakey bengat a tamoro yo. 

Luk 11:47 Abagey kayo la! ta ipaalage'yo so saray lobok na saray profetas, et pinatey ira na saray ama yo. 

Luk 11:48 Dia ed ontan sikayo so tastasi et abobonan yo so saray gawa na saray ama yo: ta pinatey dara, tan sikayo ipaalagey yo so saray lobok da. 

Luk 11:49 Kanian say kakabatan na Dios inkuanto met, Ibakik ed sikara so saray profetas tan apostoles; et arum ed sikara pateyen da tan pasegsegangen da; 

Luk 11:50 Pian say dala na saray amin a profeta, a naibung nanlapu'd inkapalsa'y mundo, naanap ed saya a kapulian; 

Luk 11:51 Manlapu'd dala nen Abel anga ed dala nen Zacarias, ya inatey ed nanleetan na altar tan santuario: on, kuan ko ed sikayo, nasingil naani ed saya'n kapulian. 

Luk 11:52 Abagey kayo la makakabat ed gangan! ta inekal yo so tombok na kakabatan: agkayo linmoob lanlamang et sinebelan yo so saray onloob komon. 

Luk 11:53 Et nen pinmaway diman, saray escribas tan Fariseos ginmapo ra'n mangapos na ontan la ed sikato, tan sikato so inayat da a mansalita na dakel a bengabengatla; 

Luk 11:54 Sikato so ingagaem da, pian mangerel ira na antokaman ya manlapu ed sangi to. 



Luk 12:1 Dia ed legan na panaon, sanen nantitipon so libolibo a karaklan ya ontan la a mangagatinan so sakey tan sakey, ingapo to ya ikuan ed saray babangatan to a manonaan nen amin, Manlikas kayo ed levadura na saray Fariseo, a sikato so pakalala. 

Luk 12:2 Ingen angapo so asakbongan, ya ag nipatnag: tan niamot, ya ag nakabatan. 

Luk 12:3 Kanian angan anto a sinalitayo ed ambilunget narengel ed maliwawa; et say sinalita yo ya inyesaes ed saray silir a karaldalman nilapag naani manlapu ed tuktuk na abung. 

Luk 12:4 Et kuan ko ed sikayo, kakaarok, Ag kayo antakot ed saray mamatey na laman, et kayari to angapo la so arum a nayarian da a gawaen. 

Luk 12:5 Ingen ipasakbay ko ed sikayo no siopa so tako tan yo: takotan yo man, so kayari pamatey to wala so pakayari to a mangipelag ed infierno; on kuan ko ed sikayo, Sikato so takotan yo. 

Luk 12:6 Agta nalako so limara'n anuyaw ed duara a kuarta? et angan sakey ed sikara ag nalingoanan dia ed arap na Dios. 

Luk 12:7 Angan saray buek na oloyo abilang ira'n amin. Agkayo antakot; mamabli kayo nen saray dakel ya anuyaw. 

Luk 12:8 Et kuan ko ed sikayo, Amin a mangipatua ed siak ed arap na saray totoo, sikato so ipatua met na Anak na too ed arap na saray angeles na Dios: 

Luk 12:9 Balet say mangiburi ed siak ed arap na saray totoo niburi naani ed arap na saray angeles na Dios. 

Luk 12:10 Et amin a mansalita na sumpa ed Anak na too, sikato'y naperdona: ingen say manayew sumpa ed Espiritu Santo ag naani naperdona. 

Luk 12:11 Et sano idongora kayo ed saray sinagoga, tan ed saray pangolo, tan ed saray makaoley, agyo kapagaan no panon ono anto so yebat yo, ono anto so kuanen yo: 

Luk 12:12 Ta say Espiritu Santo ibangatto kayo naani ed satan met lanlamang ya horas no anto so nepegyo'n salitaen. 

Luk 12:13 Et inkuan ed sikato na sakey ed karaklan, Managbangat, ibagam ed agik ya yapagantoak na tawir. 

Luk 12:14 Balet inkuan to ed sikato, Too, siopa so nangawa ed siak a mangokom ono mangapag ed sikayo? 

Luk 12:15 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Nengnengen yo, et manlikas kayo ed amin a kaagapan: ta say bilay na too andi ed karakel na saray bengatla a bebenbenan to. 

Luk 12:16 Et sinalita to ed sikara so sakey ya alimbawa, a kuan to, Say dalin na sakey a too'n mayaman binmunga na dakel:

Luk 12:17 Et minolimoli to ed loob ton dili, a kuan to, Anto so gawaen ko naani, ta angapo so pangyatolan ko ed saray bungak? 

Luk 12:18 Et inkuan to, Say a so gawaen ko: igebak so saray kamalir ko, et ipaalagey ko so babaleg; et yatolko ya amin diman so trigok tan saray kayamanan ko. 

Luk 12:19 Et kuan ko naani ed kamarerwak, Kamarerwa, dakel so saray kayamanan mo ya inyatol nipaakar ed dakel a taon; manpainawaka, manganka, uninumka, manliket ka. 

Luk 12:20 Ingen inkuan ed sikato na Dios, Sika makulangkulang, natan a labi nakerew ed sika so kamarerwam; et saray bengatla ya intadiam, siopa naani mankayarian ed sikara? 

Luk 12:21 Ontan so mantipon na kayamanan nipaakar ed sikato, et aliwa a mayaman dia ed Dios. 

Luk 12:22 Et inkuan to ed saray babangatan to, Kanian kuan ko ed sikayo, Ag kayo mapaga ed bilay yo, no anto'y kanen yo; tan angan nipaakar ed laman yo, no anto so kawesen yo. 

Luk 12:23 Ta say bilay nagkalalo nen say kanen, tan say laman nen say kawes. 

Luk 12:24 Morekdek yo 'ray wawak, ya ag ira mantanem, tan ag ira manani; ya andian ira na pantiponan ono kamalir; et tataganoen ira na Dios: Ag kayo kasi mamabli nen saray manok! 

Luk 12:25 Et siopa ed sikayo so lapu'd kapagaan nayarian to'n yarum so sankasiko ed kaatagey to? 

Luk 12:26 No ag yo nayarian sirin a ga waen so angan dagdaiset, akin et mapagakayo nipaakar ed arum? 

Luk 12:27 Nonoten yo so saray lirio, no panon so katotobo ra: ag ira mansagpot, tan ag ira maninaramey; angan ontan kuan ko ed sikayo, Angan si Salomon dia ed amin a gloria to ag akawesan a singa sakey ed saraya. 

Luk 12:28 Balet no ontan so pangawes na Dios ed dika dia ed dalin, natan wala, et nibantak nabuas ed dalikan; panon ya ag nagkalalo so pangawes to ed sikayo, O sikayo melag a pananisia? 

Luk 12:29 Agyo sirin kapagaan so kanenyo, ono say inumenyo, tan agyo met panduaruaen so linawa yo. 

Luk 12:30 Ta amin so saraya a bengatla anapen na saray naciones ed mundo: balet say Ama yo amta to a kaokolan yo so saraya'n bengatla. 

Luk 12:31 Bangbalet anapen yo so panarian, to et saraya a bengatla niarum ira ed sikayo. 

Luk 12:32 Agkayo antakot, daiset a papastolan; ta kaliktan na Ama yo ya iter ed sikayo so panarian. 

Luk 12:33 Ilakoyo so wala ed sikayo, et mamayabol kayo; mangawa kayo nipaakar ed sikayo na supot ya ag ondaan, sakey a kayamanan ya ag onkulang ed saray tawen, a sikato'y ag narandan na matakew, tan ag naderal na taboney. 

Luk 12:34 Ta no iner so kawalaan na kayamanan yo, diman met so kawalaan na puso yo. 

Luk 12:35 Balkesan yo so saray awak yo, tan akaselsel so saray silew yo; 

Luk 12:36 Et sikayo komon so singa saray totoo a manaalagar ed katawan da, no kapigan so ipawil ton manlapu ed bansal; pian, sano ompawil et ontoktok, tampol a sikato so lukasan da. 

Luk 12:37 Mapalar so saray ariripen, a sano onsabi katawan da naromog tora a manpupuyat: tua kuan ko ed sikayo, a sikato lanlamang manbalkes, tan payorongen tora ed pananganan, et onla tan manlinkor ed sikara. 

Luk 12:38 Et sano onsabi ed comadua'n panagbantay, tan no dia ed komatlo, et naromog tora ya ontan, mapalar so saratan ya ariripen. 

Luk 12:39 Say a balet so amtaen yo, ya no amta na makan abung so horas ya isabi matakew, nanbantay komon, tan ag to pinaolian so abung to a nakotkot. 

Luk 12:40 Maparaan kayo met: to dia ed horas ya ag yo isisipen onsabi so Anak na too. 

Luk 12:41 Et si Pedro inkuan to, Katawan, Salitaen mo ed sikami so sa-ya'n alimbawa, ono ed amin met? 

Luk 12:42 Et inkuan na Katawan, Siopa sirin so managpaga a napanmatalkan tan makalal, ya iyan na Katawan to a manbatay ed sankaabungan to, pian sano kanepeganto iter to ed sikara so nabebetangan dan tagano? 

Luk 12:43 Mapalar so satan ya aripen, a sano onsabi so katawan to naromog to a mangagawa na ontan. 

Luk 12:44 Dia ed tua ikuan ko ed sikayo, a sikato so igaton to'n manbantay ed amin a kayarian to. 

Luk 12:45 Balet no satan ya aripen ikuan to ed puso to, Say katawan ko matantan ya onsabi; et gapoan ton kabilen so saray ariripen a lalaki tan bibii, et mangan tan oninum, tan manbuanges; 

Luk 12:46 Onsabi katawan na satan ya aripen dia ed agew ya agto ilaloan, tan dia ed horas ya ag to amta, et sikato so leweten to na masakit tan toroen to so nabebetangan to ed saray ag napanmatalkan. 

Luk 12:47 Et satan ya aripen, ya akapikabat na linawa na katawan to, et ag nanparaan, tan agto met ginawa so onong ed linawa to, nabakbak na dakel a bakbak, 

Luk 12:48 Balet say ag akapikabat, tan nangawa na saray manepeg ed bakbak, nabakbak na daiset a bakbak. Et angan siopa a naitdan na dakel, dakel met so nasingil ed sikato: et say angimatalkan da na dakel, kerewen da ed sikato so da dakel. 

Luk 12:49 Linmaak dia a mangyan na apuy ed dalin; et anto ni so pirawat ko, no aselselan la? 

Luk 12:50 Balet wala so binyag a pakabinyagan ko; et agay la'y irap ko anga ed ag nasumpal. 

Luk 12:51 Isipen yo ta a linmaakdia ed dalin a mangiter na kareenan? Andi, kuan ko ed sikayo; no ag say subakil ingen: 

Luk 12:52 Ta manlapu ed natan naapagapag so limara ed sakey ya abung; talora sumpa ed duara, tan duara sumpa ed talora.

Luk 12:53 Naapagapag ira naani, say amasumpa ed anak a laki, et say anak a laki sumpa ed ama; say ina sumpa ed anak a bii, tan say anak a bii sumpa ed ina to; say katulangan a bii sumpa ed manugang to a bii, et say manugang a bii sumpa ed katulangan to a bii. 

Luk 12:54 Et inkuan to met ed karaklan, Sano nanengneng yo so lurem ya onalagey ed sagur, kuan yo a tampol, Mayamaya so onsabi; et ontan so nagawa. 

Luk 12:55 Et no sakey a dagem ya abagat so onsibok, kuan yo Makaatong a petang so wala naani; et sikato so nagawa. 

Luk 12:56 Sikayo'n pakalala, amta yo ya ipatalos so nengneng na dalin tan tawen; balet panon ya agyo amta ya ipatalos so saya'n panaon? 

Luk 12:57 Et akin angan sikayo lanlamang agyo okomen no anto so matunong? 

Luk 12:58 Ta sano onla ka ed arap na ekom pati kakolkol mo, dia ed dalan panpelengan mo so kilaban mo ed sikato: ompan igayogoy to ka ed okom, et say okom yawat to ka ed alguacil, et say alguacil iloob toka ed panangipangawan. 

Luk 12:59 Kuan ko ed sika, Sika ag ka makapaway diman, anga ed ag mo nabayaran so kaonoran a maravilis. 



Luk 13:1 Dia'd saya lanlamang a panaon wala ray arum ya akaarap ya angibaga ed sikato na nipaakad ed saray Galileos, ya inlaok nen Pilato so dalara ed saray bagat da. 

Luk 13:2 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara, Isipen yo a saraya Galileos sikara so managkasalanan a labas nen saray amin a Galileos, ta intepelda so saraya'n bengatla? 

Luk 13:3 Andi, kuanko ed sikayo: ingen, no ag kayo manpataoli, natawtaw kayo met ya amin ed ontan. 

Luk 13:4 Ono saraman so labinwalo, a sikara'y atapilan na ilang ed Siloe. et pinatey to ra, isipen yo a sikara so akautang a labas nen saray amin a too a manaayam ed Jerusalem? 

Luk 13:5 Andi, kuan ko ed sikayo: ingen, no ag kayo manpataoli, natawtaw kayo met ya amin ed ontan. 

Luk 13:6 Et sinalita to so saya'n alimbawa; Sakey a too walaan na sakey a kiew ya higos ya intanem to ed cauvasan to; et linma a nananap na bunga to, et ag akaromog. 

Luk 13:7 Et inkuan to ed manbabantay na kauvasan, Nia, saraya a talo'y taon linlinmaak dia a mananap na bunga ed saya a kiew ya higos, et agak makaromog: popoen mo; akin et makaskasbel ed dalin? 

Luk 13:8 Et nen inmebat kuan to ed sikato. Katawan, paolian mo ni ed saya a taon met, anga ed nabayoboan ko, tan nainan ko na pamabona: 

Luk 13:9 Et no manbunga ed saman la, maong; et no andi, popoen mo. 

Luk 13:10 Et nanbabangat ed sakey ed saray sinagoga ed agew na sabaton. 

Luk 13:11 Et nia, sakey a bii ya walaan na espiritu na beblay a labinwalo a taon la: et wala ya abokot, ya angan panon ag to nayarian so manpetek. 

Luk 13:12 Et sanen sikato'y anengneng nen Jesus, tinawag to, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Bii, nabolos ka ed sakit mo. 

Luk 13:13 Et ingaton to so saray limato ed sikato: et tampol a nanpetek, et ingalgalang to so Dios. 

Luk 13:14 Et say pangolo ed sinagoga, ya atenyeg na pasnok lapu ed anambal si Jesus ed agew a sabaton, inmebat tan inkuan to ed karaklan, Wala so anem agew a makana'n pankimeyan na to too; dia ed saraya sirin so idago yo tan natambal kayo, et aliwa'n dia ed agew na sabaton. 

Luk 13:15 Balet say Katawan inmebat ed sikato tan inkuan to, Sikayo pakalala, sakey tan sakey ed sikayo, agto kasi okbaran ed agew na sabaton so vaka to ono asno to ed atotong, tan vakar to'n painumen? 

Luk 13:16 Et saya a bii, bangta anak nen Abraham, sikato a binalor nen Satanas, nia, sarayan labinwalo a taon, ag kasi manepeg ya okbaran ed saya a balod, ed agew na sabaton? 

Luk 13:17 Et nen nikuan to so saraya'n bengatla, abaingan so amin a kakabosol to: et amin a karaklan nanliket ed saray amin a magloria a bengatla a ginawa to. 

Luk 13:18 Kanian inkuan to Anto so kaolibay na panarian na Dios? tan anto kasi pangyalilingan ko? 

Luk 13:19 Aliling to so bukel na mostaza ya inala ya sakey a too, et insibuagto ed panagtanamanan to a dili; et tinmobo, tan nagmaliw a kiew; et saray manok ed tawen nanobong ira ed kasangaan to. 

Luk 13:20 Et inkuan to lamet, Anto so pangyalilingan ko ed panarian na Dios? 

Luk 13:21 Aliling to so levadura, ya inala na sakey a bii tan inyamo'to ed taloran kasukat ya harina, anga ed linmebag ya amin. 

Luk 13:22 Et linmabas ed amin a ciudad tan binaleybaley, a nanbangat, et nanakar anga ed Jerusalem. 

Luk 13:23 Et inkuan ed sikato na sakey, Katawan, daise' ta so saray nilaban? Et inkuan to ed sikara, 

Luk 13:24 Panpilitan yo so onloob ed pinto a mainget: ta kuan ko ed sikayo, dakel so saray manseet ya onloob, et ag da nayarian. 

Luk 13:25 Sano say ama na sangkaabungan inmalagey la, tan inkapo'to so pinto, et ongapo kayo'n manalagey ed paway, tan ontoktok ed pinto, a kuan yo, Katawan, lukasan mo kami; et sikato onebat tan kuan to ed sikayo, ag ta kayo kabot no taga iner kayo; 

Luk 13:26 Saman la igapo yo ya ikuan, angan tan inminum kami ed arap mo, tan dia ed saray pulong mi nanbangat ka; 

Luk 13:27 Et inkuan to, Kuan ko ed sikayo, Agko kabat no taga iner kayo: onarawi kayo ed siak, sikayo ya amin a managawa'y mauges. 

Luk 13:28 Diman naani pannangis tan panngayet na ngipen, sano nanengneng yo di Abraham, tan Isaac, tan Jacob, tan saray amin a profetas, dia ed panaria'y Dios, et nibantak kayo lanlamang ed paway. 

Luk 13:29 Et ondago ra naani a manlapu ed bukig tan sagur, tan manlapu ed amianen tan abalaten, tan onyorong ira ed panarian na Dios. 

Luk 13:30 Et nia, walara so on or a sikara so onona, et walara so onaan a naonor ira. 

Luk 13:31 Diad saman lanlamang ya horas sinmabi so saray arum a Fariseos, a kuan da, ed sikato. Ompaway ka, et ontainan ka dia; ta si Herodes labay to ka a pateyen. 

Luk 13:32 Et inkuan tod sikara, Lakayo et kuan yo ed saman a zorra, Nia, papawayen ko so saray demonio tan manambalak natan tan nabuas, et dia ed komatlo'n agew nayadyari ak. 

Luk 13:33 Angaman ontan nakaokolan ko so manakar natan tan nabuas tan ed agew ya ontombok; ta ag nayari a say sakey a profeta ompatey ed paway na Jerusalem. 

Luk 13:34 O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, a pateyen to so saray profeta, tan topaken to so saray nibaki ed sikato! aminpiga a kinaliktan ko a tiponen komon so saray anak mo, onong na nganak a tiponen to so saray siwsiwto ed silong na payak to, et agmo nilabay! 

Luk 13:35 Nia, say abung yo natainan ed kaingewan: et kuan ko ed sikayo Ag yo ak nanengneng naani, anga ed pangikuan yo, Mapalar.so onsabi ed ngaran na Katawan. 



Luk 14:1 Tan agawa, nen linmoob ed abung na sakey a pangolo na saray Fariseo ed agew a sabaton a mangan na tinapay, a sikato so sinisiim da. 

Luk 14:2 Et nia, sakey a too a linmarag wala nen saman ed arap to. 

Luk 14:3 Et nen inmebat si Jesus akisali-taan to so saray mangakabat ed gangan tan saray Fariseos, a inkuan to, Matunong kasi manambal ed agew na sabaton, ono andi? 

Luk 14:4 Balet ag ira inmesel. Et sikato so inala to, tan sikato so tinambal to, tan inbaki to. 

Luk 14:5 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Siopa ed sikayo so walaan na asno ono vaca a naplag ed bobon, et ag to agwaten a tampol ed agew a sabaton? 

Luk 14:6 Et agda ayarian lamet so inmebat ed saraya'n bengatla. 

Luk 14:7 Et nansalita na sakey ya alimbawa ed saray binagaan, sanen alikas to no panpn a pilien da so saray manonaan a yorongan; a kuanto ed sikara. 

Luk 14:8 No sika so bagaan na siopaman ed sakey a bansal, ag ka onyorong ed manonaan a yorongan; ompan wala'y sakey a too a mapagalang nen sika a binagaan to, 

Luk 14:9 Et say nanbaga et sika tan ed sikato ondago ra ed sika tan kuan to ed sika. Itdan mo so saya a too na pasen; et saman la ongapo ka a sibabaing a mangala na kaonoran a yorongan. 

Luk 14:10 Balet sano nabagaan ka, onla ka tan onyorong ka ed kaonoran a pasen; ta no onsabi nanbaga ed sika, kuan to ed sika, Kaaro, ompasen ka ed atagtagey: saman la nawalaan ka na galang ed arap na saray amin ya akirongo ed sika ed pananganan. 

Luk 14:11 Ta amin a mamaatagey ed sikato a dili napaabeba naani; et say manpaabeba ed sikaton dili napaatagey naani. 

Luk 14:12 Et inkuan to met ed nanbaga ed sikato, No mangawa ka na kanen ono pangdeman, agmo tawagen so saray kakaarom, angan saray agagim angan saray kakanayon mo, angan saray kaababay mo a mayaman; ompan lamang no bagaanda ka met, et sakey a gunguna so nagawa ed sika. 

Luk 14:13 Balet no mangawa ka na doypoan, bagaan mo so saray duruka, saray pokol, saray piley, saray bulag: 

Luk 14:14 Et mapalar ka naani; ta angapoy nitomang da ed sika: et natomangan ka ed kioli ed bilay na saray matunong. 

Luk 14:15 Et nen say sakey ya akirongo ed sikato ed pananganan nadngel to so saraya'n bengatla, inkuan to ed sikato, Mapalar naani mangan na tinapay dia ed panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 14:16 Balet inkuan to ed sikato, Sakey a too nangawa na baleg a pangdeman; et nanbaga ed saray dakel: 

Luk 14:17 Et dia ed horas na panamangdem inbaki to so aripen to a mankuan ed saray binagaan, Dago kayo; ta am bengabengatla nitadia la natan. 

Luk 14:18 Et sikara ya amin ginmapora a nangawa na baraan a nanbabansag, Say inmuna inkuan to ed sikato, Analiwa ak na sakey ya uma, et kaokolan ko so ompaway tan sikato so nengnengen ko: Pikasik ed sika ya itepelmoak. 

Luk 14:19 Et say sakey inkuan to. Analiwak na limara'n katupag a vaca, et onla ak a salien ko ra: Pikasik ed sika ya itepelmo ak. 

Luk 14:20 Et say sakey inkuanto, Kapangkasal to, et kanian ag ko nayarian so ondago. 

Luk 14:21 Et say aripen pinmawil, tan inbaga to ed katawan to so saraya'n bengatla, Saman la say katawan na sankaabungan a sipapasnok inkuan to ed aripen to, Ompaway ka a manganganat ed saray polong tan ed saray leet na ciudad, et yakar mo dia so saray duruka tan pokol tan bulag tan piley. 

Luk 14:22 Et say aripen inkuan to, Katawan, say ingangan mo agawa, et wala ni pasen. 

Luk 14:23 Et inkuan na katawan ed aripen, Ompaway ka ed saray dalan tan ed saray alar, et sikara so pasooten mo ya onloob, pian napano so abung ko. 

Luk 14:24 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo ya angapo ed saray totoo ya binagaan so makataway na pandeman ko. 

Luk 14:25 Et dakel so totoo ya ontotombok ed sikato: et inmarap, tan inkuan to ed sikara, 

Luk 14:26 No siopaman a too ondago ed siak, et agto gulaen so ama to lanlamang, tan ina, tan asawa, tan saray anak, tan agagi a lalaki, tan bibii, on, tan say bilay to met lanlamang, ag nayari a sikato so babangatan ko. 

Luk 14:27 Angan siopa ya ag to awiten so cruz to, tan ontombok ed siak, ag nayari a sikato so babangatan ko. 

Luk 14:28 Ta siopa ed sikayo so, anta labay to so mamaalagey na sakey ya ilang, ag onyorong ya onona tan bilangen to so bili, no walaan kasi panumpal to ed sikato? 

Luk 14:29 Ompan lamang, no ingaton to la so pangipaletnegan, et ag to nayari'n sumpalen, amin a makanengneng gapoan da a balawen, 

Luk 14:30 A kuan da, Saya'n too angigapo a mamaalagey, et ag to ayarian a sinumpal. 

Luk 14:31 Ono siopa ya ari, leleg ya onla a mamakal ed sananey ya ari, ag onyorong ya onona tan ompanon no nayarian to ed sansamplo'n libo so onabet ed onsabi a mamakal et sikato pati duamplo'n libo? 

Luk 14:32 Ono andi, leleg a say sananey wala ni ed arawi, mangigangan na igagangan, tan onkerew na kipapasen na kareenan. 

Luk 14:33 No ontan sirin, angan siopa ed sikayo ya agto benegan so amin a kayarian to, ag nayari a sikato so babangatan ko. 

Luk 14:34 Maong a kagot so asin: ingen no angan say asin naandi taway to, anto ni napangasin? 

Luk 14:35 Ag onnepeg ed dalin tan ed sebekan: sikato so ibantak ed paway. Say wala an na layag a pandengal, ondengel komon. 



Luk 15:1 Bang saray amin a publicanos tan managkasalanan inmasinger ira ed sikato ya ondengel ed silato. 

Luk 15:2 Et nanparpara a manngengem so saray Fariseo tan saray escribas, a kuan da, Saya'n too awaten to so saray managkasalanan, tan mikan ed sikara. 

Luk 15:3 Et sinalita to ed sikara so saya ra alimbawa, a kuan to, 

Luk 15:4 Siopa a too ed sikayo, ya walaan na sanlasus a carnero, et no nabalang so sakey ed sikara, agto tainan ed lawak so siam a plo tan siam, tan laen ton anapen so abalang, anga ed pakaromog to? 

Luk 15:5 Et sano aromog to la, sikato'y yan to ed abala to, a sililiket. 

Luk 15:6 Et sano onsabi ed abung, tiponen to so kakaaro to tan kaababay to, a kuan to ed sikara, Miliket kayo ed siak, ta aromog ko, so carnerok ya abalang. 

Luk 15:7 Kuan ko ed sikayo, ya ontan met wala naani liket ed tawen nisengeg ed sakey a managkasalanan a magbabawi, nagkalalo nen dia ed saray siam a plo tan siam a matunong a totoo, ya agda kaokolan so pagbabawi. 

Luk 15:8 Ono siopa so bii ya walaan na samplo ra a drakma, no nabalang to so sakey, ag manelsel na silew et panisan to so abung, tan anapen to a seetan anga ed naromog to? 

Luk 15:9 Et sano naromog to, tiponen to ray kakaaro to t?.n kaababay to, a kuan to, Miliket kayo ed siak, ta aromog ko so dracma ya abalang ko. 

Luk 15:10 Ontan met, kuan ko ed sikayo, wala so liket ed arap na saray angeles na Dios nisengeg ed sakey a managkasalanan a magbabawi. 

Luk 15:11 Et inkuan to, Sakey a too walaan na duara ya anak a lalaki: 

Luk 15:12 Et say yugtan ed sikara inkuan to ed ama to, Ama, iter mo ed siak so kaaruman na kayarian mo a nabebetangan ko. Et inapag to ed sikara so kayarian to. 

Luk 15:13 Et kayari aliwa'n dakel ya agew, say yugtan ya anak tinipon to ya amin, et linma ed kurang ed sakey a dalin ya arawi; et diman to dinarak so kayarian to ed panagbilay a marutak. 

Luk 15:14 Et nen agastos to la ya amin, sinmabi ed saman a dalin so baleg ya eras: et sikato ginmapo ya wala ed pankaokolan. 

Luk 15:15 Et linma tan inmasinger ed sakey ed saray ombaley ed saman a dalin: et sikato so inbaki to ed saray uma to pian manpakan na babuy. 

Luk 15:16 Et kinaliktanto a panoen so eges to ed saray algarrobas a kanen na saray babuy: et angapo so too ya angiter ed sikato. 

Luk 15:17 Balet nen nannunot ed inkasikato inkuan to, Pigapigara so mioupa ed abung nen amak ya walaan na daakan a tinapay tan makapangikera ra, et siak ompatey ak dia ed eras! 

Luk 15:18 Onalagey ak tan onlaak ed amak, et ikuan ko ed sikato, Ama, nankasalanan ak sumpa ed tawen, tan dia ed arap mo: 

Luk 15:19 Agak la onnepeg ya ingaran na anak mo: gawa moak a singa sakey ed saray miopupa ed sika. 

Luk 15:20 Et inmalagey, tan linma ed ama to. Balet nen arawi ni, sikato so anengneng nen ama to, et atenyeg so panangabagey to, et binmatik, tan nilakap to ed beklew to, et sikato'y inangoban to. 

Luk 15:21 Et inkuan na anak ed sikato, Ama, nankasalanan ak sumpa ed tawen, tan dia ed arap mo: agak la manepeg a tawagen na anak mo. 

Luk 15:22 Ingen say ama inkuan to ed saray ariripen to, Ipawa'yo a maganganat so sankaabigan a kawes, et sikato so isolong yo ed sikato; et yanyo so sakey a singsing ed lima to, tan sapin ed saray sali to: 

Luk 15:23 Et awit yo so pinataba a vaca, tan sikato so pateyen yo, et mangan itayo, tan manliket itayo: 

Luk 15:24 Ta saya so ana' ko inatey, et mabilay lamet; abalang, et aromog. Et ginmapo ra a nanliket. 

Luk 15:25 Bang say anak to a pangoloan wala nen saman ed uma: et nen sinmabi tan inmasinger ed abung, nadngel to so togtog tan sayaw. 

Luk 15:26 Et tinawag to so sakey ed saray ariripen, tan tinepe' to ed sikato no anto kasi so saraya a bengatla. 

Luk 15:27 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Si agim sinmabi; et si amam pinatey to so pinataba a vaca, lapu'd sikato so inawa'to a nilaban tan maksil. 

Luk 15:28 Ingen nanpasnok, et agto linmoob: et pinmaway so ama to, tan sikato so akikasian to. 

Luk 15:29 Balet inmebat tan inkuan to ed ama to, Nia, dia ed saraya a dakel a taon nanlingkor ak ed sika, tan angan kapigan agko sinumpa so gangan mo: et angan kapigan ag moak inikdan na sakey a melag a kanding, pian makapiliket ak ed saray kakaaarok: 

Luk 15:30 Ingen nen sinmabi saya'n anak mo, a inopo'to ray kayarian mo ed saray mauges a bibii, pinatey mo nipaakar ed sikato so vaca a pinataba. 

Luk 15:31 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Ana'ko, sika naynay ka ed siak, et amin a kien ko, kien mo. 

Luk 15:32 Balet akaokolan so panliket tan panambeg ya: ta saya so agim a inatey, mabilay lamet; tan abalang, et aromog. 



Luk 16:1 Tan inkuan to met ed saray babangatan, Wala nen samen so sakey a too'n mayaman, ya walaan na dispen; et saya indalem da ed sikato a mandederal na kayamanan to. 

Luk 16:2 Et sikato so tinawag to, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Anto'ya a narengelan ko nipaakar ed sika? Ipatnagmo so bilang na inpanpagam; ta ag mo la nayari mandispen. 

Luk 16:3 Et say dispen inkuan to ed linawa to, Anto'y gawaen ko, ta say katawan ko ekalen to ed siak so inkadispen ko? Angapo so biskeg ko a mankotkot; mipayabol ambaing ko. 

Luk 16:4 Amtak so gawaen ko naani, pian, sano naekalak ed inkadispen, akoenda ak naani ed kaabungan da. 

Luk 16:5 Et nen tinawag to a sinansakey so saray akautang ed katawan to, inkuan to ed inmuna, Piga so utang mo ed katawan ko? 

Luk 16:6 Et inkuan to, Sanlasus kasukat a larak. Et inkuan to ed sikato, Alaen mo so amayesan mo, et yorong ka a maganga no tan isulat mo so limamplo. 

Luk 16:7 Saman la inkuan to ed sananey Et pigara so utang mo? Et inkuan to, Sanlasus kasukat a trigo. Et kuan to ed sikato, Alaen mo so amayesan mo, et isulat mo so walomplo. 

Luk 16:8 Et indayew na katawan to so ag napanmatalkan a dispen lapu ed nangawa a makalkalakal; ta saray anak na saya a mundo makabat ira ed kapolian da lanlamang nen saray anak na silew. 

Luk 16:9 Et kuan ko ed sikayo. Mikaaro kayo ed panamegley na saray kayamanan na ag inka tunong; pian, sano onkulang, awaten da kayo ed saray ayaman ya andi angaan. 

Luk 16:10 Say matoor ed dagdaiset, matoor met ed dakel: et say agmatunong ed dagdaiset, aliwa met a matunong ed dakel. 

Luk 16:11 No bangta ed saray kayamanan na ag inkatunong agkayo apanmatalkan, siopa naani mangimatalek ed sikayo ed saray tua a kayamanan? 

Luk 16:12 Et no ag kayo apanmatalkan ed kayarian na sananey, siopa naani mangiter ed sikayo na dili a kayarian yo? 

Luk 16:13 Angapo so aripen a makapan lingkor ed duara a katawan: ta balang la a gulaen to naani sakey, et aroen to so sananey; ono minonong ed sakey, et modmoraen to so sananey. Agyo nayarian so manling-kor ed Dios tan saray kayamanan. 

Luk 16:14 Et saray Fariseo, a maaro ra ed cuarta, nadngelda so saraya ya amin a bengatla; et sikato so niludlurey da. 

Luk 16:15 Et inkuan to ed sikara. Sikayo so saray mamatunong na inkasikayo lanlamang ed arap na saray totoo; ingen say Dios amta to so kapusoan yo: ta say atagey ed saray totoo sikato so sakey a kadimla ed arap na Dios. 

Luk 16:16 Say gangan tan saray profetas anga ra ed Juan: nanlapu ed saman a panaon, say evangelio na panarian na Dios nipulong, et balang too onloob a mapilpilit ed sikato. 

Luk 16:17 Ingen maininomay a nabalang so tawen tan dalin nen say napelag so sakey a ngiwit na gangan. 

Luk 16:18 Balang sakey a mangisian na asawa to a bii, et mangasawa na sananey, mankasalanan ed pikalugoran; et say mangasawa ed insian na asawan laki mankasalanan ed pikalugoran. 

Luk 16:19 Wala nen saman so sakey a too a mayaman, et nankakawes na purpura tan lienzo a mayumis, ya inagewagew a nanliliket na balbaleg; 

Luk 16:20 Et sakey a mipapayabol a manngaran na Lazaro wala nen saman a sinmaral ed pinto to, a napno na sugasugat, 

Luk 16:21 Et kinaliktan to so napesel ed saray mekmek a napelag ed pananganan na mayaman a too; ontan la, ya angan saray aso dinmago ra a nandildil ed saray suga'to. 

Luk 16:22 Et agawa, ya say mipapayabol inatey, et inyakar na saray angeles ed akoalan nen Abraham: et inatey met so mayaman, et nikotkot. 

Luk 16:23 Et dia ed Hades intangay to so saray mata, to nen nanairapan, et nanengneng to si Abraham ed arawi, tan si Lazaro ed akoalan to. 

Luk 16:24 Et inmakis tan inkuan to, Ama Abraham, kasian moak, et igangan mo si Lazaro, pian ibasa to komon so ngoro na tamoro to ed danum, tan pabtelan to so dilak; ta wala ak ed irap na saya a dalang. 

Luk 16:25 Balet inkuan nen Abraham, Ana'ko, nonoten mo ya inawat mo so saray maong a bengatla ed agew ya inpanbilay mo, et si Lazaro ontan met inawa'to so mauges a bengabengatla: ingen dia natan sikato so naligliwa, et sika wala ka ed kairapan. 

Luk 16:26 Et nilikod ni ed saya ya amin, wala so niiyan a sakey a baleg a kaaralman ed leet mi tan sikayo, pian saray maliket ya ombaliksat komon ed sikayo manlapu dia agda nayarian tan pian angapo so makabalikat a manlapud tan a onla ed sikami. 

Luk 16:27 Et inkuan to, Kerewen ko sirin ed sika, ama, ya igangan mo komon ed abung nen amak; 

Luk 16:28 Ta wala so limara'n agagik; pian paletan to ed sikara, ompan lamang met no onlara dia ed saya a pasen na irap. 

Luk 16:29 Ingen si Abraham kuan to, Wala ed sikara si Moises tan saray profetas; denglenda ra komon. 

Luk 16:30 Et inkuan to, Andi, ama Abraham: balet no onla ed sikara komon so sakey a manlapu ed saray inatey, magbabawi ra. 

Luk 16:31 Et inkuan to ed sikato, No ag da denglen si Moises tan saray profeta, ag ira met manisia, no sakey onoli ed bilay a manlapu ed saray inatey. 



Luk 17:1 Et inkuan to ed saray babangatan to, Ag nayari ya ag onsabi so saray sengeg na kagapolan; ingen abagey la, so sata'y panlapuan da! 

Luk 17:2 Magmaong komon ed sikato no nisinger ed beklew to so sakey a bato na gilingan, et nibantak ed dayat, nen say gawaen to a nigapol so sakey ed saraya ya ankekelag ya ugugaw. 

Luk 17:3 Nengnengen yo so inka sikayo lanlamang: no mankasalanan so agim, sikato'y banoen mo; et no magbabawi, sikato'y palabasen mo. 

Luk 17:4 Et no mamimpito ed inagewagew a mankasalanan sumpa ed sika, et mamimpito ya ompawil ed sika, a kuan to, Magbabawi ak: sikato so palabasen mo. 

Luk 17:5 Et inkuan na sanay apostoles ed Katawan, Aroman mo so pananisia mi. 

Luk 17:6 Et say Katawan inkuan to, No wala so pananisia yo a singa bukel na mostaza, ikuan yo ed saya a sikomoro, Nabagot ka, et nitanem ka ed dayat; et sikato onoren to kayo. 

Luk 17:7 Balet siopa so wala ed sikayo, ya walaan na aripen a manbabaka ono manpapastol na carnero, a ikuan to ed sikato, sano ompawil manlapu ed uma, Dago ka a tampol tan dongo ka ed pananganan; 

Luk 17:8 Et ag to ikuan ya onona ed sikato, Mantadia ka na pangdeman ko, tan apiger mo so kawes mo, et manlingkor ka ed siak, anga ed kayarik a mangan tan oninum; et insan mangan ka tan oninum ka? 

Luk 17:9 Misalamat kasi ed aripen lapu ed ginawa to so nanganganan? 

Luk 17:10 Ontan kayo met, sano agawa yo so amin a nigangan ed sikayo, kuan yo, Ariripen kami, ya andi kakanaan; ginawa mi so nepegmi a gawaen. 

Luk 17:11 Et agawa, a sanen walara ed dalan a mamaarap ed Jerusalem, a linmabas ed pegley na Samaria tan Galilea. 

Luk 17:12 Et nen linmoob ed sakey a baley, inmabet ed sikato so samploran lalakin akating a tinmonda ra ed arawi: 

Luk 17:13 Et intagey da so voces da, a kuan da, Jesus, Managbangat, kasianmo ka mi. 

Luk 17:14 Et nen anengneng to ra, inkuan to ed sikara, Onla kayo tan ompatnag kayo ed saray sacerdotes. Et agawa nen manaakar ira ya onla, alinisan ira. 

Luk 17:15 Et sakey ed sikara, nen anengneng to a sikato so atambal, pinmawil, ya ingalgalang to so Dios ed baleg a voces; 

Luk 17:16 Et indakmomo to so lupa to ed saray sali to, ya akisalsalamat ed sikato: et sikato so taga Samaria. 

Luk 17:17 Et si Jesus nen inmebat inkuan to, Aliwa ta'n samplora so alinisan? balet iner sirin so kawalaan day siam-ira? 

Luk 17:18 Angapo so aromog a pinmawil ya akisalamat ed Dios, nilikod so saya'n sangkaili? 

Luk 17:19 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Onalagey ka, tan naka la: say pananisiam pinaksil to ka. 

Luk 17:20 Et nen tinepetan na saray Fariseos, no kapigan so isabi panarian na Dios, inebatan to'ra et inkuan to, Say panarian na Dios ag onsabi ya wala so tanda'n pakanengnengan: 

Luk 17:21 Agda met nikuan, Ni, wadia! ono, Ni, Niman la! tan nia, say panarian na Dios wala ed dalem yo. 

Luk 17:22 Et inkuan to ed saray babangatan, Onsabi so saray agew, sano kaliktan yo a nengnengen so sakey ed saray agew na Anak na too, et sikato so ag yo nanengneng. 

Luk 17:23 Et ikuan da ed sikayo, Ni, niman la! Ni, nia la! ag ka yo oonla, tan agyo'ra tomboken; 

Luk 17:24 Ta singa say kirmat, a no onkirmat manlapu ed sakey a pasen ed lepsag na tawen onliwawa anga ed sananey a pasen ed lepsag na tawen; ontan naani Anak na too sano agew to. 

Luk 17:25 Ingen kaokolan ya onona a manlikna na dakel a bengatla tan ipulisay na saya a kapolian. 

Luk 17:26 Et onong na agawa ed saray agew nen Noe, ontan met naani ed saray agew na Anak na too. 

Luk 17:27 Angan ira, naninum ira, angasawa'ra, tan akiasawa'ra, anga ed agew ya inloob nen Noe dia ed biong, tan sinmabi delap ed dineralto ran amin. 

Luk 17:28 Ontan met so agawa ed saray agew nen Lot; angan ira, naninum ira, nansaliw ira, nanlako'ra, nantanem ira, nanabung ira; 

Luk 17:29 Ingen dia ed agew ya impaway nen Lot ed Sodoma inmuran na apuy tan azufre nanlapu ed tawen, et dineralto'ra ya amin: 

Luk 17:30 Singa saya, ontan met naani ed agew a kipatnag na Anak na too. 

Luk 17:31 Dia ed satan ya agew, say wala ed toktok na abung, tan saray kayarian to dia ed abung, ag naani onakseb a mangala ed sikara: et say wala ed uma ontan met ag ompawil. 

Luk 17:32 Nodnonoten yo so asawa nen Lot. 

Luk 17:33 Angan siopa a manpaga a mangilaban na bilay to sikato'y nabalang to: ingen angan siopa a makabalang na bilay to sikato so nilaban to. 

Luk 17:34 Kuan ko ed sikayo, Dia ed satan a labi wala so duara'n lalaki ed sakey a dokolan; say sakey naala et say sakey napaulian. 

Luk 17:35 Wala naani duara'n bibii a pelesdan mangigiling; say sakey naala, et say sakey napaulian. 

Luk 17:36 (Wala naani duara a lalaki dia ed uma; say sakey naala, et say sakey napaulian). 

Luk 17:37 Et nen inmebat ira inkuan da ed sikato, Iner, Katawan? Et inkuan to ed sikara, No iner so kawalaan na bangkay, diman met so pantitiponan na saray aguila. 



Luk 18:1 Et sinalita to ed sikara so sakey ya alimbawa pian nepeg da lawas so manpikasi, tan ag ira komon napunaw; 

Luk 18:2 A kuan to, Wala so sakey ya okom ed sakey a ciudad, ya ag to antakot so Dios, et ag to pagalangan so too: 

Luk 18:3 Et wala'y sakey a bii a balo ed saman a ciudad; et maparanay a linma ed sikato, a kuan to, Isingil mo ak ed kabosol ko. 

Luk 18:4 Et inmaleg ed magano: ingen kayari to inkuan to ed inka sikato, Angan ag ko antakot so Dios, tan ag ko pagalangan so too; 

Luk 18:5 Manwari lapu'd saya a balo'n bii maka alipanes ed sika, sikato so isingil ko, ompan napatikey to ak ed naynay ya idarago to. 

Luk 18:6 Et inkuan na Katawan, Denglenyo so salita na okom ya ag matunong. 

Luk 18:7 Et say Dios ag to kasi naani isingil so saray pinili to, ya ontawag ed sikato ed agew tan labi, et sikato so maanus ed sikara? 

Luk 18:8 Kuan ko ed sikayo, a sikara so isingil to a tampol. Angaman ontan sano onla dia so Anak na too, makaromog kasi na pananisia ed dalin? 

Luk 18:9 Et sinalita to met so saya ya alimbawa ed saray arum a manmamatalek ed inka sikara a dili a singara matunong, et modmoraen da so arum: 

Luk 18:10 Duara'n totoo, linma ra ed templo a manpikasi; say sakey Fariseo, et say sananey publicano. 

Luk 18:11 Et say Fariseo nanalagey tan aki kasi ed onia a bokbokor to, Dios, misalamatak ed sika, ta aliwa ak a singa saray arum a totoo, a matatakew, aliwara'n matunong, mikakalugoran, ono angan singa saya a publicano. 

Luk 18:12 Manayunal ak a mamidua ed sakey simba; iiter ko so kakaplo na amin a naanap ko. 

Luk 18:13 Balet say publicano, a manalalagey ed arawi, ag to nitangay a maong so saray mata to ed tawen, ingen nandugal ed pagew to, a kuanto, Dios, kasian mo ak a managkasalanan. 

Luk 18:14 Kuan ko ed sikayo, Saya a too pinmawil ed abung to ya apatunong nen say sakey: ta angan siopa a mamaatagey ed sikato lanlamang napaabeba; et say manpaabeba napaatagey. 

Luk 18:15 Et inyaakar da met ed sikato so saray anak da ya ankekelag, pian diwiten tora: ingen sanen, anengneng na saray babangatan to binano da ra. 

Luk 18:16 Ingen si Jesus tinawag to'ra, a kuan to, Paulian yo ray ugugaw ya ondago ed siak, et agyo'ra sebelan: ta sikara so akankayarian ed panarian na Dios. 

Luk 18:17 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Siopaman ya ag mangawat na panariay Dios a singa sakey ya ugao ag naani makaloob diman. 

Luk 18:18 Et tinepet ed sikato na sakey a makaoley a kaunto, Maong a Managbangat, anto so nepeg ko a gawaen pian natawir ko so bilay ya andi angaan? 

Luk 18:19 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato Akin et tawagen mo ak na maong? Angapo so maong, nilikod so sakey, salanti say Dios. 

Luk 18:20 Antam so saray gangan, Agka mikalugoran, Agka mamatey, Agka mantakew, Agka mansalita na aliwan tua a pantasi, Igalangmo so amam tan inam. 

Luk 18:21 Et inkuan to, Amin so saraya a bengatla sinumpal ko ra nanlapu ed inkaugaw ka. 

Luk 18:22 Et nen nadngel nen Jesus, inkuan to ed sikato, Kulang ni ed sika so sakey a bengatla: ilakom so amin ya wala ed sika, et yotob mo ed saray duruka, et wala naani kayamanan mo ed tawen: et gala, tomboken mo ak. 

Luk 18:23 Ingen nen nadngel to so saraya a bengatla, naermenan na mapalalo; ta mayaman a toloy. 

Luk 18:24 Et si Jesus nen nanengneng to, inkuanto, Agay la so irap da ya onloob ed panarian na Dios so saray wala an na kayamanan! 

Luk 18:25 Ta maininomay ya onlabot so sakey a camello ed abut na sakey a dagum, nen say sakey a mayaman ya onloob ed panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 18:26 Et saray akadngel, inkuan da, Siopa sirin so nayari'n nilaban? 

Luk 18:27 Balet sikato inkuan to, Saray bengatla ya ag nayari ed saray totoo sikara so nayari ed Dios. 

Luk 18:28 Et si Pedro inkuan to, Nia, pinaulian mi kayarian mi, et tinombok mi ka. 

Luk 18:29 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Angapo so too ya amaulian na abung, ono asawa, ono agagi, ono atateng, ono anak, nipaakar ed panarian na Dios, 

Luk 18:30 Ya agto awaten so dakdakel ni a toloy ed sayan panaon, tan dia ed arapen a mundo so bilay ya andi angaan. 

Luk 18:31 Et si Jesus inala to so saray labindua, et inkuan to ed sikara, Nia, onla itayo ed Jerusalem, et saray amin a bengatla ya insulat na saray profeta nasumpal ed Anak na too. 

Luk 18:32 Ta niyawat ed saray Gentil, et naludlurey, tan napabpabaingan tan naluplupda an: 

Luk 18:33 Et sikato'y leweten da tan pateyen da: et dia ed komatlo ya agew onoli ed bilay. 

Luk 18:34 Et ag da atalosan so saraya a bengatla; et saya a salita niamot ed sikara, et ag da atebek so bengabengatla ya asalita. 

Luk 18:35 Et agawa, nen manasinger ed Jerico, sakey a bulag a laki manyodyorong ed gilig na dalan a niipapayabol: 

Luk 18:36 Et nen narengel to so katooan ya onlalabas, tinepe'to no anto ya kasi. 

Luk 18:37 Et inbaga ra ed sikato; ya onlalabas si Jesus a Nazareno. 

Luk 18:38 Et nanakis, a kuan to, Jesus, sika Anak nen David, kasian mo ak. 

Luk 18:39 Et saray manaakar ed onaan sikato so binano ra, pian ag onesel: ingen sikato so nanakis na nagkalalo ni, Sika Anak nen David, kasianmo ak. 

Luk 18:40 Et si Jesus tinmun da, et inggangan to a yakar da ed sikato: et nen inmasinger, tinepe'to ed sikato, 

Luk 18:41 Anto so labay mo a gawaen ko ed sika? Et inkuan to, Katawan, makanengneng ak komon. 

Luk 18:42 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Awaten mo so pakanengneng mo: say pananisiam inlaban to ka. 

Luk 18:43 Et tampol ya akanengneng, et tinmombok ed sikato, ya ingalgalang to so Dios; et amin ya ombaley, nen sikato so anengneng da, ingalgalang da so Dios. 



Luk 19:1 Et linmoob tan onlalabas ed Jerico. 

Luk 19:2 Et nia, sakey a laki a manngaran na Zaqueo; et sikato manonaan a publicano, tan mayaman. 

Luk 19:3 Et sineetan to a nanengneng si Jesus no siopa; et ag to ayarian nisengeg ed saray dakel a totoo, lapu ed melag ya inalageyan. 

Luk 19:4 Et binmatik ed onaan, tan kinmalab ed sakey a kiew a sikomoro pian sikato'y nengnengen to: ta onlabas ed saman a dalan. 

Luk 19:5 Et nen sinmabi Jesus ed petek, tinmangawa, tan inkuan to ed sikato, Zaqueo, manganat ka, tan onepas ka; ta natan kaokolan ya ondawes ak ed abung mo. 

Luk 19:6 Et nanganat, tan inmepas, et sikato so nawa'to a malikeliket. 

Luk 19:7 Et nen anengneng da nantalabotob ira ya amin, a kuan da, Linmoob a dinmawes ed sakey a toon managkasalanan.

Luk 19:8 Et si Zaqueo inmalagey, et inkuan to ed Katawan, Nia, Katawan, say kapaldua na saray kayarian ko iter ko ed saray duruka; et no wala so daiset ya anaolan ko ed siopaman a too, ipawil ko so mamipat a tobo. 

Luk 19:9 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato. Natan ya agew sinmabi kilalaban ed saya'n abung, bangta sikato so anak met nen Abraham. 

Luk 19:10 Ta say Anak na too linma dia a mananap tan mangilaban ed saray ahalang. 

Luk 19:11 Et nen nadngel da so saraya'n bengatla, inyarum to et sinalita to so sakey'a alimbawa, lapu ed sikato so asinger ed Jerusalem, tan lapu'd misip da a say panarian na Dios ompatnag a tampol. 

Luk 19:12 Inkuan to sirin, Sakey a mabli'n too linma ed sakey a dalin ya arawi, pian awaten to nipaakar ed sikato so sakey a panarian, tan ompawil. 

Luk 19:13 Et tinawag to so sanplora'n ariripen to, tan initdanto'ra na samplora'n mina, et inkuan to ed sikara' Pananap yo anga ed isabik. 

Luk 19:14 Balet saray kabaleyan to sikato'y ginula ra, et angibaki ra na ontombok ed sikato, a mangi kuan, Ag mi labay a saya'n too manari ed sikami. 

Luk 19:15 Et agawa, nen pinmawil lamet, nen inaku to so panarian, ya inganganto a saraya ya ariripen, ya angitdan to na pilak, natawag ira ed sikato, ta pian nakabatan to so nalmoan da. 

Luk 19:16 Et say inmuna pinmatnag ed sikato, a kuan to, Katawan, say minam akalmo na samplo ran mina. 

Luk 19:17 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Maong ya inka gawa, sika maong ya aripen: lapu ed apanmatalkan ka ed dagdaiset, wala so pakaoley mo ed samplora a ciudad. 

Luk 19:18 Et say komadua dinmago, a kuan to, Katawan, say minam akalmo na limara a mina. 

Luk 19:19 Et inkuan to ed sikato met. Sika met manuleyka ed limara a ciudad. 

Luk 19:20 Et say sananey dinmago a kuanto, Katawan, nia, wadia so minam, ya inyatol ko ed sakey a pano: 

Luk 19:21 Ta tinmakot'ak ed sika, ta too kan masebeg: alaen mo so ag mo inyan, tan anien mo so ag mo intanem; 

Luk 19:22 Sikato kuanto ed sikato, Marelmeng ya aripen, dia ed sangim so pangokoman koed sika. Antam atoo ak a masebeg, ya alaen ko so ag ko inyan, tan anien ko so ag ko intanerri; 

Luk 19:23 Akin sirin ya ag mo inter, so pila'ko ya inpaabangan, pian dia ed isabik singelen ko a pati say abang? 

Luk 19:24 Et inkuanto ed saray wala ya akaarap, Ekalen yo ed sikato so mina, et sikato so iter yo ed walaaft na samplora. 

Luk 19:25 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Katawan, sikato so walaan na samplora a mina. 

Luk 19:26 Siak kuan ko ed sikayo, ya angan siopa ya walaan sikato so naitdan; ingen say andian, angan say wala ed sikato naekal ed sikato. 

Luk 19:27 Ingen sarayan kabosol ko, ya ag da komon labay a manari ak ed sikara, yakadyo'ra dia, et pateyen yo'ra ed arap ko. 

Luk 19:28 Et nen sinalita to so onia, linma ed onaan, ya ontakdang ed Jerusalem. 

Luk 19:29 Et agawa, a nen asinger ed Betfage tan Betania, ed palandey a manngaran na Kaolivaan, ingangan to so duara ed saray babangatan, 

Luk 19:30 A kuan to, Onia kayo ed baley ya wala ed arap yo; diman sano onloob kayo makaromog kayo na sakey a kilaw ya asno a nisinger, ya ag ni kinabayoan na siopaman a too: okbaran yo, et sikato so yakar yo dia. 

Luk 19:31 Et no wala so mantepet ed sikayo, Akin et sikato so okbaran yo? kuan yo so onia, Say Katawan sikato so kaokolan to. 

Luk 19:32 Et linma so saray nibaki, et aromog da so onong na inkuan to ed sikara. 

Luk 19:33 Et nen ookbaran da so kilaw ya asno, saray akankayarian inkuan da ed sikara, Akin et okbaran yo so kilaw ya asno? 

Luk 19:34 Et inkuan da, Sikato so kaokolan na Katawan. 

Luk 19:35 Et sikato so inyakar da ed Jesus: et inyan da so saray kawes da ed beneg na kilaw ya asno, et imyorong si Jesus diman. 

Luk 19:36 Et nen manaakar, inbilkag da so saray kawes da ed dalan. 

Luk 19:37 Et bang nen asinger la ed alosadsar na palandey a Koalivaan, say lapag na karaklan na babangatan ingapora so nanliket tan angigalgalang ed Dios ed baleg a voces nisengeg ed saray amin a makapanyari ya gawgawa ya anengneng da; 

Luk 19:38 A kuan da, Bendito so Ari ya onia dia ed ngaran na Katawan: deen ed tawen, tan gloria dia ed sankatageyan. 

Luk 19:39 Et saray arum ed saray Fariseo ya nanlapu ed karaklan inkuan da ed sikato, Managbangat, banom so saray babangatan mo. 

Luk 19:40 Et inmebat tan inkuan to, Kuan ko ed sikayo, a no saraya ag ira komon onesel, saray bato maningal ira. 

Luk 19:41 Et nen sinmabi ed asinger, anengneng to so ciudad et ninangisan to, 

Luk 19:42 A kuanto, No naamtaan mo komon dia ed sayan agew, salanti sika, so saray nipaakar ed deen mo! balet natan niamot ira ed saray matam. 

Luk 19:43 Ta onsabi so saray agew ed sika, sano saray kabosol mo liktoben da ka, naani na kuta, tan liktoben da ka, tan ed amin a pasen aposan da ka, 

Luk 19:44 Et igeba ra ka ed dalin, tan saray anak mo dia ed dalem mo; et ag da naani paulian ed sika so sakey a bato ed tapew na sakey; lapu ed ag mo nibiig so agew a kadalaw mo. 

Luk 19:45 Et linmoob ed templo, et ginapoan to a pinapaway so saray lumalako, 

Luk 19:46 A kuan to ed sikara, Walan nisulat, Et say abung ko sikato naani abung na pikakasi: ingen sikato so ginawayo ya ungib na saray matakew. 

Luk 19:47 Et nanbangat ya inagewagew dia ed templo. Ingen saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray escriba tan saray manonaan ed saray ombaley sineetan da a pateyen komon: 

Luk 19:48 Balet ag ira akalmo na gawaen da; ta saray amin ya ombaley nisabit ira ed sikato, a mandengdengel. 



Luk 20:1 Et agawa, ed sakey ed saray agew, nen manbabangat ed saray ombaley dia ed templo, tan inpupulong to so evangelio, diman sinmabi ed sikato so saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray escriba pati saray mamasiken; 

Luk 20:2 Et nansalita ra, a kuanda ed sikato Ibagam; Lapu ed siopa pakauley so pangawaan mo na saraya a bengatla? ono Siopa so angiter ed sika na saya'n pakauley? 

Luk 20:3 Et inmebat tan inkuan to ed sikara; Siak tepeten ko met ed sikayo so sakey a tepet; et ibaga yo ed siak: 

Luk 20:4 Say binyag nen Juan, nanlapu ed tawen, ono ed saray totoo? 

Luk 20:5 Et ninonot da ed inka sikara lanlamang, a kuan da, No ikuan tayo, Nanlapu ed tawen; ikuan to, Akin et agkayo anisia ed sikato? 

Luk 20:6 Balet no ikuan tayo, Nanlapu ed saray totoo; amin ya ombaley topaken da itayo: ta sinisia ra a si Juan sakey ed saray profetas. 

Luk 20:7 Et inmebat ira, ya agda amta no iner so nanlapuan to. 

Luk 20:8 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Siak ag ko met ibaga ed sikayo no siopa pakauley so pangawaan ko ed saraya'n bengatla. 

Luk 20:9 Et ingapo to a sinalita ed saray ombaley so saya'n alimbawa: Sakey a too nantanem na sakey a kauvasan, et impaabang to ed saray tomatalon, tan linma ed sananey a dalin ed abayag a panaon. 

Luk 20:10 Et nen panaon to la, angibaki sakeya'a aripen ed saray tomatalon, pian iter da ed sikato so bunga na kauvasan; ingen saray tomatalon sikato so pine pekpek da tan pinapa-wil da a paoy-paoy. 

Luk 20:11 Et angibaki ni sananey ya aripen: et sikato met so pine pekpek da, tan nantamian da na makapabaing, tan sikato so pinapawil da a paoy-paoy. 

Luk 20:12 Et angibaki ni komatlo: et sikato met so sinugatan da, tan sikato so pinatainan da. 

Luk 20:13 Et say katawan na kauvasan inkuan to, Anto'y gawaen ko? Ibakik so ana' ko ya inararo: sikato so derlengen da lagi. 

Luk 20:14 Ingen saray tomatalon nen sikato so anengneng da, nansasalita ra ed sakey tan sakey, a kuan da, Saya sikato so mananawir; sikato so pateyen tayo, pian say tawir kayarian tayo. 

Luk 20:15 Et sikato so intuldon da ed paway na kauvasan, tan sikato'y pinatey da. Anto sirin so gawaen na katawan na kauvasan ed sikara? 

Luk 20:16 Onla naani et deralen to so saraya a tomatalon, tan iter to so kauvasan ed saray arum. Et nen nadngelan da, inkuan da, Say Dios ag to komon yabuloy. 

Luk 20:17 Ingen ninmengneng ed sikara, tan inkuan to, Anto sirin so saya'n a nisulat, Say bato ya impulisay na saray manamaalagey na abung, Sikato lanlamang so agawa ya olo na suyok? 

Luk 20:18 Balang sakey a napelag ed satan a bato, napisagpisag naani; ingen siopaman a kapelagan to naani, sikato'y mekmeken to'n singa sapok. 

Luk 20:19 Et sineetan na saray escribas tan saray manonaan a sacerdotes ya erelen ed saman ya horas, et tinakotan da so saray ombaley: ta atalosan da a sinalita to so saya ya alimbawa a sumpa ed sikara. 

Luk 20:20 Et sikato so sinisiim da, tan nanbaki ra na mansiim, a nankonkonwari ra a matunong, pian sikato so naerel da ed saray salita, pian dia ed ontan sikato so yawat da ed betang tan pakauley na gobernador. 

Luk 20:21 Et tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da, Managbangat, amta mi a mansasalita ka tan manbabangat ka a matunong, et agmo bi-igbi-igen so inkatoo na siopaman, no ag ingen ibangat mo a tua so dalan na Dios: 

Luk 20:22 Matunong kasi ed sikami so pambayar na buis ed Cesar, ono andi? 

Luk 20:23 Ingen sikato naamtaan to so silib da, et inkuan to ed sikara, 

Luk 20:24 Ipanengneng yo ed siak so sakey a denario. Siopa so akantalintao tan akansulat ed sikato? Et inkuan da, Si Cesar. 

Luk 20:25 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Iter yo sirin ed Cesar so betang nen Cesar, et dia ed Dios so saray bengatla a betang na Dios. 

Luk 20:26 Et ag da ayarian ya inerel ed saray salita to ed arap na saray ombaley: et nankelawan da so eba'to tan ag ira inmesel. 

Luk 20:27 Et dinmago ed sikato so arum a Saduceo, a sikara so man kuan ya angapo so kioli ed bilay; 

Luk 20:28 Et tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da: Managbangat, si Moises, insula'to ed sikami, a no say agi a laki na sakey, a too ompatey a wala'y asawa to, et angapo so anak to, say asawa to alaen komon na agi to, et ipaalageyan to na poli so agi to. 

Luk 20:29 Wala sirin so pitora, a sanaagi: et say pangoloan angala na asawa'n bii, et inatey ya angapoy anak; 

Luk 20:30 Et say komadua (inala to so asawa to; et inatey met ya andi anak;) 

Luk 20:31 Et sikato so inala na komatlo; et ontan a nansasaginonor ira a pito, a sikara'y inatey ya angapoy anak. 

Luk 20:32 Et dia ed kasumpalan inatey met so bii. 

Luk 20:33 Sano kioli ed bilay sirin, siopa ed sikara so akanasawa ed sikato? ta sikato so inasawa na saray pitora. 

Luk 20:34 Et si Jesus inkuan to ed sikara, Saray anak na saya'n mundo mangasawa ra, tan miasawa ra: 

Luk 20:35 Ingen saray nipasen a manepeg a makarandan ed saman a mundo, tan say kioli ed bilay a manlapu ed saray inaatey, ag ira mangasawa, ag ira met miasawa: 

Luk 20:36 Ta ag da la nayari ompatey: ta kaparpara ra so saray angeles; et anak ira na Dios, ta sikara so anak na kioli ed bilay. 

Luk 20:37 Balet satan so kioli ed bilay na saray inaatey, angan si Moises impatnag to, dia ed pasen nipaakar ed Zarza, nen tinawag to so Katawan a Dios nen Abraham, tan Dios nen Isaac, tan Dios nen Jacob. 

Luk 20:38 Ta sikato aliwan Dios na saray inatey, no ag ingen saray mabilay: ta manbiiay so amin nipaakar ed sikato. 

Luk 20:39 Et arum ed saray escribas nen inmebat ira inkuan da, Managbangat, maong so inkuan mo. 

Luk 20:40 Et agda la nitepel so angitepet ed sikato na antokaman. 

Luk 20:41 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Panon so pangikuan da a si Cristo anak nen David? 

Luk 20:42 Ta si David met lanlamang kuan to ed libro na Salmos, Inkuan na Katawan ed Katawan ko, Onyorong ka ed nikawanan ko, 

Luk 20:43 Anga ed pangawak ed saray kabosol mo a gagatinan na saray salim. 

Luk 20:44 Si David sirin sikato so tawagen to a Katawan, et panon a sikato so anak to? 

Luk 20:45 Et sanen dengdenglen na saray amin ya ombaley inkuan to ed saray babangatan to, 

Luk 20:46 Manlikas kayo ed saray escribas, a kaliktan da so manakar ya akakawes na andukey, tan aroen da'y pa ngibano ed sikara ed saray plaza, tan saray nitalongaring a yorongan ed saray sinagoga, tan saray manonaan a pasen ed saray duypoan; 

Luk 20:47 A sikara so mangakmon ed saray abung na saray bibii a balo, et gawaen da a baraan so saray andurukey a pikakasi: saraya awaten da naani abalbaleg a kadusa. 



Luk 21:1 Et nen linmingaw, tan anengneng to so saray mamayaman ya ipepelag da so saray tokdol da dia ed panangyatolan na tokdol. 

Luk 21:2 Et anengneng to so akey a dukan balo a bii ya impelag tod man so duara'n maravilis. 

Luk 21:3 Et inkuan to, Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Sayan duka a balo'n bii angipelag na dakdakel nen sikara ya amin: 

Luk 21:4 Ta amin so saraya dia ed masulok ed sikara so angalan da na ipelagda ed saray tokdol: ingen sikato dia ed kakuiangan to inpelag to so amin a pantagano ya wala ed sikato. 

Luk 21:5 Et nen sinalita na arum so nipaakar ed templo, no panon so inkaalonganto ed saray malimgas a bato bato tan toktokdol, inkuan to, 

Luk 21:6 Nipaakar ed saraya'n bengatla a nanengneng yo, onsabi so saray agew, ya angapo so natilak a sakey a bato ed tapew na sakey ya ag naani nageba. 

Luk 21:7 Et tinepet da ed sikato, a kuan da, Managbangat, kapigan sirin so kagawa na saraya'n bengatla? Tan anto naani tanda no saraya'n bengatla asingerlara a nagawa? 

Luk 21:8 Et inkuan to, Nengneng yo ta ag kayo komon nibalang: ta dakel naani ray onsabi ed ngaran ko, a kuan da, Siak iman; tan, Asinger, la so panaon: ag kayo ontombok ed sikara. 

Luk 21:9 Et sano narengel yo so saray bakal tan gewgew ag kayo natakot: ta kaokolan a saraya'n bengatla nagawa ra ya onona; ingen ag naani onsublay a tampol so pangangaan. 

Luk 21:10 Saman la inkuan to ed sikara, Onalagey naani nacion sumpa ed nacion, tan panarian sumpa ed panarian: 

Luk 21:11 Et wala ra naani ankakabaleg a yegyeg, tan dia ed nambabangil a pasen, eras tan salot; et wala ra naani makapatakot tan angkakabaleg a tanda a manlapu ed tawen. 

Luk 21:12 Ingen arapen na saraya'n amin a bengatla, erelen da kayo naani, tan pairapen da kayo, yawatda kayo ed saray sinagoga tan panangipangawan, ya yakar da kayo ed arap na saray arari tan saray makauley nisengeg ed ngaran ko. 

Luk 21:13 Et saya nagawa naani ed sikayo a pamatua. 

Luk 21:14 Paligenen yo sirin ed kapusoan yo, ya ag kayo manmotektek ya unona no panon naani yebat yo: 

Luk 21:15 Ta siak itdan ta kayo naani sangi tan kakabatan, ya ag nayarian a liktaran tan sumpaen na saray kabusol yo. 

Luk 21:16 Balet sikayo so yawat na angan saray atateng yo, tan agagi tan kakanayon tan kakaaro; et arum ed sikayo pateyen da. 

Luk 21:17 Et kagula kayo naani na saray amin a totoo nisengeg ed ngaran ko. 

Luk 21:18 Et angan sakey a buek na olo yo ag nabalang. 

Luk 21:19 Dia ed pantepel yo natalima yo naani kamarerwa yo. 

Luk 21:20 Ingen sano nanengneng yo so Jerusalem a niliktob na saray ejercito, saman la amtaen yo a say kabagbag to asinger la. 

Luk 21:21 Saman la saray wala ed Judea ombatik ira ed saray palandey; et saray wala ed pegley to, ontainan ira; et saray wala ed uma ag ira onloob ed sikato. 

Luk 21:22 Ta saraya sikara'y agew na pangibales, pian nasumpal ya amin so nisulat. 

Luk 21:23 Abagey la so saray mamalokon tan saray manpapasoso ed saratan ya agew! ta wala naani baleg ya irap ed tapew na dalin, tan sanok ed saya'n baley. 

Luk 21:24 Et napelag ira naani ed tarem na kampilan, et niakar ira'n nadakep ed saray amin a nacion: et say Jerusalem igatin naani na saray Gentiles, anga ed kasumpal na saray agew na saray Gentiles. 

Luk 21:25 Et wala naani tanda dia'd agew tan bulan tan saray bibitewen; et dia ed tapew na dalin irap na saray nacion, dia ed katanagel ed ongol na day at tan saray daluyon; 

Luk 21:26 Saray totoo napunaw ira nisengeg ed takot, tan egagel da ed saray bengatla'n onsabi ed mundo: ta saray pakayari na saray tawen natenyeg naani. 

Luk 21:27 Et saman la nanengneng da so Anak na too ya onsabi dia ed sakey a lurem pati pakapanyari tan baleg a gloria. 

Luk 21:28 Balet sano ongapu a nagawa so saraya a bengatla, tangay kayo, et itangua yo so saray olo yo; ta say karondon yo asinger la. 

Luk 21:29 Et sinalita to ed sikara so sakey ya alimbawa: nengneng yo so kiew ya higos, tan saray amin a kiew: 

Luk 21:30 Bang sanomanolnos ira, nanengneng yo et amta yo ed inkasikayo a say tiagew asinger la. 

Luk 21:31 Ontan yo metsano nanengneng yo so saraya'n bengatla a nagawa, amtaen yo a say panaria'y Dios asinger la. 

Luk 21:32 Tua kuan ko ed sikayo, Saya a poli ag onlabas, anga ed nagawa so sarayan amin a bengatla. 

Luk 21:33 Say tawen tan dalin onlabas ira naani: ingen saray salitak ag ira onlabas. 

Luk 21:34 Balet manlikas kayo ed inkasikayo ompan saray puso yo napano ed inkasiba, tan panagbuek, tan saray kapagaan ed saya'n bilay, et onsabi ed sikayo ed kasanlilikna so saman ya agew a singa sakey a patit: 

Luk 21:35 Ta ontan so isabito ed saray amin a manaayam ed tapew na amin a dalin. 

Luk 21:36 Balet manbantay kayo ed amin a panaon, a mikasi kayo, pian ontalona kayo a nilaban ed sarayan amin a bengatla'n nagawa, tan makaalagey kayo ed arap na Anak na too. 

Luk 21:37 Et nanbabangat ya inagewagew dia ed templo; et nilabilabi ya pinmaway, tan nagtuloy ed palandey a tatawagen na Kaolivaan. 

Luk 21:38 Et amin ya ombaley dinmago'ran asaksakbay ed kabuasan ed sikato dia ed templo, pian ondengel ira ed sikato. 



Luk 22:1 Bang say fiesta na tinapay ya andi levadura asinger la a sikato so inngaran a Pascua. 

Luk 22:2 Et saray manunaan a sacerdotes tan saray escribas inanap da no panon so pamatey da ed sikato; ta antakot da so katooan. 

Luk 22:3 Et sinmelep si Satanas ed Judas ya inngaran na Iscariote, a sakey ed bilang na saray labindua, 

Luk 22:4 Et linma, et akisalita ed saray manonaan a sacerdote tan saray kapitan, no panon so pangyawa'to sikato ed sikara. 

Luk 22:5 Et linmiket ira, et nanpapaknaan da a sikato'y itdan da na pilak, 

Luk 22:6 Et akisipan, et nananap na makana a pangyawa'to ed sikato dia ed sikara ya angapo so dakel a totoo. 

Luk 22:7 Et sinmabi agew na tinapay ya andi levadura, a sikato so pankaokolan ya ibagat so pascua. 

Luk 22:8 Et imbaki to ra di Pedro tan Juan, ya inkuan to, Onla kayo tan itadia yoy nipaakar ed sikatayo so pascua, pian mangan itayo. 

Luk 22:9 Et inkuan da ed sikato, Iner so labay mo pantadiaanmi? 

Luk 22:10 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Nia, sano makaloob kayo ed ciudad, naabet kayor man na sakey a too a nanawit na sambuyog a danum; sikato'y tomboken yo ed abung a laen to. 

Luk 22:11 Et ikuan yo ed akan abung, Say Managbangat kuan to ed sika, Iner so kawalaan na pananangkailian a silir, a panganan ko na pasko pati saray babangatan ko? 

Luk 22:12 Et ipanengneng to ed sikayo so sakey a baleg a silir ya atagey ya aparakpan: diman mantadia kayo. 

Luk 22:13 Et linma ra, et aromog da so onong na imbaga to ed sikara: et intadia ra so pasko. 

Luk 22:14 Et nen sinmabi horas, dinmongo, et ibato so saray apostoles. 

Luk 22:15 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Nanpilalekan ko a sipipilalek so mikan ed sikayo ed saya a pasko ed arapen na panirap ko: 

Luk 22:16 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, sikato'y agko la kanen, anga ed sikato so nasumpal ed panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 22:17 Et angala na sakey a copa, et sanen akapisalamat, inkuan to, Alaen yo ya, et sikato'y apagapagen yo ed inkasikayo: 

Luk 22:18 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, Agak la oninum a manlapu ed natan na bunga na uvas, anga ed isabi panaria'y Dios. 

Luk 22:19 Et angala na tinapay, et sanenakapisalamat, pinisag to, et inter to ed sikara, a kuan to, Saya sikato'y laman ko a niiter nisengeg ed sikayo; gawayo' ya a pakanodnonotan ed siak. 

Luk 22:20 Et say copa ontan met kayari panamangdem, ya inkuan to, Saya a copa sikato so balo'n sipan dia ed dalak, a naibung nisengeg ed sikayo. 

Luk 22:21 Ingen nia, say lima na mangyawat ed siak wala a pati siak ed pananganan. 

Luk 22:22 Ta peteg a say Anak na too onla, a singa nigeter: ingen abagey la, so too a mangyawat ed sikato! 

Luk 22:23 Et ginapoan da'n tinepet ed sikara lanlamang, no siopa kasi ed sikara so mangawa na saya'n bengatla. 

Luk 22:24 Et agawa met ed sikara so sakey a siblangan no siopa ed sikara so nibilang a kabalbalgan. 

Luk 22:25 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Saray arari na saray Gentiles walay inkakatawan da ed sikara, et saray walaan na pakaoley ed sikara natawag ira a Mapalangkap. 

Luk 22:26 Ingen sikayo aliwa'n ontan: ingen say balbaleg ed sikayo, sikato so magmaliw a singa kayogtanan; et say manonaan, sikato so singa aripen. 

Luk 22:27 Ta siopa so babaleg, say ondongo ed dulang ono say mansirve? Aliwa kasi a say ondongo ed dulang? Ingen walaak ed pegle'yo a singa sakey a mansirve. 

Luk 22:28 Bangbalet sikayo so nansiansia ed siak ed saray inkatoktoksok; 

Luk 22:29 Et manoroak ed sikayo na sakey a panarian, a singa say Amak anoro ed siak, 

Luk 22:30 Pian makapikan tan makapiinumkayo ed dulang ko dia ed panarian ko; et onyorong kayo ed saray trono a mangokom ed labindua a poli na Israel. 

Luk 22:31 Simon, Simon, nia, si Satanas kinerew toka, pian nagalpong to ka a singa trigo: 

Luk 22:32 Ingen inpikasi taka, pian say pananisiam ag onkulang; et sika, sano makapagbabawika la, pabiskegen mo so saray agagim. 

Luk 22:33 Et inkuan to ed sikato, Katawan, maparaanak ya ontombok ed sika nanpadpara ed pangipangawan tan ed patey. 

Luk 22:34 Et inkuan to, Ibagak ed sika, Pedro, say lalong ag onkokaok natan ya agew, anga ed mamitlo a pangiburim a kabkabat moak. 

Luk 22:35 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Sanen imbaki ta kayo ya andi bolsa, tan supot, tan sapin, kinmulang kayo na bengatla? Et inkuan da, Andi. 

Luk 22:36 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Ingen natan, say walaan na bolsa, alaen to, et ontan met so supot; et say andian, ilako to so kolibenben to, et manaliw na kampilan. 

Luk 22:37 Ta kuan ko ed sikayo, a kaokolan a nasumpal ed siak so saya'n nisulat, Et nibilang ed saray makasalanan: ta say nisulat a nipaakar ed siak wala'y kasumpalan to. 

Luk 22:38 Et inkuan da, Katawan, nia wadia so duara'n kampilan. Et inkuan to ed sikara, Sarag la. 

Luk 22:39 Et pinmaway, tan linma, singa naugalian to, ed palandey na saray Olivo; et saray babangatan tinmombok ira met ed sikato. 

Luk 22:40 Et nen wala ed pasen, inkuan to ed sikara, Mikasi kayo pian agkayo onloob ed katotok so. 

Luk 22:41 Et sinmian ed sikara ed singa nagawat na sakey a bato ya itupak; et tinmalimokor tan akikasi, 

Luk 22:42 A kuan to, Ama, no labay mo, yarawim so saya a copa ed siak: angaman ontan aliwa a say linawak no ag say linawam so nasumpal. 

Luk 22:43 Et pinmatnag ed sikato so sakey'a angel a nanlapu ed tawen, ya amabiskeg ed sikato. 

Luk 22:44 Et sanen manpapanabos akikasi na lalo a marmarlang; et say linge'to singa angkakabaleg a tedter na dala a sinmaklayat anga ed dalin. 

Luk 22:45 Et nen inmalagey ed pikakasi to, linma ed saray babangatan, et aromog tora ya akaugip nisengeg ed kaermenan. 

Luk 22:46 Et inkuan to ed sikara, Akin naugip kayo? On alagey kayo tan mikasi kayo, pian ag kayo onloob ed katotokso. 

Luk 22:47 Sanen mansasalita ni, nia, dakel a katooan, tan saman so manngaran na Judas, sakey ed saray labindua: wala ed onaan da; et inmasinger ed Jesus pian onangob ed sikato. 

Luk 22:48 Ingen si Jesus inkuan to ed sikato, Judas, diad sakey ya angob yawat mo so Anak na too? 

Luk 22:49 Et nen anengneng na saray asinger ed sikato so nagawa, inkuan da, Katawan, mangabil kami ed kampilan? 

Luk 22:50 Et sakey ed sikara sinigba'to so aripen na atagey a sacerdote, et pinengal to so layag to'n nikawanan.
